verse_text: Okutonda obuzaale bwa Yesu Kristo, omwijukuru wa Daudi, omwijukuru wa Abburahamu.
Abburahamu akazaara, Isaaka, Isaaka yazaara Yakobbo, Yakobbo yazaara Yuda n'abagenzi be.
Yuda yazaara Perezi na Zeera, nyinabo nuwe Taamali; Perezi akazaara Hezirooni, Hezirooni yazaara Ramu.
Ramu akazaara Aminadabbu, Aminadabbu yazaara Nahasooni, Nahasooni yazaara Salumoni.
Salumoni akazaara Bowazi, nyina nuwe Rahabbu; Bowazi yazaara Obedi, nyina nuwe Lusi; Obedi yazaara Yese,
Yese yazaara Daudi Omukama. Daudi yazaara Solomoni hali ogu ow'akaba ali muka Uriya.
Solomoni akazaara Rehobbowamu, Rehobbowamu yazaara Abiya, Abiya yazaara Asa.
Asa yazaara Yehosafaati, Yehosafaati yazaara Yoramu, Yoramu akazaara Uziya.
Uziya yazaara Yotaamu, Yotaamu yazaara Ahazi, Ahazi yazaara Hezekiya,
Hezekiya yazaara Manaase, Manaase yazaara Amosi, Amosi yazaara Yosiya.
Yosiya akazaara Yekoniya n'abagenzi be, omu biro baanyagiirwemu okutwarwa Bbabbulooni.
Obu baamazire kutwarwa Bbabbulooni, Yekoniya akazaara Seyalityeri, Seyalityeri yazaara Zerubaabeli,
Zerubaabeli yazaara Abiyudi, Abiyudi yazaara Eliyakimu, Eliyakimu yazaara Azoori.
Azoori akazaara Zadoki, Zadoki yazaara Akimu, Akimu yazaara Eliyudi.
Eliyudi akazaara Eryeza, Eryeza yazaara Mataani, Mataani yazaara Yakobbo.
Yakobbo ogu nuwe yazaire Yosefu iba Mariya, nyina Yesu arukwetwa Kristo.

Nahabweki okuruga hali Abburahamu okuhika hali Daudi haroho bwijukuru ikumi na bbuna; okuruga hali Daudi okuhika ha kutwarwa Bbabbulooni naho haroho obwijukuru ikumi na bbuna; kandi okuruga ha kutwarwa Bbabbulooni okuhika ha kuzaarwa kwa Kristo, nabwo bwijukuru bundi ikumi na bbuna.
Eby'okuzaarwa kwa Yesu Kristo bikaba biti: Mariya nyina, obu akaba ajumbiirwe Yosefu, akazooka aina enda ya Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Yosefu iba, habw'okusangwa ali musaija ahikiriire, atagonze kumuhemura omu bantu, baitu yacwamu kumuleka omu nsita.

Obu akaba naakyateekereza ebi, malaika wa Mukana yamubonekera omu kirooto naagamba ati: “Yosefu, mwijukuru wa Daudi, otatiina kugabura Mariya mukazi waawe, habwokuba atwaire enda habw'amaani ga Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Alizaara omwana omwojo, olimuruka ibara lye Yesu, habwokuba nuwe alijuna abantu be ebibi byabu.”
Ebi byona bikabaho nukwo bihikirize MUKAMA ebi yagambiire omu kanwa k'omurangi ati:
“Omwisiki empikirre alitwara enda, azaale omwana omwojo, kandi alyetwa ibara Emanueli.” (Amakuru gaalyo: Ruhanga ali na itwe.)
Yosefu obu yasisiimukire, yakora malaika wa MUKAMA eki yamugambiire, yagabura Mariya;
kandi atamumanye atakazaire omwana omwojo. Yosefu yamuruka ibara lye Yesu.
Yesu obu yazairwe omu Betelehemu orwa Buyudaaya, omu businge bwa Herode Omukama, abasaija abanyamagezi bakaija Yerusaalemu nibaruga Burugaizooba, baakaguza bati:
“Omukama w'Abayudaaya anyakuzairwe araha? Habwokuba tukarora enyunyuuzi ye Burugaizooba, hati twizire kumuramya.”
Omukama Herode obu yahuliire eki, yatuntura hamu n'aba Yerusaalemu boona.
Nubwo yasoroize banyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro yabakaguliriza nambere Kristo ali w'okuzaarwa.
Baamugarukamu bati: “Omu Betelehemu orwa Buyudaaya; habwokuba nukwo kyahandiikirwe omurangi kiti:
‘Iwe Betelehemu orw'omu nsi ya Yuda, toli muke omu balemi baayo; habwokuba omuli iwe nuho haliruga omulemi ow'alirema abantu bange Abaisirairi’.”
Nubwo Herode yayesire abanyamagezi kumurora omunsita, yabakaguza muno bamumanyise akasumi konyini aka baaroliiremu enyunyuuzi.
Yabatuma Betelehemu ati: “Mugende muserre muno omwana, obu muraamuzoora, mwije mummanyise, nukwo na nyowe ngende mmuramye.”
Obu baamazire kuhurra omukama ebi yabaragiire, baagenda; kandi enyunyuuzi eri ei baaroliire Burugaizooba yabeebembera kuhika obu yayemeriire omwana nambere akaba ali.
Obu baarozire enyunyuuzi, baakyanganuka muno.
Kandi obu baataahire omunju, baarora omwana na Mariya nyina, baajumara, baamuramya, baasumurra ensaho zaabo, baamurabuka ebisembo: ezaabbu, obubbani, n'emigaju.
Kandi obu baahabwirwe Ruhanga omu kirooto okutagaruka hali Herode, bakatwarwa omuhanda gundi kugarukayo owabu bo.

Abanyamagezi obu baamazire kugenda, malaika wa MUKAMA yabonekera Yosefu omu kirooto, naagamba ati: “Imuka, otwale omwana na nyina, osingirwe Misiri, oikaleyo okuhika obu ndikugambira; habwokuba Herode ayeteekaniize kuseera omwana n'okumwita.”
Nubwo Yosefu yaimukire ekiro, yatwara omwana na nyina, baagenda Misiri;
baikarayo kuhikya Herode obu yafiire. Nukwo MUKAMA eki yagambisize omurangi kihikirre ngu: “Nkeeta omwana wange aruge Misiri.”

Herode obu yayetegeriize abanyamagezi nkooku baamugobiize, yakwatwa ekiniga kingi muno. Yaragira kwita abaana aboojo boona abakaba bali omu Betelehemu n'omu byaro ebiherraineho, abakaba bahikize emyaka ebiri n'abatakagihikize, naihirra ha kasumi abanyamagezi aka baamugambiire.
Aho omurangi Yeremiya eki yarangire kyahikirra ngu:
“Iraka likahulirwa omu Rama, ery'okutaabaana n'okuteera empamo; Rakeeli naalirirra abaana be, atarukwenda kuhuu muzibwa, habwokuba boona bahoireho.”
Herode obu yamazire kufa, malaika wa MUKAMA yabonekera Yosefu omu kirooto ali Misiri,
naagamba ati: “Imuka, otwale omwana na nyina, mugaruke omunsi ya Isirairi; habwokuba abaaserraga kwita omwana bafiire.”
Nubwo yaimukire, yatwara omwana na nyina, baagarukayo omunsi ya Isirairi.
Baitu Yosefu obu yahuliire Akiraho nkooku nuwe atiire engoma ya Herode ise, yatiina kugyayo. Obu yahabwirwe Ruhanga omu kirooto, yarugayo yagenda omu isaza lya Galiraaya.
Yagenda yaikara omu rubuga orurukwetwa Nazareeti, nukwo ekyagambirwe abarangi kihikirre kiti: “Alyetwa Munyanazareeti.”
Omu biro ebi, Yohaana Omubatiza akaija naarangirra omwirungu lya Buyudaaya,
naagamba ati: “Mwegarukemu, habwokuba obukama bw'omwiguru buli haihi.”
Nuwe ogu omurangi Isaaya ou yagambireho ati: “Iraka ly'ogu arukwamiira omwirungu ati: Muteekanirize MUKAMA omuhanda, mutereekereze obuhanda bwe.”
Yohaana ogu yajwaraga ekijwaro ky'ebyoya by'engamiya, yayeteegesaaga orukoba rw'oruhu; kandi yalyaga enzige n'obwoki bw'enjoki ez'omwirungu.
Abantu baarugaga Yerusaalemu n'omu isaza lyona erya Buyudaaya n'omunsi eziheriire ekisaaru Yorudaani, nibaija nambere ali.
Yababatirizaaga omu kisaaru Yorudaani nibaatura ebibi byabu.
Yohaana obu yarozire Abafalisaayo baingi n'Abasadukaayo nibaija kubatizibwa, yabagambira ati: “Inywe abaana b'enjoka! Nooha ayabahabwire kwiruka obukaya bwa Ruhanga obutagarukirra?
Mukole ebikorwa ebirukwoleka nkooku mwegarukiremu.
Muleke kwesigura muti: ‘Twina isenkuru itwe Abburahamu’; baitu nimbagambira nti: Amabaale ganu, Ruhanga asobora kugaihiramu Abburahamu abaijukuru.
Nangwa na hati endemu etairwe ha bikoro by'emiti. Omuti gwona ogutarukwana bijuma ebirungi nigwija kutemwa, gunagwe omu murro.
“Nyowe nimbabatiza n'amaizi habw'okwegarukamu, baitu ogu arukwija enyuma, nankiza obusobozi, kandi tinsemeriire n'okumukwatiraho enkaito ze; uwe alibabatiza na Mwoyo Ahikiriire n'omurro;
kandi akwasire orugali rwe kuhehemukya, naija kusingorra orubuga rwe, nukwo ahunike oburo omu nguli ye, kandi ebisunga abyokye omu murro ogutaraara.”
Nubwo Yesu yarugire Galiraaya, yagenda Yorudaani kubatizibwa Yohaana.
Baitu Yohaana yagonza kumwangirra naagamba ati: “Nyowe ninyetaaga ombatize, kandi iwe noija hali nyowe?”
Baitu Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Hati iwe ikiriza tukole tuti, nukwo tuhikirize byona Ruhanga ebi arukutugondeza.” Aho Yohaana yaikiriza.
Yesu obu yamazire kubatizibwa, ahonaaho yaruga omu maizi, iguru lyakinguka, yarora Mwoyo wa Ruhanga naamusirimukaho omu kisisani ky'eriiba, naamwijaho;
n'iraka lyaruga omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Ogu nuwe Mwana wange omugonzibwa ou nsiima muno.”
Nubwo Yesu yatwarwa Mwoyo omu irungu okwohebwa Sitaani.
Obu yamazire ebiro makumi ana nyamusana n'ekiro atarukulya kantu, enjara yamuruma.
Aho omwohi yamwizira yamwohya ati: “Obu oraaba oli Mwana wa Ruhanga, ragira amabaale ganu gafooke byokulya.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Omuntu taba mwomeezi habw'ebyokulya byonka, baitu aba mwomeezi habw'ekigambo kyona ekiruga omu kanwa ka Ruhanga.’ ”
Aho Sitaani yamutwara omu rubuga orurukwera, yamuta ha kasu k'Enju ya Ruhanga,

yamugambira ati: “Obu oraaba oli Mwana wa Ruhanga, wesimbe hansi; habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Alikukwasa bamalaika be’, kandi kiti: ‘Bakukwatirre omu mikono yabo, oleke kuteera ekigere kyawe ha ibaale’.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kandi kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Otalyohya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe’.”
Sitaani yayongera yamutwara ha rusozi oruraihire muno, yamwoleka obukama bwona obw'omu nsi n'ekitiinisa kyabwo.
Yamugambira ati: “Binu byona ndaabikuha kakuba oteeza amaju okandamya.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Rugaho Sitaani! Habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Oramyege MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, kandi nuwe oheerezeege wenka’.”
Nubwo Sitaani yamurugaho, bamalaika baija baamuheereza.
Yesu obu yahuliire Yohaana nkooku akwasirwe, yarugayo yagaruka Galiraaya.
Obu yarugire Nazareeti, akagenda yaikara Kafaranaumu, orubuga oruli ha musa gw'enyanja, omu nsi ya Zebbuluuni na Nafutaali.
Nukwo ekyagambirwe omurangi Isaaya kihikirre kiti:
“Ensi ya Zebbuluuni n'eya Nafutaali, ha bukiizi bw'enyanja, nseeri ya Yorudaani, omu Galiraaya y'Abanyamahanga,
abantu abakaba bali omu mwirima, bakajwerwa omusana mwingi, nabo abaikaraga omunsi y'ekiituuru ky'okufa emamba ekabasarra.”
Kuruga omu kasumi ako, Yesu yatandika kwegesa naagamba ati: “Mwegarukemu, habwokuba obukama bw'omu iguru bwiriire haihi.”
Yesu obu akaba naaraba ha musa gw'enyanja ya Galiraaya, yarora nyineemu babiri, Simooni arukwetwa Petero n'owanyina Andereya, nibanaga akatimba omu nyanja; habwokuba bakaba bali basohi.
Yabagambira ati: “Mumpondere, ndibafoora basohi b'abantu.”
Ahonaaho baasiga obutimba bwabo baamuhondera.
Obu yagenzireho omumaiso kake, yarora banyineemu abandi babiri, Yakobbo na Yohaana, batabani ba Zebedaayo, bali omu bwato hamu na isebo Zebedaayo nibasumiikaniza obutimba bwabo. Nabo Yesu yabeeta.
Ahonaaho baasiga obwato bwabo na isebo, baamuhondera.
Yesu akagendagenda omu Galiraaya yoona, naayegesa omu masorrokaniro gaabo, naarangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'obukama bwa Ruhanga, kandi naakiza buli ndwara n'obusaasi bwona obw'abantu.
Yaranganwa omu Siriya yoona, baamuleetera abarwaire boona abakaba bakwasirwe endwara n'obusaasi obutali bumu, abakwasirwe emyoyo emibi, abagu b'ensimbo, n'abazingamire; yabakiza.
Ebitebe by'abantu baingi bakamuhondera nibaruga Galiraaya, n'omu Mbuga Ikumi ezeeteraine, Yerusaalemu, Buyudaaya, na nseeri ya Yorudaani.
Yesu obu yarozire ebitebe by'abantu, yatemba orusozi, yaikarra hansi, nukwo abeegesebwa be kwija nambere ali,
yatandika kubeegesa ati:
“Baina omugisa abeemanya nkooku bali banaku omu mwoyo, habwokuba obukama bw'omwiguru bwabo.
Baina omugisa abarukuganya, habwokuba Ruhanga alibahuumuza.
Baina omugisa abaculeezi, habwokuba baligweterwa ensi.
Baina omugisa abarukurumwa enjara bakakwatwa n'iroho habw'obuhikiriire, habwokuba baliiguta.
Baina omugisa ab'embabazi, habwokuba baligirirwa embabazi.
Baina omugisa ab'emitima esemiire, habwokuba balirora Ruhanga.
Baina omugisa abanyakuteeraniza abantu omu businge, habwokuba balyetwa baana ba Ruhanga.
Baina omugisa abahiiganizibwa habw'obuhikiriire, habwokuba obukama bw'omwiguru bwabo.
Inywe mwina omugisa abantu obu baraabajumaga, obu baraabahiiganizaaga kandi bakabahangirra ebintu ebibi byona habwange.
Musemererwe, mukyanganuke, habwokuba empeera yanyu nyingi omu iguru; nukwo baahiiganiize bati abarangi abaabandize inywe.”
“Inywe muli kisura ky'ensi; kakuba ekisura kihoibwamu orusa, orusa oru ruligarurwamu ruta? Kiba kitakyagasa, kisigaliire kunagwa n'okurubaatirirwa abantu.
“Inywe muli kyererezi ky'ensi. Orubuga orwombekerwe ha rusozi tirusobora kuserekwa.
Busaho muntu ahemba etaara akagijuumikira ekigega, baitu bagita ha kikondo, nukwo emulikire abantu boona abali omu nju.
Ekyererezi kyanyu nukwo kimulikire kiti abantu, barole ebikorwa byanyu ebirungi, bakugize Isiinywe ow'omu iguru.”
“Mutateekereza ngu, nkaija kwihaho Ebiragiro n'abarangi. Ebi ntaije kubiihaho, baitu nkaija kubihikiriza.
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Iguru n'ensi bitakahoireho, busaho enyuguta n'emu ey'omu Biragiro noobu kaakuba kacweka kaayo akaliihwamu, okuhika byona obu birikahikirra.

Nahabweki weena anyakucwa ekimu ha biragiro binu ebike, kandi akeegesa abandi kubicwa, alyetwa muto omu bukama bw'omwiguru; kandi weena anyakubikwata akabyegesa abandi, alyetwa mukuru omu bukama bw'omwiguru.
Baitu nimbagambira nti: Obuhikiriire bwanyu obu butalikira obw'abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'obw'Abafalisaayo timulitaaha omu bukama bw'omwiguru.”
“Mukahurra aba ira nkooku baagambiirwe bati: ‘Otaliita; weena anyakwita w'okusingwa omusango’.

Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nti: Weena anyakubiihirirwa mugenzi we ali w'okusingwa omusango; weena anyakujuma mugenzi we alitwarwa omu rukurato; kandi weena anyakweta mugenzi we ati: ‘Kidoma we!’ ogu alinagwa omu kiinongoro ky'omurro.
Habweki, kakuba oba noohayo ekisembo kyawe ha itambiro, okaijuka nkooku mugenzi waawe aina eki arukukujunaana,
siga aho ekisembo kyawe omu maiso g'itambiro, genda obanze ogarukanganemu nawe, nubwo ogaruke ohonge ekisembo kyawe.
“Garukanganamu bwango n'ogu arukujunaana, atakakuhikize omu bulemi; nukwo aleke kukunyegerra hali omucwi w'emisango, n'omucwi w'emisango akakukwasa omuserikale, kandi omuserikale akakuta omu nkomo.
Mazimakwo nyowe ninkugambira nti: Tolirugamu okuhika obu olikasasurra kimu akasente koona.”
“Mukahurra nkooku kyagambirwe kiti: ‘Otalisiihana’.
Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nit: Weena ogu arora omukazi akamwegomba, buli omu mutima gwe aba asiihaine nawe.
Eriiso lyawe ery'obulyo kakuba nirikuleetereza kusiisa, liihemu olinage; haakire ofeerwe orugingo rumu orw'omubiri gwawe, kukira omubiri gwona kunagwa omu kiinongoro ky'omurro.
Kandi omukono gwawe ogw'obulyo kakuba gukuleetereza kusiisa, gutemeho ogunage; haakire ofeerwe orugingo rumu orw'omubiri gwawe, kukira iwe weena kugenda omu kiinongoro ky'omurro.”
“Kandi kikagambwa kiti: ‘Omuntu weena obu abingira kimu mukazi we, amuhe ebbaruha erukwoleka nkooku amubingire.’

Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nti: Omusaija kakuba abingira kimu mukazi we, atarukusigikira ha busiihani, nuwe aba amuleeteriize kusiihana obu aswerwa handi; n'omusaija anyakuswera omukazi ayabingirwe, nawe aba asiihaine.”
“Mukagaruka mwahurra nkooku abantu ba ira bagambiirwe bati: ‘Otalirahirra busa, baitu eki orahiriire MUKAMA okihikirizeege!’
Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nti: Mutalirahira naakake konka, noobu lyakuba iguru, habwokuba nikyo kitebe kya Ruhanga;
rundi ensi, habwokuba nuko akatebe k'ebigere bye; rundi Yerusaalemu, habwokuba nurwo orubuga rw'Omukama omukuru.
Noobu kwakuba okurahira omutwe gwawe, habwokuba tosobora kuhindura akasoke kamu kuba akarukwera rundi akarukwiragura.
Leka ekigambo kyawe ‘Ego’ kiikale kiri ‘Ego’, rundi ‘Nangwa’ kiikale kiri ‘Nangwa?’; ebirukukira hali ebi biruga hali Omubi.”
“Mukahurra nkooku kyagambirwe kiti: ‘Eriiso lirehwe eriiso, n'eriino lirehwe eriino.’
Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nti: mutalyeholerra enzigu. Omuntu obu araakuteeraga oruhi ha rusaya rw'obulyo, omuhindurre n'orundi.
Omuntu kakuba nakunyegerra habw'esaati, leka atwale n'ekooti.
Kakuba omuntu naakuhambiriza kugenda nawe kilomita emu, genda nawe n'eya kabiri.
Omuntu kakuba akusaba, omuhe; kakuba akwohoza, otalimwangirra.”
“Mukahurra nkooku kyagambirwe kiti: ‘Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe kandi onobege omunyanzigwa waawe’.
Baitu nyowe nimbagambira nti: Mugonzeege abanyanzigwa banyu, kandi musabirege abarukubahiiganiza,
nukwo mube baana ba Isiinywe ali omu iguru, habwokuba ajwisiza omusana ababi n'abarungi, kandi anagira enjura abahikiriire n'abatali bahikiriire.
Obu muraaba nimugonza abarukubagonza, mulitunga mpeera ki? N'abasorooza b'omusoro tinukwo bakora bati?
Obu muraaba nimuramukya bagenzi banyu bonka, abandi nimubakizaaho ki? N'Abanyamahanga tinukwo bakora bati?
Habweki mube bahikiriire nka Isiinywe ow'omu iguru oku ahikiriire.”
“Mwerinde, muleke kukora ebikorwa byanyu ebirungi omu maiso g'abantu ngu, babarole. Obu muraakora muti, Isiinywe ow'omwiguru talibaha mpeera.

“Habweki obu oraagabiraga omuseege, leka kukirangaaniza nk'abagobya oku bakora omu masorrokaniro n'omu mihanda, nukwo abantu babanyumize. Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abo bamazire ira kutunga empeera yabu.
Baitu obu oraagabiraga omuseege, omukono gwawe ogw'emoso guleke kumanya omukono gw'obulyo eki gurukukora.
Okugaba kwawe kubege kw'ensita; kandi So anyakurora ensita alikuha empeera.”

“Obu muraabaga nimusaba Ruhanga, mulekege kuba nk'abagobya; habwokuba bbo bagonza kusaba beemeriire omu masorrokaniro n'omu ntangatangano z'emihanda, nukwo abantu babarole. Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abo baamazire ira kutunga empeera yabo.
Baitu obu oraabaga noosaba, otaahege omu kisiika kyawe, oyekingiremu, nukwo osabe Sso atarukurorwa; kandi Uwe anyakurora ensita alikuha eky'osabire.
“Obu muraabaga nimusaba muleke kukanyisa ebigambo nkooku Abanyamahanga bakora, nibateekereza ngu, Ruhanga araabahurra habw'ebigambo byabo ebingi.
Muleke kusisana nk'abo, habwokuba Isiinywe amanyire ebi mwetaaga noobu muba mutakamusabire.
Nahabweki musabege muti: Isiitwe ali omwiguru, ibara lyawe litiinwe,
obukama bwawe bwije, ebi ogonza bikorwe omunsi nkooku bikorwa omwiguru.
Otuhe hati ebyokulya byaitu ebya buli kiro;
otuganyire ebibi byaitu nka itwe oku tuganyira abatukora kubi;
otatuleka tukoohebwa baitu otujune omu bubi.
Obu muraaganyiraga abantu ensobi zaabo, na inywe Isiinywe ow'omwiguru alibaganyira;
baitu obu mutaganyira abantu ensobi zaabo, na inywe Isiinywe talibaganyira ezanyu.”
“Obu muraabaga nimusiiba, muleke kwoleka obujune ha maiso nk'abagobya oku bakora, nukwo abantu babamanyirre nkooku barukusiiba. Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abo bamazire kutunga empeera yabo.
Baitu inywe obu muraabaga nimusiiba, munaabege ha maiso, mwesiige amagita,
nukwo abantu baleke kubamanyirra nkooku murukusiiba; baitu mumanywe Isiinywe wenka atarukurorwa. Kandi Isiinywe anyakurora eby'ensita alibaha empeera.”
“Mutalyeyahurra itungo omunsi, erirukusiiswa enkugutu n'obumomi, kandi abasuma nambere barukucwa bakaiba.
Baitu mweyahurrege itungo omwiguru, nambere litasobora kusiiswa enkugutu n'obumomi, kandi abasuma nambere batarukucwa bakaiba.
Habwokuba itungo lyanyu nambere liri, oku nuho emitima yanyu eraikaraga.”
“Eriiso niyo taara y'omubiri. Habweki eriiso lyawe obu liraaba nirihweza kurungi, omubiri gwawe gwona guhwereza kimu;
baitu eriiso lyawe obu liba litarukuhweza, omubiri gwawe gwona guswekwa omwirima. Okuhweza okuli omuli iwe kakuba kufooka mwirima, omwirima ogu guraingana ha!”
“Tiharoho anyakusobora kuheereza abakama babiri. Alinobaho omu agonze ondi, rundi aligumira hali omu agaye ondi. Timusobora kuheereza Ruhanga n'okwemarra ha itungo ly'ensi.

“Nikyo ndukubagambirra nti: Mutalitunturra obwomeezi bwanyu eki muraalyaga rundi eki muraanywaga rundi omubiri gwanyu eki muraajwaraga. Obwomeezi tibuli bw'omuhendo kukira ebyokulya? N'omubiri tiguli gw'omuhendo kukira ebyokujwara?
Murole enyonyi ez'omu mwanya; tizisiga, tizigesa, kandi tizihunika, baitu Isiinywe ow'omu iguru aziriisa. Inywe timuli b'omuhendo okukira enyonyi ezi?
Nooha omuli inywe, noobu atuntura ata, arukusobora kwongera akasumi kake ha bwomeezi bwe?
“Habwaki nimutunturra ebyokujwara? Murorre ha byakyo by'omu kisaka nkooku bikura, tibikora mulimo kandi tibyongosa.
Baitu nimbagambira nti: Noobwakubaire Solomoni omu kitiinisa kye kyona, atajwale kurungi okwingana ekimu ha byakyo binu.
Ruhanga obu araaba ajweka ati obunyansi bw'omu kisaka oburoho hati, nyenkya bukanagwa omu kikoomi, talikiraho muno kujweka inywe abaina okwikiriza kuke?
Habweki muleke kutuntura ngu: ‘Turaalya ki?’ Rundi ‘Turaanywa ki?’ Rundi ‘Turaajwara ki?’
Habwokuba ebintu nk'ebi Abanyamahanga nibyo baitanira. Isiinywe ow'omwiguru amanyire binu byona nkooku murukubyetaaga.
Baitu mubanze muserre obukama bwe n'obuhikiriire bwe, n'ebi byona biribongerwaho.
“Nahabweki, mulekege kutunturra ebya ijo; ekiro kya ijo kiryetunturra kyonka. Leka buli kiro kihwe n'omutalibano gwakyo.”
“Mutalicwa emisango, na inywe timuligicwerwa;
habwokuba nkooku mucwera abandi emisango, na inywe nukwo muligicwerwa; n'endengo ei mulengesa, na inywe niyo mulirengerwamu.
Habwaki noorora akahoiga akali omu liiso lya mugenzi waawe, otarukurora empinju enyakuli omu liiso lyawe?
Kandi noosobora ota kugambira mugenzi waawe oti: ‘Kankutokoole akahoiga akakuli omu liiso.’ kandi kunu empinju eri omu lyawe?
Ngobya iwe, banza oihe empinju enyakuli omu liiso lyawe, nukwo osobole kuhweza n'okutokoora mugenzi waawe akahoiga akamuli omu liiso.
“Mutaliha embwa ekintu ekirukwera; kandi mutalinagira empunu eruuru zanyu z'omuhendo, zikazirubatirra; hanyuma zikabahindukira kubarwanisa.”
“Musabe muraaheebwa; muserre muraazoora; mwerange muraakingulirwa.
Habwokuba weena anyakusaba aheebwa, anyakuserra azoora, anyakweranga akingulirwa.
Muzaire ki omuli inywe, kakuba omwana we amusaba omugaati amuha ibaale?
Kakuba amusaba encu amuha enjoka?
Inywe ababi, obu muraaba nimumanya kuha abaana banyu ebisembo ebirungi, Isiinywe ow'omwiguru talikiraho kuha ebirungi abo abarukumusaba:
Ebi mwenda abantu babakorre, na inywe nibyo mubakorrege. Egi niyo nyegesa yoona ey'Ebiragiro n'abarangi.”
“Murabe omu irembo erifunzire, habwokuba irembo erigalihire n'omuhanda ogurukwanguha nibyo bitwara omu kuhwerekerra, kandi ababirahamu baingi.
Ningira irembo erifunzire n'omuhanda ogw'obulemeezi nibyo bitwara omu bwomeezi, kandi ababizoora bake.”
“Mwerinde abarangi b'ebisuba abaija nambere muli nibeesisaniza nk'entaama, kandi kunu omu nda myaga emikatuzi.
Mulibamanyira ha bikorwa byabo. Emizaabbibbu baginoga ha makerre rundi emitini ha ngando?
Omuti omurungi gwana ebijuma ebirungi, kandi omuti omubi gwana ebijuma ebibi.
Omuti omurungi tigusobora kwana ebijuma ebibi, kandi omuti omubi tigusobora kwana ebijuma ebirungi,
baitu gutemwa, gunagwa omu murro.
Nahabweki mulibamanyira ha bikorwa byabo.”
“Omuntu weena anyakungambira ati: ‘MUKAMA wange, MUKAMA wange,’ tinuwe alitaaha omu bukama bw'omu iguru; baitu ogu anyakukora Isenyowe ow'omwiguru ebi agonza.
Ha kiro eki, baingi balingambira bati: ‘MUKAMA waitu, MUKAMA waitu, titwarangaga omu ibara lyawe? Titwabingaga emyoyo emibi omu ibara lyawe? Titwakoraga ebyamahano bingi omu ibara lyawe?’
Obu nubwo ndibaaturra bbwa nti: ‘Tinkabamanyaga. Mundugeho, inywe enkozi z'ebibi!’ ”
“Omuntu weena anyakuhurra ebigambo byange binu, akabihikiriza, naasisana nk'omuntu omwetegereza ayayombekere enju ye ha mwandara.
Enjura ekagwa, emigezi yatenta, n'ekiyaga kyateera enju egi, baitu etagwe, habwokuba ekaba eyombekerwe ha mwandara.
Kandi omuntu weena anyakuhurra ebi ndukugamba atarukubihikiriza, alisisana nk'omuntu omudoma ayayombekere enju ye ha musenyi.
Enjura ekagwa, emigezi yatenta, n'ekiyaga kyateera enju egi; yagwa, yasingookera kimu!”
Yesu obu yamazire kugamba ebigambo ebi, ebitebe by'abantu bikahunirizibwa omulingo yabeegesezeemu,
habwokuba akabeegesa nk' anyakwina obusobozi, atarukusisana nk'abeegesa baabu ab'ebiragiro.
Yesu obu yasirimukire orusozi, ebitebe bingi bikamuhondera.
Omugenge akaija nambere ali, yateeza amaju omu maiso ge naagamba ati: “MUKAMA wange, obu oraaba noogonza, noosobora kunkiza.”
Yesu yagorra omukono, yamukwataho naagamba ati: “Ego, ningonza, kira.” Ahonaaho ebigenge bye byakira.
Yesu yamugambira ati: “Otakisura okagambiraho muntu n'omu; baitu genda oyeyoleke nyakatagara, ohonge ekihongwa Musa eki yaragiire, bube bwakaiso hali abantu nkooku okiziibwe.”
Yesu obu yataahire omu Kafaranaumu, omukuru w'ekihanda ky'ab'amahe, Omuroma, yaija nambere ali, yamwesengereza
naagamba ati: “Waitu, omuheereza wange abyamire omu ka azingamire, naasaasa muno.”
Yesu yamugambira ati: “Ka nyije, mmukize.”
Baitu mukuru w'ekihanda ky'abamahe yamugarukamu ati: “MUKAMA wange, tinsemeriire kukutaahya omwange; baitu gamba ekigambo kyonka, omuheereza wange araakira.
Habwokuba na nyowe ndi muntu arukulemwa; nyina n'abaserikale aba ndukulema. Obu ndagira omu nti: ‘Genda’, agenda; n'ondi nti: ‘Ija’, aija; n'obu ndagira omuheereza wange nti: ‘kora kinu’, akikora.”
Yesu obu yamuhuliire, yahunirra, yagambira abakaba bamuhondiire ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Tinkaroraga muntu n'omu omu Isirairi anyakwina okwikiriza nk'oku.
Nimbagambira nti: Baingi baliruga Burugaizooba na Bugwaizooba, baikarre kulya hamu na Abbrahamu, Isaaka, na Yakobbo omu bukama bw'omu iguru
baitu abaana b'obukama balibingirwa aheeru omu mwirima, nambere abantu baliririrra kandi bakanena ensaya.”
Yesu nubwo yagambiire mukuru w'ekihanda ky'ab'amahe ati: “Genda; kikukolerwe nkooku oikiriize.” Kandi omu kasumi ako konyini omuheereza we yakira.
Yesu obu yataahire omunju ya Petero, yasanga nyinazaara abyamire, arwaire omuswija;
yamukwata ha mukono, omuswija gwakira, yaimuka, yatandika kumuheereza.
Rwebagyo, izooba obu lyagwire, bakaleetera Yesu abantu baingi abakaba bakwasirwe emyoyo emibi; yagibinga n'ekigambo kye, kandi yakiza boona abakaba barwaire.
Kinu kikahikiriza omurangi Isaaya eki yagambire ati: “Akeetaho obuceke bwaitu kandi yayetweka endwara zaitu.”
Yesu obu yarozire ekitebe kingi kimwehinguliriize, yaragira abeegesebwa kwambuka kugenda nseeri y'enyanja.
Omwegesa w'ebiragiro yaija, yamugambira ati: “Mwegesa, ndaakuhonderaga hoona h'oraakagendaga.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Eboha ziina ebiina n'enyonyi ez'omu mwanya ziina ebiju; baitu Omwana w'omuntu taina h'okuta omutwe.”
Ondi ha beegesebwa yagamba ati: “Waitu, kambanze ngende nziike taata.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Iwe mpondera, leka abakafiiri baziike abafu baabu.”
Yesu obu yataahire omu bwato, abeegesebwa be baagenda nawe.
Nubwo haimukire ihunga ly'amaani lyateera ha nyanja, ebigonzi byaseeseka omu bwato; baitu Yesu akaba agwijagiire.
Abeegesebwa baagenda baamusisiimura bati: “Waitu, tujune, twafa!”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Nimutiina ki inywe abaina okwikiriza okuke?” Nubwo yaimuka, yacoomera omuyaga n'enyanja, byateeka.
Abantu baahunirra, nibagamba bati: “Mara onu muntu ki arukuragira ihunga n'enyanja bikamuhurra?”

Yesu obu yahikire nseeri y'enyanja, omu nsi y'Abagadarene, akatangaana abasaija babiri nibaruga omu bituuro, abakaba baroho emyoyo emibi. Bakaba bali b'akabi, hataroho n'omu ayasoboraga kuraba omuhanda ogu.
Baatokera haiguru nibagamba bati: “Nootwenza ki, iwe Mwana wa Ruhanga? Oizire hanu kutucanza akasumi katakahikire?”
Haihi aho hakaba haroho igana ly'empunu nizirya.
Emyoyo emibi yamwesengereza neegamba ati: “Obu oraaba nootubinga, otusindike omu igana ly'empunu.”
Yagigambira ati: “Mugende”. Nubwo emyoyo emibi yabarugamu, yagenda yataaha omu mpunu. Igana lyona ery'empunu lyajumbuutuka, lyakonkomoka enengo y'orusozi, zaagwa omu nyanja, zaafeeramu.
Abasaija abakaba nibaziriisa bairuka, baagenda omu rubuga baasubirra buli kintu, n'ebyabaireho abasaija abakaba baina emyoyo emibi.
Nubwo abantu boona ab'omu rubuga baaturukire okutangaana Yesu. Obu baamurozire, baamwesengereza aruge omu mitaano yabu.
Yesu akataaha omu bwato, yayambuka enyanja, yahika omu rubuga rw'owaabu.
Baamuleetera omusaija anyakuzingamire, abyamire ha katabu. Yesu obu yarozire okwikiriza kwabu, yagambira anyakuzingamire ati: “Mwana wange, guma! Ebibi byawe bikuganyirwe.”
Nubwo abamu ha beegesa b'ebiragiro baagambirangana bati: “Omuntu onu ka naajuma Ruhanga!”
Baitu Yesu habw'okumanya ebiteekerezo byabu, yabagambira ati: “Nimuteekerereza ki kubi omu mitima yanyu?
Ekirukukira kurahuka kiraha, kugamba nti: ‘Ebibi byawe bikuganyirwe’, rundi kugamba nti: ‘Imuka ogende’?
Kinu nikyo muraamanyiraho Omwana w'omuntu nkooku aina obusobozi omunsi obw'okuganyira ebibi” nubwo yagambira omusaija anyakuzingamire ati: “Imuka, ohimbe akatabu kaawe, otaahe.”
Yaimuka, yataaha omuka.
Ekitebe ky'abantu obu baarozire eki, baatiina, baakugiza Ruhanga ayahaire abantu obusobozi oburukwingana aho.
Yesu obu akaba naarugayo, yarora omuntu, ibara lye Matayo, aikaliire omu isoroolerezo ly'omusoro, yamugambira ati: “Mpondera.” Matayo yaimuka, yamuhondera.
Yesu obu akaba aikaliire mba Matayo naalya, abasorooza b'omusoro n'abasiisi baija, baikaara nawe ha meeza hamu n'abeegesebwa be.
Abafalisaayo obu baakirozire, baakaguza abeegesebwa be bati: “Habwaki omwegesa wanyu alya n'abasorooza b'omusoro n'abasiisi?”
Yesu obu yahuliire eki, yagarukamu ati: “Aboomeezi tibeetaaga mufumu, baitu ayetaagwa abarwaire.
Mugende mwetegereza amakuru g'ekigambo kinu: ‘Ningonza mukole ebikorwa by'embabazi kukira kuntambira ebyonzira.’ Habwokuba ntaizirre kweta abahikiriire, baitu abasiisi.”
Nubwo abeegesebwa ba Yohaana baija hali Yesu baamukaguza bati: “Habwaki itwe n'Abafalisaayo tusiiba emirundi nyingi, kunu abeegesebwa baawe batarukusiiba?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Abagenyi basobora bata kuganya, omuswezi obu aba ainabo? Akasumi kalihika kigabura obu alibaihwaho, nubwo balitandika kusiiba.
Tiharoho muntu abazirra ekikoba kihyaka ha kijwaro kikuru; habwokuba ekikoba eki kitaagukira kimu ha kijwaro kikuru n'ekihuru kigaliha.

Kandi tiharoho muntu anyakuta eviini ey'ehiira omu ndyanga enkuru. Kakuba akorakwo, endyanga ebbaruka, eviini eseeseka, kandi endyanga esiisikarra kimu; baitu eviini ey'ehiira bagita omu ndyanga empyaka, kandi byombi biikaraho.”
Yesu obu akaba naakyabaza nabo, haija omunyoro, yateeza amaju omumaiso ge, naagamba ati: “Muhara wange afiire. Ija omukwateho, ayomeere.”
Yesu yaimuka yamuhondera aina n'abeegesebwa be.
Nubwo omukazi ow'akaba arwaire akeejwiso kumara emyaka ikumi n'ebiri yaleesirwe enyuma ya Yesu, yakwata ha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye;
habwokuba akaba naagumya omu mutima gwe ati: “Noobu ndakwataho kwonka ekijwaro kye, ndaakira.”
Yesu yahinduka, obu yamurozire yagamba ati: “Mwisiki wange, guma; okwikiriza kwawe nukwo kukukirize.” Ahonaaho omukazi yakira.
Yesu obu yataahire omunju y'omunyoro, yarora abateezi b'endere n'abantu baingi abakaba nibateera empamo,
yagamba ati; “Murugeho; omwisiki tafiire, baitu agwijagiire.” Baamusekeereza.
Obu baamazire kutu rukya abantu, Yesu yahingura omu kisiika, yakwata omwisiki ha mukono, yaimuka.
Amakuru ago gaararanga hoona omu nsi egi.
Yesu obu akaba naarugayo, abafu b'amaiso babiri baamuhondera nibatoka bati: “Mwijukuru wa Daudi, otuganyire.”
Obu yataahire omunju, abafu b'amaiso baija nambere ali, yabakaguza ati: “Nimwikiriza nkooku nsobora kukora kinu?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Ego, Waitu!”
Yabakora ha maiso naagamba ati: “Kibakolerwe nkooku mwikirize.”
Amaiso gaabo gaiguka. Yesu yabateererra muno ati: “Mwerinde, mutakigambiraho muntu weena!”
Baitu bbo obu baagenzire, baaranganiza amakuru ago omu bicweka byona eby'ensi egi.
Abasaija abo obu bakaba nibakyarugaho, abandi baaleetera Yesu omufu w'omunwa anyakuroho omwoyo mubi.
Yesu obu yamazire kubinga omwoyo mubi, omufu w'omunwa yabaza. Abantu boona baahunirra nibagamba bati: “Ekintu nka kinu tikikarorwahoga omu Isirairi.”
Baitu Abafalisaayo baagamba bati: “Abinga emyoyo emibi habw'obusobozi bwa mukuru wayo.”

Yesu yagendagenda naabungira embuga zoona n'ebyaro, naayegesa omu masorrokaniro gaabo, naarangirra abantu Amakuru Amarungi ag'obukama bwa Ruhanga, kandi naakiza abantu endwara eza buli mulingo n'obusaasi bwona.
Obu yarozire ebitebe by'abantu, yabagirra embabazi, habwokuba bakaba baharaize emitima, bataina kikoonyera, nk'entaama ezitaina muliisa.
Nubwo Yesu yagambiire abeegesebwa be ati: “Eby'okugesa bingi, baitu abakozi nubo bake.
Habweki musabe MUKAMA w'eby'okugesa atume abakozi baingi omu musiri gwe.”
Yesu akeeta abeegesebwa be ikumi na babiri, yabaha obusobozi obw'okubinga emyoyo emibi, n'okukiza endwara zoona n'obusaasi bwona.
Amabara g'abakwenda ikumi na babiri nugo ganu: ow'okubanza Simooni arukwetwa Petero, na mugenzi we Andereya; Yakobbo mutabani wa Zebedaayo na Yohaana owanyina;
Filipo na Batolomayo; Tomasi na Matayo, omusorooza w'omusoro; Yakobbo mutabani w'Alifaayo, na Tadeo;
Simooni omurwanirizi w'ihanga lye na Yuda Isikalyota ayamugobiize.
Ikumi na babiri abo, Yesu akabatuma naabaragira ati: “Mutaligenda hoona mu Banyamahanga, kandi mutalitaaha omu rubuga rwona orw'Abasamaliya.
Haakire mugende omu bantu ba Isirairi abarukusisana entaama ezaabuzire.
Obu muraabaga nimugenda, murangirre muti: ‘Obukama bw'omu iguru bwiriire haihi.’
Mukize abarwaire, muhumbuule abafiire, mukize abagenge, mubinge emyoyo emibi. Mukaheerwa busa, na inywe muheere busa.
Mutalitwara ezaabbu n'efeeza, noobu zaakuba sente omu ndyanga zanyu;
mutalitwara ensaho omu rugendo rwanyu, rundi esaati ibiri, rundi enkaito, noobu gwakuba omwigo. Habwokuba omukozi naasemerra kuheebwa empeera ye.
“Orubuga rwona rundi ekyaro ha muraataahaga, muserremuga omuntu anyakusemeriire, mwikale nawe okuhika obu mulirugayo.
Obu muraabaga nimutaaha omunju, abarumu mubagondeze obusinge.
Enju egi obu eraaba esemeriire, obusinge bwanyu buligiikaraho; baitu obu eraaba etasemeriire, obusinge bwanyu bulibagarukira.
Kakuba omuntu weena atabatangirra rundi akanga kuhuliiriza ebigambo byanyu, muruge omunju egi rundi omu rubuga oru nimuteeraterra ecuucu y'omu bigere byanyu.
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, ensi ya Sodomu na Gomora eriganyirwa kukira abantu b'omu rubuga oru.”
“Dora nimbatuma nk'entaama ezirukugenda omu myaaga hagati; nahabweki mube b'amagezi nk'enjoka, kandi abataina kabi nk'amaiba.
“Mwerindege abantu; habwokuba balibahayo omu nkurato, balibateeza enkoba omu masorrokaniro gaabu,
Kandi balibatwara kubatonganiza omu maiso g'abalemi abakuru n'ag'abakama habwange, mube bakaiso bange hali bo na hali Abanyamahanga.
Obu baraabahayoga, mutalitunturra ebi muligamba, rundi nkooku mulitongana; baitu omu kasumi ako muliheebwa ebi muligamba.
Habwokuba tibali inywe abalyetonganirra, baitu Mwoyo wa Isiinywe nuwe aligambira omuli inywe.
“Omuntu alihayo owanyina aitwe, na isemwana alihayo omwana we, kandi abaana baliimukirra abazaire baabo babaise;
na inywe mulinobwa boona habwange. Baitu ogu aligumiisiriza okuhika ha mpero, nuwe alijunwa.
Obu balibahiiganiza omu rubuga orumu, mwirukire omu rundi. Mazima nimbagambira nti: Timulimarayo embuga zoona eza Isirairi, Omwana w'omuntu atakaizire.
“Omwegesebwa takira mwegesa we, n'omuheereza takira mukama we;
nikihika omwegesebwa okusisana nk'omwegesa we, n'omuheereza kusisana nka mukama we. Nyineeka obu baraaba bamwesire mukuru w'emyoyo emibi, balisura ki hali ab'omu ka ye?”
“Nahabweki muleke kubatiina, habwokuba busaho ekiswekeriirwe ekitalisuukurwa, rundi ekiserekerwe ekitalimanywa.
Eki ndukubagambira omu nsita, mukigambe bbwa; kandi eki muhurra omu bihwa, mukyamirirre ha mutwe gw'enju.
Muleke kutiina abo abaita omubiri, abatasobora kwita omwoyo; haakire mutiine Ogu anyakuhwerekereza byombi: omubiri n'omwoyo omu murro ogutaraara.
Ebisirya bibiri tibigurwa sente ikumi? Busaho na kimu halibyo ekigwa hansi Isiinywe ow'omwiguru ataikiriize.
Nangwa n'isoke erya ha mitwe yanyu libazirwe.
Nahabweki muleke kutiina; inywe muli b'omuhendo kukira ebisirya bingi.”
“Weena alinyatura omumaiso g'abantu, na nyowe ndimwatura omumaiso ga Isenyowe anyakuli omwiguru;
baitu weena alinyehakana omumaiso g'abantu, na nyowe ndimwehakana omu maiso ga Isenyowe anyakuli omwiguru.
“Mutateekereza ngu, nkaija kuleeta obusinge omu nsi. Ntaije kuleeta obusinge, baitu empirima.
Nkaija kwahukaniza omwana na ise, omwisiki na nyina, mukamwana na nyinazaara;
habwokuba abanyanzigwa b'omuntu nubo ab'omu ka ye.
Anyakugonza ise rundi nyina okukira nyowe, tansemeriire; n'ogu anyakugonza mutabani we rundi muhara we okukira nyowe, tansemeriire;
n'ogu ateetweka musaraba gwe akampondera, tansemeriire.
Weena anyakutaatira obwomeezi bwe, alibufeerwa; baitu weena alihayo obwomeezi bwe habwange, alibutunga.”
“Weena anyakujwahukirra inywe, buli ajwahukiriire nyowe; kandi anyakujwahukirra nyowe, buli ajwahukiriire Ogu ayantumire.
Weena anyakujwahukirra omurangi habwokuba murangi, ogu aliheebwa empeera y'omurangi; kandi weena anyakujwahukirra omuhikiriire habwokuba muhikiriire, ogu aliheebwa empeera y'omuhikiriire.
Weena anyakuha omu ha bato abo ekikopo ky'amaizi agarukufuka habwokuba mwegesebwa wange, mazimakwo talisubwa mpeera ye.”
Yesu obu yamazire kwegesa abeegesebwa be ikumi na babiri, yarugayo yagenda kwegesa n'okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi omu mbuga zaabu.
Yohaana ow'akaba ali omu nkomo, obu yahuliire Kristo ebi arukukora, yatuma abeegesebwa be
okumukaguza buti: “Niiwe ogu arukugenda kwija, rundi tutegereze ondi?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Mugarukeyo, mugambire Yohaana ebi murukuhurra n'ebi murukurora:
abafu b'amaiso nibarora, abalema nibarubata, abagenge nibakizibwa, abafu b'amatu nibahurra, abafiire nibahumbuurwa, abaseege nibarangirirwa Amakuru Amarungi.
W'omugisa ogu atarukunyesiitaraho!”
Abeegesebwa ba Yohaana obu baamazire kurugayo, Yesu yakaguza ebitebe by'abantu hali Yohaana ati: “Omwirungu mukagenda kurorayo ki? Orubingo orurukutengesebwa omuyaga?
Obu, mukagenderayo ki? Kurora omuntu ajwaire engoye ezirukunekaneka? Abo abajwara engoye ezirukunekaneka baikara omu bikaali by'abakama.
Obu, mukagenderayo ki? Kurora omurangi? Ego, nimbagambira nti: Naakira n'omurangi.
Nuwe ogu ou kyahandiikirweho kiti: “‘Dora, nintuma omukwenda wange akwebembere, nuwe akusemereze omuhanda.’
Mazima nimbagambira nti: Omu bantu abaazairwe abakazi, busamu n'omu arukukira Yohaana Omubatiza ekitiinisa; baitu omuto omu bukama bw'omwiguru nuwe arukumukira.
Okuruga omu biro bya Yohaana Omubatiza n'okuhika hati, obukama bw'omwiguru burwanirirwa n'amaani, kandi ababurwanirra babunyaga n'amaani.
Habwokuba Ebiragiro n'abarangi, boona bakaranga ebirukwija kubaho okuhika ha biro bya Yohaana;
obu muraaba nimwikiriza ebyarangirwe ebi, Yohaana ogu nuwe Eriya ayanihirwaga kwija.
Anyakwina amatu, ahurre.
“Abantu ab'obusinge bunu ndabalengesaniza na ki? Nibasisana nk'abaana abaikaliire omu butale, nibeetangana bati:
“‘Tukabaterra endere, timwazina; twabaterra empamo, timwarra.’
Yohaana obu yaizire atarukulya byokulya kandi atarukunywa marwa, baagamba ngu: ‘Aroho omwoyo mubi’,
kandi Omwana w'omuntu obu yaizire naalya kandi naanywa, baagamba bati: ‘Dora omukoizi kandi omutamiizi, enganjani y'abasorooza b'omusoro n'abasiisi!’ Amagezi ga Ruhanga gamanyirwa ha bikorwa byago.”
Nubwo Yesu yatandika kujunaana embuga nambere yakoliire ebyamahano ebirukukira obwingi, habwokuba bateegarukemu.
“Olikibona iwe Korazini! Olikibona iwe Betisaida! Ebyamahano ebyakoliirwe omuli inywe, kakuba byakoliirwe Taya na Sidooni, baakubaire beegarukiremu ira, bajwaire ebiguniya, beesiigire n'iju!
Baitu nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, Tiiro na Sidooni ziriganyirwa okukira inywe.
Na iwe Kafaranaumu olinyumizibwa ohike haiguru? Nangwa, oligarurwa hansi okuzimu. Omanye ebyamahano ebyakoliirwe omuli iwe, kakuba byakoliirwe omu Sodomu, yakwikaireho okuhika hati.
Baitu nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, ensi ya Sodomu eriganyirwa kukira iwe.”
Omu kasumi ako, Yesu yagamba ati: “Taata, MUKAMA w'iguru n'ensi ninkusiima, habwokuba ebintu binu okabisereka ab'amagezi n'abarukwetegereza, wabisuukurra abaana bato.
Ego Taata, eki nikyo wasiimire.
Isenyowe akankwasa ebintu byona, kandi busaho n'omu amanyire Mwana okwihaho Ise, kandi busaho n'omu amanyire Ise okwihaho Mwana, na weena Mwana ou agonza kumusuukurra.
Mwije nambere ndi inywena abajwahire n'abalemeriirwe mbahuumuze.
Muhimbe ekikoligo kyange, mwegere hali nyowe; habwokuba ndi muculeezi kandi ninyebundaaza omu mutima, na inywe mulitungira emyoyo yanyu ekihuumuro.
Habwokuba ekikoligo kyange tikirukulemeera, kandi n'omutumba gwange nigwanguhirra.”
Omu kasumi ako Yesu akaba naaraba omu misiri y'engano ha kiro kya Sabbato; abeegesebwa be bakaba nibarumwa enjara, baatandika kucwa entwe z'engano nibazijungirra omu ngaro, nibalya.
Baitu Abafalisaayo obu baarozire eki, baamugambira bati: “Dora abeegesebwa baawe nibakora ekitarukwikirizibwa ha Sabbato.”
Nawe yabagarukamu ati: Timukasomaga Daudi eki yakozire obu yarumirwe enjara, hamu n'abo aba akaba ainabo;
nkooku yataahire omunju ya Ruhanga yalya emigaati enyakuhongerwe etaraikirizibwaga kuliibwa muntu weena kwihaho abanyakatagara bonka?
Rundi timukasomaga omu Biragiro bya Musa nkooku banyakatagara baasiisaga Sabbato nibakora omu Nju ya Ruhanga, kandi nkooku batarajunaanwaga musango?
Nimbagambira nti: Hanu haroho arukukira Enju ya Ruhanga.
Kakuba mubaire mumanyire amakuru g'ekigambo kinu ngu: “Ningonza mukole ebikorwa by'embabazi kukira kuntambira ebyonzira., timwakuhenderiire abataina musango.
Habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu nuwe MUKAMA wa Sabbato.”
Yesu yarugayo, yataaha omu isorrokaniro lyabo.
Hakaba harumu omuntu akabire omukono. Baakaguza Yesu bati: “Nikiikirizibwa okukiza ha Sabbato?” Nukwo babone ekyokumunyegerra.
Yabagarukamu ati: “Nooha omuli inywe kakuba aba aina entaama ye, ekagwa omu kiina ha Sabbato, atagiihamu?
Baitu omuntu tali w'omuhendo kukira entaama? Nahabweki nikiikirizibwa kukora ebirungi ha Sabbato.”
Aho yagambira omusaija ati: “Gorra omukono gwawe.” Yagugorra, gwakira, gwaba nk'ogundi.
Nubwo Abafalisaayo baaturuka aheeru kuhanuura nkooku baraamwita.
Yesu obu yamanyire eki, yarugayo, abantu baingi baamuhondera, kandi boona yabakiza.
Yabateererra kutamuranganiza.
Kinu kikabaho okuhikiriza ekyagambirwe omurangi Isaaya ati:
“Onu nuwe muheereza wange ou nkomere, omugonzibwa wange omwoyo gwange ou gusiimira kimu. Ndimutaho Mwoyo wange, amanyise Abanyamahanga emicwere y'obulyo.
Taliteera mpaka, talitoka, kandi tihalibaho alihurra iraka lye omu makuute;
orubingo oruhendekere talirucwa, n'ekibugo ekirukucucuuka talikiraaza, okuhikya eby'obulyo obu birisingura;
kandi Abanyamahanga nuwe balyesiga.”
Nubwo baaleesire omuntu akwasirwe omwoyo omubi, afiire amaiso n'omunwa. Yesu yamukiza, kateta yabaza, n'amaiso ge gaiguka.
Abantu boona baahunirra, baakaguza bati: “Onu taakuba Mwana wa Daudi?”
Baitu Abafalisaayo obu baahuliire eki, baagamba bati: “Ogu abinga emyoyo emibi habwa Beelizebuli, mukuru wayo.”
Yesu obu yakengere ebiteekerezo byabo, yabagambira ati: “Obukama bwona obu bwecwamu kurwanisangana, buhwerekerra; kandi busaho rubuga rundi eka, obu byebaganizaamu, ebisobora kwikaraho.
Sitaani nawe obu araaba naabinga Sitaani mutaahi we, ayebaganiizeemu kwerwanisa wenka; obukama bwe buliikaraho buta?
Nyowe obu ndaaba nimbinga emyoyo emibi habwa mukuru wayo, abeegesebwa banyu bagibinga habw'oha? Nahabweki nubo balibacwera omusango.
Baitu Omwoyo wa Ruhanga obu araaba ali nuwe ambingisa emyoyo emibi, buli obukama bwa Ruhanga bubahikireho.
“Rundi omuntu asobora ata kutaahirra omusaija ow'amaani akanyaga ebintu bye, atabandize kumukwata akamuboha? Obu nubwo asobora kunyaga eby'omu nju ye.
“Atali habwange, buli nampakaniza; kandi atasorooza na nyowe, ararangya.
Nahabweki nimbagambira nti: Abantu baliganyirwa ebibi byona n'ebijumo byona; baitu anyakujuma Mwoyo Ahikiriire taliganyirwa.
Kandi weena aligamba kubi Omwana w'omuntu aliganyirwa; baitu alijuma Mwoyo Ahikiriire taliganyirwa omu businge bunu, noobu bwakuba omu businge obuliija.”
“Semeza omuti, n'ebijuma biraasemera; rundi guleke gusiisikale, n'ebijuma byagwo biraabiiha; habwokuba omuti gumanyirwa ha bijuma byagwo.
Baana b'encwera inywe! Musobora muta kubaza ebigambo ebirungi, kunu muli babi? Habwokuba ebiijura omutima, nibyo akanwa kagamba.
Omuntu omurungi aiha ebirungi omu lyahurro lye erirungi; n'omuntu omubi aiha ebibi omu lyahurro lye eribi.
Nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango abantu balyesoborra ha buli kigambo ekibi eki baabalize;
habwokuba ebigambo byawe nibyo birikwihisaaho omusango, kandi nibyo birigukusingisa.”
Abeegesa abamu ab'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo baasaba Yesu bati: “Mwegesa, nitugonza otuhe akarorwaho.”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Abantu ab'obusinge bunu obubi kandi obutarukwesigwa nibasaba akarorwaho; baitu tibaliheebwa karorwaho koona kwihaho aka Yona omurangi.
Yona nkooku yamazire omu nda y'encu emisana esatu n'ebiro bisatu, n'Omwana w'omuntu nukwo alimara ati okuzimu ebiro bisatu n'emisana esatu.
Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, abantu aba Nineve balyemerra n'abantu ab'obusinge bunu, babasingise omusango; habwokuba Yona obu yabarangiriire, bakeegarukamu; kandi hanu haroho arukukira Yona.

Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, Omukamakati owa Bukiizi obw'obulyo alyemerra, asingise omusango abantu ab'ebiro binu; habwokuba akaruga ha mpero y'ensi, yaija okuhurra amagezi ga Solomooni; kandi hanu haroho arukukira Solomooni.”
“Omwoyo omubi obu guruga omu muntu, gugenda niguraba omu biikaro ebitarumu maizi niguserra h'okuhumurra, baitu tiguzooraho.
Nubwo gugamba guti: ‘Kangaruke owange nambere narugire.’ Obu gugaruka, gusanga enju eri kwonka, esingoliirwe, eteekaniziibwe.
Gugenda guleeta emyoyo emibi endi musanju erukugukira obubi, ija ikara omu; obwomeezi bw'omuntu ogu obwa hanyuma buba bubi kukira obw'okubanza. Ab'ebiro binu nabo nukwo baliba bati.”
Yesu obu akaba naakyabaza n'abantu, aho nyina n'abagenzi be baija, baayemerra aheeru, nibagonza kubaza nawe.
Omuntu omu nukwo kumugambira ati: “Nyoko n'abagenzi baawe beemeriire aheeru nibagonza kubaza na iwe.”
Baitu Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Mau nooha? Kandi bagenzi bange nubo baha?”
Nubwo yamuragirra abeegesebwa be naagamba ati: “Mau n'abagenzi bange nubo banu!
Weena anyakukora Isenyowe ow'omwiguru ebi agonza, nuwe mugenzi wange, nuwe munyaanya nyowe, kandi nuwe mau.”
Ha kiro eki Yesu akaruga omunju, yagenda yaikarra ha musa gw' enyanja.
Ebitebe bingi byamwesoroolezaaho; nukwo kutemba omu bwato, yabwikarramu, kandi ekitebe kyona kyayemerra ha musa gw'enyanja.
Aho yabagambira ebintu bingi omu nfumo ati: Omusigi akatura okusiga.
Obu akaba naasiga, embibo ezimu zaaragara ha muhanda rubaju, enyonyi zaija, zaazisoma.
Ezindi zaagwa ha mwandara, nambere hakaba hatali itaka lingi; ahonaaho zaamera. Baitu habw'itaka kutahama,
omusana obu gwajwire, gwazookya, kandi habw'okutagira mihama zaahotoka.
N'ezindi zaagwa omu nahwa, amahwa obu gaakuzire, gaazinyoroza.
Embibo ezindi zaagwa omwitaka erirungi, zaayana; ezimu zaayana kikumi, ezindi nkaaga, n'ezindi makumi asatu.
Nukwo Yesu kugamba ati: “Anyakwina amatu, ahurre!”
Nubwo abeegesebwa baija baamukaguza bati: “Habwaki oikara noobaliza abantu omu nfumo?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Inywe mukaheebwa okumanya ensita z'obukama bw'omwiguru, baitu bbo eki batakiheebwe.
Habwokuba weena anyakwina alyongerwaho, atunge bingi; baitu anyakwina ebike, n'ebi ainabyo birimwihwaho.
Kinu nikyo mbagambirirra omu nfumo: habwokuba obu barora, tibahweza; n'obu bahurra, basisa abatahulire; kandi n'okwetegereza tibeetegereza.
Mazimakwo Isaaya eki yarangire nikihikirra hali bo obu yagambire ati: ‘Mazimakwo okuhurra mulihurra, baitu timuhwituka, okurora mulirora, baitu timulihweza.

Habwokuba emitima y'abantu banu egaraihire, n'amatu gaabo nigahurra kubi, n'amaiso gaabo bagazibiriize. Habw'amaiso gaabo okutarora, n'amatu gaabo okutahurra, n'emitima yabo okuteetegereza, nikyo bayangiire okumpindukira mbakize.’
Amaiso ganyu g'omugisa habwokuba nigarora, n'amatu ganyu habwokuba nigahurra.
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abarangi baingi n'abahikiriire bakeegomba kurora ebi murukurora, baitu batabirole, n'okuhurra ebi murukuhurra, baitu batabihurre.”
Muhurre nu orufumo rw'omusigi:
Omuntu weena obu ahurra ekigambo ky'obukama bwa Ruhanga atakyetegeriize, omubi aija asahura ekigambo ekisigirwe omu mutima gwe; egi niyo mbibo eyaragaire omu muhanda.
Kandi eyaragaire ha itaka erya ha mwandara, nuwe muntu anyakuhurra ekigambo, ahonaaho akiikiriza n'okusemererwa;
baitu yo habw'okutahama omu mutima gwe, agumiisiriza akasumi kake; obu habaho emihito rundi okuhiiganizibwa habw'ekigambo eki, ahonaaho agwa.
Kandi egi eyaragaire omu mahwa, nuwe ogu anyakuhurra ekigambo, baitu habw'okumaliza omutima ha by'ensi, n'okutwalirizibwa obuguuda, binyoroza ekigambo eki, tikyaana bijuma.
Kandi embibo eyasigirwe omwitaka erirungi, nuwe muntu anyakuhurra ekigambo akakikenga; hanyuma akakora ebikorwa ebirungi: omu kukira ha kikumi, ondi nkaaga, n'ondi makumi asatu.
Yesu akabaganikiza oruganikyo orundi ati: “Obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisanizibwa nk'omuntu ayasigire embibo nungi omu musiri gwe.
Ekiro, abantu obu bakaba bagwijagiire, omunyanzigwa akaija yasiga emberya omu buro, yayegendera.
Oburo obu bwakuzire butandikire kutungurra, emberya nayo yazookamu.
Abakozi ba nyineeka nukwo kwija baamukaguza bati: ‘Waitu, omu musiri gwawe otasigemu embibo nungi? Kandi emberya iziremu eta?’
Yabagarukamu ati: ‘Omunyanzigwa nuwe yakozire kinu.’ Nubwo abakozi baamukagwize bati: ‘Noogonza tugende tugyomberemu?’
Nandiki nyineeka ati: ‘Nangwa, habwokuba obu muraaba nimwomberamu emberya, timwikara kutwarranizaamu oburo.
Muleke byombi bikurre hamu okuhika ha igesa; omu kasumi k'igesa, ndigambira abagesi nti: Mubanze musorooze emberya, mugibohe enganda, eyokebwe; baitu oburo bwo mubuhunike omu nguli yange.’ ”
Yesu akabacwera orufumo orundi ati: “Obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisanizibwa nk'akasigo ka karadaali, omuntu aka yatwaire yasiga omu musiri gwe;
ko kaba katoito okukira embibo zoona, baitu obu kakura, kanyeeta okukira ebisaka byona, kafooka muti, kandi enyonyi ziija zoombeka ebiju omu mataagi gaagwo.”
Akabacwera orufumo orundi ati: “Obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisanizibwa nk'ekitumbisa omukazi eki yatwaire yajwanganiza omu bihi bisatu by'ensaano, okuhika ensaano yoona obu yatumbire.”
Ebigambo ebi byona Yesu yabigambiraga ebitebe by'abantu nabirabya omu nfumo; busaho kigambo kyona eki yabagambiraga atacwire rufumo.
Kinu kikahikiriza omurangi eki yagambire ati: “Ndaabaza omu nfumo, nyatule ebyaserekerwe kuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi.”
Hanyuma Yesu yaruga omu kitebe yataaha omu nju. Abeegesebwa be baija nambere ali nibasaba bati: “Tusoborre orufumo rw'emberya y'omu musiri.”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Ogu anyakusiga embibo enungi, nuwe Mwana w'omuntu;
omusiri niyo ensi; embibo enungi nubo baana b'engoma y'omwiguru; emberya nubo baana b'Omubi;
kandi omunyanzigwa ayagisigire omu musiri nuwe Sitaani. Igesa niyo mpero y'ensi, kandi abagesi nubo bamalaika.
Emberya nkooku esoroozibwa kwokebwa omu murro, nukwo kiriba kiti ha mpero y'ensi.
Omwana w'omuntu alituma bamalaika be, baihe omu bukama bwe byona ebirukwesiitaza n'enkozi z'ebibi zoona,
babanage omu kikoomi ky'omurro; oku nuho abantu balirirra banene ensaya.
Obu nubwo abahikiriire balyangasana nk'izooba omu bukama bwa Isebo. Anyakwina amatu, ahurre.”
“Obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisana nk'itungo eryaserekerwe omu musiri, omuntu eri yagwireho; nawe yaliswekerra. Habw'okusemererwa yagenda yatunda byona ebi akaba ainabyo, yagura omusiri ogu.”
“Kandi obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisana nk'omusuubuzi arukuserra amabaale amarungi ag'omuhendo.
Obu yazoireho limu ery'omuhendo mwingi, akagenda yatunda byona ebi akaba ainabyo, yaligura.”
“Kandi obukama bw'omu iguru nibusisanizibwa nk'akatimba akaategerwe omu nyanja, kaakwata encu eza buli mulingo;
obu kaijwire, abantu baakacundamu, baakata ha bwerre, baikarra, baakomorramu encu enungi, baazita omu bigega byabo, baitu embi baazinaga.
Nukwo kiriba kiti ha mpero y'ensi. Abamalaika baliija baihe abantu ababi omu bahikiriire,
nukwo ababi babanage omu kikoomi ky'omurro; oku nuho abantu balirirra kandi bakanena ensaya.
“Ebigambo binu byona mubyetegeriize?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Ego.”
Uwe yabagambira ati: “Nahabweki buli mwegesa w'ebiragiro anyakutendekerwe habw'obukama bw'omwiguru, naasisana nyineeka anyakwiha omu lyahurro lye ebintu ebihyaka n'ebikuru.”
Yesu obu yamazire kubacwera enfumo ezi, yarugayo,
kandi obu yahikire omunsi y'owaabu, yabeegesa omu isorrokaniro lyabo. Abaamuhuliire bakahunirra nibakaguzangana bati: “Omuntu onu, amagezi ganu n'ebyamahano binu, akabiiha nkaha?
Onu tinuwe mutabani w'omubaizi? Nyina tinuwe Mariya? Kandi Yakobbo, Yosefu, Simooni na Yuda tinubo bagenzi be?
Banyaanya boona tibali owaitu hanu? Binu byona akabiiha nkaha?”
Nukwo kumwanga. Baitu Yesu yabagambira ati: “Omurangi aheebwa ekitiinisa hoona hoona, okwihaho omunsi y'owaabu n'omu ka ye.”
Oku, Yesu atakorreyo byamahano bingi habw'okutaikiriza kwabo.
Omu kasumi ako, ow'isaza Herode akahurra okurangaanwa kwa Yesu;
yagambira abagaragara be ati: “Ogu nuwe Yohaana Omubatiza ahumbuukire omu bafu; nikyo arukukorra eby'amaani ebi.”
Herode akaba akwasire Yohaana, yamuboha, yamuta omu nkomo habwa Herodiya, muka Filipo mugenzi we.
Habwokuba Yohaana akahana Herode ati: “Ebiragiro bya Musa tibirukukwikiriza kuswera muramu waawe!”
Herode noobu araaba yagondeze kumwita, baitu akatiina abantu, habwokuba Yohaana baamwetaga murangi.
Ekiro ky'okuzaarwa kwa Herode obu kyahikire, muhara wa Herodiya akacekeca omumaiso g'abagenyi boona, Herode nawe yasemererwa,
yaraganiza naarahira kumuha eki arakasaba kyona.
Omwisiki habw' okuhanulirwa nyina, yagamba ati: “Mpeera ha sahaani hanu omutwe gwa Yohaana Omubatiza.”
Ow'isaza yasaalirwa; baitu habw'okusangwa arahiire omu maiso g'abagenyi be, yaragira bagumuhe.
Yatuma bagende omu nkomo batemeho Yohaana omutwe.
Baaguleetera ha sahaani, baaguha omwisiki, nawe yagutwarra nyina.
Abeegesebwa ba Yohaana bakaija baatwara omutumbi, baaguziika; nubwo baagenzire kugambira Yesu.
Yesu obu yahuliire amakuru ago, yarugayo ali omu bwato, yagenda omu irungu. Abantu obu baamanyire eki, baaruga omu mbuga, baamuhondera nibarubata.
Obu yarugire omu bwato, yarora ekitebe kikooto ky'abantu, yabakwatirwa embabazi, yakiza abarwaire baabo.
Izooba obu lyagoroobere, abeegesebwa bakaija baamugambira bati: “Hanu tuli omwirungu, kandi n'obwire bwaira; raga abantu bagende omu byaro beegurre ebyokulya.”
Yesu yagamba ati: “Tibasemeriire kugenda; inywe mubahe ebyokulya.”
Baamugambira bati: “Hanu twinaho emigaati etaano yonka n'encu ibiri.”
Uwe yagamba ati: “Mubindeetere hanu.”
Yaragira abantu kwikarra ha bunyansi; yakwata emigaati etaano n'encu ibiri, yararamira haiguru, yasiima, yabicwamu, emigaati yagiha abeegesebwa be, bagigabire abantu.
Boona baalya, baiguta. Abeegesebwa obu baasoroize oburagalika obwasaagireho, bwaijuza ebigega ikumi na bibiri.
Abasaija abaaliire baahikaga nk'enkumi itaano, otabaliiremu abakazi n'abaana.
Yesu yaragira abeegesebwa be kugwerra omu bwato, bamubanze kwambuka nseeri y'enyanja, uwe abe naakyaraga abantu.
Obu yamazire kubaraga, yatemba orusozi ali wenka kubaza na Ruhanga. Obwire bwaira akyaliyo wenka,
baitu omu kasumi ako obwato bukaba buhikire omu nyanja hagati, nibuzongazonga habw'ebigonzi, habwokuba omuyaga gukaba gubaturukire omu maiso.
Ha nkoko y'okubanza, Yesu yaija nambere bali naarubatira ha maizi.
Abeegesebwa obu baamurozire naarubatira ha maizi baayekanga muno nibagamba bati: “Muzimu!” Baatoka habw'obutiini.
Ahonaaho Yesu yabahuumuza ati: “Muhuumule, ninyowe; mutatiina.”
Nukwo Petero kumugarukamu ati: “MUKAMA wange obu araaba ali iwe, ndagira nyije nambere oli nindubatira ha maizi.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Rugayo.” Nubwo Petero yarugire omu bwato, yarubatira ha maizi ahike hali Yesu;
baitu obu yarozire omuyaga gwaba mwingi, yatiina, yatandika kudikira omu maizi yayamirra ati: “MUKAMA wange, njuna!”
Ahonaaho Yesu yagorra omukono gwe, yamukwata naagamba ati: “Iwe ow'okwikiriza kuke, habwaki noogurukyagurukya?”
Obu baataahire omu bwato, omuyaga gwaculeera.
Abakaba bali omu bwato baamuramya nibagamba bati: “Mazimakwo oli Mwana wa Ruhanga.”
Obu baamazire kwambuka enyanja, baahika omu nsi ya Genesareeti.
Abantu ab'omu kiikaro eki obu baamumanyiriire, baatuma hoona hoona omu kicweka eki, baamuleetera boona abarwaire.
Baamwesengereza ngu, haakire abarwaire bakwate ha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye; kandi boona abaakwasireho bakakira.
Abafalisaayo n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro bakaruga Yerusaalemu baija hali Yesu baamukaguza bati:
“Habwaki abeegesebwa baawe batakuraatira migenzo y'abaisenkuruitwe? Bbo balya batabandize kunaaba omu ngaro.”
Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Habwaki na inywe mucwa Ekiragiro kya Ruhanga nimuhondera emigenzo yanyu inywenka?
Ningira Ruhanga akaragira ati: ‘Otiinege sso na nyoko’; kandi ati: ‘Weena araajumaga ise rundi nyina mazimakwo aitwege.’
Baitu inywe mugamba muti: ‘Omuntu kakuba agambira ise rundi nyina ati: Eki naakukuhaire, hati nkihongiire Ruhanga; ogu aba aganyirwe Ekiragiro ky'okutiina ise.’
Nahabweki habw'okuhondera emigenzo yanyu, nikyo mudibiza Ekiragiro kya Ruhanga.
Ngobya inywe! Isaaya akahikya obu yabarangireho naagamba ati:
‘Abantu banu bantamu ekitiinisa kya ha minwa, baitu emitima yabu tendoho;
bandamiza busa, nibeegesa ebyatairweho abantu ngu, niyo nyegesa ya Ruhanga’.”
Aho Yesu akeeta abantu kumwirra haihi, yabagambira ati: “Mumpurre kandi mwetegereze:
ekitaaha omu kanwa k'omuntu, tikiri nikyo ekimusiisa; baitu ekiruga omu kanwa, nikyo kimusiisa.”
Nubwo abeegesebwa baija bamugambira bati: “Omanyire Abafalisaayo nkooku babiihiirwe obu baahuliire orufumo obacweriire?”
Yesu yagarukamu ati: “Ekimera kyona Isenyowe ow'omu iguru eki atarabyaire, kiriihwa.
Mubaleke abo, beebembezi abafiire amaiso. Omufu w'amaiso obu ayebembera omufu w'amaiso mugenzi we, bombi bagwa omu kiina.”
Baitu Petero yamusaba ati: “Otusoborre amakuru g'orufumo runu'”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Obu na inywe timukeetegeriize?
Timurukumanya ngu, ekintu kyona ekitaaha omu kanwa, kiraba omu nda, kandi kituruka aheeru?
Baitu ekireetwa omu kanwa kiba kirugire omu mutima; eki nikyo kisiisa omuntu.
Habwokuba omu mutima nuho haruga ebiteekerezo ebibi, obwisi, obusiihani, orwanju, obusuma, okuhangirra, n'okugeya.
Ebi nibyo bisiisa omuntu; baitu okulya otanaabire omu ngaro tikisiisa muntu.”
Yesu yarugayo, yagenda omunsi ya Taya na Sidooni.
Omukazi enzaarwa ya Kanaani, akaija naayamirra ati: “MUKAMA wange, Mwijukuru wa Daudi, ongirre embabazi; muhara wange akwasirwe omwoyo mubi, gumuli kubi muno.”
Baitu Yesu atamugarukemu kantu. Abeegesebwa be baija baamwesengereza bati: “Mubinge, naatutokerra.”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nyowe ntatumwe handi kwihaho omu ntaama ezaabuzire ez'omu ruganda rwa Isirairi.”
Nubwo mukazi yaija yamuteereza amaju, naagamba ati: “MUKAMA wange, nkoonyera.”
Yesu yagarukamu ati: “Tikirukuhika kwaka abaana ebyokulya okabinagira embwa.”
Nandiki omukazi ati: “Ego, MUKAMA wange, baitu embwa nazo zirya oburagalika oburuga ha meeza ya mukama wazo.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Mukazi iwe, okwikiriza kwawe ka kwingi! Kikukolerwe nkooku orukugonza.” Ahonaaho muhara we yakira.
Yesu obu yarugire oku, yaraba ha musa gw'enyanja ya Galiraaya. Yatemba omu nsozi, yaikarayo.
Ebitebe bingi byaija nambere ali, baamuleetera abalema, abazingamire, abafu b'amaiso, abafu b'eminwa n'abandi baingi. Baabahikya omumaiso ge, yabakiza.
Abantu bakahunirra obu baarozire abafu b'eminwa nibabaza, abazingamire nibakira, abaramaire nibarubata, n'abafu b'amaiso nibarora; baahaisaniza Ruhanga wa Isirairi.

Yesu akeeta abeegesebwa be nambere ali yabagambira ati: “Abantu banu nibankwasa embabazi habwokuba baamazire na nyowe hanu ebiro bisatu bataina eki barukulya; tindukwenda kubaraga bakagenda njara, tibaikara kugwa ensazi omu muhanda.”
Abeegesebwa be baamukaguza bati: “Omwirungu munu turaiha nkaha emigaati eraamara kuliisa abantu abarukwingana aho?”
Yesu nukwo kubakaguza ati: “Mwinaho emigaati ingaha?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Musanju n'obucu buke.”
Aho yaragira ekitebe ky'abantu baikarre hansi,
yakwata emigaati musanju n'encu, obu yamazire kusiima, yabicwamu, yabiha abeegesebwa be, nabo baabigabira abantu.
Boona baalya, baiguta; nukwo abeegesebwa kusorooza oburagalika obwasigaireho, bwaijuza ebigega musanju.
Boona abaaliire baahikaga enkumi ina, otabaliiremu abakazi n'abaana.
Yesu yaraga abantu, yagwerra omu bwato, yagenda omu kicweka kya Magadani.
Abafalisaayo n'Abasadukaayo bakaija hali Yesu kumulenga nibamusaba abooleke akokurorraho akarukuruga omwiguru.
Yabagarukamu ati: “Omu bwire bwa rwebagyo mugamba muti: ‘Obwire buraaba burungi; habwokuba iguru niritukura.’

Nyenkya kara mugamba muti: ‘Harabaho enjura y'ekiyaga, habwokuba iguru niritukura kandi libiihire.’ Mumanyire kukenga iguru nkooku lirukusisana, baitu timusobora kukenga ebihuniriza eby'obusumi bunu obunyakuroho.
Abantu ab'obusinge obubi kandi obuhabire, nubo barukuserra ekihuniriza; baitu tibaliheebwa kihuniriza kwihaho kya Yona.” Nubwo yabarugireho, yagenda.
Abeegesebwa be obu baahikire nseeri y'enyanja, baarora nkooku beeberwe kutwara emigaati.
Yesu yabagambira ati: “Mwerinde kandi mwegendereze ekitumbisa ky'Abafalisaayo n'Abasadukaayo.”
Baatandika kukaguzangana bati: “Ekirukumugambisa kiti, habwokuba titwina migaati.”
Yesu obu yayetegeriize eki, nubwo yabagambiire ati: “Inywe ab'okwikiriza okuke! Eby'okutaba n'emigaati nimukibalizaho ki?
Timukeetegeriize? Timurukwijuka nkooku naliisize abantu enkumi itaano emigaati etaano yonka? Mukasorooza ebigega bingaha eby'oburagalika?
Rundi obu naaliisize abantu enkumi ina n'emigaati musanju, mukasorooza ebigega bingaha?
Habwaki mulemerwe kwetegereza nkooku ntabagambire ha by'emigaati? Mwerinde nu ekitumbisa ky'Abafalisaayo n'Abasadukaayo.”
Nubwo baayetegeriize nkooku atabagambire okwerinda ekitumbisa ky'Emigaati, baitu okwerinda enyegesa y'Abafalisaayo n'Abasadukaayo.
Yesu yahika omu kicweka kya Kaisaariya orwa Filipi, yakaguza abeegesebwa be ati: “Omwana w'omuntu abantu bamweta bata?”
Baamugarukamu bati: “Abamu bagamba ngu: Nuwe Yohaana Omubatiza; abandi ngu: Nuwe Eriya; abandi ngu: Nuwe Yeremiya rundi omu hali abarangi.”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Baitu inywe munyeta muta?”
Simooni Petero yamugarukamu ati: “Niiwe Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga Atafa.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Oli w'omugisa Simooni, mutabani wa Yona, habwokuba amazima ganu togamanyisiibwe muntu kwonka, baitu ogasuukuliirwe Isenyowe anyakuli omu iguru.
Kandi ninkugambira nti: Niiwe Petero, kandi ha mwandara gunu nuho ndyombeka ekitebe ky'abeeserwe bange, n'amaani g'okuzima tigalikisingura.
Ndikuha ebisumuruzo by'obukama bw'omu iguru. Kyona kyona eki oliboha omu nsi, kiribohwa n'omu iguru; kandi kyona eki olisumurra omu nsi, kirisumururwa n'omu iguru.”
Nubwo yateererra muno abeegesebwa be kutagambiraho muntu n'omu nkooku ali Kristo.

Okuruga obu Yesu yatandika kumanyisa abeegesebwa be nkooku ali w'okugenda Yerusaalemu kubonabonesibwa muno bakuru b'abantu, abanyakatagara abakuru, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro; n'okwitwa kandi ahumbuurwe haahingwireho ebiro bisatu.
Petero yamugarra ha rubaju, yatandika kumuhana ati: “MUKAMA wange, eki nikikafuuhe! Tikirukwija kukubaho.”
Baitu Yesu yahinduka, yagambira Petero ati: “Ngaruka enyuma iwe Sitaani! Onfookiire muhingo, habwokuba ebi orukuteekereza tibiri bya Ruhanga, baitu by'abantu.”
Nubwo Yesu yagambiire abeegesebwa be ati: “Weena anyakugonza kumpondera, ayehwemu wenka, ahimbe omusaraba gwe, ampondere.
Weena anyakutaatira obwomeezi bwe, alibufeerwa; kandi weena anyakuhayo obwomeezi bwe habwange, alibutunga.
Omuntu kirimugasira ki okulya ensi yoona, baitu akafeerwa obwomeezi bwe? Rundi kintu ki omuntu eki alihayo kucungura obwomeezi bwe?
Omwana w'omuntu aliija n'abamalaika be omu kitiinisa kya Ise, nubwo alisasura buli muntu naasigikira ha bikorwa bye.
Mali mali nimbagambira nti: Haroho abeemeriire hanu abatalihikwaho rufu batakarozire Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu bukama bwe.”
Obu haahingwireho ebiro mukaaga, Yesu yatwara Petero, Yakobbo na Yohaana mugenzi we, yabatembya ha rusozi oruraihire bali bonka.
Yahinduka omumaiso gaabo, amaiso ge gaayangasana nk'izooba, n'ebijwaro bye byayera tiitiiti.
Nubwo Musa na Eriya baazooka nibabaza nawe.
Petero yagambire Yesu ati; “MUKAMA wange, kibaire kirungi itwe kusangwa hanu; obu oraaba nogonza, kanyombeke hanu obusiisira busatu: akamu kaawe, akandi ka Musa, n'akandi ka Eriya.”
Obu akaba naakyabaza, haija ekicu ekirukwangasana, kyabasiikiriza; kandi iraka lyaruga omu kicu, nirigamba liti: “Onu nuwe Mwana wange omugonzibwa ou nsiima; mumuhurre.”
Abeegesebwa obu baahuliire eki, baagwa bajuumaire, bakwasirwe obutiini bwingi.
Yesu yaija yabakwataho naagamba ati: “Mwimuke, muleke kutiina,”
Obu bainunwire amaiso gaabo, batarole muntu, kwihaho Yesu wenka.
Obu bakaba nibasirimuka orusozi, Yesu yabateererra ati: “Eki mwolekerwe, mutakigambiraho muntu weena, okuhikya Omwana w'omuntu obu alikamara kuhumbuuka omu bafu.”
Abeegesebwa be nukwo kumukaguza bati: “Habwaki abeegesa b'ebiragiro bagamba ngu: Eriya nuwe alibanza kwija?”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo Eriya nuwe alibanza kwija, nukwo atereekereze byona.
Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Eriya akaija ira, abantu batamumanye, baitu bakamukora kyona eki baagondeze. Omwana w'omuntu nawe nukwo balimubonabonesa bati.”
Aho nuho abeegesebwa be baayetegereriize nkooku arukubagambira ebyo Yohaana Omubatiza.
Obu baahikire ha kitebe ky'abantu, omusaija akaija yamutereza amaju, naagamba ati:
“MUKAMA wange, girra mutabani wange embabazi, habwokuba agwa ensimbo kandi zimubonabonesa muno; emirundi nyingi zimunaga omu murro n'omu maizi.
Nkamuleetera abeegesebwa baawe, baitu batasobole kumukiza.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Haa! Inywe ab'akasumi kanu ak'obutaikiriza kandi abahabire, ndihikya nkaha okwikara na inywe nti? Ndibagumiisiriza kuhikya di? Mumundeetere hanu.”
Yesu yacoomera omwoyo omubi, gwamurugamu, omwojo yakira ahonaaho.
Ebi obu byahoire nubwo abeegesebwa baizire hali Yesu baamukaguza omu nsita bati: “Habwaki itwe tukalemwa kugubinga?”

Uwe yabagarukamu ati: Habw'okwikiriza kwanyu okuke. Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Obu muraaba mwina okwikiriza okurukwingana nk'akasigo ka karadaali, muligambira orusozi oru muti: “Sinduka hanu, ogende hali' kandi rulirugaho; busaho kintu kyona ekiribalema.” (
Omwoyo omubi ogwa mulingo gunu tigubingwa kindi, kwihaho okusaba n'okusiiba.)
Yesu n'abeegesebwa be obu bakaba bakyali Galiraaya, nubwo yabagambiire ati: “Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abantu,
balimwita, kandi obu halihinguraho ebiro bisatu alihumbuurwa.” Aho bbo baatuntura muno.
Obu baahikire Kafaranaumu, abasorooza b'omusoro gw'Enju ya Ruhanga baizira Petero baamukaguza bati: “Omwegesa wanyu taha musoro?”

Yabagarukamu ati: “Aguha.” Petero obu yataahire omu ka, Yesu yabanza kumukaguza ati: “Simooni nooteekereza ki? Abakama ab'omunsi, omusoro n'obusuuru babiihaho bantu ki? Babiihaho abaana baabo rundi abantu abandi?”
Petero obu yamugarukiremu ati: “Abantu abandi”, nubwo Yesu yamugambira ati: “Nahabweki abaana baabu, ebi tibirukubakwataho.

Baitu habw'okutabeesiitaza, genda ha nyanja, onagemu irobo, encu ei orabanza kukwasa, ogiihemu; obu orayesamya akanwa kaayo, orasangamu sente; ogibasasule, gube musoro gwange n'ogwawe.” ky'efeeza ekirukwingana siringi nka ina.
Omu kasumi ako, abeegesebwa bakaija hali Yesu baamukaguza bati: “Arukukira obukuru omu bukama bw'omu iguru, nooha?”
Yesu yayeta omwana omuto, yamwemereza hagati yabu,
yagamba ati: “Mazima nimbagambira nti: Obu mutalihinduka, mukaba nk'abaana abato, timulitaaha omu bukama bw'omwiguru.
Weena anyakwebundaaza nk'omwana omuto onu, nuwe arukukira obukuru omu bukama bw'omwiguru.”
“Weena anyakujwahukirra omwana omuto nk'onu omu ibara lyange, buli ajwahukiriire nyowe.
Baitu weena alyesiitaza omu ha baana abato banu abarukunyikiriza, haakire abohwe omu bikya orubengo, anagwe omu nziha y'enyanja.
“Ensi erikibona habw'ebyesiitazo! Mazima ebyesiitazo tibiri by'okuburaho, baitu alikibona ogu anyakubireeta!

Kakuba omukono gwawe rundi okuguru kwawe bikuleetereza kusiisa, bitemeho obinage hara; haakire otaahe omu bwomeezi oramaire rundi ogookere, kukira kunagwa omu murro ogutahwaho oina emikono ebiri rundi amaguru abiri.
Kandi eriiso lyawe obu liraaba nirikuleetereza kusiisa, liihemu, olinage hara; haakire otaahe omu bwomeezi oina eriiso limu, okukira kunagwa omu murro ogutaraara oina amaiso abiri.
“Mwerinde, muleke kugaya omu ha bato banu, habwokuba nimbagambira nti: Omwiguru bamalaika baabo baikara nibarora amaiso ga Isenyowe anyakuli omu iguru. (
Ningira Omwana w'omuntu akaija kugarra ekyabuzire.)”
Nimuteekereza muta? Omuntu kakuba aba aina entaama kikumi, emu hali zo ekabura, tasiga kyenda na mwenda ha nsozi akagenda kuserra enyakubuzire?
Kakuba agizoora, mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: “Agisemererwa okukira ziri kyenda na mwenda ezitarabuzire.
Na Isenyowe ow'omu iguru nukwo atagonza omu ha bato abo ahwerekerre.”
“Mugenzi waawe obu araakusiisiraga, genda omugambire eki asobeze muli inywenka. Kakuba akuhuliriza, buli mugenzi waawe omwegaruliire.
Baitu kakuba atakuhuliriza, genda n'omuntu omu rundi babiri, nukwo kyona eki muraagamba kigumibwe baakaiso babiri rundi basatu.
Kakuba ayanga kubahuliriza, kigambire ekitebe ky'abaikiriza; kandi kakuba nabo ayanga kubahuliriza, omusisanize Omunyaihanga rundi omusorooza w'omusoro.
“Mazima nimbagambira nti: Kyona kyona eki muliboha omunsi, kiribohwa n'omwiguru; kandi kyona eki mulisumurra omunsi, kirisumururwa n'omwiguru.
Ninyongera kubagambira nti: Kakuba babiri hali inywe muraikirraniza omunsi ha kintu kyona eki murukusaba, Isenyowe ow'omwiguru alikibaha.
Nambere ababiri rundi abasatu beesorooleza omu ibara lyange, ndaabaga hagati yabo.”
Nubwo Petero yaizire yamukaguza ati: “Waitu, mugenzi wange obu aransiisiraga, ndamuganyiraga emirundi ingaha? Okuhika emirundi musanju?”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Tindukukugambira ngu okuhika emirundi musanju; baitu ohikyege nsanju emirundi musanju.”
“Nahabweki obukama bw'omu iguru nibulengesanizibwa nk'omukama ayagondeze abaheereza be bamubarre ebintu bye.
Obu yatandikire kubara nabo, baamuleetera omu anyakwina ibanja lye ly'obukaikuru bwa siringi;
kandi habw'okutasobora kusasura, mukama we yaragira kumutunda hamu na mukazi we, n'abaana be, na byona ebi akaba ainabyo, nukwo amale ibanja.
Omuheereza yateeza amaju yamwesengereza ati; ‘Mukama wange, ngumiisiriza, ndaakusasura zoona.’
Mukama we yamugirra embabazi, yamulekera, kandi yamuganyira ibanja eri.
“Baitu omuheereza ogu obu yaturukire aheeru, yatangaana omu ha baheereza bataahi be, ow'akaba amuliireho ibanja erya sente nke muno; yamukwata, yamuniga naagamba ati: ‘Nsasura.’
Omuheereza mutaahi we yagwa hansi, yamwesengereza ati: ‘Ngumiisiriza, ndaakusasura.’
Baitu uwe yayanga, yagenda yamuta omu nkomo okuhika obu alikamara ibanja.
Abaheereza bataahi be obu baarozire ebibaireho, baasaalirwa muno, baagenda baagambira mukama wabu byona ebibaireho.
Nubwo mukama we yamweta yamugambira ati: ‘Iwe omuheereza omubi! Nkuganyiirege ibanja eri lyona habw'okunyesengereza;
na iwe tokuganyiire omuheereza mutaahi waawe, nkooku nyowe nkuganyiire?’
Mukama we yabiihirwa, yamukwasa abalinzi b'enkomo okuhika obu alikasasura ibanja lyona.
Isenyowe ow'omu iguru nukwo alibakora ati, obu muraaba mutarukuganyirangana n'omutima gumu.”
Yesu obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yaruga Galiraaya yagenda omu kicweka kya Buyudaaya nseeri y'ekisaaru Yorudaani;
ebitebe by'abantu baingi byamuhonderayo, yabakiza endwara.
Abafalisaayo baija nambere ali, baamulenga nibamukaguza bati: “Ebiragiro bya Musa nibiikiriza omusaija kubinga mukazi we naamujunaana ensonga yoona?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Timukasomaga ngu, Ogu ayabahangire kuruga omu kubanza, akahanga omusaija n'omukazi?
Yayongera ati: ‘Nikyo omusaija araalekeraga ise na nyina agumire hali mukazi we, kandi ababiri abo bafooke mubiri gumu.’
Nahabweki baba batakyali babiri, baitu omu Ruhanga eki yateeraniize, hatalibaho muntu akyahukaniza.”
Abafalisaayo baagaruka baamukaguza bati: “Kandi habwaki Musa yaikiriize omuntu kuha mukazi we ebbaruha y'okwahukana, nukwo amubinge?”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Habw'okugumangana kw'emitima yanyu nikyo Musa yabaikiriize okubinga bakazi banyu, baitu okuruga kara koona kikaba kitalikwo.
Kandi nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena anyakubinga mukazi we atamutuzire obusiihani, akaswera ondi, buli asiihaine; kandi weena aliswera omukazi anyakubingirwe, buli nawe asiihaine.”
Abeegesebwa be baamugambira bati: “Eby'omusaija n'omukazi obu biraaba biri biti, haakire omuntu okutaswera.”
Baitu uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Tibali boona abasobora kuhondera eki ngambire, kwihaho abo bonka Ruhanga aba akihaire.
Habwokuba haroho abakonwa abaazairwe kwo, kandi haroho abaakonerwe abantu, kandi haroho abaayekonere bonka habw'obukama bw'omwiguru. Arukusobora kukwata kinu, akikwate.”
Nubwo baamuleetiire abaana abato abakwateho, abasabire. Abeegesebwa be baacoomera ababalesire;
baitu Yesu yabagambira ati: “Muleke abaana bato baije nambere ndi, mutabatanga; habwokuba abali nk'abo, obukama bw'omwiguru bwabo.”
Nubwo yabataho emikono, yarugayo.
Omuntu akaija hali Yesu, yamukaguza ati: “Mwegesa, kikorwa ki ekirungi eki nsemeriire kukora, nukwo ntunge obwomeezi obutahwaho?”
Yamugarukamu ati: “Nonkaguliza ki ha kintu ekirungi? Haroho omurungi omu wenka. Obu oraaba noogonza kutaaha omu bwomeezi, okwatege Ebiragiro.”
Uwe yamukaguza ati: “Biragiro ki?” Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Otaliita. Otalisiihana. Otaliiba. Otalihangirra.
Otiinege sso na nyoko. Ogonzeege mutaahi wawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.”
Omusigazi ogu yamugarukamu ati: “Ebi byona nkabikwata, ninkuyaburwaho kiha?”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Obu oraaba noogonza kuhikirra, genda otunde ebyawe byona, sente eziraarugamu ozigabire abaseege, nubwo olitunga itungo omwiguru; nukwo oije onkuraatire.”
Omusigazi obu yahuliire eki, yagenda agwerirwe, habwokuba akaba aina itungo lingi.
Yesu yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Ka nikiremeera omuguuda kutaaha omu bukama bw'omwiguru.
Ninyongera kubagambira nti: Nikirahuka engamiya kuraba omu nyindo y'enkinzo, kukira omuguuda kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.”
Abeegesebwa be obu baahuliire kinu, baahunirra muno, baagamba bati: “Mara nooha alisobora kujunwa?”
Baitu Yesu yabarolerra naabagambira ati: “Kinu abantu tibarukukisobora, baitu Ruhanga naasobora byona.”
Nubwo Petero yamukaguza ati: “Dora itwe tukasiga byona twakuhondera; obu, tulitunga ki?”

Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Omu bwomeezi oburukwija, Omwana w'omuntu obu aliikarra ha kitebe kye eky'ekitiinisa, na inywe abampondiire mulikarra ha bitebe ikumi na bibiri, mucwere emisango enganda ikumi na ibiri eza Isirairi.

Omuntu weena ayasigire amaju ge, rundi bagenzi be, rundi banyaanya, rundi ise, rundi nyina, rundi abaana be, rundi ebibanja bye habwange, aliheebwa emirundi kikumi, kandi atunge n'obwomeezi obutahwaho.
Baitu baingi ab'okubanza baliba b'enyuma, kandi ab'enyuma baliba b'okubanza.”
“Obukama bw'omwiguru nibusisana nyineeka ayazindukire nyenkya kara kugulirra abakozi b'okulima omu rugonjo rwe rw'emizaabbibbu.
Obu yamazire kwikirraniza nabo empeera y'ekiro kimu, yaboohereza omu rugonjo rwe orw'emizaabbibbu.
Obu yaturukire nka ha saaha isatu, yarora abandi beemeriire omu katale bataina eki barukukora;
yabagambira ati: ‘Na inywe mugende omu rugonjo rwange mukole, ninyija kubaha ekibasemeriire.’ Baagenda.
Yayongera yaturuka nka ha saaha mukaaga na ha saaha mwenda, nabwo yakora ati.
Kandi ha saaha ikumi n'emu yaturuka aheeru, yasanga abandi beemeriire, yabakaguza ati: ‘Habwaki musiibire hanu ekiro kyona mutaina eki murukukora?’
Baamugarukamu bati: ‘Habwokuba busaho muntu atwesire.’ Yabagambira ati: ‘Na inywe mugende omu rugonjo rwange mukole.’
“Izooba obu lyagoroobere, mukama w'orugonjo rw'emizaabbibbu yagambira omukeeto we ati: ‘Yeta abakozi, obahe empeera yabo, obandize ha b'enyuma, omalirirre ha b'okubanza.’
Abaatandikire ha saaha nka ikumi n'emu obu baizire, buli omu yatunga empeera y'ekiro kimu.
Ab'okubanza obu baizire, baanihira ngu nibaija kusasurwa kukiraho; baitu buli omu omuli bo nawe akasasurwa empeera y'ekiro kimu.
Obu bakaba nibakyagiheebwa, baahyemera nyineeka,
nibakaguza bati: ‘Abaizire hanyuma bakozire esaaha emu yonka, kandi obainganiize na itwe abakozire ekiro kyona tutiirwe n'omusana?’
Uwe yagarukamu omu hali bo ati: ‘Mugenzi wange, tinkukozire kubi. Tituragainege empeera y'ekiro kimu?
Twara eyawe, ogende; ngondeze kusasura owa hanyuma nkooku nkusaswire.
Haroho arukuntanga kukozesa ebyange nkooku ndukugonza? Rundi nondora eriiso libi habw'obwenda bwange?’
Nahabweki ab'enyuma baliba b'okubanza, kandi ab'okubanza baliba b'enyuma.”
Yesu obu akaba naagenda Yerusaalemu, akagarra abeegesebwa be ikumi na babiri ha rubaju. Obu bakaba nibakyagenda yabagambira ati:
“Hati nu, nitugenda Yerusaalemu; Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo hali abanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, balimucwera omusango gw'okumwita,
kandi balimuhayo hali Abanyamahanga kumusekeereza, okumuteera enkoba, n'okumubamba ha musaraba; baitu alihumburwa hahingwireho ebiro bisatu.”
Nubwo nyina batabani ba Zebedaayo yaija nabo hali Yesu, yateeza amaju omumaiso ge aina eki arukumusaba.
Yesu yamukaguza ati: “Noyenda ki?” Yamugarukamu ati: “Ikiriza abaana bange banu baikarre, omu ha mukono gwawe ogw'obulyo ondi ha gw'emoso omu bukama bwawe.”
Baitu Yesu yagarukamu ati: “Timurukumanya eki murukusaba. Nimusobora kubagana ha mabone aga ndukwija kubonabona?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Nitusobora.”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Amabone aga ndukwija kubonabona na inywe muligabona, baitu okwikarra ha mukono gwange ogw'obulyo n'ogw'emoso, tali nyowe arukukigaba, baitu ky'abo aba kiteekaniriziibwe Isenyowe.”
Kandi ikumi obu baahuliire eki, babiihirirwa banyineemu abo ababiri.
Baitu Yesu yayeta boona, yabagambira ati: “Mumanyire abalemi b'Abanyamahanga nkooku babalemesa itwale, kandi n'abakuru baabo nkooku babaragiza obusobozi.
Tikiriba kiti omuli inywe; baitu arukwenda kuba mukuru omuli inywe, naasemerra kuba muheereza wanyu;
kandi arukwenda kuba w'okubanza omuli inywe, naasemerra kuba muheereza wanyu,
nkooku Omwana w'omuntu ataraiziire kuheerezibwa baitu okuheereza, n'okuhayo obwomeezi bwe okucungura baingi.”
Obu bakaba nibaruga Yeriko, ekitebe kikooto ky'abantu kyahondera Yesu.
Kandi abafu b'amaiso babiri abakaba baikaliire ha muhanda rubaju, obu baahuliire ngu, Yesu naahingura, baayamirra nibagamba bati: “Omwana wa Daudi, tugirre embabazi!”
Ekitebe ky'abantu kyabacoomera nikibaigaliriza ngu baculeere; baitu bbo baatokera haiguru okukiraho bati: “Waitu, Omwana wa Daudi, tugirre embabazi!”
Yesu yayemerra, yabeeta, yabakaguza ati: “Nimugonza mbakorre ki?”
Baamugarukamu bati: “Waitu, nitugonza amaiso gaitu gaiguke.”
Yesu yabakwatirwa embabazi, yabakora ha maiso, ahonaaho baarora, kandi baamuhondera.
Obu bairiire haihi na Yerusaalemu, baahika Betifage, ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva. Nubwo Yesu yatumire babiri ha beegesebwa be,
naabagambira ati: “Mugende omu kyaro eki muroleriire, nimwija kusangayo endogoyi esibikirwe, ina omwana gwayo; muzisibule, muzindeetere.
Obu haraabaho omuntu arukubakaguza, mumugarukemu muti: ‘Mukama waitu naazeetaaga’; naija kuzigarra bwango.”
Kinu kikabaho kuhikiriza ekyagambirwe omurangi ati:
“Mugambire abantu ba Siyoni muti: Dora, omukama waawe naija nambere oli, ayebundaize, atembere endogoyi, endogoyi ento, omwana gw'endogoyi.”
Abeegesebwa baagenda, baakora nkooku Yesu yabaragiriire;
baaleeta endogoyi n'omwana gwayo, baazitaho ebijwaro byabo, Yesu yaikarraho.
Abantu baingi baayarra ebijwaro byabo omu muhanda, abandi baacwa amataagi g'emiti, baagarra omu muhanda.
Ebitebe by'abantu ebikaba bimwebembiire n'ebyamukuraatiire baakatoka nibagamba bati: “Hangiriza Omwana wa Daudi! Ahaisanizibwe arukwija omu ibara lya Atahwaho! Hangiriza anyakusinga haiguru muno!”
Obu yataahire Yerusaalemu, orubuga rwona rwayooka, abantu baakaguzangana bati: “Ogu nooha?”
Ebitebe by'abantu baagarukamu nibagamba bati: “Onu nuwe Yesu, omurangi anyakurugire Nazareeti orwa Galiraaya.”
Yesu akataaha omu Nju ya Ruhanga, yatandika kubinga boona abakaba nibatundiramu n'abakaba nibagurramu, yajuumika emeeza ez'abakaba nibahingisa sente, n'entebe z'abo abakaba nibatunda amaiba.
Yabagambira ati: “Kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Enju yange eraayetwaga nju y'okusabiramu’; baitu inywe mugifoire bwingira bw'abanyagi.”
Abafu b'amaiso n'abalema baija nambere ali omu Nju ya Ruhanga, yabakiza.
Baanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro obu baarozire ebyamahano ebi yakozire, kandi n'abaana nibatokera omu Nju ya Ruhanga bati: “Hangiriza Omwana wa Daudi!” baabiihirwa muno;
baamukaguza bati: “Noohurra abo ebi barukugamba?” Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Ego, mbihuliire; inywe timukasomaga muti: ‘Omu kanwa k'abaana abato n'enkerembe numwo watungire okukugizibwa okuhikire?’ ”
Nubwo yabarugireho, yaturuka orubuga, yagenda Betaniya kugonyayo.
Nyenkya, Yesu obu akaba naagaruka omu rubuga, yarumwa enjara.
Obu yarozire omuti omutini ha muhanda rubaju, yaguhikaho, baitu tiyasangaho kantu okwihaho ebikoora byonka. Yagugambira ati: “Otaligarukira kwana ebijuma ebiro byona!” Ahonaaho omutini ogu gwahotoka.
Abeegesebwa be obu baakirozire baahunirra muno, nibagamba bati: “Omutini gunu gwahotoka guta bwango?”

Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Obu muraaba mwina okwikiriza mutarukugurukyagurukya, timulikora nk'ekyakorwa ha muti gunu kyonka, baitu noobu muligambira orusozi oru muti: ‘Sinduka ogwe omu nyanja’, nukwo kiriba.
Obu muraaba mwina okwikiriza, kyona eki muraasabaga nimwesengereza, muraakiheebwaga.”
Yesu obu yataahire omunju ya Ruhanga, banyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu baija nambere ali nakyayegesa, baamukaguza bati: “Busobozi ki oburukukukoza binu, kandi okabuheebwa oha?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Na nyowe ka mbakaguze ekikaguzo kinu; obu murangarukamu, nubwo ndabagambira obusobozi oburukunkoza binu.
