Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaruga nkaha? Kukaruga hali Ruhanga rundi omu bantu?” Bbo baatandika kuhakanizangana bati: “Obu turaagamba ngu: ‘Kukaruga hali Ruhanga’, naija kutukaguza ati: ‘Habwaki mutaramwikiriize?’
Baitu obu turaagamba ngu: ‘Kukaruga omu bantu’, nitutiina ekitebe ky'abantu, habwokuba boona bananukire Yohaana nkooku akaba ali murangi.”
Nukwo baagarukamu Yesu bati: “Titumanyire.” Uwe yabagambira ati: “Na nyowe tindukwija kubagambira obusobozi oburukunkoza binu.”
“Nimuteekereza muta? Omusaija akaba aina abatabani be babiri; akagenda yagambira omukuru ati: ‘Mwana wange, hati genda okole omu rugonjo rw'emizaabbibbu.’
Omwana yamugarukamu ati: ‘Tindukugyayo’, baitu hanyuma yayegarukamu, yagenda.
Isebo yagenda hali omuto yamugambira nk'ebi yagambiire omukuru. Nandiki uwe ati: ‘Ego taata,’ ka ngende; baitu tiyagyayo.

Hali abo ababiri, nooha ayakozire ise eki akaba naagonza?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Omukuru.” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abasorooza b'omusoro n'abamalaaya nibaija kubabanza kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.

Habwokuba Yohaana Omubatiza akaija hali inywe naabooleka omuhanda ogu musemeriire kurabamu, mutamwikirize; baitu abasorooza b'omusoro n'abamalaaya bbo bakamwikiriza. Inywe noobu mwarozire eki, nabwo muteegarukemu mukamwikiriza.”

Yesu yabagambira ati: “Muhurre oruganikyo orundi. Hakaba haroho nyineeka ayabyaire orugonjo rw'emizaabbibbu, yaruzitirra, yalimamu endeeba, yayombekamu endindiro, yarusigira abapangisa, yagenda omu ihanga erindi.
Obusumi bw'okunoga emizaabbibbu obu bwahikire, yatuma abaheereza be hali abapangisa abo, bamutwekere ha bijuma by'emizaabbibbu ye;
abapangisa baakwata abaheereza be, omu baamuteera, owa kabiri baamwita, owa kasatu baamuteera amabaale.
Yagaruka yatumayo abaheereza abandi baingi okukiraho ab'okubanza; nabo nukwo baabakozire.
Hanyuma yabatumira mutabani we naateekereza ati: ‘Omwana wange baraamugayuka.’
Baitu abapangisa abo obu baarozire omutabani, baagambirangana bati: ‘Onu nuwe mugwetwa, leka tumwite, obugwetwa bube bwaitu.’
Baamukwata, baamuturukya aheeru y'orugonjo, baamwita.
Boojo, mukama w'orugonjo obu aliija, abapangisa abo alibakoraki?”
Baamugarukamu bati: “Abapangisa abo ababi alibahwerekereza, bafe kubi, kandi orugonjo rwe arukwase abakozi abandi abaraamuha ebijuma omu kasumi kaabyo.”

Yesu yabagambira ati: “Timukasomaga Ekyahandiikirwe ekirukugamba kiti: ‘Ibaale lyonyini aboombeki eri baayangire niryo lyafookere bugumizo bw'enju; kinu nikyo Ruhanga yakozire, kandi nituhunirra kukirora’?
Nahabweki nimbagambira nti: Obukama bwa Ruhanga bulibaihwaho buheebwe ihanga erirukukora ebikorwa ebirungi. [
Omuntu weena anyakugwa ha ibaale eri, alicwacwanuka; baitu ibaale ou lirigwera, lirimusasangura.]”
Baanyakatagara abakuru n'Abafalisaayo obu baahuliire enganikyo ze, baamanya nkooku bali nubo arukugambaho.
Baitu obu baagondeze kumukwata, baatiina enkuyanja y'abantu, habwokuba baamwetaga murangi.
Yesu yayongera kubaganikiza oruganikyo orundi ati:
“Obukama bw'omwiguru nibulengesanizibwa nk'omukama ayakoliire mutabani we obugenyi bw'okuswera.
Yatuma abaheereza be kweta abo abakaba baraaliziibwe kwija ha bugenyi; baitu bbo batagonze kwija.
Yagaruka yatuma abaheereza abandi naagamba ati: ‘Mugende mugambire abo abaraaliziibwe muti: Nteekaniize obugenyi bwange, nyisire enimi y'esajwa, kandi nteekaniize buli kintu, mwije mutaahe obugenyi.’
Baitu abagenyi abaraaliziibwe batakifeeho, baayegendera, omu yagenda ha musiri gwe, ondi omu busubuzi bwe,
abasigaireho baakwata abaheereza be, baabaswaza, baabaita.
Omukama yabiihirwa muno, yatuma amahe ge, gaahwerekereza abaisi abo, gaayokya n'orubuga rwabo.
Nubwo yagambiire abaheereza be ati: ‘Obugenyi buteekaniziibwe, baitu abaraaliziibwe tibabusemeriire.
Hati nu, mugende omu ntangatangano z'emihanda, abantu baingi aba muraasangayo mubeete, baije ha bugenyi.’
Abaheereza baagenda omu mihanda, baasorooza boona abaakasangirweyo, ababi n'abarungi; enju yaijura abagenyi.
“Baitu omukama obu yaizire kurora abagenyi, yasangamu omusaija atajwaire kijwaro ky'obugenyi;
yamukaguza ati: ‘Mutaahi wange, munu otaahiremu ota, otajwaire kijwaro ky'obugenyi?’ Baitu uwe yaburwa eky'okugarukamu.
Nubwo omukama yaragiire abaheereza be ati: ‘Mumubohe emikono n'amaguru, mumunage aheeru omu mwirima nambere abantu baliririrra kandi banene ensaya.’
Habwokuba abeetwa baingi, baitu abakomwamu bake.”
Abafalisaayo baagenda, baahanuura nkooku baraatega Yesu omu bigambo.

Baamutumaho abeegesebwa baabo hamu n'ab'ekitebe kya Herode, baamugambira bati: “Mwegesa, tumanyire nkooku oli w'amazima, oyegesa omuhanda gwa Ruhanga omu mazima otaina n'omu ou orukutiina kandi tororra ha kitiinisa ky'abantu.
Tugambire eki orukuteekereza. Kihikire kuha Kaisaali omusoro, rundi nangwa?”
Baitu Yesu yakenga obugobya bwabo, yagamba ati: “Nimuntegera ki, bagobya inywe?
Munyoleke siringi ei muha omusoro.” Baamuleetera siringi.
Yesu yabakaguza ati: “Ekisisani kinu n'ebihandiikirweho by'oha?”
Baamugarukamu bati: “Bya Kaisaali.” Yesu yabagambira ati: “Ebya Kaisaali mubihe Kaisaali, n'ebya Ruhanga mubihe Ruhanga.”
Obu bahuliire eki, baahunirra, baamurugaho, baagenda.
Ha kiro eki, Abasadukaayo abagamba ngu, tiharoho okuhumbuuka kw'abafu, bakaija hali Yesu baamukaguza bati:
“Mwegesa, Musa akagamba ati: ‘Kakuba omuntu afa atazaire baana, mugenzi we aswere omufaakati ogu, nukwo bazaare kifa abaana.’
Owaitu oku, hakaba haliyo banyineemu musanju: Mukuru waabo akaswera omukazi, baitu yafa atakamuzaireho baana, yamugwetera mugenzi we.
Owa kabiri n'owa kasatu nabo nukwo bati, okuhikiza kimu ha wa musanju, boona batazaale.
Abo boona obu baahoireho omukazi nawe yafa.
Ha kuhumbuuka kw'abafu, omukazi ogu aliba muk'oha hali abo omusanju? Habwokuba boona bakamuswera.”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Muhabire habw'okutamanya ebyahandiikirwe noobu bwakuba obusobozi bwa Ruhanga.
Habwokuba ha kuhumbuuka, tibaliswera kandi tibaliswerwa, baitu baliba bali nk'abamalaika omwiguru.
Kandi ha by'okuhumbuuka kw'abafu, timukasomaga Ruhanga eki yabagambiire ati:
‘Ninyowe Ruhanga owa Abburahamu, Ruhanga wa Isaaka, kandi Ruhanga wa Yakobbo?’ Tali Ruhanga w'abafiire, baitu w'aboomeezi.”
Abantu obu baahuliire eki, baahunirra habw'okwegesa kwe.
Baitu Abafalisaayo obu baahuliire Yesu nkooku aculiize Abasadukaayo abatiire ibumbakanwa, baayesorooza hamu.
Omu hali bo, akaba ali looya, yamukaguza naamutega ati:
“Mwegesa, kiragiro ki ekikuru omu Biragiro?”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Ogonzeege MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona, n'omwoyo gwawe gwona, n'amagezi gaawe goona.
Eki nikyo kiragiro ekikuru ekirukubanza.
Kandi ekya kabiri ekirukusisana n'eki, nikyo kinu: Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.
Omu biragiro binu ebibiri, ebindi byona n'eby'abarangi numwo bisigikira.”
Abafalisaayo obu bakaba beesoroize hamu, Yesu yabakaguza ati:
“Kristo nimumuteekerezaaho muta? Mwijukuru w'oha?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Mwijukuru wa Daudi.”
Yesu yagaruka yabakaguza ati: “Daudi, obu yagambisiibwe Mwoyo Ahikiriire, habwaki yamwesire MUKAMA we ati:
‘MUKAMA akagambira MUKAMA wange ati: Ikarra ha mukono gwange ogw'obulyo okuhika obu ndifoora abanyazigwa baawe akatebe k'ebigere byawe’?
Daudi obu araaba yayesire Kristo MUKAMA we, kandi obu, aba ata mwijukuru we?”
Busaho n'omu ayasoboire kumugarukamu; kandi okuruga ha kiro eki, hatabeho n'omu ayalengereho kumukaguza ebikaguzo ebindi.
Nubwo Yesu yagambiire ebitebe by'abantu n'abeegesebwa be ati:
“Abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo balema omu kiikaro kya Musa;
nahabweki muhurrege kandi mukuraatire byona ebi baraabagambiraga, baitu muleke kukora nka bo, habwokuba ebi bagamba, tibiri nibyo bakora.
Baboha emigugu erukulemeera, etarukusobora kwetwekwa, bagyetwekesa abandi ha mitwe; baitu bbo bonka tibagonza kugitengesaaho n'orukumo rwabo.
Bakora ebikorwa byabo byona nibagonza kurorwa abantu. Banyeesa ebihuuta byabo ebyahurwamu Ebiragiro, baraihya ebitutu by'ebijwaro byabo,
bagonza ebiikaro by'omu maiso omu magenyi, n'entebe ez'ekitiinisa omu masorrokaniro,
n'okuramukibwa omu butale, n'abantu okubeeta: Mwegesa.
Baitu inywe mutalyetwa Mwegesa, habwokuba mwina omwegesa omu, kandi inywena muli iseemu.
Mutalyeta muntu weena ow'omunsi isiinywe, habwokuba mwina Isiinywe omu, anyakuli omu iguru.
Kandi mutalyetwa bakama, habwokuba mwina Mukama omu, nuwe Kristo.
Arukukira obukuru omuli inywe, araabaga muheereza wanyu;
weena anyakwenyumiza, alibundaazibwa; kandi weena anyakwebundaaza, alinyumizibwa.”
“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba mukingira abantu obukama bw'omu iguru na inywe timubutaahamu, kandi n'abarukugonza kubutaahamu timubaikiriza. [

Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba munyaga ebintu eby'omu maju g'abafaakati, kandi musaba endanda abantu babarole; nikyo mulicwererwa omusango ogurukukira obukooto.]

“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba mwambuka amayanja mugendagenda omu mahanga habw'okuhindura omuntu omu. Obu mumara kumuhindura, mumufoora muntu w'okunagwa omu kiinongoro ky'omurro, mubi okukira inywe emirundi ebiri.

“Mulikibona inywe abeebembezi abafu b'amaiso abagamba muti: ‘Kakuba omuntu naarahira Enju ya Ruhanga, tikiri kigambo; baitu kakuba naarahira ezaabbu y'omu Nju ya Ruhanga, kimusemeriire kuhikiriza endahiro ye.’
Badoma inywe abafu b'amaiso! Ekirukukira obukuru nikiha, zaabbu rundi Enju ya Ruhanga enyakweza zaabbu egi?
Kandi mugamba muti: ‘Kakuba omuntu naarahira itambiro, tikiri kigambo; baitu kakuba arahira ebinyakuli ha itambiro, kimusemeriire kuhikiriza endahiro ye.’
Inywe abafu b'amaiso! Ekirukukiraho obukuru nikiha, ekihongwa rundi itambiro erirukweza ekihongwa?
Nahabweki ogu nanyakurahira itambiro, aba alirahire na byona ebinyakuliroho.
Kandi na weena anyakurahira Enju ya Ruhanga aba agirahiire, kandi arahiire n'Ogu anyakugiikaramu.
N'anyakurahira iguru, aba arahiire ekitebe kya Ruhanga n'Ogu anyakukiikaliireho.

“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba muha ekicweka kya ikumi eky'omubwiga, n'eyobyo, n'emikubi endi; kandi timutaho mutima ebigambo ebikuru ebiri omu Biragiro: obwinganiza, embabazi n'okwikiriza. Binu nibyo mwakukozire, kandi ebindi nabyo muleke kubinagaija.
Inywe abeebembezi abafu b'amaiso, musengiija ebyokunywa kubiihamu omubu, kandi mumira engamiya!
“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba mwogya ekikopo n'esahaani haruguru, kandi kunu omu nda mwijwire obunyagi n'obubi.
Mufalisaayo iwe omufu w'amaiso: Banza oyogye ekikopo n'esahaani omu nda, nukwo na haruguru yabyo hasemere.
“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba musisana nk'ebituuro ebisiigirwe inoni, ebizooka kurungi aheeru, kandi kunu omu nda bijwire amagufa g'abafu n'oburofu bwona.
Na inywe haruguru muzooka nk'abahikiriire omumaiso g'abantu, baitu omu nda mwijwire obugobya n'obubi.
“Mulikibona ngobya inywe, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba mwombekera abarangi ebituuro, musemeza n'ebiijukyo by'abahikiriire,
nimugamba muti: ‘Kakuba twabaire turoho omu biro by'abaisenkuruitwe, titwakuteraine nabo kuseesa esagama y'abarangi.’
Habweki nimwerumiriza inywenka nkooku muli baijukuru b'abo abaisire abarangi.
Na inywe muba nimumaliriza baisenkuru inywe eki baatandikire.
Njoka inywe, baana b'encwera, mulitabuka muta omusango ogw'okunagwa omu kiinongoro ky'omurro?

Nikyo ndukubatumira abarangi, abantu b'amagezi, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro: abamu mulibo mulibaita nimubabamba ha musaraba, abandi mulibateera enkoba omu masorrokaniro ganyu, kandi abandi mubahiiganize omu mbuga zoona,

nukwo esagama y'abahikiriire boona eyasesirwe omunsi ebaimukirre: okurugirra ha sagama y'Abberi ayaitiirwe busa, okuhika ha sagama ya Zakaliya mutabani wa Barakiya, ou mwaitiire hagati y'ekiikaro ekirukwera n'itambiro.
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Binu byona birihikaho abantu ab'obusinge bunu.”

“Ai bambi Yerusaalemu, Yerusaalemu iwe anyakwita abarangi nooteeza amabaale abakutumirwa! Kaingaha obu naagondeze kusorooza hamu abaana baawe nk'enkoko oku ebumbatira obwana bwayo omu mapapa gaayo, baitu iwe otaikirize!
Dora, enju yaawe neija kusigara eri kifurukwa.
Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Timuligaruka kundora okuhika obu mulikagamba muti: ‘W'omugisa ogu arukwija omu ibara lya MUKAMA.’ ”
Yesu obu akaba naaruga omu Nju ya Ruhanga, nubwo abeegesebwa be baizire kumuragirra enyombeka yayo.
Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Ebi byona timurukubirora? Mazima nimbagambira nti: Hanu tihalisigaraho ibaale eriri ha lindi, eritalinagwa hansi.”

Yesu obu akaba aikaliire ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva, abeegesebwa be baija nambere ali baamukaguza omu nsita bati: “Tugambire, binu biribaho di, kandi karorwaho ki akalyoleka okwija kwawe n'okuhwaho kw'ensi?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Mwerinde, hatalibaho muntu weena arukubahabisa.
Habwokuba baingi abaliija omu ibara lyange, nibagamba bati: ‘Ninyowe Kristo’, kandi balihabisa baingi.
Mulihurra obulemu n'engambo zabwo; mwerinde mutalyekanga; habwokuba ebi by'okubaho, baitu empero eriba etakahikire.
Ihanga lirimukirra erindi, n'obukama bulirwanisa obundi, haligwa kiihe kandi halibaho emisisa omu biikaro bingi.
Ebi byona eriba ntandiko y'emihito.
“Nubwo balibahayo okubonabonesibwa n'okwitwa; amahanga goona galibanoba habwange.
Abaingi balinaga okwikiriza, bagobezangane, kandi banobangane.
Haliimuka abarangi baingi ab'ebisuba kandi balihabisa baingi.
Habw'obubi kuhingurana buti, okugonza okwa baingi kulifuka.
Baitu ogu aligumiisiriza kuhika ha mpero, nuwe alijunwa.
Kandi Amakuru Amarungi ganu ag'obukama bwa Ruhanga galirangirirwa omunsi yoona, gabe bwakaiso ha mahanga goona; obu nubwo empero erihika.”
“Obu mulirora ekintu ekirukunugwa kandi ekirukuhwerekereza, ekyagambirweho Daneeri omurangi, kitairwe omu kiikaro ekirukwera (arukusoma binu abyetegereze),
abo abaliba bali omu Buyudaaya bairukire ha nsozi;
alisangwa hanju eruguru, atalisirimuka kwiha ekintu omunju ye;
n'alisangwa ali omu musiri, ataligaruka omu ka kutabarra omwenagiro gwe.
Kandi bambi, abaliba baina enda n'abarukwonkya omu biro ebi balikibona!
Musabe muleke kusingwa omu biro by'obutiti rundi ha Sabbato.
Habwokuba omu biro ebi halibaho omuhito mwingi ogutakabahoga okuruga Ruhanga ahanga ensi n'okuhika hati, kandi ogutaligaruka kubaho.
Kakuba ebiro ebi bitarakeehiibweho, tihaakujunirwe muntu n'omu; baitu habw'abakomerwemu be, ebiro ebi Ruhanga akabikeehyaho.
Omuntu weena obu alibagambira ati: ‘Dora Kristo ngunu!’ Rundi: ‘Ngugwo!’ Mutalimwikiriza.
Habwokuba halizooka abarangi ab'ebisuba n'abarukweyeta Kristo, booleke ebihuniriza bingi n'ebyamahano, nukwo bahabise noobu baakubaire abakomerwemu.
Binu mbibagambiire bitakabaireho.
Nahabweki obu balibagambira bati: ‘Darawe ali omwirungu,’ mutaligyayo. Rundi: ‘Ngunu ali omu kisiika’, mutaliikiriza.
Omurabyo nkooku gumulikya niguruga Burugaizooba kuhika Bugwaizooba, n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu nukwo kuliba kuti.
Nambere hali omutumbi, nuho esega zeesorooleza.”
“Emihito y'ebiro ebi obu erihwa, ahonaaho izooba lirisiikirizibwa omwirima, n'okwezi tikulijwa, n'enyunyuuzi zirigwa hansi, kandi amaani ag'omwiguru galitengesebwa.
Nubwo akarorwaho k'Omwana w'omuntu kalizooka omu iguru, kandi enganda zoona ez'omunsi ziriganya. Aho balirora Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu bicu by'omwiguru, aina obusobozi n'ekitiinisa kingi.
Nubwo alituma bamalaika be nibateera engwara ezirukugamba muno, basorooze abakomerwemu be nibabaiha omu mbaju ina, okuruga ha mpero emu y'iguru okuhika hali endi.”
“Mwegere ha muti omutini, itaagi lyagwo obu lirokera, likanjurra amababi, mumanya nkooku ekyanda kiri haihi.
Na inywe obu mulirora ebi byona, mumanye nkooku ali haihi, ahikiire kimu ha irembo.
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Ab'obusinge bunu tibalihwaho, ebi byona bitakabaireho.
Iguru n'ensi birihwaho, baitu ebigambo byange tibirihwaho.”
“Baitu ekiro eki n'esaaha egi busaho n'omu abimanyire, noobu baakuba bamalaika ab'omu iguru, noobu yakuba Omwana w'omuntu, kwihaho Isenyowe wenka.
Nkooku kyabaire omu biro bya Noha, n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu nukwo kuliba kuti.
Omu biro ebyayebembiire okusandaara kw'amaizi, abantu baalyaaga, baanywaga, basweranganaga, okuhika ha kiro Noha eki yataahiireho omu lyato erikooto,
kandi batakimanye okuhika okusandaara kw'amaizi obu kwaizire kwabahwerekereza boona; n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu nukwo kuliba kuti.
Abasaija babiri obu balisangwa omu musiri: omu alitwarwa, ondi asigale.
Abakazi babiri obu baliba nibasa hamu: omu alitwarwa, ondi asigale.
Nahabweki mwikale nimurora, habwokuba timumanyire kiro MUKAMA eki aliiziramu.
Baitu kinu mukimanye, kakuba nyineeka yamanyire akasumi omusuma ak'arukwiziramu omu bwire bw'ekiro, yaakwikaire naarora, taakulekere enju ye kucwibwa.
Nahabweki na inywe musemeriire kwikara mweteekaniize; habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu aliija ha saaha ei mutarukumunihirranu.”
“Nooha omuheereza ogu omwesigwa kandi ow'amagezi, mukama we ou yasigiire kurolerra ab'omu ka ye, abahe ebyokulya omu kasumi akahikire?
W'omugisa omuheereza ogu, mukama we obu aligaruka, akamusanga naakora ati!
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Alimukwasa okurolerra ebintu bye byona.
Baitu omuheereza omubi kakuba ateekereza ati: ‘Mukama wange aikaireyo’,
kandi akatandika kuteera abaheereza bataahi be, akeeta ha kulya n'okunywa n'abatamiizi.
Mukama w'omuheereza ogu obu aligaruka ha kiro eki atarukumunihirramu na ha saaha ei atarukumanya,
alimufubira, amubarre omuli abo abatarukwesigwa; oku nuho abantu baliririrra kandi banene ensaya.”
“Omu kasumi ako, obukama bw'omwiguru bulirengesanizibwa n'abaisiki ikumi abatwaire etaara zaabo baagenda kutangirra omuswezi.
Abataano bakaba bali badoma, kandi bataano b'amagezi.
Habwokuba abadoma obu baatwaire etaara zaabo, batatwale magita ag'okwerinza;
baitu ab'amagezi bakatwara amagita omu cupa n'omu taara zaabu.
Omuswezi obu yakeererirwe okwija, boona baatandika kuhungira, baagwijagira.
“Baitu ekiro omu itumbi bakahurra etoko ngu: ‘Dara kigabura aizire! Muturuke aheeru mumutangirre.’
Abaisiki bali boona nubwo baimukire, baasemeza etaara zaabo.
Abadoma baasaba ab'amagezi bati: ‘Mutuheho amagita, habwokuba etaara zaitu zaagya kuraara.’
Baitu ab'amagezi baabagarukamu bati: ‘Tigarukwija kutumara itwena; haakire inywe mugende hali abasuubuzi mwegurreyo.’
Obu bakaba bagenzire kugura amagita, omuswazi yaija; abo abakaba beeteekaniize baataaha nawe omu nju ey'obugenyi, n'orwigi rwakingwaho.
Hanyuma abaisiki abandi nabo baija nibagamba bati: ‘Waitu, waitu, tukingurreho!’
Baitu omuswezi yagarukamu ati: ‘Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Timbamanyire.’
Nahabweki mwikalege nimurora, habwokuba timurukumanya kiro noobwekuba saaha.”
“Obukama bw'omwiguru bulisisana nk'omuntu ow'akaba naija kwimukya orugendo; akeeta abaheereza be yabakwasa ebintu bye.
Akaha buli omu narorra ha bwekambi bwe. Omu akamuha siringi omutwaro, gumu, ondi yamuha enkumi itaano, n'ondi yamuha rukumi rumu, hanyuma yagenda.
Ogu ayatungire siringi omutwaro gumu, ahonaaho yagenda yaisuubuza; yatunga amagoba omutwaro gumu ogundi.
N'ayatungire siringi enkumi itaano, nawe yagobamu siringi enkumi itaano zindi.
Baitu ogu ayatungire siringi rukumi rumu, akagenda yalima ekiina omu itaka, yaserekayo sente za mukama we.
“Obu haahingwireho omwanya mukooto, mukama w'abaheereza abo yagaruka, yabara nabo ebi yabasigiire.
Ogu ayahairwe siringi omutwaro gumu yaija, yaleeta siringi omutwaro gumu ogundi naagamba ati: ‘Mukama wange okansigira siringi omutwaro gumu, na nyowe nkagobamu omutwaro gumu ogundi.’
Mukama we yamugambira ati: ‘Webale omuheereza murungi kandi omwesigwa; oyesigirwe omu bike, ninyija kukukwasa bingi; ija osemererwe na mukama waawe.’
N'oli ayatungire siringi enkumi itaano yaija, naagamba ati: ‘Mukama wange, okansigira siringi enkumi itaano, hati ngoberemu enkumi itaano ezindi.’
Mukama we yamugambira ati: ‘Webale omuheereza murungi kandi omwesigwa; oyesigirwe omu bike, ninyija kukukwasa bingi; ija osemererwe na mukama waawe.’
N'oli ayatungire siringi orukumi rumu yaija naagamba ati: ‘Waitu, nkakumanya nkooku oli muntu ngumangani. Ogesa ebi otarasigire, ohunika ebi otarasigire;
nahabweki nkatiina, naagenda naasereka siringi zaawe omu itaka. Darazo, ozitwale.’
Baitu mukama we yamugarukamu ati: ‘Muheereza iwe omubi kandi omugara! Okamanya nkooku ngesa ebi ntarasasigire, kandi mpunika ebi ntarasigire.
Siringi zange waakubaire ozitaire omu banka, obu naakugarukire naakuzitungire n'amagoba gaazo.
Nahabweki mumwiheho siringi zange, muzihe ogu anyakwina omutwaro gumu.
Habwokuba weena anyakwina alyongerwaho ebindi bingi; baitu anyakwina ebike, n'ebi ainabyo birimwihwaho.
Omuheereza ataina mugaso ogu, mumunage aheeru omu mwirima. Oku nuho abantu baliririrra, kandi banene ensaya.’”
“Omwana w'omuntu obu aliizira omu kitiinisa kye aina n'abamalaika be boona, alisinga ha kitebe kye eky'ekitiinisa.
Amahanga goona galyesorooleza omumaiso ge, alibabaganizaamu nk'omuliisa okw'asoroora entaama omu mbuzi.
Entaama alizita ha mukono gwe ogw'obulyo, baitu embuzi alizita ha gw'emoso.
Nubwo Mukama aligambira aba ha mukono gw'obulyo ati: ‘Mwije inywe Isenyowe aba yahaire omugisa, mugwetwe obukama obwabateekaniriziibwe okuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi;
habwokuba obu nkaba nindumwa enjara, mukampa ebyokulya; obu nkaba nyina iroho, mukampa ekyokunywa; obu naizire ndi mugenyi mukankunira;
nkaba ndi busa, mukanjweka; obu nkaba ndwaire, mukaija mwandora; nkaba ndi omu nkomo, mukaija mwansuura.’
Nubwo abahikiriire balimugarukamu bati: ‘MUKAMA waitu, tukakurora di norumwa enjara, twakuha ebyokulya; rundi oina iroho, twakuha ekyokunywa?
Kandi tukakurora di oli mugenyi twakukunira; rundi oli busa, twakujweka?
Tukakurora di orwaire, rundi oli mu nkomo, twaija kukusuura?’
Mukama alibagarukamu ati: ‘Mazima nimbagambira nti: Eki mwakoliire omu hali abo abarukukira obuto omu bagenzi bange banu, buli mukakikorra nyowe.’
“Nubwo aligambira abo abaliba bali ha mukono ogw'emoso ati: ‘Mundugeho inywe abakyenwa, mugende omu murro ogutaraara ogwateekaniriziibwe Sitaani n'abamalaika be;
habwokuba nkaba nindumwa enjara, timwampa byokulya; nkaba nyina iroho, timwampa kyokunywa;
obunaizire ndi mugenyi, timwankunira; nkaba ndi busa, timwanjweka; nkaba ndwaire, ndi n'omu nkomo, timwaija kunsuura.’
Nabo balimugarukamu bati: ‘MUKAMA waitu, tukakurora di norumwa enjara, rundi oina iroho, rundi oli mugenyi, rundi oli busa, rundi orwaire, rundi oli omu nkomo, twayanga kukukoonyera?’
Nubwo alibagarukamu ati: ‘Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Nkooku mutarakikoliire omu hali abo abarukukira obuto, buli mutakikorre nyowe.’
Abo baligenda omu kubonabonesibwa okutalihwaho, baitu abahikiriire balitaaha omu bwomeezi obutalihwaho.”
Yesu obu yamazire kwegesa ebi byona, yagambira abeegesebwa be ati:
“Nimumanya nkooku hasigaire ebiro bibiri okuhika ha kiro kikuru eky'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho, kandi Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo kubambwa ha musaraba.”
Nubwo banyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu baayesorooliize omu kizigati kya mukuru w'abanyakatagara, ibara lye Kaayafa,
baahanuura nkooku baraakwata Yesu omu magezi, bamwite.
Baitu baagamba bati: “Kitakorwa omu biro bikuru, tihaikara kubaho epumpu omu bantu.”
Yesu obu akaba ali Betaniya omunju ya Simooni omugenge,
hakaija omukazi aina ihembe ly'amagita ag'omuhendo mwingi, yagaseesa ha mutwe gwa Yesu, obu akaba aikaliire naalya.
Baitu abeegesebwa obu baarozire eki, baabiihirwa nibagamba bati: “Amagita ganu gafiire ki?
Gaakutunzirwemu siringi nyingi, zigabirwa abanaku.”
Baitu Yesu obu yakyetegeriize, yabagambira ati: “Omukazi onu mumutuzire ki? Habwokuba ankoliire ekintu kirungi.
Abanaku obutoosa mwikara nabo, baitu timurukwija kwikara na nyowe obutoosa.
Okuseesa amagita ganu ha mubiri gwange, eki akikozire naanteekaniriza okuziikwa.
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Hoona hoona omunsi nambere Amakuru Amarungi ganu garaarangirirwaga, omukazi onu eki akozire kiraagambwahoga okumwijuka.”
Nubwo Yuda Isikalyota, omu hali ikumi na babiri, yagenzire hali baanyakatagara abakuru,
yabakaguza ati: “Murampa ki obu ndaamubahikyaho?” Baamusasura ebicweka by'efeeza makumi asatu.
Okuruga obu, yaserra akasumi ak'araamugoberezamu.
Ha kiro ky'okubanza eky'obugenyi bw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe, abeegesebwa bakaija hali Yesu baamukaguza bati: “Noogonza tukuteekanirize nkaha nambere oraaliira obugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho?”

Yesu nukwo kubagarukamu ati: “Mugende omu rubuga mb'omuntu nanka, mumugambire muti: ‘Omwegesa naagamba ati: Akasumi kange kali haihi kuhika kandi omunju yaawe nuho ndaaliira obugenyi obw'Okuhingurwaho hamu n'abeegesebwa bange.’ ”
Abeegesebwa baakora Yesu nkooku yabaragiire, baateekaniza obugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho.
Omu rwiririzi Yesu yaija yaikarra ha meeza hamu n'abeegesebwa be ikumi na babiri.
Obu bakaba nibalya, yagamba ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Omu omuli inywe naija kungobeza.”
Bbo baatandika kusaalirwa n'okumukaguza omu omu bati: “MUKAMA wange, ninyowe?”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Ogu arukukoza na nyowe omu bbakuli, nuwe arukwija kungobeza.
Omwana w'omuntu naagenda kuba nkooku kyamuhandiikirweho; baitu ogu arukumugobeza alikibona! Kyakubaire kirungi omuntu ogu kakuba atarazairwe.”
Yuda ayamugobiize yamukaguza ati: “Mwegesa, ninyowe?” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Niiwe anyakukigambire.”
Obu bakaba nibalya, Yesu yakwata omugaati, yasiima, yagucwamu, yaguha abeegesebwa be naagamba ati: “Mukwate mulye; gunu nugwo mubiri gwange.”
Kandi yakwata ekikopo, obu yamazire kusiima, yakibaha naagamba ati: “Munyweho inywena,
enu niyo sagama yange ey'ekiragaano ekihyaka, eraaseeswa habwa baingi okubaganyiza ebibi.
Nimbagambira nti: Tindigaruka kunywa ha nsande y'ebijuma by'emizaabbibbu okuhika ha kiro kiri obu ndiginywa na inywe eri mpyaka omu bukama bwa Isenyowe.”
Obu baamazire kuzina ekizina, baaturuka, baagenda ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva.
Nubwo Yesu yabagambiire ati: “Ekiro kinu inywe inywena nimwija kumpemukaho; habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Nditeera omuliisa, entaama z'omu igana irarange.’
Baitu obu ndimara kuhumbuurwa, ndibabanza kuhika Galiraaya.”
Petero yahaya naagamba ati: “Abandi boona noobu baraakurugaho, baitu nyowe nikikafuuhe!”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mazima ninkugambira nti: Kiro kinu kyonyini, enkoko etakakookere, oraaba onyehoogere emirundi esatu.”
Petero nukwo kumugarukamu ati: “Noobu ndaaba ndi w'okufa na iwe, baitu tindukwija kukwehooga.” N'abeegesebwa abandi boona nukwo baagambire bati.
Hanyuma Yesu yagenda nabo omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa Getesemaane, yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Mwikarre hanu, nyowe ka ngende kuli nsabe.”
Yatwara Petero n'abatabani ba Zebedaayo bombi, yabanza kusaalirwa n'okutuntura.
Nubwo yabagambira ati: “Omutima gwange gwina obujune bwingi, buraaliire kunyita. Mwikale hanu nimurora hamu na nyowe.”
Obu, yagendaho kake omumaiso, yajuumara, yayesengereza ati: “Taata, obu kiraaba nikisoboka, amabone ganu gandugeho; kitaba nka nyowe oku ndukugonza, baitu kibe Iwe nkooku orukugonza.”
Yagaruka hali abeegesebwa yabasanga bagwijagiire; nukwo kukaguza Petero ati: “Timusoboire kwikara nimurora hamu na nyowe esaha emu?
Murole kandi musabe, muleke kwohebwa. Omutima nigugonza mali, baitu omubiri muceke.”
Yagenda obwa kabiri yayesengereza naagamba ati: “Taata, amabone ganu obu garaaba gatarukusobora kundugaho ntakagaboine, kikorwe Iwe nkooku orukugonza.”
Yagaruka yaija, nabwo yabasanga bagwijagiire, habwokuba amaiso gaabo gakaba gaina oturo twingi.
Yabarugaho, yagenda kwesengereza obwa kasatu, naagamba ebigambo nka biri.
Hanyuma yagaruka hali abeegesebwa yabagambira ati; “Na hati mukyagwijagiire, muhumwire? Kale nu esaaha ehikire, Omwana w'omuntu aheebweyo omu mikono y'abasiisi.
Mwimuke tugende. Arukungobeza ngugwo, airiire haihi.”
Obu akaba naakyabaza ebi, Yuda, omu hali ikumi na babiri, yaija aina ekitebe ky'abantu baingi bakwasire empirima n'ebiduuma, nibaruga hali banyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu.
Ogu ayamugobiize, akaba abahaire ira akarorwaho, naabagambira ati: “Ou ndaagwa omu kifuba buli nuwe ogu; mumukwate.”
Ahonaaho yaija hali Yesu, yamuramukya ati: “Mirembe Mwegesa!” Yamugwa omu kifuba.
Yesu nukwo kumukaguza ati: “Munywani wange, oiziriire ki?” Nubwo bali baizire, baagwera Yesu, baamukwata.
Omu hali abo abakaba bali na Yesu, yasomorayo empirima ye, yagorra omukono, yatema okutu kw'omwiru w'omukuru w'abanyakatagara, yakucwaho.
Baitu Yesu yamugambira ati; “Empirima yaawe gigarre omu kiraaro kyayo; habwokuba boona abakwata empirima, baliitwa empirima.
Nimuteekereza tindukusobora kusaba Isenyowe, akantwekera ahonaaho ihe ly'abamalaika abarukukira ha bihanda ikumi na bibiri?
Kakuba kitabaire kiti, Ebyahandiikirwe byakuhikiriire bita?”
Nubwo Yesu yakagwize ekitebe kyona ky'abantu ati: “Mwizire kunkwata mwina empirima n'ebiduuma, nk'abaiziriire kukwata omunyagi? Buli kiro naikaraga omu Nju ya Ruhanga ninyegesa, mutankwate.
Baitu binu byona bibaireho, nukwo ebyahandiikirwe abarangi bihikiriziibwe.” Okuruga aho abeegesebwa be boona baamusigaho bairuka.
Omu kasumi ako, abo abaakwasire Yesu bakamutwara mba Kaayafa, omukuru w'abanyakatagara, nambere abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'abakuru b'abantu bakaba beesorooliize.
Baitu Petero yamuhondera haraho okuhikira kimu omu kizigati ky'omukuru w'abanyakatagara. Obu yataahiremu, yaikarra n'abalinzi kurora nambere biraahwera.
Baanyakatagara abakuru n'ab'orukurato boona baasera obwakaiso bw'ebisuba, bahangirre Yesu, nukwo bamwite.
Noobu haraaba haizire abakaiso baingi ab'ebisuba, baitu obwakaiso obuhikire butazooke. Ha kumalirra haija abandi babiri
baagamba bait: “Omuntu onu akagamba ati: ‘Ninsobora kuseesa Enju ya Ruhanga, n'okugaruka kugyombekera ebiro bisatu’.”
Mukuru w'abanyakatagara yayemerra yamukaguza ati: “Toina kyona eki orukugarukamu? Kiki abasaija banu eki barukukurumiriza?”
Baitu Yesu yaculeera. Mukuru w'abanyakatagara nukwo kumugambira ati: “Ninkurahiza Ruhanga omwomeezi, tugambire obu oraaba oli Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga.”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Niiwe okigambire. Baitu nimbagambira nti: Okuruga hati mulirora Omwana w'omuntu aikaliire ha mukono gw'obulyo ogw'Ow'obusobozi bwona, kandi naizira omu bicu by'omwiguru.”
Nubwo omukuru w'abanyakatagara yataagwire ebijwaro bye, naagamba ati: “Ajumire Ruhanga. Nitukyaserurra ki bakaiso abandi? Hati mwehuliire inywenka nkooku ajumire Ruhanga.
Inywe nimucwamu muta?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Asemeriire kufa.”
Nubwo baamucwera ebicwanta ha maiso, baamuteera entomi, abandi empi,
nibagamba bati: “Iwe Kristo, toma; nooha akutiire?”
Petero akaba aikaliire aheeru omu kizigati, omuzaana w'omukuru w'abanyakatagara yaija nambere ali, yagamba ati: “Na iwe obairege hamu na Yesu Omugaliraaya.”
Baitu uwe yayehooga omumaiso ga boona ati: “Eki orukugamba, tindukukimanya.”
Obu yaturukire aheeru yahika ha kiti ky'irembo, omuzaana ondi yamurora, yagambira abakaba beemeriireho ati: “Omusaija onu nawe abaire ali hamu na Yesu owa Nazareeti.”
Petero yagaruka kwehooga naarahira ati: “Omuntu ogu tindukumumanya.”
Obu haahingwireho akaanya kake, abakaba beemeriireho baija hali Petero, baamugambira bati: “Mananukwo na iwe oli omu hali bo, habwokuba engambo yaawe neekulega.”
Nubwo yatandika kwekondereza n'okurahira ati: “Omusaija ogu timmumanyiire kimu.” Ahonaaho enkoko yakooka.
Petero yaijuka ekigambo Yesu eki yamugambiire ati: “Enkoko etakakookere, oraaba onyehoogere kasatu.” Yaturuka aheeru, yarra muno.
Obwire obu bwakiire, banyakatagara abakuru boona n'abakuru b'abantu baahanuura kwita Yesu;
baamuboha, baamutwara, baamukwasa Pilaato omulemi omukuru.
Yuda ayamugobiize, obu yarozire Yesu amazire kusingwa omusango, yayegarukamu eki yakozire, yagarurra banyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu ebicweka by'efeeza amakumi asatu,
naagamba ati: “Nsiisire okugobeza omuntu ataina musango.” Baamugarukamu bati: “Itwe eki nitukifaaho ki? Oyemalirre wenka.”
Nubwo yahungwire ebicweka by'efeeza omunju ya Ruhanga, yabarugaho, yagenda, yayehanika.
Baitu banyakatagara abakuru baasorooza ebicweka ebi by'efeeza, nibagamba bati: “Tikirukuhika kubita omu lyahurro ly'Enju ya Ruhanga, habwokuba sente zinu ziguzire esagama y'omuntu.”
Baahanura kuziguramu ekibanja ky'omubumbi, baziikemuga abanyamahanga.
Nikyo ekibanja eki kyeterwa Ekibanja ky'Esagama n'okuhika hati.
Nubwo ekyagambirwe omurangi Yeremiya kyahikiriire kiti: “Bakatwara ebicweka by'efeeza makumi asatu, nugwo muhendo gw'ogu abantu ba Isirairi baaramwire,
kandi babiguramu ekibanja ky'omubumbi, MUKAMA nkooku yammanyisize.”
Yesu yayemerra omumaiso g'omulemi mukuru. Ogu yamukaguza ati: “Niiwe Mukama w'Abayudaaya?” Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Nukwo ogambire.”
Baitu banyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'abantu obu baamulegere, atagarukemu.
Nubwo Pilaato yamukagwize ati: “Torukuhurra ebi byona ebi barukukunyegerra nkooku biri bingi?”
Baitu Yesu atamugarukemu na kimu hali ebi byona ebi baamunyegeriire; omulemi nawe yahunirra muno.
Ha kiro kikuru, ekaba eri engeso y'omulemi omukuru okulekerra abantu omunyankomo omu ou baasiimaga.
Omu kasumi ako bakaba baina omunyankomo omu arukurangaanwa muno, ibara lye Baraaba.
Obu baayesoroize, Pilaato yabakaguza ati: “Nimwenda mbalekerre oha: Baraaba rundi Yesu arukwetwa Kristo?”
Akamanya nkooku bamuhaireyo habw'ihali.
Pilaato obu yaikaliire ha kitebe ky'okucweraho emisango, nubwo mukazi we yamutumiireho ati: “Omusaija ogu ahikiriire otamukoraho kantu koona; habwokuba ebi mmuroosireho ekiro, binsaalize muno.”
Baitu banyakatagara abakuru n'abahanuuzi bakasoonasoona abantu kusaba Baraaba, baite Yesu.
Omulemi omukuru yabakaguza ati: “Hali banu bombi, nimwenda mbalekerre oha?” Baamugarukamu bati; “Baraaba.”
Nandiki Pilaato ati: “Kandi Yesu arukwetwa Kristo, mmukole ki?” Nukwo boona kugarukamu bati; “Abambwe ha musaraba!”
Omulemi yabakaguza ati: “Habwaki? Akozire kibi ki?” Baitu bbo baatokera haiguru kukiraho bati: “Abambwe ha musaraba!”

Pilaato obu yarozire nayejwahiza busa, kandi nkooku harukwija kubaho akajagarro, yakwata amaizi, yanaaba omu ngaro boona nibarora, naagamba ati: “Nyowe tindukujunaanwa sagama y'omuntu onu ahikiriire, ebi bigambo byanyu.”
Abantu boona nukwo kugarukamu bati: “Esagama ye ebe hali itwe na ha baana baitu!”
Nubwo yabalekerra Baraaba, kandi yaragira babanze bateere Yesu enkoba, hanyuma yamuhayo kubambwa ha musaraba.
Nubwo abaserikale b'omulemi omukuru baatwaire Yesu omunju erukwetwa kibbira, ekihanda kyabu kyona kyamwesoroolezaaho.
Baamujuura ebijwaro bye, baamujweka orugoye orurukugaajuka.
Baaruka ekondo y'amahwa, baagimuta ha mutwe, baamukwasa orubingo omu mukono gw'obulyo. Baateeza amaju omumaiso ge nibamuteerra enaku bati? “Hangiriza, Omukama w'Abayudaaya!”
Baamucwera ebicwanta, baamwihaho orubingo, baarumuteeza ha mutwe.
Obu baamazire kumuterra enaku, baamujuura orugoye orurukugaajuka, baamujweka ebijwaro bye, baamutwara kumubamba ha musaraba.
Obu bakaba nibagenda, baatangana omusaija owa Kireene, ibara lye Simooni, baamuhambiriza okwetwekeraho Yesu omusaraba.
Obu baahikire omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa Gologota (ekirukumanyisa ngu: kiikaro ky'oruhanga),
baaha Yesu eviini etabwirwemu omubazi, aginywe; baitu obu yarolezeeho, yayanga kuginywa.
Abaserikale obu baamazire kumubamba, baabagana ebijwaro bye nibabitera itomo;
baikarra hansi bamuroleriire.
Kandi haruguru y'omutwe gwe, bakataho ekihandiiko ky'omusango gwe ekirukugamba kiti: “Onu nuwe Yesu, Omukama w'Abayudaaya.”
Akabambwa hamu n'abahuura babiri, omu ha mukono gwe ogw'obulyo, n'ondi ha gw'emoso.
Kandi abo abakaba nibahingura baamujuma, nibacwa emitwe yabo,
nibagamba bati; “Iwe ayagondeze kuseesa Enju ya Ruhanga, okagaruka kugyombekera ebiro bisatu wejune wenka! Obu oraaba oli Mwana wa Ruhanga, wehanuule ha musaraba.”
Baanyakatagara abakuru, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, hamu n'abakuru b'abantu, nabo nukwo baamujumire bati:
“Akajuna abandi, baitu tasobora kwejuna wenka, kunu nuwe Omukama wa Isirairi. Hati ayehanuule ha musaraba, nukwo na itwe tumwikirize.
Ayesiga Ruhanga, leka Ruhanga amujune hati, obu araaba naamugonza; habwokuba akagamba ati: ‘Ndi Mwana wa Ruhanga.’”
Kandi abahuura abaabambirwe nawe, nabo nukwo baamujumire bati.
Okuruga esaaha mukaaga okuhika esaaha mwenda ensi yoona ekaswekwa omwirima.
Kandi ha saaha nka mwenda, Yesu yayamuza n'iraka likooto ati: “Eli, Eli lama sabakatani?” Amakuru gaakyo ngu: “Ruhanga wange, Ruhanga wange, ondugiireho ki?”
Abamu ha basungi, obu baahuliire eki, nukwo kugamba bati: “Omusaija onu naayeta Eriya.”
Ahonaaho omu halibo yairuka yaleeta ekijumankuba yakiibika omu marwa agasaaliire, yakita ha rubingo, yamuha anyunyuguze.
Baitu abandi baagamba bati; “Ka turole Eriya nkooku araija kumujuna.”
Baitu Yesu yagaruka yayamuliza haiguru, yacwekana.
Ahonaaho enyigamo y'omunju ya Ruhanga yatemukamu habiri, okuruga eruguru okuhika hansi; ensi yatengeeta, n'emyandara yayatika;
ebituuro byayesama, emitumbi nyingi ey'abahikiriire abakaba bagwijagire yahumbuurwa.
Abaarugire omu bituuro Yesu amazire kuhumbuuka, bakagenda omu rubuga orurukwera baabonekera baingi.
Mukuru w'abaserikale n'aba akaba ainabo nibalinda Yesu, obu baahuliire omusisa, nibarora n'ebyabaireho byona, baatiina muno nibagamba bati: “Mazimakwo, onu abaire Mwana wa Ruhanga!”
Hakaba haroho n'abakazi baingi abaarugire Galiraaya bahondiire Yesu nibamuheereza, beemeriire haraho nibarora;
omuli bo hakaba harumu Mariya Magadaleena, Mariya nyina Yakobbo na Yosefu, kandi na nyina batabani ba Zebedaayo.
Obwire obu bwahikire rwebagyo, hakaija omusaija omuguuda owa Alimateya, ibara lye Yosefu, nawe akaba ali mwegesebwa wa Yesu.
Akagenda hali Pilaato, yamusaba omutumbi gwa Yesu. Pilaato yaragira bagumuhe.
Yosefu yatwara omutumbi, yaguzinga omu rugoye rwa bafuta,
yaguta omu kituuro ekihyaka eki akaba ayebaiziire omu mwandara; yakumbya ibaale likooto, yaigara omunwa gw'ekituuro, yagenda.
Mariya Magadaleena na Mariya ondi bakaba baroho, baikaliire baroleriire ekituuro.
Obwire obu bwakiire, nikyo kiro ekyakuraatiire ekiro ky'Okweteekaniza, banyakatagara abakuru n'Abafalisaayo baayesorooleza hali Pilaato
baagamba bati; “Waitu, nitwijuka omubiihi w'ebisuba ogu, obwakaba akyali mwomeezi, akagamba ati: ‘Obu halihinguraho ebiro bisatu, ndihumbuuka.’

Nahabweki, ragira balindire kimu ekituuro okuhika ha kiro kya kasatu, obw'olyaho abeegesebwa be tibaikara kwija bakaiba omutumbi gwe, hanyuma bakagambira abantu bati: ‘Ahumbuukire omu bafu’, kandi okuhaba okwa hanyuma nikwija kukira okw'okubanza obubi.”
Pilaato yabagarukamu ati; “Mwina abalinzi, mugende mukirinde nkooku murukusobora.”
Baagenda, baagumya ekituuro; ibaale balitaho emanyikirizo, baataho n'abalinzi.
Sabbato ekahwaho, kandi nyenkya omu rukyakya, ha Sande, Mariya Magadaleena na Mariya ondi bakagenda ha kituuro.
Hakabaho omusisa gw'amaani, habwokuba malaika wa Ruhanga akasirimuka yaruga omu iguru, yaija yakumbya ibaale lya ha munwa gw'ekituuro, yaliikarraho.
Amaiso ge gakaba nigangasana nk'omurabyo kandi ebijwaro bye bikaba nibyeera nk'ebirika.
Abalinzi habw'okumutiina, bakatukumira, baagwa, baasisana nk'abafiire.
Baitu malaika yagambira abakazi ati: “Mutatiina; habwokuba mmanyire nkooku murukuserra Yesu ayabambirwe ha musaraba.
Hanu taroho; ahumbuukire nkooku yagambire. Mwije murole nambere bakaba bamutaire.
Hati mugende bwango, mugambire abeegesebwa be nkooku ahumbuukire kandi naija kubabanza kuhika Galiraaya; oku nuho mulimurorra. Hati mmazire kubagambira.”
Bbo baaruga bwango ha kituuro baina obutiini hamu n'omuhimbo mwingi, bairuka kugambira abeegesebwa be.
Nubwo Yesu yabatangaine yabaramukya ati: “Mirembe!” Baamwirra haihi, baamukwata ebigere, baamuramya.
Aho Yesu yabagambira ati: “Mutatiina, irooko mugambire bagenzi bange bagende Galiraaya; oku nuho balindorra.”
Abakazi abo obu bakaba nibakyarugaho, abamu ha balinzi bakagenda omu rubuga kugambira abanyakatagara byona ebyabaireho.
Baanyakatagara obu baayesoroize kuhanuura hamu n'abakuru b'abantu, nubwo baahaire abalinzi sente,
baabateererra bati; “Mugambire abantu ngu: ‘Abeegesebwa be baizirege ekiro obu tubaire tugwijagiire, baamwiba, baamutwara.’
Kandi kinu omulemi omukuru obu araakihurra, nitwija kumunanura, nukwo na inywe tubaihe omu kabi.”
Abalinzi baatwara sente, baakora nkooku baahanuliirwe; amakuru ago gakararanga omu Bayudaaya n'okuhika hati hoona!
Omu kasumi ako, abakwenda ikumi n'omu bakagenda Galiraaya, ha rusozi Yesu oru akaba abagambireho.
Obu baamurozire, baamuramya; baitu abandi baafuberra.
Yesu yairra haihi, yabagambire ati: “Nkaheebwa obusobozi bwona omwiguru n'omunsi.
Nahabweki mugende, muhindule abantu ab'omu mahanga goona beegesebwe, nimubabatiza omu ibara lya Isiitwe, n'erya Mwana, n'erya Mwoyo Ahikiriire,
mubeegese okukwata byona ebi naabaragiire. Mumanye nkooku ndi na inywe ebiro byona okuhika ha mpero.”
Amakuru Amarungi aga Yesu Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga, nkooku gaatandikire.
Kikahandiikwa omu kitabu kya Isaaya omurangi kiti: “Dora, nintuma omukwenda wange akwebembere, akuteekanirize omuhanda gwawe;
nuwe ogu arukwamirra omwirungu ati: Muteekanirize MUKAMA omuhanda, mutereekereze obuhanda bwe.”
Nikyo Yohaana Omubatiza yazookiire omwirungu naarangirra abantu beegarukemu, nukwo babatizibwe, baganyirwe ebibi.
Abantu ab'omu Buyudaaya yoona n'aba Yerusaalemu boona bakagenda nambere ali, yababatiriza omu kisaaru Yorudaani, nibaatura ebibi byabo.
Yohaana ogu yajwaraga ekyokujwara ky'ebyoya by'engamiya, naayeteegesa orukoba rw'oruhu, kandi yalyaga enzige n'obwoki obw'omwirungu.
Akarangirra ati: “Arukunkiza obusobozi naija ankuratiire, ou ntasemeriire kwinama kusumurra orukoba rw'enkaito ze.
Nyowe mbabatiza n'amaizi; baitu uwe alibabatiza na Mwoyo Ahikiriire.”
Omu biro ebi, Yesu akaija naaruga Nazareeti orwa Galiraaya yabatizibwa Yohaana omu kisaaru Yorudaani.
Obu akaba nakyaruga omu maizi ati, yarora iguru lyakinguka, na Mwoyo Ahikiriire naamusirimukaho omu kisisani ky'eriiba;
iraka lyaruga omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Niiwe Mwana wange omugonzibwa, ou nsiima muno.”
Ahonaaho Mwoyo yamutwara omu irungu.
Yamarayo ebiro makumi ana, naayohebwa Sitaani; kandi yaikaraga omu nyamaiswa hagati; n'abamalaika baamuheerezaaga.
Yohaana obu yamazire kukwatwa, Yesu yaija Galiraaya, naarangirra Amakuru Amarungi aga Ruhanga,
naagamba ati: “Akasumi kahikire, obukama bwa Ruhanga bwiriire haihi; mwegarukemu, mwikirize Amakuru Amarungi.”
Obu akaba naaraba ha musa gw'enyanja ya Galiraaya, yarora Simooni na Andereya owanyina nibanaga akatimba omu nyanja; habwokuba bakaba bali basohi.
Yesu yabagambira ati: “Mumpondere, ndibafoora basohi b'abantu.”
Ahonaaho baasiga obutimba bwabu, baamuhondera.
Obu yagenzireho omumaiso kake, yarora Yakobbo mutabani wa Zebedaayo, na Yohaana owanyina, nabo bakaba bali omu bwato bwabu nibasumiikaniza obutimba.
Ahonaaho yabeeta; baaleka isebo Zebedaayo omu bwato hamu n'abarukukolerra empeera, baamuhondera.
Bakagenda Kafaranaumu; atabandaale, ha kiro kya Sabbato akataaha omu isorrokaniro, yatandika kwegesa.
Enyegesa ye ekahuniriza abantu, habwokuba akabeegesa nk'anyakwina obusobozi, atabeegese nk'abeegesa b'ebiragiro oku baabeegesaaga.
Omu isorrokaniro eri hakaba harumu omusaija akwasirwe omwoyo mubi:
Yatokera haiguru naagamba ati: “Yesu owa Nazareeti nootwenza ki? Oizire kutuhwerekereza? Ninkumanya, niiwe ahikiriire wa Ruhanga.”
Baitu Yesu yagucoomera ati: “Culeera, murugeho!”
Omwoyo omubi gwamukankaniza, gwayamuliza haiguru, gwamurugaho.
Abantu boona baatangaara, nukwo kukaguzangana bati: “Kinu kiki? Enu nyegesa mpyaka! Naaragiza obusobozi emyoyo emibi, nayo neemuhurra.”
Ahonaaho yagenda naayeyongera kurangaanwa omu bicweka byona ebya Galiraaya.
Obu baarugire omu isorrokaniro, baataaha omu nju ya Simooni na Andereya, bali hamu na Yakobbo na Yohaana.
Nyinazaara Simooni akaba abyamire, arwaire omuswija obu akaba naakyahikaho ati, baamumugambira.
Yesu yaija, yamukwata ha mukono, yamwimukya; omuswija gwamurugaho; yatandika kubaheereza.
Rwebagyo, izooba obu lyagwire, bakamuleetera boona abakaba barwaire n'abakwasirwe emyoyo emibi.
Ab'omu rubuga boona bakeesorooleza ha mulyango.
Yakiza baingi abakaba barwaire endwara ezitali zimu; yabinga emyoyo emibi nyingi, kandi atagiikirize kugamba, habwokuba ekamumanya.
Nyenkya akaimuka obwire butakakiire, yagenda omu kiikaro ekitarumu bantu, yasabirayo.
Simooni n'abo aba akaba ainabo baija nibamuserra,
obu baamugwireho baamugambira bati: “Boona nibakuserra.”
Nawe yabagarukamu ati: “Tweyongereyo omu byaro ebindi ebiherraineho, naho nyegeseeyo; habwokuba nikyo kyandeesire.”
Yagenda naaraba omu Galiraaya yoona, naarangirra omu masorrokaniro gaabu, kandi naabinga emyoyo emibi.
Omugenge akaija nambere ali, yateeza amaju naamwesengereza ati: “Obu oraaba noogonza, noosobora kunkiza.”
Yesu yakwatwa embabazi, yagorra omukono, yamukwataho, namugambira ati: “Ego ningonza; kira.”
Omu kasumi ako konyini ebigenge byamurugaho, yakira.
Ahonaaho Yesu yamuragira agende, naamuteererra muno ati:
“Otakisura okakigambiraho omuntu n'omu, baitu genda oyeyoleke nyakatagara, kandi habw'okusemezibwa kwawe oheyo ekihongwa Musa eki yaragiire, bube bwakaiso hali abantu.”

Baitu obu yaturukire aheeru, yatandika kwebaliza naabirarangya hoona; nahabweki Yesu akaba atakyasobora kugaruka kutaaha omu byaro burole, baitu akaikara ha rubaju; abantu baarugaga hoona hoona, nibamusangayo.
Obu haahingwireho ebiro, Yesu yagaruka Kafaranaumu, boona baamanya nkooku ali omuka.
Abantu baingi bakeesorooza, baijura omu nju; na ha mulyango omwanya gwabura; akaba naabatebeza ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Haija abantu, baamuleetera omurwaire azingamire, ahimbirwe abasaija bbana.

Obu baabuzirwe h'okumumuhikizaaho habw'obwingi bw'abantu, baasakurra orusu rw'enju haiguru ya Yesu mbere akaba ali; obu baamazire kutunga omwanya gw'okumurabyamu, baamusirimurra ha katabu aka akaba abyamireho.
Yesu obu yarozire nkooku baina okwikiriza, yagambira ekizingo ati: “Mwana wange, ebibi byawe bikuganyirwe.”
Nukwo abamu ha beegesa b'ebiragiro abakaba baikaliire aho, kwekaguza bati:
“Omusaija onu kiki ekirukumugambisa kiti? Naajuma Ruhanga! Nooha asobora kuganyira ebibi atali Ruhanga wenka?”
Yesu obu yakengere nkooku barukwekaguza bati, yagaruka yabakaguza ati: “Kiki eki murukwekaguliza muti omu mitima yanyu?
Ekirukukira kurahuka kiraha, kugambira ekizingo nti: ‘Ebibi byawe bikuganyirwe, ’ rundi kugamba nti: ‘Imuka, ohimbe akatabu kaawe, orubate’?
Hati ka mumanye Omwana w'omuntu nkooku aina obusobozi omunsi obw'okuganyira ebibi.” Nubwo yagambiire ekizingo ati:
“Ninkuragira nti: Imuka, ohimbe akatabu kaawe, otaahe.”
Uwe yaimuka, ahonaaho yahimba akatabu ke, yaturuka aheeru boona bamuroleriire; nukwo bbo kutangaara, baakugiza Ruhanga nibagamba bati: “Ekintu nka kinu titukakiroraga!”
Yesu akagaruka kugenda ha musa gw'enyanja; ekitebe kyona kyamwesoroolezaaho, uwe yabeegesa.
Obu akaba naahingura, yarora Leevi, mutabani wa Alifaayo, aikaliire omu isoroolerezo ly'omusoro, yamugambira ati: “Mpondera.” Nawe yaimuka, yamuhondera.
Kandi obu akaba aikaliire omunju ya Leevi naalya, abasorooza b'omusoro baingi n'abasiisi bakaba bailkaliire nawe n'abeegesebwa be; habwokuba hakaba haroho baingi abaamuhondiire.
Abeegesa b'ebiragiro ab'omu Bafalisaayo obu baamurozire naalya n'abasiisi n'abasorooza b'omusoro, nukwo kukaguza abeegesebwa be bati: “Habwaki naalya kandi naanywa n'abasooroza b'omusoro n'abasiisi?”
Yesu obu yakihuliire, yabagarukamu ati: “Aboomeezi tibeetaaga mufumu, baitu ayetaagwa abarwaire; ntaizirre kweta abahikiriire baitu abasiisi.”

Omu kasumi ako abeegesebwa ba Yohaana Omubatiza n'Abafalisaayo bakaba nibasiiba; abantu baija baakaguza Yesu bati: “Habwaki abeegesebwa ba Yohaana n'ab'Abafalisaayo nibasiiba, kunu abaawe batarukusiiba?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Abagenyi basobora kusiiba kunu omuswezi ainabo? Obu baba bakyali na omuswezi, tibasobora kusiiba.
Akasumi kalihika kigabura obu alibaihwaho, ha kiro eki nubwo balisiiba.
Tiharoho n'omu abazirirra ekikoba kihyaka ha kijwaro kikuru. Kakuba akorakwo, ekikoba kitaagura ekijwaro kandi ekihuru kigalihira kimu.
kandi tiharoho muntu anyakuta eviini ey'ehiira omu ndyanga enkuru. Kakuba akorakwo, endyanga ebbaruka, eviini eseeseka, n'endyanga esiisikara; baitu eviini ey'ehiira bagita omu ndyanga empyaka.”
Ha Sabbato emu, Yesu akaba naaraba omu misiri y'engano, kandi abeegesebwa be, obu bakaba nibahingura, baatandika kucwa entwe z'engano.
Nukwo Abafalisaayo kukaguza Yesu bati: “Abeegesebwa baawe, habwaki bakora ekitarukwikirizibwa Biragiro bya Musa ha Sabbato?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Timukasomaga Daudi eki yakozire obu yarumirwe enjara naayetaaga ebyokulya, uwe hamu n'abo aba akaba ainabo?

Akataaha omu Nju ya Ruhanga, Abiyasaali obu akaba ali mukuru w'Abanyakatagara, yalya emigaati ey'ekaba ehongiirwe Ruhanga, niyo etarukwikirizibwa kuliibwa muntu weena kwihaho baanyakatagara, kandi yagiha n'abo aba akaba ainabo.”
Akongera yabagambira ati: “Sabbato ekateebwaho habw'omuntu, baitu omuntu atateebweho habwa Sabbato;
nahabweki Sabbato nayo Omwana w'omuntu nuwe MUKAMA wayo.”
Yesu akagaruka yataaha omu isorrokaniro; yasangamu omusaija ow'akaba akabire omukono.
Baamuhanga amaiso, barole obu araaba naija kumukiza ha Sabbato, nukwo bamunyegerre.
Yagambira omusaija ow'akaba akabire omukono ati: “Ija hanu.”
Nubwo yabakagwize ati: “Nikiikirizibwa Ebiragiro bya Musa kukora ekirungi ha Sabbato rundi ekibi? Okujuna obwomeezi rundi kubwita?” Baitu bbo baaculeera.
Yababungyamu amaiso aina ekiniga, asaalirwe habw'okutahwituka kw'emitima yabu, nukwo kugambira omusaija ati: “Gorra omukono gwawe.” Yagugorra, omukono gwe gwakira.
Abafalisaayo baaturuka aheeru, baatandika ahonaaho kuhanuura n'ab'ekitebe kya Herode nkooku baraamwita.
Yesu yarugayo n'abeegesebwa be, yagenda ha musa gw'enyanja; kandi ekitebe ky'abantu baingi abaarugire Galiraaya baamukuraatira. Abandi baingi abaarugire Buyudaaya,
Yerusaalemu, na Idumaaya, n'abaarugire nseeri ya Yorudaani, n'ab'omu bicweka ebiherraine Tiiro na Sidooni obu baahulire byona ebi yakozire, baija nambere ali.
Yaragira abeegesebwa be kumutungira obwato habw'abantu kuba baingi, nukwo baleke kumufunza.
Uwe akaba akirize baingi nukwo boona abakaba barwaire kusindikangana, bamukwateho.
Abantu abakaba baina emyoyo emibi obu baamurozire, baagwa omu maiso ge, nibaamuza bati: “Iwe oli Mwana wa Ruhanga.”
Baitu uwe akabateererra muno okutamurangaaniza omu bantu.
Yatemba omu nsozi, yayeta abo aba yagondeze kumuhondera. Bbo baija nambere ali.
Yakomamu ikumi na babiri kwikara nawe, kandi abatumege okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi.
Yabaha obusobozi obw'okubinga emyoyo emibi.
Nubo banu: Simooni ou yarukire Petero;
Yakobbo mutabani wa Zebedaayo na Yohaana owanyina aba yarukire ibara Boanerege, amakuru gaalyo ngu: bantu ababiihirwa bwango;
Andereya na Filipo, Batolomayo na Matayo, Tomasi na Yakobbo mutabani wa Alifaayo, Tadeo na Simooni omurwanirizi w'ihanga lye,
na Yuda Isikalyota ayamugobiize. Hanyuma yataaha omu ka.
Ekitebe ky'abantu kyagaruka kyayesorooza, nahabweki Yesu n'abeegesebwa be batasobole kulya.
Abe'ka y'owaabu obu baakihuliire, baaturuka kumwiha omu kitebe habw'okuhurra abamu nibagamba bati: “Ahunguutukire.”
Abeegesa b'ebiragiro abaarugire Yerusaalemu bakagamba bati: “Ataahirwemu Beelizebuli, mukuru w'emyoyo emibi, kandi habw'obusobozi bwe nikyo arukugibingira.”
Baitu Yesu yabeeta, yabeegesa omu nfumo ati: “Sitaani asobora ata kubinga Sitaani?
Kakuba obukama bwebaganizaamu bwonka, tibusobora kwikaraho.
Kakuba n'eka eyebaganiizaamu yonka, nayo tesobora kwikaraho.
Sitaani obu araaba ayebaganizemu kwerwanisa wenka, tasobora kwikaraho, ahwerekerra.
Ningira tiharoho muntu asobora kutaaha enju y'omusaija ow'amaani akanyaga ebintu bye, rundi buli abandize kumuboha, nukwo anyage eby'omu njuye.
“Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Abantu baliganyirwa ebibi byabo byona, n'ebijumo byona ebi bajuma Ruhanga;
baitu weena anyakujuma Mwoyo Ahikiriire taliganyirwa, ekibi kye kirimusingisa omusango ebiro byona”
ekyamugambisize eki nukwo bbo kugira ngu: “Aina omwoyo omubi.”
Nyina Yesu na bagenzi be bakaija, baayemerra aheeru baamutumaho nibamweta.
Ekitebe ky'abantu kikaba kiikaliire kimwehinguliriize; abatumirwe nukwo kumugambira bati: “Nyoko na bagenzi baawe bali aheeru nibakweta.”
Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Mau nuwe oha, na bagenzi bange nubo baha?”
Yabungyamu amaiso abo abakaba bamwehinguliriize, yagamba ati: “Mau na bagenzi bange nubo banu!
Weena anyakukora Ruhanga eki agonza, nuwe mugenzi wange, nuwe munyaanya nyowe, kandi nuwe mau.”

Yesu yayongera yatandika kwegesa ha musa gw'enyanja. Ekitebe ky'abantu baingi muno kyamwesorolezaaho, nukwo kutemba omu bwato yabwikarramu buli ha nyanja, kandi n'ekitebe kyona ky'abantu kikaba kiri ha musa gw'enyanja.
Yabeegesa ebintu bingi omu nganikyo; omu kwegesa kwe akabagambira ati:
“Mutege amatu! Omusigi akatura okusiga.
Obu akaba naasiga, embibo ezimu zaaragara ha muhanda rubaju, enyonyi zaija, zaazisoma.
Embibo ezindi zaagwa ha itaka erya ha mwandara nambere hakaba hatali itaka lingi, ahonaaho zaamera; baitu habw'itaka kutahama,
omusana obu gwajwire gwazookya, kandi habw'okutagira mihama zaahotoka.
N'ezindi zikagwa omu mahwa, amahwa obu gaakuzire, gaazinyoroza, tizaayana.
Embibo ezindi zaagwa omu itaka erirungi, zaakura, zaakanya, ezimu zaayana makumi asatu, ezindi nkaaga, n'ezindi kikumi.”
Yayongera yabagambira ati: “Anyakwina amatu, ahurre.”
Baitu obu akaba ali wenka, ikumi na babiri hamu n'abo abakaba bamwehinguliriize baamukaguza amakuru ag'enganikyo ezi.
Yabagambira ati: “Inywe mukasuukulirwa ensita ez'obukama bwa Ruhanga, baitu ab'aheeru, bbo byona bibaganikizibwa omu nganikyo;
nukwo kurora barora, baitu batahweza; kandi kuhurra bahurra, baitu batahwituka; tibaikara kuhinduka bakaganyirwa.”
Kandi yabakaguza ati: “Orufumo oru timurwetegeriize? Kandi enganikyo ezindi zoona mulizeetegereza muta?
Omusigi eki asiga nikyo kigambo kya Ruhanga.
Embibo eza ha muhanda rubaju nambere ekigambo kisigirwe, nubo abarukuruga kuhurra bati, ahonaaho Sitaani aija abaihamu ekigambo ekibabairwenu.
Kandi omu mulingo nugwo gumu, ezi ezabyairwe ha itaka erya ha mwandara, nubo abo abahurra ekigambo, bakakiikiriza n'okusemerewa;
baitu habw'okutahama, bagumiisiriza akasumi kake, kandi obu habaho emihito rundi okuhiiganizibwa habw'ekigambo eki, ahonaaho bagwa.
N'ezindi nizo ezaagwire omu mahwa; nubo abo abahurra ekigambo,
baitu habw'okumaliza omutima ha by'ensi, n'okutwalirizibwa obuguuda, n'okururuukira ebintu ebindi, bibataahamu, binyoroza ekigambo eki, tikyaana bijuma.
Baitu ezi ezaasigirwe omu itaka erirungi, nubo abo abahurra ekigambo, bakakiikiriza, bakakora ebikorwa ebirungi, abamu kukira ha makumi asatu, abandi nkaaga, n'abandi kikumi.”
Yesu yayongera yabagambira ati: “Etaara ereeterwa kujuumikirwa ekigega rundi kugita omu madaara g'ekitabu? Tereeterwa kuhanikwa ha kikondo kyayo?
Habwokuba busaho na kimu ekiserekerwe ekitalizonzoorwa; rundi eky'ensita ekitalimanywa burole.
Weena anyakwina amatu, ahurre.”
Kandi yabagambira ati: “Mwegendereze eki muhurra, endengo ei mulengesa, na inywe niyo mulirengerwa, kandi n'okwongerwaho mulyongerwaho.
Habwokuba anyakwina ebingi, alyongerwaho; baitu anyakwina ebike, nabyo birimwihwaho.”
Yayongera yagamba ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga nibusisana nk'omuntu ayasigire embibo omu itaka,
akagwijagira kandi akasisiimuka, ekiro na nyamusana embibo ikamera, ikakura, atamanyire mimerre n'emikurre yazo
Itaka niryo lizimeza lyonka; habanza obukoora, hataho entwe, hakurataho enjuma ha ntwe.
Baitu enjuma obu zimara kwera, ahonaaho aleeta omuhyo, agesa, habwokuba igesa lihikire.”
Yayongera yagamba ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga turabulengesaniza na ki? Rundi turabusoboroza rufumo ki?
Nibusisana nk'akasigo ka karadaali; nambere kasigirwa omu itaka, kaba kali kajuma katoito okukira embibo zoona eziri omu nsi;
baitu obu kasigwa, kakura, kafooka kisaka kikooto ekirukukira ebisaka ebindi byona, kinaga amataagi makooto, nukwo n'enyonyi zoombeka ebiju omu kiituuru ky'amataagi gaakyo.”
Akabagambira ekigambo kya Ruhanga naakirabya omu nganikyo nyingi nk'ezi, nkooku bakaba nibasobora kukihurra;
atasobole kubagambira kintu kyona atakirabize omu ruganikyo; baitu abeegesebwa be bonka, nubo yasoborraga byona ha rubaju.
Ha kiro eki orwebagyo, omu kasweko k'obwire, akabagamba ati: “Twambuke nseeri.”
Baasiga aho ekitebe ky'abantu, baamutwarra omu bwato buli, obu akaba arumu; kandi amaato agandi gaagenda nawe.
Haimuka ihunga lingi n'ebigonzi byaseeseka omu bwato, bukaba buli haihi kwijura.
Baitu uwe akaba ali ha kiso ky'enyuma, ayesagwire ekisago, agwijagire. Baamusisiimura, nibamugambira bati: “Mwegesa, torukutufaaho? Ka twafa!”
Yasisiimuka, yacoomera omuyaga, kandi yagambira enyanja ati: “Teeka! Culeera!” Omuyaga gwagwa n'enyanja yaculeera, haabaho okuteekana kwingi.
Yabakaguza ati: “Mutiiniire ki? Timwina kwikiriza?”
Baitu bbo baatiina muno, nukwo kukaguzangana bati: “Mara onu muntu ki arukuragira ihunga n'enyanja, bikamuhurra?”
Baahika nseeri y'enyanja, omunsi y'Abageraseene.
Yesu obu yarugire omu bwato, yatangaana omusaija akwasirwe omwoyo mubi, ow'akaba naaruga omu bituuro
nambere yaikaraga. Busaho n'omu ow'akaba naasobora kumuboha noobwakubaire kumubohesa orujegere;
habwokuba emirundi nyingi baamubohesaaga empingo n'enjegere, baitu enjegere yaicwaaga, kandi n'empingo azicwacwana; hataroho ow'akaba aina amaani ag'okumuculeeza.
Ekiro na nyamusana yaikaraga naayamuliza omu bituuro na ha nsozi, naayehutaaza n'amabaale.
Obu yalengiire Yesu, yairuka, yamuteereza amaju;
yayamuza n'iraka likooto ati: “Yesu, Omwana wa Ruhanga anyakuli haiguru muno, noontura ki? Ninkurahira omu ibara lya Ruhanga, otancanza.”
Habwokuba Yesu akaba agugambiire ati: “Murugeho, iwe omwoyo omubi!”
Yesu nukwo kugukaguza ati: “Ibara Iyawe niryo liha?” Gwagarukamu guti: “Ibara lyange ninyowe Ihe; habwokuba tuli baingi.”
Gwamwesengereza muno aleke kugubinga omunsi omu.
Haihi aho ha mbanda y'orusozi hakaba haroho igana lingi ly'empunu nizirya;
emyoyo emibi yamwesengereza eti: “Tusindike omu mpunu ezi, nizo tutaahemu.”
Yagiikiriza. Emyoyo emibi yaruga omu muntu ogu, yataaha omu mpunu; kandi igana ly'empunu ezirukuhika nk'enkumi ibiri, zaajumbutuka, zaakonkomoka enengo, zaagwa omu nyanja, zaafeeramu.
Abaliisa bairuka baakisubirra ab'omu rubuga n'ab'omu byaro. Abantu baija kurora ekibaireho.
Baahika hali Yesu, baasanga omuntu ogu ow'akaba akwasirwe omwoyo omubi aikaliire, ajwaire, kandi ateekaine nuwe ogu ow'akaba akwasirwe ihe ery'emyoyo emibi; baayekanga.
Abaakirozire baabasoborra ekibaireho omuntu ogu ow'akaba aroho emyoyo emibi, n'ebibaireho empunu.
Kandi bbo baatandika kwesengereza Yesu aruge omu mitaano yabo.
Uwe obu akaba naataaha omu bwato, omusaija ow'akaba akwasirwe emyoyo emibi yaija, yamwesengereza amwikirize kwikara nawe.
Baitu Yesu yayanga, yamugambira ati: “Taaha owaanyu omu bagenzi baawe, obagambire ebikuru MUKAMA ebi akukoliire, kandi n'embabazi ezi akugiriire.”
Yagenda yatandika kurangirra ab'omu kicweka ky'Embuga Ikumi byona Yesu ebi yamukoliire; abantu boona baatangaara.
Yesu obu yayambukiire omu bwato, yagaruka nseeri y'enyanja, kandi ekitebe ky'abantu baingi kyamwesoroolezaaho; yaikara ha musa gw'enyanja.
Aho haija omu ha bakuru b'isorrokaniro, ibara lye Yairo. Obu yarozire Yesu, yagwa ha bigere bye,
yamwesengereza naagamba ati: “Muhara wange ali haihi kufa. Ija omuteho emikono yaawe, nukwo akire, kandi ayomeere.”
Yesu yagenda nawe. Ekitebe ky'abantu baingi kyamuhondera kimugoteriire.
Hakaba haroho omukazi ayamazire emyaka ikumi n'ebiri arwaire akejwiso.
Abafumu baingi bakaba balengereho kumutambira, kandi akaba amaliizeyo ebye byona, ataraarwe naakake baitu akeeyongera kuba kubi.
Akaba ahuliire ebi baagambahoga Yesu, yamuruga enyuma naaraba omu kitebe ky'abantu, yamwirra haihi, yakwata ha kijwaro kye.
Akagumya ati: “Noobu ndakwataho kwonka ekijwaro kye ndaakira.”
Ahonaaho akejwiso ke kaayoma; kandi yayehurra omu mubiri gwe nkooku akiziibwe endwara ye.
Yesu obu yamanyire amaani agamurugiremu, ahonaaho yahindukira ekitebe ky'abantu yakaguza ati: “Nooha akwasire ha bijwaro byange?”
Abeegesebwa be baamugarukamu bati: “Noorora ekitebe ky'abantu nkooku kirukukufunza, kandi nookaguza ngu: ‘Nooha ankwasireho?’ ”
Baitu uwe yamagamaga kurora ow'amukwasireho.
Omukazi habw'okumanya ekimukozirweho, yaija naatiina kandi naatukumira, yajuumara hansi omu maiso ge, yamugambirra kimu amazima goona.
Nukwo Yesu kumugambira ati: “Mwisiki wange, okwikiriza kwawe nukwo kukukirize; genda n'obusinge, okirre kimu endwara yaawe.”
Yesu obu akaba naakyabaza, haija abarukuruga mb'omukuru w'isorrokaniro, baamubikira bati: “Muhara waawe afiire. Omwegesa nokyamujwahiza ki?”
Baitu Yesu eki tiyakitaho mutima, yagambira omukuru w'isorrokaniro ati: “Otatiina, ikiriza kwonka.”
Kandi ataikirize muntu weena kugenda nawe, kwihaho Petero, Yakobbo, na Yohaana owanyina Yakobbo.
Obu baahikire ha nju y'omukuru w'isorrokaniro, Yesu yarora abantu abarukurabanganamu, abamu nibarra kandi nibateera empamo.
Obu yataahiremu yabakaguza ati: “Nimurabanganiramu ki kandi nimulizibwa ki? Omwana tafiire, baitu agwijagiire.”
Bbo baamusekeereza. Baitu boona yabaturukya aheeru, yatwara ise omwana na nyina, n'abo aba yaizire nabo, yahingura omu kisiika omwana nambere akaba ali.
Yamukwata ha mukono, yamugambira ati: “Talita kuumi;” amakuru gaakyo ngu: “Kaisiki iwe, ninkugambira nti: Imuka.”
Ahonaaho omwisiki yaimuka, yatandika kurubata; akaba ali w'emyaka ikumi n'ebiri y'obukuru. Abantu obu baarozire eki, baahuniira.
Yabateererra kutamanyisa muntu weena, kandi yaragira bahe omwisiki ekyokulya.
Oku yarugayo, yagenda omunsi y'owaabu; abeegesebwa be baagenda nawe.
Ha Sabbato yatandika kwegesa omu isorrokaniro; kandi abaingi abaamuhuliire baahunirra nibagamba bati: “Omusaija onu, binu byona akabiiha nkaha? Magezi ki aga yahairwe? Ebi arukukora ka nibihuniriza!
Onu tinuwe mubaizi, mutabani wa Mariya, mugenzi wa Yakobbo na Yose na Yuda na Simooni; kandi banyaanya titwombekere nabo owaitu?” Nukwo kumwanga.
Baitu Yesu yabagambira ati: “Omurangi aheebwa ekitiinisa hoona hoona, okwihaho omunsi y'owaabu, omu ruganda rwe, n'omuka ye.”
Oku atasobole kukorayo kyamahano na kimu, kwihaho kuta emikono ye ha barwaire bake, yabakiza.
Yahunirra habw'okutaikiriza kwabo. Kandi yagendagendaga omu byaro naayegesa.
Yayeta ikumi na babiri, yatandika kubatuma babiri babiri, kandi yabaha obusobozi bw'okubinga emyoyo emibi.
Yabateererra kutatwara kintu kyona omu rugendo rwabo, kwihaho omwigo; kutatwara ntanda, rundi ensaho, noobu zaakuba sente omu nsaho z'enkoba zaabo;
baitu bagende bajwaire enkaito, kandi batatwara kanzu ya kabiri.
Yayongera yabagambira ati: “Enju ei murataahamuga, niyo mwikalemu okuhika obu mulirugayo.
Nambere bataabajwahukirrege kandi bakanga kuhurra ebi murukugamba, obu muraabaga nimurugayo, muteerateere ecuucu y'omu bigere byanyu, bubege bwakaiso obw'okubasingisa omusango.”
Bbo baagenda nibatebeza abantu nkooku basemeriire kwegarukamu.
Bakabinga emyoyo emibi nyingi, kandi baasiiga amagita abarwaire baingi, baabakiza.
Omukama Herode ebi yabihurra, habwokuba ibara lya Yesu likaba limazire kurangaanwa. Abamu bakagamba bati: “Yohaana Omubatiza ahumbuukire omu bafu, nikyo arukukorra eby'amaani binu.”
Baitu abandi bakagamba bati: “N'Eriya.” N'abandi bagira bati: “Murangi, nk'omu ha barangi aba ira.”
Baitu Herode obu yahuliire ebi, yagamba ati: “Yohaana ou naacwireho omutwe, ahumbuukire.”
Herode akaba amazire kutuma abantu bakwate Yohaana, bamubohe, bamute omu nkomo habwa Herodiya muka Filipo mugenzi we; habwokuba Herode akaba amuswire.
Nukwo Yohaana kuhana Herode ati: “Ebiragiro bya Musa tibirukukwikiriza kuswera muka mugenzi waawe.”
Herodiya nikyo yamurwaliize enzigu, kandi yagonza kumwita; baitu atasobole,

habwokuba Herode akaba naatiina Yohaana, naamanya nkooku ali muntu ahikiriire kandi arukwera; yamulinda kurungi. Obu yahuliire Yohaana ebi yamuhanire, yasoberwa muno; baitu nabwo yamutamuga ekitiinisa.
Akasumi akasemeriire kaahikira ha kiro ky'okwijukiraho okuzaarwa kwa Herode, yacumbira abakurasi be, n'abakuru b'abaserikale, n'abantu abakuru aba Galiraaya obugenyi.
Muhara wa Herodiya obu yaizire, yacekeca, yasiimwa Herode n'abagenyi be. Omukama nukwo kugambira omwisiki ati: “Nsaba kyona eki orakagonza, ndaakikuha.”
Yamurahira ati: “Kyona kyona eki oransaba, ndaakikuha, noobu kiraaba ekicweka ky'obukama bwange.”
Omwisiki yaturuka aheeru, yakaguza nyina ati: “Nsabe ki?” Nyina yamugarukamu ati: “Saba omutwe gwa Yohaana Omubatiza.”
Omwisiki atabandaale yagaruka hali omukama, yamusaba naagamba ati: “Ningonza bwango ompeere ha sahaani hanu omutwe gwa Yohaana Omubatiza.”
Omukama yasaalirwa muno; baitu habw'okusangwa yarahira, n'okutiina kuswara hali abagenyi be, atagonze kucwa eki yarahiire omwisiki.
Nukwo omukama kutuma ahonaaho omu ha baserikale be abalinzi, yamuragira aleete omutwe gwa Yohaana. Omuserikale yagenda omu nkomo, yamutemaho omutwe,
yaguleetera ha sahaani, yaguha omwisiki; kandi omwisiki yagutwarra nyina.
Abeegesebwa ba Yohaana obu baahuliire eki, baija baatwara omutumbi gwe, baaguziika omu kituuro.
Abakwenda bakagaruka hali Yesu baamugambira byona ebi baakozire n'ebi baayegeseze.
Uwe yabagambira ati: “Mwije inywenka tugende ha rubaju, muhuumuleho”; habwokuba abantu baingi bakaba nibaija, abandi nibagenda; habweki abeegesebwa batatunge noobu kaakuba akaanya ak'okulya.
Baagwerra bonka omu bwato, baagenda ha rubaju.
Baitu abantu baingi baabarora nibagenda, baabamanyirra; baaruga omu byaro byona nibairuka baababanzaayo.
Yesu obu yarugire omu bwato yarora ekitebe ky'abantu baingi, yabakwatirwa embabazi, habwokuba bakaba nibasisana entaama ezitaina muliisa; yatandika kubeegesa ebintu bingi.
Obwire obu bukaba buli haihi kwira, abeegesebwa be baamwizira nibagamba bati: “Linu irungu, kandi n'obwire bwasa kwira;
raga abantu, bagende omu maka n'omu byaro ebiri haihi, beegurreyo ebyokulya.”
Baitu uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Inywe mubahe ebyokulya.” Nabo baamukaguza bati: “Tugende tugule emigaati ya edinaali, niyo tubahe balye?”
Nandiki uwe ati: “Mwinaho emigaati ingaha? Mugende murole.” Obu baamazire kwetegereza, baamugarukamu bati: “Twinaho emigaati etaano n'encu ibiri.”
Nubwo yaragiire boona kwegaba omu bitebe, baikarre hansi ha bunyansi obubisi.
Baikarra omu bitebe bya kikumi-kikumi n'ebya makumi ataano-ataano.
Yakwata emigaati etaano n'encu ibiri, yararamira ha iguru, yasiima; emigaati yagicwamu, yagiha abeegesebwa be bagigabire abantu; kandi n'encu ibiri yaigabira boona.
Boona baalya, baiguta.
Hanyuma baasorooza oburagalika bw'emigaati n'obw'encu bwaijuza ebigega ikumi na bibiri.
Abo abaaliire emigaati baahikaga basaija enkumi itaano.
Ahonaaho Yesu yaragira abeegesebwa be okugwerra omu bwato, bumabanze kwambuka nseeri Betisaida, uwe nakyaraga abantu.
Obu yamazire kubaraga, yatemba omu busozi kubaza na Ruhanga.
Obwire obu bwaizire, obwato bwasangwa buli omu nyanja hagati, uwe asigaire wenka ha bwerre.
Yarora nkooku bakaba nibalemesibwa kugoya obwato habwokuba omuyaga gukaba gubaturukire omu maiso. Ha saaha nka ikumi z'ekiro yabaizira naarubatira ha maizi. Yasisana kubahinguraho,
baitu obu baamurozire naarubatira ha maizi, baatekereza ngu muzimu, baayamuza;
habwokuba boona bakamurora, baayekanga. Ahonaaho yabahuumuza ati: “Muhuumule, ninyowe; mutatiina.”
Yatemba omu bwato nambere bakaba bali; omuyaga gwaculeera. Kandi baatangaara muno;
habwokuba batasoborokerwe eby'emigaati habw'okutahwituka.
Obu baamazire kwambuka, baahika omu nsi ya Genesareeti; obwato bwabu baabusibika ha musa.
Obu baarugire omu bwato, ahonaaho abantu baamanyirra Yesu,
baatandika kurabangana omu byaro ebiherraineho, baaleeta abarwaire, babahimbiire ha butabu bwabu, nibabamusangisa hoona ha baahurraga ali.

Hoona nambere yahikaga, omu byaro rundi omu mbuga rundi omu masamba baabyamyaga abarwaire omu ntangatangano, nibamwesengereza ngu, haakire bakwate ha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye; kandi boona abaakwasireho bakakira.
Abafalisaayo obu baamwesoroliizeho n'abandi ha beegesa b'ebiragiro abakaba barugire Yerusaalemu,
bakarora abamu ha beegesebwa ba Yesu nibalya batanaabire engaro.
(Habwokuba Abafalisaayo n'Abayudaaya boona tibalya batanaabire omu ngaro, nibalinda emigenzo y'abaisenkurubo;
obu baarugaga omu katale, tibalyaaga batakoogere; kandi baina emigenzo endi nyingi ei baalindaga: Nk'okwogya ebikopo, ebinaga, n'ebibindi eby'omulinga.)
Abafalisaayo n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro nukwo kumukaguza bati: “Habwaki abeegesebwa baawe batahondera emigenzo y'abaisenkuruitwe, baitu balya batanaabire engaro?”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Bagobya inywe, Isaaya ebi yarangire hali inywe bikahika nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: ‘Ab'ihanga linu bampaisaniza n'ebigambo byabo, baitu emitima yabo tendoho;
bandamiza busa, nibeegesa ebyatairweho abantu ngu niyo nyegesa ya Ruhanga.’
“Muleka Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga, mugumira ha migenzo y'abantu.”
Yayongera yabagambira ati: “Ka mwina amagezi maingi ag'okwanga Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga, nukwo mugumire ha migenzo yanyu!
Ningira Musa akagamba ati: ‘Otiinege sso na nyoko;’ kandi ati: ‘Anyakujuma ise rundi nyina, mazimakwo aitwege’;
baitu inywe mugamba muti: ‘Omuntu kakuba agambira ise rundi nyina ati: Eki naakuhaire niyo Korbaani’ (amakuru gaakyo ngu: kihongiirwe Ruhanga)
muba mutakyamwikiriza kukorra ise na nyina ekirungi kyona.
Nukwo mudibya ekigambo kya Ruhanga habw'emigenzo yanyu ei mugweterangana. Kandi mukora n'ebindi bingi nk'ebi.”
Akagaruka yayeta abantu, yabagambira ati: “Inywena mumpurre kandi mwetegereze;
busaho kintu ekiruga aheeru y'omuntu ekisobora kumusiisa; baitu ekimuruga omu nda nikyo kimusiisa.
Anyakwina amatu, ahurre.”
Obu yarugire omu bantu, amazire n'okutaaha omu nju, abeegesebwa be baamukaguza amakuru g'orufumo oru.
Yabagarukamu ati: “Na inywe timukeetegeriize? Timurukumanya ngu, ekintu kyona ekiruga aheeru kikataaha omu muntu tikisobora kumusiisa?
Habwokuba tikitaaha omu mutima gwe, baitu kitaaha omu nda ye, kirabamu, kituruka aheeru.” (Nukwo yagumize ati ebyokulya byona nkooku biri birungi.)
Yayongera ati: “Ekiruga omu muntu nikyo kimusiisa;
habwokuba omu mutima gw'omuntu omunda nuho haaruga ebiteekerezo ebibi, obusiihani bw'abahuuru, obusuma, obwisi, n'obusiihani bw'abaswire n'abaswirwe,
okwegomba kubi, itima, obucwangya, orwanju, ihali, okuhangirra, okwehaisa, n'obudoma.
Ebibi ebi byona biruga omu muntu omu nda, kandi nibyo bimusiisa.”
Yesu yaimuka yarugayo, yagenda omunsi ya Taya na Sidooni. Obu yahikireyo, yataaha omu nju, atagonze muntu weena amanye nambere ali; baitu nabwo atasobole kwesereka.
Ahonaaho omukazi ow'akaba aina muhara we aroho omwoyo omubi, obu yamuhuliireho, yaija, yagwa ha bigere bye.
Kandi omukazi ogu akaba ali Mugiriiki, nzaarwa ya Fonisiya. Yamwesengereza abinge omwoyo omubi guruge ha muhara we.
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Leka abaana bonyini babanze balye, baigute, habwokuba tikirukuhika kwaka abaana ebyokulya, okabinagira embwa.”
Baitu omukazi yamugambira ati: “Ego, Waitu, baitu embwa ezibunda hansi y'emeeza nazo zirya oburagalika bw'ebyokulya by'abaana.”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Habw'okugarukamu oti, ogende n'obusinge; muhara waawe, omwoyo omubi gumurugireho.”
Omukazi yataaha omuka, yasanga omwana abyamire omu kitabu, omwoyo omubi gumurugireho.
Yesu yagaruka naaruga omu kicweka kya Taya, yaraba Sidooni, yahika ha nyanja ya Galiraaya naaraba omu isaza ly'Embuga Ikumi.
Nuho baamuleetiire omusaija kiigaramatu kandi arukuhebebera; baamwesengereza amuteho emikono.
Obu yamwihire omu kitebe ky'abantu, amutwaire ha rubaju, yata enkumu ze omu matu ga kiigara, kandi yacwa amacwanta, yamukora ha rulimi;
obu yarozire haiguru, yasinda, yamugambira ati: “Efata,” amakuru gaakyo ngu: “Iguka.”
Amatu ge gaiguka, orulimi rwe rwabohorroka, yabaza kurungi.
kandi Yesu yabateererra kutagambiraho muntu n'omu; baitu nambere yahikize kubateererra, bbo bakakizaaho kukirangaaniza.
Kandi bakahunirra muno nibagamba bati: “Ebintu byona abikozire kurungi, naahuliza abafu b'amatu kandi naagambisa abafu b'eminwa.”
Omu biro ebi, ekitebe ky'abantu obu kyagarukire kwesorooza, kandi bataina kyokulya, Yesu yayeta abeegesebwa be, yabagambira ati:
“Ninganyira abantu banu, habwokuba bamazire na nyowe ebiro bisatu, bataina eki barukulya;
obu ndabaraga kugaruka owaabubo bataliire, nibaija kugwa ensazi omu muhanda; kandi abamu omuli bo barugire hara.”
Abeegesebwa be baamugarukamu bati: “Nikisoboka kita omuntu kutungira abantu banu boona ebyokulya omuirungu munu?”
Nawe nukwo kubakaguza ati: “Mwinaho emigaati ingaha?” Nandiki bbo bati: “Musanju.”
Yaragira ekitebe ky'abantu kwikarra hansi; yakwata emigaati musanju, obu yamazire kusiima, yagicwamu, yagiha abeegesebwa be kugigabira abantu; baagibagabira.
Kandi bakaba bainaho obucu buke; nabwo yabusiimira, yaragira babugabire abantu.
Baalya, baiguta. Baasorooza oburagalika obwasigaireho, bwaijuza ebigega musanju.
Abaaliire baahikaga nk'enkumi ina.
Yabaraga; ahonaaho yagwerra omu bwato hamu n'abeegesebwa be, yagenda omu nsi ya Dalmanuta.
Abafalisaayo bakaija baatandika kumuteeza empaka, nibamusaba ekihuniriza ekirukuruga hali Ruhanga, nibamulenga.
Uwe yasinda n'agamba ati: “Habwaki ab'ebiro binu nibasaba ekihuniriza? Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Busaho kihuniriza ekiriheebwa ab'ebiro binu.”
Yabasigaho, yagaruka yagwerra omu bwato, yayambuka nseeri.
Abeegesebwa bakaba beeberwe kutwara entanda, kyonka omu bwato bakaba bainamu omugaati gumu gwonka.
Uwe yabahabura ati: “Barungi bange, mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafalisaayo n'ekya Herode.”
Nukwo bbo kutandika kukaguzangana bati: “Ekirukumugambisa kiti, habwokuba titwina mugaati.”
Yesu obu yakyetegeriize, yabakaguza ati: “Eky'okutaba na mugaati nimukibalizaho ki? Timukamanyire rundi timukeetegeriize? Emitima yanyu tekahwitukire?
Ka mwina amaiso, timurukurora? Ka mwina amatu, timurukuhurra? Rundi timurukwijuka?
Obu naacwire emigaati etaano nagiriisa abantu enkumi itaano, oburagalika obu mwasoroize bukaijuza ebigega bingaha?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Ikumi na bibiri.”
“Kandi obu nacwire emigaati musanju nagiriisa abantu enkumi ina, oburagalika obu mwasoroize bukaijuza ebigega bingaha?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Musanju.”
Yabakaguza ati: “Nabwo timukeetegeriize?”
Baahika Betisaida. Abantu abamu baamuleetera omufu w'amaiso, baamwesengereza amukwateho.
Yakwata omufu w'amaiso ha mukono, yamwiha omu kyaro eki; obu yamazire kumucwa amacwanta ha maiso, amutaireho n'emikono, yamukaguza ati: “Oina eki orukurora?”
Omusaija ogu yainunuka, yagarukamu ati: “Nindora abantu; baitu nibasisana nk'emiti erukugenda.”
Yesu yayongera yamuta engaro ha maiso. Uwe yahweza, yakira, yarora kurungi ebintu byona.
Yamwohereza kutaaha owaabu, naamugambira ati: “Otahunguka noobu haakuba omu kyaro kinu.”
Yesu yayongera kugenda omu byaro bya Kaisaariya Filipi aina abeegesebwa be; obu bakaba nibagenda, yabakaguza ati: “Abantu baanyeta bata?”
Baamugarukamu bati: “Abamu bagamba ngu: Yohaana Omubatiza; abandi ngu: Eriya; n'abandi ngu: Omu ha barangi.”
Nandiki uwe ati: “Baitu inywe munyeta muta?” Petero yamugarukamu ati: “Niiwe Kristo.”
Yabateererra ati: “Eki mummanyireho, mutakigambira muntu.”

Akatandika kubamanyisa Omwana w'omuntu nkooku asemeriire kubonabonesibwa omu bintu bingi n'okwangwa abakuru b'abantu, n'abanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, n'okwitwa kandi ahumburwe haahingwireho ebiro bisatu.
Ebi byona akabigamba bbwa. Nubwo Petero yatwaire Yesu ha rubaju, yatandika kumuhana.
Baitu Yesu obu yahindukire, arozire abeegesebwa be, yacoomera Petero ati: “Ngaruka enyuma iwe Sitaani! Habwokuba ebi orukuteekereza tibiri bya Ruhanga, baitu by'abantu.”
Yayeta ekitebe ky'abantu hamu n'abeegesebwa be, yabagambira ati: “Weena anyakugonza kumpondera, ayehwemu wenka, ahimbe omusaraba gwe, ampondere.
Habwokuba weena anyakutaatira obwomeezi bwe, alibufeerwa; kandi weena anyakuhayo obwomeezi bwe habwange na habw'Amakuru Amarungi, alibujuna.
Baitu omuntu nikimugasa ki okutunga ensi yoona, kandi akafeerwa obwomeezi bwe?
Kintu ki omuntu eki asobora kuhayo okucungura obwomeezi bwe?

Baitu weena arukunkwatirwa ensoni rundi akaikwatirwa ebigambo byange omu businge bunu obuhabire kandi obubi, Omwana w'omuntu nawe alimukwatirwa ensoni obu aliija aina ekitiinisa kya Ise, asendekeriziibwe abamalaika be abahikiriire.”
Yesu yayongera ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Haroho abamu abeemeriire hanu abatalihikwaho rufu batakarozire bukama bwa Ruhanga nibwija n'obusobozi.”
Obu haahingwireho ebiro mukaaga, Yesu yatwara Petero, Yakobbo na Yohaana, yabatembya ha rusozi oruraihire bali bonka, yahinduka omu maiso gaabu,
ebyokujwara bye byayangasana, byayera tiitiiti; kandi busaho mwogi w'engoye omu nsi ayaakusoboire kubyezaakwo.
Eriya na Musa baababonekera, nibabaza na Yesu.
Petero nukwo kugambira Yesu ati: “Mwegesa, kirungi itwe kusangwa hanu. Katwombeke obusiisira busatu: akamu kaawe, akamu ka Musa, n'akandi k'Eriya.”
Baitu atamanye eki arukugamba, habwokuba bbo bakaba nibatiina muno.
Ekicu kyaija kyabasiikiriza, iraka lyaruga omu kicu nirigamba liti: “Onu nuwe Mwana wange omugonzibwa, mumuhurre.”
Ahonaaho obu bamagamagire, tibarora muntu n'omu kwihaho Yesu wenka.
Obu bakaba nibasirimuka orusozi, Yesu yabateererra okutagambiraho muntu weena ebi baarozire, okuhika Omwana w'omuntu obu alikamara kuhumbuuka omu bafu.
Ekigambo eki baakiculerra, nibakaguzangana ngu: Okuhumbuuka omu bafu nikimanyisa ki?
Nubwo baamukagwize bati: “Habwaki abeegesa b'ebiragiro bagamba ngu, Eriya nuwe alibanza kwija?”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo Eriya nuwe alibanza kwija, nukwo atereekereze byona; baitu kitahandiikwe kiti hali Omwana w'omuntu ngu: asemeriire kubonabonesibwa omu bintu bingi n'okugaywa?
Kyonka nyowe nimbagambira nti: Eriya akaija ira, kandi bakamukora kyona eki baagondeze, nkooku kyamuhandiikirweho.”
Obu baahikire hali abeegesebwa abandi, baarora ekitebe kingi ky'abantu kibeehinguliriize kandi abeegesa b'ebiragiro nibabateeza empaka.
Ahonaaho ekitebe ky'abantu obu baamurozire, baahunirra muno, bairuka baagenda nambere ali kumutangirra.
Nawe nukwo kubakaguza ati: “Nimubateereza ki empaka?”
Omu hali bo yamugarukamu ati: “Mwegesa, nkuleetiire mutabani wange, aina omwoyo omubi ogurukumutanga kubaza.
Nambere gukamukwatira hoona, gumuteera hansi; aleeta ifuro, kandi anena amaino, ayomangana. Nkasaba abeegesebwa baawe kugubinga, baalemwa.”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Inywe ab'obusinge obutarukwikiriza, ndiikara na inywe kuhikya di? Ndibagumiisiriza kuhikya di? Mumundeetere.”
Baamuleetera omwojo. Omwoyo omubi obu gwamurozire, ahonaaho gwakankaniza omwojo, yagwa hansi, yayekulingura yaleeta ifuro omu kanwa.
Yesu yakaguza ise omwana ati: “Amazire kasumi ki arwaire endwara enu?” Yamugarukamu ati: “Kuruga omu buto bwe.
Emirundi nyingi gumunaga omu murro n'omu maizi kumwita; baitu obu oraaba oina eki orukusobora kukora, otugirre embabazi kandi otukonyere.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Ogambire oti: obu oraaba oina eki orukusobora? Omuntu anyakwikiriza asobora ebintu byona.”
Ahonaaho ise omwana yatokera haigura naagamba ati: “Ego ninyikiriza; baitu nganyira habw'okwikiriza kwange okuke!”
Yesu obu yarozire ikitebe ky'abantu nibeeseesa nambere ali, yacoomera omwoyo omubi ati: “Iwe omwoyo ogutarukugamba kandi ogufiire amatu, ninkuragira omurugeho, kandi otalimugarukaho obundi.”
Omwoyo omubi obu gwamazire kutoka, gwamukankaniza muno, gwamurugaho, kandi omwojo yasisana nk'omutumbi. Nikyo abantu abarukukira obwingi omuli bo baagambiire bati: “Omwojo afiire.”
Baitu Yesu yamukwata ha mukono, yamwimukya, omwojo yayemerra.
Kandi Yesu obu yamazire kutaaha omu nju, abeegesebwa be baamukaguza omu nsita bati: “Habwaki itwe twalemerwe kugubinga?”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Omwoyo omubi ogw'omulingo gunu, tigusobora kubingwa ekintu kindi kyona kwihaho okusaba n'okusiiba.”
Obu baarugire aho, baaraba omu Galiraaya. kandi atagonze muntu n'omu akimanye;
habwokuba akaba naayegesa abeegesebwa be naabagambira ati: “Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abantu, bamwite; obu alimara kwitwa, hakahinguraho ebiro bisatu alihumbuuka.”
Baitu bateetegereze eki agambire kandi baatiina kumukaguza.
Baahika Kafaranaumu; kandi Yesu obu yamazire kutaaha omu nju yabakaguza ati: “Mubaire nimubazaaho ki omu muhanda?”
Baitu bbo baaculeera kwonka, habwokuba obu babaire omu muhanda bakakaguzangana ngu, Omukuru omulibo nooha?
Nawe nukwo kwikarra, yayeta ikumi na babiri, yabagambira ati: “Weena arukugonza kuba w'okubanza naasemerra kuba w'okumalirrayo omu boona, kandi muheereza wa boona.”
Yakwata omwana yamuleeta hagati yabo, yamukiikira omu mikono ye, naabagambira ati:
“Weena araajwahukirraga omwana nk'onu omu ibara lyange, buli ajwahukiriire nyowe; kandi weena araanjwahukirraga, buli tajwahukiriire nyowe baitu ajwahukiriire Ogu ayantumiire.”
Yohaana yamugambira ati: “Mwegesa, tukarora omuntu naabinga emyoyo emibi omu ibara lyawe; twamutanga, habwokuba akaba atarukukwataniza na itwe.”
Baitu Yesu yagamba ati: “Muleke kumutanga. Busaho muntu akora eky'amaani omu ibara lyange nukwo hanyuma akanguha kumbazaaho kubi.
Weena atarukutuhakaniza, buli ali habwaitu.
