Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Weena abaha ekikopo ky'amaizi kunywa, habwokuba muli bange, taliburwa mpeera ye.”
“Weena alyesiitaza omu ha bato banu abarukunyikiriza akagwa omu kibi, haakire abohwe orubengo rukooto omu bikya, anagwe omu nyanja.
Kandi omukono gwawe obu guraaba nigukuleetereza okusiisa, gutemeho; haakire otaahe omu bwomeezi ogookere, kukira kugenda omu kiinongoro ky'omurro oina emikono ebiri.[
Oku nambere hali enzito ezitafwa n'omurro ogutaraara.]
Okuguru kwawe obu kuraaba nikukuleetereza kusiisa, kutemeho; haakire otaahe omu bwomeezi oli mulema, kukira kunagwa omu murro ogutahwaho oina amaguru abiri. [
Oku nambere hali enzito ezitafwa n'omurro ogutaraara.]
Kandi eriiso lyawe obu liraaba nirikuleetereza kusiisa, liihemu; haakire otaahe omu bukama bwa Ruhanga oina eriiso limu, kukira kunagwa omu murro ogutahwaho oina amaiso abiri.
Oku nambere hali enzito ezitafwa n'omurro ogutaraara.
Habwokuba buli muntu alisemezibwa omurro nk'ekisura oku kisemeza ebyokulya.
Ekisura kirungi; baitu kakuba kihoibwamu orusa, mulirugarramu muta? Enyikara yanyu ikalege neenulirra nk'ekisura, kandi mwikarane n'obusinge.”
Yesu obu yarugireyo, yagenda omu kicweka kya Buyudaaya ekiri nseeri y'ekisaaru Yorudaani. Ebitebe by'abantu byagaruka kumwesoroolezaaho, nawe yayongera kubeegesa, nkooku engeso ye ekaba eri.
Abafalisaayo baija nambere ali, baamukaguza nibamulenga bati: “Ebiragiro bya Musa nibiikiriza omusaija kubinga mukazi we?”
Nawe yabakaguza ati: “Musa akabaragira ki?”
Baamugarukamu bati: “Musa akaikiriza omuntu kuhandiika ebbaruha y'okwahukana na mukazi we, nukwo amubinge.”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Habw'okugumangana kw'emitima yanyu, nikyo yabahandiikiriire ekiragiro eki.
Habwokuba okuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi: ‘Rubanga akahanga omusaija n'omukazi.’
‘Nikyo omusaija araalekeraga ise na nyina, agumire hali mukazi we,
kandi ababiri abo bafooke mubiri gumu.’ Habweki baba batakyali babiri baitu omu.
Nababweki Ruhanga eki yateeraniize hatalibaho muntu akyahukaniza.”
Obu baahikire omunju, abeegesebwa be baayongera kumukaguza ha kigambo eki.
Uwe yabagambira ati: “Weena anyakubinga mukazi we, akaswera ondi, buli asiihaine;
kandi n'omukazi anyakwahukana na iba, akaswerwa ondi, buli nawe asiihaine.”
Abantu bakamuleetera abaana, abakwateho; baitu abeegesebwa be baacoomera ababaleesire.
Yesu obu yarozire eki yabiihirwa, kandi yabagambira ati: “Muleke abaana baije nambere ndi, mutabatanga habwokuba abali nk'abo, obukama bw'omu iguru bwabo.
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena ataikiriza bukama bwa Ruhanga nk'omwana, talibutaahamu.”
Yabakiikira, yabaha omugisa, abataireho emikono ye.
Yesu obu akaba naimukya orugendo, haija omusigazi nairuka, yateeza amaju omu maiso ge, yamukaguza ati: “Mwegesa omurungi, nsemeriire kukora ki okugwetwa omu bwomeezi obutahwaho?”
Yesu nawe yamukaguza ati: “Habwaki nonyeta murungi? Busaho murungi kwihaho Ruhanga wenka.
Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga obimanyire. Otaliita. Otalisiihana. Otaliiba. Otalihangirra. Otaligobya. Otiinege sso na nyoko.”
Nandiki oli ati: “Mwegesa, ebi byona nkabikwata okuruga omu buto bwange.”
Yesu nukwo kumurolerra, yamugonza, yamugambira ati: “Nooburwaho ekintu kimu; genda otunde ebi oinabyo, sente eziraarugamu ozigabire abanaku, nubwo olitunga itungo omu iguru; nukwo oije onkuraatire.”
Omusigazi obu yahuliire ekigambo eki, yagwerwa, yagenda aina obujune, habwokuba akaba aina itungo lingi.
Yesu nukwo kubabungyamu amaiso, yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Ka nikiremeera abaguuda kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga!”
Abeegesebwa be baahunirra habw'ebigambo bye. Baitu Yesu yayongera kubasoborra ati: “Baana inywe, ka nikiremeera abarukwesiga itungo okutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga!
Nikirahuka engamiya kuraba omu nyindo y'enkinzo, okukira omuguuda kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.”
Bbo bakahunirra muno, baakaguzangana bati: “Mara nooha alisobora kujunwa?”
Yesu nukwo kubarolerra yagamba ati: “Kinu abantu tibakisobora, baitu Ruhanga akisobora; habwokuba Ruhanga naasobora byona.”
Nubwo Petero yamugambiire ati: “Dora itwe, tukaleka byona, twakuhondera.”

Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Busaho muntu n'omu ayasigire enju ye, rundi bagenzi be, rundi banyaanya, rundi nyina, rundi ise, rundi abaana be, rundi ebibanja bye habwange na habw'Amakuru Amarugni,
atatunga emirundi kikumi omu kasumi kanu: amaju, bagenzi be, banyaanya, nyina, abaana n'ebibanja, nukwo oteho okuhiiganizibwa; kandi omu busumi oburukwija alitunga obwomeezi obutahwaho.
Baitu baingi ab'okubanza baliba b'enyuma, kandi ab'enyuma baliba b'okubanza.”

Obu bakaba bali omu muhanda nibagenda Yerusaalemu Yesu abeebembiire, abeegesebwa be baahunirra n'abandi abakaba bamuhondiire baatiina. Yagaruka yagarra ha rubaju ikumi na babiri, yatandika kubagambira ebirukwija kumubaho,
naagamba ati: “Dora nitugenda Yerusaalemu; Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo hali ba nyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro; balimucwera omusango gw'okufa, kandi balimuhayo hali Abanyamahanga;
balimujuma, bamucwere amacwanta, bamuteere enkoba, bamwite; kandi obu halihinguraho ebiro bisatu alihumbuuka.”
Yakobbo na Yohaana batabani ba Zebedaayo baamwirra haihi, baamugambira bati: “Mwegesa, nitugonza otukorre eki turaakusaba kyona.”
Yabakaguza ati: “Nimugonza mbakorre ki?”
Nandiki bbo bati: “Otwikirize omu akwikarre ha mukono gwawe ogw'obulyo n'ondi ha gw'emoso omu kitiinisa kyawe.”
Baitu Yesu yabagambira ati: “Timurukumanya eki murukusaba. Nimusobora kubagana ha mabone aga ndukwija kubonabona rundi ha mulingo ogw'okufa ogu ndukwija kufamu?”
Baamugarukamu bati: “Nitusobora.” Yesu yabagambira ati: “Ego, amabone aga ndukwija kubonabona na inywe muligabona, n'okufa, mulifa nkooku ndukwija kufa;
baitu okwikarra ha mukono gwange ogw'obulyo rundi ha gw'emoso tali nyowe arukukugaba, baitu kw'abo abaakuteekaniriziibwe.”
Abasigaireho ikumi, obu baahuliire eki, baabiihirirwa Yakobbo na Yohaana.
Yesu nukwo kubeeta yabagambira ati: “Mumanyire abo abeetwa abalemi b'Abanyamahanga nkooku babalemesa itwale, n'abakuru baabo babatwaza obusobozi.
Tikiriba kiti omuli inywe; baitu arukwenda kuba mukuru omuli inywe, abe muheereza wanyu,
kandi arukwenda kuba w'okubanza, abe mwiru wa boona.
Habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu nawe ataije kuheerezibwa, baitu okuheereza n'okuhayo obwomeezi bwe kucungura baingi.”
Bakataaha Yeriko; kandi obu akaba naarugayo aina abeegesebwa be n'ekitebe ky'abantu baingi, baasanga Batimaayo, mutabani wa Timaayo, omusabiirizi omufu w'amaiso, aikaliire ha muhanda rubaju.
Obu yahuliire ngu, ni Yesu owa Nazareeti, yatandika kutokera haiguru naagamba ati: “Yesu, Omwana wa Daudi, ongirre embabazi!”
Baingi baamucoomera ngu, aculeere; baitu yakizaaho kutokera haiguru ati: “Omwana wa Daudi ongirre embabazi.”
Yesu yayemerra, yagamba ati: “Mumwete, aije.” Baayeta omufu w'amaiso nibamugambira bati: “Huumura, imuka, naakweta.”
Yanaga omwenagiro gwe, yamatuka, yahika hali Yesu.
Yesu yamukaguza ati: “Nogonza nkukorre ki?” Nandiki omufu w'amaiso ati: “Mwegesa, ningonza ndole.”
Yesu yamugambira ati: “Wegendere; okwikiriza kwawe kukukirize.” Ahonaaho yarora, yagenda na Yesu.
Obu bairiire haihi na Yerusaalemu, bahikire Betifage na Betaniya haihi n'orusozi rw'emiti Oliva, nubwo Yesu yatumire babiri ha beegesebwa be,
yabagambira ati: “Mugende omu kyaro kiri eki muroleriire; obu muraaba nimutaahamu muti, murarora omwana gw'endogoyi ogutakatembwaga muntu; mugusibule, muguleete.
Obu haraabaho arukubakaguza ati: ‘Nimusibura gwaki?’ Mumugarukemu muti: ‘Mukama waitu nagwetaaga, kandi naija kugugarra bwango.’”
Baagenda, baasanga omwana gw'endogoyi gusibikirwe haihi n'irembo ha ruguudo rubaju; baagusibura.
Abantu abakaba beemeriireho nukwo kubakaguza bati: “Omwana gw'endogoyi nimusibura gwaki?”
Baabagarukamu Yesu eki yabagambiire, nabo baabaleka baagenda.
Baaleetera Yesu omwana gw'endogoyi, baagutaho ebijwaro byabu, yagwikarraho.
Abantu baingi baayarra ebijwaro byabu omu muhanda, abandi baayarra amataagi g'emiti aga bacwire omu ngonjo.
Boona abakaba babeebembiire n'abakaba babahondiire bakatoka bati: “Hangiriza! Ahaisanizibwe ogu arukwija omu ibara ly'Atahwaho!
Bw'omugisa obukama bwa isenkuru-itwe Daudi oburukwija! Hangiriza anyakusinga haiguru muno!”
Yesu yataaha Yerusaalemu, yagenda omu Nju ya Ruhanga obu yamazire kurora ebintu byona, kandi obwire buli haihi kwira, yaturuka mu rubuga yagenda Betaniya hamu na ikumi na babiri.
Obu bwakiire nyenkya, bakaba nibaruga Betaniya, yarumwa enjara.

Obu yalengera omuti omutini ogujumbire, yagenda kurora obu araaba nasobora kugusangaho ekijuma. Baitu obu yaguhikireho, atasangeho kantu kwihaho ebikoora byonka, habwokuba kakaba katali kasumi k'emitini kwaniramu.
Yagugambira ati: “Okuruga hati hatalibaho n'omu agaruka kukulyaho ekijuma.” Abeegesebwa be eki bakakihurra.

Baahika Yerusaalemu. Yataaha omu Nju ya Ruhanga, yatandika kubingamu abakaba nibatundiramu n'abakaba nibagurramu; kandi yajuumika emeeza ez'abakaba nibahingisa sente, n'entebe ez'abakaba nibatunda amaiba;
kandi ataikirize muntu weena kurabya ekintu omu Nju ya Ruhanga.
Yayegesa naabakaguza ati: “Kitahandiikwe kiti: ‘Enju yange eraayetwaaga Nju y'okusabiramu, ey'amahanga goona’? Baitu inywe mugifoire bwingira bw'abanyagi.”
Baanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro obu bahuliire eki baaserra omuhanda ogw'okumwita. Baitu bakamutiina, habwokuba enyegesa ye ekahuniriza abantu boona.
Obwire obu bukaba nibusweka, Yesu yaruga omu rubuga.
Nyenkya kara Yesu n'abeegesebwa be obu bakaba nibahingura, baarora omuti omutini gwomiire kimu okuhika ha mihama.
Petero yaijuka ekyabaireho, yagambira Yesu ati: “Mwegesa, dora! Omutini ogu wakyenere, hati gwomere.”
Yesu yagarukamu ati: “Inywe mwesigege Ruhanga.
Mazima nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena aligambira orusozi runu ati: ‘Sinduka, ogwe omu nyanja’ kandi atarukugurukyagurukya, baitu naikiriza ngu, eki arukugamba nikiija kubakwo, kirimukolerwa.
Nikyo ndukubagambirra nti: kyona eki muraasabaga nimwesengereza, nimwikiriza nkooku muraakitunga, mazimakwo muraakiheebwaga.
Obu muraabaga mwemeriire nimusaba, mwina ekigambo kyona ha muntu, mubanzege mumuganyire; na Isiinywe anyakuli omu iguru nukwo abaganyire ebibi byanyu.
[Baitu kakuba mutaganyira, na Isiinywe anyakuli omu iguru talibaganyira bibi byanyu.]”
Baayongera baahika Yerusaalemu. Yesu obu akaba naagendagenda omu Nju ya Ruhanga, abanyakatagara abakuru abeegesa b'ebiragiro, n'abakuru b'abantu baija nambere ali,
baamukaguza bati: “Busobozi ki oburukukukoza ebintu binu, kandi nooha yabukuhaire kubikora?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Na nyowe kambakaguze ekekaguzo kinu; obu murangarukamu, numwo ndabagambira obusobozi oburukunkoza ebi byona.
Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaruga hali Ruhanga rundi omu bantu? Mungarukemu.”
Baitu bbo baahakanizangana bonka bati: “Obu turagarukamu ngu: ‘Kukaruga hali Ruhanga,’ naija kutukaguza ati: ‘Habwaki mutaramwikiriize?’
Boojo tugarukemu tuti: ‘Kukaruga omu bantu?’ ” Baitu bakatiina abantu, habwokuba boona bananukire Yohaana nkooku akaba ali murangi mali.
Nahabweki baagarukamu Yesu bati: “Titumanyire.” Yesu nubwo yabagambiire ati: “Na nyowe tindukwija kubagambira obusobozi oburukunkoza binu.”

Yesu akatandika kubabaliza omu nfumo ati: “Omusaija akabyara orugonjo rwe rw'emizabbibbu, yaruzitirra orukoroba, yalimamu endeeba, yayombekamu endindiro, yarusigira abapangisa okururolerra; uwe yagenda omu ihanga erindi.
Obusumi bw'okunoga obu bwahikire, yatuma omuheereza hali abapangisa abo, bamutwekereho ebijuma by'emizaabbibbu.
Baitu abapangisa abo baakwata omuheereza, baamuteera, baamubinga yarugayo ngaro-nsa.
Yagaruka yabatumira omuheereza ondi; ogu baamuteera orubaale, baamuswaza.
Yatumayo ondi, ogu baamwita; n'abandi baingi nukwo baabagizire bati. Abamu baabateera, abandi baabaita.
Akaba akyasigaizeeho omuntu omu, nuwe mutabani we omugonzibwa ou yabatumiire ha kumalirra, naateekereza ati: ‘Mutabani wange baraamugayuka.’
Baitu abapangisa abo obu baamurozire, baagambirangana bati: ‘Onu nuwe mugwetwa. Muleke tumwite, obugwetwa bube bwaitu.’
Baamukwata, baamwita, baamunaga aheeru y'orugonjo.
Hati nu Mukama w'orugonjo oru alikora ki? Aliija, ahwerekereze abapangisa abo, kandi orugonjo arukwase abandi.
Timukasomaga ekyahandiikirwe kinu ekirukugamba kiti: ‘Ibaale lyonyini abombeki eri baayangire, niryo lyafookere bugumizo bw'enju;
kinu nikyo Atahwaho yakozire, kandi nikituhuniriza?’ ”
Baaserra okumukwata, baitu baatiina akanyanya k'abantu, kandi nibamanya orufumo oru nkooku arugambiire bbo; baamuleka baayegendera.
Bakamutumira abamu ha Bafalisaayo n'ab'ekitebe kya Herode bamutege omu bigambo bye.

Baija baamugambira bati: “Mwegesa nitumanya nkooku oli w'amazima, kandi tosoroora mu bantu; habwokuba tororra ha kitiinisa ky'abantu, baitu oyegesaakwo omuhanda gwa Ruhanga. Kihikire kuha Kaisaali omusoro rundi nangwa?
Tuhe omusoro rundi tuguleke?” Baitu uwe obu yamanyire obugobya bwabo, yabakaguza ati: “Nimuntegera ki? Mundeetere siringi, ngirole.”
Baagimuleetera. Uwe yabakaguza ati: “Ekisisani kinu n'ebihandiikirweho by'oha?” Nandiki bbo bati: “Bya Kaisaali.”
Yesu yabagambira ati: “Ebya Kaisaali mubihe Kaisaali, n'ebya Ruhanga mubihe Ruhanga.” Eki kikabahuniriza muno.
Abasadukaayo abahakana ngu, busaho kuhumbuuka, bakaija hali Yesu, baamukaguza bati:
“Mwegesa, Musa akatuhandiikira ati: Mukuru w'omuntu obu araafaaga akasiga omukazi atazaire baana, mugenzi wa kifa aswere omufaakati ogu, nukwo bazarre kifa abaana.
Aho nu hakaba haroho nyineemu musanju. Mukuru wabu yaswera omukazi, baitu yafa atasigire baana;
n'owa kabiri yamuswera, nawe yafa atasigire baana n'owa kasatu nukwo ati.
Okuhika boona musanju, obu baafiire batasigire baana. Abo boona obu bahoireho omukazi nawe yafa.
Ha kiro ky'okuhumbuuka aliba muk'oha? Habwokuba boona musanju bakamuswera.”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Aho tinuho muhabira okutamanya Ebyahandiikirwe, noobu bwakuba obusobozi bwa Ruhanga?
Habwokuba abafiire obu balihumbuuka, tibaliswera kandi tibaliswerwa; baitu baliba nk'abamalaika ab'omwiguru.

Kandi ebirukukwata ha kuhumbuuka kw'abafu, timukasomaga omu kitabu kya Musa, omu kicweka ekirukugamba ha by'orusaka orurukwaka, Ruhanga nkooku yamugambiire ati: ‘Ninyowe Ruhanga owa Abburahamu, Ruhanga owa Isaaka, kandi Ruhanga owa Yakobbo?’
Tali Ruhanga ow'abafiire, baitu ow'aboomeezi; inywe muhabiire kimu.”
Kandi omu ha beegesa b'ebiragiro yaija, yahurra nibateezangana empaka, obu yamazire kwetegereza nkooku Yesu abagarukiremu kurungi, yamukaguza ati: “Ekiragiro ky'okubanza omu byona nikiha?”
Uwe yamugarukamu ati: “Eky'okubanza nikyo kinu: ‘Iwe Isirairi hurra, MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu nuwe MUKAMA wenka;
ogonzeege MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona, n'omwoyo gwawe gwona, n'amagezi gaawe goona, n'amaani gaawe goona.’
Ekya kabiri nkinu: ‘Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.’ Busaho kiragiro ekindi ekirukukira ebi.”
Omwegesa w'ebiragiro yamugambira ati: “Mwegesa ohikize. Ogambire ngu, Ruhanga ali omu, kandi busaho ondi, kwihaho Uwe wenka.
Kandi okumugonza n'omutima gwona, n'amagezi goona, n'amaani goona, kandi n'okugonza mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka, ebi nibikirra kimu ebyonzira ebyokiibwe n'ebitambirwe.”
Yesu obu yarozire nkooku agarukiremu n'amagezi, nubwo yamugambiire ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga tobuli hara.” Okuruga obu busaho n'omu ayagumire okumukaguza.
Yesu obu akaba naayegesa omunju ya Ruhanga akakaguza ati: “Abeegesa b'ebiragiro basobora bata kugamba ngu, Kristo aba mwijukuru wa Daudi?

Kandi kunu Daudi wenka akagambisibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire ati: ‘Atahwaho akagambira MUKAMA wange ati: Ikarra ha mukono gwange ogw' obulyo, okuhika abanya nzigwa baawe obu ndibafoora akatebe k'ebigere byawe.’
“Daudi wenka ayeta Kristo MUKAMA we; kandi obu, aba ata mwijukuru we?” Ekitebe kyona eky'abantu kyamuhurra n'okusemererwa.
Yesu obu akaba naayegesa, akagamba ati: “Mwerinde abeegesa b'ebiragiro abagonza kugendagenda bajwaire ekanzu ezirukwekweya, n'okuramukibwa n'ekitiinisa omu butale.
Bagonza kwikarra ha ntebe z'ekitiinisa omu masorrokaniro, n'ebiikaro ebirukukira oburungi omu magenyi.
Nubo abo abanyaga amaju g'abafaakati, hanyuma beezokesa nibarandagatana omu kusaba. Abo balicwerwa omusango ogurukukira ogw'abandi.”
Yesu akaba aikaliire aroleriire eryahurro lya sente. Yarora abantu baingi nibalitamu sente. Abaguuda baingi bakanagamu omuhendo mukooto.
Omufaakati omunaku yaija, yanagamu obusente bubiri bw'ebyoma.
Nukwo Yesu kweta abeegesebwa be, yabagambira ati: “Mazima nimbagambira nti: Omufaakati omunaku onu anagiremu nyingi okukira abandi boona abanagire omu lyahurro.
Habwokuba bbo banagiremu ebi basaagiriire; baitu uwe omu bunaku bwe ahaireyo byona ebi ainabyo.”
Yesu obu akaba naakyaruga omu Nju ya Ruhanga, omu ha beegesebwa be yamugambira ati: “Mwegesa, dora amabaale ganu n'ebyombeko binu, ka bikasemera!”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Ebyombeko ebi ebikooto obiboine? Tihalisigara ibaale na limu eriri ha lindi, eritalinagwa hansi.”
Yesu obu akaba aikaliire ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva, aroleriire Enju ya Ruhanga, nubwo Petero, Yakobbo, Yohaana na Andereya baamukagwize omu nsita bati:
“Tugambire, binu biribaho di? Kandi karorwaho ki akalyoleka nkooku biri by'okuhikirra?”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mwerinde hatalibaho muntu weena arukubahabisa.
Baingi abaliija omu ibara lyange nibagamba bati: ‘Ninyowe ogu!’ Kandi balihabisa baingi.
Obu mulihurra obulemu n'orugambo rw'obulemu, mutalitiina; ebi by'okubaho, baitu empero eriba etakahikire.
Ihanga liriimukirra erindi, n'obukama bulirwanisa obundi; halibaho emisisa omu biikaro bingi kandi haligwa ekiihe; baitu egi niyo ntandiko y'emihito.
“Inywe mwerinde, habwokuba balibahayo omu nkurato, balibaterra omu masorrokaniro; mulyemerra omumaiso g'abalemi n'ag'abakama habwange, mube bakaiso bange hali bo.
Amakuru Amarungi gabanze garangirirwe omu mahanga goona.

Obu balibatwara, bakabahayo kutongana emisango, mutalitunturra ebi muligamba, baitu mugambe kyona eki muliheebwa omu kasumi ako; habwokuba tibali inywe abalyetonganirra, baitu mulitonganirirwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Omuntu alihayo owanyina aitwe, na ise mwana alihayo omwana we, n'abaana baliimukirra abazaire baabo babaise;
na inywe mulinobwa boona habwange. Baitu ogu aligumisiriza okuhika ha mpero, nuwe alijunwa.”
“Baitu obu mulirora ekintu ekibi, ekirukunugwa kandi ekirukuhwerekereza, kitairwe nambere kitasemeriire kuba (arukusoma binu ayetegereza); obu, abo abaliba bali omu Buyudaaya bairukire ha nsozi.
Alisangwa ali ha nju eruguru atalisirimuka, kandi atalitaaha omunju ye kwihamu ekintu kyona;
n'ow'alisangwa ali omu musiri ataligaruka omuka kutabarra omwenagiro gwe.
Kandi bambi abaliba baina enda n'abarukwonkya omu biro ebi balikibona!
Musabe, ebi bireke kubaho omu biro by'obutiti.
Habwokuba omu biro ebi halibaho omuhito ogutakabahoga okuruga Ruhanga yakaba kuhanga ensi n'okuhika hati, kandi ogutaligaruka kubaho.
Kakuba MUKAMA atarakeeheze ha biro ebi, tihaakujunirwe muntu n'omu; baitu habw'abakomerwemu be, ebiro ebi Ruhanga akabikeehya.
Omuntu weena obu alibagambira ati: ‘Dora, Kristo ngunu!’ Rundi ‘Ngugwo!’ mutalikiikiriza.
Halizooka abarangi b'ebisuba n'abarukweyeta Kristo. Balikora ebyamahano n'ebirukuhuniriza, nukwo bahabise noobu baakubaire abakomerwemu.
Baitu inywe mwerinde; ebi byona mbibagambiire bitakabaireho.”
“Baitu emihito y'ebiro ebi obu erihwa, izooba lirisiikirizibwa omwirima, n'okwezi tikulijwa,
n'enyunyuuzi ez'omu iguru ziryeseesa hansi, n'amaani ag'omwiguru galitengesebwa.
Obu nubwo balirora Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu bicu by' omwiguru aina obusobozi bwingi n'ekitiinisa.
Nubwo alituma bamalaika basorooze abakomerwemu be, nibabaiha omu mbaju ina ez'ensi, okuruga iguru n'ensi nambere bitandikira okuhika nambere bigarukira.”
“Mwegere ha muti omutini, itaagi lyagwo obu lirokera, likanjurra amababi, mumanya nkooku ekyanda kiri haihi.
Na inywe obu mulirora binu nibibaho, mumanye Omwana w'omuntu nkooku ali haihi, ahikiire kimu ha irembo.
Mazima nimbagambira nti: Ab'obusinge bunu tibalihwaho ebi byona bitakabaireho.
Iguru n'ensi birihwaho, baitu ebigambo byange tibirihwaho.”
“Baitu ekiro eki n'esaaha egi busaho n'omu abimanyire, noobu baakuba bamalaika ab'omwiguru, noobu yakuba Mwana wonyini, kwihaho Isenyowe wenka.
Mwerinde, mwikale nimurora kandi musabe, habwokuba titumanyire akasumi ako nambere kalihikira.
Nikisisana nk'omuntu arukugenda orugendo; obu aba naaruga omu ka asiga akwasize abaheereza be, buli omu omulimo ogu araakora; kandi aragira omukumirizi kwikara naalinda.
Nahabweki, mwikale nimurora, habwokuba timumanyire kasumi nyineeka akaliiziramu: asobora kwija omu kairirizi rundi omu itumbi rundi enkoko niikooka, rundi omu rukyakya.
Kakuba aija aleke kubagwamu akasanga mugwijagiire.
Ekindukubagambira, nikyo ngambira n'abandi boona nti: Mwikale nimurora.”

Hakaba hasigaire ebiro bibiri okuhika ha bugenyi bw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho n'obw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe. Baanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro bakaba nibaserra amagezi nkooku baraakwata Yesu abantu batamanyire, nukwo bamwite;
baitu bakagamba bati: “Tutamukwata ha kiro kikuru, tihaikara kubaho epumpu omu bantu.”

Yesu obu akaba ali Betaniya, omunju ya Simooni omugenge, aikaliire naalya, hakaija omukazi aina ihembe ly'amagita agarukuboya kurungi ag'omuhendo mwingi, yafundukura ihembe, amagita yagamuseesa ha mutwe.
Baitu hakabaho abamu abagambirangaine babiihirwe bati: “Amagita ganu gafiire ki?
Amagita ganu gaakusoboire kuguzibwa habwa edinaali bikumi bisatu, zigabirwa abaseege.” Omukazi ogu baamuhyemera.
Baitu Yesu yabagambira ati: “Omukazi mumuleke; mumutuntuliize ki? Ankoliire ekintu kirungi.
Habwokuba abanaku obutoosa mwikara nabo. Obu muraagonzaaga bwona, musobora kubakorra ebirungi; baitu timurukwija kwikara na nyowe butoosa.
Onu akozire eki asoboire; omubiri gwange agusiigire kara gutakaziikirwe.
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Hoona hoona omunsi nambere Amakuru Amarungi ganu garaarangirirwaga, omukazi onu eki akozire kiraagambwahoga okumwijuka.”
Nubwo Yuda Isikalyota, omu ha ikumi na babiri yagenzire hali banyakatagara abakuru agobeze Yesu abamukwase.
Obu baakihuliire baasemererwa, baamunihiza kumuha sente. Nawe yaserra akasumi ak'okumubakwasa.

Ha kiro eky'okubanza eky'obugenyi bw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe, eki baatambirahoga omwana gw'entaama ogw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho, abeegesebwa be bakamukaguza bati: “Noogonza tugende tukuteekanirize nkaha, nambere oraliira obugenyi obw'Okuhingurwaho?”
Nubwo yatuma babiri ha beegesebwa be, nabagambira ati: “Mugende omu rubuga, muraatangaana omusaija ayetwekere ensoha y'amaizi; mumuhondere.
Nambere araataaha hoona, mugambire nyineeka muti: ‘Omwegesa naakukaguza ati: Ekisiika kyange eky'abagenyi kiraha nambere ndaaliira obugenyi obw'Okuhingurwaho hamu n'abeegesebwa bange?’
Uwe araabooleka ekisiika kikooto omu kainaabiri ekiteekaniziibwe, kirumu byona ebirukwetaagwa; oku nuho mututeekanirize.”
Abeegesebwa baimukya, baataaha omu rubuga, baasanga byona biri nkooku yabagambiire; baateekaniza obugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho.
Omu rwiririzi Yesu akaija hamu na ikumi na babiri.
Obu bakaba bali ha meeza nibalya, yagamba ati: “Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Omu omuli inywe naija kungobeza, kandi nuwe ogu arukulya na nyowe.”
Bbo baabanza kusaalirwa n'okumukaguza omu omu bati: “Ninyowe?”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Nuwe omu omuli inywe ikumi na babiri arukukoza na nyowe omu bbakuli.
Habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu naagenda nkooku kyamuhandiikirweho, baitu alikibona omuntu ogu arukugobeza Omwana w'omuntu! Kyakubaire kirungi omuntu ogu kakuba atarazairwe.”
Obu bakaba nibalya, Yesu yakwata omugaati yasiima, yagucwamu, kandi yaguha abeegesebwa be naagamba ati: “Mukwate, mulye, gunu nugwo mubiri gwange.”
Kandi yakwata ekikopo, obu yamazire kusiima, yakibaha; boona baanywaho.
Yabagambira ati: “Enu niyo sagama yange ey'ekiragaano ekihyaka, eraaseeswa habwa baingi.
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Tindigaruka kunywa ha nsande ey'ebijuma by'emizaabbibbu okuhika ha kiro eki, obu ndiginywa na inywe eri mpyaka omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.”
Obu baamazire kuzina ekizina baaturuka, baagenda ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva.
Nubwo Yesu yabagambiire ati: “Inywena nimwija kumpemukaho; habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Nditeera omuliisa, entaama zirarange.’
Kyonka obu ndimara kuhumburwa, ndibabanza okuhika Galiraaya.”
Baitu Petero yahaya naagamba ati: “Abandi boona noobu baraakuhemukaho, baitu nyowe ninkifuuhya!”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mazima ninkugambira nti: Kiro kinu kyonyini, enkoko etakakookere kabiri, oraaba onyehoogere emirundi esatu.”
Baitu Petero yayongera kukigumiza kimu ati: “Noobu ndaaba ndi w'okufa na iwe, baitu tindukwija kukwehooga.” Kandi abandi boona nukwo baagambire bati.
Bakahika omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa Getesemaane. Yesu yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Mwikarre hanu, nyowe kangende nsabe.”
Yatwara Petero, Yakobbo, na Yohaana; yabanza kusaalirwa muno n'okutuntura.
Nubwo yabagambiire ati: “Omutima gwange gwina obujune bwingi, buraaliire kunyita. Mwikale hanu nimurora.”
Yagendaho kake omu maiso, yajuumara hansi, yayesengereza ngu, obu kiraaba nikisoboka, esaaha egi emuhinguleho.
Yagamba ati: “Abba”, amakuru ngu, Taata. “Ebintu byona noobisobora; onyiheho amabone ganu; nabwo kitaba nyowe nkooku ndukugonza, baitu kibe Iwe nkooku orukugonza.”
Yagaruka yabasanga bagwijagiire, yakaguza Petero ati: “Simooni ogwijagiire? Tosoboire kurora esaaha emu?
Murole kandi musabe, nukwo muleke kwohebwa; omutima nigugonza mali, baitu omubiri muceke.”
Yagarukayo yayesengereza naagamba ebigambo bimu na biri.
Baitu obu yagarukire, nabwo yabasanga bagwijagiire, habwokuba amaiso gaabo gakaba nigakamba. Kandi bbo baaburwa eki baramugarukamu.
Yagaruka omurundi gwa kasatu, yabagambira ati: “Na hati mukyagwijagiire, muhumwire? Kihoire; esaaha ehikire; Omwana w'omuntu aheebweyo omu mikono y'abasiisi.
Mwimuke tugende; arukungobeza ngugwo, airiire haihi.”
Ahonaaho obu akaba naakyabaza, Yuda, omu hali ikumi na babiri, yaija n'ekitebe ky'abantu baina empirima n'ebiduuma, batumirwe baanyakatagara abakuru, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'abakuru b'abantu.
Ogu ayagobiize Yesu akaba abahaire akarorwaho naagamba ati: “Ou ndaagwa omu kifuba, buli nuwe ogu; mumukwate, mumutwale nimumulindira kimu ataikara kucwa.”
Yuda obu yaizire, ahonaaho yamwirra haihi, yamuramukya ati: “Mwegesa!” Yamugwa omu kifuba.
Bali baamugwera, baamukwata.
Kandi omu hali abo abakaba beemeriire aho, yasomorayo empirima ye, yatema omwiru w'omukuru w'abanyakatagara, yamucwaho okutu.
Yesu yabakaguza ati: “Mwizire kunkwata n'empirima n'ebiduuma nk'abaiziriire kukwata omunyagi?
Buli kiro naikaraga na inywe ninyegesa omu Nju ya Ruhanga, ka mutarankwasire. Baitu leka Ebyahandiikirwe bihikirizibwe.”
Abeegesebwa boona baamusigaho, bairuka.
Omusigazi omu yamuhondera ajwaire esuuka erukwera yonka; nawe bamukwata;
baitu uwe yabasigira esuuka egi, yairuka ali busa.
Baatwara Yesu hali mukuru w'abanyakatagara. Abanyakatagara abakuru, abakuru b'abantu, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro bakeesoroolezaayo.
Kandi Petero akaba amuhondiire haraho, okuhika obu baataahire omu kizigati kya mukuru w'abanyakatagara; yaikarra n'abalinzi nayota omurro.
Baanyakatagara abakuru n'orukurato rwona baaserra obwakaiso hali Yesu nukwo bamwite; baitu batabuzoole.
Baingi bakaleeta obwakaiso bw'ebisuba hali uwe, baitu obwakaiso bwabo butaikirranize.
Abamu bakeemerra nibamuhangirra bati:
“Tukamuhurra naagamba ati: ‘Ndiseesa Enju ya Ruhanga enu eyayombekerwe emikono y'abantu.’ ”
Noobu baraaba baagambire bati, baitu obwakaiso bwabo butaikirranize.
Mukuru w'abanyakatagara yayemerra hagati, yakaguza Yesu ati: “Toina kyona eki orukugarukamu? Banu kiki eki barukukurumiriza?”
Baitu uwe yaculeera, tiyagarukamu kantu. Mukuru w'abanyakatagara yagaruka yamukaguza ati: “Niiwe Kristo, Omwana w'Ogu Anyakuhaisanizibwa?”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Ninyowe; kandi muligaruka kurora Omwana w'omuntu aikaliire ha mukono gw'obulyo ogw'Ow'Obusobozi bwona, naizira omu bicu by'omu iguru.”
Nubwo Mukuru w'abanyakatagara yataagwire omwenagiro gwe naagamba ati: “Nitukyayetaagira ki abakaiso?
Mumwehuliriire nkooku ajumire Ruhanga. Inywe nimucwamu muta?” Boona baamucwera omusango ngu, asemeriire okufa.
Abamu baatandika kumucwera ebicwanta, n'okumuswekerra ha maiso, n'okumuteera empi nibagamba bati: “Toma, nooha akutiire!” Abaserikale abalinzi nabo baamutangiriza empi.
Petero obu akaba ali ifo omu kizigati, omu ha bazaana b'omukuru w'abanyakatagara yaija.
Obu yarozire Petero naayota, yamugumyaho amaiso yagamba ati: “Na iwe obairege hamu na Yesu Omunazareeti.”
Baitu uwe yayehooga naagamba ati: “Eki orukugamba tindukukimanya kandi tindukukyetegereza.” Yagenda yayemerra ha kiti ky'irembo, kandi enkoko yakooka.
Omuzaana ogu yayongera kumutaho eriiso, yagaruka kugambira abakaba beemeriireho ati: “Omusaija onu nuwe omu hali bo.”
Baitu Petero yagaruka yayehooga. Obu haahingwireho akaanya kake, abakaba beemeriire aho baagaruka baagambira Petero bati: “Mazimakwo na iwe oli omu hali bo, habwokuba oli Mugaliraaya.”
Baitu uwe yatandika kwekyena n'okurahira ati: “Omuntu ogu ou murukubazaaho, timmumanyire.”
Ahonaaho enkoko yakooka omurundi gwa kabiri. Nubwo Petero yaijukire Yesu eki yamugambiire ati: “Enkoko etakakookere kabiri, oraaba onyehoogere kasatu.” Obu yaijukire eki, yasaalirwa muno, yarra.
Obwire obu bukaba nibukya buti, baanyakatagara abakuru, hamu n'abakuru b'abantu, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, n'orukurato rwona baikarra kuhanuura; hanyuma baaboha Yesu baamutwara, baamukwasa Pilaato.
Pilaato yamukaguza ati: “Niiwe Mukama w'Abayudaaya?” Uwe yamugarukamu ati: “Nukwo ogambire.”
Baanyakatagara abakuru bakamunyegerra ebintu bingi.
Pilaato yagaruka yamukaguza ati: “Toina kyona eki orukugarukamu? Dora, ebi barukukunyegerra nkooku biri bingi.”
Baitu Yesu tiyamugarukamu kindi; habweki Pilaato yahunirra.
Ha bugenyi obukuru nk'obu Pilaato yabalekerraga omunyankomo omu ou baasiimaga.
Omu beemi abakaba bali omu nkomo abaakwasirwe habw'okwita abantu omu kajagarro, hakaba harumu omusaija ibara lye Baraaba.
Ekitebe ky'abantu kyaija kyasaba Pilaato akole nkooku abakorra bwona.
Uwe yabakaguza ati: “Nimwenda mbalekerre Omukama w'Abayudaaya?”
Habwokuba akamanya ngu, banyakatagara abakuru bamuhaireyo habw'ihali.
Baitu banyakatagara abakuru nukwo kwimukiriza ekitebe ky'abantu ngu, haakire abalekerre Baraaba.
Pilaato yagaruka yabakaguza ati: “Kandi omusaija ou murukweta Mukama w'Abayudaaya, mmukole ki?”
Baitu bbo baatokera haiguru bati: “Mubambe ha musaraba.”
Nandiki Pilaato ati: “Habwaki? Kibi ki eki akozire?” Nukwo bbo kutokera haiguru okukiraho bati: “Mubambe ha musaraba.”
Aho Pilaato habw'okugonza kusiimwa ekitebe ky'abantu, yabalekerra Baraaba. Obu baamazire kuteera Yesu enkoba, yamuhayo kubambwa ha musaraba.
Abaserikale baihaho Yesu baamutwara omu kikaali omunju enyakwetwa kibbira; baasorooza ekihanda kyona ky'abaserikale.
Baamujweka orugoye orurukugaajuka, baazinga ekondo y'amahwa baagimuta ha mutwe.
Baatandika kumuramya bati: “Hangiriza, Omukama w'Abayudaaya!”
Baamuteeza orubingo omu mutwe, baamucwera ebicwanta, baateeza amaju nibamuramya.
Obu baamazire kumuterra enaku, baamujuura orugoye orurukugaajuka, baamujweka engoye ze, baamwebembeza kugenda kumubamba ha musaraba.
Kandi bakahambiriza omuhinguzi, Simooni owa Kireene, ise Alekisanda na Rufo, ow'akaba naaruga omu kyaro, ayetweke omusaraba gwa Yesu.
Baahikya Yesu omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa Gologota (ekirukumanyisa ngu, kiikaro ky'oruhanga).
Baamuha eviini etabwirwemu omubazi; baitu ataginywe.
Baamubamba ha musaraba; baabagana ebyokujwara bye nibabiterra itomo, okucwamu buli omu eki araatwara.
Obu baamubambire ha musaraba zikaba ziri saaha isatu.
Ekihandiiko ekirukumanyisa omusango gwe kikaba nikigamba kiti: “Omukama w'Abayudaaya.”
Bakamubamba n'abanyagi babiri, omu ha mukono ogw'obulyo, ondi ha gwemoso.
(Ekyahandiikirwe kyahikirra ekirukugamba kiti: “Akabalirwa hamu n'enkozi z'ebibi.”)
Abo abakaba nibahingura baamujuma, nibacwa emitwe yabo, nibagamba bati: “Ahaa! Iwe ayagondeze kuseesa Enju ya Ruhanga okagaruka kugyombekera ebiro bisatu,
wejune wenka, oyehanuule ha musaraba!”
N'abanyakatagara abakuru nabo bakamujuma bali hamu n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro nibagambirangana bati; “Akajuna abandi, baitu tasobora kwejuna wenka.
Leka Kristo, Omukama wa Isirairi, hati ayehanuule ha musaraba, nukwo na itwe turole, twikirize.” Kandi abo abakaba babambirwe nawe, nabo baamujuma.
Esaaha ya mukaaga obu yahikire, omwirima gwasweka ensi yoona okuhika ha saaha ya mwenda.
kandi ha saaha ya mwenda Yesu yayamuza n'iraka likooto ati: “Eli, Eli, lama sabakatani?” amakuru gaakyo ngu: “Ruhanga wange, Ruhanga wange, ondugiireho ki?”
Abamu ha basungi obu baahuuliire eki baagamba bati: “Muhurre, naayeta Eriya.”
Omu hali bo yairuka yaibika ekijumankuba omu marwa agasaliire, yakita ha rubingo, yakimuha anyunyuguze, yagamba ati: “Ka turole Eriya obu araija kumuhanuura ha musaraba.”
Yesu yayamuza n'iraka likooto, yacwekana.
Enyigamo y'omu Nju ya Ruhanga yatemukamu habiri, okuruga eruguru okuhika hansi.
Omukuru w'abaserikale ow'akaba ayemeriire aho amuroleriire, obu yaboine nkooku acwekaine, yagamba ati: “Mazimakwo, omusaija onu abaire ali Mwana wa Ruhanga!”
Kandi hakaba haroho abakazi beemeriire hara baroleriire. Omuli bo hakaba harumu Mariya Magadaleena, na Mariya nyina Yakobbo omuto, na Yose, hamu na Salome.
Abo nubo abaamuhonderaga nibamuheereza obu akaba ali omu Galiraaya; kandi hakaba haroho abakazi abandi baingi abaizire nawe Yerusaalemu.
Eki kikaba kiri kiro eky'Okweteekanirizaamu, nikyo kiro ekyebembera Sabbato. Nahabweki omu rusweko rw'obwire,
Yosefu owa Arimateya, omukurasi ow'ekitiinisa omu rukurato, nawe akaba naategereza obukama bwa Ruhanga, yagenda hali Pilaato atarukutiina, yasaba omutumbi gwa Yesu.
Pilaato, kyamuhuniriza okuhurra nkooku afire ira, nukwo kweta mukuru w'abaserikale, yamukaguza obu araaba afiirekwo.
Omukuru w'abaserikale obu yamazire kumumanyisa nkooku afiire, yaikiriza Yosefu atwale omutumbi.
Yagura orugoye rwa bafuta, yahanuura omutumbi, yaguzinga omu rugoye oru, yaguta omu kituuro ekikaba kibaizirwe omu mwandara. Hanyuma yakumbya ibaale, yaigarra omunwa gw'ekituuro.
Mariya Magadaleena na Mariya nyina Yose bakarora nambere bataire Yesu.
Sabbato obu yahoireho, Mariya Magadaleena, na Mariya nyina Yakobbo, na Salome bakagura amagita agarukuboya nukwo bagende basiige omutumbi gwa Yesu.
Nyenkya kara, ha Sande, ekiro ekibanza omu wiiki, bakagenda ha kituuro izooba liturukire.
Bakaba nibakaguzangana bati: “Nooha aratukumbiza ibaale kuliiha ha munwa gw'ekituuro? ”
Obu baimukize amaiso, baarora ibaale liri erikooto muno likumbiibwe.
Obu bataahire omu kituuro, baarora omusigazi aikaliire ha rubaju rw'obulyo, ajwaire orugoye orurukwera; baahunirra.
Uwe yabagambira ati: “Muleke kuhunirra; mmanyire nimuserra Yesu owa Nazareeti ayabambirwe ha musaraba. Hanu taroho, ahumbuukire; mwije murole nambere bakaba bamutaire.
Hati nu, mugende mugambire abeegesebwa be na Petero ngu, naija kubabanza kuhika Galiraaya, oku nuho mulimurorra nkooku yabagambiire.”
Bbo baaturuka omu kituuro, bairuka bakwasirwe akatukumo kandi nibahunirra; baitu habw'obutiini batagambireho muntu n'omu.
[Yesu obu yahumbuukire, omu rukyakya ha kiro kya Sande, akabanza kubonekera Mariya Magadaleena ou yabingireho emyoyo emibi musanju.
Uwe yagenda yagambira abaikaraga hamu na Yesu, abakaba nibaganya kandi nibarra.
Baitu obu baahuliire nkooku ayomiire, kandi Mariya nkooku amurozire, batabiikirize.
Eki obu kyahoire, akabonekera abandi babiri ali omu nsisana endi, obu bakaba nibagenda omu kyaro.
Nabo baagarukayo baabigambira abandi, baitu batabaikirize.
Hanyuma akabonekera ikumi n'omu obu bakaba nibalya; yabahana habw'okutaikiriza kwabu n'okugumangana kw'emitima yabo, habwokuba bataikirize ebi baagambiirwe abo abaamurozire amazire kuhumbuuka.
Yabagambira ati: “Mugende omunsi yoona, murangirre abantu boona Amakuru Amarungi.
Ogu aliikiriza akabatizibwa nuwe alijunwa; baitu ataliikiriza, omusango gulimusinga.
Bunu nubwo oburorwaho obulyoleka abaliikiriza: habw'obusobozi bwange balibinga emyoyo emibi, balibaza endimi empyaka;
noobu balikwata enjoka, rundi bakanywa ekirukwita kyona, tibiribakoraho kabi; balita emikono yabo ha barwaire, bakire.”
MUKAMA Yesu obu yamazire kubaza nabo, yatwarwa omwiguru, yaikarra ha mukono ogw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga.
Abeegesebwa baagenda baabirangirra hoona hoona; MUKAMA naakora hamu nabo kandi naagumya ebigambo byabo n'ebihuniriza ebyabikuraataga. Amiina.
Omugonzibwa Teyofilo: Abantu baingi bakakora ebi barukusobora okuhandiika ebintu ebyabaireho omuli itwe.
Bakahandiika ebi twagambiirwe abo abaabirozire kuruga ha kubanza, nubo abo abaatumirwe kubitugambira.
Na nyowe obu namazire kubyetegereza kurungi okuruga ha byabandiize, nkasiima okubikuhandiikira mbikurataniize.
Kinu nkikozire nukwo omanye amazima g'ebintu ebi byona ebi wayegesiibwe.

Omu kasumi ka Herode, omukama wa Bayudaaya, hakaba haroho nyakatagara, ibara lye Zakaliya, ow'omu kihanda ky'abanyakatagara ekya Abiya. Akaba aswire omukazi ow'omu baijukuru ba Arooni, ibara lye Elizabbeti.
Bombi bakaba bali bahikiriire omumaiso ga Ruhanga bataina eki barukujunaanwa, nibahikiriza kurungi Ebiragiro bya MUKAMA n'emirwa ei yataireho.
Bakaba bataina mwana, habwokuba Elizabbeti akaba ali ngumba, kandi bombi bakaba bakuzire muno.
Kiro kimu Zakaliya akaba naakora omulimo gwe ogw'obunyakatagara omumaiso ga Ruhanga, ab'ekihanda kye obu bakaba bali b'okukora omulimo ogu.
Engeso y'abanyakatagara nkooku ekaba eri, nuwe akaba akomerwe akaruuru kutaaha omunju ya Ruhanga kwotera omugaju.
Omu kasumi ak'okwotera omugaju, ekitebe kyona eky'abantu kikaba kiri aheeru nibasaba Ruhanga.
Malaika wa Mukama yamubonekera, ayemeriire ha rubaju rw'obulyo rw'ekiswa nambere baayoterraga omugaju.
Zakaliya obu yamurozire yayekanga, yatiina muno.
Baitu malaika yamugambira ati: “Zakaliya, leka kutiina. Okusaba kwawe Ruhanga akuhuliire; mukazi waawe Elizabbeti alikuzarra omwana w'obwojo, olimuruka ibara lye Yohaana.
Mulikyanganuka muno kandi mulisemererwa, n'abandi baingi balisemererwa habw'okuzaarwa kwe;
habwokuba aliba mukuru omumaiso ga MUKAMA. Talinywa marwa noobu kyakuba ekitamiiza kyona. Alizaarwa aijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Aligarra Abaisirairi baingi hali MUKAMA Ruhanga wabo;
alimwebembera aina amaani n'obusobozi nk'obwa Eriya, aligarra emitima y'abazaire ha baana baabo, aligarra abeereme omumuhanda gw'abahikiriire, nukwo ateekanirize MUKAMA abantu abamusemeriire.”
Nubwo Zakaliya yakagwize malaika ati: “Kinu nsobora nta kukinanukira? Nyowe ngurusire, na mukazi wange akaikwire.”
Malaika yamugarukamu ati: “Ninyowe Gabulyeri anyakwemerra omumaiso ga Ruhanga. Ntumirwe kubaza na iwe n'okukumanyisa amakuru ganu amarungi.
Hurra nu, habw'okutaikiriza obukwenda bwange obulihikirra omu kasumi kabwo, oraafa omunwa, oikale otarukubaza okuhika ha kiro ebi byona obu birihikirra.”
Omu kasumi ako abantu bakaba bategeriize Zakaliya nibahunirra kandi nibeekaguza ekimukereriize omunju ya Ruhanga.
Obu yaturukire aheeru atasobole kubaza nabo, nubwo baamanya nkooku abonekiirwe omunju egi; kandi uwe habw'okulemwa kugamba, akabeesa engaro.
Obusumi bwe obw'okuheereza obu bwahoire, yagaruka omuka ye.
Obu haahingwireho ebiro, mukazi we Elizabbeti yatwara enda, kandi yayesereka omunju kumara ameezi ataano, naagamba ati:
“MUKAMA nukwo ankozire ati, obu yasiimire kunyihaho ensoni omu bantu.”
Elizabbeti obu akaba aina enda y'ameezi mukaaga, nubwo Ruhanga yatumire malaika Gabulyeri omu rubuga rwa Galiraaya orwetwa Nazareeti,
hali omwisiki empikirre, ow'akaba ajumbiirwe omusaija, ibara lye Yosefu, ow'omu ruganda rwa Daudi; ibara ly'omwisiki ogu nuwe Mariya.
Malaika akaija nambere ali yamuramukya ati: “Mirembe, iwe aijwire emigisa, MUKAMA ali na iwe!”
Mariya, ebigambo ebi bikamukanga muno, nukwo kwekaguza amakuru g'okuramukya oku.
Nubwo malaika yamugambiire ati: “Mariya, leka kutiina, habwokuba Ruhanga akusiimire.
Hati noija kutwara enda, olizaara omwana w'obwojo, olimuruka ibara lye Yesu.
Aliba mukuru kandi alyetwa Omwana w'Anyakuli haiguru muno; MUKAMA Ruhanga alimwikaliza ha kitebe kya isenkuru Daudi,
kandi alirema abaijukuru ba Yakobbo ebiro byona, n'obukama bwe tibulihwaho.”
Baitu Mariya yakaguza malaika ati: “Eki kisoboka kita? Nyowe kantamanyire musaija.”
Malaika yamugarukamu ati: “Mwoyo Ahikiriire alikwizira, kandi n'amaani g'Ogu Anyakuli haiguru muno galikuswekerra. Omwana ow'alizaarwa nikyo alyeterwa ahikiriire, kandi Omwana wa Ruhanga.
Dora, mwenekati wanyu Elizabbeti, ou baayeetaga ngumba, hati aina enda y'ameezi mukaaga, kandi kunu mukaikuru;
habwokuba busaho ekirema Ruhanga.”
Nubwo Mariya yagambire ati: “Nyowe ndi hanu, omuzaana wa MUKAMA; kinkolerwe nkooku ogambire.” Aho malaika yamuburaho.
Omu biro ebi Mariya akaimukya, yagenda bwango omunsi y'ensozi, omu kyaro kya Buyudaaya.
Yataaha omunju ya Zakaliya, yaramukya Elizabbeti.
Kandi Elizabbeti obu yahuliire okuramukya kwa Mariya, omwana yazaana omu ndi ye. Elizabbeti yaijura Mwoyo Ahikiriire,
nukwo kugamba n'iraka likooto ati: “Oli w'omugisa omu bakazi boona! N'omwana omunda yawe aina omugisa!
Kyandugira nkaha nyowe kubungirwa nyina MUKAMA wange?
Habwokuba obu mpuliire okuramukya kwawe, omwana yazaana omunda yange habw'omuhimbo.
W'omugisa onu ayaikiriize ekigambo kya MUKAMA nkooku kirihikirra hali uwe!”
Mariya yagamba ati: “Omutima gwange nigukugiza MUKAMA,
n'omwoyo gwange nigusemerererwa Ruhanga Omujuni wange,
habwokuba arozire okwebundaaza kw'omuzaana we! Dora, okuruga hati abantu ab'obusinge bwona baraanyetaga w'omugisa;
habwokuba Omusobozi wa byona akankorra ebikuru, n'ibara lye niryera.
Obusinge n'obusinge agirra embabazi boona abamutiina.
Omukono gwe akagukozesa eby'amaani, ararangize ab'emyehembo omu biteekerezo by'emitima yabo,
abingire ab'obusobozi ha bitebe byabo, yanyumiza abaculeezi;
abajara abaigusize ebirungi, abaguuda ababingire ngaro nsa.
Akonyiire Isirairi omwiru we, obu yaijukire kwoleka embabazi ze
nkooku yaraganiize Abburahamu na baijukuru be ebiro byona.”
Mariya akamara omwa Elizabbeti ameezi nk'asatu, hanyuma yagarukayo owaabu.
Akasumi k'Elizabbeti ak'okuzaara kaahika, yazaara omwana w'obwojo.
Abataahi na beene baabo obu baahuliire nkooku MUKAMA yamugiriire embabazi, boona baasemererwa hamu nawe.
Omwana obu yahikize ebiro munaana, baija kumusara; bakaba nibagaonza kumuruka Zakaliya, nk'ibara lya ise;
baitu nyina yabagambira ati: “Nangwa, naija kurukwa Yohaana.”
Baamugarukamu bati: “Omu beene banyu busamu n'omu arukwetwa ibara eri.”
Baakozesa oburorwaho kukaguza Zakaliya abamanyise ibara eri arukwenda kuruka omwana.
Uwe yasaba eky'okuhandiikaho; yahandiika ati: “Ibara lye nuwe Yohaana.” Boona baahunirra.
Ahonaaho akanwa ke kaiguka n'orulimi rwe rwabohorroka, yatandika kubaza naakugiza Ruhanga.
Abataahi boona baatiina. Amakuru ago gaararanga omu nsi yoona ey'ensozi eya Buyudaaya.
Boona abaagahuliire baagata ha mutima nibeekaguza bati: “Mara omwana ogu aliba ata?” Habwokuba omukono gwa MUKAMA gukaba gumuroho.
Zakaliya ise, akaijura Mwoyo Ahikiriire yaranga ati:
“Akugizibwe MUKAMA Ruhanga wa Isirairi; habwokuba aizire kucungura abantu be.
Atwimukiize omujuni ow'obusobozi, omu ruganda rwa Daudi omwiru we,
nkooku yagambiire omu barangi be abarukwera okuruga ira lyona:
kutujuna abanyazigwa baitu, n'okutwiha omu mikono y'abo boona abarukutunoba.
Nukwo ayoleke embabazi ezi yaraganiize baisenkuruitwe, naijuka ekiragaano kye ekirukwera,
nikyo ekirahiro eki yarahiire isenkuru-itwe Abburahamu ngu,
obu tulikajunwa omu mikono y'abanyanzigwa baitu, tumuheerezeege tutarukutiina,
nitwera kandi tuhikiriire omumaiso ge ebiro byaitu byona.
Na iwe mwana, olyetwa murangi w'Ogu Anyakuli haiguru muno; habwokuba olyebembera MUKAMA okuteekaniza emihanda ye,
n'okumanyisa abantu be okujunwa oku batunga okubaganyiza ebibi byabo.
Kandi habw'embabazi nyingi eza MUKAMA waitu, emamba enyakuruga omwiguru, obu erisara habwaitu,
erimulikira abo abaikara omu mwirima n'omu kiituuru ky'okufa, kandi eriteerekereza ebigere byaitu omu muhanda gw'obusinge.”
Omwana akakura, yaba w'amaani omu mutima, kandi akaikara omu irungu okuhika obu yayeyolekiire Abaisirairi.
Omu biro ebi, ekiragiro kikaruga hali Kaisaali Agusito ekirukuragira abantu ab'omunsi ye yoona beehandiikise, babarwe.
Kunu nukwo kwabaire okwehandiikisa okw'okubanza, Kwirino obu akaba ali mulemi mukuru wa Siriya.
Boona bakagenda kwehandiikisa, buli omu omu rubuga rw'owaabu.
Yosefu nawe akaruga Nazareeti, orubuga rwa Galiraaya, yagenda Buyudaaya omu rubuga rwa Daudi orurukwetwa Betelehemu, habwokuba nawe akaba ali mwijukuru ow'ekitabu kya Daudi,
nukwo nawe ayehandiikise hamu na Mariya ou akaba ajumbiire; kandi Mariya akaba aina enda.
Obu bakaba bakyali Betelehemu, ebiro bye by'okuzaara byahika.
Yazaara omwana, omuzigaijo ow'obwojo. Yamusweka omu bugoye, yamubyamya omu kyato ekiriirwamu ente, habw'okuburwa omwanya omu nju y'abagenyi.
Omunsi egi hakaba harumu abaliisa abaikaraga omu bwerre nibalinda amagana gaabo ekiro.
Malaika wa MUKAMA akababonekera, ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA kyamuliikana nikibeehinguliriza, baatiina muno.
Malaika yabagambira ati: “Mutatiina, habwokuba mbaleetiire amakuru amarungi ag'omuhimbo mwingi oguraakwata abantu boona.
Kiro kinu omu rubuga rwa Daudi, habazaliirwe Omujuni, nuwe Kristo MUKAMA.
Kanu nuko karorwaho aka muraamumanyiraho: Nimwija kusanga omwana enkerembe aswekerwe omu bugoye, abyamire omu kyato ekiriirwamu ente.”
Ahonaaho ihe lingi ery'abamalaika ab'omu iguru bakaija baateerana hamu na malaika ogu, baakugiza Ruhanga nibazina bati:
“Ekitiinisa kibe hali Ruhanga omu iguru, n'obusinge bube omunsi ha bantu Ruhanga aba arukusiima!”
Bamalaika obu baabarugireho, bagarukire omwiguru, abaliisa nukwo kugambirangana bati: “Katugende Betelehemu, turole ekibaireho MUKAMA eki atumanyisize.”
Baagenda nibarahuka, baasanga Mariya na Yosefu n'omwana w'enkerembe abyamire omu kyato ekiriirwamu ente.
Obu baamurozire, baasubirra byona malaika ebi yabagambiire ha mwana ogu;
kandi boona abaabihuliire bakahunirizibwa ebi abaliisa baabagambiire.
Baitu Mariya, ebintu ebi byona akabita ha mutima gwe, yaikara naabiteekerezaaho.
Abaliisa bakagarukayo nibahaisaniza kandi nibakugiza Ruhanga habwa byona ebi baahuliire n'ebi baarozire. Bikaba birikwo nkooku baabigambiirwe.
Ekiro kya munaana obu kyahikire, omwana akasarwa, baamuruka ibara Yesu. Niryo malaika yamwesire atakatondekere omu nda.
Akasumi obu kaahikire okukora omukoro gw'okwezibwa kwabo, Ebiragiro bya Musa nkooku byaragiraga, Yosefu na Mariya bakatwara omwana Yerusaalemu kumuhongera MUKAMA.
(nibahondera ekyahandiikirwe omu Biragiro bya MUKAMA ngu: “Omuzigaijo weena ow'obwojo araahongerwaga MUKAMA.”)
Bakagenda n'okuhayo ekihongwa nkooku kiri omu Biragiro bya MUKAMA, nugo: “Amaiba abiri rundi obwana bw'amaiba bubiri.”
Omu kasumi ako, omu Yerusaalemu hakaba haliyo omusaija, ibara lye Simyoni, omuntu ahikiriire, anyakutiina Ruhanga, kandi ayategerezaaga okucungurwa kwa Isirairi, Mwoyo Ahikiriire akaba amuroho.
Nuwe ayamusuukuliire nkooku atalifa atakarozire Kristo, MUKAMA ou yanihiize.
Akeebemberwa Mwoyo kwija omu Nju ya Ruhanga, abazaire b'omwana Yesu obu baamutaahizeemu okumukora omurwa gwabu nkooku gukaba guli.
Nubwo Simyoni yakikiira omwana, yakugiza Ruhanga naagamba ati:
“MUKAMA wange, hati leka omuheereza waawe afe n'obusinge, nkooku waraganiize;
habwokuba amaiso gange garozire okujuna kwawe,
oku wateekaniriize omu maiso g'amahanga goona,
gube musana ogumulikira Abanyamahanga, kandi guleetere ekitiinisa abantu baawe Abaisirairi.”
Ise na nyina bakahunirizibwa ebyamugambirweho.

Simyoni yabasabira omugisa, yayongera yagambira Mariya nyina ati: “Hurra, Ruhanga ataireho omwana onu nukwo baingi bagwe kandi baimuke omu Isirairi, kandi abe karorwaho abantu baingi aka bataliikiriza.
Nukwo ebiteekerezo by'abaingi bisuukurwe, (na iwe empirima erikucumita omutima).”
Kandi hakaba haroho omurangikati, ibara lye Anna, muhara wa Fanueli ow'omu ruganda rwa Aseeri. Akaba akaikwire muno. Obu yaswirwe, akamara na iba emyaka musanju yonka;
akaikara ali mufaakati okuhika ha myaka kinaana n'ena y'obukuru. Tiyarugaga omu Nju ya Ruhanga. Yaikaramuga naaramya, naasiiba kandi naasaba nyamusana n'ekiro.
Omu kasumi ako obu yaizire yatandika kusiima Ruhanga, kandi boona abakaba bategeriize okucungurwa kwa Yerusaalemu, yabagambira ha mwana ogu.
Abazaire be obu baamazire kuhikiriza byona ebiragiro bya MUKAMA nkooku byaragiraga, baagarukayo Galiraaya omu rubuga rw'owaabu Nazareeti.
Omwana akakura, yagira amaani, aijwire amagezi; n'emigisa ya Ruhanga yaikaraga hali uwe.
Buli mwaka abazaire ba Yesu baagendaga Yerusaalemu habw'ebiro bikuru by'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho.
Yesu obu yahikize emyaka ikumi n'ebiri, bakagenda nawe habw'ebiro bikuru engeso yaabo nkooku ekaba eri.
Ebiro bikuru obu byahoire baimukya kugarukayo owaabu, baitu omwana Yesu yasigara Yerusaalemu abazaire be batamanyire.
Bakaba nibateekereza ngu, agenzire n'ekitebe ky'abantu abakaba nibagarukayo. Obu baamazire kugenda orugendo rw'ekiro kyona, nubwo baatandika kumuserurra omu banyabuzaale n'omu bataahi.
Obu baalemerwe kumuzoora, baagarukayo Yerusaalemu nibakyamuserra.
Obu haahingwireho ebiro bisatu, bakamuzoora omunju ya Ruhanga, aikaliiire hagati y'abeegesa bakuru naabahuliriza kandi naabakaguza.
Boona abaamuhuliire bakahunirizibwa amagezi ge n'okugarukamu kwe.
Abazaire be obu baamurozire, baahunirra muno; nukwo nyina kumukaguza ati: “Mwana wange, habwaki otukozire oti? Dora sso na nyowe tukuserwire muno tutuntwire.”
Nawe yabagarukamu ati: “Munseruliire ki? Timumanyire nkooku nsemeriire kwekambisa ha bya Isenyowe?”
Baitu bbo batasobole kwetegereza amakuru g'eki yabagambiire.
Nubwo Yesu yagenda nabo baahika Nazareeti, kandi yaikara naabahurra. Ebigambo ebi byona, nyina akabirinda ha mutima.
Yesu yayeyongera kukura omu magezi n'omu mubiri, naasiimwa Ruhanga n'abantu.

Omu mwaka gwa ikumi n'etaano ogw'obulemi bwa Tiberiyo Kaisaali, Ponsiyo Pilaato obu akaba ali mulemi mukuru wa Buyudaaya, Herode ali w'isaza lya Galiraaya, na Filipo mugenzi we ali w'isaza ly'ekicweka kikooto kya Ituraaya na Turakoni, na Lisaniya ali w'isaza lya Abileene,
kandi Annasi na Kaayafa bali bakuru ba banyakatagara, nubwo ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyaiziire Yohaana, omwana wa Zakaliya ali omwirungu.
Aho Yohaana yagenda omu bicweka byona ebiheriire ekisaaru Yorudaani, naarangirra abantu beegarukemu, babatizibwe, nukwo baganyirwe ebibi.
Nkooku kyahandiirirwe omu kitabu ky'omurangi Isaaya kiti: “Nuwe ogu arukwamirra omwirungu ati: Muteekanirize MUKAMA omuhanda, mutereekereze obuhanda bwe.
Ebihanga byona biijuzibwe, orusozi rwona n'emigongo yoona bingangainganizibwe. Emihanda eramaire etereekerezibwe, n'obuhanda obubi busemezibwe;
nukwo abantu boona barole okujuna kwa Ruhanga.”
Abantu baingi bakaija hali Yohaana okubatizibwa. Nukwo uwe kubagambira ati: “Inywe baana b'encwera! Nooha ayabahabwire kwiruka ekifubiro ekirukwija?
Mukole ebikorwa ebirukwoleka nkooku mwegarukiremu. Muleke kwesigura muti: ‘Twina Abburahamu isenkuru itwe.’ Nimbagambira nti: Amabaale ganu Ruhanga asobora kugaihiramu Abburahamu abaijukuru.
Nangwa na hati endemu etairwe ha bikoro by'emiti. Nahabweki omuti gwona ogutarukwana ebijuma ebirungi nigwija kutemwa, gunagwe omu murro.”
Nubwo abantu baamukagwize bati: “Hati itwe tukole ki?”
Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Anyakwina esaati ibiri, aheho ataina; n'anyakwina ebyokulya, nawe nukwo akole ati.”
Abasorooza b'omusoro abaizire kubatizibwa nabo baamukaguza bati: “Mwegesa, tukole ki?”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Mutalisorooza okuhinguraniza hali ebi muragiirwe.”
Abaserikale nabo baamukaguza bati: “Kandi itwe, tukole ki?” Yabagarukamu ati: “Mutalinyaga muntu weena ebintu bye, noobu kwakuba kumutiinisiriza; kandi omusaara gwanyu gubamalege.”
Okunihira kw'abantu kukeeyongera, baatandika kuteekereza ngu, Yohaana yaakuba Kristo.
Yohaana yagambira boona ati: “Nyowe nimbabatiza n'amaizi; baitu arukunkiza obusobozi naija, kandi tinsemeriire n'okusumurra orukoba rw'enkaito ze. Uwe alibabatiza na Mwoyo Ahikiriire n'omurro.
Akwasire orugali rwe kuhehemukya, naija kusingorra orubuga rwe nukwo ahunike oburo omu nguli, kandi ebisunga abyokye omu murro ogutaraara.”
Haroho n'ebindi bingi Yohaana ebi yateereriire abantu obu yabaga nabarangirra Amakuru Amarungi.
Kandi akahana Herode ow'isaza habw'okuhambura Herodiya muka mugenzi we, na habw'ebibi ebindi ebi akaba akozire.
Nubwo Herode yayongera yakora ekibi ekindi, nikyo eky'okukwata Yohaana omu nkomo.
Abantu boona obu baamazire kubatizibwa, Yesu nawe yabatizibwa kandi akyali aho naasaba, iguru lyakinguka,
Mwoyo Ahikiriire yamusirimukaho ali omu kisisani ky'eriba, n'iraka lyaruga omu iguru nirigamba liti. “Niiwe mwana wange omugonzibwa, ou nsiima muno.”
Yesu ha yatandikire emirimo ye, akaba aina emyaka nka makumi asatu ey'obukuru. Kandi abantu baateekerezaaga ngu: akaba ali mwana wa Yosefu, mutabani wa Heeli,
Heeli mutabani wa Mataati, Mataati mutabani wa Leevi, Leevi mutabani wa Meleki, Meleki mutabani wa Yanai, Yanai mutabani wa Yosefu,
Yosefu mutabani wa Matatiya, Matatiya mutabani wa Amosi, Amosi mutabani wa Nahumu, Nahumu mutabani wa Esiri, Esiri mutabani wa Nagai,
Nagai mutabani wa Maati, Maati mutabani wa Matatiya, Matatiya mutabani wa Semeyi, Semeyi mutabani wa Yoseki, Yoseki mutabani wa Yooda,
Yooda mutabani wa Yohanani mutabani wa Rehesa, Rehesa mutabani wa Zerubabeeri, Zerubabeeri mutabani wa Seyahtyeri, Seyahtyeri mutabani wa Neeri, Neeri mutabani wa Meleki,
Meleki mutabani wa Adi, Adi mutabani wa Kosamu, Kosamu mutabani wa Erimoodamu, Erimoodamu mutabani wa Eri,
Eri mutabani wa Yoswa, Yoswa mutabani wa Eryezeeri, Eryezeeri mutabani wa Yolimu, Yolimu mutabani wa Mataati, Mataati mutabani wa Leevi,
Leevi mutabani wa Simyoni, Simyoni mutabani wa Yuda, Yuda mutabani wa Yosefu, Yosefu mutabani wa Yonamu, Yonamu mutabani wa Eriyakimu,
Eriyakimu mutabani wa Melea, Melea mutabani wa Mena, Mena mutabani wa Matata, Matata mutabani wa Nasani, Nasani mutabani wa Daudi,
Daudi mutabani wa Yese, Yese mutabani wa Obedi, Obedi mutabani wa Bowazi, Bowazi mutabani wa Sala, Sala mutabani wa Nahasooni,
Nahasooni mutabani wa Aminadabbu, Aminadabbu mutabani wa Adimini, Adimini mutabani wa Aram, Aram mutabani wa Hezirooni, Hezirooni mutabani wa Perezi, Perezi mutabani wa Yuda,
Yuda mutabani wa Yakobbo, Yakobbo mutabani wa Isaaka, Isaaka mutabani wa Abburahamu, Abburahamu mutabani wa Teera, Teera mutabani wa Nahora,
Nahora mutabani wa Serugi, Serugi mutabani wa Lehu, Lehu mutabani wa Peregi, Peregi mutabani wa Eberi, Eberi mutabani wa Seela, Seela mutabani wa Kainaani,
Kainaani mutabani wa Arafakisadi, Arafakisadi mutabani wa Sheemu, Sheemu mutabani wa Noha, Noha mutabani wa Lameki,
Lameki mutabani wa Metuseera mutabani wa Enoka, Enoka mutabani wa Yaledi, Yaledi mutabani wa Maharaleeli mutabani wa Kainani,
Kainani mutabani wa Enosi, Enosi mutabani wa Seesi, Seesi mutabani wa Adamu, Adamu mutabani wa Ruhanga.
Yesu akaruga ha kisaaru Yorudaani aijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire. Mwoyo ogu yamutwara omwirungu,
nambere yamazire ebiro makumi ana naayohebwa Sitaani. Omu biro ebi tiyalyaga kantu; obu byahoire, yarumwa enjara.
Nubwo omwohi yamugambiire ati: “Obu oraaba oli Mwana wa Ruhanga, ragira ibaale line lifooke byokulya.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Omuntu taba mwomeezi habw'ebyokulya byonka.’ ”
Aho omwohi yamutembya nambere hatungamire muno. Omu kasumi kake yamwoleka obukama bwona obw'omunsi,
yamugambira ati: “Ndaakuha obusobozi n'ekitiinisa kyabwo kyona; habwokuba bwona nkabuheebwa kandi mbuha weena ou ndukwenda.
Obu bwona ndaabukuha obu orandamya.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Oramyege MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe, kandi nuwe oheerezeege wenka!’ ”
Omwohi yamutwara Yerusaalemu, yamuta ha kasu k'Enju ya Ruhanga, yamugambira ati: “Obu oraaba oli Mwana wa Ruhanga, ruga hanu oyesimbe hansi;
habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Ruhanga alikukwasa bamalaika be’.
Kandi kiti: ‘Bakukwatirre n'emikono yabo, oleke kuteera ekigere kyawe ha ibaale.’ ”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Otalyohya MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe.’ ”
Omwohi, obu yamazire kumwohya omu miringo egi yoona, yamurugaho okuhikya obu alitunga omwanya ogundi.
Nubwo Yesu yagarukire Galiraaya aijwire amaani ga Mwoyo Ahikiriire. Okurangaanwa kwe kwahika omu kicweka eki kyona.
Yayegesa omu masorrokaniro gaabo, boona baamuhaisaniza.
Yesu akaija Nazareeti nambere yakuliire, yataaha omu isorrokaniro ha Sabbato, engeso ye nkooku ekaba eri. Yaimuka kusoma,
baamuha ekitabu kya Isaaya omurangi. Obu yakisuukwire, yazoora nambere hahandiikirwe hati:

“Omwoyo wa MUKAMA ali hali nyowe, habwokuba akanseesaho amagita kutebeza abanaku amakuru amarungi. Akantuma kurangirra okulekerwa kw'abanyankomo. n'abafu b'amaiso nkooku baraahweza, kugarurra obusinge abarukubonabonesibwa,
n'okurangirra omwaka MUKAMA aligiirramu embabazi.”
Yesu yakuba ekitabu, yakigarurra omuheereza, yaikarra. Boona abakaba bali omu isorrokaniro baamuhanga amaiso.
Yatandika kubeegesa ati: “Hati ekyahandiikirwe kinu kyahikirra nkooku mwakihurra.”
Boona baamusiima nibahunirra habw'ebigambo by'embabazi ebyarugire omu kanwa ke nibakaguzangana bati: “Onu tali nuwe mutabani wa Yosefu?”
Baitu uwe yabagambira ati: “Nkimanyire, nimwija kuncwera orufumo muti: ‘Mufumu, wetambire wenka!’ N'okungambira muti: ‘Tukahurra byona ebi wakoliire Kafaranaumu, bikorre na hanu omunsi y'owaanyu.’ ”
Uwe yabagambira ati: “Mali mali omurangi taheebwa kitiinisa omunsi y'owaabu.
Mazimakwo omu biro bya Eriya hakaba haroho abafaakati baingi omu Isirairi, iguru obu lyayebohere, enjura yamara emyaka esatu n'ameezi mukaaga etarukugwa, hakabaho kiihe omu nsi yoona.
Baitu Eriya atatumwe hali omuntu ondi weena, kwihaho omufaakati ow'omu rubuga Zalefasi, omunsi ya Sidooni.
Kandi omu Isirairi hakaba haliyo abagenge baingi omu biro by'omurangi Erisa; naho hatakizibweyo n'omu, kwihaho Naamani Omusiriya wenka.”
Abantu boona ab'omu isorrokaniro obu baahuliire ebi, baakwatwa ekiniga kingi.
Baimuka, baamuturukya omu rubuga rwabo, baamutwara ha mutwe gw'orusozi nambere bakaba beyombekiire orubuga, nukwo bamunage omu kihanga.
Baitu uwe yabarabamu hagati, yagenda.
Yesu akagenda Kaferanaumu, orubuga rwa Galiraaya. Ha kiro kya Sabbato yabeegesa.
Boona baahunirizibwa omulingo yabeegesezeemu, habwokuba ebigambo bye bikaba biri by'amaani.
Omu isorrokaniro hakaba harumu omusaija akwasirwe omwoyo omubi. Omwoyo ogu gwatoka n'iraka likooto guti:
“Mawe, nootwenza ki iwe Yesu owa Nazareeti? Oizire kutuhwerekereza? Nkumanyire, niiwe Ahikiriire wa Ruhanga.”
Yesu yagucoomera ati: “Culeera, omurugeho!” Omwoyo omubi obu gwamazire kumunaga hansi omumaiso g'abantu boona, gwamurugaho gutamukozire kabi kandi.
Boona baahunirra, baagambirangana bati: “Kintu ki kinu, naabinga emyoyo mibi n'obusobozi n'amaani, kandi neeruga omu bantu?”
Okurangaanwa kwe kwahika omunsi zoona eziherraineho.
Yesu akaruga omu isorrokaniro, yataaha omwa Simooni, Nyinazaara Simooni akaba akwasirwe omuswija mwingi; baayesengereza Yesu amukize.
Obu yamwinamireho, yaragira omuswija, gwamurugaho. Ahonaaho omurwaire yaimuka, yatandika kubaheereza.
Izooba obu likaba nirigorooba, boona abakaba baina abarwaire baabo ab'endwara ezitali zimu, bakabaleetera Yesu, yabataho emikono omu omu, yabakiza.
Emyoyo emibi nayo ekaruga omu bantu baingi neetoka eti: “Oli Mwana wa Ruhanga!” Yesu yagicoomera, tiyagiikiriza kugamba, habwokuba ekamanya nkooku ali Kristo.
Obwire obu bwakiire, Yesu akaimuka, yagenda omu kiikaro ekitarumu bantu. Baitu abantu baatandika kumuserra, baija nambere ali baagonza kumutanga aleke kubarugaho.
Uwe yabagambira ati: “Nyowe ndi w'okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'obukama bwa Ruhanga n'omu mbuga ezindi, habwokuba eki nikyo naatumiirwe.”
Kandi yayegesaaga omu masorrokaniro ga Bayudaaya.
Yesu obu akaba ayemeriire ha musa gw'enyanja ya Genesareeti, abantu bakaba nibasindikangana bamwirre haihi, nukwo bahurre ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Yarora amaato abiri gali ha musa gw'enyanja; baitu abasohi bakaba bagarugiremu niboogya obutimba bwabo.
Yataaha omu bwato obumu obwa Simooni, yamusaba abwirizeeyo kake, abwihe ha musa. Yayegesa abantu aikaliire omu bwato.
Obu yamazire kwegesa, yagambira Simooni ati: “Irizaayo obwato omu nziha, munagemu obutimba bwanyu, nukwo mukwase.”
Simooni yamugarukamu ati: “Mwegesa, tutalibaine okukiisa obwire, titukwasize kantu! Baitu habw'ekigambo kyawe kantege obutimba.”
Baatega obutimba, baakwasa encu nyingi muno, n'obutimba bwatandika kutemuka.
Baasima bataahi baabo abakaba bali omu bwato obundi, baije babakonyere. Baija, baijuza amaato gombi, kake konka gadikire.
Simooni Petero obu yarozire eki, yajuumara ha bigere bya Yesu naagamba ati: “Ndeka MUKAMA wange, habwokuba ndi musiisi!”
Uwe na boona aba akaba ainabo bakahunirra habw'encu nyingi ezi baakwasize.
Yakobbo na Yohaana, batabani ba Zebedaayo abaakoraga na Simooni, nabo nukwo baahuniriire bati. Yesu nukwo kugambira Simooni ati: “Otatiina, okuruga hati oraasohaga abantu.”
Baasika amaato, baagagarra ha musa, baasiga byona, baamukuratira.
Yesu obu akaba ali omu rubuga orumu, hakaija omusaija agengere weena. Obu yarozire Yesu, yajuumara omumaiso ge, namwesengereza ati: “MUKAMA wange, obu oraaba noogonza, noosobora kunkiza.”
Yesu yagorra omukono gwe, yamukwataho, naagamba ati: “Ego ningonza, kira!” Ahonaaho ebigenge byamurugaho.
Yesu yamuteererra okutagambiraho muntu weena, baitu yamugira ati: “Genda oyeyoleke nyakatagara, kandi oheyo ekihongwa Musa eki yaragiire bube bwakaiso hali abantu nkooku okiziibwe.”
Okurangaanwa kwa Yesu kukagenda nikweyongera hoona hoona, n'ebitebe by'abantu baingi bakeesorooza kumuhurra n'okukizibwa endwara zaabo.
Baitu Yesu obundi n'obundi yabasigahoga, agenda omu irungu kusaba.

Kiro kimu Yesu obu akaba naayegesa, omu kitebe ky'abantu hakaba harumu Abafalisaayo n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro abakaba barugire omu byaro byona ebya Galiraaya, Buyudaaya, na Yerusaalemu. Yesu akaba aina obusobozi bwa MUKAMA obw'okukiza abarwaire.
Aho nubwo haizireho abasaija bahimbiire ha katabu omuntu anyakuzingamire. Baalengaho kumutaahya omunju bamute omumaiso ga Yesu.

Baitu obu baalemerwe h'okumurabya habw'obwingi bw'abantu, baamutembya ha rusu rw'enju, baasakurra amategura, baafumura ekihuru, baamusirimurra ha katabu ke, baamuhikya hagati y'abantu omumaiso ga Yesu.
Obu yarozire okwikiriza kwabu, yagamba ati: “Muntu iwe, ebibi byawe bikuganyirwe.”
Abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo baatandika kukaguzangana bati: “Onu muntu ki arukujuma Ruhanga? Nooha asobora kuganyira ebibi atali Ruhanga wenka?”
Yesu obu yamanyire ebiteekerezo byabo, yabagambira ati: “Nimwekaguliza ki omu mitima yanyu?
Ekirukukira kurahuka nikiha? Okugamba nti: ‘Ebibi byawe bikunganyirwe,’ rundi kugamba nti: ‘Imuka ogende.’
Hati kamboleke Omwana w'omuntu nkooku aina obusobozi omunsi obw'okuganyira ebibi.” Nubwo yagambiire anyakuzingamire ati: “Ninkuragira: Imuka, himba akatabu kaawe, otaahe!”
Ahonaaho omusaija yamatuka, boona nibarora, yahimba akatabu aka akaba abyamireho, yataaha owaabu naakugiza Ruhanga.
Boona baahunirra, baakugiza Ruhanga nibagamba bati: “Ka turozire ebyamahano kiro kinu!”
Eki obu kyahoire, Yesu yaturuka aheeru, yarora omusooroza w'omusoro arukwetwa Leevi, aikaliire omu isoroolezo ly'omusoro; yamugambira ati: “Mpondera.”
Uwe yaimuka, yasiga byona yamuhondera.
Leevi ogu yacumbira Yesu obugenyi bwingi omunju ye, kandi ha bugenyi obu, hakaba haroho ekitebe kingi eky'abasorooza b'omusoro, n'abantu abandi abaikaliire nabo nibalya.
Baitu Abafalisaayo abamu n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro ab'omu kitebe kyabu bakahyemera abeegesebwa ba Yesu nibagamba bati: “Kiki ekirukubaliisa kandi ekirukubanywisa n'abasooroza b'omusoro n'abasiisi?”
Kandi Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Aboomeezi tibeetaaga mufumu, baitu ayetaagwa abarwaire.
Nyowe ntaizirre kweta abahikiriire, baitu nkaizirra abasiisi, beegarukemu.”
Abantu bakakaguza Yesu bati: “Habwaki abeegesebwa ba Yohaana basiiba emirundi nyingi kandi basaba, n'abeegesebwa b'Abafalisaayo nabo nukwo bakora; kandi kunu abaawe baikara nibalya kandi nibanywa?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nimusobora kusiibya abagenyi enjara, kunu na kigabura ali nabo?
Baitu akasumi kalihika kigabura obu alibaihwaho; obu nubwo balitandika kusiiba.”
Kandi Yesu yabacwera enfumo zinu ati: “Busaho ataagura ekikoba eky'orugoye ruhyaka akakibazira ha rukuru; kakuba akora ati, aba asiisire oruhyaka, kandi n'ekikoba kitemura orugoye orukuru.
“Kandi busaho anyakuta eviini ey'ehiira omu ndyanga enkuru. Kakuba akora ati, eviini ey'ehiira ebbarura endyanga, eviini eseeseka, n'endyanga esiisikara.
Baitu eviini empyaka bagita omu ndyanga empyaka.
Kandi busaho muntu agonza eviini ey'ehiira amazire kunywaho enkuru; baitu agamba ati: ‘Enkuru niyo nungi.’ ”
Yesu akaba naaraba omu misiri y'engano ha Sabbato; abeegesebwa be baacwa entwe z'engano, baazijungirra, baalya.
Nukwo Abafalisaayo abamu kubakaguza bati: “Kiki ekirukubakoza ekitaikirizibwa ha Sabbato?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Timukasomaga Daudi eki yakozire obu yarumirwe enjara, hamu n'abo aba akaba ainabo?
Nkooku yataahire omu Nju ya Ruhanga, yaihamu emigaati enyakuhongerwe, yagirya kandi yaha n'aba akaba ainabo?” Niyo emigaati etaraikirizibwaga kuliibwa muntu ondi, kwihaho abanyakatagara bonka.
Nubwo yabagambiire ati: “Omwana w'omuntu nuwe MUKAMA wa Sabbato.”
Ha Sabbato endi, Yesu obu yataahire omu isorrokaniro kwegesa, hakaba harumu omusaija akabire omukono ogw'obulyo.
Abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo nukwo kuhanga Yesu amaiso, barole obu arakiza omuntu ha Sabbato, nukwo babone h'okumunyegererra.
Baitu Yesu yamanya ebiteekerezo byabo, nukwo kugambira omusaija anyakukabire omukono ati: “Ija oyemerre hanu.” Omusaija yaimuka, yayemerraho.
Nubwo Yesu yabagambiire ati: “Kambakaguze kinu: Ha kiro kya Sabbato, Ebiragiro byaitu bitwikiriza kukora ebirungi rundi kukora ebibi? Kujuna obwomeezi rundi kubuhwerekereza?”
Boona yababungyamu amaiso, nubwo yagambiire omusaija ogu ati: “Gorra omukono gwawe.” Yagugorra, omukono gwe gwakira.
Baitu bbo baakwatwa ekiniga, baatandika kuhanuura bonka na bonka eki baraakora Yesu.
Omu biro ebi Yesu akagenda ha nsozi kusaba, yakiisa obwire naasaba Ruhanga.
Obwire obu bwakiire, yayeta abeegesebwa be, yakomamu ikumi na babiri, yabeeta abakwenda. Nubo banu:
Simooni ou yarukire Petero, na mugenzi we Andereya, Yakobbo na Yohaana, Filipo na Batolomayo,
Matayo na Tomasi, Yakobbo mutabani w'Alifaayo na Simooni ayayetwaga omurwanirizi w'ihanga lye,
Yuda mutabani wa Yakobbo na Yuda Isikalyota ayamugobiize.

Yesu yasirimuka nabo, yayemerra omu kyeya nambere yasangire ekitebe kingi ky'abeegesebwa be, n'abantu baingi abakaba barugire Buyudaaya yoona na Yerusaalemu, n'abaarugire omu mbuga Tiiro na Sidooni eziheriire enyanja. Bantu abaaizire kumuhuliriza n'okukizibwa endwara zaabo.
Abaatalibanizibwaga emyoyo emibi nabo bakakizibwa.
Abantu boona baaserraga kumukwataho, habwokuba amaani gaamurugamuga gabakiza boona.
Yesu akahindukira abeegesebwa be, yagamba ati: “Mwina omugisa inywe abanaku, habwokuba obukama bwa Ruhanga bwanyu,
Mwina omugisa inywe abarukurumwa enjara hati, habwokuba muliiguta. Mwina omugisa inywe abarukurra hati, habwokuba muliseka.
Muliba b'omugisa inywe abantu obu baraabanoba, bakababinga mu masorrokaniro, bakabajuma, kandi bakabeeta babi nibabatura Omwana w'omuntu!
Musemererwe ha kiro eki, kandi muguruke habw'omuhimbo, habwokuba empeera yanyu nyingi omwiguru. Ningira baisenkurubo nukwo baakozire bati abarangi.
Baitu mulikibona inywe abaguuda, habwokuba okusemererwa kwanyu mumazire kukutunga.
Mulikibona inywe abarukwiguta hati, habwokuba mulirumwa enjara. Mulikibona inywe abarukuseka hati, habwokuba muliganya kandi mulirra.
Mulikibona inywe, abantu boona obu baraababazaho kurungi, habwokuba na baisenkurubo nukwo baakozire bati abarangi ab'ebisuba.”
Baitu nimbagambira inywe abarukumpuliriza nti: Mugonzeege abanyanzigwa banyu, mukole kurungi abanyakubanoba,
mugondeze omugisa abanyakubakyena, kandi musabire abanyakubajuma.
Omuntu obu araakuteera oruhi ha rusaya orumu, omuhindurre n'orundi. Omuntu obu araatwara ekooti yaawe, otamwima n'esaati.
Weena araakusaba omuhe, n'araatwara ekyawe otalikimugaruza.
Eki mwenda abantu babakorre, na inywe nikyo mubakorrege.
“Obu muraaba nimugonza abanyakubagonza, muraasiimirwa kiraha? Nangwa n'abasiisi nabo baagonza abanyakubagonza.
Obu muraaba nimukora kurungi abanyakubakora kurungi, muraasiimirwa kiraha? Nangwa n'abasiisi nabo nukwo baakora.
Obu muraaba nimwohoza abo aba murukunihira kubasasura, muraasiimirwa kiraha? Abasiisi nabo boohoza bataahi baabo, nibagumya ngu, baraasasurwa omuhendo gwona.

Baitu inywe mugonzeege abanyanzigwa banyu, mubakorre ebirungi, kandi mwohoze mutarukunihira kusasurwa kantu; nubwo mulitunga empeera nkooto, kandi muliba baana b'Ogu Anyakuli haiguru muno; habwokuba agirra embabazi abantu entasiima n'enkozi z'ebibi.
Mubege b'embabazi nka Isiinywe oku ali w'embabazi.”
“Mutalicwa emisango, na inywe timuligicwerwa; mutalihenderra, na inywe timulihendererwa; muganyire, na inywe muliganyirwa.
Mugabe, na inywe muliheebwa. Endengo nungi, ehikire, erukumwaga niyo muliheebwa. Endengo ei mulengesa, na inywe niyo mulirengerwamu.”
Yesu akabacwera orufumo runu ati: “Omufu w'amaiso asobora kunanata omufu w'amaiso mutaahi we? Bombi tibaligwa omu kiina?
Omwegesebwa takira omwegesa we; baitu omwegesebwa weena obu amara kutendekwa kurungi, aba nk'omwegesa we.
Habwaki noorora akahoiga akali omu liiso lya mugenzi waawe, otarukurora empinju enyakuli omu liiso lyawe?

Rundi noosobora ota kugambira mugenzi wawe oti: Mugenzi wange kankutokoole akahoiga akakuli omu liiso; kandi kunu torukurora empinju enyakuli omu lyawe? Ngobya iwe, banza oihe empinju omu liiso lyawe osobole kuhweza n'okutokoora mugenzi waawe akahoiga akamuli omu liiso.”
“Tiharoho muti omurungi ogwana ebijuma bibi, rundi omuti omubi ogwana ebijuma birungi.
Buli muti gumanyirwa ha bijuma byagwo; habwokuba ha mwera-maino tibanogaho bijuma by'omukunyu, kandi ha makerre tibanogaho mizaabbibbu.
Omuntu omurungi aiha ha birungi ebi agira omu mutima gwe; n'omuntu omubi aiha ha bibi ebi agira omu mutima gwe; habwokuba ebisaaga omu mutima nibyo akanwa kagamba.”
“Munyetera ki: ‘MUKAMA wange, MUKAMA wange’, kunu mutarukukora ebi mbagambira?
Omuntu weena anyakwija hali nyowe, akahuliriza ebi ndukugamba nabihikiriza, kambooleke nkooku arukusisana.

Naasisana nk'omuntu arukwombeka. Akalima omusingi, gwahama, enju ye yagyombeka ha mwandara. Ekisaaru obu kyaboogere, empaya y'amaizi yateera enju egi; baitu etasobole kugitengesa, habwokuba ekaba eyombekerwe kurungi.

Kandi weena obu ahurra ebi ndukugamba, atarukubihikiriza, naasisana nk'omuntu ayayombekere enju ye ha itaka kwonka, atalimire musingi. Enjura obu yagwire ekisaaru kyabooga, empaya y'amaizi yateera enju egi, ahonaaho yasingooka, n'okusingooka kwayo kwali kw'amaani.”
Yesu obu yamazire kugambira abantu ebi byona, yagenda Kafaranaumu.
Hakaba haroho omukuru w'ab'amahe ow'akaba aina omuheereza we omwesigwa muno. Ogu akaba arwaire, ali haihi n'okufa.
Omukuru w'ab'amahe obu yahuliire nibabazaaho Yesu, yamutumira abakuru b'Abayudaaya, naamusaba aije akize omuheereza we.
Obu baahikire hali Yesu baamwesengereza muno bati: “Omuntu ogu osemeriire kumukoonyera,
habwokuba agonza ihanga lyaitu, kandi akatwombekera isorrokaniro.”
Nukwo Yesu kugenda nabo. Obu akaba alihaihi kuhika ha nju, mukuru w'ab'amahe yatuma banywani be bamugambe bati: “MUKAMA wange, leka kwejwahiza busa, habwokuba tinsemeriire kukutaahya omwange;
kandi nyerozire nkooku ntasemeriire kwija nambere oli. Gamba ekigambo kyonka, omuheereza wange araakira.
Habwokuba na nyowe ndi muntu arukulemwa, kandi nyina abaserikale aba ndukulema. Obu ngambira omu nti: ‘Genda’, agenda; n'ondi nti: ‘Ija’ aija; n'omuheereza wange nti: ‘Kora kinu’, akikora.”
Yesu obu yahuliire ebigambo ebi yahunirra, yahinduka yagambira ekitebe ky'abantu abamuhondiire ati: “Nimbagambira nti: Tinkabonaga okwikiriza nka kunu, noobu haakubaire omu Isirairi”.
Abakaba batumirwe, obu bagarukire omu ka, bakasanga omuheereza akizire.
Obu haahingwireho akasumi kake, Yesu yagenda omu rubuga Naini aina abeegesebwa be n'ekitebe ky'abantu baingi.
Obu akaba nairirra irembo ly'orubuga, yatangaana abahimbire omutumbi gw'omutabani w'omufaakati, kandi nuwe mwana we omu wenka. Abantu baingi ab'omu rubuga bakaba nibagenda nawe.
MUKAMA Yesu obu yamurozire, yamukwatirwa embabazi, yamugambira ati: “Leka kurra.”
Yairra haihi, yakwata ha ruhinyo, abakaba bahimbire omutumbi baayemerra. Yagamba ati: Musigazi iwe, ninkugamba nti: “Imuka.”
Ow'akaba afiire yaikarra, yatandika kubaza. Yesu yamugarurra nyina.
Aho boona baakwatwa obutiini, kandi baakugiza Ruhanga nibagamba bati: “Omuli itwe haimukiremu omurangi mukuru!” Kandi bati: “Ruhanga aizire kujuna abantu be!”
Amakuru ganu hali Yesu gaararanga omu Buyudaaya yoona n'ensi eziherraineho.
Abeegesebwa ba Yohaana bakamusubirra ebi byona. Nawe nukwo kweta babiri hali bo, yabatuma hali MUKAMA Yesu
bamukaguze bati: “Niiwe arukugenda kwija, rundi tutegereze ondi?”
Obu baahikire hali Yesu baamugambira bati: “Yohaana Omubatiza atutumire okukukaguza ngu: ‘Niiwe ogu arukugenda kwija, rundi tutegereze ondi?’”
Omu kasumi ako Yesu akakiza endwara za buli mulingo nk'ebidanda, emyoyo emibi, kandi abafu b'amaiso yabaigura amaiso.

Nukwo kugarukamu abeegesebwa ba Yohaana ati: “Mugarukeyo, mugambire Yohaana ebi murozire n'ebi muhuliire ngu, abafu b'amaiso nibarora, abalema nibarubata, abagenge bakiziibwe, abafu b'amatu nibahurra, abaafiire nibahumbuurwa, n'abaseege nibarangirirwa Amakuru Amarungi.
W'omugisa ogu atarukunyesiitaraho.”
Abaatumirwe Yohaana obu baagarukireyo, Yesu yatandika kusoborra ebitebe by'abantu hali Yohaana ati: “Omu irungu mukagenda kurorayo ki? Orubingo orurukutengesebwa omuyaga?
Obu, mukagenda kurorayoki? Omuntu ajwaire engoye ezirukunekaneka? Ningira abo abajwara bati kandi abaikara nibasemererwa, basangwa omu bikaali by'abakama!
Obu, mukagenda kurorayoki? Omurangi? Ego, nimbagambira nti: Naakira n'omurangi.
Habwokuba Yohaana ogu nuwe ayahandiikirweho ngu: ‘Dora nintuma omukwenda wange akwebembere, nuwe akusemereze omuhanda.’
Nimbagambira nti: Omu bantu abaazairwe abakazi, busamu n'omu arukukira Yohaana ekitiinisa; baitu omuto omu bukama bwa Ruhanga naamukira.”
(Abantu boona, hamu n'abasorooza b'omusoro abakaba babatiziibwe Yohaana, obu baahuliire ebigambo ebi, baakugiza Ruhanga habw'entegeka ye.
Baitu Abafalisaayo n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro abataraikirize bukatizibwa Yohaana, bakanga entegeka Ruhanga ei yabategekiire.)
“Hati nu, abantu ab'ebiro binu ndabalengesaniza na ki? Kandi nibasisana bata?
Nibasisana abaana abaikaliire omu katale nibeetangana bati: ‘Tukabaterra endere, timwazina! Twateera empamo, timwarra!’
Yohaana Omubatiza akaija atarukulya byokulya kandi atarukunywa marwa; inywe mwagamba ngu: ‘Aroho omwoyo omubi!’
Baitu Omwana w'omuntu, uwe akaija naalya kandi naanywa; mwagamba ngu: ‘Dora omukoizi kandi omutamiizi, nganjani y'abasorooza b'omusoro n'abasiisi!’
Baitu amagezi ga Ruhanga gamanyirwa ha bikorwa byago.”
Omu ha Bafalisaayo akeeta Yesu okulya nawe. Yesu yataaha omunju ye, yaikarra kulya.
Omu rubuga oru hakaba harumu omukazi omusiisi. Obu yamanyire Yesu nkooku arukulya omunju y'Omufalisaayo, yaleeta orusale rw'amagita agarukuboya kurungi.
Yamwemerra enyuma narra. Amaizi ag'omu maiso ge gaajubya ebigere bya Yesu, yabiragaza n'isoke rye, yabinywegera, yabisiiga amagita ago.
Omufalisaayo ow'akaba araaliize Yesu obu yakirozire, yateekereza omunda ye ati “Omuntu onu kakuba abaire ali murangi, yakumanyire omukazi onu arukumukwataho nkooku ali musiisi!”
Yesu nukwo kumugarukamu ati: “Simooni, nyina eki ndukugonza kukugambira.” Nawe yagarukamu ati: “Mwegesa, kingambire.”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Hakaba haroho abanyamabanja babiri abaatongwaga omuntu. Omu akaba naatongwa siringi rukumi, ondi siringi kikumi.
Obu baabuzirwe eky'okusasura, bombi yabaganyira. Hali abo bombi nooha alikira kumugonza?”
Simooni yamugarukamu ati: “Ninteekereza oli ou yaganyiire enyingi.” Yesu yagamba ati: “Ocwiremu kurungi.”

Nubwo yahindukira omukazi, yagambira Simooni ati: “Omukazi ogu omuboine? Obu ntaahire omunju yaawe, tompaire amaizi g'okunaba ebigere, baitu onu ajubize ebigere byange n'amaizi ag'omu maiso ge, yabiragaza n'isoke rye.
Kandi obu ontangiriire tonnywegiirege, baitu omwanya gwona ogu nakamara hanu, omukazi onu takalekiire kunywegera ebigere byange.
Iwe tonseesire amagita ha mutwe, baitu uwe asiigire ebigere byange amagita agarukuboya kurungi.
Nahabweki ninkugambira nti: Habw'okugonza kwe okwingi, ebibi bye ebingi bimuganyiirwe; baitu anyakuganyirwa ebike, agonza kake.”
Nubwo Yesu yagambira omukazi ati: “Oganyirwe ebibi byawe.”
Abo abakaba baikaliire nibalya nawe baatandika kukaguzangana bati: “Onu nuwe oha arukuganyira ebibi?”
Baitu Yesu yagambira omukazi ati: “Okwikiriza kwawe kukujunire; genda n'obusinge.”
Ebi obu byahoire, Yesu yagenda naaraba omu mbuga n'omu byaro naayegesa kandi naarangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'obukama bwa Ruhanga. Ikumi na babiri bakagenda nawe,
hamu n'abakazi abamu abakaba bakiziibwe emyoyo emibi n'endwara. Nubo banu: Mariya arukwetwa Magadaleena ayarugirweho emyoyo emibi musanju,
na Yoana muka Kuuza omukeeto wa Herode, kandi Susaana n'abandi baingi abahaireyo ebyabo okubakoonyera.
Abantu baingi obu baayesoroize Yesu nambere akaba ali, nibaruga omu mbuga ezitali zimu, yabaganikiza oruganikyo ati:
“Omusigi akatura kusiga. Obu akaba naasiga, embibo ezimu zaagwa ha muhanda rubaju, abantu baazirubatirra, n'enyonyi zaazisoma.
Ezindi zaagwa ha itaka erya ha mwandara, obu zaayarukire, zaahotoka habw'okuburwa amaizi.
Embibo ezindi zaagwa omu mahwa; zaakura nago, gaazinyoroza.
N'ezindi zaagwa omu itaaka erirungi, zaayaruka, zaakura, zaayana obujuma kikumi, kikumi.” Obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yakangura iraka naagamba ati: “Anyakwina amatu, ahurre!”
Abeegesebwa be obu bamukagwize amakuru g'oruganikyo oru,
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Inywe mukaheebwa okumanya ensita z'obukama bwa Ruhanga; baitu abandi bazigambirwa omu nganikyo, nukwo barole nk'abatarukurora, kandi bahurre nk'abatarukwetegereza.”
Amakuru g'oruganikyo oru nganu: Embibo nikyo kigambo kya Ruhanga.
Ezi ezaagwire ha muhanda rubaju nubo abo abahurra ekigambo; hanyuma omwohi aija, ekigambo akiiha omu mitima yabo, nukwo baleke kwikiriza bakajunwa.
Kandi ezi ezaagwire ha mwandara nubo abo abahurra ekigambo bakakiikiriza n'okusemererwa; baitu tikihama omu mitima yabo. Baikiriza okumara akasumi kake, baitu omu kasumi k'okwohebwa bagwa.
Kandi embibo ezaagwire omu mahwa nubo abo abahurra ekigambo, baitu obu bagenda, banyorozibwa emitalibano, obuguuda, n'okusemerererwa eby'obwomeezi bunu; kandi ebikorwa byabo ebirungi tibyeyongera.
Embibo ezaagwire omu itaka erirungi nubo abo abahurra ekigambo bakakikwata n'omutima gumu, kandi bakora ekikorwa ebirungi nibagumiisiriza.
“Busaho anyakuhemba etaara, akagijuumikira ekigega, rundi akagita omu madaara g'ekitabu; baitu agihanika ha kikondo kyayo, nukwo emulikire abarukutaaha omu nju.
Habwokuba busaho ekiserekerwe ekitalyolekwa, noobu kyakuba eky'ensita ekitalimanywa kandi kikazooka burole.
Nahabweki mwetegereze ebi murukuhurra, kabwokuba anyakwina bingi nuwe alyongerwaho, baitu anyakwina ebike n'ebi ainabyo birimwihwaho.”
Nyina Yesu n'abagenzi be bakaija nibamuserra, baitu batasobole kumuhika haihi habw'obwingi bw'abantu.
Nukwo kumutumaho bati: “Nyoko n'abagenzi baawe beemeriire aheeru nibagonza kukurora.”
Baitu uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Mau n'abagenzi bange nubo abo abahurra ekigambo kya Ruhanga bakakihikiriza.”
Kiro kimu Yesu akatemba omu bwato hamu n'abeegesebwa be, yabagambira ati: “Ka twambuke nseeri y'enyanja.” Aho baimukya.
Obu bakaba nibakyagenda, Yesu yagwijagira. Haateera ihunga lingi ha nyanja, obwato bwatandika kwijura amaizi, boona baaba omu kabi.
Abeegesebwa baija hali Yesu baamusisiimura bati: “Mwegesa, Mwegesa, twafa!” Yesu yasisiimuka, yacoomera ihunga n'ebigonzi eby'amaani; byaculeera, haabaho okuteekaana.
Nubwo yakagwize abeegesebwa be ati: “Okwikiriza kwanyu kuraha?” Baahunirra kandi baatiina nibagambirangana bati: “Mara onu muntu ki arukuragira ihunga n'ebigonzi, bikamuhurra?”
Obu baayambukire, baahika omunsi y'Abageraseene enyakuroleriire Galiraaya.

Yesu obu akaba nakyahika ha bwerre, akaizirwa omusaija arugire omu rubuga oru, akaba akwasirwe emyoyo emibi. Akaba amazire obusumi bwingi ataina eki arukujwara. Tiyaraaraga omunju, baitu yaikaraga omu bituuro.
Obu yarozire Yesu, yatokera haiguru, yagwa omumaiso ge, naagamba n'iraka likooto ati: “Yesu Omwana wa Ruhanga owa haiguru muno, nontura ki? Nkwesengeriize, otancanza!”

Ekyamugambisize kiti, habwokuba Yesu akaba aragiire omwoyo omubi okumurugaho. (Gwamukwataga emirundi nyingi, nikyo baamulindiraga aboherwe n'enjegere emikono n'amaguru, baitu yazicwaga kandi omwoyo mubi gwamuhambaaliza omwirungu.)
