Aho Yesu yamukaguza ati: “Ibara lyawe niiwe oha?” Yagarukamu ati: “Ninyowe Ihe”, habwokuba emyoyo emibi nyingi ekaba emurumu.
Emyoyo egi yayesengereza Yesu aleke kugiborogosa okuzimu owa Nyabuyonga.
Haihi aho ha rubaju rw'orusozi, hakaba haroho igana ly'empunu nirya. Emyoyo egi yasaba Yesu agiikirize etaahe omu mpunu ezi Yagiikiriza.
Nubwo emyoyo emibi yarugire omu muntu ogu, yataaha omu mpunu, igana lyona lyajumbutuka, lyakonkomoka enengo y'orusozi, zaagwa omu nyanja, zaahwerekerra.
Abaaliisaaga empunu ezi obu baarozire ebibaireho, bairuka baararangya amakuru omu rubuga n'omu byaro.
Nukwo abantu kugenda kurora ekibaireho. Obu baahikire hali Yesu, baasanga omusaija ayarugirweho emyoyo emibi aikaliire ha bigere bye, ajwaire, kandi ateekaine. Boona baatiina.
Kandi abo abaarozire ekintu eki, baabamanyisa omusaija ow'akaba akwasirwe emyoyo emibi nkooku yakiziibwe.
Nukwo Abageraseene boona kusaba Yesu abarugemu agende, habwokuba bakaba nibatiina muno. Nubwo Yesu yatembere omu bwato yagaruka nambere yarugire.
Obu akaba atakagenzire, omusaija oli ayarugirwemu emyoyo emibi yamwesengereza amwikirize kugenda nawe. Baitu Yesu yamuraga naagamba ati:
“Garukayo, ogambire ab'omu ka yaawe ebikuru Ruhanga ebi akukoliire.” Omusaija yagenda naarangaaniza omu rubuga rwona byona Yesu ebi amukoliire.
Yesu obu yagarukireyo, ekitebe ky'abantu kyamutangirra, habwokuba boona bakaba bamutegeriize.
Nubwo haizire omusaija, ibara lye Yairo, ow'akaba ali mukuru w'isorrokaniro. Yagwa ha bigere bya Yesu, naamwesengereza ahike omu nju ye,
habwokuba akaba aina muhara we omu wenka ow'emyaka ikumi n'ebiri, ow'akaba ali haihi n'okufa. Yesu obu akaba naagenda, abantu baingi baamwehinguliriza nibamufunza.
Hakaba haroho omukazi ow'akaba arwaire akeejwiso okumara emyaka ikumi n'ebiri, ebintu bye byona akaba abimaliize omu bafumu, baitu busaho n'omu ayasoboire kumutambira.
Omukazi ogu akaleetwa enyuma ya Yesu, yakwata ha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye, ahonaaho akeejwiso ke kaakira.
Nukwo Yesu kukaguza ati: “Nooha ankwasireho?” Boona obu baayehakaine, nubwo Petero yamugambiire ati: “Mwegesa, abantu boona bakwehinguliriize nibakufunza.”
Baitu Yesu yagamba ati: “Haroho ankwasireho, habwokuba mpuliire amaani gandugamu.”
Omukazi obu yarozire Yesu nkooku yamwetegeriize, yarugayo naatukumira, yajuumara omumaiso ge. Yasoborra hagati y'abantu boona eki yamukwatiireho, kandi nkooku akiziibwe ahonaaho.
Nubwo Yesu yamugambira ati: “Mwana wange, okwikiriza kwawe nukwo kwakukiza, wegendere n'obusinge.”
Yesu obu akaba naakyabaza, haija omuntu arugire mb'omukuru w'isorrokaniro, yamubikira ati: “Muhara waawe afiire, otongera kujwahya Omwegesa.”
Baitu Yesu nawe yakihurra, nukwo kugambira Yairo ati: “Otatiina, ikiriza kwonka, omwana waawe araakira.”
Kandi obu yahikire omunju, ataikirize muntu weena kutaahamu nawe, kwihaho Petero, Yohaana na Yakobbo, hamu na ise omwana na nyina.
Abantu boona bakaba nibarra kandi nibateera empamo habw'omwana. Yesu yagamba ati: “Muleke kurra, omwana tafiire, baitu agwijagiire.”
Abantu baamusekeereza, habw'okumanya nkooku afirekwo.
Baitu Yesu yamukwata ha mukono, yamweta ati: “Mwisiki iwe, imuka!”
Obwomeezi bwamugarukamu, ahonaaho yaimuka; Yesu yaragira bamuhe akookulya.
Abazaire be baatangaara muno, baitu Yesu yabateererra okutagambiraho muntu weena ebibaireho.
Yesu akeeta Ikumi na babiri, yabaha amaani n'obusoboozi obw'okubinga emyoyo emibi yoona n'okukiza endwara.
Yabatuma kurangirra obukama bwa Ruhanga n'okukiza abarwaire.
Yabagambira ati: “Omu rugendo rwanyu mutatwara kintu kyona, noobu gwakuba omwigo, rundi ensahu, rundi ebyokulya, rundi sente; kandi mutatwara esaati ibiri.
Enju ei muraataahamuga niyo mwikalemu okuhika obu mulikarugayo.
Nambere bataabajwahukirre, obu muraaba nimuruga omurubuga oru, muteerateere ecuucu y'omu bigere byanyu, ebege bwakaiso hali bo.”
Ikumi na babiri baagenda nibaraba omu byaro, nibarangirra Amakuru Amarungi, kandi nibakiza abarwaire hoona hoona.
Omu biro ebi, Herode akahurra byona ebikaba nibibaho, kandi yatuntura, habwokuba abamu bakaba nibagamba ngu: Yohaana Omubatiza ahumbuukire!
Abandi baagambaga ngu: Eriya nuwe agarukire kuboneka; kandi haroho n'abaagambaga ngu: Omu ha barangi aba ira ahumbuukire.
Nukwo Herode kwekaguza ati: “Yohaana nkamutemaho omutwe; baitu ogu muntu ki ou ndukuhurraho ebigambo binu?” Yayenda kurora Yesu.
Abakwenda obu baagarukire, baasoborra Yesu byona ebi baakozire. Nukwo kubatwara ha rubaju, baagenda omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa Betisaida.
Baitu ekitebe ky'abantu obu baakimanyire baamuhondera. Uwe yabatangirra, yabeegesa eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga, kandi yakiza n'abo abaka nibenda kukizibwa.

Izooba obu lyagoroobere, ikumi na babiri baija hali uwe, baamugambira bati: “Ragira abantu bagende omu byaro n'omu maka agali haihi, beeserurre h'okugoonya n'ebyokulya; habwokuba hanu tuli omu irungu.”
Baitu uwe yabagambira ati: “Inywe mubahe ebyokulya.” Baamugarukamu bati: “Hanu twinaho emigaati etaano yonka n'encu ibiri; rundi buli tugende tugurre abantu banu boona ebyokulya.”
Habwokuba hakaba haroho abasaija nk'enkumi itaano. Yesu yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Mubaikalize omu bitebe by'abantu makumi ataano-ataano.”
Nukwo baakozire bati, baabaikaliza boona.
Aho Yesu yakwata emigaati etaano n'encu ibiri, yararamira haiguru, yasiima, yabicwamu, yabiha abeegesebwa be kubigabira abantu.
Boona baalya baiguta. Obu baasoroize oburagalika obwasaagireho, bwaijuza ebigega ikumi na bibiri.
Kiro kimu Yesu obu akaba ali wenka naasaba, abeegesebwa be baija nambere ali, nukwo kubakaguza ati: “Abantu bannyeta bata?”
Baamugarukamu bati: “Baakweta Yohaana Omubatiza; abandi baagamba ngu: Niiwe Eriya; kandi abandi ngu: Niiwe omu ha barangi aba ira ahumbuukire.”
Yagaruka yabakaguza ati: “Baitu inywe nimunnyeta muta?” Petero yamugarukamu ati: “Niiwe Kristo owa Ruhanga!”
Yesu yabateererra okutakigambiraho muntu n'omu,

naagamba ati: “Omwana w'omuntu naasemerra kubonabonesibwa muno, n'okwangwa abakuru b'orukurato, n'abanyakatagara abakuru, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, n'okwitwa; kandi ahumburwe haahingwireho ebiro bisatu.”
Yesu yagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Weena anyakugonza kumpondera, ayehwemu wenka, ahimbe omusaraba gwe buli kiro, ampondere.
Habwokuba weena arukutaatira obwomeezi bwe alibufeerwa; baitu weena anyakuhayo obwomeezi bwe habwange alibujuna.
Omuntu kuraamugasira ki okulya ensi yoona, baitu akeehwerekereza wenka rundi akafeerwa obwomeezi bwe?
Weena anyakunkwatirwa ensoni kandi akazikwatirwa ebigambi byange, nawe Omwana w'omuntu alimukwatirwa ensoni abu aliizira omu kitiinisa kye n'omu kitiinisa kya Ise n'eky'abamalaika abahikiire.
Malimali nimbagambira nti: Haroho abeemeriire hanu abatalihikwaho rufu batakarozire obukama bwa Ruhanga.”
Obu haahingwireho ebiro nka munaana Yesu amazire kugamba ebigambo ebi, yatwara Petero, Yohaana, na Yakobbo, yabatembya ha rusozi kusaba.
Obu akaba naakyasaba, enzooka y'amaiso ge yahinduka, engoye ze zaayera tiitiiti.
Ahonaaho haazooka abantu babiri nibabaza nawe, nubo Musa na Eriya
abaabonekere omu kitiinisa, baabaza nawe ha kufa oku akaba naija kuhikiriza Yerusaalemu
Petero n'abataahi be bakaba baina oturo twingi, baitu obu baahamantukire baarora ekitiinisa kye n'abasaija babiri abakaba beemeriire nawe.

Abasaija abo obu bakaba nibakyamurugaho, Petero yagambira Yesu ati: “Mwegesa, kibaire kirungi itwe kusangwa hanu. Katwombeke obusiisira busatu: akamu kaawe, akamu ka Musa, n'akandi k'Eriya.” Obu, akaba atarukumanya eki arukugamba.
Obu akaba naakyagamba ebi, ekicu kyaija kyabasiikiriza. Obu kyabasiikiriize baatiina.
Iraka lyaruga omu kicu nirigamba liti: “Onu nuwe Mwana wange ou nyekomiire, mumuhurre!”
Iraka obu lyaculiire, baasanga Yesu ali wenka. Binu byona abeegesebwa bakabiculerra, kandi omu biro ebi batagambireho muntu n'omu ekigambo kyona hali ebi baaboine.
Ekiro ekyakurasireho obu baasirimukire orusozi, abantu baingi bakaitirana Yesu.
Omusaija ow'akaba ali omu kitebe yatokera haiguru ati: “Mwegesa, ninkwesengereza ondorre mutabani wange, nuwe wenka ou nyina.
Omwoyo omubi gwikara nigumukwata, ahonaaho ayamuza, gumunaga ensimbo, aleeta ifuro, gumumara amaani, kandi tigumulekera.
Nkeesengereza abeegesebwa baawe kugubinga, baitu batasobole.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Inywe abataina okwikiriza kandi ab'obusinge obuhabire, ndihikya nkaha okwikara na inywe n'okubagumiisiriza? Omwana waawe muleete hanu.”
Omwojo obu akaba nakyaija, omwoyo omubi gwamuteera hansi, gwamunaga ensimbo. Baitu Yesu yacoomera omwoyo mubi, yakiza omwojo, yamugarurra ise.
Abantu boona baahunirra habw'obusobozi obwa Ruhanga. Abantu obu bakaba nibakyahunirirra ebintu byona Yesu ebi yakozire, uwe yagambira abeegesebwa be ati:
“Ebigambo binu mubiteho omutima; habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abantu.”
Baitu ebigambo ebi bateetegereze amakuru gaabyo. Bikaba bibaserekerwe, nukwo baleke kubyetegereza; kandi bakatiina kubimukaguzaaho.
Hakaimukaho empaka omu beegesebwa, nibeekaguza arukukira obukuru omuli bo.
Baitu Yesu obu yamanyire ebiteekerezo byabo, yakwata omwana muto, yamwemereza ha rubaju rwe,

yabagambira ati: “Weena anyakujwahukirra omwana muto nk'onu habwange, buli ajwahukiriire nyowe; kandi anyakujwahukirra nyowe, buli ajwahukiriire Ogu ayantumiire; habwokuba anyakukira obuto omuli inywe, nuwe mukuru.”
Nubwo Yohaana yamugambiire ati: “Mwegesa, turozire omuntu naabinga emyoyo emibi omu ibara lyawe, twamutanga habwokuba tali w'ekitebe kyaitu.”
Nukwo Yesu kumugambira ati: “Muleke kumutanga, habwokuba weena atarukubahakaniza, ali habwanyu.”
Akasumi ka Yesu ak'okutwarwa omwiguru obu kairiire haihi, akamalirra kugenda Yerusaalemu.
Yatuma abakwenda kumwebembera. Bbo baagenda baataaha omu kyaro ky'Abasamaliya kumuteekaniriza.
Baitu abantu baayo baayanga kumutangirra, habwokuba akaba naahingura kugenda Yerusaalemu.
Abeegesebwa be Yakobbo na Yohaana obu baarozire kunu baamukaguza bati: “MUKAMA waitu, noogonza turagire omurro guruge omwiguru, gubahwerekereze?”
Baitu Yesu yabahindukira yabahana ati: [“Timurukumanya omwoyo ogu musemeriire kuba nagwo, habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu ataije kuhwerekereza obwomeezi bw'abantu, baitu okubujuna.”]
Nubwo bayeyongera kugenda omu kyaro ekindi.
Obu bakaba nibakyagenda, baitirana omuntu ayagambiire Yesu ati: “Ndaakuhonderaga hoona nambere oraakagendaga.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Eboha ziina ebiina byazo, n'enyonyi ziina ebiju byazo; baitu Omwana w'omuntu taina h'okuta omutwe.”
Yesu yagambira omuntu ondi ati: “Mpondera.” Baitu uwe yamugarukamu ati: “Mukama wange, kambanze ngende nziike taata.”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Leka abakafiiri baziike abafu baabo, baitu iwe genda orangirre obukama bwa Ruhanga.”
N'omuntu ondi yagamba ati: “Mukama wange, nyowe ninyija kukuhondera, baitu kambanze ngende ndage ab'owaitu.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Busaho n'omu arukulimisa ekyoma, akarora enyuma, asemeriire obukama bwa Ruhanga.”
Ebi obu byahoire, MUKAMA Yesu akakoma abandi nsanju na babiri yabatuma babiri babiri, bamwebebembere omu mbuga n'omu mbuga n'omu biikaro nambere akaba naija kubunga.
Yabagambira ati: “Eby'okugesa bingi, baitu abagesi nubo bake; habweki musabe MUKAMA w'eby'okugesa ayongere abakozi omu musiri gwe.
Irooko mugende, hati nimbatuma nk'ebyaana by'entaama ebirukugenda omu myaaga hagati.
Mutatwara ensahu ya sente, n'ey'ebyokulya, noobu zaakuba enkaito; mutaramukyaramukya omu muhanda.
Enju yoona ei muraataahamuga, mubanze mugambe muti: ‘Obusinge bube omunju enu!’
Obu haraaba harumu omuntu arukugonza obusinge, obusinge bwanyu buraikaraga nawe; baitu obu ataasangwemu, buraabagarukiraga.
Enju egi niyo mwikalemu nimunywa ebi baraabahaga, habwokuba omukozi asemerra kuheebwa empeera ye; kandi mutalijeerajeera.
Obu muraataahaga omu rubuga mukajwahukirirwa, mulye ebi baraabasemberezaaga,
mukize abarwaire baamwo, kandi mubagambire muti: ‘Obukama bwa Ruhanga bubairiire haihi.’
Baitu obu muraataahaga omu rubuga nambere baayanga kubajwahukirra, mugende omu makuute gaarwo, muganbe muti:
‘Nangwa n'ecuucu ey'orubuga rwanyu enyakuli ha bigere byaitu twagibateerateerra; baitu mumanye obukama bwa Ruhanga nkooku bubairiire haihi.’
Nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, Sodomu eriganyirwa kukira orubuga oru!”

“Olikibona iwe Korazini! Olikibona iwe Betisaida! Habwokuba ebyamahano ebyakoliirwe omuli inywe kakuba byakoliirwe omu Tiiro na Sidooni, baakubaire beegarukiremu ira bajwaire ebiguniya kandi baikaliire omu iju.
Baitu ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango Tiiro na Sidooni ziriganyirwa okukira inywe.
Kandi iwe Kafaranaumu olinyumizibwa ohike haiguru? Nangwa, oligarurwa hansi okuzimu!
“Weena anyakubahurra buli ahuliire nyowe; kandi weena arukunyanga buli ayangire Ogu ayantumiire.”
Nsanju na babiri bakagaruka basemeriirwe muno, nibagamba bati: “Waitu, emyoyo emibi nayo ekatuhurra habwawe!”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nkarora Sitaani naagwa nk'omurabyo ogurukuruga omwiguru.
Hati mbahaire obusobozi bw'okurubatirra enjoka n'enge, n'okurubatirra amaani goona ag'omunyanzigwa; kandi busaho kintu ekiribakora kubi.
Kyonka muleke kusemererwa habw'emyoyo emibi kubahurra; baitu musemererwe habwokuba amabara ganyu gahandiikirwe omwiguru.”

Kandi omu kasumi ako Mwoyo Ahikiriire akaijuza Yesu okusemererwa, nukwo uwe kugamba ati: “Ninkusiima Taata, iwe MUKAMA w'iguru n'ensi, habwokuba ebintu ebi, okabisereka ab'amagezi n'abarukwetegereza, wabisuukurra abaana bato. Ego Taata, habwokuba eki nikyo wasiimire.
Isenyowe akankwasa ebintu byona; kandi busaho n'omu amanyire Mwana okwihaho Ise, kandi busaho amanyire Ise okwihaho Mwana, na weena Mwana ou agonza kumusuukurra.”
Nubwo Yesu yahindukiire abeegesebwa be, yabagambira omu bihwa ati: “G'omugisa amaiso agarukurora inywe ebi murukurora!
Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Abarangi baingi n'abakama bakeegomba kurora ebi murukurora, baitu batabirole, n'okuhurra ebi murukuhurra, baitu batabihurre.”
Nubwo haimukire omwegesa w'ebiragiro kumulenga naakaguza ati: “Mwegesa, nkole ki okugwetwa omu bwomeezi obutahwaho?”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Omu Biragiro kikahandiikwa kita? Osomamu ota?”
Nandiki uwe ati: “Ogonzeege MUKAMA Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona, n'omwoyo gwawe gwona, n'amaani gaawe goona, n'amagezi gaawe goona; kandi ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.”
Yesu yamugambira ati: “Ogarukiremu kurungi; kora oti, kandi olyomeera.”
Baitu omwegesa w'ebiragiro, habw'okugonza kwerunga, yakaguza Yesu ati: “Kandi mutaahi wange nooha?”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Kiro kimu omusaija akaba naaruga Yerusaalemu naagenda Yeriko, yagwa omu banyagi abaamujwiremu engoye ze, baamuteera, baagenda baamusiga nahoijahoija.
Omu kasumi ako haabaho nyakatagara ow'akaba naaraba omu muhanda ogu. Obu yarozire omusaija ogu yamurabaho, yagenda.
Omuleevi nawe obu yahikireho yamurora, yamurabaho nka nyakatagara oli.
Baitu Omusamaliya ow'akaba naagenda omu muhanda ogu, yahika nambere ali. Obu yamurozire, yakwatwa embabazi,
yamwirra haihi, yaseesa amagita n'eviini omu bihuta bye, yabisemba. Hanyuma yamuta ha nsoro ye, yamuleeta omunju y'abagoonyi, nambere yamurwaliize.
Obwire obu bwakiire yakwata siringi ina, yaziha omulinzi w'enju y'abagoonyi, naagamba ati: ‘Omurwaze, obu ndigaruka kyona eki oliba oyongiireho, ndikikusasura.’
Hali abo abasatu, nooha ou orukurora ow'akaba ali mutaahi w'omusaija ogu ayagwire omu banyagi?”
Omwegesa w'ebiragiro yamugarukamu ati: “Ogu ayamugiriire embabazi.” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Na iwe genda okole oti.”
Obu bakaba nibagenda, Yesu yahika omu kyaro ekimu; omukazi arukwetwa Malita yamujwahukirra, yamutaahya omunju ye.
Malita akaba aina owanyina, ibara lye Mariya. Mariya ogu yaikarra haihi n'ebigere bya MUKAMA Yesu naahuliriza ebi akaba naayegesa.
Baitu Malita akaba naatalibanizibwa emirimo nyingi; nukwo kugenda hali Yesu naagamba ati: “MUKAMA wange, torukurora owanyina nyowe nkooku andekiire kuheereza nyenka? Mugambe, aije ankonyere!”
Baitu MUKAMA yamugarukamu ati: “Malita, Malita nootunturra kandi nootalibanizibwa ebintu bingi.
Ekirukwetaagwa kiri kimu kyonka. Mariya ayegomboize omugabo murungi ogutalimwihwaho.”
Yesu akaba ali mu kiikaro kimu naasaba; obu yamazire, omu ha beegesebwa be yamugambira ati: “MUKAMA waitu, twegese okusaba nka Yohaana oku yayegeseze abeegesebwa be.”
Nukwo Yesu kubagambira ati: “Obu muraabaga nimusaba, mugambege muti: ‘Isiitwe, ibara lyawe litiinwe, obukama bwawe bwije;
otuhe hati ebyokulya byaitu ebya buli kiro;
otuganyire ebibi byaitu, habwokuba na itwe tuganyira boona abatukora kubi; otatuleka tukoohebwa.’ ”
Kandi Yesu akabagambira ati: “Omuli inywe anyakwina munywani we, kakuba agenda owe omu itumbi akamusaba ati: ‘Munywani wange, nyohozaayo emigaati esatu;
habwokuba naizirwa omugenyi arugire hara, kandi tinyina kyokulya ky'okumuha!’
Baitu nyineeka akamugarukamu ati: ‘Leka kuntalibaniza; nkingire ira, nyowe n'abaana bange tubyamire. Tinsobora kwimuka kukuha eki orukwenda.’
Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Noobu araaba atarukugonza kwimuka kumuha eki arukusaba habw'obuganjani, baitu habw'okwongera kumujwahya naamwesengereza, naija kwimuka amuhe kyona eki arukwetaaga.
“Nikyo na nyowe ndukubagambirra nti: Musabe, muraaheebwa; muserre, muraazoora; mwerange, muraakingulirwa.
Habwokuba weena anyakusaba, aheebwa; anyakuserra, azoora; kandi anyakweranga, akingulirwa.
Muzaire ki omuli inywe anyakuha omwana we enjoka, kunu amusabire encu?
Rundi anyakuha omwana we enge, kunu amusabire ihuli?
Nukwo inywe ababi, obu muraaba nimusobora kuha abaana banyu ebirungi, Isiinywe ow'omwiguru talikiraho okuha Mwoyo Ahikiriire abo abarukumusaba?”
Yesu akaba naabinga ha muntu omwoyo omubi ogwamufoire kateta; omwoyo omubi obu gwamazire kumurugaho, omusaija yabaza. Nukwo abantu kuhunirra;
baitu abamu omuli bo baagamba bati: “Ogu abinga emyoyo emibi habwa Beelizebuli mukuru wayo.”
Aho abandi baamutega nibamusaba akarorwaho akarukuruga omu iguru.
Baitu Yesu habw'okumanya ebiteekerezo byabo yabagambira ati: “Obukama bwona obwebaganizaamu okurwanisangana, buhwerekerra. Kandi eka enyakwebaganizaamu nayo ehwerekerra.
Sitaani obu araaba ayebaganiizeemu kwerwanisa wenka, obukama bwe buliikaraho buta? Inywe mugamba ngu, obusobozi bwa Beelizebuli nubwo bunbingisa emyoyo emibi.
Obu kiraaba kiri kiti, kandi abaana banyu baagibingisa obusobozi bw'oha? Nahabweki nubo abalibacwera omusango.
Baitu obusobozi bwa Ruhanga obu buraaba buli nubwo obunbingisa emyoyo emibi, mumanye obukama bwa Ruhanga nkooku bubahikireho.
“Omuntu w'amaani obu aba aina ebyokurwanisa ebirukumara, alinda eka ye, nukwo ebintu bye biikara omu businge.
Baitu arukumukira amaani obu amuseesira, akamusingura, amunyagaho ebyokurwanisa bye byona ebi abaire naayesiga, kandi agaba ebi amunyagireho.
Atali habwange buli nampakaniza; kandi atasorooza na nyowe, ararangya.”
“Omwoyo omubi obu guba gumazire kuruga omu muntu, gugendagenda omu biikaro ebitarumu maizi niguserra h'okuhuumura. Obu gutazooraho, gugamba guti: ‘Kangarukeyo owange nambere naarugire.’
Obu gugaruka gusanga enju esingoliirwe kandi eteekaniziibwe kurungi.
Nubwo gugenda, guleeta endi musanju erukugukira obubi, ija ikara omu. Kandi omuntu ogu obwomeezi bwe bwa hanyuma buba bubi okukira obw'okubanza.”
Yesu obu akaba nakyagamba ebi, omukazi ow'akaba ali omu kitebe yaimukya iraka lye naagamba ati: “Y'omugisa enda eyakuzaire n'amabeere aga wayonkere!”
Baitu Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Abarukukira kuba b'omugisa nubo abahurra ekigambo kya Ruhanga bakakikwata!”
Ebitebe by'abantu obu byayeyongiire kukanya, Yesu yabagambira ati: “Abantu ab'ebiro binu, bantu babi! Nibasaba akarorwaho, baitu tibaliheebwa karorwaho okwihaho aka Yona.
Yona nkooku yabaire karorwaho ha bantu ba Nineve, n'Omwana w'omuntu nukwo aliba ha bantu ab'obusinge bunu.

Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, Omukamakati ow'Obukiizi bw'obulyo alyemerra n'abantu ab'ebiro binu abasingise omusango, habwokuba akaruga ha mpero y'ensi yaija okuhurra amagezi ya Solomooni; kandi hati arukukira Solomooni ali hanu.
Ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, abantu ba Nineve balyemerra basingise ab'obusinge bunu omusango; habwokuba bakeegarukamu obu baahuliire Yona ebi yabarangiriire; kandi hati arukukira Yona ali hanu!”
“Busaho muntu anyakumara kuhemba etaara akagisereka omu kisiika rundi akagijuumikira ekigega; baitu agihanika ha kikondo kyayo, nukwo abarukutaaha omu nju bahweze.
Eriiso lyawe niyo taara ey'omubiri; eriiso lyawe obu liba nirihweza, omubiri gwona guhwereza kimu; baitu eriiso obu liba litarukuhweza, omubiri gwawe nagwo guswekwa omwirima.
Habweki werinde, ekyererezi eki oinakyo kitaikara kufooka mwirima.
Omubiri gwona obu guraaba niguhwereza kimu, gutarumu ekyetwa omwirima, gwangasanira kimu, gubamulikira nkooku mwakumuliikirwe etaara.”
Yesu obu yamazire kubaza, Omufalisaayo akamweta kulya owe; yagenda yataaha omunju, yaikarra kulya.
Omufalisaayo yahunirra okurora Yesu naalya atabandize kunaaba.
Nukwo MUKAMA Yesu kumugambira ati: “Inywe Abafalisaayo, mwogya ebikopo n'esahaani haruguru, baitu omu nda mwijwire obunyagi n'obubi.
Ha, badoma inywe! Ayahangire ebya haruguru tinuwe ayahangire n'eby'omu nda?
Haakire ebintu ebi mwinabyo mubigabirege abanaku, nukwo ebindi byona birisemerezebwa habwanyu.

“Baitu mulikibona inywe Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba muha Ruhanga ekicweka kya ikumi eky'omubwiga n'eyobyo n'emikubi endi, baitu obwinganiza n'okugonza Ruhanga timubifaaho. Ebi nibyo mwakufiireho, kandi ebindi nabyo muleke kubinagaija.
“Mulikibona inywe Abafalisaayo! Habwokuba mugonza ebiikaro eby'ekitiinisa omu masorrokaniro, n'okuramukibwa omu butale.
Mulikibona inywe! Habwokuba muli nk'ebituuro ebitarukurorwa, abantu ebi barubataho batamanyire.”
Nubwo omu ha beegesa b'ebiragiro yamugambiire ati: “Mwegesa, obu orukugamba oti, buli na itwe otujumire!”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Mulikibona na inywe abeegesa b'ebiragiro! Mutweka abantu ebintu ebiremiire muno, kandi kunu inywe mutarukutaho n'orukumo kubakoonyera kubyetweka.
Mulikibona inywe abombekera abarangi ebituuro, kandi kunu nubo abaisirwe abaisenkuru inywe.
Nukwo na inywe muli bakaiso kandi nimugumya baisenkuru inywe ebi baakozire. Bbo bakabaita, kandi inywe nimwombeka ebituuro byabo.
“Nikyo Ruhanga yagambiire omu Magezi ge ati: ‘Ndibatumira abarangi n'abakwenda; abamu omuli bo balibaita kandi abandi balibahiiganiza.’
Nukwo ab'ebiro binu bajunaanwe esagama y'abarangi boona eyaseesekere kuruga hakuhangwa kw'ensi.
Okuruga ha sagama y'Abberi okuhika ha ya Zakaliya ou baitiire hagati y'itambiro n'ekiikaro ekirukwera. Mazima nimbagambira nti: Abantu ab'ebiro binu balijunaanwa esagama yabo.
Mulikibona inywe abeegesa b'ebiragiro! Habwokuba mukaihaho ekisumuruzo eky'orwigi orw'okumanya. Inywe inywenka timwataahamu, kandi n'abandi abakaba nibenda kutaahamu mwabatanga.”
Yesu obu akaba naaruga omunju egi, abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo baatandika kumuteeza muno empaka, baamukaguliriza ha bintu bingi,
bakaba nibamutega emitego nukwo bamukwasize ha bigambo ebi araabagarukamu.
Omu kasumi ako, abantu enkumi n'enkumi obu baayesoroize hamu, bakaba nibasindikangana, Yesu yabanza kugambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafalisaayo, nubwo obugobya bwabu.
Busaho ekiswekeriirwe ekitalisuukurwa, rundi ekiserekerwe ekitalimanywa.
Kyona kyona eki mwagambiire omu mwirima kirihulirwa omusana nigujwa; n'eki mwahwehweteriire omu bisiika ebya ha rubaju kirirangirirwa ha rusu rw'enju.”
“Banywani bange kambagambire nti: Muleke kutiina abo abaita omubiri kunu bataina kindi eki basobora kukora ekirukukira aho.
Kambagambire ow'okutiina. Mutiine Ogu anyakumara kwita, akagira n'obusobozi obw'okunaga omu murro ogutaraara. Mazimakwo Ogu nuwe mutiinege!
“Ebisirya bitaano tibigurwa sente abiri? Kandi kunu busaho na kimu halibyo ekyeba omu maiso ga Ruhanga.
Isoke lya ha mitwe yanyu nalyo libazirwe lyona. Nahabweki muleke kutiina. Inywe muli b'omuhendo mwingi kukira ebisirya bingi!”
“Nimbagambira nti: Omuntu weena alinnyatura omumaiso g'abantu, Omwana w'omuntu nawe alimwatura omumaiso ga bamalaika ba Ruhanga;
kandi weena alinyehakana omumaiso g'abantu, Omwana w'omuntu alimwehakana omumaiso ga bamalaika ba Ruhanga.
Weena anyakugamba kubi ha Mwana w'omuntu aliganyirwa; baitu anyakujuma Mwoyo Ahikiriire taliganyirwa.
Obu baraabaleeta omu masorrokaniro, rundi hali ab'obusobozi, rundi hali abalemi kubanyegerra, muleke kutuntura nkooku muraagarukamu nimwetonganirra, rundi eki muraagamba;
habwokuba Mwoyo Ahikiriire alibeegesa omu kasumi ako eki musemeriire kugamba.”
Omuntu omu hali abo abakaba bali omu kitebe akagambira Yesu ati: “Mwegesa, gambira mugenzi wange tubagane obugwetwa bwaitu.”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Musaija iwe, nooha yantaireho kubacwera omusango, rundi kubabaganirizaamu abintu byanyu?”
Yayongera yabagambira ati: “Mwegendereze kandi mwerinde okwegomba kwona, habwokuba obwomeezi bw'omuntu tibubaho habw'itungo eringi eri ainalyo.”
Nukwo kubacwera orufumo runu ati: “Hakaba haroho omuguuda anyakwina itaka lye eryayereze ebirimwa bingi.
Kandi uwe yabanza kwekaguza ati: ‘Nkole ki? Tinyina h'okuhunika ebirimwa byange byona.’
Yagamba ati: ‘Kinu nikyo ndaakora. Ndaaseesa enguli zange, nyombekemu enkooto nambere ndihunika oburo bwange hamu n'ebintu byange ebindi.
Obu nubwo ndyehuuma nti Nyeyahuliire ebintu ebirimmazaaho emyaka nyingi erukwija. Kampuumule, ndye, nywe, nyegonze.’
Baitu Ruhanga yamugambira ati: ‘Mudoma iwe! Kiro kya hati oraihwaho obwomeezi bwawe. Ebintu byona ebi wayeyahuliire biriba by'oha?’
Nukwo kiba kiti hali ogu ayeyahurra itungo lingi omu nsi, kunu munaku omu maiso ga Ruhanga.”
Nubwo Yesu yagambiire abeegesebwa be ati: “Nikyo ndukubagambirra nti: Mutalitunturra obwomeezi bwanyu eki muraalyaga rundi, omubiri gwanyu eki muraajwaraga.
Habwokuba obwomeezi bw'omuhendo kukira ebyokulya, n'omubiri gw'omuhendo kukira ebyokujwara.
Murole ebingoora: tibisiga, tibigesa, tibigira nguli noobu haakuba ahandi h'okuhunika; baitu nabwo Ruhanga abiriisa. Inywe ka nimukirra kimu enyonyi!
Nooha omuli inywe, noobu atuntura ata, akusobora kwongeraho akasumikake ha bwomeezi bwe?
Obu muraaba mutarukusobora kukora akantu kake nk'ako, ebindi nibibatuntuliza ki?
Murorre ha byakyo nkooku bikura: tibiruka kandi tibyongosa; baitu nimbagambira nti: Nangwa na Solomooni omu kitiinisa kye kyona atajwale kurungi okwingana ekimu hali byo.
Ruhanga obu araaba ajweka ati ebinyansi ebiroho hati, nyenkya bikanagwa ha kikoomi, talikiraho muno kujweka inywe abaina okwikiriza kuke?
Mulekege okumaliza omutima ha ki muraalyaga n'eki muraanywaga, noobu kwakuba kubitunturra.
Habwokuba ebi byona Abanyamahanga b'omunsi munu nibyo baitanira. Baitu Isiinywe amanyire nkooku murukubyetaaga.
Ekirikukira, inywe mubanze muserre obukama bwe, n'ebi byona biribongerwaho.”
“Mutatiina inywe igana erike! Habwokuba Isiinywe akasiima kubaha obukama.

Mutunde ebi mwinabyo, mugabire abaseege; mwetungire ensahu za sente ezitarukukura, kandi mwahule itungo eritahwaho omwiguru, omusuma nambere atalisobora kulihikaho kandi enkugutu nambere italisobora kulisisa.
Habwokuba itungo lyanyu nambere liri, oku nuho n'emitima yanyu eraikaraga.”
“Mwikale mweteekaniize, mweteegere emyeko, n'etaara zanyu nizaaka.
Mube nk'abantu abarukulindirra mukama wabo arukugaruka naaruga ha bugenyi bw'obugole. Obu aija akateera ha rwigi, bamukingurra bwango.
B'omugisa abaheereza abo mukama wabu aba alisanga nibarora. Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Alyeteega omweko, abaikalize, abaheereze.
Kakuba agaruka omu kisisiimuko ekyakabiri rundi ha nkoko y'okubanza akabasanga nibarora, baina omugisa abaheereza abo!
“Kinu mukimanye, kakuba nyineeka yamanyire esaaha omusuma ei arukwiziramu, yakwikaire naarora, nukwo omusuma aleke kucwa enju ye.
Na inywe mwikale mweteekaniize, habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu aliija omu kasumi aka mutarukumunihirramu.”
Nubwo Petero yamukagwize ati: “MUKAMA wange, orufumo runu orucweriire itwe, nandiki abantu boona?”
MUKAMA yamugarukamu ati: “Muheereza ki omwesigwa kandi ow'amagezi, mukama we ou akwasa ebintu bye, kurolerra eka ye n'okuha abantu be ebyokulya byabo omu kasumi kaabyo?
Omuheereza ogu ahiirirwe mukama we obu aliija akamusanga naakora ati.
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Mukama we alimukwasa kurolerra ebintu bye byona.

Kyonka omuheereza ogu kakuba ateekereza omu mutima gwe ati: ‘Mukama wange aikaireyo, tarukwija bwango,’ akatandika kuteera abaheereza bataahi be abasaija n'abakazi, akeeta ha kulya, kunywa, n'okutamiira,
mukama we obu aligaruka ha kiro eki atarukumunihirramu na ha kasumi ak'atamanyire, alimufubira muno, kandi amubarre omuli abo abatarukwesigwa.
“Omuheereza ogu ayamanyire mukama we eki arukwenda, kandi tiyataho mutima kukikora, aliteerwa muno;

baitu omuheereza ataramanyire mukama we eki yayenzire, kandi yakora ekisemeriire kumufubiza, ogu aliteerwa kake. Anyakuheebwa bingi, alikaguzibwa bingi; n'anyakukwasibwa bingi muno, alisabwa bingi muno.”
“Nkaija kuhemba omurro omunsi; haa, kakuba gubaire gwakire!
Nkyaina omulingo ogw'okufa ogu ndukwija kufaamu; kandi nintuntura okuhika obu kulikahikirra!
Nimuteekereza ngu, nkaija okuleeta obusinge, omu nsi? Nangwa, nimbagambira nti: Ntaije kuleeta obusinge baitu nkaija kuleeta okwebaganizaamu.
Okuruga hati enju enyakurumu abantu bataano eraayebaganizaamu: abasatu bahakanize ababiri, n'ababiri bahakanize abasatu.
Ise omwana alyebaganiza ha mutabani we, n'omutabani hali ise; omukazi alyebaganiza na muhara we na muhara we hali nyina; nyinazaara alyebaganiza ha mukamwana, na mukamwana hali nyinazaara.”
Yesu akongera kugambira ebitebe by'abantu ati: “Obu murora ekicu nikiimuka Bugwa-izooba, ahonaaho mugamba muti: ‘Enjura niija kugwa’, kandi egwakwo.
N'obu murora omuyaga niguteera nigwiha Bukiizi bw'obulyo, mugamba muti: ‘Nihaija kujwa omusana mwingi’, kandi gujwakwo.
Bagobya inywe! Obusumi bw'omusana n'enjura mubukengera ha kurora ensi n'iguru; habwaki mutakenga amakuru ag'obusumi bunu?”
“Kiki ekirukubalemesa kucwamu ekihikire?

Obu oraaba noogenda omukooti, lengaho kwikirraniza na kinyegerra mukyali omu muhanda; nukwo aleke kukutwara hali omucwi w'emisango, omucwi w'emisango akakukwasa omuserikale, n'omuserikale akakuta omu nkomo.
Ninkugambira nti: Toliruga omu nkomo okuhikya obu olikasasurra kimu akasente koona akasigaireyo.”
Omu kasumi ako hakabaho abantu abamu abamanyisize Yesu ha by'Abagaliraaya abaisirwe Pilato obu yabasangire nibatamba ebyonzira.
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nimuteekereza Abagaliraaya banu nubo bakaba bali basiisi okukira Abagaliraaya abandi, nikyo baabonaboniire bati?
Nangwa, nimbagambira nti: Na inywe obu mutalyegarukamu, nukwo mulihwerekerra muti.
Rundi nimuteekereza abantu ikumi na munaana bali, abaatiirwe omunaara gwa Silohamu gwabaita, nubo bakaba baina omusango ogurukukira ogw'abantu abandi abaikaraga Yerusaalemu?
Nangwa, nimbagambira nti: Na inywe obu mutalyegarukamu, nukwo mulihwerekerra muti.”
Aho Yesu akabaganikiza oruganikyo runu ati: “Omusaija akaba aina omuti gw'omutini ogwameezire omu rugonjo rwe orw'emizaabbibbu. Akaija kuguserraho ebijuma, tiyabisangaho.
Yagambira omulimi w'emizaabbibbu ati: ‘Hati nakamara emyaka esatu ninyija kuserra ebijuma ha muti gunu omutini, ntarukusangaho kantu. Guteme! Nigusiisira ki itaka?’
Baitu omulimi yamugarukamu ati: ‘Waitu, haakire guleke gumale omwaka gunu. Mbanze ngulimirre, nguteho n'ebyokuguleetera orwezo.
Omwaka ogurukwija obu gulyana, kiriba kirungi, obu gutalyana nubwo tuligutema.’ ”
Ha kiro kya Sabbato, Yesu akaba naayegesa omu isorrokaniro erimu.
Hakaba haroho omukazi ow'akaba aina omwoyo omubi ogwamucekeze kumara emyaka ikumi na munaana; akaba ayegemere, atarukusobora kwegorra.
Yesu obu yamuboine, yamweta ati: “Mukazi iwe, okiziibwe endwara yaawe!”
Yamutaho emikono, ahonaaho omukazi yagorroka, yakugiza Ruhanga.

Omukuru w'isorrokaniro yabiihirwa habw'okurora Yesu akirize omuntu ha Sabbato. Nukwo kugambira abali aho ati: “Abantu baina ebiro mukaaga ebi basemeriire kukorramu emirimo. Nahabweki mwijege omu biro ebi, mukiziibwe; baitu hatali ha Sabbato!”
Nubwo MUKAMA Yesu yamugarukiremu ati: “Bagobya inywe! Haroho omuli inywe atasibura ente ye rundi endogoyi ha Sabbato akagitwara kugyesera amaizi?
Omukazi ogu, omwijukuru wa Abburahamu, Sitaani ou yazingazingire okumara emyaka ikumi na munaana; nawe tasemeriire okuzingururwa ha kiro kya Sabbato?”
Obu yabalize ebigambo ebi, abanyanzigwa be boona baakwatwa ensoni; baitu ekitebe ky'abantu baasemererwa habw'ebyamahano byona ebi yakozire.
Yesu yagamba ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga nibusisana buta? Ndabulengesaniza na ki?
Nibusisana akasigo ka karadaali omuntu aka yatwaire yabyara omu musiri gwe, kakakura, kaafooka kisaka kikooto, n'enyonyi zaayombeka ebiju byazo omu mataagi gaakyo.”
Yesu yayongera yagamba ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga ndabulengesaniza na ki?
Nibusisana ekitumbisa omukazi eki yajwanganiize omu bihi bisatu eby'ensaano okuhika yoona obu yatumbire.”
Yesu akagenda naayegesa omu mbuga n'omu byaro, akwasire omuhanda oguraamuhikya Yerusaalemu.
Nubwo omuntu omu yamukagwize ati: “Mukama wange, abo abalijunwa baliba bake?” Yesu yamugarukamu ati:
“Mwekambe kutaaha nimuraba omu irembo erifunzire. Nimbagambira nti: Abantu baingi balirengaho okulirabamu, baitu tibalisobora.
“Nyineeka obu alikamara kukinga orwigi, mulyemerra aheeru nimweranga muti: ‘Waitu, tukingurre!’ Uwe alibagarukamu ati: ‘Tindukumanya nambere murukuruga.’
Nubwo mulitandika kwetonda muti: ‘Twalyaaga na iwe twanywaga na iwe, kandi wayegesaaga omu makuute g'owaitu.’
Nandiki uwe ati: ‘Mbagambiire: tindukumanya nambere murukuruga! Mundugeho inywe enkozi z'ebibi!’
Obu nubwo haliba okurra n'okunena ensaya, obu mulirora Abburahamu, Isaaka, Yakobbo n'abarangi boona bali omu bukama bwa Ruhanga, kandi kunu inywe mutangiirwe aheeru!
Abantu baliruga Burugaizooba na Bugwaizooba, ha Bukiizi obw'emoso na Bukiizi bw'obulyo baikarre ha bugenyi omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Mumanye nkooku abamu ab'enyuma baliba b'okubanza, kandi abamu ha b'okubanza baliba b'enyuma.”
Omu kasumi ako konyini, Abafalisaayo abamu bakaija baagambira Yesu bati: “Ruga hanu ogende, habwokuba Herode nagonza kukwita.”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Eboha egi, mugende mugigambire muti: ‘Hati na ijo nimbinga emyoyo emibi, ninkiza n'abarwaire, kandi ha kiro kya kasatu nubwo ndimalirra omulimo gwange.’
Baitu hati na ijo na ijweri ndi w'okweyongera omu maiso. Tikihikire omurangi okwitirwa aheeru y'orubuga Yerusaalemu.

“Yerusaalemu, Yerusaalemu iwe anyakwita abarangi kandi anyakuteeza amabaale abakwenda abakutumiirwe! Kaingaha obu nagondeze kusorooza abaana baawe nk'enkoko oku ebumbatira obwana bwayo omu mapapa gaayo, baitu mwayanga!
Hati murole: Enju yanyu neija kusigara eri kifurukwa. Kandi nyowe nimbagambira nti: Timulindora okuhikya obu muligamba muti: ‘W'omugisa ogu arukwija omu ibara lya MUKAMA.’ ”
Ha kiro kya Sabbato, Yesu obu yagenzire kulya omunju y'omu ha bakuru b'Abafalisaayo, abantu boona baamuhanga amaiso.
Omu kitebe hagati hakaba haroho omusaija ow'akaba azimbire emikono n'amaguru.
Nukwo Yesu kukaguza abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'Abafalisaayo ati: “Ebiragiro nibitwikiriza kukiza ha Sabbato rundi nangwa?”
Bbo baahuna kwonka. Nukwo Yesu kukwataho omusaija yamukiza, yamwohereza agende.
Hanyuma yabagambira ati: “Nooha omuli inywe anyakwina endogoyi rundi ente, kakuba egwa omu iziba ha Sabbato, ataakugiihiremu ahonaaho ha kiro eki?”
Eki nakyo batasobole kukigarukamu.
Yesu obu yarozire abagenyi abamu nkooku beekomiire ebiikaro eby'ekitiinisa, nubwo yabacweriire orufumo runu ati:
“Obu baraakuraaliza ha bugenyi bw'obugole, leka kwikarra omu kiikaro ky'ekitiinisa, tihaikara kubaho omuntu arukukukiza ekitiinisa ayaraaliziibwe;
kandi ayabaraaliize inywembi akaija akakugamba ati: ‘Rugiza omuntu onu.’ Nukwo okagenda n'ensoni kwikarra omu kiikaro eky'enyuma.

Kakuba oraalizibwa, genda oikarre omu kiikaro ekitali ky'ekitiinisa, kikuraaliza obu aija hali iwe akugambire ati: ‘Munywani wange, ija oikarre omumaiso.’ Kinu kirikuhaisa ekitiinisa omu maiso g'abagenyi abandi boona.
Habwokuba weena anyakwenyumiza, alibundaaziba; kandi anyakwebundaaza, alinyumizibwa.”

Kandi Yesu yagambira ayamuraaliize ati: “Obu oraabaga ocumbiire abantu ebyokulya ebya nyamusana rundi otaralizaaga bagenzi baawe, rundi beene banyu, rundi abaguuda bataahi baawe, tibaikara kukuraaliza nkooku wabaraaliize, kandi buli osaswirwe.
Baitu obu oraateekaga obugenyi, oraalizeege abanaku, ebizingo, abalema n'abafu b'amaiso.
Nubwo oliheebwa omugisa, habwokuba bbo, tibaina eki basobora kukugarurra, kandi iwe olisasurwa ha kuhumbuuka kw'abahikiriire.”
Omu ha bantu abakaba baikaliire nibalya nawe, obu yahuliire eki, yagambira Yesu ati: “Aina omugisa ogu ow'alirya ebyokulya omu bugenyi bw'omu bukama bwa Ruhunga!”
Baitu Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Hakaba haroho omusaija ayateekere obugenyi bwingi, yaraaliza abantu baingi.
Akasumi k'obugenyi obu kaahikire, yatuma omuheereza we kugambira abaaraaliziibwe ati: ‘Mwije, byona biteekaniziibwe.’
Baitu boona baatandika kwekasa omu-omu. Ow'okubanza yagambira omuheereza ati: ‘Nguzire ekibanja, kimpikiriire kugenda kukirora. Nkesengeriize onganyire.’
Ondi yagamba ati: ‘Nguzire ente ikumi, hati ningenda kwirengesa. Nkwesengeriize, onganyire.’
Ondi yagamba ati: ‘Nubwo ndugire kugabura, nikyo kintangire kwija.’

“Omuheereza yagarukayo, ebi byona yabigambira mukama we. Nubwo nyineeka yakwasirwe ekiniga, yaragira omuheereza we ati: ‘Rahuka, ogende omu nguudo z'omu rubuga n'omu mihanda yarwo, oleete abanaku, ebizingo, abafu b'amaiso, n'abalema.’
Omu kasumi kake omuheereza yagaruka kumugambira ati: ‘Waitu, eki oragiire, kikozirwe; baitu nabwo hakyaroho omwanya.’
Nubwo mukama we yamuragiire ati: ‘Irooko ogende omu nguudo enkooto n'omu mihanda y'omu byaro, ohambirize abantu baije, nukwo enju yange ijule.
Baitu nimbagambira nti: Busaho n'omu ha bantu abo abaaraaliziibwe alirya ha bugenyi bwange.’ ”
Ebitebe by'abantu baingi bikaba nibihondera Yesu mbere arukugenda. Uwe yahinduka yabagambira ati:
“Weena anyakwija nambere ndi, ateerekeseze ise na nyina, mukazi we n'abaana, bagenzi be n'abanyaanya, nangwa n'obwomeezi bwe, ogu tasobora kuba mwegesebwa wange.
Weena ateetweka musaraba gwe akampondera, tasobora kuba mwegesebwa wange.
“Nooha omuli inywe anyakugonza kwombeka omunaara, atabanza kwikarra akabalirra ebiragwombeka; akamanya ngu, aina sente ezirukumara omulimo?
Kakuba atabalirra, obu aliba amazire kulima omusingi, kandi akasangwa atarukusobora kumara omulimo gwona, nubwo boona abaligurora balitandika kumusekeereza,
nibagamba bati: ‘Omuntu onu akatandika kwombeka, baitu tiyasobora kumaliriza!’
“Rundi mukama ki anyakugonza kuramagira omukama ondi, atabanza kwikarra akahanuura nkooku araasobora n'abaserikale be omutwaro gumu kurwanisa omukama ondi anyakwina abaserikale emitwaro ebiri?
Kakuba arora nkooku atarukusobora, atuma abakwenda okutangatangana omukama ogu akyali hara, naasaba obusinge.
Na inywe nukwo kiba kiti, tiharoho n'omu anyakusobora kuba mwegesebwa wange, ateerekeseze byona ebi ainabyo.”
“Ekisura kirungi, baitu obu kihoibwamu orusa ruligarurwamu ruta?
Tikiina mugaso ha itaka noobu haakuba ha rubungo. Kisigarra kunagwa abantu. Anyakwina amatu, ahurre!”
Kiro kimu abasorooza b'omusoro n'abantu abateekerezebwaga kuba babi, boona bakeesorooleza hali Yesu kumuhuliriiza.
Abafalisaayo n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro obu baarozire eki, baatontoroma nibagamba bati: “Ntamanya omuntu onu ajwahukirra abantu babi, n'okulya alya nabo!”
Nubwo Yesu yabaganikiize oruganikyo runu ati:
“Muntu ki omuli inywe anyakwina entaama kikumi, emu kakuba emuburaho, ataleka kyenda na mwenda omu kisaka akagenda kuserra enyakubuzire, okuhikya obu agizoora?
Obu amara kugizoora, agita ha mabega aijwire omuhimbo.
Obu ahika omuka ayeta banywani be n'abataahi, abagambira ati: ‘Bagenzi bange, katusemererwe hamu habwokuba entaama yange ey'abaire ebuzire ngizoire.’
Nikyo ndukubagambira nti: Halibaho okusemererwa kwingi omwiguru habw'omusiisi omu anyakwegarukamu, kukira abantu ab'engeso nungi kyenda na mwenda abatarukwetaaga kwegarukamu.”
“Rundi mukazi ki anyakwina siringi ikumi, emu kakuba emuburaho atahemba etaara, akasingorra enju, akaserra hoona hoona okuhikya obu agizoora?
Obu amara kugizoora, ayeta banywani be n'abataahi nabagambira ati: ‘Bagenzi bange, katusemererwe hamu, habwokuba siringi yange ey'ebaire ebuzire ngizoire.’
Nikyo ndukubagambira nti: Abamalaika ba Ruhanga nukwo basemererwa bati habw'omusiisi omu anyakwegarukamu.”
Aho Yesu yagamba ati: “Hakaba haroho omusaija ow'akaba aina abatabani babiri.
Omuto akasaba ise ati: ‘Taata, mpa omugabo gw'obugwetwa bwange.’ Nubwo isebo yabaganizeemu itungo, yalibaha.
Obu haahingwireho ebiro bike, omuto yasorooza ebintu bye byona, yagenda omunsi ya hara. Oku nuho yabisiisire omu ngeso mbi.
“Obu yayemaliireho kimu buli kantu, nubwo haagwire kiihe omunsi egi. Omusigazi yatandika kutaaga habw'okutaa n'akantu.
Aho yagenda kukorra omusi w'ensi egi. Omuntu ogu yamusindika kuliisa empunu omu iriisizo lye.
Obu akaba naaliisa yayegomba kulya ebisusu empunu ebi zaalyaga, baitu busaho muntu ayamuhaire akookulya.
Obu, yayetiire, yagamba ati: Abakozi baingaha aba isenyowe abarukulya nibaiguta, bikabalema n'okubalema; baitu nyowe hanu, enjara y'okunyita!
Kanyimuke ngende hali isenyowe mmugambire nti: ‘Taata, nkasiisa hali Ruhanga na hali iwe.
Tinkyasemerra n'okwetwa mwana waawe; haakire onfoole nk'omu ha bakozi baawe.’
Nubwo yaimukire yakwata ogw'okumugarra hali ise. “Obu akaba akyali haraho, ise yamumanyirra, yamukwatirwa embabazi. Nubwo yairukire, yamugwa omu kifuba.
Baitu omwana yagamba ati: ‘Taata nkasiisa hali Ruhanga na hali iwe. Tinkyasemerra n'okwetwa mwana waawe.’
Ise yayeta abaheereza be nagamba ati: ‘Nyabura inywe mundahukize ekijwaro nyaburungi, mukimujweke. Mumute empeta omu rukumu n'enkaito omu bigere.
Muleete esajwa, mugiite, tucumbe obugenyi; tulye tusemererwe.
Omwana wange onu ow'akaba afiire, hati mwomeezi: akaba azaahire, hati azaahukire.’ Baatandika kusemererwa.
“Omu kasumi ako, omutabani omukuru akaba ali ha musiri. Obu akaba naagaruka, ali haihi kutaaha, yahurra engoma n'ebizina.
Yayeta omu ha baheereza, yamukaguza ekinyakuroho omu ka.
Nandiki omuheereza ati: ‘Muto waawe agarukire, kandi isiinywe amwitiire esajwa habwokuba agarukire n'obusinge kandi mwomeezi.’
Omukuru nukwo kukwatwa ekiniga yayanga okutaaha omunju. Ise yaturuka aheeru yamwesengereza ataahe.
Yagarukamu ise ati: ‘Nyowe mmazire emyaka enu yoona ninkuheereza. Tinkakweremeraga omurundi na gumu. Baitu tokampaga nangwa n'akabuzi nkasemererwaho n'abanywani bange.
Baitu mutabani waawe ogu ayasiisire itungo lye omu bamalaaya, obu agarukire, omwitiire esajwa!’
Ise yamugarukamu ati: ‘Mwana wange, obutoosa otaaha na nyowe, kandi ebyange byona byawe.
Baitu kihikire okukora obugenyi bunu n'okusemererwa, habwokuba muto waawe ow'akaba afiire, hati mwomeezi; akaba azaahire, hati azaahukire.’ ”
Yesu akagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Hakaba haroho omusaija muguuda ow'akaba aina omukeeto we. Baamumunyegerraho nkooku akaba naasiisasiisa ebintu bye.
Nukwo kumweta yamukaguza ati: ‘Kiki kinu eki ndukuhurra hali iwe? Mbarra eby'obukeeto bwawe, habwokuba tokyagaruka kuba mukeeto wange.’
Omukeeto nukwo kwekaguza ati: ‘Nyowe ndagira nta? Mukama wange naija kunyihaho obukeeto! Tinyina maani g'okulima, n'okusabiiriza nikunkwasa ensoni.
Otyo, hati naacwamu eki ndaakora ekirintaahya omu maka gaabo obu ndiba mbingirwe omu bukeeto.’
Nubwo yakeesire abanyamabanja ba mukama we omu-omu, yakaguza ow'okubanza ati: ‘MUKAMA wange naakutonga ki?’
Yamugarukamu ati: ‘Naatonga encundiro z'amagita kikumi.’ Omukeeto yamugambira ati: ‘Kwata orupapura oruroho ibanja lyawe, ikarra bwango, ohandiike makumi ataano.’
Yakaguza ondi ati: ‘Kandi iwe naakutonga ki?’ Yamugarukamu ati: ‘Naatonga ebigega by'engano kikumi.’ Omukeeto yamugambira ati: ‘Kwata orupapura oruroho ibanja, ohandiike ebigega kinaana.’
Mukama w'omukeeto onu enkurungutaniza akamusiima habw'amagezi ge; habwokuba abantu b'ensi enu baina amagezi ag'okukorrana n'abagenzi baabu okukira abantu b'omusana.
“Nikyo ndukubagambira nti: Itungo ly'obugobya libakonyere kwetungira enganjani. Hanyuma obu lirihwaho nubwo balibatangirra babataahye omu bwikaro obutalihwaho.”
“Weena anyakwesigwa omu bintu bike, ayesigwa n'omu bingi; kandi ataba mwesigwa omu bintu bike, n'omu bingi tayesigwa.
Obu muraaba mutarabaire beesigwa omu itungo ly'ensi, nooha alibakwasa itungo ery'amazima?
Obu muraaba mutarabaire beesigwa omu kurolerra eby'abandi, nooha alibaha ekyanyu kukirolerra?
“Tiharoho muheereza anyakusobora kuheereza abakama babiri. Alinobaho omu, agonze ondi; rundi aligumira hali omu, agaye ondi. Timusobora kuheereza Ruhanga n'okwemarra ha itungo ly'ensi.”
Abafalisaayo abagonzaaga itungo ly'ensi obu baahuliire ebi byona, baamusekeereza.
Nukwo Yesu kubagambira ati: “Inywe mweyoleka nk'abarungi omu maiso g'abantu, baitu Ruhanga amanyire emitima yanyu. Habwokuba abantu eki banyumiza, Ruhanga akinuga.

“Ebiragiro n'eby'Abarangi bikaba nibikora okuhika omu biro bya Yohaana Omubatiza; okurugirra obu, Amakuru Amarungi ag'obukama bwa Ruhanga gaikara nigarangirirwa, kandi buli omu ataho omutima okubutaahamu.
Nikirahuka iguru n'ensi kuhwaho, okukira akacweka kamu ak'enyuguta kudiba omu Biragiro.”
“Omuntu weena anyakubinga mukazi we akaswera ondi aba asiihaine; kandi n'omusaija anyakuswera omukazi abingirwe, nawe aba asiihaine.”
“Hakaba haroho omusaija omuguuda ayajwaraga engoye eza kahukya n'ezindi ezirukunekaneka. Buli kiro yalyaga kandi yanywaga kurungi, ataina ekimuburaho.
Kandi ha irembo lye habyamahoga omusaija omunaku, ibara lye Lazaaro, ow'akaba acwekacwekere ebihooya.
Yayegombaga kulya oburagalika obwarugaga ha meeza y'omuguuda; kandi embwa zaijaga nizikomba ebihooya bye.
“Hanyuma omunaku ogu yafa, abamalaika baamutwara baamuhikya Abburahamu nambere aikara. Omuguuda nawe yafa, yaziikwa.
Obu akaba ali okuzimu omu busaalizi bwingi, yaimukya amaiso yarora Abburahamu ali hara, na Lazaaro amuheriire.
Yayamirra naagamba ati: ‘Taata Abburahamu, ngirra embabazi! Otume Lazaaro aibike ensonga y'orukumo rwe omu maizi, aije anfukirize orulimi, habwokuba nimbabirirwa muno omu murro gunu!’

Baitu Abburahamu yamugarukamu ati: ‘Mwana wange, ijuka nkooku watungire ebirungi bingi obu okaba okyali omu nsi; Lazaaro we akabona enaku; baitu hati ahuumizibwe hanu, kandi iwe oli omu busaalizi bwingi.
Tikiri eki kyonka; hagati yaitu na inywe haroho omwanya mukooto ogurukutanga boona abagonza kuruga hanu kwija oku, rundi okuruga oku kwija kunu.’
“Omuguuda yagamba ati: ‘Hati nu Taata, ninkwesengereza otume Lazaaro omu ka ya Isenyowe,
habwokuba nyinayo bagenzi bange bataano. Abahabule bataliikara kwija omu kiikaro kinu eky'amabone.’
Abburahamu yamugarukamu ati: ‘Bagenzi baawe baina ebyahandiikirwe Musa n'abarangi, leka bahondere ebi.’
Omuguuda yagarukamu ati: ‘Nangwa, Taata Abburahamu! Kakuba habaho omuntu ayahumbuukire omu bafu, akabahikaho, baakwegarukiremu.’
Nandiki Abburahamu ati: ‘Obu baraaba batarukuhurra Musa n'abarangi, tibarukwija kunanuka, noobu haraabaho anyakuhumbuukire omu bafu.’”
Yesu akagambira abeegesebwa be ati: “Ebyesiitazo tibiri by'okuburaho; baitu alikibona ogu anyakubireeta!
Haakire abohwe orubengo omu bikya anagwe omu nyanja, okukira kwesiitaza omuha baana abato banu.”
“Na inywe mwerinde! Mugenzi waawe obu araasiisaga, omuhanege. Obu araayegarukamuga, omuganyirege.
Kakuba naakusobeza emirundi musanju omu kiro kimu, kandi naakwizira buli murundi naagamba ati: ‘Nzizire’, na iwe omuganyirege.”
Abakwenda baasaba MUKAMA Yesu bati: “Twongereho okwikiriza!”
Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Kakuba mwina okwikiriza okurukwingana akasigo ka karadaali, mwakuragiire omutoma ogu muti: ‘Sinduka, oyebyale omu nyanja!’ Gwakubahuliire.”
“Nooha omuli inywe anyakwina omuheereza arukumulimira rundi arukuliisa entaama ze, obu aba nakyaija naaruga ha musiri, mukama we aramugambiire ati: ‘Rahuka bwango, oikarre, olye ebyokulya byawe’?
Taakumugambire ati: ‘Ihura ebyokulya byange, ojwale kurungi, ompeereze okuhika obu ndakamara kulya n'okunywa. Obu na iwe noija kulya n'okunywa’?
Nimugira ngu, mukama we aramusiima habw'okukora ebi amuragiire?
Na inywe nikyo kimu, obu muraabaga mumazire kukora byona ebi muragiirwe, mugambege muti: ‘Tuli baheereza abatarukugasa; tukozire ebi twaba nituragirwa kukora.’ ”
Yesu obu akaba naagenda Yerusaalemu, akaraba ha mutaano gwa Samaliya na Galiraaya.
Obu yahikire omu kyaro kimu, yaitirana abagenge ikumi. Baayemerra haraho,
baayamirra bati: “Yesu Omwegesa, otugirre embabazi!”
Obu yabeetegeriize, yabagambira ati: “Mugende mweyoleke banyakatagara.” Obu bakaba nibakyagenda, baakira.
Omu hali bo, obu yarozire nkooku akizire, yagaruka naahaisaniza Ruhanga n'iraka likooto.
Yajuumara ha bigere bya Yesu, yamusiima. Omusaija onu akaba ali Musamaliya.
Yesu nukwo kukaguza ati: “Abatambirwe tibabairege ikumi? Omwenda guraha?
Busaho ondi anyakugarukire kuhaisaniza Ruhanga kwihaho omunyaihanga onu wenka?”
Nukwo Yesu kumugambira ati: “Imuka oyegendere, okwikiriza kwawe kwakukiza.”
Abafalisaayo obu baakagwize Yesu ngu, obukama bwa Ruhanga nibwija di? Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Obukama bwa Ruhanga tibwija niburorwa,
kandi tiharoho muntu aligamba ati: ‘Ka mbunu hanu!’ Rundi: ‘Mbuli hali.’ Habwokuba obukama bwa Ruhanga buli omuli inywe.”
Nubwo Yesu yagambiire abeegesebwa be ati: “Akasumi kalihika obu mulyegomba okurora ekimu ha biro by'Omwana w'omuntu, baitu timulikirora.
Balibagambira bati: ‘Darawe ali hanu!’ Rundi: ‘Ngugwo ali hali!’ Baitu mutaligyayo, kandi mutalibahondera.
Omurabyo nkooku gumulikiza haiguru kuruga ha rubaju rumu okuhika ha rundi, Omwana w'omuntu nawe nukwo aliba ati ha kiro ky'okwija kwe.
Baitu alibanza kubonabonesibwa omu bintu bingi, n'okwangwa abantu ab'ebiro binu.
“Nkooku kyabaire omu biro bya Noha, nukwo kiriba kiti n'omu biro by'Omwana w'omuntu.
Abantu baalyaga, baanywaga, kandi baasweranganaga okuhika ha kiro Noha eki yataahiiremu omu lyato erikooto, okusandaara kw'amaizi kukaija kwahwerekereza abantu boona.
“Kandi nukwo kyabaire n'omu biro bya Loti. Abantu baalyaga, baanywaga, baaguraga, baatundaga, baabyaraga, kandi baayombekaga.
Baitu ha kiro Loti eki yarugiremu Sodomu, omurro n'obuganga bikaruga omwiguru byagwa, byahwerekereza abantu boona.
Nukwo kiriba kiti na ha kiro Omwana w'omuntu eki alibonekeramu.
“Ha kiro eki alisangwa ha nju eruguru kandi ebintu bye biri omunju, atalisirimuka kubiihamu; kandi n'ow'alisangwa omu musiri, ataligaruka omu ka.
Mwijuke muka Loti!
“Weena anyakugonza kujuna obwomeezi bwe, alibufeerwa; kandi anyakufeerwa obwomeezi bwe, alibujuna.
Nimbagambira nti: Ha kiro eki ababiri abaliba babyamire omu kitabu kimu: omu alitwarwa, ondi alisigara.
Abakazi babiri abaliba nibasa hamu: omu alitwarwa, ondi alisigara.” [
N'abasaija ababiri abaliba bali omu musiri: omu alitwarwa, ondi alisigara.]
Abeegesebwa baamukaguza bati: “Waitu, ebi biriba nkaha?” Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nambere hali omutumbi, oku nuho esega zeesorooleza.”
Nubwo Yesu yabaganikiize oruganikyo runu okubeegesa nkooku basemeriire kusaba batarukuhwa masiko.
Yagamba ati: “Omu rubuga orumu hakaba harumu omucwi w'emisango ow'akaba atatiinire Ruhanga noobu kwakuba okufaaho abantu.
Kandi omu rubuga oru hakaba harumu omufaakati ayaikaraga naija hali uwe naamusaba ati: ‘Ndamura n'omunyanzigwa wange.’
Omucwi w'emisango akamara omwanya akyayangire kumuramura; baitu hanyuma yayeteekerereza wenka ati: ‘Noobu ndaaba ntarukutiina Ruhanga rundi kufaaho abantu,
baitu habw'omufaakati onu kuntalibaniza muno, kammuramule n'omunyanzigwa we. Hatali eki naija kunjwahya habw'okwikara nagaruka!’”
MUKAMA Yesu nukwo kubagambira ati: “Mwetegereze omucwi w'emisango atali mwinganiza eki agambire.
Lero si, Ruhanga taliramura kurungi abantu be aba yakomeremu abamutaagira nyamusana n'ekiro? Alibaikazaho kubakoonyera?
Nimbagambira nti: Alibaramura bwango. Baitu Omwana w'omuntu obu aliija, alisanga okwikiriza kukyali omunsi?”
Yesu yagaruka kuganikiza abantu abaayemanyaga kuba bahikiriire, kandi nibagaya abandi, yagamba ati:
“Abasaija babiri bakagenda omunju ya Ruhanga kusaba; omu akaba ali Mufalisaayo, ondi musorooza w'omusoro.
Omufalisaayo yayemerra yasaba omu mutima gwe ati: ‘Ai Ruhanga, ninkusiima, habwokuba tindi nk'abantu abandi: abahoogozi, abateesigwa, abasiihani, noobwakubaire nk'omusorooza w'omusoro onu.
Buli wiiki nsiiba emirundi ebiri, kandi mpa kimu kya ikumi ha bintu byona ebi ntunga.’
Baitu omusorooza w'omusoro akeemerra haraho, atarukugonza n'okuraramira haiguru, yayeteerateera ha kifuba naagamba ati: ‘Ai Ruhanga, onganyire nyowe omusiisi!’
Nimbagambira nti: Omusaija onu akagaruka owe aganyirwe okukira oli; habwokuba weena anyakwenyumiza, alibundaazibwa; kandi anyakwebundaaza, alinyumizibwa.”
Abantu bakaleetera Yesu abaana enkerembe abakwateho; baitu abeegesebwa obu baarozire eki baabacoomera.
Nubwo Yesu yabeeta naagamba ati: “Muleke abaana baije nambere ndi, mutabatanga; habwokuba abali nk'abo, obukama bwa Ruhanga bwabu.
Mananukwo nimbagambira nti: Weena atarukwikiriza obukama bwa Ruhanga nk'omwana muto, talibutaahamu.”
Omulemi omu akamukaguza ati: “Mwegesa omurungi, nkole ki okugweterwa obwomeezi obutahwaho?”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Noonyetera ki omurungi? Tiharoho murungi n'omu kwihaho Ruhanga wenka.
Ebiragiro obimanyire: ‘Otalisiihana, otaliita, otaliiba, otalihangirra, otiinege sso na nyoko.’”
Omusaija yaragukamu ati: “Ebi byona nkabikwata okuruga omu buto bwange.”
Yesu obu yahuliire eki, yamugambira ati: “Nookyaburwaho kimu kyonka. Tunda byona ebi oinabyo ogabire abaseege, oije ompondere; nubwo olitunga itungo omwiguru.”
Baitu omusaija obu yahuliire eki yagwerwa, habwokuba akaba ali muguuda muno.
Yesu obu yarozire nkooku agweriirwe, yagamba ati: “Ka nikiremeera abaguuda kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga!
Nikirahuka engamiya kuraba omu nyindo y'enkinzo kukira omuguuda kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.”
Abantu abaakihuliire nukwo kumukaguza bati: “Mara nooha asobora kujunwa?”
Yesu yagarukamu ati: “Abantu eki batasobora, Ruhanga akisobora.”
Nubwo Petero yagambire ati: “Dora itwe, tukasiga byona twakuhondera.”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Mali mali nimbagambira nti: Busaho muntu n'omu ayasigire enju ye, rundi mukazi we, rundi bagenzi be habw'obukama bwa Ruhanga,
ow'ataliheebwa bingi okukiraho omu kasumi kanu, kandi omu biro ebirukwija alitunga obwomeezi obutahwaho.”
Yesu akatwara ikumi na babiri ha rubaju yabagambira ati: “Hati nu, nitugenda Yerusaalemu, kandi byona ebyahandiikirwe abarangi ha Mwana w'omuntu nibiija kuhikira.
Aliheebwayo hali Abanyamahanga, balimusekeereza, balimukora kubi, kandi balimucwera ebicwanta.
Balimuteera enkoba, kandi balimwita; baitu obu halihinguraho ebiro bisatu alihumbuuka.”
Abeegesebwa bateetegereze na kimu ha bigambo binu, habwokuba amakuru gaabyo gakaba gabawsrekerwe, kandi batakenge Yesu eki yabalizeeho.
Obu akaba nairirra orubuga Yeriko, Yesu yasanga omufu w'amaiso aikaliire ha muhanda rubaju naasabiiriza.
Obu yahuliire ekitebe kingi ky'abantu nikihingura, yakaguza ekinyakuroho.
Baamugambira bati: “Yesu owa Nazareeti nuwe arukuhingura.”
Omufu w'amaiso nukwo kwamirra ati: “Yesu, mwijukuru wa Daudi, ongirre embabazi!”
Abantu abakaba beebembiire baamucoomera aculeere. Baitu uwe yatokera kimu ati: “Mwijukuru wa Daudi, ongirre embabazi!”
Yesu yayemerra, yaragira bamumuleetere. Obu yahikire haihi, Yesu yamukaguza ati:
“Noogonza nkukorre ki?” Yamagarukamu ati: “Mukama wange, ningonza ndole!”
Yesu yamugambira ati: “Rora! Okwikiriza kwawe nukwo kwakukiza.”
Ahonaaho amaiso ge gaiguka, yahondera Yesu naahaisaniza Ruhanga. Abantu boona obu baarozire eki baakugiza Ruhanga.
Yesu akataaha omu rubuga Yeriko, kandi akaba ali w'okururabamu.
Hakaba haliyo omusaija omuguuda, omukuru w'abasorooza b'omusoro, ibara lye Zakayo.
Akagonza muno kurora Yesu ogu nkooku arukusisana, baitu atasobole, habw'ekitebe kingi ky'abantu, habwokuba akaba ali mugufu.
Nubwo yairukire yayebembera ekitebe kyona, yatemba omutoma, nukwo arole Yesu, habwokuba ogu nugwo muhanda ogu akaba naarabamu.
Yesu obu yahikireho yararamira haiguru, yamugambira ati: “Zakayo, sirimuka bwango, habwokuba kiro kya hati ndi w'okusiiba owaawe.”
Zakayo yasirimuka bwango, yamutangirra n'okusemererwa kwingi.
Abantu obu baarozire eki baatandika kutontoroma nibagamba bati: “Yagenda kuba mugenyi w'omuntu omusiisi!”

Aho Zakayo yayemerra yagambira MUKAMA Yesu ati: “Mukama wange, hati ninyija kugabira abanaku ekicweka kya kabiri ky'ebintu byange; kandi obu haraaba haroho ou nagobiize weena, ndamulehera emirundi ena.”
Yesu yamugambira ati: “Kiro kya hati okujunwa kwizire omunju enu, habwokuba omusaija onu nawe mwijukuru wa Abburahamu;
kandi Omwana w'omuntu akaija kuserra n'okujuna ekyabuzire.”
Obu bakaba nibakyahuliriza ebi, Yesu yayongera kubaganikiza oruganikyo, habwokuba akaba ali haihi na Yerusaalemu, kandi abantu bakateekereza ngu, obukama bwa Ruhanga bukaba buli haihi kwija.
Nubwo yagambire ati: “Hakaba haroho omuntu ow'ekitiinisa ayagenzire omu nsi ya hara kwetungira obukama, nukwo hanyuma agaruke.
Obu akaba atakagenzire, akeeta ikumi ha baheereza be, yabaha buli omu siringi nka bikumi bibiri, naabagambira ati: ‘Muzisuubuze okuhikya obu ndigaruka.’
Baitu abantu b'owaabu bakaba bamunobere, nukwo kumuhondeza abakwenda nibagamba bati: ‘Omusaija ogu titurukwenda atuleme.’
“Obu yagarukire, amazire kulya obukama, akaragira kumwetera abaheereza be aba yasigiire sente, nukwo amanye amagoba gaazo.
Ow'okubanza yaija omu maiso ge yagamba ati: ‘Mukama wange, siringi zaawe makumi abiri ezi wampaire ikagoba bikumi bibiri.’
Yamugarukamu ati: ‘Webale muheereza wange omurungi! Nkooku oyesigirwe omu bintu ebike, nkuhaire obusobozi bw'okulema embuga ikumi.’
Omuheereza wa kabiri yaija yagamba ati: ‘Mukama wange, siringi zaawe makumi abiri ezi wampaire ikagoba kikumi kimu.’
Yamugarukamu ati: ‘Na iwe noija kulema embuga itaano.’
Omuheereza ondi yaija yagamba ati: ‘Mukama wange, siringi zaawe nzinu, nkazaahura omu kitambaara.
Nkakutiina, habwokuba oli muntu mubi; oihamu eki otaratairemu, ogesa ebi otarasigire.’
Yamagarukamu ati: ‘Muheereza iwe omubi! Kankusingise omusango ninsigikira ha bigambo ebi ogambire! Okamanya nkooku ndi muntu mubi, nyihamu eki ntaratairemu, kandi ngesa ebi ntarasigire!
Mara habwaki sente zange otarazitaire omu banka? Obu nakugarukire naakuziihireyo n'amagoba gaazo?’
Nubwo yagambiire abakaba beemeriireho ati: ‘Mumwiheho siringi zange abiri, muzihe ogu ayagobere bikumi bibiri.’
Nukwo bbo kumugambira bati: ‘Waitu, kandi uwe k'aina ebikumi bibiri!’
Nyowe nimbagambira nti: ‘Weena anyakwina, alyongerwaho; baitu ataina bingi, n'akatoito aka ainako kalimwihwaho.
Hati nu, abanyanzigwa bange mubaleete hanu, mubaitire omumaiso gange!’ ”
Yesu obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yabeebembera kugenda Yerusaalemu.
Obu yairiire haihi na Beetifage na Betaniya, ahikire ha rusozi orwayetwaga orw'emiti Oliva, yatuma babiri ha beegesebwa be,

ati: “Mugende omu kyaro kiri ekituroleriire, obu muraaba nimukyataahamu muti, murasanga omwana gw'endogoyi ogutakatembwahoga muntu, gusibirwe; mugusibule muguleete hanu. Omwana gw'endogoyi ogutakatembwahoga muntu (Luk 19:30)
Obu haraabaho arukubakaguza ati: ‘Nimusibura gwaki?’ Mumugambire muti: ‘Mukama waitu nagwetaaga.’ ”
Abaatumirwe baagenda, baasanga biri nkooku yabagambiire.
Obu bakaba nibasibura omwana gw'endogoyi' bakama baagwo baabakaguza bati: “Nimusibura gwaki?”
Baagarukamu bati: “Mukama waitu nagwetaaga.”
Nubwo baaguleetiire Yesu, baagutaho ebijwaro byabo, bagumutembya.
Obu akaba naagenda, baayarra ebijwaro byabo omu muhanda.

Obu yairiire haihi na Yerusaalemu, ahikire ha kasirimuko k'orusozi rw'emiti Oliva, ekitebe kyona eky'abeegesebwa be kyatandika kusemererwa n'okuhaisaniza Ruhanga n'iraka likooto habw'ebihuniriza ebi baarozire,
nibagamba bati: “W'omugisa MUKAMA ogu arukwija omu ibara lya Atahwaho. Obusinge bube omwiguru, n'ekitiinisa kibe hali Mukama w'iguru!”
Abafalisaayo abamu ab'omu kitebe eki, nukwo kumugambira bati: “Mwegesa, culeeza abeegesebwa baawe!”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Nimbagambira nti: Banu noobu baraaculeera, amabaale nigaija kutoka.”
Obu akaba nairra haihi n'orubuga, yarurora, yarulirirra ati:
“Nangwa n'ekiro kinu kakuba obaire omanyire ebirukuleeta obusinge! Baitu bambi, bikuserekerwe!
Akasumi kalikuhikira abanyanzigwa baawe obu balikugota, bakwehingulirize, bakufunze embaju zoona.
Balikukenya hansi hamu n'abantu abaliba bali omuliiwe, kandi tibalikusigira ibaale na limu eryemeriire ha lindi; habwokuba otamanye akasumi Ruhanga aka yaiziremu kukujuna!”
Yesu akataaha omunju ya Ruhanga, yatandika kubingamu abakaba nibatundiramu ebintu,
naabagambira ati: “Kikahandiikwa ngu: ‘Enju yange eraayetwaga Nju y'okusabiramu’; baitu inywe mugifoire bwingira bw'abanyagi!”
Kandi bukyabukya Yesu yayegesaaga omunju ya Ruhanga. Baanyakatagara abakuru, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, n'abeebembezi b'abantu bakaba nibaserra kumwita,
baaburwa eki baraamukora, habwokuba abantu boona bakaba nibamuhuliiriza n'omutima gumu.
Kiro kimu, Yesu obu akaba naayegesa abantu omunju ya Ruhanga kandi naabarangirra Amakuru Amarungi, banyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro hamu n'abakuru b'abantu baija,
baamukaguza bati: “Tugambire, busobozi ki oburukukukozesa ebintu binu, rundi ayabukuhaire nooha?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Na nyowe ka mbakaguze, mungambire.
Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaruga hali Ruhanga rundi omu bantu?”
Baitu bbo baatandika kuteezangana empaka bati: “Obu turagarukamu ngu: ‘Kukaruga hali Ruhanga’, naija kutukaguza ati: ‘Habwaki mutaramwikiriize?’
Obu turagarukamu ngu: ‘Kukaruga omu bantu’, abantu boona nibaija kututeera amabaale, habwokuba bananukire Yohaana nkooku akaba ali murangi.”
Nukwo kugarukamu ngu: Tibamanyire nambere kwarugire.
Yesu nubwo yabagambiire ati: “Na nyowe tindukwija kubagambira obusobozi oburukunkoza binu.”
Nubwo Yesu yayongera kuganikiza abantu oruganikyo runu ati: “Omusaija akabyara orugonjo rw'emizaabbibbu, yarusigira abapangisa okururolerra, yagenda omunsi endi, amaleyo omwanya.
Obusumi obw'okunoga obu bwahikire, yatuma omuheereza hali abapangisa abo, bamutwekere ha bijuma by'emizaabbibbu. Baitu abapangisa baamuteera, baamubinga, yarugayo ngaro-nsa.
Yagaruka yatuma omuheereza ondi, nawe baamuteera, baamuswaza, baamubinga. Nawe yarugayo ngaro-nsa.
Yayongera yatumayo omuheereza owa kasatu; onu nawe baamuhutaaza, baamubinga.
Nubwo mukama w'orugonjo yayekagwize ati: ‘Nyowe ndakora ki? Ka mbatumire omwana wange omugonzibwa; rundi uwe baraamugayuka!’
Baitu abapangisa obu baamurozire naija, baagambirangana bati: ‘Onu nuwe mugwetwa. Muleke tumwite, obugwetwa bube bwaitu’.
Baamuturukya omu rugonjo, baamwita. “Boojo, mukama w'orugonjo, abapangisa abo alibakora ki?
Aliija abahwerekereze, n'orugonjo arukwase abandi.” Abantu obu baahuliire eki baagamba bati: “Nikikafuuhe!”
Baitu Yesu yabarolerra nabakaguza ati: “Ekyahandiikirwe kinu ekirukugamba kiti: ‘Ibaale lyonyini abombeki eri baayangire, niryo lyafookere bugumizo bw'enju’, nikimanyisa ki?
Omuntu weena anyakugwa ha ibaale eri alicwacwanuka; kandi weena ou lirigwera lirimusasangura.”
Omu kasumi ako abeegesa b'ebiragiro n'abanyakatagara abakuru bakaba nibagonza kukwata Yesu, habwokuba bakamanya oruganikyo oru nkooku yaruganikize nirukwata hali bo, baitu bakatiina abantu.

Nahabweki balinda akasumi aka baraamukwatiraho. Baatuma n'entasi ezayesisanize kuba b'amananu, basobole kumukwasa omu bigambo ebi arukugamba, nukwo bamuheyo omu mikono n'omu busobozi bw'omulemi mukuru.
Baakaguza Yesu bati: “Mwegesa, tumanyire nkooku agamba kandi oyegesa ebihikire, kandi tosoroora omu bantu, baitu oyegesaakwo omuhanda gwa Ruhanga.
Kihikire kuha Kaisaali omusoro rundi nangwa?”
Baitu uwe yamanya obugobya bwabu, nukwo kubagambira ati:
“Munyoleke siringi. Ekisisani kinu n'ebihandiikirweho by'oha?” Baagarukamu bati: “Bya Kaisaali”.
Yesu yabagambira ati: “Ebya Kaisaali mubihe Kaisaali n'ebya Ruhanga mubihe Ruhanga.”
Batasobole kumukwasa omu kigambo kyona omu maiso g'abantu. Eki yabagarukiremu kyabahuniriza, baahuna kwonka.
Abasadukaayo abamu, abo abagamba ngu, abafu tibahumbuuka, bakaija hali Yesu

baamukaguza bati: “Mwegesa, Musa akatusigira ekihandiiko ekirukugamba kiti: ‘Omusaija obu araafaaga akasiga omukazi atazaire baana, mugenzi w'omusaija ogu aswere omufaakati nukwo bazarre kifa abaana.’
Hakaba haroho banyineemu musanju; mukuru wabu yaswera omukazi, baitu yafa atasigire baana,
n'owa kabiri yaswera omukazi ogu,
n'owa kasatu nukwo ati, okuhika boona musanju obu baafiire batasigire baana.
Abo boona obu bahoireho, omukazi nawe yafa.
Obu, ha kiro ky'okuhumbuuka aliba muk'oha? Habwokuba boona musanju bakamuswera.”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Abantu ab'ebiro binu baswera kandi baswerwa,
baitu abantu abalisangwa basemeriire kuhika oku hanyuma y'okuhumbuuka kw'abafu, tibaliswera.
Bbo tibaligaruka kufa, habwokuba balisisana nk'abamalaika, kandi baana ba Ruhanga, ningira babagaine ha kuhumbuuka.

Baitu abafu nkooku bahumbuurwa, na Musa wenka akakimanyisa omu byahandiikire okwoleka ebyabaireho ha rusaka ruli, nambere yagumize MUKAMA nkooku ali Ruhanga wa Abburahamu, Ruhanga wa Isaaka, kandi Ruhanga wa Yakobbo.
Tali Ruhanga w'abafiire, baitu w'aboomeezi, habwokuba hali Uwe boona baba boomeezi.”
Abamu ha beegesa b'ebiragiro nukwo kugarukamu bati: “Mwegesa ogambire kurungi!”
Kandi batongere kumukaguza ebindi.
Yesu yabakaguza ati: “Abantu nibasobora bata kugamba ngu: Kristo aba mwijukuru wa Daudi?
Kandi kunu Daudi wenka omu kitabu kya Zabbuli akagamba ati: ‘Atahwaho akagambira MUKAMA wange ati: Ikarra ha mukono gwange ogw'obulyo,
okuhika abanyanzigwa baawe obu ndibafoora akatebe k'ebigere byawe.’
Daudi obu arraba yayesire Kristo MUKAMA we, obu aba ata mwijukuru we?”
Abantu boona obu bakaba nibamuhuliriza, Yesu akagambira abeegesebwa be ati:

“Mwerinde abeegesa b'ebiragiro abagonza kugendagenda bajwaire ekanzu ezirukukwekweya, okuramukibwa n'ekitiinisa omu butale, n'okwikarra ha ntebe ez'ekitiinisa omu masorrokaniro, n'ebiikaro ebirukukira oburungi omu magenyi.
Bbo banyaga amaju g'abafaakati, hanyuma beezookesa nibarandagatana omu kusaba! Abo balicwerwa omusango ogurukukira ogw'abandi!”
Yesu akaimukya amaiso yarora abaguuda nibata ebisembo byabo omu lyahurro lya sente omunju ya Ruhanga;
kandi yarora n'omufaakati omunaku naanagamu sente ibiri ez'itaano.
Yesu yagamba ati: “Mazima nimbagambira nti: Omufaakati omunaku onu anagiremu nyingi okukira abandi boona.
Habwokuba abo boona banagiremu ebi basaagiriire; baitu uwe omu bunaku bwe ahaireyo byona ebi ainabyo.”
Abantu abamu bakaba nibabazaaho Enju ya Ruhanga nkooku ekaba etonerwe kurungi n'amabaale ag'omuhendo kandi n'ebisembo abantu ebi baahayoga. Nukwo Yesu kubagambira ati:
“Ebi byona ebi murukurora, akasumi kalihika obu hatalisigara ibaale na limu eriri ha lindi, eritalinagwa hansi.”
Nubwo abantu baamukagwize bati: “Mwegesa, binu biribaho di? Kandi karorwaho ki akalyoleka nkooku biri haihi kubaho?”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Mwerinde nukwo muleke kuhabisibwa; habwokuba baingi baliija omu ibara lyange nibagamba bati: ‘Ninyowe ogu!’ Kandi bati: ‘Akasumi kahikire!’ Baitu mutalibahondera.
Obu mulihurra obulemu n'epumpu, mutalitiina; ebi by'okubanza kubaho, baitu empero terihika ahonaaho.”
Yayongera kubagambira ati: “Ihanga liriimukirra erindi, n'obukama bulirwanisa obundi.
Halibaho emisisa y'amaani, haligwa kiihe omu biikaro ebitali bimu, kandi kagingo eriita baingi; halizooka ebintu ebirukutiinisa n'ebihuniriza eby'amaani ebirukuruga omu iguru.
“Baitu binu byona bitakabaireho balibakwata, balibahayo kucwerwa emisango omu masorrokaniro, balibata omu nkomo, balibahikya omu maiso g'abakama n'abalemi bakuru nibabatura nyowe.
Obu nubwo mulitunga omwanya ogw'okumpeera obwakaiso.
Kinu mwikale nimukiijuka: mutalyetegeka eki mulyetonganirra akasumi katakahikire;
habwokuba ndibaha ebi muligamba hamu n'amagezi abanyanzigwa banyu aga batalisobora kwemera rundi kuhakaniza.
Muliheebwayo noobu baakubaire abazaire banyu, n'abagenzi banyu, n'ab'oruganda, n'abanywani banyu; abamu omuli inywe balibaita.
Mulinobwa boona habwange.
Baitu busaho kasoke na kamu aka ha mitwe yanyu akalibaburaho.
Omu kugumiisiriza nuho mulijunira obwomeezi bwanyu.”
“Obu mulirora Yerusaalemu rugosirwe amahe, mumanye okuhwerekerra kwarwo nkooku kuli haihi.
Abaliba bali omu Buyudaaya basingirwe ha nsozi, n'abaliba bali omu rubuga barurugemu, kandi n'abaliba bali omu byaro batalirutaahamu.
Habwokuba ebi nibyo ebiro by'okuhoora enzigu, nukwo byona Ebyahandiikirwe bihikirizebwe.
Bambi! Balikibona abakazi abaliba baina enda n'abarukwonkya omu biro ebi! Habwokuba omunsi halibamu emihito nyingi, kandi Ruhanga alikayukira muno abantu abo.
Abamu baliitwa obwogi bw'empirima, abandi balinyagirwa omu mahanga goona, kandi Yerusaalemu ruliikara nirurubatirirwa Abanyamahanga okuhikya engoma yabo obu erihwaho.”
“Halibaho oburorwaho omu izooba, omu kwezi, n'omu nyunyuuzi; kandi omu nsi amahanga goona galiba omu bujune, nigatuntura habw'okuhirra kw'enyanja n'ebigonzi byayo.
Abantu balikabibwa obutiini habw'okuteekereza akabi akarukugwera ensi; nangwa n'eby'amaani eby'omwiguru biritengesebwa.
Nubwo balirora Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu kicu aina obusobozi n'ekitiinisa kingi.
Ebintu ebi obu biritandika kubaho, mwimukye emitwe yanyu, murole haiguru habwokuba okucungurwa kwanyu kuliba kuli haihi.”
Yesu yabacwera orufumo runu ati: “Mwegere ha muti omutini na ha miti endi yoona.
Obu murora etandikire kurokera, mumanya ekyanda nkooku kiri haihi.
Nukwo na inywe obu mulirora binu nibibaho, mumanye obukama bwa Ruhanga nkooku buli haihi.
Mananukwo nimbagambira nti: Akasumi kanu tikalihwaho ebi byona bitakabaireho.
Iguru n'ensi birihwaho, baitu ebigambo byange tibirihwaho.”
“Mwerinde! Emitima yanyu etaikara kutwarwa omukoijo n'obutamiizi n'emyetunturo ey'obwomeezi bunu, nukwo ekiro eki kitalibagwera bwango nk'ekiriba.
Habwokuba ekiro eki kiriizira abantu boona abaikara omunsi.
Mwikale nimurora obwire bwona, nimusaba obutoosa nukwo mutunge amaani ag'okubatabura ebintu ebi byona ebiribaho n'ag'okubasoboza kwemerra omu maiso g'Omwana w'omuntu.”
Nyamusana Yesu yayegesaaga omunju ya Ruhanga, baitu obwire obu bwairaga yagendaga kugonya ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva.
Kandi nyenkya kara abantu boona baazindukaga kuhurra ebi arukwegesa omu Nju ya Ruhanga.
Obugenyi bw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe, oburukwetwa Okuhingurwaho, bukaba buli haihi kuhika.
Baanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro bakaba nibaserra amagezi ag'okwita Yesu, habwokuba bakaba nibatiina abantu.
Nubwo Sitaani yataahiremu Yuda arukwetwa Isikalyota, omu ha ikumi na babiri.
Yuda akagenda yahanuura n'abanyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'abalinzi b'enju ya Ruhanga nkooku araagobeza Yesu abamukwase.
Baasemererwa, baamuraganiza kumuha sente.
Nawe yaikiriza kandi yaserra akanya karungi aka araabamukwasizamu, abantu, batakimanyire.
Aho ekiro kikuru ky'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe kyahika, nikyo eki baatambirahoga omwana gw'entaama ogw'Okuhingurwaho.
Yesu yatuma Petero na Yohaana ati: “Mugende mututeekanirize Obugenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho, twije tubulye.”
Baamukaguza bati: “Noogonza tubuteekanirize nkaha?”
Yabagarukamu ati: “Obu muraaba nimutaaha omu rubuga nimwija kutangaana omusaija ayetwekere ensoha y'amaizi. Mumuhondere okuhika omu nju ei araataahamu.
Nyineeka mumugambire muti: ‘Omwegesa akutumireho naakaguza ngu: Kiraha ekisiika ky'abagenyi nambere araaliira Obugenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho hamu n'abeegesebwa be?’
Araabooleka ekisiika kikooto eky'omu kainaabiri ekirumu byona ebirukwetaagwa. Oku nuho murateekaniza ebintu byona.”
Bbo baagenda, baasanga byona biri nkooku yabagambiire, baateekaniza Obugenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho.
Esaaha obu yahikire, Yesu yaija ha meeza hamu n'abakwenda be.
Yabagambira ati: “Nyegombere muno kulya na inywe Obugenyi bunu obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho ntakabonabonesiibwe!
Nimbagambira nti: Tindigaruka kubulya okuhika obu bulihikirizibwa omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.”
Nubwo yakwata ekikopo, yasiima naagamba ati: “Mukwate kinu munyweho inywena;
habwokuba nimbagambira nti: Okuruga hati tindigaruka kunywa ha nsande y'ebijuma by'emizaabbibbu okuhikya obukama bwa Ruhanga obu buliija.”
Yakwata omugaati, yasiima, yagucwamu, yagubaha naagamba ati: “Gunu nugwo mubiri gwange [oguraaheebwayo habwanyu. Kinu mukikolege okunyijukiraho.”
Omu mulingo nugwo gumu obu baamazire kulya, yakwata ekikopo naagamba ati: “Ekikopo kinu nikyo kiragaano ekihyaka eky'esagama yange eraaseeswa habwanyu.”]
“Omukono gw'ogu arukungobeza ngunu, guli hanu n'ogwange ha meeza!
Habwokuba Omwana w'omuntu naagenda kuhikiriza ekyamuteekaniriziibwe, baitu alikibona bambi omuntu ogu arukumugobeza!”
Aho baatandika kukaguzangana bonka na bonka ngu, nooha omuli bo arukwija kukora eki.
Hakaimuka empaka omu bakwenda ngu, nooha omuli bo arukuteekerezibwa kuba mukuru.
Yesu yabagambira ati: “Abakama b'Abanyamahanga abantu baabo babalemesa itwale, kandi n'ab'obusobozi beetwa kabumba,
baitu tikiriba kiti omuli inywe; leka omukuru omuli inywe abe nk'arukukira obuto, kandi omwebembezi nk'omuheereza.
Arukukira obukuru nuwe oha: anyakwikarra ha meeza okulya, nandiki anyakuheereza? Tali ogu anyakwikarra ha meeza? Baitu nyowe ndi hagati yanyu nk'omuheereza.
“Inywe abatarandugiireho omu mihito yange,
Isenyowe nkooku yanteekaniriize obukama, na nyowe nukwo ndukububateekaniriza.
Muraaliira kandi munywere ha meeza omu bukama bwange, kandi mwikarre ha bitebe mucwere emisango enganda ikumi na ibiri eza Isirairi.”
Yesu akagamba ati: “Simooni, Simooni, omanye Sitaani aikirizibwe kubasegesa inywena nk'engano.
Baitu iwe nkakusabira okwikiriza kwawe kuleke kugarukirra; kandi obu olimara kwegarukamu, ogumye bagenzi baawe.”
Petero yamugarukamu ati: “MUKAMA wange, nyeteekaniize kugenda omu nkomo n'okufa hamu na iwe!”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Petero ninkugambira nti: Kiro kinu enkoko etakakookere, oraaba onyehoogere emirundi esatu ngu, tommanyire.”
Yesu yabakaguza ati: “Buli obu nabatumire mutaina nsahu za sente n'ez'ebyokulya, mutajwaire n'enkaito, hakabaho ekyababuzireho?” Baagarukamu bati: “Nangwa.”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Leero hati, weena anyakwina ensahu ya sente rundi ey'ebyokulya agitwale; kandi ataina empirima, atunde omwegereko gwe, agigule.
Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Ekyahandiikirwe ekirukugamba kiti: ‘Akabalirwa omu basiisi’ nikisemerra kuhikirra hali nyowe; ningira ebyampandiikirweho biri haihi kuhikirra.”
Abakwenda baamugarukamu bati: “Waitu, hanu twina empirima ibiri!” Nandiki uwe ati: “Ezi nizimara!”
Yesu yaruga omu nju yagenda ha rusozi rw'emiti Oliva, nkooku yakakoraga bwona; abakwenda be baamukuraatira.
Obu baahikireyo yabagambira ati: “Musabe, mutaikara kutwarwa omu kwohebwa.”
Uwe yabarugaho yagenda nk'omwanya oguhungurwamu ibaale, yateeza amaju yayesengereza ati:
“Taata, obu oraaba nookisiima onyiheho amabone ganu. Nabwo kitaba nyowe nkooku ndukugonza, baitu kibe Iwe nkooku orukugonza.” [
Nubwo malaika yaruga omwiguru yamubonekera, yamugumya.
Obu, obusaalizi bwamuhinguraine, yayesengereza muno okukiraho; empita yamurugamu yatonya hansi neesisana entonyezi enkooto ez'esagama.]
Obu yamazire kusaba, yaimuka, yagaruka hali abakwenda be yabasanga bagwijagiire habw'obujune.
Yabagambira ati: “Mugwijagiziibwe ki? Mwimuke musabe, mutaikara kutwarwa omu kwohebwa.”
Obu akaba nakyabaza, haija ekitebe, ky'abantu; omusaija arukwetwa Yuda, omu hali ikumi na babiri, abeebembiire. Yairra haihi Yesu kumugwa omu kifuba.
Baitu Yesu yamukaguza ati: “Yuda, noogobeza Omwana w'omuntu kunu noomugwa omu kifuba?”
Abo abakaba bali hamu na Yesu obu baarozire ekirukugenda kubaho, baamukaguza bati: “Waitu, tubateme n'empirima?”
Omu hali bo yatema omwiru w'omukuru w'abanyakatagara, yamucwaho okutu okw'obulyo.
Baitu Yesu yabatanga ati: “Lekera aho!” Yakwata ha kutu kw'omusaija, yamukiza.
Nubwo Yesu yakagwize banyakatagara abakuru, n'abakuru n'abalinzi b'enju ya Ruhanga n'abakuru b'abantu abakaba baizire kumukwata ati: “Munyiziire n'empirima n'ebiduuma nk'abaiziire kukwata omunyagi?
Buli kiro naikaraga na inywe omunju ya Ruhanga, mutankwate. Baitu kanu nuko kasumi kanyu, hati omwirima nugwo gurukulema.”
Aho baakwata Yesu, baamutwara baamuhikya mba mukuru w'abanyakatagara; Petero yabahondera ali haraho.
Obu baahembere omurro omu kizigati hagati, baikarra kwota, Petero nawe yabaikarramu.
Omu ha bazaana n'omukuru w'abanyakatagara obu yamurozire aikaliire ha murro, yamugumyaho amaiso naagamba ati: “Omusaija onu nawe abairege hamu na Yesu!”
Baitu Petero yayehooga naagamba ati: “Mukazi iwe, ogu tindukumumanya!”
Obu haahingwireho akanya kake, omuntu ondi yamurora yagamba ati: “Na iwe oli omu hali bo!” Baitu Petero yamugarukamu ati: “Musaija iwe, tindi wabo!”
Obu haahingwireho omwanya gw'esaaha nk'emu, ondi yamwomereza muno naagamba ati: “Mazimakwo omusaija onu abaire ali hamu nawe; habwokuba nawe Mugaliraaya!”
Petero yagamba ati: “Musaija iwe, tindukumanya eki orukugamba!” Ahonaaho obu akaba naakyabaza, enkoko yakooka.
MUKAMA Yesu yahinduka yarolerra Petero. Na Petero nubwo yaijukire ebigambo MUKAMA ebi yamugambiire ati: “Kiro kinu enkoko etakakookere, oraaba onyehoogere kasatu.”
Petero yaturuka aheeru, yarra muno.
Abasaija abakaba nibalinda Yesu bakamusekeereza kandi baamuteera enkoba.
Baamuswekerra ha maiso, nibamukaguza bati: “Toma, nooha akutiire!”
Kandi baamugambaho ebindi bingi nibamujuma.
Obwire obu bwakiire, abakuru b'abantu, banyakatagara abakuru, n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro bakasorrokana hamu, baaleeta Yesu omu Rukurato rwabo.
Baamukaguza bati: “Tugambire, niiwe Kristo?” Yabagarukamu ati: “Obu ndaabagambira, timurukwija kunyikiriza;
noobu ndaabakaguza, timurukwija kungarukamu.
Baitu okuruga hati, Omwana w'omuntu naija kwikarra ha mukono gw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga Omusobozi wa byona.”
Boona nukwo kumukaguza bati: “Mara iwe, oli Mwana wa Ruhanga?” Yabagarukamu ati: “Niinywe mwakigamba.”
Nandiki bbo bati: “Hati nitukyaserurra ki obwakaiso? Ningira twayehulirra itwenka ebi agambire!”
Nubwo ekitebe kyona eky'abantu kyaimukire, baatwara Yesu omumaiso ga Pilaato.
Baatandika kumunyegerra nibagamba bati: “Omuntu onu tumusangire naajemesa ihanga lyaitu, naatanga abantu kuha Kaisaali omusoro, kandi naayeyeta Kristo Omukama.”
Pilaato yamukaguza ati: “Niiwe Omukama w'Abayudaaya?” Yesu yagarukamu ati: “Nukwo ogambire.”
Pilaato yagaruka yagambira banyakatagara abakuru n'ekitebe kyona ati: “Omuntu onu timmuzoireho musango naakake.”
Baitu bbo baaterraho kimu amaani bati: “Naaleeta akajagarro omu bantu, akabandiza Galiraaya okuhika na hanu.”
Pilaato obu yahuliire ebigambo ebi, yabakaguza omusaija ogu obu araaba ali Mugaliraaya.
Obu yamanyire Yesu nkooku ali w'omu isaza lya Herode, yamumusindikira, habwokuba omu kasumi ako Herode nawe akaba ali omu Yerusaalemu.
Herode obu yarozire Yesu, yasemererwa muno. Akaba amazire omwanya naayegomba kumurora, habwokuba akaba amuhuliireho kandi yanihiraga kumurora naakora ekyokuhuniriza.
Nikyo Herode yamaliire omwanya naamukaguza bingi; baitu Yesu atagarukemu kantu.
Baanyakatagara abakuru n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro baayemerra aho, nibamunyegerra ebintu bingi!
Herode n'abaserikale be baamwoleka emigayo nibamusekeereza. Herode yamujweka omwenagiro gw'ekitiinisa, yamugarra hali Pilaato.
Ha kiro eki kyonyini Herode na Pilato nubwo baganjaine, habwokuba kara koona bakaba banobangaine.
Ebi obu byahoire, Pilaato yasorooza hamu banyakatagara abakuru, abalemi b'Abayudaaya n'abantu abandi,
yabagambira ati: “Mwandeetera omuntu onu nimugamba ngu, naajemesa abantu. Hati nyowe obu mmukagwize omu amaiso ganyu, timmuzoireho musango na gumu hali ebi byona ebi murukumujunaana.
Nangwa noobwakuba Herode tamuzoireho musango, nikyo amugaruliire hali itwe. Taina kintu kyona eki yakozire ekirukusemerra kumwisa.
Nahabweki ndaragira bamuteere enkoba, nukwo mmulekere agende.” [
Eki akakigamba habwokuba akaba naaragirwa kubalekerra omunyankomo omu ha kiro kikuru eki.]
Nubwo boona baatokiire hamu bati: “Ogu mwiheho, otulekerre Baraaba!”
Baraaba ogu akaba akwasirwe omu nkomo habw'okwemesa abantu ab'omu rubuga na habw'obwisi.
Pilato, habw'okugonza kulekera Yesu, akongera yababaliza;
baitu bbo baatoka bati: “Mubambe, mubambe ha musaraba!”
Pilaato yabakaguza omurundi gwa kasatu ati: “Habwaki? Kibi ki eki akozire? Timmuzoireho musango gwona ogusemeriire kumwisa! Nahabweki ndaragira bamuteere enkoba, nukwo mmulekere agende.”
Baitu baaterraho kimu amaani nibatokera haiguru, nibasaba ngu abambwe, kandi amaraka gaabo gaasingwire.
Pilaato nukwo kucwa omusango ngu, eki basabire nikyo kikorwe.
Yalekera omusaija ou bakomere, ogu ow'akaba akwasirwe omu nkomo habw'okwemesa abantu na habw'obwisi. Yahayo Yesu bamukole nkooku baagondeze.
Obu bakaba nibatwara Yesu, bakakwata omusaija arukwetwa Simooni owa Kireene, ow'akaba naaruga omu kyaro; baamutweka omusaraba aguhimbe, akuraatire Yesu.
Ekitebe kingi eky'abantu n'eky'abakazi abakaba nibarra, nibamuterra empamo, bakamuhondera.
Yesu yahinduka yabagambira ati: “Inywe bahara ba Yerusaalemu muleke kundirirra, baitu mweririrre inywenka kandi mulirirre abaana banyu.
