Obu muraakwataga ebiragiro byange nyowe nkooku nakwasire ebya Isenyowe, muliikara omu ngonzi zange nyowe nkooku naikaire omu ngonzi ze.
Ebi mbibagambiire nukwo okusemererwa kwange kwikale omuli inywe, kandi okusemererwa oku kwijurre kimu.
“Kinu nikyo ndukubaragira: Mugonzangane nka nyowe oku nabagondeze.
Tiharoho anyakwina engonzi ezirukukira zinu, ezihambiriza omuntu kufeera enganjani ze.
Inywe muli nganjani zange obu muraaba nimukora ebi ndukubaragira.
Tinkyabeeta bairu, habwokuba omwiru tamanya mukama we ebi akora; baitu mbeesire nganjani, habwokuba nkabamanyisa byona Isenyowe ebi yangambiire.
Tibali inywe abankomere, baitu ninyowe nabakomere, nabataho nukwo mukole ebirungi, kandi ebikorwa byanyu biikaleho. Nahabweki kyona eki musaba Isenyowe omu ibara lyange, akibahe.
Eki ndukubaragira nkinu: Mugonzangane.”
“Abantu obu balibanoba, mumanye nkooku baabandize kunoba nyowe.
Kakuba mubaire muli b'ensi enu, ensi yakubagondeze nk'abaayo; baitu timuli b'ensi habwokuba nkabakoma nabaiha omunsi, nikyo ensi erukubanobera.
Mwijuke eki nabagambiire nti: ‘Omuheereza takira mukama we’. Obu baraaba nibampiiganiza, na inywe balibahiiganiza. Obu baraaba baahuliire ebi nabagambiire, n'ebyanyu balibihurra.
Baitu ebi byona balibibakora nibabatura nyowe, habwokuba tibarukumanya Ogu ayantumire.
Kakuba ntaraizire nkabagambira, tibaakubaire na kibi; baitu hati tibaina ky'okwekwasa habw'ekibi kyabo.
Ogu anyakunnoba, anoba na Isenyowe.
kakuba ntarakozire omuli bo ebikorwa ebitakakorwaga ondi weena, tibaakubaire na kibi; baitu hati babirozire kandi baanoba nyowe hamu na Isenyowe.
Eki kikabaho kihikirize ekyahandiikirwe omu Biragiro byabo kiti: ‘Bakannobera busa’.
Baitu Omuhabuzi ou ndibatwekera, naaruga hali Isenyowe, nuwe Mwoyo ow'amazima anyakuruga hali Isenyowe, Ogu obu aliija aliba kaiso wange.
Na inywe muli bakaiso, habwokuba okuruga ha kubanza twikaire hamu.”
“Ebi byona mbibagambiire muleke kugarukirra.
Balibabinga omu masorrokaniro; kandi akasumi kalihika omuntu weena arukubaita mbere aliteekerereza ngu, naaheereza Ruhanga.
Ekiribakoza eki nukwo kutamanya Isenyowe noobwakuba nyowe.
Baitu akasumi obu kalihika, muliijuka nkooku nabibamanyisize.” “Ebigambo binu ntabibagambire kuruga ha kubanza, habwokuba tukaba tukyali hamu.
Hati nu ningenda hali Ogu ayantumire, kandi busaho n'omu omuli inywe arukunkaguza ati: ‘Noogenda nkaha?’
Baitu habw'okubibagambira, emitima yanyu ijwire obujune.
Nabwo nimbagambira amazima nti: Okugenda kwange nikubagasira. Kakuba ntagenda, Omuhabuzi talibaizira; baitu obu ndigenda ndimubatumira.
Uwe obu aliija alirumiriza abantu habw'ekibi, habw'obuhikiriire na habw'okucwerwa omusango.
Alibarumiriza ekibi habw'okutanyikiriza.
Aligumya obuhikiriire bwange, habwokuba ningaruka hali Isenyowe kandi timulyongera kundora.
Alinanura abantu nkooku balicwerwa omusango, habwokuba omulemi w'ensi enu amazire kusingwa omusango.
“Nkyaina bingi eby'okubagambira, baitu timurukwija kubisobora hati.
Mwoyo w'amazima obu aliija, alibeebembera abooleke amazima goona. Uwe talibaza habw'obusobozi bwe, baitu kyona eki alihurra, nikyo aligamba; kandi alibamanyisa n'ebirukwija kubaho.
Aliinyumiza habwokuba araihaga ha byange, naabibamanyisa.
Byona Isenyowe ebi ainabyo, byange; nikyo mbagambiriire nti: Mwoyo, ebyange nibyo araabamanyisaaga.”
“Hasigaire akacu kake muliba mutakyandora, kandi halihinguraho akacu kake mulindora.”

Abamu ha beegesebwa be nukwo kukaguzangana bati: “Kinu kiki eki atugambiire ati: ‘Hasigaire akacu kake, muliba mutakyandora’; kandi ati: ‘Halihinguraho akacu kake, mulindora’? Kandi ati: ‘Ningenda hali Isenyowe’?”
Baayongera kukaguzangana bati: “Naamanyisa ki obu arukugamba ati: ‘Hasigaire akacu kake’? Titurukwetegereza eki arukugamba.”
Yesu yakenga nkooku barukugonza kumukaguza, nukwo kubagambira ati: “Kinu tinikyo murukukaguzangana: Nyowe eki ngenderiire obu ngambire nti: ‘Hasigaire akacu kake muliba mutakyandora’?
Mazimakwo nimbagambira nti: Inywe mulirra, muliganya; baitu ensi, yo erisemererwa. Mulisaalirwa, baitu okusaalirwa kwanyu kulirugwamu okusemererwa.
Omukazi obu aba naarumwa kuzaara, asaalirwa, habwokuba akasumi ke kaba kahikire; baitu obu amara kuzaara, obusaalizi aba atakyabwijuka habw'okusemererwa, habwokuba omwana azairwe omunsi.
Inywe nimusaalirwa hati, baitu ndigaruka mbasuule, nukwo emitima yanyu erisemererwa, kandi okusemererwa kwanyu oku busaho n'omu alikubaihaho.
Ha kiro eki timulinkaguza kantu. Mali mali nimbagambira nti: kyona eki mulisaba Isenyowe omu ibara lyange, alikibaha.
Mwakaba kuba, timukasabaga kantu omu ibara lyange. Musabe, muliheebwa, nukwo okusemererwa kwanyu kuhikirre.
“Ebi mbibagambiire omu nfumo; akasumi kalihika obu ntalibagambira omu nfumo, baitu ebya Isenyowe ndibibagambira bbwa.
Ha kiro eki mulisaba omu ibara lyange, kandi tindukubagambira nti: Nyowe ndibasabira hali Isenyowe;
ningira Isenyowe nawe abagonza, habwokuba inywe mukangonza mwaikiriza nkooku narugire hali Uwe.
Nkaruga hali Isenyowe, naija omunsi; hati ensi ningirugamu, ningaruka owa Isenyowe.”
Abeegesebwa be baagamba bati: “Weza! hati noogamba bbwa, tokyagamba omu nfumo!
Twetegeriize nkooku omanyire ebintu byona, kandi torukulindirra muntu n'omu kukukaguza; nikyo turukwikiririza nkooku warugire hali Ruhanga.”
Yesu yabagarukamu ati: “Hati mwaikiriza?
Akasumi nikaija, na hati kahikire, aka mulirarangiramu, buli muntu akwate ogwe, nimunsigaho nyenka; baitu nabwo tindi nyenka, habwokuba nyina Isenyowe.
Ebi mbibagambiire nukwo muzoole obusinge omuli nyowe. Omunsi mwina obujune, baitu mugume. Nyowe, ensi ngisingwire.”
Yesu obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yararamira haiguru nagamba ati: “Taata, akasumi kahikire; nyumiza Omwana waawe, nukwo nawe akunyumize.
Habwokuba okamuha obusobozi ha bantu boona, nukwo ahe boona aba wamukwasize obwomeezi obutahwaho.
Kandi obwomeezi obutahwaho nubwo bunu: abantu bamanye iwe Ruhanga omu, ow'amazima, na Yesu Kristo ou watumire.
Nyowe nkakunyumiza omunsi, mmazire kuhikiriza omulimo wampaire kukora.
Hati nu Taata, onnyumiririze nambere oli nongarurra ekitiinisa eki nkaba nyinakyo ndi hamu na iwe ensi etakahangirwe.
“Nkakumanyisa abantu aba wansoroliire omunsi. Bakaba bali baawe, okabampa, kandi bakwasire ekigambo kyawe.
Hati bamanyire byona ebi wampaire nkooku biruga nambere oli;
habwokuba byona ebi wangambiire nkabibamanyisa, baabiikiriza, baamanyira kimu nkooku narugire hali Iwe, kandi baikiriza ngu, niiwe wantumire.
Abo nubo ndukusabira. Tindukusabira ab'ensi, kyonka ninsabira abo aba wampaire, habwokuba baawe.
Abange boona, baawe; n'abaawe boona, bange. Ninyumiririzibwa omuli bo.
Hati tinkyali omunsi, baitu bbo bagirumu. Nyowe ninyija nambere oli. Taata Ahikiriire, abo aba wampaire obalinde habw'obusobozi bwawe obu wampaire babe bamu nka itwe oku tuli bamu.
Obu nkaba nkyaina abo aba wampaire, nkabalinda habw'obusobozi bwawe obu wampaire. Nkabalinda, tihabuzireho n'omu kwihaho ogu ou akaba ali w'okuhwerekerra, nukwo Ebyahandiikirwe bihikirre.
Baitu hati ninyija nambere oli. Binu nimbigamba nkyali omunsi, nukwo baijurre kimu okusemererwa kwange.
Mbahikizeho ekigambo kyawe; kandi abantu babanobere habwokuba tibali b'ensi enu, nka nyowe oku ntali wayo.
Tindukukusaba kubaiha omunsi, baitu obalinde hali Omubi.
Tibali b'ensi nka nyowe oku ntali w'ensi.
Obeeze omu mazima. Ekigambo kyawe nugo amazima.
Nkooku wantumire omunsi, na nyowe nukwo ngibatumiremu.
Nyowe ninyehayo habwabu, nukwo bbo beezibwe mali.”
“Tindukusabira banu bonka, baitu n'abandi abalinyikiriza habw'ebigambo byabo,
nukwo boona babe bamu nka Iwe Taata oku oli omuli nyowe, na nyowe omuli Iwe. Nabo babe omuli itwe, nukwo abantu bamanye nkooku niiwe wantumire.
Ekitiinisa eki wampaire, nikyo mbahaire. Babe bamu nka itwe oku tuli bamu,
nyowe omuli bo na Iwe omuli nyowe. Bafooke bamu, nukwo abantu bamanye nkooku wantumire, kandi wabagonza nkooku wangondeze.
Taata, aba wampaire, ningonza baikale nambere ndi, barole ekitiinisa eki wampaire, habwokuba okangonza ensi etakahangirwe.
Taata Ahikiriire, abantu batakumanye, baitu nyowe nkakumanya; kandi na banu nibamanya nkooku niiwe wantumire.
Nkabakumanyisa, kandi ndibakumanyisa, nukwo okugonza oku wangondezeemu kwikale omuli bo, na nyowe nyikale omuli bo.”
Yesu obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yaturuka n'abeegesebwa be baacwanganiza ekihanga eky'akasaaru Kederooni. Oku hakaba haliyo orugonjo oru yataahiremu aina abeegesebwa be.
Yuda, ayamugobiize, akaba naamanya ekiikaro eki. Obundi n'obundi Yesu yagendayoga hamu n'abeegesebwa be.
Nukwo Yuda kugendayo aina ekihanda ky'abaserikale n'abakuru baabo eki yahairwe banyakatagara abakuru n'Abafalisaayo, baina etaara n'ebimuli, hamu n'eby'okurwanisa.
Yesu habw'okumanya byona ebirukugenda kumubaho, yarugayo naabakaguza ati: “Nimuserra oha?”
Bbo baamugarukamu bati: “Yesu owa Nazareeti.” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Dara nyowe.” Yuda, ayamugobiize, akaba ayemeriire nabo.
Yesu obu yabagambiire ati: “Dara nyowe”, baayekanga, baagwa hansi.
Yagaruka yabakaguza ati: “Nimuserra oha?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Yesu owa Nazareeti.”
Nandiki uwe ati: “Mbagambiire ira nti; Ninyowe ogu. Obu muraaba nimuserra nyowe, abasaija banu mubaleke bagende.”
Kinu kikabaho kiikirize eki yagambire ira ati: “Hali abo aba wampaire, busaho n'omu ayabuzireho.”
Simooni Petero ow'akaba aina empirima, nubwo yagisomoire, yatema omwiru w'omukuru w'abanyakatagara, yamucwaho okutu kw'obulyo. Ibara ly'omwiru ogu, nuwe Malikusi.
Yesu yagambira Petero ati: “Empirima yawe gigarre omu kiraaro kyayo; tindukwija kubonabona Isenyowe nkooku yandagiire?”
Nubwo ekihanda ky'abaserikale n'omukuru waabo hamu n'abalinzi b'Abayudaaya baakwasire Yesu baamuboha.
Baabanza kumutwara hali Annasi, habwokuba akaba ali isezaara Kaayafa, ow'akaba ali mukuru w'abanyakatagara omu mwaka ogu.
Kaayafa ogu, nuwe yahaire Abayudaaya amagezi ati: Kihikire omuntu omu kufeera boona.
Simooni Petero hamu n'omwegesebwa ondi, baahondera Yesu. Omwegesebwa oli, habw'okumanywa mukuru w'abanyakatagara, yataaha hamu na Yesu omu kizigati kya mukuru w'abanyakatagara;
Petero akyayemeriire ha irembo. Nahabweki omwegesebwa oli, ow'akaba naamanywa mukuru w'abanyakatagara, yaturuka, yagambira omuzaana ayalindaga irembo, ataahye Petero.
Omuzaana ogu nubwo yakagwize Petero ati: “Na iwe toli omu ha beegesebwa b'omuntu ogu?” Yamugarukamu ati: “Tindi mwegesebwa we.”
Hakaba haroho embeho kandi abaheereza n'abakuru b'abaserikale bakaba bahembere omurro gw'amakara, beemeriire niboota, na Petero abarumu.
Mukuru w'abanyakatagara yakaguza Yesu ha beegesebwa be na ha nyegesa ye.
Nukwo Yesu kumugarukamu ati: “Abantu boona nabagambiraga bbwa. Butoosa naayegesaaga omu masorrokaniro n'omunju ya Ruhanga, nambere Abayudaaya boona beesorooleza. Tinkabazaaga kintu kyona omunsita.
Hati nyowe nonkaguliza ki? Kaguza abo abaampurraga ninyegesa; ebi nabagambiire nibabimanya.”
Obu yagambire eki, omu ha bakuru b'abaserikale abakaba beemeriire aho, yateera Yesu oruhi naagamba ati: “Noogarukamu oti mukuru w'abanyakatagara?”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Obu ndaaba mbalize kubi, ndumiriza ekibi eki ngambire. Obu ndaaba mbalize kurungi, onteeriire ki?”
Nubwo Annasi yamutwekere hali Kaayafa, mukuru w'abanyakatagara aboherwe.
Simooni Petero akaba ayemeriire naayota. Baamukaguza bati: “Na iwe toli omu ha beegesebwa be?” Yayehooga naagamba ati: “Nangwa, tindi mwegesebwa we.”
Omu ha baheereza ba mukuru w'abanyakatagara, anyakwina obuzaale n'omuntu Petero ou yacwireho okutu, yamukaguza ati: “Timbarozirege muli hamu omu rugonjo?”
Petero yayehooga; ahonaaho enkoko yakooka.

Nubwo baihire Yesu omwa Kaayafa, baamutwara omunju ei baacweramuga emisango. Obwire bukaba nibukyanganuka. Bbo bonka batataahe omunju y'emisango habw'okuziza, batakamazire kulya obugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho.
Pilaato nukwo kuturuka yabasanga aheeru, yabakaguza ati: “Omuntu onu nimumujunaana musango ki?”
Baamugarukamu bati: “Omuntu onu kakuba atabaire mucwi w'Ebiragiro, titwakumukuleetiire.”
Pilaato yabagambira ati: “Mumwetwarre, mumucwere omusango nimuhondera Ebiragiro byanyu.” Nandiki Abayudaaya bati: “Ebiragiro byaitu tibirukutwikiriza kwita omuntu n'omu.”
Eki kikabaho kihikirize ekigambo Yesu eki yagambire kwoleka emifeere ye.
Pilaato yagaruka yataaha omunju ey'okucweramu emisango, yayeta Yesu yamukaguza ati: “Niiwe Mukama w'Abayudaaya?”
Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Ekikaguzo eki kyawe habwawe, rundi abandi nubo bakikugambiire hali nyowe?”
Pilaato yamungarukamu ati: “Nyowe ndi Muyudaaya? Ab'ihanga lyawe n'abanyakatagara abakuru nubo bakundeetiire. Okozire ki?”

Nandiki Yesu ati: “Obukama bwange tibuli bw'omunsi munu; obu bwakubaire buli bw'omunsi munu, abaheereza bange bakurwaine, ndeke kuheebwayo hali Abayudaaya; baitu obukama bwange tibuli bw'omunsi munu.”

Pilaato yamukaguza ati: “Nukwo kugamba oli mukama?” Yesu yamugarukamu ati: “Niiwe orukugamba nkooku ndi mukama. Ningira eki nikyo nazaalirwe, kandi nikyo naiziire omunsi, okumanyisa amazima. Ow'amazima weena akwata ebigambo byange.”
Pilaato yamukaguza ati: “Amazima kimanyisa ki?” Obu yamazire kugamba eki, Pilaato yaturuka, yagaruka hali Abayudaaya, yabagambira ati: “Timurozireho musango.
Baitu mwina engeso y'okubalekerra omunyankomo omu ha kiro kikuru eky'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho. Nimwenda mbalekerre Omukama w'Abayudaaya?”
Nubwo baatokiire haiguru bati: “Atali ogu, baitu otulekerre Baraaba!” Baaraba ogu akaba ali munyagi.
Nubwo Pilaato yaragiire batwale Yesu, bamuteere enkoba.
Abaserikale baaruka ekondo y'amahwa, baagimuta ha mutwe, baamujweka orugoye rwa kahuukya;
baatandika kwija omu omu nibagamba bati: “Mirembe, Omukama w'Abayudaaya!” Baamuteera empi.
Pilaato yayongera yaturuka aheeru yabagambira ati: “Hati kammubaleetere, nukwo mumanye nkooku ntamuzoireho musango.”
Yesu nukwo kuturuka aheeru, ajwaire ekondo y'amahwa n'orugoye rwa kahuukya. Pilaato yabagambira ati: “Omuntu ngugwo!”

Baanyakatagara abakuru hamu n'abakuru b'abaserikale obu baamurozire, baatokera haiguru bati: “Mubambe! Mubambe ha musaraba!” Pilaato yabagambira ati: “Inywe inywenka mumutwale, mumubambe, habwokuba nyowe timmuzoireho musango.”
Abayudaaya baamugarukamu bati: “Twina ekiragiro, kandi ekiragiro eki nkooku kirukugamba, uwe asemeriire kufa, habwokuba akeeyeta Mwana wa Ruhanga.”
Pilaato obu yahuliire ebigambo ebi yayongera kutiina.
Yagaruka yataaha omunju ey'okucweramu emisango, yakaguza Yesu ati: “Okaruga nkaha?” Baitu Yesu tiyamugarukamu.
Pilaato nukwo kumukaguza ati: “Torukwenda kungarukamu? Tomanyire nkooku nyina obusobozi obw'okukulekera rundi obw'okukubamba ha musaraba?”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Tokubaire n'obusobozi bwona hali nyowe, kakuba butarakuhairwe kuruga omwiguru; nahabweki anyakundiraine yampikya hanu, nuwe aina ekibi ekirukukira ekyawe.”

Okuruga obu Pilaato yaserra amagezi ag'okumulekera, baitu Abayudaaya baatokera haiguru bati: “Omuntu onu obu oraamulekera, buli toli nganjani ya Kaisaali; habwokuba weena anyakwefoora mukama, aba naarwanisa Kaisaali.”
Pilaato obu yahuliire ebigambo ebi, yaragira baturukye Yesu aheeru, yaikarra ha kitebe ky'okucweraho emisango, omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa Amabaale Agaaliriirwe, kandi omu Ruhebburaayo: Gabbata.
Ekiro eki kikaba kiri ky'Okwetekaniriza ekiro kikuru eky'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho; kandi zikaba ziri saaha nka mukaaga. Nubwo Pilaato yagambiire Abayudaaya ati: “Mukama wanyu ngugwo!”
Baatokera haiguru muno bati: “Mwiheho! Mwiheho! Mubambe ha musaraba!” Pilaato yabakaguza ati: “Ndabamba mukama wanyu?” Nandiki abanyakatagara abakuru bati: “Titwina mukama ondi kwihaho Kaisaali.”
Aho Pilaato yamubakwasa, bamubambe ha musaraba.
Nubwo baatwaire Yesu, yagenda ahimbire omusaraba gwe, baahika omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa eky'Oruhanga, kandi omu Ruhebburaayo: Gologota.
Oku nuho baamubambire hamu n'abandi babiri, omu ha rubaju rw'obulyo ondi ha rubaju rw'emoso, Yesu abali hagati.
Pilaato yahandiika ekirango, yakita ha musaraba. Kihandiikirweho kiti: “Yesu owa Nazareeti, Omukama w'Abayudaaya.”
Ekirango eki kikasomwa Abayudaaya baingi, habwokuba ekiikaro nambere akaba abambirwe kikaba kiri haihi n'orubuga; kandi kikaba kihandiikirwe omu Ruhebburaayo, omu Rulatini, n'omu Rugiriiki.
Baanyakatagara abakuru b'Abayudaaya nukwo kugambira Pilaato bati: “Otahandiika oti: ‘Omukama w'Abayudaaya’; baitu handiika oti: ‘Omuntu onu akeeyeta Omukama w'Abayudaaya.’ ”
Pilaato yabagarukamu ati: “Eki mpandiikire, nikyo mpandiikire.”

Abaserikale obu baamazire kubamba Yesu, baatwara ebyokujwara bye, baabiteeka emiteeko ena, buli muserikale yabagana omuteeko gumu. Baitu ekanzu ye ekaba etaina rubaziiro, ekaba erukirwe yoona kuruga ha bikya kuhika ha mukugiro.

Nukwo bbo kugambirangana bati: “Tutagitaagura, baitu tugiterre itomo, turole ow'aragitwara.” Eki kikabaho okuhikiriza ekyahandiikirwe kiti: “Bakabagana ebijwaro byange, ekanzu yange bakagiterra itomo.”
Kandi abaserikale abo nukwo baakozire bati. Haihi n'omusaraba gwa Yesu hakaba heemeriireho nyina, na nyinento, na Mariya muka Kileyopa, na Mariya Magadaleena.
Yesu obu yarozire nyina n'omwegesebwa ou yagonzaaga beemeriire haihi, yagambira nyina ati: “Mukazi, omwana waawe ngugwo!”
Kandi yagambira omwegesebwa ogu ati: “Nyoko ngugwo!” Okuruga obu omwegesebwa yamutwara omuka ye.
Ebi obu byahoire, Yesu amazire kumanyire kimu byona nkooku bihoire (kandi okuhikiriza Ebyahandiikirwe), yagamba ati: “Iroho lindi kubi.”
Aho hakaba hateekerweho ebbakuli ijwire amarwa agasaaliire, baibikamu ekijumankuba, baakita ha rubingo, baakihikya ha kanwa ke.
Yesu obu yamazire kunyunyuguza amarwa agasaaliire, yagamba ati; “Kihoire”; yainamya omutwe, yacwekana.

Ekiro eki kikaba kiri ky'Okweteekaniriza ebiro bikuru. Habw'okutagonza emitumbi ikale ha misaraba ha kiro kya Sabbato (habwokuba Sabbato egi ekaba eri nkuru), Abayudaaya nukwo kusaba Pilaato abaserikale ab'okuhenda amaguru g'abaabambirwe, nukwo bahanuule emitumbi.
Abaserikale baija, baahenda amaguru g'ow'okubanza, n'ag'ondi abakaba babambirwe nawe.
Obu baahikire hali Yesu, baasanga afiire ira, tibaamuhenda maguru.
Baitu omu ha baserikale yamucumita icumu omu rubaju, ahonaaho haarugamu esagama n'amaizi.
Ogu ayarozire kinu, akakigumya-kandi eki yagumize ky'amazima, naamanya nkooku arukubaza amananu-nukwo na inywe mwikirize.
Ebi bikabaho bihikirize ekyahandiikirwe kiti: “Talihendwa igufa na limu.”
Kandi ekyahandiikirwe ekindi ekirukugamba kiti: “Balimurora ou baacumisire.”

Ebi obu byahoire, Yosefu owa Arimateya, ow'akaba ali mwegesebwa wa Yesu, hatali bwerebwere habw'okutiina Abayudaaya, yasaba Pilaato amwikirize kutwara omutumbi gwa Yesu. Pilaato yamwikiriza. Yosefu yaija, yahanuura omutumbi, yagutwara.
Nikodemo, ogu ayaizire hali Yesu ekiro, nawe yaija yaleeta ekitabe ky'emigaju n'eseeta, ebirukuhika kilo nka makumi ana na itano.
Baatwara omutumbi gwa Yesu, baaguzinga omu ngoye za bafuta, batairemu ebirukuboya, engeso z'Abayudaaya ez'okuziika nkooku zikaba ziri.
Haihi n'ekiikaro eki yabambirwemu, hakaba haroho orugonjo orunyakurumu ekituuro ekihyaka ekitakaziikwamuga muntu.
Omu nuho baaziikire Yesu, habwokuba kikaba kiri kiro ky'Abayudaaya eky'okweteekaniriza Sabbato, kandi ekituuro eki kikaba kiri haihi.
Ha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki, Mariya Magadaleena akaija ha kituuro nyenkya kara, obwire butakakiire. Yasanga ibaale liihirwe ha munwa gw'ekituuro.
nukwo kwiruka yagenda hali Simooni Petero n'omwegesebwa oli, Yesu ou yagonzaaga. Yabagambira ati: “MUKAMA, omukituuro bamwihiremu, kandi titurukumanya nambere bamutaire.”
Aho Petero n'omwegesebwa oli baaturuka, baagenda ha kituuro.
Bombi bairuka, baitu omwegesebwa oli yasiga Petero, yamubanza ha kituuro.
Obu yainamire kulinguzaamu, yarora engoye eza bafuta zitairwe aho, baitu uwe atataahemu.
Nubwo Simooni Petero yaija amuhondiire, yataaha omu kituuro, yarora engoye eza bafuta zitairwe aho,
n'ekitambaara ekikaba kiri ha mutwe gwe kitali hamu n'engoye eza bafuta; baitu kikubirwe, kitairwe ha wakyo kyonka.
Nubwo omwegesebwa oli, ayabandize kuhika ha kituuro, nawe yataahamu, yarora, yaikiriza.
Obusumi obu bwona, bakaba batakeetegeriize ekyahandiikirwe ekirukugamba ngu, kimuhikiriire kuhumbuuka omu bafu.
Hanyuma abeegesebwa abo baagarukayo owaabubo.
Baitu Mariya yasigara ayemeriire aheeru y'ekituuro, narra. Nubwo yainamire kulinguza omu kituuro,
yarora bamalaika babiri bajwaire ebirukwera, baikaliire nambere omutumbi gwa Yesu gukaba gutairwe, omu ha musego, ondi ha mirambi.
Nukwo bbo kumukaguza bati: “Mukazi iwe, noolizibwa ki?” Yabagarukamu ati; “Habwokuba MUKAMA wange bamutwaire, kandi tindukumanya nambere bamutaire.”
Obu yagambire eki yahinduka, yarora Yesu ayemeriire aho, baitu atamanye nkooku ali nuwe.

Nukwo Yesu kumukaguza ati: “Mukazi iwe, noolizibwa ki? Nooserra oha?” Kandi Mariya habw'okugira ngu nuwe omulimi w'orugonjo oru, yamugarukamu ati: “Waitu, obu araaba ali niiwe omutwaire, ngambira nambere omutaire, ngende mmwiheyo.”
Nubwo Yesu yamwesire ati: “Mariya.” Uwe yakubuutuka, yamwetebuka omu Ruhebburaayo ati: “Rabboni!” (amakuru gaakyo: Mwegesa).

Yesu yamugambira ati: “Otankwataho, habwokuba tinkatembere hali Isenyowe, baitu genda hali bagenzi bange obagambire oti: nintemba hali Isenyowe kandi Isiinywe, hali Ruhanga wange kandi Ruhanga wanyu.”
Mariya Magadeleena yagenda, yagambira abeegesebwa ati: “Ndozire MUKAMA waitu”; kandi yabamanyisa ebigambo ebi yamuragiire.
Ha kiro eki omu kairirizi, ekiro eky'okubanza omu wiiki, abeegesebwa bakaba beekingiire omu nju habw'okutiina Abayudaaya. Yesu akaija yabeemerra hagati, yabaramukya ati: “Obusinge bube na inywe.”
Obu yamazire kugamba eki, yabooleka ebiganja bye n'orubaju rwe. Aho abeegesebwa baasemererwa habw'okurora MUKAMA.
Yesu yayongera yagamba ati: “Obusinge bube na inywe, Isenyowe nkooku yantumire na nyowe nukwo ndukubatuma.”
Obu yamazire kugamba eki, yabaikiza orwoya, nabagambira ati: “Mutunge Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Aba muliganyira ebibi biribaganyirwa; kandi aba mutaliganyira ebibi, tibiribaganyirwa.”
Baitu Tomasi, arukwetwa Omurongo, omu ha ikumi na babiri, akaba atali nabo Yesu obu yaizire.

Nukwo abeegesebwa abandi kumugambira bati: “Turozire MUKAMA.” Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Obu ntaarole bihuta by'emisumaali omu biganja bye nkabitamu orukumu rwange, ntakakwasire n'engaro zange omu rubaju rwe, tindukwija kwikiriza.”
Obu haahingwireho ebiro munaana, abeegesebwa be nabwo bakaba bali omunju, na Tomasi abarumu. Enyigi zikaba zikingirwe, baitu Yesu yaija yabeemerra hagati, yabaramukya ati: “Obusinge bube na inywe”.
Nubwo yagambiire Tomasi ati: “Taahya hanu orukumu rwawe, kandi rora ebiganja byange; leeta engaro yawe ogite omu rubaju rwange; leka kuhakana, baitu ikiriza.”
Tomasi yamugarukamu ati: “MUKAMA wange kandi Ruhanga wange!”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Waikiriza habw'okundora? Baina omugisa abaikiriza bataina eki baarozire.”
Haroho n'ebikorwa ebindi bingi Yesu ebi yakoliire omu maiso g'abeegesebwa be, ebitarahandiikirwe omu kitabu kinu;
baitu binu bikahandiikwa nukwo mwikirize Yesu nkooku ali Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga; kandi habw'okwikiriza oku, mutunge obwomeezi omuli Uwe.
Ebi obu byahoire, Yesu yagaruka yayeyoleka abeegesebwa be ha nyanja ya Tiberiya. Akabeeyoleka ati:
Simooni Petero, na Tomasi arukwetwa Omurongo, Nasanairi owa Kana orwa Galiraaya, na batabani ba Zebedaayo, n'abeegesebwa abandi babiri bakaba bali hamu.
Simooni Petero yabagambira ati; “Nyowe ningenda kusoha.” Nabo baamugarukamu bati: “Na itwe katugende hamu.” Baagenda, baataaha omu bwato; baitu ekiro eki batakwase kantu.
Obwire obu bukaba nibukya, Yesu yayemerra ha musa gw'enyanja; baitu abeegesebwa be batamanye nkooku ali uwe.
Yesu yabakaguza ati: “Boojo, mukwasizeho encu?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Nangwa.”
Nandiki uwe ati: “Munage akatimba ha rubaju rw'obulyo orw'obwato, nimwija kukwasa.” Baakanagayo, baitu hanyuma batasobole kukasika kukataahya omu bwato, habw'encu kuba nyingi.
Nubwo omwegesebwa Yesu ou yagonzanga yagambiire Petero ati: “Ni MUKAMA!” Obu yahuliire ngu, nuwe MUKAMA, Simooni Petero ou akaba ali busa habw'okusoha, yajwara orugoye rwe, yayesimba omu nyanja.
Baitu abeegesebwa abandi baija nibagoya obwato, nibacunda akatimba akaijwire encu, habwokuba bakaba bali haihi n'obwerre nka mita kikumi mu abiri.
Obu baahikire ha bwerre, baasanga omurro gw'amakara hatalikirweho encu n'emigaati.
Yesu yabagambira ati; “Muleeteho encu ezimu ezi mwaruga kukwasa.”
Simooni Petero nukwo kugaruka omu bwato, yakurra akatimba, yakahikya ha bwerre kaijwire encu nkooto kikumi mu ataano na isatu; baitu noobu ziraaba zabaire nyingi ziti, akatimba katataaguke.
Yesu yabagambira ati: “Mwije, mulye ekyanyenkya.” Kandi busaho n'omu ha beegesebwa ayalengereho kumukaguza ati: “Niiwe oha?” Bakamanya nkooku ali nuwe MUKAMA.
Yesu yaija, yakwata omugaati, yagubagabira, kandi encu nayo yagibagabira.
Ogu nugwo gwabaire murundi gwa kasatu Yesu okubonekera abeegesebwa be, amazire kuhumbuuka omu bafu.

Obu baamazire kulya ekyanyenkya, Yesu yakaguza Simooni Petero ati: “Simooni, mutabani wa Yohaana, nongonza kukira banu?” Yamugarukamu ati: “Ego, MUKAMA wange, noomanya nkooku ndukukugonza.” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Liisa obwana bw'entaama zange.”
Yesu yamukaguza omurundi gwa kabiri ati: “Simooni, mutabani wa Yohaana nongonza?” Yamugarukamu ati: “Ego, MUKAMA wange, noomanya nkooku ndukukugonza.” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Rolerra entaama zange.”

Yamukaguza omurundi gwa kasatu ati: “Simooni, mutabani wa Yohaana, nongonza?” Petero yatuntura habw'okumukaguza omurundi gwa kasatu ati: “Nongonza?” Nukwo kumugarukamu ati: “MUKAMA wange, iwe omanyire byona; noomanya nkooku ndukukugonza.” Nandiki Yesu ati: “Liisa entaama zange.

Mali mali ninkugambira nti: Obu okaba oli musigazi, wayeteegaga orukoba, ogenda nambere wagonzaaga; baitu obu oliba ogurusire, oligorra, emikono yaawe, ondi akubohe, akutwale nambere otarukugonza kugenda.”
(Eki akakigamba kwoleka omulingo Petero ogu alifeeramu nkooku gulihaisa Ruhanga ekitiinisa.) Nubwo yamugambiire ati: “Mpondera.”
Petero yakubuutuka, yarora omwegesebwa oli Yesu ou yagonzaaga, abahondiire. Nuwe ogu ayaigamiire Yesu ha kifuba nibalya ekyekiro, kandi ayamukagwize ati: “MUKAMA, nooha arukwija kukugobeza?”
Petero obu yamuboine, yakaguza Yesu ati: “MUKAMA wange, kandi onu aliba ata?”
Nandiki Yesu ati: “Obu ndaaba ningonza aikaleho okuhika obu ndiija, iwe nookijunaana ki? Mpondera!”
Orugambo oru rwararanga omu bagenzi babo ngu, omwegesebwa ogu talifa. Yesu atagambire Petero ngu, talifa; baitu akagamba ati: “Obu ndaaba ningonza aikaleho okuhika obu ndiija, iwe nookijunaana ki?”
Omwegesebwa oli nuwe arukugumya binu byona, kandi nuwe yabihandiikire; nitumanya ebi arukugamba nkooku biri by'amazima.
Haroho n'ebindi bingi Yesu ebi yakozire; byona kakuba byahandiikirwe buli kimu, ninteekereza nti: tihaakubaireho mwanya omunsi ogw'okubyahuramu.
Omu kitabu eky'okubanza eki nakuhandiikiire, Teofilo, nkahandiikamu byona Yesu ebi yakozire n'ebi yayegeseze okuruga ha kubanza
okuhika ha kiro eki yatwaliirweho omwiguru, amazire kuraganiza abakwenda aba yayekomiire kubatwekera Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Obu yamazire kufa ha musaraba, akabeeyoleka ayomiire, naakigumya n'ebirukuhuniriza bingi. Kandi akamara ebiro makumi ana naababonekera, naabagambira eby'Obukama bwa Ruhanga.
Obu akaba akyali nabo ha meeza, akabaragira kutaruga Yerusaalemu, baitu baikaleyo bategeriize Ise eki yaraganiize. Eki nikyo mwahuliire nimbazaaho nti:
“Yohaana akabatiza n'amaizi; baitu inywe, omu biro ebitali bingi, nimwija kubatizibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.”
Abakwenda obu bakaba beesoroize hamu, bakakaguza Yesu bati: “Mukama, kanu nuko kasumi oraagarurramu Isirairi obukama?”
Uwe yabagarukamu ati: “Tikiri kyanyu kumanya akasumi rundi ebiro Isenyowe ebi yataireho habw'obusobozi bwe.
Baitu muliheebwa amaani, Mwoyo Ahikiriire obu alibaijaho; kandi muliba bakaiso bange omu Yerusaalemu, n'omu Buyudaaya yoona, n'omu Samaliya, n'okuhika ha mpero y'ensi.”
Amazire kugamba ebi, yatwarwa omwiguru bamuroleriire, ekicu kyaija kyamubasiikirizaaho.
Obu bakaba bakyaroleriire haiguru, uwe naagenda, haazooka abasaija babiri babeemeriire haihi, bajwaire engoye ezirukwera.
Baabakaguza bati: “Inywe basaija ba Galiraaya, kiki ekibeemeriize muroleriire haiguru? Yesu onu, anyakubaihirweho yatwarwa omwiguru, nukwo aligaruka ati, nkooku mwamurora naagenda.”
Nubwo Abakwenda baagarukire Yerusaalemu nibaruga ha rusozi orw'emiti Oliva, oruli haihi na Yerusaalemu, nk'orugendo orwarubatwaga ha Sabbato;

Obu baahikireyo, baatemba omu kainabiri, nambere banu boona baikaire: Petero na Yohaana, Yakobbo na Andereya, Filipo na Tomasi, Batolomayo na Matayo, Yakobbo mutabani w'Alifaayo na Simooni Omurwanirizi w'ihanga Iye, hamu na Yuda mutabani wa Yakobbo.
Abo boona bakaikara hamu bataireho muno omutima ha kusaba, baina na Mariya nyina Yesu hamu n'aboruganda rwe.
Omu biro ebi, Petero akeemerra hagati y'abagenzi be (abakaba nibahika nka kikumi n'abiri), yabagambira ati:
“Bagenzi bange, Ebyahandiikirwe bisemeriire kuhikirizibwa. Nibyo Mwoyo Ahikiriire ebi yagambisize Daudi, naaranga hali Yuda ayayebembiire abo abaakwasire Yesu.
Ningira uwe akaba naabalirwa omuli itwe, kandi akaba ahairwe omugabo gwe omu buheereza bwaitu bunu. (
Baitu omusaija ogu, sente ezi yasaswirwe habw'ekibi kye, akaiguramu omusiri. Hanyuma yayekenya hansi, yahuulika enda, amara goona gaseeseka.
Eki kikamanywa boona abaikaraga Yerusaalemu; nikyo omusiri ogu, omu ngambo yabo, gwayetiirwe Akelidama, amakuru gaakyo: Omusiri gw'Esagama.)
Nkooku kyahandiikirwe omu Kitabu kya Zabbuli kiti: ‘Eka ye, leka efooke kifurukwa, hatalibaho n'omu agiikaramu.’ Kandi kiti: ‘Omulimo gwe gutwarwe ondi.’
“Nahabweki tusemeriire kukoma omu ha basaija aba twagendaga nabo ebiro byona MUKAMA Yesu ebi yamazire na itwe,
okurugirra Yohaana obu akaba naabatiza, okuhika ha kiro Yesu eki yatwihiirweho yatwarwa omu iguru. Leka omuntu ogu afooke kaiso hamu na itwe, agumye eby'okuhumbuuka kwa Yesu.”
Nubwo baaleeta amabara abiri: Yosefu arukwetwa Barasaba, abamu ou baayetaga Yusito, hamu n'ondi arukwetwa Matiya.
Nukwo boona kusaba nibagamba bati: “Ai MUKAMA, iwe arukumanya emitima y'abantu boona, hali banu bombi otwoleke ou okomere,
kutwara obuheereza bunu n'obukwenda Yuda obu yanagire yayegendera.”
Baabaterra itomo, lyakwata Matiya; yabalirwa omu bakwenda ikumi n'omu.
Ekiro kya Pentikooti obu kyahikire, boona bakaba beesoroliize omu kiikaro kimu.
Ahonaaho okuhirra kukaruga omu iguru, kwaija nk'ekiyaga ky'amaani, kwaijuliza kimu enju nambere bakaba baikaliire.
Haazooka endimi nk'ez'omurro, zayebaganiizemu, nizaakira ha mutwe gwa buli omu omuli bo.
Boona baijura Mwoyo Ahikiriire, baatandika kubaza endimi ezindi, nkooku Mwoyo yabahaire kuzibaza.
Kasumi ako, omu Yerusaalemu, hakaba harumu Abayudaaya, abantu abeekambiire ediini, abakaba barugire omu mahanga goona agali omu nsi.
Ekitebe ky'abantu obu kyahuliire okuhirra oku, baayesorooleza hamu nibatangaara, habwokuba buli muntu akahurra abakwenda nibabaza omu rulimi rw'owaabu.
Boona baahunirra kandi baatangaara, nibeekaguza bati; “Banu boona abarukubaza tibali Bagaliraaya?
Hati kinu kiri kita, buli omu omuli itwe kubahurra nibabaza orulimi rw'owaitu nambere twazaalirwe?
Omuli itwe haroho Abapaati, Abameedi n'Abeeramiiti, hamu n'abantu abaikara Mesopotamiya, Buyudaaya na Kapadokiya, Ponto na Asiya,
Firigiya na Panfiliya, Misiri n'ebicweka bya Libbiya haihi na Kirene. Otaireho n'abagenyi abaarugire Rooma, nubo Abayudaaya n'abandi abahindukire bataaha omu diini y'Ekiyudaaya,
Abakureete n'Abaharabu. Itwena nitubahurra nibabaza omu ndimi zaitu ebikuru Ruhanga ebi yakozire.”
Boona baahunirra kandi baasoberwa, nukwo kukaguzangana bati: “Mara kinu nikimanyisa ki?”
Baitu abandi baasekereza abakwenda nibagamba bati: “Batamiire amarwa g'omutararra.”

Nubwo Petero yayemeriire hamu na ikumi n'omu, yabaliza haiguru naagamba ati: “Inywe bantu ba Buyudaaya, na boona abaikara Yerusaalemu, kinu mukyetegereze kandi mutege amatu kuhurra eki ndukwija kubagambira.
Abasaija banu tibatamiire, nkooku murukuteekereza; habwokuba hati saaha isatu za nyenkya.
Baitu kinu nikyo ekyarangirwe omurangi Yoweri ati:

‘Omu biro bya ha mpero abantu boona ndibaseesaho Mwoyo wange.’ Nukwo Ruhanga arukugamba. ‘Batabani banyu na bahara banyu baliranga ebya Ruhanga, abasigazi banyu balibonekerwa, n'abagurusi banyu baliroota ebirooto.
Ego, kandi omu biro ebi ndiseesa Mwoyo wange ha bairu bange na ha bazaana bange; nabo baliranga.
Ndyoleka ebyamahano omwiguru n'ebihuniriza omunsi: esagama, omurro, n'okucuuka kw'omwika.
Izooba liriraara n'okwezi kulinanata nk'esagama, ekiro kya MUKAMA kitakahikire, ekiro kikuru kandi ky'ekitiinisa kitakabaireho.
Kandi omuntu weena alyamirra ibara lya MUKAMA nubwo alijunwa.’

“Inywe basaija ba Isirairi, muhurre eki ndukwija kubagambira: Yesu owa Nazareeti, omuntu Ruhanga ou yabamanyisize n'eby'amaani, n'ebyamahano, n'ebihuniriza ebi yamukoleze hagati yanyu, inywena nkooku murukumanya
Yesu ogu obu yamazire kuheebwayo, entegeka ya Ruhanga nkooku ekaba eri kara koona ebintu binu bitakabaireho, mukamubamba ha musaraba, mwamwisa emikono y'abantu abatalemwa Biragiro byaitu.
Baitu Ruhanga akamuhumbuura, yamwiha omu busaalizi bw'orufu, habwokuba kikaba kitarukusoboka uwe kwikara omumaino garwo.
Kandi Daudi akamugambaho ati: ‘Obutoosa nyikaza Atahwaho mu maiso gange, habwokuba andi haihi na nyowe tinditengesebwa.
Nikyo omutima gwange gurukusemerererwa, nimbaza ebigambo by'omuhimbo kandi obu nkyali mwomeezi ndaikaraga nimwesiga.
Habwokuba tolindekera nkagenda Okuzimu, toliikiriza Enganzi yawe kujunda.
Ondagirra omuhanda gw'okumpikya ha kujunwa; okwikara omumaiso gaawe kulinyijuza okusemererwa kwona.’
“Bagenzi bange, busaho kugurukyagurukya: isenkuru itwe Daudi nawe akafa, yaziikwa, n'okuhika hati ekituuro kye kiri owaitu hanu.
Habw'okusangwa ali murangi, na habw'okumanya Ruhanga nkooku yamurahiire ati: Omu ha baijukuru be alimwikaliza ha kitebe ky'obukama bwe,
Daudi akamanya kara kandi yabaza ha kuhumbuuka kwa Kristo, nkooku atarasingirwe Kuzimu, kandi n'omubiri gwe nkooku gutarajunzire.
Yesu ogu, Ruhanga akamuhumbuura; kandi eki itwena nitukijurra.
Obu yamazire kunyumizibwa ali ha mukono gw'obulyo gwa Ruhanga kandi amazire kuheebwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, Ise ou yamuraganiize, nuwe akozire ekihuniriza kinu eki murukurora kandi eki murukuhurra.
Mazimakwo Daudi atatembe omu iguru; baitu nuwe ayagambire ati: ‘Atahwaho akangambira MUKAMA wange ati: Ikarra ha mukono gwange ogw'obulyo,
okuhika abanyanzigwa baawe obu ndibafoora akatebe ak'ebigere byawe.’
“Ab'enju ya Isirairi boona leka bamanyire kimu Yesu ou mwabambire ha musaraba nkooku Ruhanga yamuhindwire, yamufoora MUKAMA kandi Kristo.”
Abantu obu baahuliire ebi, omutima gwabasarra, baakaguza Petero n'abakwenda abandi bati; “Bagenzi baitu, turaakora ki?”
Petero yabagarukamu ati; “Mwegarukemu. Buli omu omuli inywe abatizibwe omu ibara lya Yesu Kristo, nukwo muganyirwe ebibi byanyu. Kandi muliheebwa ekisembo kya Ruhanga, nuwe Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Habwokuba okuraganizibwa oku: kwanyu, n'okw'abaana banyu, kandi kw'abandi boona abakyali, boona MUKAMA Ruhanga aba araayetaga.”
Petero akabasoborra n'ebindi bingi naabateererra ati: “Mwejune, muruge omu bantu b'obusinge bunu obuhabire.”
Abo abaikiriize ebigambo bye bakabatizibwa. Ha kiro eki, ha muhendo gw'abaikiriza hakongerwaho abantu nk'enkumi isatu.
Abaikiriza abo boona bakaikara nibeekambira enyegesa z'abakwenda, nibateerana nabo omu kucwa omugaati n'omu kusaba.
Abantu boona bakatiina habw'ebyamahano bingi n'ebihuniriza ebyakozirwe abakwenda.
Abaikiriize boona baikaraga hamu, kandi n'ebintu byabo byona baabibaganaga hamu.
Baatundaga ebintu byabo hamu n'itungo lyabo. Ebyarugamuga babibagana, baha buli muntu nkooku yayetaagaga.
Buli kiro baayesoroolezaaga omunju ya Ruhanga kandi baateeraniraga mu maka gaabo kucwamu omugaati. Baalyaaga ebyokulya byabo n'okusemererwa, baina omutima murungi,
nibakugiza Ruhanga kandi nibasiimwa abantu boona. Buli kiro MUKAMA yayongerahoga omuhendo gw'abo abarukujunwa.
Kiro kimu Petero na Yohaana bakaba nibagenda omunju ya Ruhanga ha saaha y'okusaba, niyo saaha ya mwenda.
Baarora abahimbire omuntu nibamurabyaho. Omuntu ogu akaba azairwe ali mulema. Buli kiro baamuhimbaga, baamuta ha irembo ly'Enju ya Ruhanga erirukwetwa Erirungi, asabirize abo abataahamuga.
Omusaija ogu obu yarozire Petero na Yohaana nibaija kutaaha omunju ya Ruhanga, yabasaba bamuhe akantu.
Petero ow'akaba ali na Yohaana yamugumyaho amaiso, yamugambira ati: “Turolerre.”
Nawe yabataho amaiso, naanihira ngu, baramuha akantu.
Baitu Petero yagamba ati: “Efeeza n'ezaabbu tinyinabyo, baitu ninkuha eki nyinakyo. Omu ibara lya Yesu Kristo owa Nazareeti, imuka orubate.”
Petero yamukwata omukono gw'obulyo, yamwimukya. Ahonaaho amaguru ge n'ebigere bye byatunga amaani.
Yabandaatuka, yayemerra, yatandika kurubata, yataaha nabo omunju ya Ruhanga naarubata, naaguruka, kandi naakugiza Ruhanga.
Abantu boona obu baamurozire naarubata kandi naakugiza Ruhanga,
baamumanyirra nkooku nuwe ayaikaraga naasabiiriza ha Irembo Erirungi ery'Enju ya Ruhanga, baahunirra muno kandi baatangaara habw'eki ekimubaireho.
Omusaija ogu, obu akaba akyagumiireho Petero na Yohaana, abantu boona babaizira nibairuka, bali omu kisasi ky'omulyango ekirukwetwa ekya Solomooni, nibahunirra muno.

Petero obu yarozire eki, yatandika kubeegesa ati: “Inywe basaija ba Isirairi, kinu nikibahunirizaho ki? Habwaki nimutuhanga amaiso nk'abarukuteekereza ngu, obusobozi rundi oburungi bwaitu nibyo byarubasa omusaija onu?
Ruhanga owa Abburahamu, Isaaka na Yakobbo, Ruhanga ow'abaisenkuru itwe, nuwe yanyumiize omuheereza we Yesu, ou mwahaireyo mwamwehakanira omu maiso ga Pilaato, obu akaba amaliriire kumulekera.
Baitu inywe mukeehakana ogu Arukwera kandi Ahikiriire, mwasaba okuheebwa omwisi w'abantu,
kandi mwaita ou turukweta endugirro y'obwomeezi. Nuwe ogu Ruhanga ou yahumbwire omu bafu, kandi niitwe bakaiso b'ekintu eki.
Okwikiriza ibara lya Yesu n'obusobozi bwe nibyo byagarurra amaani omusaija onu, ou murukurora kandi ou murukumanya. Okwikiriza Yesu nukwo kwamukiriza kimu inywena nkooku murukurora.
“Hati nu bagenzi bange, nimmanya ngu, inywe n'abeebembezi banyu eki mukakikora habw'obutamanya.
Baitu Ruhanga nukwo yahikiriize ati eki yarangisize abarangi boona ngu, Kristo we alibonabonesibwa.
Nahabweki mwegarukemu, muhindukire Ruhanga, ebibi byanyu biihweho. Obu nubwo MUKAMA araabaha ebiro eby'okuhuumuzibwamu,
kandi abatumire Kristo ou yabategekiire.
Nuwe Yesu anyakwikara omwiguru okuhika akasumi k'okugarurramu buhyaka ebintu byona, Ruhanga nkooku yarangisize abarangi be abahikiriire okuruga kara.
Mazimakwo Musa akagamba ati: ‘Omu bagenzi banyu, MUKAMA Ruhanga naija kubaimukizamu omurangi ondi, nka nyowe oku yanyimukize. Byona ebi araakabagambiraga, mubihikirize.
Omuntu weena atalihurra murangi ogu, alihwerekerezibwa, aihwe omu bantu ba Ruhanga.’
Kandi abarangi boona abaarangire ebya Ruhanga, okuruga hali Samwiri n'abo abaamuhondiire, nukwo baarangire bati ha biro binu.
Inywe muli baijukuru b'abarangi kandi bagwetwa b'endagaano Ruhanga ei yaraganiize baisenkuru inywe, naagambira Abburahamu ati: ‘Omu ruzaaro rwawe, enganda zoona ez'ensi numwo ziriheerwa omugisa.’
Ruhanga obu yahumbwire omwana we, akabanza kumutuma hali inywe Abayudaaya, abahe omugisa naiha buli omu omuli inywe omu ngeso ze ezitahikire.”
Petero na Yohaana obu bakaba nibakyabaza n'abantu, banyakatagara baabaizira baina omulinzi omukuru w'Enju ya Ruhanga hamu n'Abasadukaayo.
Bbo babihiirwe habw'okuhurra Petero na Yohaana nibeegesa kandi nibarangirra okuhumbuuka kw'abafu okwatandikire na Yesu.
Baabakwata, baabalindira omu nkomo okuhika nyenkya, habwokuba bukaba bwizire.
Baitu baingi omuli abo abaahuliire enyegesa yabu bakaikiriza; n'omuhendo gw'abaikiriza gwayeyongera, gwahika nk'enkumi itaano.
Obu bwakiire nyenkya, abalemi baabo hamu n'abakuru b'enganda n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro bakeesorooleza Yerusaalemu,
baina Annasi mukuru w' abanyakatagara, Kaayafa, Yohaana, Alekizanda, n'abandi boona ab'oruganda rw'omukuru wa banyakatagara.
Obu baayemeriize abanyankomo hagati, baatandika kubakaguza bati: “Busobozi ki obubakoleze binu, rundi mubikozire omu ibara ly'oha?”
Petero, aijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire, yabagarukamu ati: “Inywe abalemi b'abantu n'abakuru b'enganda,
obu muraaba nimutukaguza hati habw'ekikorwa ky'embabazi eki tukoliire omuntu ogu omulema kandi nkooku akiziibwe,

inywe inywena hamu n'abantu ba Isirairi boona mumanye ngu, omu ibara lya Yesu Kristo owa Nazareeti ou mwabambire hamusaraba, Ruhanga ou yahumbwire omu bafu, habw'Ogu, omusaija onu nikyo ayemereriire omu maiso ganyu akizire.
Yesu ogu niryo ibaale inywe abombeki eri mwayangire, baitu niryo lyafookere bugumizo bw'enju.
Tiharoho ondi asobora kutujuna, habwokuba busaho ibara lindi hansi y'iguru eryahairwe abantu erisobora kutujuna.”
Ab'orukurato obu baarozire obumanzi bwa Petero na Yohaana, kandi baabamanya nkooku bali bantu kwonka abateegesiibwe, baahunirra. Baabamanya nkooku bali nubo abakaba nibaikara na Yesu.
Obu baarozire omusaija ayakiziibwe abeemeriire ha rubaju, baaburwa eki baraabahakaniza.
Nukwo kubaragira kuturuka aheeru, bbo bahanule bonka,
nibakaguzangana bati: “Abasaija banu tubakole ki? Habwokuba baakozire ekyamahano ekirangainwe kandi ekimanyirwe abantu boona abaikara Yerusaalemu, titukyasobora kukyehakana.
Kyonka habw'okukiculeeza kireke kweyongera kurangaanwa hoona omu bantu ka tubakange; balekere aho kugambira omuntu weena omu ibara eri.”
Nukwo kweta abakwenda, baabateererra kutagaruka kugamba rundi kwegesa omu ibara lya Yesu.
Baitu Petero na Yohaana baabagarukamu bati: “Na inywe mukicwemu, obu kiraaba kihikire omu maiso ga Ruhanga itwe okubahurra okukira Ruhanga.
Kyonka, ebi twarozire n'ebi twahuliire titusobora kubiculerra.”
Ab'orukurato baayongera kubakanga, hanyuma baabalekera, habw'okuburwa obulyo obu baraabafubirraho. Kandi abantu boona bakaba nibakugiza Ruhanga habw'eki ekyabaireho.
Bakamanya omusaija ogu ayakozirweho ekyamahano eki eky'okukizibwa, nkooku akaba ahingwize emyaka makumi ana ey'obukuru.
Petero na Yohaana obu baalekiirwe, baagenda hali ab'ekitebe kyabu, baabamanyisa byona banyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'enganda ebi baabagambiire.
Obu baabihuliire, boona baimukiza Ruhanga amaraka nibamusaba bati: “Ai Mukama Rutakirwa, niiwe ayahangire iguru n'ensi, n'enyanja, n'ebinyakubirumu byona,
niiwe ayayekonyiize Mwoyo Ahikiriire kugambisa isenkuru-itwe Daudi omuheereza waawe oti: ‘Habwaki amahanga geekoba kukora kubi, habwaki abantu bahanurra busa ebitarumu?
Abakama b'ensi nibeetekaniriza obulemu, n'abalemi bakeesorooza hamu kurwanisa Atahwaho n'okurwanisa MUKAMA we ou yayekomiire.’
Kyamazima omu rubuga runu, Herode na Ponsio Pilaato bakeeteeraniza n'Abanyamahanga n'abantu ba Isirairi kurwanisa omwana waawe ahikiriire Yesu ou wayekomiire abe Mukama.
Nukwo bahikiriize bati ebi wategekere ira omu magezi gaawe n'omu busobozi bwawe ngu kibeho.
Hati nu, Ai MUKAMA, rora nkooku barukutukangisa, okoonyere abaheereza baawe kubaza ekigambo kyawe n'obumanzi bwona.
Gorra omukono gwawe, okize; kandi oikirize ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano bikorwe omu ibara ly'omwana waawe ahikiriire Yesu.”
Obu baamazire kusaba, ekiikaro ha bakaba beesoroliize kyatengeeta; boona baijura Mwoyo Ahikiriire, baatandika kubaza ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'obumanzi.
Ekitebe kyona eky'abaikiriza bakaba baina omutima gumu n'omwoyo gumu. Hakaba hataroho n'omu omuli bo ayagizire ngu, byona ebi yatungire bye wenka; baitu byona bikaba biri by'abo boona.
Abakwenda bakongera kujurra okuhumbuuka kwa MUKAMA Yesu n'obumanzi bwingi, kandi embabazi za MUKAMA zaikaraga hali bo.
Omuli bo hakaba hatarumu n'omu ayaburwahoga ekintu, habwokuba boona abakaba baina ebibanja rundi amaju bakabitunda, baaleeta sente ezi baihiremu,
baaziha abakwenda. Bbo baazigabira buli omu nkooku yayetaagaga.
Hakaba haroho omusaija ow'oruganda rwa Leevi, enzaarwa ya Kipuro, arukwetwa Yosefu, abakwenda ou baayesire Baranaba (amakuru gaalyo: Mwekambisa).
Uwe akatunda ekibanja eki akaba ainakyo, yaleeta sente, yaziha abakwenda.
Hakaba haroho omusaija arukwetwa Ananiya. Uwe hamu na mukazi we Safiira bakatunda ekimu ha bibanja byabo.
Baitu Ananiya yasigaza ekicweka kya sente ezaarugiremu, amazire kwikirraniza na mukazi we. Yaleetaho ekicweka ekisigaireho, yakikwasa abakwenda.
Petero nukwo kumukaguza ati: “Ananiya, Sitaani ataahire ata omu mutima gwawe kubiiha Mwoyo Ahikiriire, okasigaza ekicweka kya sente ez'otunzire omu kibanja?

Obu okaba otakakitunzire, kikaba kitali kyawe bweremera? Kandi obu wamazire kukitunda, sente zaakyo okaba otarukusobora kwikoza nkooku orukwenda? Ekiteekerezo eki kikaija kita omu mutima gwawe? Tobiihire bantu, baitu obiihire Ruhanga.”
Ananiya obu yahuliire ebigambo ebi, yagwa hansi, yakanguka. Kandi eki kyatiinisa muno boona abaakihuliire.
Abasigazi baimuka, baazinga omutumbi gwe omu rugoye, baaguturukya, baaguziika.
Obu haahingwireho esaaha nka isatu, mukazi we yaija atamanyire ekibaireho.
Nukwo Petero kumukaguza ati: “Ngambira, omuhendo gunu nugwo mwatunzire omu kibanja?” Nandiki mukazi ati: “Ego, nugwo ogu.”
Nubwo Petero yamukagwize ati: “Habwaki mwikirraniize kwohya Mwoyo wa Ruhanga. Emirindi egi noogihurra? Y'abantu abarukuruga kuziika baro, bali ha irembo; na iwe nibaija kukuturukya.”
Ahonaaho omukazi ogu yagwa hansi ha bigere bya Petero, yakanguka. Abasigazi obu baataahiremu, baasanga afiire ira; baamuturukya, baamuziika ha rubaju rwa iba.
Obutiini bwakwata ekitebe kyona eky'abaikiriza n'abandi boona abaahuliire ebigambo ebi.
Omu kasumi ako abakwenda bakaba nibakora ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano bingi omu bantu. Abaikiriza boona baayesoroolezaaga omu kisasi ky'omulyango gwa Solomooni, baina omutima gumu.
Baitu abandi abatali b'ekitebe kyabo, busaho n'omu ayayehoiremu kuteerana nabo, noobu baraaba basiimirwe abantu boona.
Kandi omuhendo gw'abasaija n'abakazi abaikiriize MUKAMA gukeeyongera muno kukira kara.
Baatwaraaga abarwaire baabo, baabata ha nguudo, baababyamya ha butabu na ha mikeeka, nukwo ekiituuru kya Petero kibahikeho obu araaba naahingura.
Abantu baaruga omu byaro ebiherraine Yerusaalemu, baayesorooleza aho, baleesire abarwaire n'abakwasirwe emyoyo emibi, boona baakizibwa.
Omu kasumi ako, omukuru w'abanyakatagara akaimuka, hamu n'ab'ekitebe ky'Abasadukaayo aba akaba ainabo. Boona baijwire ihali,
baakwata abakwenda, baabata omu nkomo ei baatamuga abantu boona.
Baitu ekiro, malaika wa MUKAMA yakingura enyigi z'enkomo, yabaturukya aheeru, yagamba ati:
“Mugende, mwemerre omunju ya Ruhanga, mugambire abantu ebigambo byona eby'obwomeezi bunu obuhyaka.”

Obu baahuliire eki, baataaha omunju ya Ruhanga obwire nibukyanganyka, baatandika kwegesa. Nubwo mukuru w'abanyakatagara yaizire n'abakonyezi be, yasorooza orukurato rukuru n'abakuru boona aba Isirairi, yatuma omu nkomo, abalinzi baleete abakwenda.
Baitu abakuru b'abaserikale obu baahikire omu nkomo, baasanga batarumu, nubwo baagarukire baamanyisa orukurato bati:
“Twasanga enkomo ekingirwe kurungi mali, n'abalinzi beemeriire ha miryango; baitu obu tukingwireho, omunda titwasangamu muntu.”
Omukuru w'abalinzi b'Enju ya Ruhanga hamu n'abanyakatagara abakuru, obu baahuliire amakuru ago, baatuntura muno, batarukumanya ebigambo ebi nambere biraagarukira.
Nubwo haizire omuntu ayabaleetiire amakuru naagamba ati: “Abasaija aba mwataire omu nkomo, hati beemeriire omunju ya Ruhanga nibeegesa abantu.”
Omukuru w'abalinzi b'Enju ya Ruhanga n'abakuru b'abaserikale baagenda, baabaihayo mpora, nibatiina kubakwasa amaani, nukwo abantu batabateera amabaale.
Obu baabaleesire, baabeemereza omu rukurato hagati, mukuru w'abanyakatagara yabakaguza ati:
“Tukabateererra kutagaruka kwegesa omu ibara ly'omuntu ogu, baitu hati Yerusaalemu mugiijwize enyegesa yanyu, kandi mwegesa nk'abarukugenderra kutukwasa omusango ogw'esagama y'omuntu ogu!”
Petero n'abakwenda abandi baamugarukamu bati: “Itwe tusemeriire kworobera Ruhanga kukira kworobera abantu.
Ruhanga wa baisenkuruitwe akahumbuura Yesu, inywe ou mwaisire nimumuhanika ha muti.
Baitu Ruhanga akamunyumiza, yamuta ha mukono gwe ogw'obulyo abe Omwebembezi kandi Omujuni, habw'okwegarukisamu Abaisirairi n'okubaganyiza ebibi.
Itwe tuli bakaiso b'ebi byona, hamu na Mwoyo Ahikiriire, Ruhanga ou yahaire abo abamworobera.”
Ab'orukurato obu baahuliire ebi, baabihirwa muno, baagonza kubaita.
Baitu omu rukurato, hakaba harumu Omufalisaayo arukwetwa Gamalyeri, omwegesa w'ebiragiro, abantu boona ou baatamuga ekitiinisa. Uwe akeemerra, yabasaba abasaija abo babaturukyeho aheeru.
Hanyuma, ab'orukurato yabagambira ati: “Inywe basaija ba Isirairi, mwegendereze eki murukukora abantu banu.

Omu biro ebyahingwire, Tehuda, omusaija omubi, akaimuka yayeyeta mwebembezi omukuru, kandi abantu nk'ebikumi bbina bakamukuraatira. Baitu omusaija ogu obu yaisirwe, abaamuhondiire boona baararanga, n'ebyabo byagarukira aho.
Ogu obu yahoireho, hakaimuka Yuda Omugaliraaya, omu biro by'okubara abantu, yayemesa baingi; baitu nawe akaitwa, na boona abamukuraatiire baararanga.
Hati amagezi ndukubaha nugo ganu: Abantu abo mubagendeho mpora, mubaleke; habwokuba enyegesa enu n'ebikorwa binu obu biraaba birugire omu bantu, birihwaho.
Baitu obu biraaba biri bya Ruhanga, timulisobora kubihwerekereza. Mwerinde mutaikara kuba nimurwana na Ruhanga!”
Ab'orukurato baikiriza amagezi aga yabahaire. Obu bataahize abakwenda, baaragira babateere enkoba, kandi baabateererra kutagaruka kwegesa omu ibara lya Yesu. Hanyuma baabalekera.
Abakwenda baaruga omu rukurato baina omuhimbo habw'okugaywa nibaturwa ibara lya Yesu.
Kandi buli kiro baayegesaaga omunju ya Ruhanga n'omu maka g'abantu nibarangirra abantu Yesu nkooku ali Kristo.

Omu biro ebi, abeegesebwa obu baayeyongiire kukanya, Abayudaaya abaabazaaga Orugiriiki baahyemera Abayudaaya abaabazaaga Oruhebburaayo, habwokuba abafaakati baabo bakaba batarukufibwaho omu kugabirwa ebintu okw'obutoosa.
Nubwo ikumi na babiri baayesire ekitebe ky'abeegesebwa boona, baabagambira bati: “Tikihikire itwe okuleka kurangirra ekigambo kya Ruhanga tukagenda ha kugaba ebyokulya.
Nahabweki bagenzi baitu, mukome omuli inywe abasaija musanju abarukusiimwa abantu, abaijwire Mwoyo wa Ruhanga n'amagezi, tubakwase omulimo gunu.
Baitu itwe nitwija kwekambira kusaba n'okwegesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga.”

Ekihanuuro eki kyasiimwa ekitebe kyona, baakoma Sitefano, omusaija anyakwina okwikiriza kwingi kandi anyakwijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire, baakoma Filipo na Porokooro, Nikanoori na Timooni, Paamena na Nikola owa Antyokiya ayahindukire yataaha omu diini y'ekiyudaaya.
Abo baabaleeta omumaiso g'abakwenda, baabasabira, abakwenda baabataho emikono.
Ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyayeyongera, n'omuhendo gw'abeegesebwa gwakanya muno omu Yerusaalemu, kandi banyakatagara baingi baikiriza kuhondera enyikiriza egi.
Sitefano, Ruhanga ou yahaire emigisa nyingi n'amaani, akatandika kukora ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano omu bantu.
Nukwo abantu kwimuka kumuteeza empaka, abamu nibaruga omu isorrokaniro ly'Abaalekiirwe (nkooku lyayetwaga) n'Abakirene n'Aba Alekizanderiya, kandi n'abandi abaarugire Kilikiya na Asiya.
Bbo batasobole kumusingura habw'amagezi yahairwe hamu n'ebi Mwoyo wa Ruhanga ebi yamugambisize.
Nukwo kugulirra abantu ab'okumuhangirra bati: “Tukahurra naagamba eby'okujuma Musa na Ruhanga.”
Obu baamazire kwimukiriza abantu n'abakuru baabo hamu n'abeegesa b'ebiragiro, baamwizira, baamukwata, baamuleeta omu rukurato.
Baayemereza aho bakaiso b'ebisuba abaagizire bati: “Omusaija onu tayosa kugamba kubi ha kiikaro kinu ekirukwera na ha Biragiro byaitu.
Tukamuhurra naayegesa ati: Yesu owa Nazareeti alihwerekereza ekiikaro kinu, kandi alihindura engeso Musa ezi yatusigiire.”
Boona abakaba baikaliire omu rukurato obu bahangire Sitefano amaiso, baarora amaiso ge nigangasana nk'aga malaika.
Mukuru wa banyakatagara akakaguza Sitefano ati: “Ebigambo binu by'amazima?”
Uwe yamugarukamu ati: “Bagenzi bange na bataata, mumpuliirize! Ruhanga ow'ekitiinisa akabonekera isenkuru-itwe Abburahamu, obu akaba akyali Mesopotamiya, atakagenzire kwikara Haraani,
yamugambira ati: ‘Ruga omu nsi y'owanyu n'omu beene banyu, ogende omunsi ei ndikwoleka.’
Nawe nukwo kuruga omunsi y'Abakalidaaya, yagenda kwikara Haraani. Ise obu yamazire kufa, Ruhanga yamwihayo, yamuleeta omunsi enu ei murumu hati.
Baitu atamuhemu bugwetwa, nangwa, noobu haakuba h'okuta ekigere; kyonka akaraganiza kumuha ensi, ebe butaka bwe n'abaijukuru be, noobu aliba yabaire ataina mwana omu kasumi ako.
Ruhanga yayongeraho binu ati: Abaijukuru baawe balisuhuukira omu nsi endi mbere abantu balibafoora bairu rubaale kandi balibakora kubi kumara emyaka bikumi bbina.
Ruhanga yayongera ati: ‘Ihanga eriribaikaza liti, ndiricwera omusango, nukwo hanyuma barugeyo, bandamize omu kiikaro kinu.’

Nubwo yamuhaire endagaano y'omugenzo gw'okusarwa. Kandi omutabani we Isaaka obu yazairwe, Abburahamu yamusara ha kiro kya munaana. Isaaka nawe nukwo yasazire Yakobbo; na Yakobbo yasara ati baisenkuruitwe ikumi na babiri.
“Baisenkuru itwe abo habw'okukwatirwa Yosefu ihali, baamutunza abantu abaamutwaire Misiri. Baitu Ruhanga yaikara nawe,
yamwiha omu mihito ye, yamuha amagezi agamukonyiire kusiimwa Faraaho, omukama wa Misiri. Faraaho akamufoora mulemi mukuru wa Misiri kandi omuroleerezi w'ekikaali kye kyona.
Hanyuma hakagwa kiihe omunsi Misiri yoona n'eya Kanaani, haabaho omuhito mwingi. Baisenkuru itwe baaburwa ebyokulya.
Baitu Yakobbo obu yahuliire nkooku Misiri haliyo engano erukutundwa, yatumayo baisenkuruitwe omurundi gw'okubanza.
Kandi ha murundi gwa kabiri, Yosefu yayetondera bakuru be, nukwo Faraaho kumanya oruganda rwe.
Aho Yosefu yatuma bamwetere Yakobbo ise n'ab'oruganda rwe boona, abantu nsanju na bataano.
Yakobbo yagenda Misiri, kandi oku nuho yagwire hamu n'abaisenkuruitwe,
emitumbi yaabu yatwarwa Sekemu, yaziikwa omu kituuro Abburahamu eki akaba aguzireho batabani ba Hamori owa Sekemu.
“Baitu akasumi ak'okuhikiriza endagaano Ruhanga ei yaraganiize Abburahamu obu kairiire haihi, abantu bakakanya baahingurana omunsi Misiri,
okuhika engoma obu yaliirwe omukama ondi ow'akaba atamanyire Yosefu.
Ogu yacwera ihanga lyaitu amagezi, yahambiriza baisenkuruitwe kunaga abaana baabo enkerembe, bafe.
Omu kasumi ako Musa nubwo yazairwe, ali mwana murungi anyakusiimwa Ruhanga. Akoororwa omunju ya ise kumara ameezi asatu.
Baitu uwe obu yanagirwe, muhara wa Faraaho yamuzoora, yamutwara, yamworoora nk'omwana we nyabwe.
Musa akatendekwa amagezi goona ag'Abamisiri, kandi akaba ali w'amaani omu bigambo n'omu bikorwa bye.
“Musa obu yahikize emyaka makumi ana ey'obukuru, yaizirwa ekiteekerezo eky'okubungira ab'ihanga lye Abaisirairi.
Obu yarozire omu hali bo naakorwa kubi, yamurwanirra, yamuhorra enzigu, naateera Omumisiri.
Akanihira ngu bagenzi be bakengere nkooku nuwe Ruhanga yatumire kubaiha mu bwiru rubaale, baitu bbo batakimanye.
Ha kiro ekyakurasireho, yasanga babiri mulibo nibarwana, yagonza abaramule abateeranize, nukwo kubagambira ati: ‘Basaija inywe, habwaki nimukorangana kubi, kunu muli iseemu?’
Ogu ayabaire naakora kubi mugenzi we yamusindika kuli naagamba ati: ‘Nooha ayakuhaire obusobozi obw'okutulema n'okutucwera emisango?
Nooyenda kuunyita nkooku waisire Omumisiri ijo?’
Musa obu yahuliire eki, yairuka, yasuhuukira omunsi ya Midiyani. Oku nuho yazaaliire abatabani babiri.
“Obu haahingwireho emyaka makumi ana, malaika yamubonekera omu ndimi z'omurro, ogukaba nigwakira omu rusaka, omwirungu erinyakuheriire Orusozi Sinai.
Musa, obu yarozire omurro ogu, yahunirra. Obu yairiire haihi kwetegereza, yahurra iraka lya MUKAMA nirigamba liti:
‘Ninyowe Ruhanga w'abaswenkuru. Ruhanga wa Abburahamu, Isaaka n'owa Yakobbo.’ Musa yatukumira, yatiina n'okugumyaho amaiso.
MUKAMA yamugambira ati: ‘Juuramu enkaito zaawe, habwokuba ekiikaro nambere oyemeriire nikyera.
Mazimakwo ndozire abantu bange abali omu Misiri nkooku barukukorwa kubi, kandi mpuliire okusinda kwabo; nyizire kubaiha mu bwiru bwabo. Hati nu ija, nkutume Misiri.’

“Nahabweki Musa ogu, abantu ou baayangire nibagamba bati: ‘Nooha yakuhaire obusobozi obw'okutulema n'okutucwera emisango?’ nuwe ogu Ruhanga ou yatumire abe mwebembezi kandi mucunguzi waabo, naabajunisa obusobozi bwa malaika ayamubonekiire omu rusaka.
Musa obu yamazire kukora ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano omu Misiri, akabaihayo nabarabya omu Nyanja Erukutukura, n'omu irungu nambere baamazire emyaka makumi ana.
Ogu nuwe Musa ayagambiire Abaisirairi ati: ‘Omu bagenzi banyu Ruhanga naija kubaimukizaamu omurangi ondi, nka nyowe oku yanyimukize.’

Musa ogu nuwe akaba aina ekitebe kyona ky'abantu omu irungu, aina na malaika ayabalize nawe ha rusozi Sinai, kandi Musa nuwe ogu ayabalize n'abaisenkuru itwe bwire obu bwona. Nuwe yakwasiibwe ebigambo by'obwomeezi kubituhikyaho.
“Baisenkuru itwe bakanga kumuhurra, baamucuma kuli; kandi omu mitima yabu bakagonza kugaruka Misiri,
baagambira Arooni bati: ‘Tukorre baruhanga ab'okutwebembera; habwokuba Musa ogu ayatwihire omunsi ya Misiri, titurukumanya nkooku abaire.’
Nukwo kuheesa ekisisani ky'enyana, baakihongera ekyonzira, baasemerererwa ekintu ki baayekoliire.

Ruhanga akabahwamu, yabaleka baramye ihe ery'enyunyuuzi ez'omu iguru, nkooku kyahandiikirwe omu kitabu ky'abarangi kiti: ‘Inywe ab'omu ruganda rwa Isirairi, omu irungu mukampongera ebisoro ebinyakwisirwe n'ebyonzira kumara emyaka makumi ana.
Baitu mwarugayo mwayetwekaga eheema ya Moloki n'enyunyuuzi z'omucwezi Refani, nibyo ebisisani ebi mwayekoliire kuramya; nikyo ndibazaahiza mbahinguze Bbabbulooni.’
“Baisenkuru itwe bakaba baina Eheema omu irungu erukugumya Ruhanga nkooku yaikaraga nabo, niyo egi Ruhanga ei yaragiire Musa kukora narorra ha kisisani eki yamwolekere.

Eheema egi niyo baisenkuruitwe basigiirwe baisebo, bakagenda nayo okuhika Yoswa obu yagihikize omunsi egi ei baanyagireho abantu Ruhanga aba yabingiremu, baisenkuruitwe nibahikamu bati. Eheema yaikarayo okuhika omu businge bwa Daudi,
Ruhanga ou yagiriire embabazi. Daudi akasaba aikirizibwe kwombekera Ruhanga wa Yakobbo Enju.
Baitu Solomooni nuwe yamwombekiire Enju egi.
Kunu Rutakirwa taikara omu maju agombekerwe n'emikono y'abantu, omurangi nkooku yagambire ati:
‘Iguru nikyo kitebe kyange eky'obukama, kandi ensi nuko katebe k'ebigere byange. MUKAMA yayongera yakaguza ati: Nju ya mulingo ki ei mulinyombekera? Rundi kiikaro ki eki ndihumurramu?
Ebintu ebi byona bitakorwe mukono gwange?’
“Ntahurra inywe, ab'emitima egangaire n'amatu agatarukuhurra nk'ag'Abanyamahanga, butoosa mwangirra Mwoyo Ahikiriire. Baisenkuru inywe nkooku babaire nibakora, na inywe nukwo murukukora.
Murangi ki baisenkuru inywe ou batarahiiganiize? Bakaita abo abaarangire okwija kw'Omuhikiriire Ogu, ou mwagobiize kandi mwamwita.
Inywe abaahairwe Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga ebyaleesiirwe bamalaika, mwayanga kubikwata.”
Ab'orukurato obu baahuliire ebigambo ebi, baakwatwa ekiniga kingi, baamunenera ensaya.
Baitu Sitefano, aijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire, amaiso yagahanga ha lguru, yarora ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga, na Yesu amwemeriire ha mukono gw'obulyo.
Yagamba ati: “Nindora iguru likingwirwe n'Omwana w'omuntu ayemeriire ha mukono gw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga.”
Baitu bbo baatoka muno, baigara amatu gaabo, baamweseesaho.
Baamusindikiriza aheeru y'orubuga, baamuteeza amabaale. Kandi abakaiso abo ab'ebisuba baanaga ebijwaro byabo ha bigere by'omusigazi arukwetwa Saulo.
Sitefano, obu bakaba nibamuteeza amabale, yayesengereza ati: “MUKAMA Yesu, twara omwoyo gwange.”
Yateeza amaju, yayamirra n'iraka likooto ati: “Ai MUKAMA, ekibi kinu otakibajunaana.” Obu yamazire kugamba ebi, yakaba. Kandi Saulo akasiima okwitwa kwa Sitefano.
Ha kiro eki, abaikiriza aba Yerusaalemu bakatandika kuhiiganizibwa muno; kandi boona baararangira omu byaro bya Buyudaaya na Samaliya, kwihaho abakwenda bonka.
Abasaija abamu abaatiinaga Ruhanga bakaziika Sitefano, baamulirirra muno.
Baitu Saulo yaikara naahiiganiza abaikiriza Ruhanga naataaha omu buli nju, naakwata abasaija n'abakazi, naabata omu nkomo.
Abo abaararangire, bakagenda hoona nibeegesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Filipo akagenda omu rubuga rwa Samaliya yabarangirra Kristo.
Ebitebe bingi by'abantu, obu baahuliire Filipo ebi arukwegesa, baarora ebihuniriza ebi arukukora, baabiikiriza n'omutima gumu.
Kandi baingi abakaba bakwasirwe emyoyo emibi, ekabarugamu neeyamuza. Baingi abakaba bazingamire n'abaramaire baakizibwa.
Haabaho okusemererwa kwingi omu rubuga oru.
Baitu omu rubuga oru hakaba haroho omusaija arukwetwa Simooni, ayakoraga eby'amasano, naahuniriza Abasamaliya, naayeyeta muntu mukuru.
Abantu boona ab'orulengo orwa hansi n'orwa haiguru baamutiinaga nibagamba bati: “Omusaija onu nuwe maani ga Ruhanga arukwetwa Rutakirwa.”
Kandi baamutiinaga, habwokuba akaba amazire omwanya mukooto naabahuniriza n'amasano ge.
Baitu obu baikiriize Amakuru Amarungi, Filipo aga yabarangiriire ha bukama bwa Ruhanga na ha ibara lya Yesu Kristo, baabatizibwa, abasaija n'abakazi.
Simooni nawe yaikiriza, kandi obu yamazire kubatizibwa, yaikaraga naagenda na Filipo. Obu yarozire ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano bikuru Filipo ebi yakozire, yahunirra muno.
Abakwenda abakaba bali Yerusaalemu obu baahuliire Abasamaliya nabo nkooku baikiriize ekigambo kya Ruhanga, baabatumaho Petero na Yohaana.
Obu baahikireyo baabasabira nukwo batunge Mwoyo Ahikiriire;
habwokuba busaho n'omu omuli bo ow'akaba atungire Mwoyo ogu, kwihaho kubatizibwa kwonka omu ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu.
Aho Petero na Yohaana baabataho emikono, baaheebwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Simooni obu yarozire baatunga Mwoyo Ahikiriire habw'abakwenda kubataho emikono, yabaha sente,
naagamba ati: “Obusobozi obu na nyowe mubumpe, weena ou ndaatahoga emikono, atungege Mwoyo Ahikiriire.”
Baitu Petero yamugarukamu ati: “Kabule nazo sente zaawe, iwe anyakutekeriize kugura ekisembo kya Ruhanga na sente!
Ekintu kinu leka kukyetabamu, toinaho mugabo, habwokuba omutima gwawe tigusemiire omu maiso ga Ruhanga.
Nahabweki zira ekibi kyawe, osabe MUKAMA akuganyire ekiteekerezo eki.
Nyowe mmazire kwetegereza nkooku oijwire ihali kandi oboherwe ekibi.”
Nandiki Simooni ati: “Munsabire hali MUKAMA, byona ebi mwagamba haleke kubaho na kimu ekyampikaho.”
Abakwenda obu baamazire kuha obwakaiso n'okwegesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga, baagaruka Yerusaalemu nibarangirra Amakuru Amarungi omu byaro bingi eby'Abasamaliya.
Malaika wa MUKAMA akagambira Filipo ati: “Imuka ogende, okwate omuhanda ogw'obukiizi bw'obulyo, ogw'irungu, ogurukuruga Yerusaalemu nigugenda Gaaza.”
Yaimuka, yagenda. Omusaija wa Esiyopiya omukonwa, omuheereza wa Kandaake Omukamakati wa Esiyopiya, ow'akaba ali mukeeto w'ebintu bye byona, akaba aizire Yerusaalemu kuramya.
Omu kasumi ako akaba naagaruka owaabu, aikaliire omu kigaali kye, kandi naasoma Ekitabu kya Isaaya omurangi.
Mwoyo wa Ruhanga yagambira Filipo ati: “Irirra ekigaali eki, ogende nakyo.”
Filipo yairuka, yamuhikaho, yamuhurra naasoma Ekitabu kya Isaaya omurangi, nukwo kumukaguza ati: “Ebi orukusoma ebi, noobyetegereza?”
Oli yamugarukamu ati: “Ndabyetegereza nta, hataroho ansoboroliire?” Yasaba Filipo atembe omu kigaali kye, aikarre nawe.
Ekicweka eky'omu Byahandiikirwe eki akaba naasoma nkinu: “Akaba nk'entaama erukutwarwa omu ibaagiro; rundi nk'akataama akali omumaiso g'omusazi w'ebyoya. Nawe nukwo atarayesamize kanwa ke.
Akeebundaaza kandi tiyacwerwa omu mazima. Busaho n'omu alibaza ha baijukuru be, habwokuba omunsi obwomeezi bwe bukacwibwaho!”
Nubwo omukonwa yakagwize Filipo ati: “Ninkusaba onsoborre: omurangi ogu, akabazaaho oha? Akeebazaaho wenka rundi akabazaaho omuntu ondi?”
Filipo yabandiza ha kyahandiikirwe eki, yamusoborra Amakuru Amarungi aga Yesu.
Obu bakaba nibakyagenda, baahika ha maizi agarukugera, omukonwa yagamba ati: “Dora amaizi nganu! Hati ekirukuntanga kubatizibwa kiraha?” [
Filipo yamugarukamu ati: “Obu oraaba noikiriza n'omutima gwawe gwona, nikisoboka.” Nandiki omukonwa ati: “Ninyikiriza Yesu Kristo nkooku ali Mwana wa Ruhanga.”]
Yaragira kwemereza ekigaali, bombi baaragara omu maizi, Filipo yamubatiza.
Obu baarugire omu maizi, Mwoyo wa MUKAMA yahwangura Filipo naamutwara handi, omukonwa tiyagaruka kumurora; yakwata omuhanda gwe yagenda n'omuhimbo.
Filipo akaija kurora, yayesanga ali Azooto, yayongera orugendo rwe naaraba omu mbuga zoona naarangirra Amakuru Amarungi okuhika obu yataahire Kaisaariya.
Omu biro ebi, Saulo obu akaba naakyakangisiriza kandi naahaya kwita abeegesebwa ba MUKAMA, yagenda hali omukuru w'abanyakatagara,
yamusaba ahandiikire amasorrokaniro ga Damasiko ebbaruha ezirukumwikiriza kukwata n'okutwara Yerusaalemu abasaija rundi abakazi abarukuhondera Omuhanda gwa MUKAMA kakuba abasangayo.
Obu akaba naakyagenda, ali haihi kuhika Damasiko, ahonaaho ekyererezi kyaruga omwiguru, kyamwehinguliriza.
Yagwa hansi, yahurra iraka nirimugamba liti: “Saulo, Saulo, nompiiganiriza ki?”
Nawe yakaguza ati; “Niiwe oha, Waitu?” Iraka lyamugarukamu liti: “Ninyowe Yesu ou orukuhiiganiza.
Hati imuka, otaahe omu rubuga, oraamanyisibwa eki oraakora.”
Abasaija abakaba nibagenda nawe baayemerra babuzirwe eky'okugamba. Bakahurra iraka, baitu batarole muntu.
Saulo yaimuka hansi; obu yaburwire amaiso, tiyahweza kantu. Baamunanata, baamutaahya Damasiko.
Akamara ebiro bisatu atarukurora kandi atarukulya noobwakuba kunywa kantu.
Damasiko hakaba haliyo omwegesebwa, ibara lye Ananiya. MUKAMA akamubonekera yamweta ati: “Ananiya.” Uwe yayetebuka ati: “Ndi hanu, Taata.”
Nandiki MUKAMA ati: “Imuka, ogende omu ruguudo orurukwetwa Oruterekeriire, okaguliirize omunju ya Yuda, omuntu arukwetwa Saulo owa Taruso. Mu kasumi kanu naasaba,
kandi abonekiirwe naarora omusaija arukwetwa Ananiya naija kumutaho emikono nukwo ahweze.”
Ananiya yamugarukamu ati: “MUKAMA wange, baingi bakambalizaaho omusaija ogu, na ha bubi obu abaire naakora abantu baawe omu Yerusaalemu.
Na hanu aizire aina obusobozi abanyakatagara bakuru obu baamuhaire obw'okuboha boona abarukwamirra ibara lyawe.”
Baitu MUKAMA yamugarukamu ati: “Genda, habwokuba omusaija ogu nikyo kikwato kyange eki nakomere kumanyisa ibara lyange omu Banyamahanga, n'omu bakama baabo, n'omu bantu boona aba Isirairi.
Ndimwoleka nkooku asemeriire kubonabonesibwa muno habwange.”

Nubwo Ananiya yagenzire, yataaha omunju egi. Yataho Saulo emikono naagamba ati: “Mugenzi wange Saulo, ntumirwe MUKAMA Yesu ayakubonekiire omu muhanda, nukwo oiguke amaiso kandi oijule Mwoyo Ahikiriire.”
Ahonaaho ebintu ebirukusisa ebigaragamba by'encu byamuruga ha maiso, yarora. Saulo yayemerra, yabatizibwa.
Obu yamazire kulya ebyokulya, yagarukwamu amaani. Damasiko akamarayo ebiro bike, ali hamu n'abeegesebwa.
Ahonaaho yatandika kurangirra Yesu omu masorrokaniro gaayo naagamba ati: “Nuwe Mwana wa Ruhanga.”

Boona abaamuhuliire bakahunirra nibakaguza bati: “Omusaija onu, tinuwe ayahiiganizaaga aba Yerusaalemu abaayaturaga ibara eri? Kandi tinikyo aiziriire hanu, abatwale omu maiso g'abanyakatagara abakuru baboherwe?”
Baitu Saulo yayeyongera muno kwegesa n'amaani yakwasa ensoni Abayudaaya abaikaraga Damasiko, naagumiza kimu Yesu nkooku ali Kristo.
Ebiro nkooku byagenzire nibihinguraho, Abayudaaya baayekoba hamu kumwita;
baitu ensita zaabu Saulo yazimanya. Baikaraga nibalinda amalembo g'orubuga nyamusana n'ekiro nibaserra kumwita.
Baitu abaikiriza baamucwisa ekiro, baamusirimura ekisiika ali omu kisombera ekiteekerwe kiteeko.
Obu yahikire Yerusaalemu, yalengaho kwehikya abaikiriza; baitu boona bakamutiina, habw'okutaikiriza nkooku akaba ali kwo mwegesebwa.
Baranaba nuwe ayamutwaire, yamuhikya abakwenda, yabasoborra Saulo nkooku yarozire MUKAMA omu muhanda, yabaza nawe, kandi nkooku yarangiriire n'obumanzi ibara lya Yesu omu Damasiko
Saulo yatandika kugenda nabo, naabungira ab'omu Yerusaalemu,
naarangirra n'obumanzi omwibara lya MUKAMA. Kandi obu yamazire kugamba n'Abayudaaya abaabazaaga Orugiriiki n'okuhakaniza nabo, baamalirra kumwita.
Ab'oruganda obu baakimanyire, baamutwara Kaisaariya, nukwo baamwohereza agende Taruso.
Nahabweki ekitebe ky'abaikiriza boona ab'omu Buyudaaya, Galiraaya, na Samaliya baasigara baina obusinge kandi baayeyongera kukanya nibatiina Ruhanga kandi nibagumibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Petero obu akaba naagenda hanu na hali okubungira abaikiriza boona, yahika n'omu baikiriza abaikaraga Liida.
Oku nuho yasangire omusaija, ibara lye Aineya, ayamazire emyaka munaana atarukuruga ha kitabu, azingamire.
Petero yamugambira ati: “Aineya, Yesu Kristo hati yakukiza; imuka oyale ekitabu kyawe.” Ahonaaho yaimuka.
Boona abaikaraga Liida na Sarooni obu baamurozire akizibwe, baahindukira MUKAMA.
Omu rubuga Yoppa hakaba harumu omwegesebwa, ibara lye Tabita, amakuru gaalyo: Dorokasi rundi Enjaza. Omukazi ogu yakoraga ebirungi bingi naagabira n'abanaku.
Omu biro ebi akarwara, yafa. Obu baamazire kwogya omutumbi gwe, baagubyamya omu kisiika ekiri omu kainaabiri.
Kandi Liida teri hara na Yoppa. Nahabweki abeegesebwa obu baahuliire Petero nkooku ali oku, baamutumaho abasaija babiri nibamwesengereza bati; “Waitu oije oturole, otabandaara.”

Petero yaimuka, yagenda nabo. Obu yahikireyo, baamutembya omu kainaabiri. Abafaakati boona baija bamwemerra haihi nibarra, nibamwoleka ebitetei n'ebijwaro ebindi Dorokasi ebi yabaziire obu akaba akyali nabo.

Nubwo Petero yabaturukize aheeru, yateza amaju, yasaba. Obu yamazire kusaba, yahindukira omukazi ogu ayafiire, yamugambira ati: “Tabita, imuka.” Omukazi yaziburra amaiso, yarolerra Petero, yaimuka, yaikarra.
Petero yamukwata ha mukono, yamwemereza. Nubwo yayesire abaikiriza n'abafakaati, yamubakwasa ali mwomeezi.
Ekyabaireho kyamanywa omu Yoppa hoona; baingi baikiriza MUKAMA.
Petero yayongera yamara ebiro Yoppa, naaraara omwa Simooni, omuhazi w'empu.
Omu rubuga Kaisaariya hakaba harumu omusaija, ibara lye Koroneeri, omukuru w'ab'amahe ab'omu kihanda ekyayetwaga ky'Abaitale.
Uwe n'ab'eka ye boona bakaba bali bantu abaayekambiraga ediini kandi abarukutiina Ruhanga. Yagabaga n'obwenda kukoonyera abanaku b'Abayudaaya, kandi yasabaga Ruhanga atarukulekerra.
Kiro kimu ha saaha nka mwenda ez'orwebagyo, akabonekerwa, yarora butunu malaika wa Ruhanga nataaha omunju nambere ali, naamweta ati: “Koroneeri.”
Kandi Koroneeri, anyakwijwire obutiini, yamuhanga amaiso nayetebuka ati: “Kiki Taata?” Malaika yamugambira ati: “Okusaba kwawe n'okugaba kwawe bitembere nk'ekiijukyo omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
Hati nu, tuma abantu Yoppa, beeteyo omuntu Simooni, arukwetwa Petero,
anyakuraara omwa Simooni omuhazi w'empu, enju ye eri ha musa gw'enyanja.”
Malaika ayabalize nawe obu yamazire kugenda, Koroneeri yayeta babiri ha baheereza be hamu n'omu ha baserikale abaamulindaga, omuntu ayayekambiraga muno ediini.
Obu yamazire kubasoborra byona ebibaireho, yabatuma Yoppa.
Ha kiro ekyakuraasireho, abaatumirwe obu bakaba nibakyagenda, bali haihi kuhika orubuga ha saaha nka mukaaga, nubwo Petero yatembere ha nju eruguru kusaba.
Omu kasumi ako enjara yamuruma kandi yagonza kulya akantu; baitu ab'omunju obu bakaba nibakyateekaniza ebyokulya, yabonekerwa.
Yarora iguru likingwirwe, kandi ekintu ekirukusisa esuuka nkooto nikisirimuka hansi, kikwasirwe ha nsonda ina.
Kikaba kirumu emiringo yoona ey'ebisoro n'ebirukwekurra n'enyonyi z'omu mwanya.
Yahurra iraka nirimugamba liti: “Petero imuka; obiite olye.”
Petero yagarukamu ati: “Nangwa, MUKAMA wange! Nyowe tinkalyaga kintu kyona ekirukuzira rundi ekitasemiire.”
Iraka lyagaruka nirimugambira liti: “Ruhanga eki yayeriize, otalikyeta ky'omuziro.”
Eki kikabaho emirundi esatu, hanyuma ekintu kyagarurwa omwiguru.
Petero obu akaba akyasobiirwe naagurukyagurukya amakuru g'okubonekerwa oku, nubwo haizire abasaija abatumirwe Koroneeri, bayemerra omu irembo ly'enju ya Simooni,
baayeranga nibakaguza Simooni arukwetwa Petero obu araaba naaraara aho.
Petero obu akaba naakyacumiitiriza amakuru g'okubonekerwa oku, Mwoyo Ahikiriire yamugambire ati: “Haizire abasaija basatu nibakuserra.
Rahuka osirimuke, ogende nabo otarukugurukyagurukya, habwokuba ninyowe mbatumire kwija hanu.”
Petero yasirimuka, yahikaho abasaija abo, yabakaguza ati: “Ou murukuserra ninyowe, muleesirwe ki?”

Bbo baamugarukamu bati: “Koroneeri, mukuru w'ab'amahe, omuntu ahikiriire, arukutiina Ruhanga kandi arukusiimwa Abayudaaya boona, ahabwirwe malaika wa Ruhanga kukweta oije owe, nukwo ahurre ebi oraagamba.”
Aho Petero yabataahya omunju, baaba bagenyi be. Obwire obu bwakiire, Petero yaimuka, yagenda nabo asendekeriziibwe abaikiriza abamu ba Yoppa.
Orubuga rwa Kaisaariya bakarutaaha ha kiro ekyakuraasireho. Baasanga Koroneeri abategeriize, amazire kweta ab'oruganda rwe n'abanywani be abandi babeho.
Petero obu yahikire ha nju, Koroneeri yaturuka aheeru, yagenda kumutangirra, yajuumara ha bigere bya Petero, yamuramya,
Baitu Petero yamwimukya naagamba ati: “Yemerra; na nyowe ndi muntu nka iwe.”
Baagenda nibabaza, baataaha omunju, baasangamu abantu baingi abaayesoroize.

Petero yatandika kubeegesa ati: “Inywena mumanyire Ebiragiro nkooku bitanga Abayudaaya okuteerana rundi okubungira abantu b'ihanga erindi; baitu nyowe, Ruhanga akaanyoleka nkooku ntasemerire kugaya omuntu weena rundi kumunuga.
Nahabweki obu baanyesire, tinyangire kwija. Kandi nikyo ndukukaguliza nti: Munyetiire ki?”
Koroneeri yamugarukamu ati: “Ebiro bbina ebihingwire, obu nkaba ninsaba omu kisiika kyange, ha saaha nk'enu ey'omwenda, nkarora omusaija anyemeriire omumaiso, ajwaire ebijwaro ebirukwangasana,
yangambira ati: ‘Koroneeri, Ruhanga ahuliire okusaba kwawe, kandi aijukire n'okugaba kwawe.
Hati nu, tuma abantu Yoppa, beeteyo omuntu Simooni arukwetwa Petero, anyakuraara omwa Simooni omuhazi w'empu, enju ye eri ha musa gw'enyanja.’
Nikyo nakutumiireho ahonaaho, kandi na iwe okozire kurungi kwija. Hati nu, itwena twesoroize hanu omumaiso ga Ruhanga, nukwo tuhurre byona MUKAMA ebi akuragiire kutugambira.”
Petero yatandika kwegesa naagamba ati: “Mazima mmanyire Ruhanga nkooku atasoroora mu bantu;
baitu omu buli ihanga, weena arukumutiina akakora ebihikire, Ruhanga amusiima.
Ruhanga akahikya ekigambo kye hali Abaisirairi barangirirwe Amakuru Amarungi ag'obusinge, nakirabya omu Yesu Kristo (MUKAMA w'abantu boona).
Na inywe mumanyire ebyabaireho omu Buyudaaya yoona, okubandiza Galiraaya nambere Yohaana yayegeseze ebyokubatiza.

Mumanyire Yesu owa Nazareeti nkooku Ruhanga yamuseesereho Mwoyo Ahikiriire, yamuha n'obusobozi. Kandi habw'okukonyerwa Ruhanga, Yesu yagendagendaga naakora ebirungi, kandi naakiza boona abakaba nibagadisibwa Sitaani.
Na itwe tuli bakaiso b'ebi byona ebi yakoliire omu Buyudaaya n'omu Yerusaalemu. Yesu ogu, abantu bakamwita nibamuhanika ha muti;
baitu Ruhanga akamuhumbuura obu haahingwireho ebiro bisatu, yamutwoleka.
Atamwoleke bantu boona, baitu akamwoleka itwe abakaiso Ruhanga aba yakomere kara, abaaliire na Yesu kandi baanywa nawe amazire kuhumbuuka omu bafu.
Akaturagira kwegesa n'okunanura abantu nkooku nuwe ogu Ruhanga ou yakomere kuba mucwi w'emisango y'abomiire n'abafiire.
Kandi nuwe abarangi boona baajuliire nibagumya ngu, weena arukumwikiriza naaganyirwa ebibi habw'ibara lye.”
Petero obu akaba naakyabaza ebi, Mwoyo Ahikiriire yasirimuka hali boona abakaba nibamuhuliriza.
Abaikiriza abasazirwe abaizire na Petero, bakahunirra habw'okurora abanyamahanga nabo nibaseeswaho ekisembo kya Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Baitu nabo bakabahurra nibabaza endimi kandi nibahaisaniza Ruhanga. Nubwo Petero yakagwize ati:
“Abantu banu abatungire Mwoyo Ahikiriire nka itwe, haroho asobora kubaima amaizi ngu batabatizibwa?”
Yaragira babatizibwe omu ibara lya Yesu Kristo. Hanyuma baamusaba amale nabo ebiro bike.
Abakwenda n'ab'oruganda abakaba bali Buyudaaya bakahurra nkooku Abanyamahanga nabo baikiriize ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Kandi Petero obu yagarukire Yerusaalemu, ab'omu kitebe ky'abasazirwe baamujunaana,
nibamukaguza bati: “Kiki ekyakutwaire omu bantu abatasazirwe kandi walya nabo?”
Petero yatandika kubasoborra byona nkooku byagenzire naagamba ati:
“Kiro kimu obu nkaba ndi omu rubuga Yoppa ninsaba, nubwo nabonekiirwe, narora ekintu ekirukusisa esuuka enkooto nikisirimuka hansi kikwasirwe ha nsonda ina, kyampikaho.
Obu nakyetegeriize, narora harumu ebisoro by'emiringo yoona, n'enyamaiswa, n'ebirukwekurra, hamu n'enyonyi z'omu mwanya.
Kandi nahurra iraka niringambira liti: ‘Petero imuka; obiite olye.’
Nyowe nagarukamu nti: ‘Nangwa, MUKAMA wange; habwokuba tinkalyaga kintu kyona ekirukuzirwa rundi ekitasemiire.’
Baitu iraka lyaruga omu iguru omurundi gwa kabiri, nirigamba liti: ‘Ruhanga eki yayeriize, otalikyeta ky'omuziro.’
Eki kikabaho emirundi esatu, hanyuma byona byagarurwa omu iguru.
“Omu kasumi ako konyini haija abasaija basatu, baahika ha nju ei tukaba turumu, batumirwe kuntabarra nibaruga Kaisaariya.
Mwoyo Ahikiriire yandagira kugenda nabo ntarukugurukyagurukya. N'ab'oruganda abo mukaaga nabo baagenda na nyowe, twataaha mb'omusaija ogu Koroneeri.
Kandi uwe yatusoborra nkooku yarozire malaika ayemeriire omu kisiika kye naagamba ati; ‘Tuma abantu Yoppa, beeteyo Simooni arukwetwa Petero;
ogu alikwegesa ebigambo ebirukwija kukujuna hamu n'eka yaawe yoona.’
Kandi nyowe obu natandikire kwegesa, Mwoyo Ahikiriire yabaijaho boona, nkooku yatwizireho itwe omu kubanza.
Na nyowe naijuka MUKAMA eki yagambire ati: ‘Yohaana akabatiza n'amaizi, baitu inywe mulibatizibwa na Mwoyo Ahikiriire.’
Hati Ruhanga obu araaba yabahaire ekisembo ekirukusisana n'eki yatuhaire obu twabandiize kwikiriza MUKAMA Yesu Kristo, nyowe ninyowe oha ayaakusoboire kutanga Ruhanga?”
Abakwenda obu baahuliire eki, baabireka. Baatandika kukugiza Ruhanga nibagamba bati: “Hati Abanyamahanga nabo Ruhanga abahaire okwegarukamu okurukutungisa obwomeezi obutahwaho.”

Abararangiibwe hanu na hali habw'okuhiiganizibwa okwabaireho habw'ebya Sitefano, bakagenda baahika Foinike na Kipuro na Antyokiya batarukutebeza muntu ondi weena Amakuru Amarungi kwihaho Abayudaaya bonka.
Omulibo hakaba harumu abasaija abamu, enzaarwa za Kipuro na Kirene. Obu baahikire Antyokiya baatandika kwegesa Abagiriiki, nibabarangirra Amakuru Amarungi ga MUKAMA Yesu.
Obusobozi bwa MUKAMA bwabaiziramu, kandi abantu baingi baikiriza, baahindukira Mukama.
Ekitebe ky'abaikiriza ab'omu Yerusaalemu obu baahuliire eki, nubwo baatumire Baranaba agenda Antyokiya.
Obuyahikireyo, yarora embabazi Ruhanga ezi yabagiriire, yasemererwa. Boona yabateererra kugumira hali MUKAMA n'omutima gumu.
Baranaba ogu akaba ali musaija murungi, anyakwijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire n'okwikiriza. Kandi Antyokiya oku, abantu baingi baahindukira MUKAMA.
Aho Baranaba yarugayo yagenda Taruso kuserra Saulo.
Obu yamuboine, yamuleeta Antyokiya. Bombi baamarayo omwaka gwona bali mu baikiriza baayo, nibeegesa abantu baingi. Kandi Antyokiya, nuho abeegesebwa baabandiize kwetwa Abakristo.
Obu bakaba bakyali oku, abarangi abamu bakaruga Yerusaalemu baahika Antyokiya.
Omu hali bo, omuntu anyakwetwa Agabo, yayemerra yarangisibwa Mwoyo nkooku harukwija kubaho kiihe omu nsi yoona. Niyo kiihe eyabaireho omu businge bwa Klahudiyo.
Abaikiriza bakacwamu buli muntu aheyo obukoonyezi nkooku arukusobora, ebintu babitwekere bagenzi baabo abaikara Buyudaaya.
Kandi nukwo baakozire. Ebintu baabitwekera abakuru ba Yerusaalemu, byatwarwa Baranaba na Saulo.
Omu biro ebi, Herode omukama akatandika kuhiiganiza abamu ab'omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza.
Yakobbo, mugenzi wa Yohaana, akamwisa empirima.
Kandi obu yarozire Abayudaaya nkooku bakisiimire, yaragira bakwate na Petero. Eki kikabaho omu biro eby'obugenyi obw'okwijuka Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe.

Herode obu yamazire kukwata Petero, yamuta omu nkomo, yamukwasa ebihanda bbina eby'abaserikale, bali bbana mu buli kihanda, nukwo bamulinde nibahonderangana, naagenderra kumuleeta omu maiso g'abantu ekiro kikuru eky'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho kimazire kuhwa.
Petero nukwo kulindirwa omu nkomo ebiro ebi byona; baitu ekitebe ky'abaikiriza bakeekamba kumusabira hali Ruhanga.

Ha kiro eki kyonyini Herode eki akaba araaliire kumuleeta omu rukurato, Petero akaba agwijagiire, ali hagati y'abaserikale babiri, aboherwe n'enjegere ibiri, kandi abalinzi abandi bali ha irembo nibalinda enkomo.
Aho malaika wa MUKAMA yamubonekera, kandi ekyererezi kyayaka omu kasiika ke. Malaika yateerateera Petero ha ibega, yamusisiimura ati: “Matuka bwango!” Enjegere zaamuruga ha mikono, zaaragara.
Malaika yamugambira ati: “Weteege orukoba rwawe, sabikira enkaito zaawe.” Petero nukwo yakozire, kandi malaika yayongera yamugira ati: “Wefubike omunagiro gwawe, onkurate.”
Petero yaruga mu kasiika, yamukurata; kyonka atarukugumya malaika nkooku arukumwiha kwo omu nkomo, baitu akateekereza ngu, abonekiirwe.

Obu baamazire kurabaho abalinzi ab'okubanza n'aba kabiri, baahika ha rwigi rw'ekyoma, orurukutaahya omu rubuga. Orwigi oru rwabeekingurra rwonka; baaturuka aheeru. Bairrayo omumaiso okuhika malaika obu yamurugireho.
Petero nubwo yagarukirwemu amagezi, yagamba ati: “Hati namanyira kimu MUKAMA nkooku atumire malaika we kunyiha omu mikono ya Herode, kandi yanjuna byona Abayudaaya ebi bakaba bategekere kunkora.”
