Ebi obu yamazire kubyetegereza, yayongera yahika ha nju ya Mariya nyina Yohaana, abandi ou barukweta Mariko, nambere abaikiriza baingi bakaba beesoroliize hamu kumusabira.
Obu yayerangire ha rwigi rw'irembo, omwisiki arukwetwa Roda yaija kwetegereza.
Obu yamanyiriire iraka lya Petero, habw'omuhimbo, tiyakinguraho rwigi, baitu yairuka yagaruka omunju naabagambira ngu, Petero ayemeriire ha irembo.
Bbo baamugarukamu bati: “Ohungutukire.” Baitu omwisiki yagumiza kimu ngu, nukwo kiri. Kandi bbo bamugambira bati: “Rundi malaika we!”
Baitu Petero yayongera kwerangira ha rwigi, kandi obu bakingwireho baamurora, baahunirra muno.
Uwe yabaculeeza n'omukono gwe, yatandika kubasoborra MUKAMA nkooku amwihire omu nkomo. Yayongera yagamba ati: “Ebi byona mubimanyise Yakobbo n'abagenzi baitu.” Nubwo yabarugaho, yagenda handi.
Obu bwakiire nyenkya, abaserikale bakaba omu mwetunturo mwingi habw'okutamanya Petero nambere agiire.
Kandi Herode obu yaragiire kumuserra, baalemwa kumuzoora. Yakaguliriza muno abalinzi, nukwo hanyuma yaragira babaite. Nubwo Herode yaruga Buyudaaya, yagenda Kaisaariya, yaikarayo.

Herode akaba abiihirirwe muno abantu ba Tiiro na Sidooni; nukwo omuganda gw'abantu kwija nambere ali obu baamazire kusoonasoona Bulasito, omukuru wa bagaragara, baasaba obusinge, habwokuba abantu baabo baasakiraga muno ebyokulya omu nsi y'Omukama Herode.
Ha kiro eki yakomere, Herode yajwara ebijwaro by'obukama, yasinga ha kitebe kye, yababaliza orubazo.
Abantu nukwo kumuswagira nibagamba bati: “Arukugamba nuwe ruhanga, takyali muntu!”
Omu kasumi ako malaika wa Ruhanga yamuteera kandi yagwa hansi. Yajunaanwa okutaha Ruhanga ekitiinisa; yaliibwa enzito, yafa.
Baitu ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyayeyongera kandi kyararanga muno, baingi baakiikiriza.
Baranaba na Saulo obu baamazire obutumwa bwabo, baaruga Yerusaalemu, baagaruka Antyokiya baina Yohaana, abamu ou barukweta Mariko.

Omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza ekikaba kiri Antyokiya, hakaba harumu abarangi n'abeegesa, nubo banu: Baranaba, Simyoni anyakwetwa Kiiragura, Lusiyo owa Kireene, Manayeni ayayoroirwe hamu n'owiisaza Herode, na Saulo.
Kiro kimu obu bakaba nibasaba MUKAMA kandi nibasiiba, Mwoyo Ahikiriire yabagambira ati: “Munsororremu Baranaba na Saulo, bakole omulimo ogu mbeetiire.”
Boona obu baamazire kusiiba n'okusaba, baabataho emikono baabatuma.
Ababiri abo obu baamazire kutumwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, baimukya orugendo orwa Seleyukiya; kandi okurugayo, baagwerra omu meeri, baagenda Kipuro.
Obu baahikire orubuga Salamisi, baarangirra ekigambo kya Ruhanga omu masorrokaniro g'Abayudaaya, kandi bakaba baina Yohaana arukubakoonyera.
Obu baamazire kuraba omu kizinga kyona kya Kipuro, baahika orubuga Paafo. Oku baasangayo Omuyudaaya omu, omunyamasano kandi omurangi w'ebisuba arukwetwa Bar-yesu (amakuru ngu, mwana wa Yesu).
Akaba ali hamu n'omulemi mukuru w'ekicweka eki, omuntu anyakwetwa Serugiyo Paulo, omusaija omwetegereza. Nuwe yayesire Baranaba na Saulo yabasaba kumusoborra ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Baitu Elima, arukwetwa omunyamasano (habwokuba nugo makuru g'ibara lye) yatandika kubahakaniza naagenderra kuhabisa omulemi mukuru, aleke kwikiriza.
Baitu Saulo, anyakwetwa Paulo, aijwire Mwoyo Ahikiriire, yamugumyaho amaiso
nnagamba ati: “Iwe mwana wa Sitaani, iwe omunyanzigwa w'obuhikiriire bwona, iwe anyakwijwire obugobya n'obubi bwona, olireka di kuramaza emihanda ya MUKAMA enyakuterekeriire?
Lero hati, omukono gwa MUKAMA nigwija kukuteera nukwo ofe amaiso, omale akasumi otarukurora izooba.” Ahonaaho ekiho n'omwirima byamusweka, yahaamanga naaserra ow'okumunanata.
Omulemi mukuru obu yarozire ekibaireho, yaikiriza kandi yahunirizibwa ebi baayegeseze hali MUKAMA.
Paulo n'abagenzi be baagwerra nibaruga Paafo, baayambuka, baahika Peruga, orubuga orwa Panfiliya. Oku nuho Yohaana yabarugiireho, yagaruka Yerusaalemu;
baitu bbo bairrayo baaruga Peruga, baahika Antyokiya, narwo rubuga rwa Pisidiya. Kandi ha kiro kya Sabbato bakataaha omu isorrokaniro ly'Abayudaaya, baikarra.
Eby'Ebiragiro bya Musa n'eby'abarangi obu byamazire kusomwa, abakuru b'isorrokaniro baabatumaho nibabasaba bati: “Bagenzi baitu, obu muraaba mwina ekigambo ky'okugumya abantu banu, mukigambe.”
Paulo nukwo kwemerra, boona yabaculeeza n'omukono gwe, yatandika kwegesa ati: “Inywe bantu ba Isirairi, na inywena abarukutiina Ruhanga, muhurre.
Ruhanga w'ihanga lyaitu Isirairi akakoma baisenkuru itwe, yabakuza yabafoora ihanga ruranganwa obu bakaba bali omu nsi ya Misiri, nukwo hanyuma yabaihayo habw'amaani g'obusobozi bwe.
Akabagumiisiriza obu bakaba bali omu irungu kumara emyaka makumi ana.
Obu yamazire kuhwerekereza amahanga musanju ag'omu nsi ya Kanaani, ensi egi yagiha Abaisirairi ebe bugwetwa bwabu, baamarayo emyaka nka bikumi bbina mw'ataano.
Ebi obu byahoire, akabaha abacwi b'emisango babaleme okuhika ha businge bw'omurangi Samwiri.
Nubwo bamusabire abahe omukama, kandi Ruhanga yabaha Saulo mutabani wa Kisi ow'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini, yabalemera emyaka makumi ana.
Kandi Ruhanga obu yamwihire ha ngoma, yataho Daudi kuba omukama waabu, ou yagambireho ati: ‘Mmazire kukoma Daudi, mutabani wa Yese, nuwe muntu ndukusiima ow'alikora byona ebi ndukwenda.’
Omu baijukuru ba Daudi ogu, Ruhanga numwo yaihiire Isirairi Omujuni, nuwe Yesu, nkooku kyaraganiziibwe.
Kandi Yesu obu akaba atakaizire, Yohaana akarangirra Abaisirairi boona okubatiza okw'okwegarukamu.
Yohaana obu akaba naamaliriza omulimo gwe, akagamba ati: ‘Nyowe nimunteekerezaho ki? Tindi ogu ow'okwija, nangwa. Baitu haroho arukunyija enyuma kandi tinsemeriire kusumurra orukoba orw'enkaito ze.’
“Bagenzi bange, baijukuru ba Abburahamu, na inywena abarukutiina Ruhanga, obukwenda obu obw'okujunwa, niinyowe bwaiziire.
Baitu abantu ba Yerusaalemu n'abalemi baabo Yesu batamumanyirre noobu kwakuba okukenga ebyagambirwe abarangi, ebisomwa hanu buli Sabbato. Baitu Ebihandiiko bakabihikiriza obu baamusingisize omusango.
Noobu baraaba baabuzirwe eky'okumujunaana ekisemeriire kumwisa, nabwo bakasaba Pilaato amwite.
Kandi obu baamazire kuhikiriza byona ebyamuhandiikirweho, baamuhanuura ha muti, baamuziika omu kituuro.
Baitu Ruhanga akamuhumbuura omu bafu;
yamara ebiro bingi naabonekera abo abaarugire nawe Galiraaya baija Yerusaalemu. Hati nubo barukumuheera obwakaiso omu bantu.
Na itwe twizire nitubaleetera Amakuru Amarungi ag'ebi Ruhanga yaraganiize baisenkuruitwe,
nkooku yabihikiriize omuli itwe abaana baabo obu yahumbwire Yesu. Kandi nukwo kyahandiikirwe kiti omu zabbuli eya kabiri: ‘Iwe oli Mwana wange, nkuzaire kiro kya hati.’
Habw'okugumya nkooku yamuhumbwire omu bafu okutagaruka kujunda, Ruhanga akongera ati: ‘Ndikuha emigisa egumire kandi erukwera nk'ei nahaire Daudi.’
Nikyo yagambiire omu zabbuli endi ati: ‘Toliikiriza Ahikiriire wawe kujunda.’
Daudi obu yamazire kuhikiriza entegeka ya Ruhanga omu bantu b'obusinge bwe yafa, yaziikwa n'abaisenkuru, kandi yajunda;
baitu ogu Ruhanga ou yahumbwire, atajunde.
“Nahabweki bagenzi bange, mumanye okuganyirwa ebibi nkooku kubarangirirwa habw'omuntu ogu Yesu,
kandi habw'ogu, weena arukumwikiriza naganyirwa byona ebi Ebiragiro bya Musa bitarasoboire kumuganyira.
Nahabweki mwerinde, timwikara kuhikwaho abarangi ebi baarangire bati:
‘Inywe abasekeerezi mwetegereze, muhunirre kandi muhweho; habwokuba omu biro byanyu ninkora ekikorwa eki mutalisobora kwikiriza, noobu haakubaho arukukibasoborra.’”
Obu bakaba nibaruga omu isorrokaniro, abantu baasaba Paulo na Baranaba kugaruka kubasoborra ebigambo ebi ha Sabbato erukwija.

Orusorrokano obu rwarugirwemu, Abayudaaya baingi hamu n'abantu baayo abaahindukire kutaaha omu diini y'Ekiyudaaya, baakuratira Paulo na Baranaba, kandi bbo baabateererra kwikara nibeesiga embabazi za Ruhanga.
Ha Sabbato eyakurasireho, kutagirwa ab'omu rubuga boona bakeesorooza hamu kuhurra ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Baitu Abayudaaya obu baarozire obwingi bw'abantu, bakwatwa ihali, baatandika kuhakaniza Paulo ebi yagambire, baamujuma.

Paulo na Baranaba baabagarukamu n'obumanzi bati: “Kikaba nikyetaagwa inywe mubanze murangirirwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga. Baitu obu mwakyangire, mukecwera inywenka omusango nkooku mutasemeriire kutunga obwomeezi obutahwaho; hati itwe nitwija kugenda omu Banyamahanga.
Nikyo MUKAMA yaturagiire naagamba ati: ‘Nkutaireho obe kyererezi hali Abanyamahanga, okujuna kwange okuhikye ha mpero y'ensi.’ ”
Abanyamahanga obu baahuliire eki, baasemererwa, baatandika kuhaisaniza ekigambo kya Ruhanga; kandi boona abaakomiirwe obwomeezi obutahwaho baikiriza.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyararanga omunsi egi yoona.
Baitu Abayudaaya baimukiriza abakazi ab'ekitiinisa abaayekambiraga ediini, hamu n'abasaija bakuru ab'omu rubuga, baatandika kuhiiganiza Paulo na Baranaba, baababinga omu nsi y'owaabu.
Nukwo bbo kubateerateera ecuucu y'omu bigere byabo, baagenda Ikoniyo.
Baitu abeegesebwa baijura omuhimbo na Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Obu bakaba bali Ikoniyo, baataaha omu isorrokaniro ly'Abayudaaya, baayegesa ebigambo ebyagwire abantu ha njoka, byaleetera Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki baingi kwikiriza.
Baitu Abayudaaya abamu baayanga kwikiriza, baata omu Banyamahanga omutima mubi banobe abantu abaikiriize.
Oku Paulo na Baranaba baamarayo akasumi, nibeegesa ebya MUKAMA batarukutiina, nawe akagumya ebi baayegeseze ha kisembo kye ky'embabazi, naikiriza ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano bikorwe emikono yabo.
Baitu abantu ab'omu rubuga bakaba beebaganizeemu; abamu bali ha rubaju rw'Abayudaaya, abandi orw'abakwenda.
Ekyarugiremu, Abanyamahanga n'Abayudaaya baikirraniza n'abalemi baayo, baacwa amagezi kubakora kubi n'okubateeza amabaale.
Baitu abakwenda obu baakimanyire, bairukira Lisitura na Derube, embuga za Likaoniya, n'omunsi ezindi eziherraineho.
Oku nuho baarangiriire Amakuru Amarungi.
Omu rubuga Lisitura hakaba haliyo omusaija ayazairwe ali mulema; akaba atarukusobora n'okurubata.
Yaija kuhuliriza Paulo naayegesa; kandi Paulo obu yamurozire, yamanya nkooku aina okwikiriza okurukusobora kumukiza.
Yagamba n'iraka likooto ati; “Imuka, oyemerre toro.” Omusaija ayazairwe ali mulema yamatuka, yatandika kurubata.
Ekitebe ky'abantu obu kyarozire Paulo eki akozire, baatokera haiguru omu rulimi rwabu Orulikaoniya bati: “Abacwezi batwiziremu, bali omu bisisani by'abantu!”
Baranaba baamukubya Zeu, kandi Paulo ow'akaba naabaza muno, baamweta Herume.
Nubwo nyakatagara w'ibandiro ly'omucwezi Zeu erikaba liri omu maiso g'orubuga yaizire n'abantu be, yaleeta enimi zijwekerwe emiihura, boona baagonza kutamba ekyonzira ha irembo ly'orubuga.
Baitu abakwenda Baranaba na Paulo obu baakihuliire baatemura ebijwaro byabo, bajumbutuka nibaraba omu kitebe ky'abantu hagati nibabatanga n'iraka likooto bati:

“Basaija inywe, kiki ekirukubakoza binu? Na itwe tuli bantu nyabuntu nka inywe. Tubaleetiire Amakuru Amarungi, nukwo muleke abacwezi abo abataina mugaso, muhindukire Ruhanga omwomeezi, ayahangire iguru n'ensi, hamu n'enyanja, na byona ebigirumu.
Omu businge bwa ira Ruhanga akaikiriza buli ihanga kwekorra ebyalyo nkooku lirukwenda;

baitu nabwo ateebuzeeho obwakaiso obw'ebirungi abakorra naabanagira enjura enyakuruga omwiguru, naabeereza oburo bwanyu omu busumi bwabwo, naabaigusa ebyokulya kandi emitima yanyu naagiijuza okusemererwa.”
Paulo na Baranaba noobu baabaliize ebi byona, kake konka balemwe kutanga abantu kubatambira ekyonzira.
Nubwo haizire Abayudaaya abaarugire Antyokiya na Ikoniyo. Baatandika kusoonasoona abantu. Ekyarugiremu, Paulo bakamuteera amabaale, baamukurra, baamuturukya omu rubuga, nibagira ngu, afiire.
Baitu abaikiriza obu baamuhikireho, yaimuka, yagaruka omu rubuga. Ha kiro egyakurasireho, uwe na Baranaba baagenda Derube.
Obu baamazire kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi omu rubuga oru, baatungamu abeegesebwa baingi, baagaruka Antyokiya nibaraba Lisitura na Ikoniyo,
nibagumya emitima y'abaikiriza nibabateererra kweyongera omu kwikiriza, kandi nibabagambira itwena nkooku tuli b'okuhikwaho obulemeezi bwingi tutakataahire omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Obu baamazire kukomera buli kitebe ky'abaikiriza abakuru b'okubarolerra, nibasaba kandi nibasiiba, boona baabakwasa MUKAMA ou baikiriize.
Nubwo Paulo na Baranaba baayongiire orugendo nibaraba Pisidiya, baahika Panfiliya.
Obu baamazire kurangirra ekigambo kya Ruhanga omu Perige, baayongera baagenda Ataliya.
Obu baarugire oku, baagwerra omu meeri, baahika Antyokiya nambere baabandiize kuheebwa obukonyezi bwa Ruhanga habw'omulimo ogu bahikiriize.
Obu baahikire Antyokiya, baasorooza ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, baabasoborra byona Ruhanga ebi yabakoleze, kandi nkooku yakinguliireho Abanyamahanga omuhanda gw'okwikiriza.
Bbo baikara n'abeegesebwa baayo okumara ebiro bingi.
Omu kasumi ako hakaijaho abantu abamu abaarugire Buyudaaya, baayegesa abaikiriza bati: “Kakuba mutasarwa, Ekiragiro kya Musa nkooku kirukuragira, timusobora kujunwa.”
Paulo na Baranaba bakabanza kuteera muno empaka n'abantu abo, okuhika bbo hamu n'abandi obu baakomerwe kugenda Yerusaalemu kuhanuura ekigambo eki hamu n'abakwenda n'abakuru abandi.
Ekitebe kyona ky'abaikiriza kyabaraga. Kandi obu bakaba nibaraba Foinike na Samaliya, baagambira abaikiriza baayo Abanyamahanga nkooku baahindukire. Amakuru ago gakakyanganura muno ab'oruganda boona.
Obu baahikire Yerusaalemu, baatangirirwa ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, hamu n'abakwenda n'abakuru abandi, baabamanyisa byona Ruhanga ebi yabakoleze.
Baitu abamu ab'omu kitebe ky'Abafalisaayo abakaba baikiriize, baatandika kuhakana nibagamba bati: “Abanyamahanga basemeriire kusarwa n'okwegesibwa kukuratira Ebiragiro bya Musa.”
Abakwenda n'abakuru bakeesorooza hamu kwetegereza ekigambo eki.

Obu baamazire omwanya mukooto nibahanuura, Petero yaimuka, yabagambira ati: “Bagenzi bange, nimumanya kurungi nkooku omu biro bya ira, nyowe kalimi kagamba, Ruhanga yankomere omuli inywe nukwo ndangirre Abanyamahanga enyegesa y'Amakuru Amarungi, bagihurre kandi baikirize.
Ruhanga, arukumanya emitima y'abantu, akabagumya, yabaha Mwoyo Ahikiriire nkooku yamutuhaire ira;
kandi atatwahukanizeemu nabo, baitu akeeza emitima yabu habw'okwikiriza oku bainakwo.
Hati Ruhanga nimumwoheza ki nimuta ekikoligo omu bikya by'abeegesebwa, ekikoligo baisenkuru itwe eki batarasoboire kuhimba noobwakuba itwe?
Baitu hati nitwesiga nkooku tulijunwa habw'embabazi za MUKAMA Yesu nk'abo oku balijunwa embabazi ze.”
Orukurato rwona rwaikara niruculeera, baahuliriza Baranaba na Paulo nibabasoborra ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano Ruhanga ebi yabakoleze omu Banyamahanga.
Bbo obu baamazire kusoborra ebyabo, Yakobbo yatandika kubaza ati: “Bagenzi bange, mumpulirize.
Simyoni arugire kutusoborra Ruhanga nkooku yabandize kuta omutima ha Banyamahanga n'okukoma abamu omuli bo abafoole bantu be.
Kandi eki nikiikirraniza n'ekyahandiikirwe abarangi kiti:
‘Ebiro ebi obu birihwa, ndigaruka nyombeke buhyaka enju ya Daudi eyagwire; nyombeke buhyaka ebikambuuro byayo, ngyemereze,
nubwo abantu abandi, hamu n'Abanyamahanga boona abarukwetwa habw'ibara lyange baligaruka kuserra MUKAMA.
MUKAMA ayatumanyisize ebintu ebi kuruga ira lyona, nukwo arukugamba ati.’
Nahabweki eki ncwiremu nikyo kinu: Itwe titusemeriire kutalibaniza abarukuruga omu Banyamahanga nibahindukira Ruhanga,
baitu kitusemeriire kubahandiikira nitubahabura beetantale ekintu kyona ekihongirwe abacwezi, beetantale obusiihani n'okulya ebisoro ebimyoirwe rundi enyama enyakurumu esagama.
Okuruga ira na ira omu buli rubuga habaho abantu abarukwegesa Ebyahandiikirwe Musa, habwokuba bisomwa buli Sabbato mu masorrokaniro gaabu.”

Nubwo abakwenda hamu n'abantu bakuru baacwiremu kukoma abamu omuli bo ab'okutuma Antyokiya bagende na Paulo na Baranaba. Ekitebe kyona ky'abaikiriza kyakisiima. Baakoma Yuda arukwetwa Barsaba na Siraasi. Nubo bantu abali beebembezi omu bagenzi baabo.
Baabakwasa ebbaruha erukugamba eti: “Bagenzi baitu, itwe abakwenda hamu n'abantu abakuru, tubahandiikire inywe ab'oruganda, Abanyamahanga abali Antyokiya na Siriya na Kilikiya, nitubaramukya.
Obu twahuliire nkooku haroho abamu abaarugire omuli itwe hanu abaabatalibaniize n'ebigambo byabo, baatabangura emitima yanyu, kandi kunu tutabaragiire,
tukeesorooza, twacwamu kukoma abasaija n'okubabatumira, hamu n'abagonzibwa Baranaba na Paulo,
abasaija abaayefubiire habwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Nahabweki twabatumira Yuda na Siraasi. Bbo bonka baraabasoborra nibagumya ebi tuhandiikire omu bbaruha egi.
Kwali kucwamu kwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire na itwe kutabatweka omutumba mukooto kukira binu byonka ebirukwetaagwa:
musemeriire kwetantara ebihongiirwe abacwezi, n'enyama enyakurumu esagama rundi enyama y'ebisoro ebimyoirwe, hamu n'obusiihani. Obu muraayerindaga ebi, muliba mukozire kurungi. Mugoroobe.”
Abaatumirwe obu baamazire kuraga abantu ba Yerusaalemu, baimukya orugendo baagenda Antyokiya. Obu baahikireyo, baatandika kweta ab'ekitebe, baabakwasa ebbaruha.
Kandi bbo, obu baagisomere, baasemererwa muno habw'ebigambo ebirukuhuumuza ebi baagisangiremu.
Yuda na Siraasi abakaba bali barangi, bakeekambisa ab'oruganda boona babagambira ebigambo bingi eby'okubagumya.
Obu bakaba baamazireyo ebiro, ab'oruganda baabaraga n'obusinge, baagarukayo Yerusaalemu hali abo abaabatumire. [
Baitu Siraasi akagonza asigaleyo.]
Paulo na Baranaba bakaikara Antyokiya hamu n'abaikiriza abandi baingi, nibeegesa kandi nibarangirra abantu ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Obu haahingwireho ebiro, Paulo akagambira Baranaba ati: “Ija tugarukeyo, tusuule bagenzi baitu ab'omu mbuga zoona nambere twarangiriire ekigambo kya MUKAMA, turole nkooku bali.”
Baranaba akaba naayenda kutwara Yohaana arukwetwa Mariko;
baitu Paulo tiyagonza kugenda n'omuntu ayabaahukaineho Panfiliya, atarasoboire kumaliriza nabo omulimo.
Hakabaho empaka nyingi. Ekyarugiremu bayaahukana: Baranaba yatwara Mariko, baagwerra omu meeri, baagenda Kipuro,
baitu Paulo yakoma Siraasi, yagenda nawe. Ab'oruganda boona bamugondeza emigisa ya MUKAMA.
Paulo yaraba Siriya na Kilikiya naagumya ebitebe by'abaikiriza.
Paulo obu yarugire Kilikiya, yahika Derube na Lisitura. Oku hakaba haliyo omwegesebwa omu, ibara lye Timoteo, mutabani w'omukazi Omuyudaaya ow'akaba aikiriize ira; baitu ise akaba ali Mugiriiki.
Ab'oruganda ba Lisitura na Ikoniyo baasiimaga muno Timoteho.
Paulo akagonza Timoteho kugenda nawe; nahabweki yamusara. Eki akakikora habwokuba Abayudaaya abakaba bali omu biikaro ebi, baamanyaga ise Timoteho nkooku ali Mugiriiki.
Obu bakaba nibaraba omu mbuga ezi, baasoborraga abantu ebiragiro ebyatairweho abakwenda n'abakuru abakaba bali Yerusaalemu, baabateererra kwikara nibabihikiriza.
Eki kyaleetera ebitebe by'abaikiriza kwongera kugumira omu kwikiriza, kandi abantu abaikiriize kyabaleetera kukanya buli kiro.
Bakaraba omu nsi ya Firigiya na Galatiya, Mwoyo Ahikiriire amazire kubatanga kurangirra ekigambo omu Asiya.
Obu baahikire ha mutaano gwa Misiya, baayenda kweyongera kuhika Bitiniya, baitu Mwoyo wa Yesu tiyabaikiriza;
nukwo kuraba Misiya, baahika Troa.
Ekiro eki Paulo yabonekerwa, yarora omusaija owa Makedoni ayemeriire aho naamwesengereza ati: “Yambuka enyanja, oije Makedoni, otukonyere.”
Obu yarugire kubonekerwa, ahonaaho twayeteekaniza kwambuka kugenda Makedoni, nitugumiza kimu Ruhanga nkooku atwesire okubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi.
Okuruga Troa twagwerra omu meeri, twayambuka, twahika Samoterake; kandi ha kiro ekyakurasireho twahika Neapoli.
Obu twarugayo, twahika Filipi, orubuga orukuru rwa Makedoni, orukaba rutembwirwe Abarooma. Omu rubuga oru tukamaramu ebiro bike;
ha kiro kya Sabbato twaruga omu rubuga nituraba omu irembo lyarwo, twahika ha rubaju rw'ekisaaru nambere twanihiire kusanga abarukusaba. Twaikarra hansi, twabaliza abakazi abakaba beesoroizeho.

Omuli abo abaatuhuliire hakaba harumu omu arukwetwa Lidiya, omukazi ayarugire omu rubuga rwa Tyatiiro, omusuubuzi w'engoye eza kahuukya, kandi omuntu ayayekambaga kuramya Ruhanga. Obu yahuliire Paulo ebi yayegeseze, MUKAMA yakingura omutima gwe, abiikirize.
Uwe n'ab'omu ka ye boona obu baamazire kubatizibwa, nubwo yatwesengeriize naagamba ati: “Obu muraaba munanukire nkooku ndukwikiriza kwo MUKAMA, mwije muraale owange.” Yatuhambiriza.
Ekiro kimu obu tukaba nitugenda omu kiikaro ky'okusabiramu, twatangaana omuzaana ow'akaba atemberwe omwoyo ogw'okuragura, kandi ayatungisaaga muno bakama be omu kuragura.
Omuzaana ogu yatandika kuhondera Paulo hamu na itwe, naayamuza ati: “Abasaija banu, baheereza ba Ruhanga anyakuli haiguru muno, baizire kubarangirra nkooku muraajunwa.”
Akaikara naakora ati buli kiro okuhika Paulo obu yabiihiirwe, yahinduka yacoomera omwoyo ogu ati: “Ninkuragira omu ibara lya Yesu Kristo, murugeho.” Gwamurugaho omu kasumi ako konyini.
Bakama be obu baarozire nkooku hatakyaroho okunihira kwona okw'okumutungamu amagoba, baakwata Paulo na Siraasi, baabacunda, baabatwara booma omumaiso g'abalemi.
Obu baabahikize hali abacwi b'emisango, baagamba bati: “Abasaija banu Bayudaaya, nibatalibaniza muno orubuga rwaitu,
nibeegesa engeso ezitarukwikirizibwa ebiragiro byaitu, itwe Abarooma.”
Ekitebe ky'abantu nakyo kyayetaba n'abakama b'omwisiki omu kubaimukirra, nukwo abacwi b'emisango kuragira babajuule n'amaani kandi babateere emiigo.
Obu baamazire kubateera emiigo nyingi, baabata omu nkomo, baaragira mukuru waayo kubalinda obutengyambone.
Obu yamazire kuragirwa ati, yabata omu kisiika ekya ha kaifo, kandi amaguru gaabo yagata mu nkomo z'ebiti.
Ekiro eki omu itumbi, Paulo na Siraasi bakaba nibasaba kandi nibazina eby'okukugiza Ruhanga, n'abanyankomo abandi bakaba nibabahuliriza.
Omu kasumi ako haabaho omusisa gw'amaani, emisingi y'enkomo yatengesebwa, enyigi zoona zaakinguka, kandi empingo ezikaba zibabohere zaasumurruka.
Omukuru w'enkomo obu yajumbutukire omu turo, yasanga enyigi zikingukire, nukwo kusomora empirima ye naayeteekaniza okweyita, naagira ngu, abanyankomo bacwire.
Baitu Paulo yamweta n'iraka likooto ati: “Oteekora akabi, habwokuba itwena turoho.”
Omukuru w'enkomo yatuma bamuleetere etaara, yataaha omu nkomo, yagwa omumaiso ga Paulo na Siraasi naatukumira.
Yabaturukya aheeru, naagamba ati: “Bakama bange, nyowe nkole ki okujunwa?”
Baamugarukamu bati: “Ikiriza MUKAMA Yesu, nubwo oraajunwa, iwe n'eka yaawe.”
Uwe hamu na boona abakaba bali omuka ye, Paulo na Siraasi baatandika kubeegesa ekigambo kya MUKAMA.
Ha saha egi yonyini yabatwara kuboogya ebihuta byabo; nubwo yabatiziibwe hamu n'ab'omuka ye boona.
Kandi obu yabahikize owe, yabaha ebyokulya. Omukuru w'enkomo n'ab'omu ka ye boona baasemererwa muno habw'okwikiriza Ruhanga.
Obwire obu bwakiire, abacwi b'emisango baaragira abakuru b'abalinzi nibagamba bati: “Abasaija abo balekere, bagende.”
Omukuru w'enkomo nukwo kubigambira Paulo ati: “Abacwi b'emisango bantumireho, nibandagira kubalekera; hati muturuke, mugende n'obusinge.”

Baitu Paulo yamugarukamu ati: “Mara itwe enzaarwa za Rooma batutiire abantu boona nibarora, kandi kunu tutacweriirwe musango gwona, baatuta n'omu nkomo. Obu si nibenda kutwihamu omu nsereko? Nangwa! Bbo bonka leka baije batwihemu.”
Abalinzi b'enkomo, ebigambo ebi baabigambira abacwi b'emisango. Nabo obu baahuliire banu nkooku bali nzaarwa za Rooma, baatandika kutiina;
baija babetondera. Babaiha omu nkomo kandi babeesengereza baruge omu rubuga rwabo.
Paulo na Siraasi nukwo kuruga omu nkomo, baagenda mba Lidiya nambere baasangire ab'oruganda. Obu baamazire kubahuumuza, baarugayo, baagenda.
Paulo na Siraasi obu baamazire kuraba Anfiipoli na Apolooniya, baahika Teesalonika nambere Abayudaaya bakaba baina isorrokaniro.
Paulo yataahamu, yatandika kubaza nabo, engeso ye nkooku ekaba eri. Yamara wiiki isatu naabahakaniza naajurra Ebihandiiko ebirukwera,
naasoborra kandi naagumya Kristo nkooku akaba ali w'okubonabonesibwa n'okuhumbuuka omu bafu, naagamba ati: “Yesu onu ou ndukubarangirra, nuwe Kristo.”
Abamu omuli bo baasikirizibwa ebi baahuliire, baayeteeraniza na Paulo na Siraasi. Kandi n'Abagiriiki baingi abaatiinaga Ruhanga bakeeteraniza nabo, hamu n'abakazi ab'ekitiinisa baingi.

Baitu Abayudaaya baakwatwa ihali, nukwo kusorooza abasaija ababi abaikaraga nibenjeera, baimukiiriza ekitebe kikooto ky'abantu, baacwa epuumpu omu rubuga. Baataaha enju ya Yasooni, nibanihira kuturukya Paulo na Siraasi babahikye nambere abantu baayesoroliize.
Obu baababuzire, baacunda Yasooni n'abamu ha bagenzi baitu, baabahikya omumaiso g'abalemi b'orubuga nibatoka bati: “Abasaija bali abaajumikire ensi, baizire na hanu.
Yasooni nuwe abaraize; kandi banu boona nibakora ebintu ebirukuhakaniza ebiragiro bya Kaisaali, nibagira ngu, haroho omukama ondi arukwetwa Yesu.”
Abanyarubuga n'abalemi barwo obu baabihuliire, baatandika kutuntura.
Yasooni na bagenzi be bakabanza kubaihaho omusimbo batakabalekiire.
Ekiro eki kyonyini ab'oruganda baacwisa Paulo na Siraasi, baakwata ogwa Beroya. Obu baahikireyo, baataaha omu isorrokaniro ly'Abayudaaya.

Abayudaaya baayo bakaba batali bantu abagumangana nk'aba Teesalonika. Bbo bakarahuka kwikiriza ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'omutima gumu, nibasoma buli kiro Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera, barole ebigambo binu obu biraaba biri by'amazima.
Nahabweki Abayudaaya baingi omuli bo bakaikiriza, hamu n'abakazi Abagiriiki baingi, abantu b'ekitiinisa, oteho n'abasaija.
Baitu Abayudaaya ba Teesalonika obu baahuliire Paulo nkooku arangiriire ekigambo kya Ruhanga omu Beroya, nukwo kwijayo, baatamu abantu epuumpu, baabaimukiriza.
Ahonaaho ab'oruganda baacwisa Paulo, atwarwe ogw'enyanja; baitu Siraasi na Timoteho baasigarayo.
Abo abaasendekeriize Paulo, bakamuhikya Ateena. Obu yamazire kubaha obukwenda obw'okugambira Siraasi na Timoteho barahuke bamusangeyo, bbo baakwata omuhanda, baagarukayo.
Paulo obu akaba akyabategeriize Ateena, omutima gwamusarra muno habw'okurora orubuga oru rwijwire ebisisani by'abacwezi barwo.
Buli kiro omu isorrokaniro yahakanizaaga Abayudaaya n'abanyamahanga abaatiinaga Ruhanga hamu na'bantu abandi aba yasangaga omu katale.

Kandi abanyamagezi abamu ab'ekitebe ky'Omugiriiki Epikuliyo n'ab'ekitebe ekindi ky'entabiganya nabo baamuhakaniza. Abamu baakaguza bati: “Hati enjaaliimi egi neegamba ki?” Abandi baagarukamu bati: “Nasisana arukwegesa baruhanga aba tutamanyire” habwokuba akaba naayegesa hali Yesu na ha kuhumbuuka.
Nukwo kumweta agende nabo, baamuhikya omu rukurato orurukwetwa Arehopago, baatandika kumukaguza bati: “Enyegesa enu empyaka, torukwija kutusoborra amakuru gaayo?
Habwokuba ebimu ebi otugambiire bituhuniriize. Nahabweki nitwenda kumanya amakuru gaabyo.”
Abantu boona b'Ateena n'abanyamahanga abakaba baliyo, bakaba bataina kindi eki baakoraga kwihaho kubaza n'okuhurra ebintu byona ebihyaka.
Paulo yayemerra omumaiso g'orukurato orwa Arehopago yatandika okubasoborra ati: “Inywe abasaija ba Ateena, mmazire kwetegereza nkooku muli bantu abarukutaho muno omutima ha diini mu buli kintu.

Habwokuba nambere nkarabire hoona, nsangire ebintu ebi murukuramya, kandi naasanga itambiro erimu erihandiikirweho liti: ‘Itambiro lya ruhanga atarukumanywa.’ Ningira ogu ou murukuramya mutamanyire, nuwe Ruhanga, nyowe ou ndukubarangirra.
“Ruhanga ayahangire ensi na byona ebirumu nkooku ali MUKAMA w'iguru n'ensi, taikara mu maramizo agombekerwe abantu,
kandi takonyerwa bantu nk'anyakwina eki abuzirwe, habwokuba nuwe wenka aha boona obwomeezi, n'okwikya orwoya, na buli kintu kyona.
Akahanga enganda zoona eza bantu, nabaiha omu muntu omu, yabaha ensi yoona bagiikalemu, amazire kutaho obusumi bw'emyaka baraamara, yataho n'emitaano nambere enganda ziraagarukiraga,
nukwo abantu baserre Ruhanga nibamanya nkooku basobora kumuzorra mu kuhamanga. Mazimakwo buli omu omuli itwe tamuli hara,
habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Omuli Uwe nuho tutunga obwomeezi, nuwe tugenderamu kandi nuwe atuha kubaho.’ Kandi abaisenkuru inywe abaabacweriire enfumo bakagamba bati: ‘Na itwe tuli baana be mali.’
Itwe nkooku tuli baana ba Ruhanga, tuleke kugira ngu, Ruhanga nasisana ekisisani ekyakozirwe amagezi g'abantu ekyaihirwe omu zaabbu, rundi efeeza, rundi amabaale agaasarwirwe.
Ebiro ebi mwamazire omu butamanya, Ruhanga atabiteho mutima; baitu hati naaragira abantu boona, hoona nambere bali, beegarukemu,
habwokuba akataho ekiro nambere ensi yoona ericwerwaho omusango omu mazima, nigucwibwa omuntu ou yataireho, kandi eki akakyoleka abantu boona obu yamuhumbwire omu bafu.”
Obu baahuliire ha by'okuhumbuuka kw'abafu, abamu baayesekera; baitu abandi baagamba bati: “Ekigambo eki nitwenda kukihurra kiro kindi.”
Nubwo Paulo yabarugiremu.
Baitu habaho abasaija abamu abaamugumiireho baafooka abaikiriza. Omuli bo hakaba harumu Diyonisiyo, omukurasi ow'orukurato orwa Arehopago n'omukazi arukwetwa Damali, hamu n'abantu abandi.
Ebi obu byahoire, Paulo yaruga Ateena yagenda Korinto.

Nuho yaitiraine Omuyudaaya arukwetwa Akwila, enzaarwa ya Ponto. Uwe na mukazi we Purisila nubwo bakaba bakyarugire Itale habwokuba Omukama omukuru Kilahudiyo akaba aragiire Abayudaaya boona baruge Rooma. Paulo yagenda kubabungira,
kandi obu yarozire bali bakozi b'amaheema, omulimo ogurukusisa nk'ogu yakozire, yatandika kwikara nabo, nibakora hamu.
Buli Sabbato yayegesaaga omu isorrokaniro lyayo kandi yalengahoga kusoonasoona Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki.
Siraasi na Timoteho obu baamazire kwija, nibaruga Makedoni, Paulo yayeheriireyo kimu ha mulimo ogw'okutebeza n'okusoborra Abayudaaya nkooku Yesu ali Kristo.
Obu baatandikire kumuhakaniza n'okumujuma, yakunkumura ekijwaro kye, naagamba ati: “Esagama yanyu ebe hali inywe. Nyowe tinyina musango. Okuruga hati ninyija kugenda omu Banyamahanga.”
Yaruga omu isorrokaniro lya Korinto, yagenda kwikara omunju y'omusaija arukwetwa Tito Yusto, omuntu ayatiinaga Ruhanga. Enju ye ekaba eri haihi n'isorrokaniro.
Kirisipo, omukuru w'isorrokaniro, hamu n'ab'omuka ye boona baikiriza MUKAMA. Abakorinto abandi baingi abaahuliire enyegesa za Paulo baikiriza kandi baabatizibwa.
Kiro kimu omu itumbi MUKAMA akabonekera Paulo yamugambira ati: “Otatiina, yegesa kandi otaculeera;
ndi hamu na iwe, kandi tiharoho muntu araakukora kubi habwokuba omu rubuga runu nyinamu abantu bange baingi.”
Paulo akamarayo omwaka gumu n'ameezi mukaaga, naabeegesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Galiyo obu akaba ali mulemi mukuru wa Akaaya, Abayudaaya bakaikirraniza okukwata Paulo, baamutwara omu kooti,
nibagamba bati: “Omusaija onu naayohya abantu, baramye Ruhanga omu mulingo ogutarukwikirizibwa Ebiragiro bya Musa.”

Kandi Paulo obu akaba atakagarukiremu, nubwo Galiyo yagambiire Abayudaaya ati: “Inywe Abayudaaya, kakuba omuntu onu abaire aina eki asobeze, rundi acwire ekiragiro kikuru, naakubagumiisiriize mbahurra;
baitu empaka zanyu obu ziraaba ziri ha bigambo, rundi ha mabara, rundi ha biragiro byanyu, mubyemarre inywenka. Nyowe tindukwenda kucwa misango ey'ebintu nk'ebi.”
Yababinga omu kooti.
Aho boona baahinduka baagwera Soositene, mukuru w'isorrokaniro, baamuterra omu kooti. Baitu Galiyo ebi byona atabifeeho.

Ebi obu byahoire, Paulo yayongera kumarayo ebiro bingi, nubwo yaragire ab'oruganda, yagwerra omu meeri, yayambuka yagenda Siriya, aina Purisila na Akwila. Obu bakaba bali Kenkereya, Paulo yayemwa isoke nkooku akaba aragaine.
Kandi obu baahikire Efeeso, yabasigaho. Yataaha omu isorrokaniro wenka, yatandika kuhakana n'Abayudaaya.
Abaikiriza obu baamusabire ayongere kwikara nabo ebiro bindi, yayanga;
baitu yabaraga naagamba ati: “Ruhanga obu aliba agondeze, ndigaruka.” Yagwerra omu meeri, yaruga Efeeso.
Obu yasaabukire ahikire Kaisaariya, yagenda kuramukyaho ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, hanyuma yagenda Antyokiya.
Obu yamazireyo ebiro bike, yarugayo, yagenda naaraba omunsi yoona ya Galatiya na Firigiya, naagumya abaikiriza boona.
Omu biro ebi, Efeeso hakaijayo Omuyudaaya, ibara lye Apolo, enzaarwa ya Alekizanderiya. Apolo ogu akaba ali muntu arukubaza kurungi kandi anyakumanyire muno Ebihandiiko ebirukwera.
Omusaija ogu akaba ayegesiibwe Omuhanda gwa MUKAMA; yarangirra n'omuhimbo ebigambo ebirukukwata hali Yesu kandi yabyegesa kurungi, noobu araaba akaba naamanya okubatiza kwa Yohaana kwonka.
Yatandika kwegesa n'obumanzi omu isorrokaniro ly'Abayudaaya; baitu Purisila na Akwila obu baamuhuliire, baamutwara owaabu, baayongera kumwegesa kurungi Omuhanda gwa Ruhanga.

Apolo obu yagondeze kwambuka kugenda Akaaya, ab'oruganda baamusagika, baahandiikira abaikiriza baayo nibabasaba kumutangirra. Obu yahikireyo, yakonyerwa amaani ga Ruhanga kugumya abo abakaba baikiriize,
habwokuba yahakanizaaga muno Abayudaaya burole, naaboolekera omu Bihandiiko ebirukwera Yesu nkooku ali Kristo.
Apolo obu akaba akyali Korinto, Paulo akakwata omuhanda ogw' obwerre, yahika Efeeso nambere yasangire abaikiriza abamu.
Yabakaguza ati; “Mukaheebwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire obu mwaikiriize?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Nangwa, n'okuhurra titukahurrahoga nkooku haroho Mwoyo Ahikiriire.”
Yayongera yabakaguza ati: “Mukabatizibwa muta?” Baamugarukamu bati: “Tukabatizibwa omu kubatiza okwa Yohaana.”
Nandiki Paulo ati: “Yohaana akabatiza n'okubatiza kw'okwegarukamu, naateererra abantu kwikiriza ogu ow'akaba ali ow'okumwija enyuma, nuwe Yesu.”
Obu baahuliire eki, baabatizibwa omu ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu,
kandi Paulo obu yamazire kubataho emikono, Mwoyo Ahikiriire yabaijaho, baatandika kubaza endimi n'okuranga ebya Ruhanga.
Abo boona bakaba bali nka ikumi na babiri.
Paulo akataaha omu isorrokaniro ly'Abayudaaya, yabalizamu n'obumanzi kandi yahakaniramu n'amagezi okubaikirizisa eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga. Yamara ameezi asatu naakora ati,

okuhika abamu obu bakadadaire, bayanga kwikiriza, nibajuma Omuhanda gwa MUKAMA omumaiso ga boona. Nubwo Paulo yabarugireho, yatwara abaikiriize, kandi buli kiro baikaraga nibahanurra omu kisiika ky'okubalizaamu eky'omusaija arukwetwa Tiraano.
Paulo yaikara naakora ati kumara emyaka ebiri. Ekyarugiremu nukwo abantu boona abaikaraga Asiya: Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki, kuhurra ekigambo kya Mukama.
Emikono ya Paulo, Ruhanga akagikozesa ebyamahano ebitakabonwaga.
Abantu bakaba nibatwara ebitambara n'engoye ebi yakwasireho babikwasaho abarwaire, bakira endwara zaabo, n'emyoyo emibi yabarugaho.

Abayudaaya abamu, enjeezijeezi, abaagendaga nibabinga emyoyo emibi, nubwo baalengereho kugibinga hali abo abakaba bainayo, nibaatura ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu, nibagamba bati: “Ninkuragirra omuli Yesu, Paulo ou arangirra.”
Omuli abo abaakikozire hakaba harumu abasigazi musanju, batabani b'Omuyudaaya Sikewa, nyakatagara mukuru.
Baitu omwoyo omubi gwabagarukamu guti: “Yesu mmumanyire, na Paulo mmumanyire; baitu inywe, niinywe baha?”
Omusaija ow'akaba aroho omwoyo omubi yabagurukira, yabakiza amaani, yabasingura. Baaruga omunju egi bali busa kandi bahutaire muno.
Abantu boona abaikaraga Efeeso, Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki, obu baakihuliire baatiina muno kandi baanyumiza MUKAMA Yesu.
Baingi omuli abo abaikiriize, bakaija baayegarukamu nibaatura ebibi ebi baakozire.

Kandi baingi omuli abo abakaba nibakora eby'obufumu, bakasorooza hamu ebitabu byabo, baabyokeza omumaiso g'abantu. Obu babaliriire omuhendo gw'ebitabu ebi, baasanga niguhika ebicweka by'efeeza emitwaro etaano.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyayeyongera kuraranga muno kandi kyasingurra kimu.
Ebi byona obu byahoire, Paulo yacwamu kugaruka Yerusaalemu, naaraba Makedoni na Akaaya naagira ati: “Obu ndikamara kuhikayo, ninyija kugenda na Rooma.”
Nukwo yatuma ati babiri ha bakonyezi be, Timoteho na Erasito, bamwebembere kuhika Makedoni, uwe akyasigaire Asiya kumara ebiro bike.
Omu kasumi ako, hakaba haroho okwimukirra kwingi habw'Omuhanda gwa MUKAMA.
Habwokuba omusaija arukwetwa Demetiriyo, omuheesi w'eby'efeeza, ayaheesaga ebisisani by'ekirorro ky'embandwa enkazi Atemisi, yahaga abaheesi baingi omulimo.
Abo boona akabasorooza, hamu n'abandi abaakoraga omulimo ogu, yabagambira ati: “Basaija inywe, mumanyire omulimo gunu nkooku nugwo gubaire nigututungisa.

Hati mumazire kurora n'okuhurra, tihali Efeeso honka, baitu kutagirwa n'omu Asiya yoona, omusaija ogu Paulo nkooku asoonasoonere abantu baingi yabahindura, naagamba ngu, baruhanga abakozirwe engaro tibali baruhanga naakake.

Hati nu akabi kaija, tiharukwija kugaywa mulimo gwaitu gwonka, baitu n'ekirorro ky'embandwa enkuru Atemisi nikiija kudiba; kandi omucwezikati ogu arukuramibwa ab'omu Asiya n'ahandi hoona omunsi, naija kwihwaho ekitiinisa kye.”
Obu baahuliire eki, baakwatwa ekiniga kingi, baatandika kutoka muno nibagamba bati: “Atemisi ow'Abeefeso nuwe ruranganwa!”
Orubuga rwona rwaijwamu akambayaya, abantu bajumbutukira hamu, baagenda omu kizaaniro ky'orubuga nibacunda Abamakedoni babiri Gaayo na Arisitariko, abasaija abaagendaga na Paulo omu ngendo ze.
Paulo nawe yagonza kugenda omu kitebe eki eky'abantu babataisule, baitu abaikiriza baamutanga;
kandi abamu ha banyoro abakuru aba Asiya, abakaba bali banywani be, baamutumaho, nibamwesengereza aleke kugenda omu kizaaniro eki akeenaga omu kabi.
Omu kasumi ako buli omu akaba naatoka okwe; habwokuba bakaba batabatabukire, kandi abarukukira obwingi omuli bo batamanye eki bayesorooliize.
Abayudaaya baacumiriza Alekizanda omumaiso ga boona. Abamu ab'omu kitebe nukwo kuteekereza ngu, nuwe arukujunaanwa. Alekizanda yabaculeeza n'omukono gwe, nukwo ayetonganirre.
Baitu obu baayetegeriize nkooku ali Muyudaaya, boona baatokera hamu nibagamba bati: “Atemisi ow'Abeefeso nuwe ruranganwa!” Baakora bati okumara esaaha ibiri.

Omukuru w'orubuga obu yamazire kuculeeza abantu yabagambira ati: “Inywe abasaija ba Efeeso, nooha atamanyire orubuga rwa Efeeso nkooku nurwo rulinda iramizo lya Atemisi ruranganwa, rulinda n'ekisisani kye ekyarugire omu iguru?
Hati nu, nkooku hataroho muntu asobora kubihakaniza, nimusemerra kuculeera, mutakora kantu na kamu nimurahukiriza.
Habwokuba abasaija banu aba muleesire hanu, tibasiisire eby'omu birorro byanyu kandi tibajumire mucwezikati waitu.
Demetiriyo n'abaheesi bagenzi be obu baraaba baina eki barukunyegererra omuntu weena, ekooti ez'okucweramu emisango iroho, n'abalemi baroho; nuho bagende banyegerrangane.
Baitu obu muraaba mwina ekindi eki murukwenda, kiraacwerwa omu rukurato rwaitu orwa butoosa.
Habwokuba na itwe tuli omu kabi k'okunyegererwa habw'okuleeta akajagarro ak'ekiro kinu, kandi tiharoho bulyo bwona obu tusobora kutongana obw'okunanura ekireesire akajagarro kanu.”
Obu yamazire kugamba eki, yaraga ekitebe.
Akajagarro obu kahoire, Paulo yayeta abaikiriza yabagambira eby'okubagumya, yabaraga, yarugayo yagenda Makedoni.
Obu yamazire kuraba omu bicweka ebi, n'okubagambira bingi eby'okubagumya, yahika Bugiriiki.
Oku yamarayo ameezi asatu, kandi obu akaba naayeteekaniza okugwerra omu meeri kugenda Siriya, Abayudaaya baayekoba omu nsita okumwita. Baitu uwe yacwamu kugaruka enyuma arabe Makedoni ha bwerre.
Abaamusendekeriize kumuhikya Asiya nubo banu: Soopateri owa Beroya, mutabani wa Piiro; Arisitariko na Sekundo Abateesalonika; Gaayo owa Derube na Timoteho, hamu na Tikiko na Turofimo abantu ba Asiya.
Abo boona bakatwebembera, baatulindirirra Turoyi.

Ebiro bikuru eby'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe obu byamazire kuhwaho, na itwe twaruga Filipi tuli omu meeri. Emeeri egi twagimaramu ebiro bitaano, kandi bbo twabasanga Turoyi nambere twamazire ebiro musanju.
Ha kiro eky'okubanza omu wiiki, obu twayesoroize kulya hamu omugaati; Paulo, ow'akaba ali w'okurugayo nyenkya, yatandika kubaza nabo. Yaikaraho muno nayegesa okuhika omu itumbi.
Omu kisiika ekya haiguru nambere tukaba twesorooliize, hakaba nihaakiramu etaara nyingi.
Paulo obu yaikaire naabaza muno, omusigazi arukwetwa Eyutiko, ow'akaba aikaliire omu idirisa, yakwatwa oturo twingi, twamulemesa, yahanuuka omu kainaasatu, yagwa hansi. Baamwihaho afiire.
Paulo yasirimuka, yamwinamaho, yamubumbaatira naagamba ati: “Muleke kutiina, akyayomiire.”
Nukwo Paulo kugaruka omu kainaasatu, kandi obu yamazire kucwamu omugaati n'okulya, yayongera kubaza nabo omwanya mukooto okuhikya omu rukyakya nambere yabarugireho.
Omusigazi ogu bamutwara omuka ayomiire, emitima yabagwa omunda.
Itwe tukagwerra omu meeri, twayeyongera omumaiso, twahika Aso nambere twanihiire kugwerereza Paulo ow'akaba ategekere kuraba ha bwerre.
Obu yatuhikireho tuli Aso, twamuta omu meeri, twairrayo twahika Mitileene.
Obwire obu bwakiire, twarugayo tuli omu meeri, twarabaho ekizinga Kiiyo. Ha kiro kya kasatu ky'orugendo twahika Saamo, kandi ha kiro kya kana twahika Mileeto.
Paulo wenka akaba acwiremu kutaraba Efeeso, nukwo aleke kukerererwa Asiya; habwokuba akaba naarahukiriza, obu kiraaba nikisoboka, ekiro kikuru kya Pentikooti kimusange Yerusaalemu.
Obu akaba ali Mileeto, Paulo yatuma Efeeso kumweterayo abakuru ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza.
Obu baamuhikireho, yabagambira ati: “Nimumanya omulingo nabaikaramuga obutoosa, okuruga ha kiro eki naahikiireho omu Asiya.
Nimumanya nkooku nkaba nimpeereza MUKAMA n'okwebundaaza kwona, kandi nimumanya emihito n'obusaasi ebyangweriire habw'obucwangya bw'Abayudaaya.
Baitu tinkalekiire kubarangirra n'okubeegesa ekigambo kyona ekiraabagasira, ninkigamba omu rwanjale rw'abantu rundi omu maka ganyu,
ninteererra Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki kuhindukira Ruhanga n'okwikiriza MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Hati nimurora nkooku ndukuhambirizibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire kugenda Yerusaalemu ntarukumanya ebirangwera obu ndaahikayo;
kyonka omu buli rubuga oru ndabiremu, Mwoyo Ahikiriire nuwe ammanyisa nkooku ndi w'okukwatwa omu nkomo n'okubonabonesibwa.

Baitu obwomeezi bwange tindukubweta bw'omugaso rundi bw'omuhendo hali nyowe. Eki ndukugonza nukwo kumaliiriza orugendo rwange n'okuhikiriza obuheereza obu nahairwe MUKAMA Yesu, nukwo okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'embabazi za Ruhanga.
“Hati nimmanya nkooku hataroho n'omu omuli inywe aba nahikireho nindangirra obukama bwa Ruhanga ow'aligaruka kundora.
Nahabweki hati nimbamanyisa nkooku ntarukujunaanwa obwomeezi bw'omuntu weena omuli inywe ow'aligwa,
habwokuba nkabooleka entegeka yoona eya Ruhanga ntarukutiina.
Hati nu mwerinde inywenka, kandi mulinde n'igana lyona Mwoyo Ahikiriire eri yabakwasize kurolerra, muliise ekitebe kya MUKAMA. Ekitebe eki yacungwize esagama ye.
Nimmanya ngu, obu ndaamara kubarugaho, emyaaga emikatuzi niija kubataahirra, kandi igana eri terukwija kuligirra mbabazi.
Nangwa n'omuli inywe halirugamu abantu abarukwegesa eby'okuhabisa abaikiriza, nukwo beetungire bati ab'okubahondera.
Nahabweki mwikale nimurora kandi mwijuke nkooku namazire na inywe emyaka esatu ntarukwosa kiro na nyamusana kuteererra buli omu, nindira.
Hati nu, nimbakwasa Ruhanga n'enyegesa ey'embabazi ze. Enyegesa enyakusobora kubagumya n'okubatungisa obugwetwa omuli abo abeeziibwe.
Tinkasabaga muntu n'omu kumpa feeza rundi ezaabbu, noobu kyakuba ekyokujwara.
Inywena nimumanya emikono yange nkooku niyo yantungisaaga byona ebi naayetagaaga, hamu n'abo aba nkaba nyinabo.
Ebi byona nkabikora kubooleka nkooku musemeriire kwehayo nukwo mukonyere enceke, nimwijuka ebigambo MUKAMA Yesu ebi yagambire ati: ‘Okugaba kwina omugisa okukira okuheebwa!’”
Obu yamazire kugamba ebi, Paulo yateeza amaju hamu nabo boona, baasaba.
Obu, boona bakaba nibarra, Paulo bamugwa omu kifuba nibamunywegera.
Ekyakizire muno kubasaaliza nikyo ekigambo eki yabaragisize ngu, tibaligaruka kumurora. Baamusendekereza, baamuhikya ha meeri.
Obu twamazire kubaraga, twagwerra omu meeri, twagenda tutarukukubutuka twahika ekizinga Koosi. Ekiro ekyakurasireho twahika Roodo. Obu twarugire Roodo, twahika Paatara,
nambere twasangire meeri erukugenda Foinike, twagitaahamu, twagenda.
Obu twalengiire ekizinga Kipuro, twagisiga ha bumoso, twagenda Siriya. Twahika ha bwerre omu rubuga Tiiro, habwokuba nuho bakaba nibagya kwihiramu ebintu omu meeri.
Obu twasangireyo abaikiriza, twamarayo ebiro musanju. Habw'okuhaburwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, abantu baayo baagambire Paulo eleke kugenda Yerusaalemu.

Baitu obwire bwaitu obu bwahikire, twarugayo, twayongera orugendo rwaitu. Abo boona, hamu n'abakazi n'abaana baabo baatusendekereza okuhika obu baatuturukize orubuga. Obu twahikire ha musa gw'enyanja twateeza amaju, twasaba. Hanyuma, obu twamazire kuragangana,
twagwerra omu meeri, nabo bakagaruka owaabu.
Orugendo rwaitu orw'okuruga Tiiro obu rwahoire, twahika Putolemai nambere twaramukiize ab'oruganda, kandi twamara nabo ekiro kimu.
Obu bwakiire twarugayo, twahika Kaisaariya; twataaha omunju ya Filipo omurangirizi w'Amakuru Amarungi, ow'akaba ali omu ha baheereza bali omusanju, twaikara owe.
Filipo akaba aina bahara be bbana abataswirwe, kandi abakaba baina ekisembo ky'okuranga ebya Ruhanga.
Obu twamazireyo ebiro, hakaijayo omurangi ayarugire Buyudaaya, ibara lye Agabo.

Obu yatuhikireho, yakwata omweko gwa Paulo, yagwebohesa amaguru n'emikono naagamba ati: “Kinu nikyo Mwoyo Ahikiriire arukugamba ngu: ‘Abayudaaya ba Yerusaalemu nukwo baliboha bati mukama w'omweko gunu, bamuheyo omu mikono y'Abanyamahanga.’ ”
Obu twahuliire eki, itwe n'abandi boona abakaba baliyo, twayesengereza Paulo aleke kugenda Yerusaalemu.
Baitu uwe yagarukamu ati: “Kiki eki murukukora kwija hamu nimurra kandi nimunsununura? Nyowe tinyeteekaniize kukwatwa kwonka baitu n'okufeera Yerusaalemu habw'ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu.”
Obu yayangire kutuhuliriza, twamuleka, nitugamba tuti: “MUKAMA eki araagonza, nikyo kikorwe.”
Ebiro byaitu Kaisaariya obu byahoireho, twaboha ebintu, twaimukya orugendo, twagenda Yerusaalemu.
Abamu ha baikiriza ba Kaisaariya baagenda na itwe, baatuhikya ha nju ya Minasooni, Omunyakipuro, omu ha baikiriza abaabandize kuhindukira MUKAMA. Nuho tukaba tuli b'okuraara.
Obu tukaba nitukyataaha Yerusaalemu, ab'oruganda batutangirra n'okusemererwa.
Kandi nyenkya, obwire obu bwakiire, Paulo yagenda na itwe kurora Yakobbo. Abakuru b'ekitebe boona bakaba baliyo.
Obu yamazire kubaramukya, Paulo yabasoborra naaherraniza ebintu byona Ruhanga ebi yamukoleze omu Banyamahanga.

Obu baahuliire ebi baatandika kukugiza Ruhanga. Kandi Paulo baamugarukamu nibasoborra bati: “Mugenzi waitu, na iwe orozire omu Buyudaaya nkooku harumu abantu enkumi n'enkumi abaikiriize; boona nibeekambira Ebiragiro bya Musa.
Na hati baahurra nkooku orukwegesa Abayudaaya boona abarukwikara omu Banyamahanga kuleka Ebiragiro bya Musa, kandi noobeegesa kutasara abaana baabo n'okutakwata engeso ez'ihanga lyaitu.
Hati tukole ki? Mazima nibaija kuhurra nkooku oizire kunu.
Nahabweki kora eki turukukuhabura. Hanu twinaho abasaija bbana abaarahiire;

obatwale, oyeyeze hamu nabo, osasule byona eby'okubamwa isoke, emikoro nkooku eri. Aho boona nuho baraamanyira ebyakugambirweho nkooku bitali by'amazima, kandi iwe wenka nkooku oyerinda kandi okwata Ebiragiro bya Musa.

Baitu Abanyamahanga abo abaikiriize, tukabahandiikira ebbaruha nitubasoborra eki twacwiremu, nkooku basemeriire kwetantara ebihongiirwe abacwezi, n'enyama enyakurumu esagama, n'ebisoro ebimyoirwe, hamu n'obusiihani.”

Ha kiro ekyakurasireho, Paulo yatwara abasaija abo, yayeyeza hamu nabo, yataaha omunju ya Ruhanga kumanyisa abakuru baayo ebiro eby'okwezebwa kwabu nambere birihweraho, nukwo ekihongwa ekya buli omu kiheebwayo.
Ebiro ebi musanju obu bikaba biri haihi kuhwa, Abayudaaya abamu abaarugire Asiya, baamurora omunju ya Ruhanga, baatandika kujagaraza abantu, baagenda baamukwata,

nibatoka bati: “Inywe basaija ba Isirairi, mutukoonyere! Omusaija onu nuwe arukugenda buli hantu naayegesa abantu kuhakaniza ihanga lyaitu, naagaya Ebiragiro ebi twahairwe Musa n'ekiikaro kinu ekirukwera. Kandi ihangamura ataahize Abagiriiki omunju ya Ruhanga, asiisire n'ekiikaro kinu ekirukwera.”
Eki bakakigamba habw'okumurora juba omu rubuga ali na Trofimo owa Efeeso. Baateekereza ngu, Paulo amutaahize omunju ya Ruhanga.
Nubwo orubuga rwona rwaimukiriire, abantu baayesorooza, baakwata Paulo, baamucunda, baamuturukya omunju ya Ruhanga; ahonaaho enyigi zaakingwa.
Kandi obu bakaba nibeetekaniza kumwita, amakuru gahika mukuru w'amahe ngu, Yerusaalemu yoona egwirwemu akambayaya.
Ahonaaho yatwara ab'amahe hamu n'abakuru baabo bagwera ekitebe ky'abantu. Nabo obu baarozire ab'amahe hamu n'omukuru wabu, baalekeraho kuteera Paulo.
Kandi mukuru w'amahe obu yahikire Paulo, yamukwata, yaragira bamubohese enjegere ibiri, yamukaguza ibara lye n'eki akozire.
Abamu ab'omu kitebe baatoka kundi n'abandi kundi. Obu yayetegeriize nkooku atarukusobora kumanya amazima habw'etoko yabu, yaragira kumutwara omu kigo ky'ab'amahe.
Obu baamuhikize ha matembero g'ekigo, ab'amahe baamuhimba habw'empaka z'abantu;
habwokuba ekitebe ky'abantu kikamukuratira nikitoka muno kiti: “Mumwite!”
Paulo obu akaba ali haihi kutaahibwa omu kigo, yakaguza mukuru w'amahe ati: “Nonyikiriza kukugambira ekigambo?” Nawe yamukaguza ati: “Mara iwe noomanya Orugiriiki?
Tiniiwe Omunyamisiri oli ayayemeseze abantu omu biro ebyahingwire, watwara omu irungu abasaija enkumi ina abaisi b'abantu?”
Nandiki Paulo ati: “Nyowe ndi Muyudaaya, nzaarwa ya Taruso orwa Kilikiya, orubuga orumanyirwe muno. Nkwesengeriize, nyikiriza mbalize abantu.”
Obu yamwikiriize, Paulo yayemerra ha matembero, yaculeeza abantu n'omukono gwe. Obu baamazire kuculeera, yabagambira omu Ruhebburaayo ati:
“Bagenzi bange kandi bataata, muhurre ekigambo eki ndukwetonganirra omu maiso ganyu.”
Obu baahuliire naabagambira omu Ruhebburaayo, baaculerra kimu cii. Paulo yagamba ati:

“Nyowe ndi Muyudaaya, nzaarwa ya Taruso orwa Kilikiya, baitu nkakurra omu rubuga runu, naatendekwa omwegesa Gamalyeli okukuraatira engeso z'Ebiragiro by'abaisenkuru itwe, nayekambiraga ebya Ruhanga inywena nkooku murukukora hati.
Nahiiganizaaga abantu abaahonderaga Omuhanda gunu, ntaireho n'okubaita, nimboha abasaija n'abakazi, nimbakwasa omu nkomo.

Omukuru wa banyakatagara n'abakurasi boona ab'orukurato nubo bakaiso bange, habwokuba bakampa ebbaruha ez'okutwarra bagenzi baabo ab'omu rubuga Damasiko. Nkagendayo nkwate na bali abakaba baliyo, mbaleete Yerusaalemu baboherwe, nukwo bafubirwe.
“Obu nkaba ninkyagenda, ndi haihi kuhika Damasiko, nk'omu ihangwe, ahonaaho ekyererezi eky'amaani kyaruga omwiguru, kyanyehinguliriza.
Naagwa hansi, naahurra iraka niringambira liti: ‘Saulo, Saulo nompiiganiriza ki?’
Na nyowe naagarukamu nti: ‘Niiwe oha, Waitu?’ Lyangarukamu liti: ‘Ninyowe Yesu owa Nazareeti ou orukuhiiganiza.’
Abantu abakaba bali na nyowe bakarora ekyererezi eki, baitu batahurre iraka ly'ogu ow'arukubaza na nyowe.
Naayongera naakaguza nti: ‘Nkole ki MUKAMA wange?’ Nawe yangarukamu ati: ‘Imuka, otaahe orubuga Damasiko. Nuho oraamanyisibwa eki oraakora.’
Obu naalemerwe kurora habw'okwangasana kw'ekyererezi eki, bagenzi bange nubwo baannanasire, bampikya Damasiko.
“Omusaija arukwetwa Ananiya, omuntu ayayekambiraga ebya Ruhanga, naahikiriza Ebiragiro bya Musa kandi naasiimwa Abayudaaya boona abaikaraga Damasiko,
yaija kundora. Yanyemerra ha rubaju, yangambira ati: ‘Mugenzi wange Saulo, iguka amaiso.’ Omu kasumi ako konyini amaiso gange gaiguka, naamurora.
Yayongera yagamba ati: ‘Ruhanga ow'abaisenkuruitwe akukomere omanye ebi arukugonza, orole Omuhikiriire ogu Yesu, kandi ohurre iraka lye;
habwokuba oliba kaiso we ha bantu boona, ow'okugumya ebi warozire n'ebi wahuliire.
Hati otegeriize ki? Imuka, obatizibwe, oyogebweho ebibi byawe, oyamirre ibara lye.’ ”
“Kiro kimu, obu namazire kugaruka Yerusaalemu, nkaba ninsaba omunju ya Ruhanga, ahonaaho nasisa nk'arukuroota.
Narora MUKAMA nangambira ati: ‘Rahuka, oruge bwango Yerusaalemu, habwokuba abantu banu tibarukwija kwikiriza ebi orukumbazaaho.’
Na nyowe nagarukamu nti: ‘MUKAMA wange, bbo bonka bamanyire nkooku nagendaga omu buli isorrokaniro ninta omu nkomo abarukukwikiriza kandi nimbateera.
Obu baaseesire esagama ya Sitefano, kaiso waawe, nkaba nyemeriireho nimpikirraniza n'abarukumwita, ndinzire ebijwaro byabo.’
Baitu MUKAMA yangambira ati: ‘Irooko ogende, ninyija kukutuma hara omu Banyamahanga.’ ”
Abantu bakaikara bamutegiire amatu okuhika obu yagambire ebigambo ebi; nubwo baatokiire haiguru nibagamba bati: “Omuntu ogu mumwite aruge omu nsi! Tasemeriire kwikaraho!”
Obu, bakaba nibatoka muno, nibanaga n'ebijwaro byabo, kandi nibamiisa ecuucu haiguru.
Nukwo mukuru w'amahe kuragira bamutaahye omu kigo, bamukagulirize nibamuteera n'enkoba, nukwo amanye ebi barukumujunaana.

Obu baamazire kumuboha ha nyomyo, Paulo yakaguza omukuru w'ekihanda ky'abaserikale ow'akaba ayemeriire haihi ati: “Omu Biragiro byanyu nimwikirizibwa kuteera enkoba omuntu anyakuli Omurooma kandi atakasingirwe musango?”
Mukuru w'ekihanda ky'abaserikale obu yahuliire eki, yagenda hali mukuru w'amahe yamukaguza ati: “Omanyire eki orukukora? Omusaija onu Murooma.”
Aho mukuru w'amahe yaija, yamukaguza ati: “Ngambira amazima, oli Murooma kwo?” Paulo yamugarukamu ati: “Ego.”
Mukuru w'amahe yamugambira ati: “Nyowe Oburooma nkabugura omuhendo mukooto.” Nandiki Paulo ati: “Baitu nyowe nkazaarwakwo.”
Ahonaaho abo abakaba nibagonza kumukaguliriza baamurugaho, kandi mukuru w'amahe obu yayetegeriize nkooku yabohere Omurooma, yatiina muno.

Nyenkya obu bwakiire, habw'okwenda kumanya Abayudaaya ebi barukumujunaana, omukuru w'amahe yabohorra Paulo kandi yaragira abanyakatagara abakuru n'orukurato rwona kwesorooza. Yaleeta Paulo yamwemereza omumaiso gaabo.
Paulo yagumyaho amaiso ab'orukurato, yatandika kwesoborra ati: “Bagenzi bange, obwomeezi bwange bwona naikaraga ninkora ebihikire omu maiso ga Ruhanga okuhika na hati, ntaina ekirukunjunanwa.”
Obu yagambire ati, Ananiya omukuru w'abanyakatagara, yaragira abo abakaba bamwemeriire haihi kumuteera oruhi.
Nukwo Paulo kumugambira ati: “Iwe ekisiika ekisiigirwe inoni! Na iwe Ruhanga alikuteera! Oikaliire kuncwera omusango noosigikira omu Biragiro bya Musa, kandi wabicwa nooragira kunteera?”
Abo abakaba bamwemeriire haihi baagamba bati: “Obu si noojuma nyakatagara omukuru owa Ruhanga?”
Nandiki Paulo ati: “Bagenzi bange, mbaire ntamanyire nkooku ali nyakatagara omukuru; ningira kikahandiikwa kiti: ‘Otalijuma omukuru w'ihanga lyawe.’ ”

Hanyuma Paulo obu yayetegeriize omu bantu abeesoroize, ekicweka kimu nkooku kikaba kiri ky'Abasadukaayo kandi ekindi ky'Abafalisaayo, nubwo yagambiire Orukurato n'iraka likooto ati: “Bagenzi bange, nyowe ndi Mufalisaayo kandi mwana w'Abafalisaayo. Ninjunanwa hanu habw'okunihira oku twina ha kuhumbuuka kw'abafu.”
Obu yamazire kugamba eki, empaka zaimuka hagati y'Abafalisaayo n'Abasadukaayo; orukurato rwayebaganizaamu habiri.
Abasadukaayo nubo abaagambire ngu, tiharoho kuhumbuuka kw'abafu, kandi tiharoho malaika, noobu gwakubaire omuzimu; baitu Abafalisaayo ebi byona babiikiriza.

Aho haabaho etoko nyingi, abamu ha beegesa b'ebiragiro ab'omu kitebe ky'Abafalisaayo baayemerra, baahakana n'amaani nibagamba bati: “Titurukurora nsobi omuntu onu ei yakozire. Kiraaba kita kakuba aba agambiirwe malaika rundi omuzimu?”
Empaka zaabo obu zayeyongiire, omukuru w'amahe yatiina, naateekereza ngu, Paulo basobora kumutaagataagura, nukwo kuragira ab'amahe bagende bamubaihemu n'amaani, bamutwale omu kigo.
Kandi ha kiro eki omu itumbi, MUKAMA yamubonekera naagamba ati: “Guma omutima, nkooku wanjuliire Yerusaalemu, nukwo osemeriire kunjurra na Rooma.”
Nyenkya obu bwakiire, Abayudaaya baayesorooza hamu, baayekoba omu nsita nibarahira nkooku batarukwija kulya rundi kunywa okuhika obu barakamara kwita Paulo.
Abaayekobere omu nsita egi, bakaba nibakira ha makumi ana.
Baagenda hali bakuru b'abanyakatagara n'abakuru b'enganda baabagambira bati? “Turahiriire kimu okutaroza ha kookulya koona tutakaisire Paulo.
Hati nu inywe n'ab'orukurato, ekyanyu eki muraakora nukwo kusaba mukuru w'amahe amubagarurre nk'abarukugonza kwongera kwetegereza kurungi omusango gwe. Itwe tweteekaniize kumwita atakabahikireho.”
Baitu mwihwa wa Paulo yahurra ensita yabo ey'okumugwera; yagenda yataaha omu kigo, yagimanyisa Paulo.
Paulo yayeta omu ha bakuru b'abaserikale, yamugambira ati: “Omusigazi onu mutwale hali mukuru w'amahe; aina eki arukwenda kumugambira.”
Yamutwara, yamuhikya hali mukuru w'amahe nagamba ati: “Paulo omunyankomo anyesirege, yansaba kukuleetera omusigazi onu, aina eki arukwenda kukugambira.”
Omukuru w'amahe yamukwata ha mukono, yamugarra ha rubaju, yamukaguza mpora ati: “Nooyenda kungambira ki?”
Nandiki omusigazi ati: “Abayudaaya bacwire amagezi ag'okukusaba ngu, nyenkya ogarre Paulo omu rukurato, nibasisana nk'abarukwenda kwongera kwetegereza omusango gwe.

Baitu ebyabo otabiikiriza, habwokuba haroho abasaija abarukukira ha makumi ana abeetekaniize kumugwerra, kandi barahiire nkooku batarukwija kulya n'okunywa batakamwisire. Hati baliyo beeteekaniize, balinzire eki oraabagarukamu.”
Mukuru w'amahe nukwo kuraga omusigazi, yamuteererra ati: “Otagambiraho muntu n'omu nkooku wabimmanyisa.”

Omukuru w'amahe akeeta babiri ha bakuru b'abaserikale yabagambira ati: “Hati muteekanize abaserikale bikumi bibiri, hamu n'ab'embaraasi nsanju n'ab'amacumu bikumi bibiri, mugende Kaisaariya ha saaha isatu z'ekiro.
Kandi muteekanize embaraasi Paulo ezi aratemba, mumuhikye hali Feelikisi omulemi omukuru, atahikirweho kabi koona.”
Yahandiika ebbaruha erukugamba eti:
“Oweekitiinisa Omulemi Mukuru Feelikisi; nyowe Kilaudiyo Lisiya ninkuramukya.
Omusaija onu akakwatwa Abayudaaya, kandi baakumwisire kakuba ntaragenzireyo n'ab'amahe bange, namujuna obu namazire kwetegereza nkooku ali Murooma.
Obu nagondeze kumanya omusango barukumunyegerra, namutwara omu rukurato rwabo.
Nubwo nayetegeriize nkooku anyegeriirwe habw'ebintu ebinyakuli omu biragiro by'ihanga lyabu, baitu gutali musango ogw'okumwisa rundi kumukwasa omu nkomo.
Aho, obu namanyisiibwe nkooku beekobere kumwita, nikyo namukutwekerra bwango, kandi naragira abamunyegeriire basoborre omumaiso gaawe eki barukumutura. Orame!”
Abaserikale baatwara Paulo nkooku baaragiirwe, baamuhikya omu rubuga Antipatri ekiro.
Obwire obu bwakiire, abaingi baagaruka omu kigo, baitu baamusigira ab'embaraasi beeyongere kugenda nawe.
Banu, obu baahikire Kaisaariya, ebbaruha bagiha omulemi omukuru, kandi baayemereza Paulo omu maiso ge.
Omukuru obu yamazire kusoma ebbaruha, yamukaguza ihanga lye. Obu yamanyire nkooku yarugire Kilikiya,
yagamba ati: “Omusango gwawe ndiguhurra abakunyegeriire obu balikamara kwija.” Yaragira bamulindire omu kikaali kya Herode.
Obu haahingwireho ebiro bitaano, Ananiya, omukuru w'abanyakatagara, yaija n'abakuru b'enganda abamu, hamu n'omusaija Terutulo ow'okubatonganirra. Banyegerra Paulo hali omulemi omukuru.
Obu baamwesire, Terutulo yatandika kumunyegerra naagamba ati: “Oweekitiinisa Feelikisi, ihanga linu nirikusiima habw'okulireetera obusinge, nirikusiima habw'ebindi orukutegeka kuligarra obuhyaka.
Hoona hoona kandi obutoosa tusiima entegeka yawe.
Ntakwikaizeho, ninkusaba habw'embabazi zaawe, otuhulirizeho kake.
Okukugambira amazima, turozire omusaija onu nkooku arukututalibaniza muno, naaleeta akatabanguko omu Bayudaaya abali omu nsi zoona, kandi nuwe mwebembezi w'ekitebe ky'Abanazareeni.
Ekindi, akalengaho okusiisa Enju ya Ruhanga, nukwo kumukwata. [Twagonza kumucwera omusango nituhondera Ebiragiro byaitu;
baitu Lisiya, mukuru w'amahe yabitaahamu, yamutwiha omu ngaro n'amaani,
naaragira abaamunyegeriire kwija hanu omu maiso gaawe.] Kandi na iwe obu oramukaguza noija kumanya kurungi buli kintu eki turukumunyegererra.”
Abayudaaya bakwataniza na Terutulo, baagumya ebi byona nkooku biri by'amazima.
Omulemi omukuru obu yamusimireho kubaza, Paulo yagamba ati; “Mmanyire omazire emyaka nyingi noocwera abantu b'ihanga linu emisango; nikyo ndukwetonganirirra ntarukutiina.
Obu orakaguza abantu, noija kumanya nkooku mmazire ebiro ikumi na bibiri byonka nakaba kwija Yerusaalemu kuramya.
Abantu banu batansange ninteera empaka n'omuntu weena, noobu kwakuba kutabatabura abantu omunju ya Ruhanga, rundi omu masorrokaniro, rundi omu rubuga.
Kandi ebi barukunnyegererra hati, tibaina obwakaiso bwabyo.

Baitu eki ndukwikiriza omu maiso gaawe nikyo kinu: Nyowe omu kuramya Ruhanga w'abaisenkuru itwe, ninkuratira Omuhanda bbo ogu barukweta akatebe akeecwireho. Obu, ninyikiriza byona ebiri omu Biragiro bya Musa n'ebyahandiikirwe abarangi.
Okunihira kwange hali Ruhanga kuli kumu n'okwabu nkooku halibaho okuhumbuuka kw'abahikiriire n'abatahikiriire.
Nikyo nyekambira obutoosa kwikara n'omutima ogutaina kamogo hali Ruhanga na hali abantu.
Hati nkaleeta ebisembo eby'okukoonyera abanaku ab'ihanga lyaitu, hamu n'eby'okuhonga, habwokuba mmazire emyaka ntaija Yerusaalemu.
Obu nkaba ninkyakora ebi, banu bansanga omunju ya Ruhanga, mmazire kwezibwa, ntaina kitebe ky'abantu kandi hataroho bwogo. Baitu hakaijaho Abayudaaya abamu abaarugire omu Asiya
nubo baakwizire hanu kunnyegerra, obu baraaba baina eki barukunjunaana.
Hatali eki, leka abantu abali hanu bagambe ekibi eki bandozireho obu baanyemeriize omumaiso g'orukurato.
Obu nkaba nyemeriire hagati yabu nkagamba bwa nti: ‘Ha kiro kinu nintonganizibwa omumaiso ganyu habw'okwikiriza okuhumbuuka kw'abafu.’ ”
Feelikisi ow'akaba naamanya kurungi eby'Omuhanda ogu, yakerereza omusango, yabaraganiza kiro kindi, yagambira Paulo ati: “Lisiya omukuru w'amahe obu aliija, nubwo ndicwa omusango gwawe.”
Yaragira omukuru w'abaserikale kumulindira omu nkomo, baitu bamuheho obugabe kandi batatanga banywani be kumukorra ebi arukwetaaga.
Obu haahingwireho ebiro, Feelikisi yaija na mukazi we Durusilla Omuyudaayakati. Yatuma baleete Paulo, ahurre ebi arukwegesa ha by'okwikiriza Kristo Yesu.
Baitu Paulo obu yatandikire kusoborra ha kuhikirra, ha kwetanga, na ha kucwerwa omusango okuliija, Feelikisi yatiina, yagamba ati: “Hati garukayo. Obu nditunga omwanya ndikweta.”
Omu kasumi ako koona akaikara nanihira ngu, Paulo naija kumugulirra, nikyo yamweteraga emirundi nyingi kubaza nawe.
Baitu obu haahingwireho emyaka ebiri, ekiikaro kya Feelikisi kyatwarwa Porukiyo Fesito; kandi Feelikisi habw'okugonza kusiimwa Abayudaaya, yasiga Paulo omu nkomo.
Fesito obu akaba amazire ebiro bisatu ahikire omu isaza lye, yaruga Kaisaariya, yagenda Yerusaalemu.
Abanyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'Abayudaaya baamulegera Paulo;
baamwesengereza n'embabazi abaleetere Paulo Yerusaalemu, nukwo basobole kumugwera, bamwitire omu muhanda.
Baitu Fesito yabasoborra Paulo nkooku arukulindirwa Kaisaariya, kandi uwe wenka nkooku ali w'okugarukayo bwango.
Yayongera yagamba ati: “Nahabweki, leka ab'obusobozi omuli inywe tugende hamu. Obu haraaba haroho ekibi kyona musaija ogu eki yakozire, bamunyegerre.”
Obu yamazire nabo ebiro ebindi nka munaana rundi ikumi, yagarukayo Kaisaariya. Ha kiro ekyakurasireho yaikarra ha kitebe ekicwerwaho emisango, yaragira baleete Paulo.
Obu baamuleesire, Abayudaaya abaarugire Yerusaalemu baamwehinguliriza nibamunyegerra ebintu bingi kandi eby'amaani, baitu ebikaba bitaina bwakaiso.
Paulo yatandika kwetonganirra naagamba ati: “Nyowe tinkakoraga kintu kyona ekirukucwa Ebiragiro by'Abayudaaya, rundi ekirukusiisa Enju ya Ruhanga, rundi ekirukusobya ebiragiro bya Kaisaali.”
Baitu Fesito, habw'okugonza kusiimwa Abayudaaya, yakaguza Paulo ati: “Noikiriza kugenda Yerusaalemu, nuho otonganire emisango egi omumaiso gange?”
Nandiki Paulo ati: “Nyowe nyemeriire omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'ekooti ya Kaisaali, nuho nsemeriire kucwererwa omusango. Na iwe nookimanya kurungi nkooku ntaina kibi kyona eki nakozire Abayudaaya.

Obu ndaaba nakozire kubi, rundi nakozire ekisemeriire kunnyisa, tindukucwa magezi ag'okwehugura kufa. Baitu ebi byona ebi barukunjunaana, obu biraaba bitaina bulyo, busaho n'omu anyakwina obusobozi okumpayo hali bo. Nyowe ninjurra hali Kaisaali.”
Fesito obu yamazire kwehanuuza ha bahabuzi be, yamugarukamu ati; “Ojuliire hali Kaisaali, owa Kaisaali nuho orukwija kugenda.”
Obu haahingwireho ebiro, Omukama Agiripa na Bereniike omukazi we baahika Kaisaariya kutangirra Fesito.
Baamarayo ebiro; nukwo Fesito kusubirra Omukama omusango gwa Paulo, naagamba ati; “Hanu haroho omusaija, Feelikisi ou yasigire omu nkomo;
na nyowe obu nkaba ndi Yerusaalemu, abanyakatagara abakuru n'abakuru b'Abayudaaya bakamunnyegerraho, nibasaba mmusingise omusango.
Baitu nabagarukamu nti: ‘Teri ngeso y'Abarooma kuhayo omuntu atakatongaine n'abamunyegeriire, kandi nawe atahairwe omwanya gw'okwetonganirra eki bamunyegereriire.’
Nahabweki abantu abo boona obu baizire hanu, ntabakerereze, baitu ha kiro ekyakurasireho naikarra ha kitebe ekicwerwaho emisango, naragira baleete omusaija ogu.
Baakinyegerra obu baayemeriire, batasobole kwoleka obubi obw'omusango ogu barukumujunaana nkooku nanihiire;
baitu baamunyegererra ebintu ebitali bimu ebirukukwata ha diini yabo, na ha muntu ayafiire arukwetwa Yesu; baitu Paulo ou arukugumya ngu, akyayomiire.
Obu nalemerwe kwetegereza kurungi ebigambo ebi, namukaguza obu araaba naikiriza kugenda Yerusaalemu, nuho abitonganire.
Nubwo Paulo yajuliire Omukama Omukuru Agusito ngu nuwe amucwere omusango; na nyowe nukwo kuragira bamulindire omu nkomo okuhika obu ndakasobora kumutweka hali Kaisaali.”
Agiripa yagambira Fesito ati: “Na nyowe, omusaija ogu naakugondeze kumwehulirra nyenka.” Nandiki Fesito ati: “Oramuhurra nyenkya.”

Obwire obu bwakiire, Agiripa na Bereniike baizira omu kitiinisa kingi, baataaha omunju nambere baacweraga emisango, bali hamu n'abakuru b'amahe n'abantu bakuru ab'omu rubuga. Aho Fesito yaragira baleete Paulo.

Fesito yatandika kubisoborra naagamba ati: “Rukirabasaija Agiripa, na inywe inywena abeesoroize hanu, murole omusaija onu Abayudaaya boona ab'omu Yerusaalemu n'aba hanu ou baansabire n'amaani ngu, asemeriire kufa.
Nyowe habwange ndozire nkooku ataina eki yakozire ekisemeriire kumwisa. Baitu uwe nkooku yajuliire hali Omukama Omukuru Agusito, nkacwamu kumumutwekera.

Hati nyowe tinyina bulyo obuhikire obu ndaasigikiraho kuhandiikira mukama wange hali uwe. Nikyo mmuleetiire omumaiso ganyu, n'okukira muno omumaiso gaawe, Rukirabasaija Agiripa. Obu turamara kwetegereza ebye, nubwo ndatunga eki ndaahandiika.
Na nyowe ndozire nkooku kitahikire kutweka omunyankomo, ntarukwoleka emisango erukumujunanwa.”
Rukirabasaija Agiripa yagambira Paulo ati: “Hati oikiriziibwe kwetonganirra.” Aho Paulo yaimukya omukono gwe, yatandika kwetonganirra ati:
“Omukama Agiripa, ninyeyeta w'omugisa kiro kya hati kwetonganira omumaiso gawe habw'ebi byona Abayudaaya ebi barukunjunaana.
Okukira muno habwokuba iwe omanyiire kimu engeso zoona n'empaka ez'Abayudaaya. Nahabweki ninkwesengereza ogumiisirize ompulirize.
“Abayudaaya boona nibamanya engeso zange ezi naakuliiremu okuruga omu buto, omu bantu ab'ihanga lyange n'omu Yerusaalemu.
Bakaba nibammanya okuruga ira kandi basobora kukigumya hati, kakuba nibenda, nkooku ndi Mufalisaayo anyakukuraatira ekitebe ekirukukira ebindi byona kuhikya engeso z'ediini yaitu.
Hati nyemeriire hanu ninjunanwa habw'okunihira Ruhanga eki yaraganiize baisenkuruitwe,
kandi n'enganda zaitu ikumi na ibiri eki zirukunihira kutunga obu baba nibeehayo kuramya Ruhanga ekiro na nyamusana. Waitu, habw'okunihira oku nikyo Abayudaaya barukunjunaanira.
Baitu inywe habwaki mutarukwikiriza Ruhanga nkooku asobora kuhumbuura abafiire?
“Na nyowe nyenka nkaba ninyikiririza kimu nkooku nsemeriire kucwa amagezi goona kurwanisa ibara lya Yesu owa Nazareeti.

Nukwo naakozire Yerusaalemu. Nakwasa abaikiriza baingi omu nkomo habw'obusobozi obu naheebwaga banyakatagara abakuru. Tikiri eki kyonka, baitu obu bakaba nibacwerwa omusango gw'okufa, na nyowe nkakisagika.

Emirundi nyingi nabafubiraga omu masorrokaniro goona, nkalengaho kubahambiriza nukwo beehakane enyikiriza yabo. Nkabakwatirwa muno ekiniga, nukwo kubahiiganiriza nimbakurata n'omu mbuga ez'amahanga agandi.”
“Omu kubakurata omu mbuga z'amahanga, nkaba ningenda Damasiko, mpairwe obusobozi kandi ntumirwe banyakatagara abakuru.
Omu ihangwe obu nkaba ningenda, Waitu, nkarora ekyererezi nikiruga omwiguru, nikimuliikana okukira izooba, kyayaka kyanyehinguliriza nyowe n'abo aba nkaba ningenda nabo.
Itwena twagwa hansi, nubwo naahuliire iraka nirinnyeta omu Ruhebburaayo liti: ‘Saulo, Saulo noompiiganiriza ki? Nooyesaaliza wenka kusamba ha mihunda.’
Namukaguza nti: ‘Niiwe oha, Waitu?’ MUKAMA yangarukamu ati: ‘Ninyowe Yesu ou orukuhiiganiza.
Hati nu imuka, oyemerre. Eki ngenderiire kukubonekera nukwo kukukoma ompeereze kandi obe kaiso ow'okugumya nkooku ondozire, n'ow'okugumya ebindi ebi ndikweyolekeramu.
Ndaakujuna abantu ab'ihanga lyawe, nkwihe n'omu mikono y'Abanyamahanga nambere ndukwija kukutuma,
obaigule amaiso, baruge omu mwirima, baije omu musana; baruge omu busobozi bwa Sitaani, beehongere Ruhanga, kandi habw'okunyikiriza baganyirwe ebibi kandi batunge ekiikaro hamu n'abo abayeziibwe.’ ”
“Nahabweki nu, Agutamba Agiripa, okubonekerwa oku okw'omwiguru ntakwigalirize,

baitu nkabanza kukurangirra aba Damasiko, nakusoborra aba Yerusaalemu n'ab'omu Buyudaaya yoona, kandi n'Abanyamahanga, nimbateererra beegarukemu, bagaruke hali Ruhanga, nibakora ebikorwa ebisemeriire abeegarukiremu kwo.
Eki nikyo Abayudaaya bankwatiire ndi omunju ya Ruhanga, baalengaho kunnyita.
Baitu habw' okukonyerwa Ruhanga, nikyo kinyemeriize hanu n'okuhika hati, nimmanyisa abakuru n'abato nkooku ntaina kindi eki ndukwegesa kwihaho abarangi na Musa ebi baarangire ngu, nibiija kubaho:
Kristo nkooku asemeriire kubonabonesibwa, kandi habw'okusangwa ali w'okubanza okuhumbuuka omu bafu, nuwe alimanyisa ab'ihanga linu n'Abanyamahanga boona omusana nkooku gwaizire omunsi.”
Paulo obu akaba naakyayetonganirra ati, Fesito yamugambira n'iraka likooto ati: “Paulo ohunguutukire, amagezi gaawe amaingi gaija kukunaga iraro.”
Baitu Paulo yamugarukamu ati: “Oweekitiinisa Fesito, tingwire iraro; baitu nimbaza amazima kandi ebihikire.
Omukama Agiripa, ebigambo ebi abimanyireho, kandi nimmubaliza ntaina eki ndukutiina; habwokuba ningumiza kimu ebi byona nkooku arukubyetegereza, tibiri bintu ebyakoliirwe omu nsita.
Agutamba Agiripa, noikiriza eby'abarangi? Nyowe nimmanya nkooku orukubiikiriza.”
Agiripa nukwo kugarukamu Paulo ati: “Mara iwe noogonza kumpindura Mukristo omu kasumi kake!”

Nandiki Paulo ati: “Obu karaaba kali kasumi kake rundi kaingi, baitu nyowe eki ndukusaba Ruhanga, tihali habwawe wenka, baitu na boona abarukumpurra ha kiro kya hati, mube nka nyowe--kwihaho muleke kubohwa omu njegere zinu.”
Nubwo omukama yaimukire, hamu n'omulemi omukuru na Bereniike, n'abandi boona abakaba baikaliire nabo.
Obu baamazire kuturuka aheeru, baatandika kugambirangana bati: “Omusaija onu taina eki akozire ekisemeriire kumwisa rundi kumutaisa omu nkomo.”
Agiripa yagambira Fesito ati: “Omuntu onu akusoboire kulekerwa, kakuba atarajuliire hali Kaisaali.”
Obu kyamazire kugumibwa nkooku turukwija kugwerra omu meeri twambuke kugenda Itale, Paulo n'abanyankomo abandi baabakwasa omukuru w'abaserikale arukwetwa Yuliyo, ow'omu ihe lya Agusito.
Twataaha omu meeri enyakuruga Aduramiti, ekaba eri haihi kwimukya kugenda ha myogo enyakuli ha musa gw'Asiya. Twagwerra omu nyanja, twina Alisitaako Omunyamakedoni ayarugire Teesalonika.
Ekiro ekyakurasireho twahika Sidooni; oku Yuliyo yagirra Paulo embabazi yamwikiriza kubungira enganjani ze, bamuhumuze.
Obu twarugire oku twagwerra omu nyanja, twagenda nitukiikira ekizinga Kipuro habw'okwehugura omuyaga ogukaba gututurukire omumaiso.
Twacwanganiza enyanja nituraba ha rubaju rwa Kilikiya na Panfiiliya, twahika Miira, orubuga rwa Likiya.
Oku nuho mukuru w'abaserikale yasangire emeeri enyakuruga Alekizanderiya neegenda Itale, yagitutamu.

Tukamara ebiro bingi nitugenda mpora, twahika haihi na Kunido, tuli mu bulemeezi habw'omuyaga kutatwikiriza kweyongera omumaiso, nukwo kukwata omuhanda ogwa ha ifo y'ekizinga Kureete, twairirra omukono gw'enyanja ogurukwetwa Salumoone.
Twagenda nagwo gwonka tukyali omu bulemeezi, okuhika obu twahikire ekiikaro nambere harukwetwa Emyogo Emirungi, haihi n'orubuga rwa Lasaaya.
Ebiro bingi nkooku bikaba bifiire busa, kandi n'orugendo rutandikire kuba rw'akabi, n'ebiro by'okusiiba bikaba bihoire, Paulo nukwo kubahabura ati:
“Bakama bange, nkooku ndukurora, orugendo runu nirwija kubamu akabi n'okufeerwa kwingi. Titurukwija kufeerwa ebintu n'emeeri byonka, baitu n'obwomeezi bwaitu.”
Baitu Mukuru w'abaserikale yayesiga omurungiki w'emeeri na mukama wayo okukira ebya Paulo yagambire.

Kandi na habw'omwogo kutaba murungi kumarramu ebiro by'obutiti, abaingi baasiima kurugamu n'okweyongera omu nyanja, nibanihira nkooku barukusobora kuhika Foinike, omwogo gwa Kureete oguroleriire hagati y'obukiizi bw'emoso n'obw'obulyo obwa Burugaizooba, bamarreyo ebiro by'obutiti.
Akayaga aka ha bukiizi bw'obulyo obu kaatiire mpora, baateekereza ngu, baatungire eki babaire nibagonza, baabohorra ebinyakusibika emeeri, baatandika kugenda nibakeetera Kureete nibeebinga omusa.
Baitu omu kanya kake haija ihunga ly'amaani erirukwetwa ery'obukiizi obwa Burugaizooba, lyateera niriruga ha kizinga.
Emeeri obu yatangirwe omuyaga, etarukusobora kugwolekera, na itwe twajwaha, twagireka. Omuyaga nugwo gwatutwara gwonka.
Twagenda nitukiikira akazinga akarukwetwa Kauda. Obu twamazire kutalibana muno tukasobora kutabura akaato kaitu:

kandi obu baamazire kukataahya omu meeri, baalengaho emeeri yoona kugibohesa emiguha, nibagigyehinguliriza. Habw'okutiina kukwatira omu musenyi gw'enkungu ya Siriti, baasirimura amatanga agarukutwara emeeri nukwo batwarwe omuyaga gwonka.
Obu twatengeesiibwe muno ihunga, ha kiro ekyakurasireho baatandika kwiha ebintu omu meeri n'okubinaga omu nyanja.
Kandi ha kiro kya kasatu ky'ihunga baanaga ebimu ha bintu ebigendesa emeeri.
Obu twamazire ebiro bingi tutakyarora izooba noobu zaakuba enyunyuuzi, kandi ihunga lingi nirituteera, tukaba tutakyanihira kukira.
Obu haahingwireho ebiro bataina eki baliire, Paulo yabeemerra hagati naagamba ati; “Basaija inywe, kakuba mwampuliriize, timwakurugire Kureete, mukaizirwa akabi kanu n'okufeerwa okurukwingana aho.
Hati nimbateererra, mugume emitima! Tiharukwija kufa muntu n'omu omuli inywe, kwihaho emeeri yonka.
Habwokuba ekiro kinu kyonyini mpikirweho malaika wa Ruhanga ou ndamya kandi arukuntunga.
Malaika yagamba ati: ‘Paulo, otatiina; oli w'okwemerra omumaiso ga Kaisaali, kandi habwawe Ruhanga naija kulinda abo boona abali na iwe omu meeri.’
Nukwo nu basaija inywe, mugume emitima. Nyowe ninyesiga Ruhanga, kandi mazimakwo ebintu nibiija kuhikirra nkooku ngambiirwe.
Baitu tuli b'okunagwa ha kizinga.”
Ha kiro ekya ikumi na bbina ky'ihunga, obu tukaba nitukyayenjeera omu Nyanja Adiriya, omu bwire bw'itumbi abalimba baatandika kuteekereza ngu, haroho ensi ei bali haihi kuhikaho.
Baalenga okuhama kw'amaizi, baasanga ziri mita makumi ana. Obu bairiire kake omumaiso, baagaruka baalenga, baasanga ziri mita makumi asatu.
Habw'okutiina kuhuumira emyandara, baasumurra ebisibika emeeri bbina, baabisibikira ha kiso ky'enyuma eky'emeeri. Baategereza obwire kukya.
Abalimba obu bakaba nibagonza kweyiba kuruga omu meeri, bamazire n'okusirimura akaato omu nyanja, nibasisana nk'abarukugonza kusirimura ebirukusibika emeeri ha kiso ky'omumaiso,
nubwo Paulo yagambiire mukuru w'abaserikale n'abaserikale be ati: “Abantu abo obu bataikale omu meeri, timurukwija kukira.”
Abaserikale nukwo kusara emiguha y'akaato, baakaleka kaagenda.
Obwire obu bukaba buli haihi kukya, Paulo yabeesengereza, boona balyeho ebyokulya, naagamba ati: “Kiro kya hati nikyo kya ikumi na bbina muli omu mwetunturo, mutaina eki murukulya.
Nahabweki nimbeesengereza mulyeho akookulya, kabagarremu amaani, habwokuba tiharoho kasoke akaraabura ha mitwe yanyu inywena.”
Obu yamazire kugamba eki, yakwata omugaati, yasiima Ruhanga omumaiso ga boona, yagucwamu, yatandika kulya.
Boona baagarukwa omutima omunda, baalya ebyokulya. (
Itwena abakaba bali omu meeri, tukaba tuli bantu bikumi bibiri nsanju na mukaaga.)
Obu baamazire kwiguta, baakeehya obulemeezi bw'ebintu baanaga engano yoona omu nyanja.
Obwire obu bwakiire, bakaba batamanyirre nsi ei baahikireho, baitu bakarora omukono gw'enyanja oguroho omwogo gw'omusenyi. Ha mukono ogu nuho baayenda kuhikiza emeeri, obu kyakubaire nikisoboka.
Baanaga ebisibika emeeri, baabisiga omu nyanja. Omu kasumi nuko kamu baasumurra emiguha ei ekaba ebohere engahi enyakurungika. Baahanika itanga ery'omumaiso nukwo omuyaga gubatwale ha mwogo.

Baitu obu baahikire nambere engezi z'amaizi zirukutangatanganira, emeeri yatwarwa, engezi yabahikya nambere amaizi gatahamire, kandi ekiso eky'omumaiso kyataaha omu musenyi, kyakwatiramu. Ekiso ky'enyuma kyacwacwanwa amaani g'ebigonzi ebirukwehuura.
Nubwo abaserikale baahanwire amagezi ag'okwita abanyankomo, hataakubaho n'omu arukuziha akacwa;
baitu omukuru w'abaserikale, habw'okugonza kujuna Paulo, yabatanga kukora eki bakaba bategekere. Yaragira abarukumanya kuziha babanze beenage omu nyanja, nukwo bazihe bahike ha bwerre,
kandi abandi bagendere ha mbaaho rundi ha bicweka by'emeeri. Nukwo kyabaire kiti, boona baakira, baahika ha bwerre.
Obu twamazire kukira, nubwo twamanya ekizinga eki nkooku kyayetwaga Melita.
Abantu baamwo bakatukunira kurungi muno. Baatutangirra itwena, kandi habw'enjura kutandika kugwa n'obwire kuba bw'obutiti, baatuhembera omurro.
Paulo akaba asenyere ekiganda ky'enku, yakita ha murro; baitu habw'ekibabu kyagwo, hahurumukamu encwera, yamwezinga ha mukono.

Enzaarwa ez'omu kizinga eki obu baarozire nerengiija ha mukono gwe, baagambirangana bati: “Nyabura inywe omusaija onu mwisi w'abantu. Noobu araaba atabukire enyanja, baitu encwa ya Ruhanga ey'amazima temwikirize kwikaraho.”
Baitu Paulo, enjoka yagikunkumurra omu murro atahikirweho kabi koona.

Abantu baalindirra nibateekereza ngu, naija kuzimba rundi aragwa hansi akanguke; baitu obu baamazire kulindirra omwanya mukooto, batarozire kabi koona akamubaireho, baatandika kuteekereza kundi, baagira ngu, mucwezi.
Haihi n'ekiikaro eki, hakaba haroho ebibanja by'omunyoro omukuru w'ekizinga eki, ibara lye Pubuliyo. Akatutangirra kandi yatukunira muno okumara ebiro bisatu.
Omu kasumi ako, ise Pubuliyo akaba abyamire omu kitabu, arwaire omuswija n'ensese. Paulo yagenda kumubungira. Obu yamazire kumusabira, yamutaho emikono, yamukiza.
Eki obu kyabaireho, abarwaire abandi ab'omu kizinga eki nabo baija baakizibwa.
Abantu baayo bakatuha ebisembo bingi, kandi obu twayeteekaniize kugwerra omu meeri, baatuboherra na byona ebi tukaba nitwetaaga.
Obu haahingwireho ameezi asatu, tukaihwayo emeeri eyarugire Alekizanderiya ei ekaba emazire ebiro by'obutiti omu kizinga eki, eroho ekisisani ky'Aboojo Abarongo omumaiso gaayo.
Obu twahikire Sirakuuse, twamarayo ebiro bisatu.
Twarugayo nitwekiisa omusa gw'enyanja, twahika Reegiyo. Obu haahingwireho ekiro kimu, haimuka omuyaga ogw'obukiizi bw'obulyo, kandi ha kiro kya kabiri twahika Puteyoli,
nambere twasangire ab'oruganda abaatusabire kumara nabo ebiro musanju. Hanyuma twairrayo, twahika Rooma.
Ab'oruganda ab'oku obu baahuliire nkooku tuhikireyo, baija baatutangaana ha Katale ka Apio na ha ntangatangano ya Ngonyo Isatu. Paulo obu yarozire ab'oruganda yasiima Ruhanga, yagarukwamu amaani.
Obu twahikire Rooma, Paulo yaikirizibwa kweraaza mbere arukwenda, aina omuserikale ayamulindaga.

Obu haahingwireho ebiro bisatu, Paulo akeeta abeebembezi b'Abayudaaya, beesorooze. Obu baamazire kwesorooza yabagambira ati: “Bagenzi bange, noobu ndaaba ntaina eki nasobiize abantu rundi ntacwire engeso z'abaisenkuru itwe, baitu nabwo nkakwatirwa Yerusaalemu naaheebwayo omu mikono y'Abarooma.
Obu baamazire kuntonganiza, baasanga ntaina musango gw'okunnyisa, baayenda kundekera.
Baitu Abayudaaya obu baayangire, nyowe nukwo kujurra hali Kaisaali, noobu ndaaba ntaina eki ndukwenda kunyegerra abantu ab'ihanga lyange.
Nahabweki nikyo nsabiire kubarora n'okubaza na inywe. Ningira Abaisirairi eki baikara bategeriize, nikyo kintaisize omu njegere zinu.”
Nabo baamugarukamu bati: “Itwe titukatungaga bbaruha ezirukuruga Buyudaaya ezirukukugambaho, noobu yakuba omuntu w'owaitu araizire kutusoborra rundi kutugambira ekibi kyona hali iwe.
Baitu nitwenda iwe wenka otusoborre ebyawe. Ekitebe eki, eki tukimanyaho nkinu: hoona nikigambwaho kubi.”

Obu baamazire kumuraganiza ekiro ekindi, baingi omuli bo bakaija omunju ye nambere akaba naagoonya ha kiro eki. Yabasoborra ebye okuruga nyenkya kuhika rwebagyo, naabamanyisa eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga, kandi naalengaho kubaikirizisa Yesu naasigikira omu Biragiro bya Musa n'omu by'abarangi.
Abamu bakaikiriza ebi yabagambiire, abandi baayanga.
Kandi bbo nkooku batarasoboire kwikirraniza, baayahukana, Paulo amazire kubamanyisa ekintu kimu ati: “Mwoyo Ahikiriire akahikya obu yagambiire baisenkuru inywe naakirabya omu Isaaya omurangi ati:
‘Hikaho abantu abo, obagambire oti: Okuhurra mulihurra, baitu timulyetegereza; okurora mulirora, baitu timulihweza.

Habwokuba emitima y'abantu banu egumangaine, n'amatu gaabo nigahurra kubi, n'amaiso gaabo bagazibiriize. Habw'amaiso gaabo okutarora, n'amatu gaabo okutahurra, n'emitima yabo okuteetegereza nikyo baayangiire okumpindukira nkabakiza.’
Mukimanye nu, okujunwa kunu okwa Ruhanga nkooku kuhairwe Abanyamahanga nabo. Bbo nibaija kuhurra.” [
Obu yamazire kugamba ebi, Abayudaaya baarugaho, nibateezangana empaka.]
Paulo akamarayo emyaka ebiri yoona, naayesasurra ebyetaago bye byona, kandi yatangirraga boona abaijaga kumubungira,
naabarangirra obukama bwa Ruhanga kandi naayegesa bwerebwere ebya MUKAMA Yesu Kristo hataroho arukumutanga.
