Nyowe Paulo, omuheereza wa Yesu Kristo, ayayesirwe kuba mukwenda, ayasoroirwe kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi agaaraganiziibwe Ruhunga.
Abarangi be bakabanza kugarangirra ira omu Bihandiiko ebirukwera.
Nugo Makuru Amarungi agarukubaza ha Mwana we ayazairwe omu mubiri ali mwijukuru wa Daudi,
baitu habw'okwera kw'omwoyo gwe na habw'okuhumbuuka omu bafu akamanyisibwa nkooku ali Mwana wa Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona. Ogu nuwe Yesu Kristo MUKAMA waitu,
ou twatungiiremu omugisa n'obukwenda obw'okurangirra ab'omu mahanga goona okworoba okurukuruga omu kumwikiriza.
Na inywe muli omuli abo abaayesirwe kufooka ba Yesu Kristo.
Inywe inywena abagonzibwa ba Ruhanga abali Roma, abaayesirwe kuba bantu ba Ruhanga: Nimbagondeza omugisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Eky'okubanza ninsiima Ruhanga wange omu Yesu Kristo habwanyu inywena; habwokuba okwikiriza kwanyu nikuranganwa omunsi yoona.
Ningira Ruhanga ou mpeereza n'omwoyo gwange gwona nindangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'Omwana we, nuwe kaiso wange nkooku mbaijuka butoosa omu kusaba kwange.
Obu, ninsaba Ruhanga kakuba akisiima, mbahikeho nambere muli.
Habwokuba ningonza muno kubarora, nukwo nsobole kubaleetera ekisembo ky'omwoyo ekiraabagumya.
Kandi na itwe tusobole kugumyangana omu kwikiriza kwaitu: okwange n'okwanyu.
Bagenzi bange, ningonza mumanye nkooku nagondeze kwija nambere muli emirundi nyingi, mbatungemu abaikiriza nkooku nabatungire omu Banyamahanga abandi; baitu okuhika hati nkyaina ebintangire.
Nyowe nkyaina ibanja ery'okuhikaho Abagiriiki n'ab'amahanga agandi agateegesiibwe, ab'amagezi omuli bo n'abadoma.
Na inywe abali Rooma, nyina ekihika eky'okubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi.
Kandi nyowe, Amakuru Amarungi tindukugakwatirwa nsoni: nugo maani ga Ruhanga aganyakujuna weena arukwikiriza, okubandiza ha Bayudaaya okuhika na ha Bagiriiki.

Habwokuba omu Makuru Amarungi omu, nuho harukusuukulirwa obuhikiriire oburuga hali Ruhanga, oburaba omu kwikiriza kandi nibuheebwa abarukwikiriza; nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ogu anyakuhikiriire alyomeera habw'okwikiriza,”
Obukaya bwa Ruhanga butandikire kuzooka niburuga omwiguru, nibuhikaho abantu abatatiina Ruhanga kandi ababi ababuutikira amazima habw'obubi bwabo.
Byona ebi basobora kumanyaho Ruhanga nibabyetegereza, habwokuba Ruhanga akabibooleka.
Okuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi, omulingo gwe ogutarorwa, nubwo busobozi bwe obutahwaho hamu n'obwaruhanga bwe, byetegererezibwa omu bintu ebi yahangire. Nahabweki tibaina ky'okwekwasa kyona.
Noobu baraaba baamanyire Ruhanga, baitu batamutemu kitiinisa kandi batamusiime nkooku asemeriire. Ebiteekerezo byabo bikabahabisa kandi amagezi gaabo agaturumu gaswekererwa omwirima.
Abaayeyesire abanyamagezi, nubo bafookere badoma.
Bakaleka kuramya Ruhanga atafa, baatandika okuramya ebisisani ebirukusisana abantu abafa, rundi ebinyonyi, rundi ebisoro, rundi ebyekurra.
Nikyo Ruhanga yabahweriiremu, emitima yabo ekeemaliza ha bubi, bakakora bonka na bonka ebihemura emibiri yabo.
Ningira bakaleka amazima agarukumanyisa Ruhanga baatamu ebisuba, baaramya kandi baaheereza ebihangwa okukira Omuhangi, anyakuheebwa ekitiinisa ebiro byona! Amiina.
Nikyo Ruhanga yabalekiire balemwe okwegomba okurukuswaza. Bakazi baabo bakaleka emibiri yabo eki yahangiirwe, baagikoza eki etarahangiirwe.
Abasaija nabo bakaleka kuteerana n'abakazi baatandika kwanjukiranganaho, nibakora ebikorwa eby'obuhemu n'abasaija bataahi baabo, baayereetera bonka ekifubiro ekisemeriire obugwagwa bwabo.
Habw'okwanga kwikiriza Ruhanga, nikyo nawe yabalekiire baikale n'omutima oguramaire n'engeso ez'obugwagwa.
Baijura engeso embi zoona: obubi, okwegomba okubi, hamu n'itima. Baijwire ihali, obwisi, enkungani, obugobya, n'enobi. Baaba ngambigambi,
bahangirizi, abanoba Ruhanga, beereme, abeekuliriza, abenyumiza, abaserra obubi, abatahurra bazaire baabo,
badoma, abateesigwa, abataganyira, n'abatagira mbabazi.
Abo noobu baraaba nibamanya ekiragiro kya Ruhanga ekigamba ngu, abakora ebintu nk'ebi basemeriire kufa, tibagarukira ha kubikora kwonka, baitu basagika n'abandi abarukubikora.

Muntu iwe, noobu oraaba noosisa ota, toina ky'okwekwasa kyona obu ocwera mugenzi waawe omusango. Obu omucwera omusango, oba noogwesingisa wenka, habwokuba iwe kicwa, ebintu ebi orukukora nibyo bimu mali.
Tumanyire Ruhanga nkooku ahikya okusingisa omusango abantu abakora ebibi nk'ebi.
Muntu iwe, obu ocwera omusango abo abakora ebintu nk'ebi, kandi kunu na iwe nibyo orukukora, noogira ngu, olitabuka encwa ya Ruhanga?
Rundi noogaya embabazi ze enyingi, okugumiisiriza kwe n'obukwata-mpora bwe? Tomanyire embabazi za Ruhanga nkooku zikuleetera okwegarukamu?
Baitu habw'okukadadara n'okuteegarukamu okw'omutima gwawe, nooyeyahurra ekifubiro ekiribaho ha kiro kiri, nambere encwa ya Ruhanga ey'amananu eryolekerwa.
Habwokuba alisasura buli muntu naarorra ha bikorwa bye.
Abo abagonza kutunga ekitiinisa, okusiimwa, n'okutafa, nibagumiisiriza omu kukora ebirungi, Ruhanga alibaha obwomeezi obutahwaho.
Abandi ab'empaka kandi abatoorobera mazima, baitu aboorobera obubi, alibooleka ekiniga n'obukaya.
Buli muntu anyakukora ebibi alihikwaho omuhito n'enaku nyingi, okubandiza ha Muyudaaya okuhika na ha Mugiriiki.
Baitu weena anyakukora ebirungi aliheebwa ekitiinisa, alisiimwa, kandi alitunga obusinge, okubandiza ha Muyudaaya okuhika na ha Mugiriiki,
habwokuba Ruhanga tasoroora.
Boona abasiisire batarukumanya Biragiro, balihwerekerra batarukujunaanirwa ha Biragiro. Kandi boona abaasiisire nibamanya Ebiragiro, omu Biragiro numwo balicwererwa omusango.
Abanyakuhurra Ebiragiro kwonka, tibali bo bahikiriire omumaiso go Ruhanga, baitu abanyakukora Ebiragiro ebi bigamba, nubo balyetwa bahikiriire.
Abanyamahanga abataina Biragiro, obu baraaba bakora Ebiragiro ebi bigamba habw'amagezi gaabo, bbo bonka beefookera bakwasi b'Ebiragiro, noobu baraaba bataina Biragiro.
Booleka Ebiragiro ebi birukuragira nkooku bihandiikirwe omu mitima yabo. Emitima yabo nayo eba neekigumya, kandi ebiteekerezo byabo ebitarukwikirraniza biba nibibanyegerra rundi nibibaihaho omusango
ha kiro eki nambere Ruhanga alicwerraho abantu omusango gw'ebi baakozire omu nsita, naaraba omu Kristo Yesu, nkooku kisangwa omu Makuru Amarungi aganatumirwe kurangirra.
Baitu iwe obu oraaba nooyeyeta Muyudaaya, nooyesiga Ebiragiro nooyenyumiza kuba wa Ruhanga
noomanya ebi arukwenda kandi noosiima ebirukukira oburungi, habw'okwegesibwa Ebiragiro,
iwe obu oraaba noogumya nkooku oli munanasi w'abafu b'amaiso, noomulikira abo abali omu mwirima,
muhabuzi w'abataina magezi, mwegesa w'abaana, habwokuba noomanya amagezi n'amazima agali omu Biragiro, -
kandi iwe anyakwegesa abandi, toyeyegesa? Iwe anyakuteererra abantu okutaiba, oiba?
Iwe anyakutanga abandi kusiihana, osiihana? Iwe anyakunuga embandwa, onyaga ota ebiri omu mabandiro?
Iwe anyakwenyumiriza omu Biragiro, ogaya ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga noocwa Ebiragiro?
Habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Ibara lya Ruhanga nirijumwa omu Banyamahanga habwanyu.”
Kyamazima okusarwa nikugasa obu oraaba noohikiriza Ebiragiro; baitu obu orukucwa Ebiragiro, okusarwa kwawe kusisana n'okutasarwa.
Nukwo nu omuntu atasazirwe, kakuba ahikiriza Ebiragiro ebi birukugamba, noobu araaba atasazirwe, baitu talibarwa nk'asazirwe?
Habweki, abo abatasazirwe mubiri baitu nibahikiriza Ebiragiro, balisingisa omusango inywe abarukucwa Ebiragiro kandi kunu mwina ebyahandiikirwe omu Biragiro kandi musazirwe.
Habwokuba Omuyudaaya nyakabara tali ogu arukurorwa ha bya haruguru, n'okusarwa kw'amazima tikiri kintu kya haruguru ha mubiri.
Omuyudaaya nyakabara nuwe Muyudaaya omunda; kandi n'okusarwa okw'amazima kuli omu mutima, kintu ky'omwoyo tikiri ky'Ebiragiro ebyahandiikirwe. Kandi omuntu ogu tasiimwa abantu, baitu asiimwa Ruhanga.
Hati abandi Omuyudaaya naabakiza ki? Rundi okusarwa kwina mugaso ki?
Nikigasa muno omu miringo etali emu. Eky'okubanza Abayudaaya nubo baakwasiibwe ebigambo bya Ruhanga.
Abamu noobu baraaba batarabaire beesigwa, baitu itwe tugambe ki? Obuteesigwa bwabo buratanga Ruhanga kuba mwesigwa?

Nikikafuuhe! Ruhanga aikara ali w'amazima abantu boona noobu baraaba bali banyabisuba, nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Leka ebigambo byawe byoleke nkooku oli w'amazima, nukwo osinge obu baba nibakucwera omusango.”
Obubi bwaitu obu buraaba nibwoleka obwinganiza bwa Ruhanga, turagamba ki? Ngu Ruhanga tali mwinganiza kutufubira? [Nyowe nimbaza nk'omuntu buntu.]
Naakake konka! Ruhanga obu araaba atali mwinganiza, ensi asobora ata kugicwera omusango?
Ebisuba byange obu biraaba nibyongera kwoleka amazima ga Ruhanga kandi nibimwongera ekitiinisa, habwaki ninkyacwerwa omusango nk'omusiisi?
Habwaki tutakora ebibi nukwo harugemu ebirungi? - abantu abamu nkooku batuhangirra ngu, nukwo twegesa. Abo, omusango gwabo nigubasinga kurungi.
Hati nu tugambe tuta? Itwe Abayudaaya twina eki turukukiza abandi? Nangwa, naakake konka; habwokuba mmazire kugamba ngu, abantu boona, Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki, balemwa ekibi,
nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Tiharoho ahikiriire, nangwa noobwakuba omu;
tiharoho arukwetegereza, tiharoho arukuserra Ruhanga.
Boona bakahaba, baasiisikarra hamu, tiharoho arukukora kurungi, nangwa noobwakuba omu.”
“Emimiro yabo bituuro ebyesamiriire, endimi zabu bazibiihisa ebisuba.” “Ebigambo byabo nibisaaliza nk'obusegwe bw'encwera.”
“Akanwa kaabo kaikara nikakondereza kandi nikahangirra.”
“Ebigere byabo bibanguhya kugenda okuseesa esagama,
hoona ha bakagenda bahwerekereza kandi baleeta obujune,
kandi omuhanda oguleeta obusinge tibagumanyire.”
“Ruhanga tibamutiina.”
Hati nitumanya ngu, byona Ebiragiro ebi bigamba, bikwata abo abarukulemwa Ebiragiro, nukwo akanwa koona kabumbwe kandi ensi yoona Ruhanga agicwere omusango.
Omumaiso ge busaho muntu n'omu alyeetwa muhikiriire habw'okuhikya ebiri omu Biragiro; habwokuba omu Biragiro nuho tumanyira ekibi.
Baitu hati Ruhanga ayolekere obuhikiriire obutarukuruga omu Biragiro, kandi Ebiragiro n'abarangi nibabijurra.
Nubwo obuhikiriire Ruhanga obu aha abo abarukwikiriza Yesu Kristo, kandi obuheebwa boona abamwikiriza. Habwokuba busaho mbaganizo:
ningira boona bakasiisa, balemwa kuhika ha kitiinisa kya Ruhanga,
baitu habw'embabazi ze bakaheerwa busa obuhikiriire, Kristo Yesu obu yatucungwire.
Nuwe ogu Ruhanga ou yahaireyo ali ndehwa, aseese esagama ye kuleherra abamwikiriza. Eki akakikora nukwo ayoleke obuhikiriire bwa Ruhanga, ayagumiisirize naayebwa ebibi ebyakozirwe ira;
nukwo omu busumi bunu tumanye nkooku ahikiriire, kandi ahikiriza weena anyakwikiriza Yesu.
Hati okwenyumiza kwaitu nikugasa ki? Kwa busa. Habwaki? Nikusigikira ha bikorwa byaitu? Nangwa, baitu ha kwikiriza kwaitu.
Itwe nitugumya tuti: Okwikiriza nukwo kuhikiriza omuntu, baitu tikuli kukora ebirukuragirwa Ebiragiro.
Obu, Ruhanga aba Ruhanga w'Abayudaaya bonka? Kandi tali Ruhanga w'Abanyamahanga? Ego, nabo wabo.
Ruhanga nkooku ali omu, aliha abasazirwe obuhikiriire habw'okwikiriza kwabo, n'abatasazirwe abubahe habw'okwikiriza kwabo.
Hati nu Ebiragiro turabidibya habw'okwikiriza kunu? Nikikafuuhe! Baitu tubigumye bugumya.
Hati nu turagamba ki hali Abburahamu, isenkuru itwe ow'omubiri?
Abburahamu obu araaba yahikiriziibwe ebi yakozire, yakubaire n'eky'okwenyumirizaaho; baitu ateenyumize omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
Kandi Ebyahandiikirwe nibigamba ki? Nibigira biti: “Abburahamu akaikiriza Ruhanga, eki kikamuhaisa obuhikiriire.”
Ningira omusaara gw'omuntu anyakukora omulimo tigwetwa kisembo, gwetwa ibanja eri asemeriire kusasurwa.
Baitu ogu atarukwesiga ebi arukukora, kyonka naayesiga Ruhanga anyakweza n'abo abatamutiina, okwikiriza kwe kwetwa buhikiriire.
Daudi nawe nukwo ahaisaniza ati omugisa oguheebwa omuntu Ruhanga ou ayeta muhikiriire, kandi kunu ataina ebi akozire, naagamba ati:
“B'omugisa abo abaganyirwa ensobi zaabo, kandi bakaihwaho ebibi byabo!
W'omugisa omuntu MUKAMA ou atalibarra bibi bye.”
Omugisa gunu guba gw'abasazirwe bonka, rundi n'abatasazirwe? Itwe tugamba tuti: Okwikiriza kwa Abburahamu kukamwesa muhikiriire.
Eki kikabaho di? Amazire kusarwa rundi atakasazirwe? Kitamwese muhikiriire amazire kusarwa nangwa, baitu atakasazirwe.

Okusarwa kwe kakaba karorwaho ak'okugumya obuhikiriire obu yatungire habw'okwikiriza atakasazirwe. Ekyagenderiirwe nukwo kumufoora isenkuru boona abaikiriza batasazirwe, nabo bakabarwa kuba bahikiriire.
Kandi abe isenkuru w'abasazirwe, abatagarukiire ha kusarwa kwonka baitu abahondera ekirale eky'okwikiriza, isenkuru-itwe Abburahamu oku akaba ainakwo atakasazirwe.
Ruhanga okuraganiza Abburahamu n'abaijukuru be nkooku baligweterwa ensi, kutaruge omu kuhikya Ebiragiro, baitu kukaruga omu buhikiriire obu baahairwe habw'okwikiriza kwabo.
Abakwasi b'Ebiragiro obu baraaba bali nubo b'okugwetwa, buli okwikiriza tikwina mugaso, n'okuraganiza oku kwa busa.
Ningira Ebiragiro bimanyisa abantu, Ruhanga nkooku ali w'obukaya, kandi Ebiragiro nambere bitali, tihabaho n'okubicwa.

Nikyo obuhikiriire burugira omu kwikiriza, nukwo ebyaraganiziibwe bisigikire ha mbabazi za Ruhanga, biheebwe abaijukuru ba Abburahamu boona-tibali bakwasi b'Ebiragiro bonka, baitu n'abo abaikiriza nk'Abburahamu; habwokuba nuwe isenkuru itwe itwena,
nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Nkufoire isenkuru amahanga maingi.” Eki Abburahamu akakiraganizibwa Ruhanga ou yaikiriize, nuwe Ogu anyakuhumbuura abafu kandi anyakuhanga ebintu ebikaba bitaroho.
Abburahamu akaikiriza, naanihira ebitakunihiirwe ngu, alifooka isenkuru amahanga maingi, nkooku yagambiirwe ati: “Abaijukuru baawe nukwo baliba baingi bati.”
Noobu yarozire ahoireyo, habwokuba akaba ahikize emyaka nka kikumi ey'obukuru, kandi yarora mukazi we Saara ali ngumba, baitu ebi bitamugaruukirize omu kwikiriza.
Atagurukagurukye eki Ruhanga yamuraaganiize, baitu akeeyongera okugumira omu kwikiriza kwe, naahaisaniza Ruhanga,
ananukiire kimu nkooku Ruhanga akaba naasobora kukora eki yaraganiize.
Nikyo okwikiriza kwe “kwamweseze muhikiriire.”
Baitu ebigambo ebirukugamba biti: “Kukamwesa muhikiriire”, bitahandiikwe habwe wenka,
baitu bikahandiikwa na habwaitu. Na itwe tulyetwa bahikiriire: itwe abaikiriza Ogu ayahumbwire Yesu MUKAMA waitu omu bafu.
Yesu ogu ayaisirwe habw'ebibi byaitu kandi yahumbuurwa, nukwo atwegarukanganisemu na Ruhanga.
Nahabweki, nkooku tuhikirizibwa okwikiriza, twina obusinge na Ruhanga habwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo,
ou twarabiremu okuhika ha mbabazi zinu ezi turumu. Nikyo turukukyanganukira, nitunihira okubagana ha kitiinisa kya Ruhanga.
Kandi tikiri eki kyonka, baitu nitukyanganuka n'omu kusaasa kwaitu, nitumanya omu kusaasa nkooku harugamu okugumiisiriza;
omu kugumiisiriza harugamu obumanzi, kandi obumanzi burugwamu okunihira.
Kandi itwe titurukunihirra busa, habwokuba Mwoyo Ahikiriire ou twahairwe, akaseesa engonzi za Ruhanga omu mitima yaitu.
Obu tukaba tukyali baceke, akasumi konyini obu kaahikire, Kristo akatufeera, itwe abatatiina Ruhanga.
Weza, nikiremeera omuntu kufeera ahikiriire. Rundi kwikiriza kwehayo habw'ow'engeso nungi.
Baitu omuli eki, Ruhanga nuho ayolekera nkooku atugonza, habwokuba obu tukaba tukyali basiisi, Kristo akatufeera.
Hati nu, nkooku tweziibwe esagama ye, alitujunira kimu okufubirwa Ruhanga.
Habwokuba obu tukaba tukyali banyanzigwa ba Ruhanga, tukagarukanganamu nawe habw'okufa kw'Omwana we. Hati, obu twagarukangainemu, obwomeezi bwo tibuliikiraho kutujuna.
Tikiri eki kyonka, baitu nitwesiima omu Ruhanga habwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo ayatugarukanganiisizemu.
Habweki ekibi nkooku kyaizire omunsi habw'omuntu omu, kandi kyaleeta okufa; nukwo orufu rwahikire ha bantu boona, habwokuba boona bakasiisa.
Mazima ebibi bikaba biri omunsi Ebiragiro bitakatairweho; baitu mbere hatali Biragiro, ebi bakora tibyetwa bibi.
Kandi orufu rwalemaga abantu okuruga hali Adamu okuhika hali Musa; nangwa rwalemaga n'abatarasiisire, Adamu nkooku yasiisire. Kandi Adamu ogu akaba ali kisisani ky'ogu ow'akaba ali w'okwija.

Baitu ekisembo Ruhanga eki agabira busa tikisisana kibi kya Adamu. Habwokuba ekibi ky'omuntu omu, obu kiraaba kyaleetiire baingi okufa, baitu embabazi za Ruhanga n'ekisembo ekiheriirwe busa eky'omuntu omu Yesu Kristo tibyakukizire muno kubaleetera omugaso?

Kandi ekisembo eki ekya busa tikirukusisana n'ebyarugire omu kibi ky'omuntu ogu omu. Ningira omusango ogwacwirwe habw'ekibi eki ekimu, gukarugwamu okusingwa; baitu ekisembo ekya busa, ekigabwa abantu bamazire kukora ebibi bingi, kiihaho omusango.

Orufu obu ruliba rwalemere habw'ekibi ky'omuntu ogu omu, abo abagirirwa embabazi ezihinguraine, kandi abaheriirwe busa ekisembo eky'obuhikiriire, balikira muno kulema omu bwomeezi obw'ebiro n'ebiro habw'omuntu ali omu Yesu Kristo.
Ekibi ky'omuntu omu nkooku kyasingisize abantu boona omusango, n'ekikorwa ekihikiire kimu ky'omuntu omu nukwo kyaihireho boona omusango, nikibatungisa obwomeezi.
Ningira abaingi nkooku baafookere basiisi habw'obutahurra bw'omuntu omu, n'abaingi nukwo baliba bahikiriire habw'obuhulizi bw'omuntu omu.
Ebiragiro obu byaizire, bikakanyisa emisango; baitu emisango ha yayeyongiire kukanya, nuho n'embabazi za Ruhanga zaakizire kukanya muno.
Habweki, ekibi nkooku kyalemere nikireeta orufu, n'embabazi za Ruhanga nazo nukwo irirema niireeta obuhikiriire, niihikya abantu omu bwomeezi obutahwaho habwa Yesu Kristo MUKAMA waitu.
Hati tugambe ki? Twikale nitusiisa, nukwo embabazi za Ruhanga ikanye?
Nikikafuuhe! Itwe abaarugire mu bibi tusobora tuta kugaruka kubiikaramu?
Timurukumanya itwe itwena abaabatiziibwe omu Kristo Yesu tukafa, nkooku twabatiziibwe nukwo tufe nawe?
Habweki obu twabatiziibwe tukafa, twaziikwa hamu nawe; nukwo Kristo nkooku yahumbwirwe omu bafu habw'ekitiinisa kya Ise, na itwe tusobole okugendera omu bwomeezi obuhyaka.
Obu turaaba twateeraniziibwe nawe omu kufa nk'okwe, mazima tuliteeranizibwa nawe omu kuhumbuuka nk'okwe.
Tumanyire engeso zaitu eza ira nkooku zaabambirwe hamu nawe ha musaraba, nukwo omubiri ogukora ebibi guhwerekerre; na itwe tuleke kugaruka kulemwa ebibi obundi.
Ningira ogu ayafiire, aba atakyalemwa bibi.
Na itwe obu turaaba twafiire hamu na Kristo, nitwikiriza nkooku tulyomeera hamu nawe.
Habwokuba nitumanya Kristo obu yakahumbwirwe omu bafu, taligaruka kufa; n'orufu tirukyamulema.
Okufa oku yafiire, akafa ha kibi omurundi gumu, yamara; baitu obwomeezi obu aina, - naayomezibwa Ruhanga.
Nukwo na inywe mwebale nk'abaarugire omu bibi, kandi abarukwomeera omu Ruhanga habwa Kristo Yesu.
Habweki mutaikiriza bibi kulema emibiri yanyu enyakufa, mukatwalirizbwa okwegomba kwayo.

Engingo ez'emibiri yanyu mutaziikiriza kukora ebibi, mukaifoora bintu eby'okubakoza ebibi, baitu mwehe Ruhanga nk'abantu abaihirwe omu kufa, baataahibwa omu bwomeezi; kandi engingo zanyu muzihe Ruhanga nk'ebintu eby'okubakoza ebirungi.
Ebibi tibiribalema, habwokuba timurukulemwa Biragiro, baitu nimulemwa embabazi za Ruhanga.
Nukwo kugamba, twikalege nitusiisa, habwokuba titurukulemwa Biragiro baitu embabazi za Ruhanga? Nikikafuuhe!
Kinu nakyo timurukukimanya? Kakuba nimweha omuntu nk'abairu abahurra, muba kwo bairu b'ogu ou muhurra: rundi bairu b'ekibi ekitwara omu kufa, rundi bairu b'obuhulizi obuhikya ha kwezibwa.
Baitu Ruhanga asiimwe, habwokuba inywe, ira abakaba bali bairu b'ekibi, hati mufookere bahulizi n'omutima gwona, mwahika ha rulengo orw'enyegesa ei mwahairwe,
kandi obu mwaihirwe omu bibi, mwaffoka bairu b'obuhikiriire.
Nimbaza nk'omuntu buntu, habw'obuceke bw'obuhangwa bwanyu. Habwokuba engingo zanyu ira nkooku mwazikoleze eby'ensoni n'obubi obuhinguraine, hati nu muzite ha buhikiriire obuleeta okwezibwa.
Obu mukaba muli bairu b'ebibi, mukaba mutaina bukwatane n'eby'obuhikiriire.
Baitu nu, karungi ki aka mwaihire omu bintu ebirukubakwasa ensoni biro binu? Ekiruga omu bintu ebi nukwo kufa.
Baitu hati nkooku mwihirwe omu bibi, mwafooka bairu ba Ruhanga, oburungi obu murukutunga nukwo okwezibwa, kandi ekiruga omu kwezibwa oku nubwo bwomeezi obutahwaho.
Habwokuba empeera y'ebibi, nukwo kufa; baitu ekisembo Ruhanga eki agabira busa, nubwo bwomeezi obutahwaho omu Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu.
Beene baitu, timurukumanya Ebiragiro nkooku birema omuntu akyali mwomeezi? - nimbaliza abo abarukumanya Ebiragiro.
Nukwo kiti, omukazi omuswerwa, Ekiragiro kimuboha hali iba obu aba akiri mwomeezi; baitu iba obu afa, nubwo asumururwa ha Kiragiro eki.
Nukwo nu, kakuba aswerwa omusaija ondi, kunu iba akiri mwomeezi, obu ayetwa musiihani. Baitu kakuba iba afa, buli takyalemwa Kiragiro eki; kandi kakuba aswerwa omusaija ondi, tayetwa musiihani.
Na inywe bagenzi bange, nukwo mwafiire muti ha Biragiro omu mubiri gwa Kristo, mutungwe ondi ayahumbwirwe omu bafu, kandi itwena tusobole kukorra Ruhanga ebirungi.
Obu tukaba nitukyahondera eby'omubiri, okwegomba kwaitu okubi okwasisiimurwaga Ebiragiro kwakorraga omu ngingo zaitu, nukwo tukole ebibi ebireeta orufu.

Baitu hati tukaihwaho Ebiragiro, tumazire kuleka ebi ebyatwikaize omu bwiru, nukwo tuheereze tutarukuhondera Ebiragiro ebyahandiikirwe ira, baitu nituheereza twina bwomeezi obuhyaka obuleetwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.

Hati nu tugambe ki? Tuti: Ebiragiro nibyo bireeta ebibi? Mahano! Kakuba bitarabaire Biragiro, ebibi tinkubimanyire. Kakuba Ebiragiro bitaragambire biti: “Otalyegomba kubi”, tinakusoboire kumanya ekyetwa okwegomba okubi.
Baitu ebibi obu byataahiriire omu Kiragiro eki, byanyimukyamu okwegomba okw'emiringo yoona. Nambere hatali Biragiro, buli ebibi biba bifiire.
Nyowe kara nkaba ndi mwomeezi hataroho Biragiro; baitu Ebiragiro obu byaizire, ebibi byanjunaanwa, nyowe naafa.
Ekiragiro eki ekikaba kiri ky'okundeetera obwomeezi, kikandugiramu orufu.
Habwokuba ebibi obu byataahiriire omu Kiragiro, bikangobeza kandi byanyitira omu Kiragiro eki.
Habweki, Ebiragiro nibyera, n'Ekiragiro ky'okuteegomba kubi nakyo nikyera, nibihika kandi birungi.
Hati nu, ebirungi nibyo byanyisire? Nangwa! Ebibi nibyo byanyisire nibiraba omu birungi nukwo ebibi bizooke nkooku biri bibi, kandi habw'okutaahirra omu Kiragiro, bihinguraniire kimu obubi.
Tumanyire Ebiragiro nkooku biri by'omwoyo; baitu nyowe ndi w'omubiri, ayaguliirwe omu bwiru bw'ebibi.
Ebikorwa byange byonyini tindukubyetegereza. Habwokuba ebi ngonza, tibiri nibyo nkora; baitu ekintu kyonyini eki nnoba, nikyo nkora.
Hati nu, obu ndaaba ninkora ebi ntarukugonza, buli ninyikiriza Ebiragiro nkooku birukwetaagwa.
Nahabweki, takyali nyowe arukubikora, baitu nibikorwa ebibi ebiikara omuli nyowe.
Habwokuba mmanyire omuli nyowe nkooku hatarumu karungi na kamu, nukwo kugamba: omu mubiri gwange. Noobu ngonza kukora ebihikire, baitu ndemwa kubikora.
Ebirungi ebi ngonza, timbikora; baitu ebibi ebi ntagonza, nibyo nkora.
Habweki, obu ndaaba nkora ebi ntagonza, takyali nyowe anyakubikora, baitu bikorwa ebibi ebinyakwikara omuli nyowe.
Na nyowe nsanga kinu kinfookiire kiragiro. Obu ngonza kukora ebihikire, ebibi bimba haihi.
habwokuba omu mutima gwange ninsiima Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga,
baitu omu ngingo zange nimpurramu ekiragiro ekindi, ekirukurwanisa ekiragiro ekiri omu mutima gwange, nikinfoora munyankomo w'ekiragiro ky'ebibi ebiikara omu ngingo zange.
Imira nyowe! Ka mboine! Omubiri gunu ogw'okufa, nooha aligunjuna?
Ruhanga asiimwe arukutujunira omu Yesu Kristo MUKAMA waitu! Hati nu, nyowe habwange nkwata Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga n'amagezi gange, baitu omu mubiri gwange mpondera ekiragiro ky'ebibi.
Aho nu, abo abali omu Kristo Yesu, tibakyaina musango hati.
Habwokuba ebihaburo ebya Mwoyo Ahikiriire anyakuleeta obwomeezi oburukuraba omu Kristo Yesu bikambohorra ha kiragiro ky'ebibi n'orufu.

Habwokuba Ebiragiro, ebi bitarasoboire kukora habw'obuceke bw'omubiri, Ruhanga akabikora naatuma Omwana we nyabwe aina omubiri nk'ogwaitu ogukora ekibi, gube kyonzira habw'ekibi. Kandi omu mubiri ogu nuho ekibi yakisingisiize omusango.
Nukwo tuhikiririze kimu Ebiragiro ebi birukuragira, itwe abatahondera eby'omubiri, baitu abahondera ebya Mwoyo.
Abo abahondera eby'omubiri, emitima yabo bagita ha by'omubiri, baitu abo abahondera ebya Mwoyo, emitima yabo bagita ha bya Mwoyo.
Okuta omutima ha by'omubiri kurugwamu okufa; baitu okuta omutima ha bya Mwoyo kurugwamu obwomeezi n'obusinge.
Habwokuba omutima oguhondera ebi omubiri gugonza, guba munyanzigwa wa Ruhanga; tigworobera Biragiro bya Ruhanga, mazimakwo tigusobora.
Kandi abo abalemwa omubiri tibasobora kusiimwa Ruhanga.
Baitu Mwoyo wa Ruhanga obu araaba naikara kwo omuli inywe, timuli omu mubiri, baitu omu Mwoyo. Weena ataina Mwoyo wa Kristo, ogu tali muntu we.
Kristo obu araaba ali omuli inywe, buli omubiri gufiire habw'ebibi, baitu omwoyo gwawe gwomeezibwa habw'obuhikiriire.
Mwoyo w'Ogu ayahumbwire Yesu omu bafu, obu araaba naikara omuli inywe, Ogu ayahumbwire Yesu, alyomeeza n'emibiri yanyu enyakufa, habwa Mwoyo we anyakwikara omuli inywe.
Nukwo nu beene baitu, twina ibanja eritali ly'omubiri, ngu tukuraatire eby'omubiri
obu muraaba nimukuraatira eby'omubiri mulifa; baitu obu muraaba nimucwa ebikorwa ebibi by'omubiri habwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, mulyomeera.
Ningira boona abeebemberwa Mwoyo wa Ruhanga, baba baana ba Ruhanga.
Na inywe mutaheebwe mutima ogw'obwiru ogw'okubagarra omu butiini; baitu mukaheebwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire ayabafoire baana, anyakutugambisa ati: “Abba, Isiitwe!”
Mwoyo ogu wonyini nuwe arukutumanyisa hamu n'omutima gwaitu, nkooku tuli baana ba Ruhanga.
Kandi obu turaaba tuli baana, buli tuli bagwetwa. Bagwetwa ba Ruhanga abagweterwa hamu na Kristo, kakuba tubona emihito hamu nawe, nukwo tusobole kuheebwa ekitiinisa hamu nawe.
Ninteekereza nti: Emihito y'akasumi kanu tesemeriire kulengesanizibwa n'ekitiinisa eki tulisuukulirwa.
Habwokuba ebihangwa byona biikara bitegeriize n'ekihika okwolekwa kw'abaana ba Ruhanga.
Ningira ebihangwa eby'omunsi bikaba bitakusobora kukora nkooku byakwegondiize; hatali habwabyo, baitu habw'Ogu ayabitegekere ati-nukwo biikale bitegeriize ebiriija.
Habwokuba ebihangwa ebi nabyo birisumururwa omu bwiru obw'okujunda, bitunge obugabe obw'ekitiinisa obw'abaana ba Ruhanga.
Nitumanya ebihangwa byona nkooku biikara nibisinda kandi nibisaasa nk'ebirukurumwa kuzaara okuhika na hati.
Tibiri bihangwa byonka, baitu na itwe abaahairwe Mwoyo nk'omuganuro ogw'okubanza, nitusinda omu nda yaitu, tutegeriize kuhindurwa baana, nubwo emibiri yaitu yoona ericungurwa.
Kandi okunihira oku nukwo twajuniirwemu. Ningira okunihira ebirukurorwa, oku tikuba kunihira kwo. Nooha anihira ebi arukurora?
Baitu obu turaaba nitunihira ebi tutarukurora, mazimakwo tubitegereza tugumire.
Mwoyo nukwo atukoonyere ati mu buceke bwaitu; habwokuba titumanyire kusaba nkooku tusemeriire; baitu Mwoyo wenka atutonganirra hali Ruhanga, naasinda omu mulingo ogutagambwa.
Ogu anyakwekebiija emitima y'abantu naamanya Mwoyo ebi arukugenderra; habwokuba Mwoyo atonganirra abantu be, Ruhanga nkooku arukusiima.
Tumanyire ngu, omu buli kintu Ruhanga eki akora, agenderramu oburungi bw'abo abamugonza, abeetwa entegeka ye nkooku eri.
Habwokuba abo aba yamanyire ira, batakabaireho, nubo yakomere basisane Omwana we, nukwo Omwana asobole kuba muzigaijo omu bagenzi be abaingi.
Kandi abo aba yakomere batakabaireho, nubo yayesire; n'abo aba yayesire, nubo yahaire obuhikiriire; n'abo aba yahaire obuhikiriire, nubo yahaisize ekitiinisa.
Hati nu, ebi turabigambaho ki? Ruhanga obu araaba atwemeriireho, nooha aliturwanisa?
Ogu ataraganyiire Omwana we nyabwe, baitu yamuhayo habwaitu itwena, alyangira ki okutuha ebintu byona hamu nawe?
Nooha alijunaana abakome ba Ruhanga? Ruhanga nuwe anyakubaihaho omusango.
Ow'okubacwera omusango nooha? Ni Kristo Yesu ayafiire, yagaruka yahumbuurwa omu bafu, anyakuli ha mukono gw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga, nuwe arukututonganirra kwo!
Nooha alitwihaho engonzi za Kristo? Eriba mihito, bujune, kuhiiganizibwa, njara, okugenda busa, akabi akandi rundi empirima?
Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ekiro kyona twitwa habwawe; nitusisanizibwa nk'etaama ez'okwitwa.”
Nangwa, omu bintu ebi byona nitusingurra kimu habw'Ogu ayatugondeze.
Nyowe ningumiza kimu nti: Busaho kintu na kimu noobu rwakuba rufu, rundi bwomeezi, abamalaika rundi emyoyo emibi, ebintu ebiroho rundi ebiriija,
noobu byakubaire ebya ha iguru rundi eby'okuzimu, rundi ekintu ekindi kyona ekyahangirwe ekirisobora kutwihaho engonzi za Ruhanga na Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu.
Nimbaza amazima omu Kristo, tindukubiiha. Omutima gwange nigumanywa Mwoyo Ahikiriire
nkooku gwijwire obujune bwingi n'obusaalizi obutaina h'okugarukira.
Naakugondeze nyowe nkyenwe kandi mbaganizibwe na Kristo habwa bagenzi baitu, n'ab'oruganda rwaitu.
Nubo Abaisirairi abaayesirwe kuba baana ba Ruhanga, abaahairwe ekitiinisa n'endagaano, abaakwasibwe Ebiragiro n'emikoro ey'okuramya, n'ebyaraganiziibwe.
Omuli bo nuho haarugire baisenkuru itwe, kandi omu ihanga lyabo nuho haazairwe Kristo, nuwe Ruhanga anyakulema byona, anyakukugizibwa ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
Kinu tikirukumanyisa ngu, Ruhanga eki yaraganiize kikalema kuhikirizibwa, nangwa! Habwokuba boona abaazairwe omu Isirairi, tibali Baisirairi;
kandi boona tibali bagwetwa b'Abburahamu, habw'okuzaarwa nk'abaijukuru. Baitu kikahandiikwa kiti: “Omu Isaaka nuho haliruga abagwetwa baawe.”
Eki nikimanyisa ngu, abaana ba Abburahamu abaazairwe omu mubiri, tibali nubo baana ba Ruhanga; baitu abaazairwe, Ruhanga amazire kukora endagaano na Abburahamu, nubo bagwetwa kwo.
Habwokuba ekyaraganiziibwe kikagamba kiti: “Omwaka ogurukwija ndigaruka mbarole omu kasumi nka kanu, kandi Saara aliba azaire omwana w'obwojo.”
Tikiri eki kyonka, baitu na Rebbeka, obu akaba aina enda ey'abarongo ey'omusaija ogu omu, nuwe isenkuru itwe Isaaka,

noobu bakaba batakazairwe kandi batakakozire kintu ekirungi rundi ekibi, baitu entegeka ya Ruhanga ey'okukoma ou yasiimire, ekeeyongera omumaiso. Hatali habw'ebi baakozire, baitu habw'enkoma ya Ruhanga.
Rebbeka akagambirwa ati: “Isingoma aliheereza Kato.”
Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Yakobbo nkamugonza, baitu Esau nkamwanga.”
Hati turagamba ki? Ngu Ruhanga tagira bwinganiza? Nikikafuuhe!
Uwe akagambira Musa ati: “Ndiganyira ou ndukugonza kuganyira, kandi ngirre embabazi ou ndukugonza kugirra embabazi.”
Habweki tikirukurugirra ha kugonza kw'omuntu rundi ha bwekambi bwe, baitu kirugirra ha mbabazi za Ruhanga.
Habwokuba omu Bihandiiko ebirukwera Ruhanga akagambira Faraaho ati: “Nkwimukize, ningenderra okukwolekeramu obusobozi bwange, nukwo ibara lyange lirangirirwe omunsi yoona.”
Habweki nu, Ruhanga aganyira weena ou agonza kuganyira, kandi agumanganiza omutima ogwa weena ou agoza gugumangane.
Hati nu nimwija kunkaguza muti: “Habwaki Ruhanga naakyajunaana abantu habw'ensobi zaabu? Kandi nooha asobora kwanga kukora Ruhanga eki arukwenda?”
Baitu si niiwe oha iwe omuntu arukugarukamu Ruhanga? Ekinaga kirikaguza omubumbi wakyo kiti: “Habwaki wambumbire oti?”
Omubumbi w'ekinaga, ibumba taliinaho busobozi, omu kitonge kimu ky'ibumba kubumbamu ekibindi eky'emikoro ey'ekitiinisa rundi ekindi ekikwatirwamu ebintu ebya buli kiro?
Ruhanga obu araaba naagonza okwoleka ekiniga kye n'okumanyisa obusobozi bwe, nikiita ki Uwe kugumiisiriza habw'embabazi ze enyingi ebibindi ebimukwasa ekiniga ebi yabumbiire kuhwerekerezibwa?
Akagenderra kwoleka ekitiinisa kye ekingi ha bibindi ebimukwasa embabazi, ebi yateekaniriize ekitiinisa okuruga ira.
Ebibindi ebi niitwe aba yayesire, atatwihe omu Bayudaaya bonka, baitu n'omu Banyamahanga.
Nikyo Ruhanga yagambiire omu kitabu kya Hoseya ati: “Abo abakaba batali bantu bange, ndibeeta ‘ihanga lyange’. N'omukazi akaba atarukugonzibwa, ndimweta ‘kiganzi’.”
“Kandi omu kiikaro kyonyini nambere bagambiriirwe bati: ‘Timuli bantu bange’, nuho balyeterwa ‘Baana ba Ruhanga omwomeezi’.”
Kandi Isaaya akatokera haiguru obu yabaliize hali Isirairi ati: “Omuhendo gw'abaana ba Isirairi noobu guraaba nigwingana omusenyi gwa ha nyanja, baitu abake abalisigaraho nubo balijunwa;
habwokuba MUKAMA talikeerereza kufubira abantu n'amaani.”
Kandi na Isaaya akakiranga ati: “Kakuba MUKAMA ow'amahe ataratusigiire ruzaaro, twakubaire nka Sodomu, twakusisaine nka Gomora.”
Hati turagamba ki? Tumanyire obuhikiriire obusigikira ha kwikiriza nkooku bwahikireho Abanyamahanga abatarabwekambiire;
baitu Abaisirairi abaayekambiire obuhikiriire obusigikira ha Biragiro, bbo bakalemwa kuhikiriza Ebiragiro ebi.
Habwaki? Habwokuba obuhikiriire batabwekambiire nibasigikira ha kwikiriza, baitu bakasigikira ha bikorwa byabo. Gamba bakaterwa ibaale eritabaijura,
nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Dora nimbyara ibaale omu Siyoni, ibaale eriritabaijura abantu, omwandara ogulibanaga; kandi weena anyakumwikiriza, talikwatwa nsoni.”
Beene baitu, omutima gwange eki gurukwenda, kandi eki ndukusabira Abaisirairi hali Ruhanga, nikyo kinu: bajunwe.
Ningumya nkooku bagonza kwo Ruhanga, baitu tibakabaire kwetegereza.
Habw'okutamanya obuhikiriire oburuga hali Ruhanga na habw'okuserra okweteeraho obuhikiriire bwabo nyabwabo, bateeteho obu oburuga hali Ruhanga.
Habwokuba omu Kristo nuho Ebiragiro bihikirizibwa, nukwo weena arukumwikiriza ahikirizibwe.
Musa akahandiika naagamba ati: Omuntu anyakwekambira obuhikiriire oburukusigikira ha Biragiro, nubwo bulimuhaisa obwomeezi.
Baitu obuhikiriire oburukusigikira ha kwikiriza tibukutanga kugamba omu mutima gwawe oti: “Nooha alitemba omu iguru?” [Nukwo aiheyo Kristo].
Rundi oti: “Nooha alisirimuka okuzimu?” [Nukwo aihe Kristo omu bafu].
Kandi Ebyahandiikirwe byonyini bigamba biti: Ekigambo kikuli haihi, kikuli ha munwa, n'omu mutima gwawe. [Nikyo kigambo eky'okwikiriza ekitwegesa].
Kakuba oyatura n'akanwa kaawe oti: Yesu aba MUKAMA, okaikiriza n'omutima gwawe Ruhanga nkooku yamuhumbwire omu bafu, alijunwa.
Omuntu aikiriza Kristo n'omutima gwe, nukwo ahikirre; kandi ayatura Kristo n'akanwa ke, nukwo ajunwe.
Ebyahandiikirwe bigamba biti: “Weena anyakumwikiriza, talikwatwa nsoni.”
Habwokuba tiharoho mbaganizo ha Muyudaaya n'Omugiriiki: MUKAMA ogu omu, aba MUKAMA wa boona, kandi oburungi bwe abugabira boona abamukunga.
Ningira: “Weena anyakwamirra MUKAMA alijunwa.”
Baitu abantu basobora bata kwamirra ogu ou bataraikiriize? Kandi n'okwikiriza ou batakahurrahoga? Kandi barahurra bata, hataroho murangirize?
Kandi bbo bararangirra bata, batatumirwe? Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ka birungi ebigere by'abarukurangirra Amakuru Amarungi!”
Baitu boona abaagahuliire, batagateho mutima, nangwa. Isaaya nkooku yagambire ati: “Ai MUKAMA, nooha ayaikiriize ebi twamurangiire?”
Nahabweki okwikiriza kuruga omu bigambo ebi tuhurra, kandi ebigambo ebi tuhurra biruga omu kurangirra Kristo.
Leka nyowe nkaguze nti: Abaisirairi batahurre? Mazimakwo bakahurra, habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Iraka lyabo likahulirwa abantu boona, n'ebigambo byabu bikahika ha mitaano y'ensi.”

Ninyongera kukaguza nti: Ihanga lya Isirairi litabyetegereze? Baitu Musa ti nuwe ayabandize kubahabura ati: “Ndibakwasa ihali hali abo abatakabaire ihanga; ndibakwasa ekiniga hali ihanga eritaina magezi.”
Kandi Isaaya nikyo agambira atarukutiina ati: “Nkazoorwa abo abataranserwire; nkeeyoleka abo abatarankaguliriize.”
Baitu hali Isirairi naagamba ati: “Ekiro kyona emikono yange nkaikara ngitegiire abantu entahurra kandi abeemi.”
Hati kankaguze nti: Ruhanga akanagira kimu abantu be? Nikikafuuhe! Na nyowe nyenka ndi Mwisirairi, mwijukuru w'Abburahamu, ow'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini.
Ruhanga atange bantu be aba yamanyire ira. Timurukwijuka Ebihandiiko ebirukwera ebi bigamba hali Eriya, obu yanyegeriire Abaisirairi hali Ruhanga?
Ati: “Ai MUKAMA, abarangi baawe babaisire, amatambiro gaawe bagasesire. Nyowe nyenka ninyowe nsigaireho, kandi na nyowe nibenda kunyita.”
Baitu Ruhanga akamugarukamu ki? Akamugira ati: “Nyesaagisiizeho abantu kasanju abatarateeriize embandwa Baali amaju.”
Kandi n'omu kasumi kanu, hakyaroho abake abasigaireho abaakomerwe habw'embabazi za Ruhanga.
Obu baraaba baakomerwe habw'embabazi, okukomwa kwabo tikukyasigikira ha bikorwa byabo. Kakuba kusigikira ha baakozire, buli embabazi za Ruhanga iba itakyali mbabazi.
Hati nu, tugambe ki? Abaisirairi bakalemwa kutunga obuhikiriire obu baaserwire. Abaakomerwe nubo baabutungire; baitu abandi, emitima yaabo yagumangana,
nkookukyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ruhanga akabaha emitima erukusununuka, amaiso agatarukurora, kandi amatu agatarukuhurra n'okuhika hati.”
Daudi nawe akagamba ati: “Ekiihuro kyabo leka kibafookere mutego, kiriba, buhya, kandi kifubiro kyabo.
Amaiso gaabo gaswekwe omwirima, nukwo baleme kuhweza, kandi baikale bagemerwe enaku ebiro byona.”
Nikyo ndukukaguliza nti: Bakatabaijuka nk'abarukwija kugwa? Naakake konka! Okusobya kw'Abaisirairi kukaleetera Abanyamahanga kujunwa. Nukwo kujunwa okwakwasize Isirairi ihali.
Ensobi zaabo obu iraaba niireetera abantu omugisa, n'okusiisa kwabo obu kuraaba nikuleetera Abanyamahanga embabazi; okwegarukamu kw'Abaisirairi boona tikulirugwamu emigisa erukukiraho muno?
Hati nimbaza na inywe Abanyamahanga, habwokuba ndi mukwenda hali Abanyamahanga. Nimpaisaniza obuheereza bwange,
nukwo nkwase ihali Abayudaaya bataahi bange, kandi njune abamu omuli bo.
Okwangwa kwabo obu kuraaba kwaleetiire baingi okugarukanganamu na Ruhanga, okutangirirwa kwabo kulibaleetera ki? Tikulibahumbuura omu bafu?
Ensaano ey'omuganuro enyakuhongwa, obu eba eyeziibwe, buli n'ekiihuro kyona kyeziibwe; kandi ekikoro obu kiba nikyera, n'amataagi nago buli nigeera.

Amataagi agamu obu garaaba gaakoonoirweho, na iwe omunono ogw'omuti oliva ogw'omu kisaka, okagarurwa omu kiikaro kyago, nukwo oliisibwe hamu nago ebirukuruga omu kiikaro kyago, nukwo oliisibwe hamu nago ebirukuruga omu mihama yagwo,
otenyumiriza ha mataagi ago. Kakuba oyenyumiza, ijuka nkooku atali iwe anyakukwatiriire ekikoro, baitu ekikoro nikyo kikwatiriire iwe.
Osobora kugamba oti: “Amataagi, eki gaakoonolirweho, nukwo nyowe kugarurwa omu kiikaro kyago.”
Eki ky'amazima. Gakanogorwaho habw'okutaikiriza kwago, baitu iwe ekikwemeriize otarukutengeeta, nukwo kwikiriza kwawe. Habweki leka kwekuza, baitu oikale nootiina.
Ruhanga obu araaba ataraganyire mataagi gonyini agaameriireho, na iwe talikuganyira.
Habweki nu, oyetegereze embabazi kandi n'obukaya bwa Ruhanga. Obukaya bwe hali abo abagwire, n'embabazi ze hali iwe, kakuba oziikaramu. Kakuba kitabakwo, na iwe olicwibwaho.
Nangwa na bali, obu baraaba batarukugumira omu butaikiriza bwabo, baligarurrwa ha muti; habwokuba Ruhanga aina obusobozi obw'okwongera kubagarramu.

Iwe obu oraaba wacwirwe ha muti ogw'oliva ogw'omu kisaka ogwayemereze, wagarurwa ha muti gw'oliva ogw'omu kisaka ogwayemereze, wagarurwa ha muti gw'oliva ogwabyairwe abantu kandi ogutarayemereze, amataagi agazairweho tigalikira muno kugarurwa ha muti nambere gaarugire?
Bagenzi bange, ninyenda mukenge kirungi ensita enu, muleke kwebara nk'abamagezi: abamu omu Baisirairi bagumangaine kandi baliikara nibagumangana okuhika Abanyamahanga boona obu balitutaahamu.
Obu nubwo Abaisirairi nabo balijunwa, nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Omujuni aliruga Siyoni, ihanga lya Yakobbo aliihiremu kimu okutatiina Ruhanga.”
“Egi eriba ndagaano yange nabo, obu ndibaihaho ebibi byabo.”
Okurorra ha Makuru Amarungi, bbo baba banyanzigwa ba Ruhanga, nukwo inywe musobole okugaikiriza; baitu okurorra ha kukomwa, bbo baba nganzi habw'abaisenkurubo.
Ningira Ruhanga obu ayeta rundi agaba, tayeyijukya.
Nka inywe ira oku mukaba mweremiire Ruhanga, baitu hati mugiriirwe embabazi habw'obwereme bwa bali.
Nabo hati bafookere beereme, nukwo bagiriirwe embabazi nk'ezi mwagiriirwe.
Ningira abantu boona Ruhanga akabeeta abeemi, nukwo boona abagirre embabazi.
Haa! Amagezi ga Ruhanga, n'okumanya kwe ka bihinguraine obwingi! Encwa ye k'etarukwetegerezibwa, n'emihanda ye k'etarukukengwa!
“Nooha aramanyire ebiteekerezo bya MUKAMA? Nooha si aramuhanuliire?”
“Nooha aramuhaire ekisembo nukwo nawe agarulirwe?”
Ebintu byona biruga omuli Uwe, biraba omuli Uwe, kandi bigarukira omuli Uwe. Aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
Nahabweki bagenzi bange, nimbeesengereza habw'embabazi za Ruhanga, muheyo emibiri yanyu nk'ekyonzira ekyomiire, ekirukwera kandi ekirukusiimwa Ruhanga. Obu nubwo muba nimuramya Ruhanga omu mazima.
Muleke kwesisaniza n'ab'ensi enu, baitu muhinduke, nimugarurwa buhyaka omu biteekerezo byanyu, nukwo mugumye Ruhanga ebi agonza: nibyo ebirungi, ebisiimwa, kandi ebihikiire kimu.

Habw'omugisa ogu nahairwe, ninteererra buli omu omuli inywe, aleke kweteekerezaaho muno okukira nkooku ali, baitu ayeteekerezeho nkooku ali omu mazima, buli omu naarorra ha kwikiriza Ruhanga oku yamuhaire.
Omu mubiri gumu nkooku twinamu ebicweka bingi, kandi ebicweka ebi byona bitarukukora mulimo gumu,
nukwo kiti na itwe. Noobu turaaba tuli baingi, baitu tuli mubiri gumu omu Kristo; kandi buli omu kicweka kya mugenzi we.
Nkooku twina ebisembo ebitarukusisana okurorra ha migisa ei twahairwe, katubyekonyeze. Obu kuraaba kuli kuranga, turange niturorra ha kwikiriza kwaitu.
Obu buraaba buli buheereza, tuheereze. Ogu arukwegesa, ate omutima ha kwegesa kwe.
Ogu arukuhabura, ahabule kwo; ogu arukugaba, agabe n'obwenda; ogu arukukoonyera, akoonyere n'obwekambi; kandi arukukora eby'embabazi, abikole n'okusemererwa.
Engonzi zanyu zibe z'amazima. Munobe ekibi, mugumire ha kirungi.
Mugonzangane nk'ab'oruganda oku bagonzangana; omu kuhangana ekitiinisa buli omu akizeho mugenzi we.
Mwekambe, muleke kuba bagara, muheereze MUKAMA n'omutima ogwijwire engonzi.
Mukyanganuke omu kunihira kwanyu, mugumiisirize omu mihito, musabe obutalekerra.
Muhe abantu ba Ruhanga ebi barukwetaaga, mutangirre kandi mukunire abagenyi.
Musabire omugisa abo abanyakubahiiga; mubasabire omugisa, baitu muleke kubakondereza.
Mukyanganuke n'abo abarukukyanganuka, murre n'abo abarukurra.
Mwikale mwina omutima gumu; muleke kwekuliriza, mweteerane n'abo abataina kitiinisa, muleke kwemanyaho amagezi.
Weena anyakukora kubi, mutamuhoora nzigu, baitu muteho omutima okukora boona eki barukweta ekirungi.
Obu kiraaba nikisoboka, mwikarane na boona mu businge nkooku murukusobora.
Abagonzibwa, mutalyehorra inywenka enzigu, baitu eki mukirekere encwa ya Ruhanga; habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Okuhoora enzigu kwange, ninyowe ndihoora; MUKAMA nukwo agamba.”
Na handi kigamba kiti: “Omunyanzigwa waawe obu arumwa enjara, muhe ebyokulya; obu akwatwa iroho, muhe ekyokunywa; habwokuba obu okora oti, oba noomusingisa omusango.”
Mutalisingurwa obubi, baitu inywe obubi mubusinguze oburungi.
Buli muntu weena ayorobere abalemi abarukumulema, habwokuba tiharoho busobozi na bumu rundi buli burugire hali Ruhanga; kandi abalemi abaroho bakateebwaho Ruhanga.
Habweki, ogu anyakweremera abalemi, aba ayeremiire ekyatairweho Ruhanga. Kandi abeereme abo, beereetera omusango.
Habwokuba abalemi tibatiinisa bantu abakora kurungi, baitu batiinisa abakora kubi. Iwe nooyenda kutatiina ow'obusobozi? Hati nu, kora ebirungi, nukwo nawe akusiime.
Ningira uwe muheereza wa Ruhanga arukukora habw'oburungi bwawe. Baitu kakuba okora kubi, otiine; habwokuba ekitara takihagatiirra busa. Nuwe muheereza wa Ruhanga ow'okufubira anyakukora kubi.
Nahabweki omuntu asemeriire kworoba, tikuli habw'okwetantara obukaya bwa Ruhanga kwonka, baitu na habw'okuhaburwa omutima gwe eki gumugambira.
Nikyo muheera emisoro, habwokuba abalemi baheereza ba Ruhanga, abarukukora omulimo agw'okusorooza emisoro.
Musasule boona ebi barukubatonga: abarukusorooza omusoro, mugubahe; abarukutonga obusuuru, mububahe; ab'okutiinwa, mubatiine; ab'ekitiinisa, mubahe ekitiinisa.
Mutaliba n'ibanja ha muntu weena, okwihaho ibanja ery'okugonzangana; habwokuba ogu anyakugonza mutaahi we, aba ahikiriize Ebiragiro.

Nibyo Ebiragiro ebigamba biti: “Otalisiihana, otaliita, otaliiba, otalyegomba kubi” n'ebiragiro ebindi, byona bifunzibwa omu kigambo ekirukugamba kiti: “Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.”
Anyakwina egonzi takora kubi mutaahi we; nahabweki engonzi nizo ihikiriza Ebiragiro.
Okwongera hali eki, mumanyire akasumi nkooku kali haihi kandi kahikiire kimu, inywe kusisiimuka omu turo; habwokuba okujunwa, hati kutwiriire haihi okukira nambere twabandize kwikiriza.
Obwire buli haihi kukya, n'izooba liri haihi kuturuka. Habweki, tuleke ebikorwa eby'omwirima, tukwate eby'okurwanisa omu musana.
Tukole kurungi nk'abali omu musana, tutarukurarraana omu magenyi kandi tutarukutamiira, tutarukusiihana n'okukora eby'obugwagwa, tutarukukungana n'okugirrangana ihali.
Baitu MUKAMA Yesu Kristo nuwe mufoole ngabu yanyu, muleme emibiri yanyu, ereke kukora ebi erukwegomba.
Omuntu ow'okwikiriza okuke mumutangirre, baitu mutarukuteezangana empaka ha biteekerezo bye.
Omuntu omu aikiriza nkooku asobora kulya buli kintu kyona, baitu ondi ow'okwikiriza kuke alya emikubi yonka.
Ogu arukulya buli kintu aleke kugaya atarukulya buli kintu kandi atarukulya buli kintu nawe aleke kucwera omusango ogu arukubirya; habwokuba Ruhanga amazire kumutangirra.
Niiwe oha arukucwera omuheereza w'ondi omusango? Obu araaba naayemerra rundi naagwa, nikimanywa mukama we wenka. Kandi alikwatirirwa, habwokuba mukama we aina obusobozi obw'okumwemereza.
Omuntu omu, ekiro kimu akyeta kikuru kukira ebindi; kunu ondi, ebiro byona abinganiza. Leka buli omu ayecweremu wenka.

Ogu anyakukuza ekiro, akikuza habw'okuhaisa MUKAMA ekitiinisa. N'ogu anyakulya buli kintu, nawe alya habw'okuhaisa MUKAMA ekitiinisa, habwokuba alya nasiima Ruhanga; n'ogu atalya kintu, akizira habw'okuhaisa MUKAMA ekitiinisa, kandi nawe asiima Ruhanga.
Busaho n'omu ayeyomeeza, kandi busaho ayefeera.
Obu twomeera, twomeezibwa MUKAMA; kandi obu tufa, nabwo tufeera MUKAMA. Nukwo nu, obu twomeera rundi tufa, tuli ba MUKAMA.
Eki nikyo Kristo yaferiire kandi yahumbuuka, nukwo asobole kuba MUKAMA wa boona: aboomiire n'abafiire.
Habwaki ocwera mugenzi waawe omusango? Rundi habwaki ogaya mugenzi waawe? Ningira itwena tulyemerra omumaiso g'ekitebe kya Ruhanga ekicwerwaho emisango;
nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Mukama agamba ati: Ninyowe Atahwaho, kandi buli muntu alinteereza amaju, orulimi rwa buli omu rulihaisaniza Ruhanga.”
Habweki, buli omu omuli itwe alyetonganirra hali Ruhanga.
Habweki, tutongera kucwerangana emisango, baitu tucwemu kutagaruka kuleetera mugenzi waitu ekyesiitazo rundi ekindi kyona ekirukwekiika omu muhanda gwe.
Mmanyire kandi ningumiza kimu omu MUKAMA Yesu nkooku hataroho kintu na kimu eky'omuziro habwakyo; baitu kiba ky'omuziro hali ogu anyakuteekereza ngu, ky'omuziro.
Iwe eki orukulya, obu kiraaba nikikora kubi mugenzi waawe, obu muba mutakyagonzangana. Otaikiriza eki orukulya kuhwerekereza ogu Kristo ou yaferiire.
Nahabweki, iwe eki orukweta kirungi otakireetereza okugambwaho kubi.
Habwokuba obukama bwa Ruhanga tibiri byokulya rundi byokunywa, baitu nukwo okuhikirra, okuteekaana, n'okusemererwa oku tuheebwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Ogu anyakuheereza ati Kristo, nuwe asemeza Ruhanga kandi asiimwa abantu.
Hati nu, ka twekambire ebireeta obusinge n'ebirukwombeka ekitebe ky'abaikiriza.
Muleke kusiisa omulimo gwa Ruhanga habw'ebyokulya. Mazimakwo ebintu byona birungi, baitu ekibi nukwo omuntu okusiitaza abandi habw'eki arukulya.
Haakire okutalya nyama, rundi okutanywa marwa, rundi okutakora kintu kyona ekirukwesiitaza mugenzi waawe.
Okwikiriza oku oinakwo, oikale nakwo nikumanywa iwe na Ruhanga. W'omugisa ogu atarukwetuntuza obu aba naakora ebi arukuteekereza ngu bihikire.
Baitu ogu anyakugurukyagurukya, kakuba alya, omusango gwamusinga; habwokuba eki akora takikora habw'okwikiriza; ningira kyona ekitaruga omu kwikiriza kiba kibi.
Itwe abaina amaani, tusemeriire okugumiisiriza obuceke bw'abataina maani, tutarukuserra eby'okwesemeza itwenka.
Leka buli omu omuli itwe aserre ebirukusemeza mutaahi we habw'okumugasira n'okumugumya.
Habwokuba Kristo ataserre ebirukumusemeza wenka; baitu nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ebijumo by'abo abaakujumire, bikahikaho nyowe.”
Byona ebyahandiikirwe ira, bikahandiikwa kutwegesa, nukwo tutunge okunihira habw'okugumibwa n'okwekambisibwa Ebihandiiko ebi ebirukwera.
Ruhanga, endugirro y'amaani gaitu kandi anyakutwekambisa, abahe okwikarana mwina omutima gumu, nimusisana Kristo Yesu.
Nukwo inywena hamu musobole kunyumiza Ruhanga, Ise MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, n'iraka limu.
Habweki mujwahukirrangane nka Kristo oku yabajwahukiriire, nukwo Ruhanga aheebwe ekitiinisa.
Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Kristo akafooka muheereza w'abasazirwe, abanze ayoleke amazima ga Ruhanga, naagenderra kugumya ebyaraganiziibwe baisenkuru itwe,
nukwo hanyuma asoboze Abanyamahanga kuhaisaniza Ruhanga habw'embabazi ze, nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Habweki ndikuhaisaniza omu Banyamahanga, kandi nzine eby'okukukugiza.”
Handi kigamba kiti: “Inywe Abanyamahanga mukyanganuke hamu n'abantu be”;
Kandi kiti: “Muhaisanize Atahwaho Abanyamahanga inywena, n'abantu boona bamuhaisanize.”
Na Isaaya ayongera ati: “Omwijukuru wa Yese aliija, aliimuka okulema Abanyamahanga; kandi Abanyamahanga nuwe baligiramu obwesige.”
Ruhanga endugirro y'okunihira kwaitu abaijuze omuhimbo gwona n'obusinge ebireetwa okwikiriza, nukwo habw'obusobozi bwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, okunihira kwanyu kusaagane muno.
Bagenzi bange, mmanyiire kimu inywena nkooku mwijwire engeso nungi, nimwetegerereza kimu, kandi nimusobora n'okuhaburangana.
Baitu haroho ebintu ebimu ebi mbahandiikiire n'obumanzi, mbandiize kubaijukya embabazi Ruhanga ezi yangiriire

nkooku zaanfoire muheereza wa Kristo Yesu hali Abanyamahanga. Kandi obuheereza obu mbakorra, nukwo kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi aga Ruhanga. Abanyamahanga nabo basobole kufooka kyonzira ekirukusiimwa Ruhanga, kimazire kwezibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Nahabweki omu Kristo Yesu nyina eki ndukusigikiraho okwenyumiza habw'omulimo gwange ogu nkorra Ruhanga.
Habwokuba tindikisura okubazaaho ekindi kyona, okwihaho Kristo ebi yakoliire omuli nyowe okuleetera Abanyamahanga okworobera Ruhanga omu bigambo byange n'omu bikorwa byange,
habw'amaani g'ebihuniriza n'ebyamahano ebyakozirwe, na habw'amaani ga Mwoyo Ahikiriire. Nikyo narangiririire kimu Amakuru Amarungi aga Kristo okuruga Yerusaalemu okuhikira kimu Iliiriko.
Eki naayendaga muno nukwo kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi, hatali omu biikaro nambere ibara lya Kristo lyagambirweho, ntaliikara kwombeka ha musingi ogw'omuntu ondi,
baitu kibe nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Balirora ou batakagambirwahoga, kandi balyetegereza ou batakahurrahoga.”
Eki nikyo kyantangire okwija owanyu buli kasumi.
Baitu hati nkooku ntakyaina h'okukora omulimo omu bicweka binu, kandi nkooku mmazire emyaka nyingi nyina ekihika kwija kubarora,
ninihira kubarora obu ndiba nindabaho okugenda Sipaini, nkamara na inywe ebiro bike, nukwo mumboherre omu rugendo rwange.
Baitu hati ninyija kugenda Yerusaalemu, nintwarra abantu ba Ruhanga eby'okubakoonyera.
Habwokuba aba Makedoni n'ab'Akaaya bakaikiriza okusorooza ebintu eby'okukoonyera abanaku abali omu baikiriza ba Yerusaalemu.

Eki bakakikora n'okusemererwa, kandi mazimakwo babainaho ibanja. Abanyamahanga obu baraaba babagaine n'Abayudaaya ha birungi byabo eby'omwoyo, nabo basemeriire kubakoonyera n'ebintu byabo eby'omubiri.
Obu ndimara eki, mmazire n'okubaha ebyasoroziibwe, ndibarabaho ningenda Sipaini.
Nimmanya obu ndibahikaho, ndiija nyina emigisa yoona eya Kristo.
Bagenzi bange, nimbeesengereza habwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, na habw'engonzi za Mwoyo, mwekambe hamu na nyowe munsabire hali Ruhanga,
nukwo ntabuke abataikiriza abali Buyudaaya, kandi ebyokukoonyera ebi ndukutwara Yerusaalemu bisiimwe abarukwera.
Nukwo Ruhanga obu alisiima, nsobole kwija owanyu n'omuhimbo, kandi ngarukwemu amaani obu ndiba ndi na inywe.
Ruhanga, endugirro y'obusinge, aikale na inywe inywena. Amiina.
Munyaanya-itwe Foibe, omuheerezakati ow'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza ba Kenkereya ngugwo, niimubakwasa.
Mumutangirre omu Mukama nkooku kisemeriire abantu ba Ruhanga. Mumukoonyere omu byona ebi arukubeetaagaho, habwokuba abaire mukoonyezi w'abaingi kandi na nyowe nyenka akankoonyera.
Mundamukize Pirisika n'Akwila, abakozi bagenzi bange omu kuheereza Kristo Yesu,
abaayehaireyo okutemwaho ebikya habw'okujuna obwomeezi bwange. Abantu abo tali nyowe nyenka arukubasiima, baitu nibasiimwa ebitebe byona eby'abaikiriza eby'omu Banyamahanga.
Mundamukize n'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza abeesorooleza omunju yabo. Mundamukize munywani wange Epaineto, ayabandize kuhindukira Kristo omu Asiya.
Mundamukize Mariya ayabatalibaniire muno.
Mundamukize Anderoniko na Yuniya ab'oruganda rwange kandi abanyankomo aba nkaba nkwasirwe nabo; bantu barangwa ibara omu bakwenda kandi nubo bambandize kwikiriza Kristo.
Mundamukize Ampulyato, munywani wange omu MUKAMA.
Mundamukize Urubano, omukozi mugenzi waitu omu kuheereza Kristo, hamu na Sitaaki munywani wange.
Mundamukize Apele arukusiimwa habw'okuheereza Kristo n'obwesige. Mundamukize ab'omu ka y'Arisitobulo.
Mundamukize na Herodiyoni ow'oruganda rwange. Mundamukize abantu ba MUKAMA abanyakuli omunju ya Narikiiso.
Mundamukize abakozi ba MUKAMA: Tirifeena na Tirifoosa. Mundamukize enganjani yange Paasa ayakoliire MUKAMA n'amaani.
Mundamukize Ruufo enganzi ya Mukama, mundamukize na nyina ayanfookiire mau.
Mundamukize Asinkurito, Fulegooni, Herume, Patiroba, Heruma, n'ab'oruganda abanyakuli hamu nabo.
Mundamukize Filoologo, Yuliya, Nerehu na munyaanya, kandi na Olimpa n'abantu ba Ruhanga boona abali hamu nabo.
Maramukyangane n'omwoyo omurungi nimugwangana omu kifuba. Ebitebe byona eby'abaikiriza Kristo nibabaramukya.
Bagenzi bange nimbeesengereza, mwerinde abo abarukwimukiriza empaka n'obulemeezi ebirukuhakaniza enyegesa ezi mwayegesiibwe; mubeetantale.
Habwokuba abantu abarukusisa bati, tibaheereza MUKAMA waitu Kristo, baitu baheereza enda zaabo; kandi babiihabiiha emitima y'abantu abataina magezi n'ebigambo byabo ebirungi kandi eby'akasiigo.
Obuhulizi bwanyu burangaanwa hoona, nikyo ndukwesiimira habwanyu. Ninyenda mube b'amagezi ha birungi kandi abatarukumanya bibi.
Nubwo Ruhanga, endugirro y'obusinge, alyanguha kusasangurra Sitaani hansi y'ebigere byanyu. Omugisa gwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo gube na inywe.
Timoteo, omukozi mugenzi wange, nabaramukya. Lukiyo, Yasooni, na Sosiipateri ow'oruganda rwange nabo nibabaramukya.
Nyowe Teretiyo, kihandiika ebbaruha enu, nimbaramukiza omu MUKAMA.
Gaayo arukundaaza kandi arukukunira ekitebe kyona eky'abaikiriza, naabaramukya. Erasito omukeeto w'orubuga na mugenzi waitu Kwarito nibabaramukya.
[Embabazi za MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo zikale na inywe inywena. Amiina.]
Ekitiinisa kibe hali Ogu arukusobora kubaha amaani ag'okukuraatira Amakuru Amarungi aga ndangirramu Yesu Kristo. Omu Makuru ago nuho hasuukulirwa ensita eyaserekerwe okuruga ira na ira,
baitu hati eyolekerwe kandi yamanyisibwa amahanga goona omu Bihandiiko by'abarangi, Ruhanga nkooku yaragiire, nukwo amahanga ago gaikirize kandi gahurre.
Ruhanga ow'amagezi goona, Uwe wenka aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro n'ebiro habwa Yesu Kristo! Amiina.
Nyowe Paulo, ayayesirwe kuba omukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, Ruhanga nkooku yagondeze, na mugenzi waitu Soositene,

nituhandiikira inywe ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza ruhanga abali Korinto, inywena abaayezibwe Kristo Yesu, baayetwa kuba bahikiriire, hamu n'abo boona abikiriza MUKAMA Yesu Kristo abe MUKAMA waabo kandi waitu.
Nitubagondeza embabazi n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Obutoosa ninsiima Ruhanga habwanyu, habw'embabazi ze ezi yabagiriire omu Kristo Yesu,
habwokuba omuli uwe nuho mwaihire byona. Byona ebi mwegesa n'ebi mumanya.
Byona ebi twabeegeseze hali Kristo bimazire kugumibwa omuli inywe.
Nahabweki tiharoho kisembo kyona eky'omwoyo eki mutaina, mukyategeriize okugaruka kwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Nuwe alibagumya okuhika ha mpero, musangwe mutaina musango ha kiro MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo eki aliiziramu.
Ruhanga ayabeesire kuteerana n'Omwana we Yesu Kristo MUKAMA waitu, aba mwesigwa.
Bagenzi bange, nimbeesengereza omu ibara lya MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, inywe mwikirranize, haleke kubaho okwebaganizaamu; baitu muteerane nimugamba kamu kandi nimwikirraniza.
Habwokuba abantu ab'owa Kilowe bammanyisize nkooku mwina empaka, bagenzi bange.
Eki ndukwoleka nikyo kinu: buli omu omuli inywe naagamba ati: “Nyowe ndi wa Paulo”, rundi: “Nyowe ndi w'Apolo”, ondi ati: “Nyowe ndi wa Keefa”, n'ondi ati: “Nyowe ndi wa Kristo.”
Mara Kristo abaganizibwamu? Paulo nuwe yabambirwe ha musaraba habwanyu? Rundi mukabatizibwa omu ibara lya Paulo?
Ninsiima Ruhanga habwokuba ntabatize n'omu omuli inywe, okwihaho Kirisipo na Gaayo,
haleke kubaho arukagamba ngu, mukabatizibwa omu ibara lyange.
(Egokwo, nkabatiza n'eka ya Sitefana. Okwihaho abo, tindukumanya obu haraaba haroho ondi weena ou nabatiize.)
Habwokuba Kristo atantume kubatiza; baitu akantuma okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi, ntarukubaza ebigambo eby'amagezi g'ensi, omusaraba gwa Kristo guleke kwihwaho obusobozi.
Isomo ly'omusaraba hali abarukuhwerekerra kiba ky'obudoma; baitu hali itwe abarukujunwa, nugo maani ga Ruhanga.
Habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Ndihwerekereza amagezi g'ab'amagezi, kandi ndimaraho okwetegereza kw'abarukwetegereza.”
Ow'amagezi araha? Omwegesa w'ebiragiro araha? Kalimpaka ow'obusinge bunu araha? Amagezi g'ensi Ruhanga atagafoole budoma?
Okuruga kara, Ruhanga nkooku yategekere, ab'ensi bakalemwa kumumanya habw'amagezi gaabu amaingi; baitu Ruhanga akasiima abaikiriza kubajunisa enyegesa yaitu ey'obudoma.
Habwokuba Abayudaaya bagonza ebihuniriza, kandi Abagiriiki baserra eby'amagezi,
baitu itwe twegesa Kristo ayabambirwe ha musaraba, Abayudaaya eki beeta kyesiitazo kandi Abanyamahanga eki beeta obudoma.
Baitu hali abo abarukwetwa Bayudaaya, noobu baraaba bali Bagiriiki, Kristo nuwe maani ga Ruhanga kandi magezi ge.
Habwokuba obudoma bwa Ruhanga bukira amagezi g'abantu; kandi n'obuceke bwa Ruhanga bukira amaani g'abantu.
Nahabweki bagenzi bange, mwijuke okwetwa kwanyu. Bake omuli inywe abakaba nibabarwa omu b'amagezi ab'ensi, noobwakubaire ab'obusobozi, rundi ab'enganda enkuru;
baitu Ruhanga akakoma abadoma b'ensi nukwo aswaze ab'amagezi. Ruhanga akakoma enceke z'ensi nukwo aswaze ab'amaani.
Akakoma abatali b'ekitiinisa, abarukugaywa omu nsi, n'abakaba batali b'omugaso, nukwo adibye abakaba bali b'omugaso;
haleke kubaho omuntu arukwenyumiza omu maiso ga Ruhanga.
Ruhanga nuwe ndugirro y'obwomeezi bwanyu omu Kristo Yesu ou yafoire magezi gaitu, buhikiriire bwaitu, kwera kwaitu n'okucungurwa kwaitu.
Nukwo kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ogu arukwenyumiza, leka ayenyumirize omu MUKAMA.”
Bagenzi bange, obu naizire owanyu, ntaije nimbarangirra ensita za Ruhanga omu bigambo ebi mutasobora kwetegereza.
Habwokuba nkamalirra kutamanya kindi kyona omuli inywe, kwihaho Yesu Kristo, ogu ayambambirwe ha musaraba.
Obu nahikire owanyu nkazooka ndi muceke, ninkyatiina, kandi nintukumira.
Orubazo rwange n'okwegeza kwange bikaba bitali by'amagezi ag'okusoonasoona abantu; baitu byayolekaga amaani ga Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Nukwo okwikiriza kwanyu kuleke kusigikira ha magezi g'abantu, baitu kusigikire ha maani ga Ruhanga.
Inywe abagumire omu kwikiriza, twina amagezi ag'okubacwera, noobu garaaba gatali g'obusinge bunu rundi g'abalemi ab'obusinge bunu abali b'okuhwaho.
Baitu itwe tumanyisa ensita ya Ruhanga kandi amagezi ge agaserekerwe, niyo ntegeka Ruhanga ei yataireho kutuhaisa ekitiinisa amahanga goona gatakahangirwe.
Busaho mulemi n'omu ow'obusinge bunu aragyetegeriize. Kakuba baagyetegeriize, tibaakubambire ha musaraba MUKAMA ow'ekitiinisa.
Baitu kikahandiikwa kiti: “Eriiso ebi litakaroraga, n'okutu ebi kutakahurraga, kandi n'ebitakataahaga omu mutima gw'omuntu, nibyo Ruhanga yateekaniriize abarukumugonza.”
Ebi, Ruhanga akabitusuukururra omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire, Habwokuba Mwoyo atindura buli kintu kyona noobu ziraaba ziri nsita za Ruhanga.
Muntu ki arukumanya ebiteekerezo by'ondi, kwihaho omutima gwa mukama wabyo? Nukwo kiti, busaho arukumanya ebiteekerezo bya Ruhanga kwihaho Mwoyo wa Ruhanga.
Itwe, tutaheebwe mwoyo w'ensi enu, baitu tukaheebwa Mwoyo anyakuruga hali Ruhanga, nukwo twetegereze ebisembo Ruhanga ebi yatugabiire.
Ebi nibyo tusoborra omu bigambo ebitaruga omu magezi g'abantu, baitu ebi twegesibwa Mwoyo. Abo abaina Mwoyo, tubasoborra amagezi ga Mwoyo.
Baitu omuntu ataina Mwoyo tatunga bisembo bya mwoyo wa Ruhanga. Abyeeta by'obudoma kandi tasobora kubyetegereza, habwokuba byetegerezibwa abaina mwoyo.
Anyakwina Mwoyo ayetegereza byona, baitu uwe tayetegerezibwa muntu weena.
“Nooha aramanyire ebiteekerezo bya MUKAMA, nooha si aramuhanuliire?” Baitu itwe tuteekereza ebiteekerezo bya Kristo.
Bagenzi bange, nyowe nkaba ntarukusobora kubeegesa nk'abantu abarukulemwa omwoyo, baitu nk'abarukulemwa omubiri, kandi abaana abato omu Kristo.
Nkabanywisa amata, bitali byokulya ebigumire; habwokuba mukaba mutakahikire kubirya: kandi na hati hoona timukahikire, ningira nimukyalemwa omubiri.
Obu muraaba mukyaina ihali n'empaka, timukyalemwa omubiri, nimukora nk'abantu kwonka?
Omu, obu agamba ati: “Nyowe ndi wa Paulo”, n'ondi ati: “Nyowe ndi w'Apolo”, muba mutakyali bantu kwonka?
Hati Apolo nuw'oha? Na Paulo nuw'oha? Bbo baheereza abaabaleetiire okwikiriza, buli omu MUKAMA nkooku yamuhaire.
Nyowe nkabyara, Apolo yaitirra amaizi, baitu Ruhanga nuwe akuza.
Nahabweki arukubyara n'arukwitirira tibali b'omugaso, kwihaho Ruhanga wenka anyakukuza.
Arukubyara n'arukwitirra nibainganaingana, kandi buli omu alisasurwa naalengerwa ha mulimo ogu yakozire.
Habwokuba tuli bakozi abarukukorra hamu na Ruhanga; inywe muli musiri gwa Ruhanga. Muli kyombeko kya Ruhanga.
Na nyowe nk'omwombeki ow'amagezi, habw'ekisembo Ruhanga yampaire, nkataho omusingi, ondi yagwombekaho. Leka buli muntu arukugwombekaho ayegendereze.
Habwokuba busaho musingi ogundi omuntu ogu asobora kutaho, kwihaho gunu ogwatairweho, nuwe Yesu Kristo.
Ha musingi ogu kakuba omuntu aimukizaho ekyombeko kya zaabbu, efeeza, amabaale g'omuhendo, emiti, obunyansi, rundi embuba
omulimo gwa buli omu gulirorwa; habwokuba omurro gw'Ekiro kya ha mpero gulyoleka omulimo gwa buli omu nkooku guli.
Ekyombeko omuntu eki yayombekere ha musingi obu kitaligwa, uwe alitunga empeera.
Baitu mukama w'ekyombeko ekirihya, alifeerwa; noobu alijunwa, baitu aliba nk'anyakurabire omu murro.
Timurukumanya nkooku muli Nju ya Ruhanga kandi Mwoyo wa Ruhanga nkooku aikara omuli inywe?
Weena anyakuhwerekereza Enju ya Ruhanga, nawe Ruhanga alimuhwerekereza; habwokuba Enju ye neeyera, kandi Enju egi ninywe.
Haleke kubabo weena arukwebiiha, obu haraaba haroho omuli inywe arukweyeta ow'amagezi omu businge bunu, leka afooke mudoma, nukwo hanyuma abe w'amagezi.
Habwokuba amagezi g'ensi enu, Ruhanga ageeta budoma. Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti:
“MUKAMA naamanya ebiteekerezo by'abanyamagezi nkooku bitarumu mugaso.”
Nahabweki haleke kubaho omuntu arukwenyumiriza omu bikorwa by'abantu. Habwokuba ebintu byona byanyu,
noobu araaba ali Paulo, rundi Apolo, rundi Keefa, rundi ensi yoona, rundi obwomeezi, rundi okufa, rundi ebiroho, rundi ebiriija, byona byanyu;
na inywe muli ba Kristo: kandi Kristo wa Ruhanga.
Inywe musemiriire kutumanya nkooku tuli baheereza ba Kristo kandi bakeeto b'ensita za Ruahanga.
Kandi ekikuru hali abakeeto nukwo okuba beesigwa.
Inywe kuncwera omusango rundi kugucwerwa Enkurato z'abantu, tinkifaaho muno. Na nyowe nyenka tinyecwera musango.
Timmanyire kintu eki ndukujunaanwa, baitu eki tikiri nikyo ekirukunyihaho musango. MUKAMA nuwe ancwera omusango.

Nahabweki mutalicwa emisango obwire butakahikire, MUKAMA atakagarukire, nuwe alimulika ebintu ebiserekerwe omu mwirima hati, kandi alyata ensita z'omutima. Obu nubwo Ruhanga alisiima buli muntu nkooku kimusemeriire.

Bagenzi bange, binu byona mbyebalizeeho kandi mbibalizeeho Apolo nukwo bibagasire. Na inywe mutwegereho mutarukuhingura ha Byahandiikirwe, haleke kubaho omuli inywe arukwenyumiza ngu, naagonza omukwenda omu kandi naagaya ondi.
Kiki eki orukukiza abandi? Kandi kiki eki oina eki otarahairwe? Obu oraaba wakihairwe, nooyenyumiriza ki nk'atarakihairwe?
Inywe timwina ekirukubabura! Mutungire byona ebi murukwenda! Mufookere balemi tutabakonyiire! Kakuba mwalemerekwo, twakusemiriirwe, na itwe twakulemere na inywe.
Baitu ningira ngu, itwe abakwenda Ruhanga akatuta enyuma y'abandi boona, nk'abantu abaacweriirwe omusango ogw'okufa, habwokuba tufookere eky'okusungwa ensi yoona, nitusungwa abamalaika n'abantu.
Itwe tuli basema habwa Kristo, baitu inywe muli b'amagezi omu Kristo. Itwe tuli baceke, baitu inywe muli b'amaani. Inywe nimuheebwa ekitiinisa, baitu itwe nitugaywa.
Okuhika na hati niturumwa enjara kandi twina iroho, tujwaire obutengo, nituterwa entomi, kandi titwina bwikaro,
nitutalibana, nitwekorra itwenka n'emikono yaitu. Obu batujuma, itwe tubasabira omugisa; obu batuhiiganiza, itwe tugumiisiriza;
obu batuhangirra, itwe tubagarukamu n'obuculeezi; n'okuhika hati tufookere ekinugwa omunsi kandi ekitagasa omu byona.
Binu byona timbihandiikire kubaswaza, baitu nimbahabura nk'abaana bange abagonzibwa.
Noobu muraaba mwina abarukubahabura baingi omu Kristo, baitu timwina baisiinywe baingi. Habwokuba ninyowe nafookere isiinywe omu Kristo Yesu habw'okubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi.
Nahabweki nimbeesengereza, mukwate engeso zange.
Nikyo nabatumiireho Timoteo, omwana wange omugonzibwa kandi omwesigwa omu MUKAMA, abaijukye emikorre yange omu Kristo, nkooku ndukugyegesa hoona omu bitebe by'abaikiriza.
Abamu nibeehemba nibagira ngu, owanyu tindukwijayo.
Baitu owanyu ndiijayo bwango, MUKAMA obu aliba agondeze; obu nubwo ndimanya abarukwehemba ebi barukukora, hatali ebi barukugamba bugamba.
Habwokuba obukama bwa Ruhanga tibuba omu bigambo bugambo, baitu buba omu bikorwa.
Nimwenda ki? Nyije n'omwigo, rundi nyije n'omutima gw'engonzi n'obuculeezi?
Nikigambwa ngu, mwina orwanju, kandi orwanju orw'omulingo ogutarukusangwa n'omu bakafiiri; habwokuba omusaija naateerana na muka-ise.
Kandi inywe nimwenyumiza! Timusemeriire kuganya? Omuntu ayakozire eki, asendwe.
Noobu ndaaba ntali na inywe oku, baitu tuli hamu omu mwoyo. Kandi na inywe, omuntu ayakozire ekibi eki, mmazire ira kumucwera omusango omu ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu.
Obu murabaga musorrokaine, ndaabaga na inywe mu mwoyo, nyina amaani ga MUKAMA waitu Yesu.
Omuntu ogu mumuheyo hali Sitaani, omubiri gwe guhwerekerre, nukwo omwoyo gwe gujunwe ha kiro kya MUKAMA Yesu.
Nimwenyumiririza busa. Timurukumanya ekitumbisa ekike nkooku kitumbisa ihyanga lyona?
Mwihemu ekitumbisa eky'obubi, nukwo mube mugaati omuhyaka ogutarumu kitumbisa ekya ira. Habwokuba Kristo, Omwana gw'Entaama ogw'Okuhingurwaho kwaitu, akatambwa.

Nahabweki katusemeze ekiro kikuru eky'obugenyi obw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho, tutaina kitumbisa ekya ira, noobu kyakuba ekitumbisa eky'itima n'obubi, baitu twina omugaati ogutatumbisiibwe, ogutarumu kamogo kandi gw'amananu.
Omu bbaruha yange nkabahandiikira nimbatanga kwikara n'abasiihani;
baitu ntagambe kwahukanira kimu n'abasiihani ab'omunsi munu abataikiriza, rundi ab'omukoijo, rundi abasuma, rundi abarukuramya abacwezi. Obu kyakubaire kiri kiti, mwakurugire omunsi munu.

Baitu eki nabahandiikiire nukwo kubatanga okwikara n'omuntu omwikiriza obu araaba ali musiihani, rundi w'omukoijo, rundi arukuramya embandwa, rundi omujumi, rundi omutamiizi, rundi omusuma-omuntu nk'ogu n'okulya mutalirya nawe.
Nyowe ninfaayo ki okucwera omusango abatali omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza? Abanyakuli omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza tinubo musemeriire kucwera omusango?
Ruhanga nuwe acwera omusango abatali omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza. Kikahandiikwa kiti; “Omuntu omubi mumubinge, abarugemu.”
Omuntu omu omuli inywe obu araaba aina eki arukujunaana mugenzi we, tikimukwasa nsoni kumunyegerra omu maiso g'abacwi b'emisango ab'ensi, kukira kumunyegerra omumaiso g'abarukwikiriza?
Timurukumanya abantu ba Ruhanga nkooku nubo balicwera ensi omusango? Kandi inywe obu muraaba muli b'okucwera ensi omusango, muraalemwa muta kucwa emisango enke nk'egi?
Timurukumanya nkooku tulicwera bamalaika omusango? Kandi emisango ey'ensi enu timwakugicwire kukiraho?
Obu muraaba mwina emisango nk'egi, habwaki mugitwarra abantu abakira kugaywa ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, nubo bagicwe?
Kinu ninkigamba kubakwasa ensoni. Kisoboka kita omuli inywe kuburamu muntu ow'amagezi arukusobora kuramura bagenzi be?
Baitu abaiseemu nibanyegerrangana, kandi nibanyegerrangana ha batali baikiriza.
Kunyegerrangana omu nkurato ez'ensi nikyoleka nkooku mulemerwe. Habwaki mutagumiisiriza kukorwa kubi? Habwaki mutaikiriza kugobezibwa?
Baitu inywe inywenka mukora kubi kandi mugobeza noobu baakuba bagenzi banyu.
Timurukumanya abagobya nkooku bataligwetwa omu bukama bwa Ruhanga? Muleke kubiihwabiihwa. Abanjuki, abaramya embandwa, abasiihani, abakuuhya,
abasuma, ab'omukoijo, abatamiizi, abajumi, rundi abanyagi tibaligwetwa omu bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Abamu omuli inywe nukwo mukaba muli muti. Baitu mukoogebwa, mwayezibwa, mwaihwaho omusango omu ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu Kristo n'omu Mwoyo wa Ruhanga waitu.
Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Ebintu byona ninyikirizibwa kubikora”, baitu tibiri byona ebirukugasa. “Ebintu byona ninyikirizibwa kubikora”, baitu tinyina na kimu eki ndukwemarraho.

“Ebyokulya bikategekerwa enda, kandi enda yategekerwa ebyokulya” baitu byombi: enda n'ebyokulya, Ruhanga alibihwerekereza. Omubiri gutahangirwe obusiihani, baitu gukahangirwa MUKAMA, kandi MUKAMA waitu nuwe MUKAMA w'omubiri.
Ruhanga ayahumbwire MUKAMA waitu, na itwe alituhumbuura n'obusobozi bwe.
Timurukumanya emibiri yanyu nkooku eba bicweka by'omubiri gwa Kristo? Hati ebicweka by'omubiri gwa Kristo ndabifoora nta bicweka by'omubiri gwa malaaya? Nikikafuuhe!
Timurukumanya ngu, omusaija anyakuteerana n'omukazi malaaya, bombi baba mubiri gumu? Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ababiri abo bafooke mubiri gumu.”
Kandi anyakuteerana na MUKAMA aba mwoyo gumu nawe.
Mwetantale obusiihani. Ebibi ebindi byona omuntu ebi akora tibisiisa mubiri gwe; baitu anyakusiihana asiisa omubiri gwe gwonyini.
Timurukumanya omubiri gwanyu nkooku guli Nju ya Mwoyo Ahikiriire anyakuli omuli inywe, Ruhanga ou yabahaire? Timuroho habwanyu inywenka;
mukagurwa omuhendo mukooto. Nahabweki muhe Ruhanga ekitiinisa omu mibiri yanyu.
Okugarukamu ebi mwampandikiire: kirungi omusaija kutakwatakwata mukazi.
Baitu habw'okwerinda ekyohyo ky'obusiihani buli musaija abe na mukazi we, kandi na buli mukazi abe namusaija we.
Omusaija asemeriire kuteerana na mukazi we, n'omukazi nukwo akole ati iba.
Habwokuba omukazi talema mubiri gwe wenka, baitu gulemwa iba. Omusaija nawe talema mubiri gwe wenka, baitu gulemwa mukazi we.
Muleke kwimangana, rundi buli mwikirraniize habw'akasumi, nukwo mwemarre ha kubaza na Ruhanga; baitu hanyuma mugaruke muteerane, Sitaani taikara kuboohya habw'obuceke bwanyu.
Kinu nkigambire nimbahabura, tikiri kiragiro.
Naakugondeze boona baikale nkooku ndi; baitu buli omu aina ekisembo Ruhanga eki yamuhaire, omu ky'omulingo gumu n'ondi ky'omulingo gundi.
Abataswire n'abataswirwe, hamu n'abafaakati nimbagambira nti: Kyakubaire kirungi baikale nka nyowe oku ndi.
Baitu obu baraaba batarukosobora kwerinda, baswere rundi baswerwe. Kirungi kuswera rundi kuswerwa okukira kutuntuzibwa okwegomba kw'omubiri.
Abaswire n'abaswirwe nimbaragira, tali nyowe baitu nimuragirwa MUKAMA: omukazi aleke kwahukana na iba
(baitu obu araaba ayahukaine nawe, aikale ataswirwe; kitali eki agarukanganemu na iba) kandi omusaija atalibinga mukazi we.
Abandi, ebi ndukubagambira byange, tibiri bya MUKAMA: Omukristo weena obu aba aina omukazi atarukwikiriza Ruhanga, omukazi ogu akacwamu kwikara nawe, aleke kumubinga.
Kandi omukazi weena obu aba aina iba atarukwikiriza Ruhanga, iba akacwamu kwikara nawe, omukazi ogu atalyahukana na iba.
Habwokuba omusaija atarukwikiriza Ruhanga ayezibwa habwa mukazi we, kandi omukazi atarukwikiriza Ruhanga ayezibwa habwa iba. Kakuba kitarabaire kiti, abaana banyu tibakweziibwe; baitu hati beezibwe.

Omu ha babiri atarukwikiriza Ruhanga, obu araaba naagonza kwahukana, leka ayahukane. Omu kintu nk'eki, omusaija omukristo rundi omukazi omukristo baba batakyabohwa; habwokuba Ruhanga akatweta twikale omu businge.
Mukazi iwe noomanya ota nkooku otalijuna baro? Na iwe musaija, noomanya ota nkooku otalijuna mukazi wawe?
Leka buli muntu aikale omu mulingo MUKAMA ogu yamuteekaniriize, kandi Ruhanga ogu yamwetiiremu. Nukwo nyegesa nti ebitebe byona eby'abaikiriza Ruhanga.
Haroho omuntu ayayesirwe amazire kusarwa? Aleke kwesisaniza nk'atarasazirwe. Haroho omuntu ayayesirwe atakasazirwe? Aleke kwegomba kusarwa.
Okusarwa n'okutasarwa tikwina mugaso, baitu ekikuru nukwo kukwata ebiragiro bya Ruhanga.
Buli muntu aikale omu mulingo ogu yayetiirwemu.
Okaba oli mwiru obu wayesirwe? Tikiri kigambo. Baitu obu oraaba noosobora kutunga obugabe, haakire obutunge. Habwokuba MUKAMA ou yayesire ali mwiru, nuwe MUKAMA aha obugabe.
Nikyo kimu, n'ogu ou yayesire ali w'obugabe, afooka mwiru wa Kristo.
Mukagurwa omuhendo mukooto; muleke kuba bairu b'abantu.
Nahabweki bagenzi bange, leka buli muntu aikale omumaiso ga Ruhanga omu mulingo ogu yayetiirwemu.
Ebirukukwata ha bataswire n'abataswirwe, tinyina kiragiro kya MUKAMA. Baitu nimbahabura nk'omuntu ou musemeriire kwesiga habw'embabazi MUKAMA yangiriire.
Obu ndukurora obulemeezi obuli omumaiso, ninteekereza: kirungi omuntu aikale nkooku ali.
Okateeranizibwa n'omukazi? Leka kwahukana nawe. Tokaswire mukazi? Leka kuswera.
Baitu kakuba oswera nooba otakozire kibi. Kandi omwisiki kakuba aswerwa, nawe aba atakozire kibi. Baitu abarukuswerangana balibona obulemeezi omunsi munu; eki naakugondeze kukibajuna.
Bagenzi bange, eki ndukubagambira nkinu: akasumi akaatairweho kaagenda nikairra haihi. Okuruga hati abaina abakazi baikale nk'abatainabo;
n'abo abarukuganya baikale nk'abatarukuganya; n'abarukusemererwa baikale nk'abatarukusemererwa; n'abarukusuubura baikale nk'abataina by'okusuubura;
kandi abarukukozesa ebintu by'ensi, baleke kubimarraho omutima. Habwokuba omulingo gw'ensi nkooku eri nigwija kuhwaho.
Tindukwenda mwikale nimutuntura. Ataina mukazi ata omutima ha bya MUKAMA, kukora ebi araasiima;
baitu omusaija aina omukazi ata omutima ha by'ensi, kukora ebiraasiimwa mukazi we,

nahabweki omutima gwe guli hanu na hali. Kandi omukazi ataswirwe rundi omwisiki empikirre atunturra ebya MUKAMA nkooku araikara asemiire omu mubiri n'omu mwoyo; baitu omukazi anyakuswirwe atunturra eby'ensi, kukora ebiraasiimwa iba.
Kinu ninkibagambira habw'okubagasa, tindukugenderra kubaboha, baitu kubooleka ekirukukira oburungi, nukwo muheereze MUKAMA n'omutima gumu.
Omusaija ataswire arukuhurra nkooku atarukusobora kwerinda omwisiki ou arukukora nawe kandi tarukusobora kulema omubiri gwe, akole ekihikire. Haakire baswerangane, eki tikiri kibi.
Baitu weena anyakwina omutima ogugumire, ataina ekirukumuhambiriza kuswera, naalema omubiri gwe kandi acwiremu wenka kutamuswera, naaba akozire kurungi.
Nahabweki obu aswera omwisiki ogu akora kurungi, kandi obu atamuswera aba akizireho kukora kurungi.
Omukazi abohwa hali iba, omusaija atakafiire. Iba kakuba afa, omukazi aina obugabe kuswerwa omusaija weena ou agondeze, baitu omu MUKAMA.
Nyowe nkooku ndukurora, kakuba aikara nkooku ali kyakukizire oburungi. Kandi ninteekereza nti: Na nyowe nyebembirwe Mwoyo wa Ruhanga.
Ebirukukwata ha byokulya ebihongiirwe embandwa, ebi itwena nitubimanya habwokuba “Twina amagezi”, nkooku murukugamba. Baitu “Amagezi” ago galeeta emyehembo; okugonza nukwo kwombeka.
Anyakuteekereza ngu, aina eki amanyire, aba atakamanyire nkooku kimusemeriire.
Baitu anyakugonza Ruhanga, nuwe amanywa Ruhanga.
Hati nu, ha kulya ebihongiirwe embandwa, nitumanya “embandwa nkooku zitarohokwo”, kandi “Tiharoho Ruhanga ondi, kwihaho omu wenka.”
Noobu haraaba haroho abarukwetwa baruhanga omwiguru rundi omu nsi mazimakwo haroho bingi ebirukwetwa “baaruhanga” rundi “embandwa”,
baitu habwaitu haroho Ruhanga omu, Isiitwe, endugirro yaitu kandi ey'ebintu byona, na MUKAMA omu Yesu Kristo nambere ebihangwa byona byarugire, na itwe nambere twiha obwomeezi.
Baitu amagezi ago, boona tibainago. Abamu, habw'okumanyiira embandwa, nibakyalya ebyokulya ebihongerwe; kandi emitima yabo habw'okusangwa eri miceke eyesiitara.
Ebyokulya tinibyo bitusiimisa Ruhanga. Okutalya ebyokulya tikitufeereza kantu, kandi okulya tikitwongeraho kantu.
Kyonka mwerinde, obugabe bwanyu butaliikara kwesiitaza abaceke.
Kakuba omuntu naakurora, iwe arukwetegereza, oikaliire omu kibbali noolya, kandi asangirwe ali muceke omu mutima gwe, nawe tarukwija kutwalirizibwa okulya ebihongiirwe embandwa?
Nukwo habw'amagezi gaawe, mugenzi waitu omuceke Kristo ou yafeeriire, ahwerekerra.
Kusiisa oti bagenzi bawe noosiitaza emitima yabo emiceke, oba okozire ekibi hali Kristo.
Nahabweki ebyokulya obu biraaba nibireetereza mugenzi wange kugwa, nyowe tindirya nyama ebiro byona, ndeke kunaga mugenzi wange omu kibi.
Tindi w'obugabe? Tindi mukwenda? Ntarole Yesu Mukama waitu?
Tali nyowe ayabakulize omu MUKAMA? Ha bandi noobu ndaaba ntali mukwenda, baitu hali inywe ndi mukwenda; habwokuba muli kyokurorraho ky'obukwenda bwange omu MUKAMA.
Okwetonganirra kwange hali abo abarukunkaguza nukwo kunu:
Tituli b'okuheebwa ebyokulya n'ebyokunywa?
Titurukwikirizibwa kugenda n'omukazi munyaanyaitwe omu Yesu nk'abakwenda abandi, n'abagenzi ba MUKAMA na Keefa oku bakora?
Rundi nyowe na Baranaba niitwe itwenka abaragirwa kwekorra eby'okutukoonyera?
Nooha akora obuserikale, akeegurra byona ebi arukwetaaga? Nooha abyara orugonjo, atalya ha biruga omu rugonjo oru? Nooha aliisa igana, atanywa ha mata gaalyo?
Nimugira binu nimbigambisibwa obusobozi bwange? Ebiragiro nabyo tinukwo bigamba biti?
Kikahandiikwa omu Biragiro bya Musa kiti: “Omuntu arukukugesera, aikirizibwa kutwara ha buro.” Aho nimugira Ruhanga naagamba ha bagesi bonka?
Tarukukigamba hali itwe itwena? Eki kikahandiikwa habwaitu, habwokuba omulimi alima naanihira kutunga, kandi omugesi agesa naanihira kutwaraho ebi arukugesa.
Itwe obu turaaba twabasigiremu eby'omwoyo, nikiremeera kubatungamu eby'okukoonyera omubiri?
Abandi obu baraaba babainaho obusobozi obu, kandi itwe turaasura ki? Noobu turaaba twina obusobozi obu, tutabukozese; baitu tukagumiisiriza byona nukwo tuleke kutanga Amakuru Amarungi aga Kristo.
Timurukumanya abo abakora omunju ya Ruhanga nkooku balya ha by'omu Nju ya Ruhanga? N'abo abaheereza ha Itambiro nkooku balya ha byonzira ebihongerwe?
Na MUKAMA waitu nukwo yaragiire ati: Abo abarangirra Amakuru Amarungi, baliisibwege ha by'Amakuru Amarungi.
Baitu nyowe tinkakozesaaga busobozi obu, kandi binu timbihandiikire nukwo mubinkorre. Haakire nfe, hatabaireho muntu anyihaho kinu eki ndukwenyumirizaamu.
Obu ndaaba nindangirra Amakuru Amarungi, eki tikirukundeetera kwenyumiza. Habwokuba ogu nugwo mulimo gwange mali. Ninkanyagwe kakuba ntarangirra Amakuru Amarungi!
Kakuba ngarangirra nkyegondiize nyenka, empeera yange nimba ngitungire; kakuba ngarangirra nk'ayatumirwe, buli mba ninkora omulimo ogu nakwasiibwe.
Obu, empeera yange neeha? Niyo enu: Nukwo kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi ntarukuheebwa kantu kandi ntarukukozesa busobozi obu nahairwe Makuru Amarungi.
Noobu ndaaba ntarukulemwa muntu weena, nkeefoora mwiru wa boona, nukwo mpindule baingi kukiraho.
Omu Bayudaaya nkeefoora nk'Omuyudaaya nukwo mpindule Abayudaaya. Hali abarukulemwa Ebiragiro bya Musa nkeefoora nk'arukulemwa Ebiragiro-kandi kunu tibirukundema-nukwo mpindule abarukulemwa Ebiragiro.
Hali abo abatarukulemwa Biragiro, nkaba ndi nk'atarukulemwa Biragiro-tikuli kugamba ngu, tindemwa Biragiro bya Ruhanga, baitu ndemwa ebiragiro bya Kristo nukwo mpindule abatarukulemwa Biragiro.
Omu baceke nkeefoora muceke, nukwo mpindule abaceke. Nkeesisaniza abantu boona omu bintu byona, nukwo nsobole kujuna abamu omuli bo.
Ebi byona mbikora habw'Amakuru Amarungi, nukwo na nyowe mbaganeho emigisa yago.
Timurukumanya omu mpaka z'okwiruka kaliitango, abairuki boona nkooku bairuka kwo; baitu anyakutunga ekisembo aba omu? Nahabweki mwiruke, nukwo mukitunge.
Buli muzaani ayemanyiiza kwetanga omu bintu byona. Eki, bakikora habw'okutunga ekondo erukuhwaho, baitu itwe tutunga ekondo etarukuhwaho.
Na nyowe tinyiruka ntaina eki ndukugenderra, kandi tinteera ntomi nk'arukuteera amasa;
baitu nsaalize omubiri gwange, kandi ngulema, nukwo obu ndimara kurangirra abandi, ntaliija kubarwa nk'atahikire.
Bagenzi bange ningonza mwijuke baisenkuruitwe nkooku baayebemberwaga Ekicu omwirungu, kandi boona nkooku baarabire omu Nyanja,
kandi boona nkooku baabatiriziibwe omu kicu eki n'omu Nyanja bakwataniize na Musa.
Kandi bakalya ekyokulya ky'embaganiza
boona bakanywa n'amaizi ag'embaganiza. Bbo baanywaga ha mwandara ogu ogwagendaga nabo, kandi Omwandara ogu akaba ali Kristo.
Noobu kiraaba kyabaire kiti, baitu baingi omuli bo batasiimwe Ruhanga kandi bakahwerekerezibwa omwirungu.
Hati ebi byona by'okutuhabura, tuleke kwegomba ebibi abaisenkuru itwe nkooku baakozire.
Muleke kuramya embandwa nk'abamu omuli bo oku baakozire. Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Abantu bakaikarra kulya n'okunywa, kandi baimuka kucekeca.”
tuleke kweha obusiihani nk'abamu omuli bo oku baakozire, haafa abantu emitwaro ebiri n'enkumi isatu kiro kimu.
Tuleke kujwahya MUKAMA nk'abamu omuli bo oku baakozire, baahwerekerizibwa enjoka;
kandi tuleke kuhyema nk'abamu omuli bo oku baakozire baamarwaho Omuhwerekereza.
