Hati ebi byona bikabaho nk'ekyokurorraho, kandi byahandiikwa kwegesa itwe abaroho biro binu ebya ha mpero.
Nahabweki arukuteekereza nkooku ayemeriire, ayerinde atagwa.

Busaho kyohyo ekirabaiziire ekitahikaho abantu boona. Ruhanga mwesigwa, taliikiriza ebyohyo ebibahinguraine kubahikaho, baitu omu kwohebwa nk'oku alibaha amagezi ag'okisingura nukwo musobole okugumiisiriza.
Bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, mwetantale kuramya embandwa.
Nimbahabura nk'abantu abarukwetegereza. Inywe mwecweremu inywenka amazima g'eki ndukugamba.
Ekikopo eki tusabira omugisa, tinukwo okubagana ha sagama ya Kristo? Omugaati ogu tucwamu, tinukwo okubagana ha mubiri gwa Kristo?
Omugaati nkooku guli gumu, na itwe abaingi tuba mubiri gumu, habwokuba itwena tubagana ha mugaati gumu.
Mwetegereze emirwa y'Abaisirairi: abalya ebyonzira ebihongerwe, tinubo abaina obukwatane na Ruhanga anyakuramibwa?
Obu, nimba ningamba ki? Nimugira ngamba nti: Ebihongiirwe embandwa nakyo kintu kiri aho? Rundi nti: Embandwa erohokwo?
Nangwa, eki ndukugamba nikyo kinu: Abakafiiri ebi bahonga, babihongera embandwa, tibabihongera Ruhanga. Tindukugonza inywe mweteerane n'embandwa.
Timusobora kunywa ha kikopo kya MUKAMA, kandi na ha nkooba y'embandwa. timusobora kulya ha kiihuro kya MUKAMA kandi na ha buro bw'embandwa.
Obu, MUKAMA titurukumwendereza? Niitwe turukumukiza amaani?
“Ebintu byona nibiikirizibwa”, baitu tibiri byona by'omugaso. “Ebintu byona nibiikirizibwa”, baitu tibiri byona birukugumya ekitebe.
Buli muntu aleke kweserurra ebye, baitu aserre n'ebirukugasira mutaahi we.
Kyona ekitundwa omu katale k'enyama mukirye n'omutima gumu, mutarukugurukyagurukya.
Habwokuba: “ensi n'ebigirumu byona bya MUKAMA”.
Kakuba omu ha baikiriza Ruhanga abaraaliza ha bugenyi, mukaikiriza kugendayo, mulye kyona eki babasemberiize mutarukugurukyagurukya.
(Baitu omuntu kakuba naabamanyisa ati: “Ekintu kinu kihongerwe”, muleke kukirya, tihali habwanyu baitu habw'ogu abamanyisize.
Eki tindukukigamba habw'oburungi bw'emitima yanyu, baitu habw'oburungi bw'omutima gw'ogu.) Mara habwaki nyigamira ebiteekerezo by'omuntu ondi?
Obu ndaaba nindya ninsiima Ruhanga, nimpyemererwa ki habw'ekindukulya mmazire kusiima?
Nukwo nu, obu muraabaga nimulya rundi ninumywa rundi nimukora ebintu ebindi byona, mubikolege habw'okuhaisa Ruhanga ekitiinisa.
Mutalibiihiza Abayudaaya, rundi Abagiriiki, rundi ebitebe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga.
Mukole nka nyowe oku ndengaho kukyanganura abantu boona omu buli kintu eki nkora, ntarukuserra eby'okungasira nyenka, baitu eby'okugasira abaingi nukwo bajunwe.
Munkuraatire nka nyowe oku nkuraatira Kristo.
Nimbasiima habwokuba nimunyijuka omu buli kintu kyona, kandi nimukwata ebigambo byange nkooku nabibeegeseze.
Baitu ninyenda mwetegereze Kristo nkooku ali mutwe gwa buli muntu weena. Omutwe gw'omukazi nuwe iba, kandi omutwe gwa Kristo nuwe Ruhanga.
Omusaija weena arukusaba rundi arukuranga ebya Ruhanga aswekeriire omutwe gwe, ahemura Kristo.
Kandi omukazi arukusaba rundi arukuranga ataswekeriire omutwe gwe, nawe ahemura iba-nk'omukazi anyakuramya amwire omutwe gwe, nawe ahemura iba-nk'omukazi anyakuramya amwire omutwe gwe.
Kakuba omukazi ayanga kweswekerra, haakire asale isoke rye; baitu okusara isoke rundi kulimwa obu kiraaba nikimuhemura, kirungi ayeswekerre.
Omusaija, uwe tasemeriire kuswekerra omutwe gwe, habwokuba nuwe kisisani kandi kitiinisa kya Ruhanga; baitu omukazi aba kitiinisa kya iba.
(Habwokuba omusaija Ruhanga atamwihe omu mukazi, baitu omukazi nuwe yaihirwe omu musaija.
Kandi omusaija atahangirwe mukazi, baitu omukazi nuwe yahangiirwe omusaija.)
Nahabweki omukazi asemeriire kuswekerra omutwe gwe, habw'abamalaika abaroho.
(Baitu omu ntegeka ya MUKAMA waitu, omukazi taikaraho hataroho musaija; omusaija nawe taikaraho hataroho mukazi.
Omukazi nkooku yaihirwe omu musaija, omusaija nawe hati azaarwa omukazi; kandi bombi baruga hali Ruhanga.)
Na inywe mwecweremu inywenka, nikihika omukazi kusaba Ruhanga ateeswekeriire omutwe?
Obuhangwa bwonka tiburukwoleka okukuza muno isoke nkooku kihemura omusaija?
Baitu omukazi kulikuza kiba kitiinisa kye. Habwokuba akaheebwa isoke limuswekerre.
Obu haraaba haroho omuntu arukwenda kuteera empaka, itwe titwina kindi eki tumanyire, noobu haakuba omu bitebe ebindi by'abaikiriza Ruhanga.
Hali binu ebi ndukubahabura, tindukubasiima, habwokuba okwesorooza kwanyu tikurugwamu oburungi baitu kurugwamu obubi.
Eky'okubanza, obu musorrokana nk'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga, mpurra nkooku mwebaganizaamu. Eki na nyowe obundi nkiikiriza.
Ego okwebaganizaamu kusemeriire kubeho omuli inywe, nukwo ab'a mazima bamanywe.
Obu mwesorooza, ekiihuro kya MUKAMA tinikyo muba nimulya.
Habwokuba obu muba nimulya, buli muntu alya ebyokulya bye atalinzire abandi, kandi omu aba naarumwa enjara, ondi atamiire.
Mahano! Timugira maju ag'okuliiramu n'ag'okunyweramu? Rundi nimugaya ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, nimuswaza muti abataina kantu? Mbagambe ki? Mbasiime? Nangwa, tindukubasiima.
Habwokuba ebi nahairwe MUKAMA, na nyowe nibyo nabeegeseze nti: MUKAMA Yesu ha kiro eki yagoberiziibweho, akakwata omugaati,
obu yamazire kusiima, yagucwamu naagamba ati: “Gunu nugwo mubiri gwange oguraaheebwayo habwanyu. Kinu mukikolege okunyijuka.”
Omu mulingo nugwo gumu obu baamazire kulya, yakwata ekikopo nagamba ati: “Ekikopo kinu nikyo kiragaano ekihyaka eky'esagama yange. Kinu mukikolege, obu muraakanywaga, munywege nimunyijuka.”
Bwona obu muraalyaga omugaati gunu mukanywa ha kikopo kinu, muraamanyisaaga okufa kwa MUKAMA okuhika obu aliija.
Nahabweki weena araalyaga omugaati gunu, rundi akanywa ha kikopo kya MUKAMA atasemeriire, alisingwa omusango ogw'okusiisa omubiri gwa MUKAMA n'esagama ye.
Nukwo nu, buli muntu ayerole atakaliire ha mugaati ogu kandi atakanywire ha kikopo eki.
Habwokuba weena anyakulya kandi akanywa atarukwetegereza mubiri gwa MUKAMA, ayeriira kandi ayenywera wenka omusango.
Baingi omuli inywe nikyo barukucekera kandi nikyo barukurwarra, kandi abamu bafiire.
Kakuba twecwera itwenka omusango omu mazima, titwakugucweriirwe MUKAMA.
Baitu MUKAMA obu atucwera omusango, atufubira; nukwo tuleke kusingwa omusango hamu n'ab'ensi.
Nahabweki bagenzi bange, obu muraayesoroozaaga kulya, mulindanganege
omuntu weena obu araabaga naarumwa enjara, alyege omuka ye-okwesorooza kwanyu kutaliikara kurugwamu emisango. Ebindi ndibibamanyisa obu ndiija.
Bagenzi bange, ninyenda mumanye ebirukukwata ha bisembo ebigabwa mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Mumanyire ngu, obu mukaba mukyali bakafiiri, mwatwarwaga embandwa ezitagamba, nizo zaabahabisaaga.

Nahabweki ningonza mumanye nkooku hataroho muntu n'omu aragambisiibwe Mwoyo wa Ruhanga ati: “Yesu akyenwe!” Kandi busaho muntu asobora kugamba ati: “Yesu nuwe MUKAMA”, rundi buli akigambisibwe Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Haroho ebisembo eby'emiringo nyingi, baitu Mwoyo Ahikiriire ali omu;
kandi haroho obuheereza bw'emiringo nyingi, baitu MUKAMA ali omu;
Kandi haroho emirimo ey'emiringo nyingi, baitu Ruhanga ali omu anyakukozesa ebisembo ebi byona omu boona.
Kandi buli omu Mwoyo amuha ekisembo eky'okugasira boona.
Omu, Mwoyo amuha kubaza eby'amagezi; ondi Mwoyo ogu omu, amuha okwetegerezesa abandi.
Ondi Mwoyo amuha okwikiriza, ondi amuha ekisembo ky'okutamba endwara.

Ondi Mwoyo amuha okukora ebyamahano, ondi okuranga ebya Ruhanga, ondi amagezi g'okwahurana emyoyo emirungi n'emibi, ondi ekisembo ky'okubaza endimi nyingi nkooku Mwoyo aba amuhaire, kandi ondi kusoborra amakuru g'endimi ezi.
Ebi byona bikorwa Mwoyo ogu omu, anyakugabira buli muntu nkooku agonza.
Omubiri nkooku guli gumu, gwina n'ebicweka bingi, kandi ebicweka ebi byona noobu biraaba biri bingi, baitu guba mubiri gumu, na Kristo nawe nukwo ali ati,
Habwokuba itwena tukabatizibwa mwoyo omu, twafooka mubiri gumu-Abayudaaya n'Abagiriiki, abairu n'ab'obugabe-itwena tukanywisibwa ha mwoyo omu.
Habwokuba omubiri tigugira kicweka kimu, baitu bingi.
Kakuba ekigere nikigamba kiti: “Nyowe habw'okutaba mukono, habweki tindi kicweka ky'omubiri,” eki tikikitanga kuba kicweka ky'omubiri.
Kandi okutu kakuba nikugamba kuti: “Nyowe habw'okutaba liiso, habweki tindi kicweka ky'omubiri,” eki tikikutanga kuba kicweka ky'omubiri.
Kakuba omubiri gwona gwabaire liiso, omuntu yakuhuliriire nkaha? Kakuba omubiri gwona gwabaire kutu, omuntu yakukagiire nkaha?
Baitu nkooku kiri, Ruhanga akateekaniza ebicweka by'omubiri, buli kimu yakiha ekiikaro kyakyo nkooku yagondeze.
Ebicweka byona kakuba byabaire kicweka kimu, omubiri gwakurugire nkaha?
Na hati ebicweka biri bingi, baitu omubiri guli gumu.
Eriiso tirisobora kugambira omukono liti: “Tindukukwetaaga”; rundi omutwe kugambira ebigere guti: “Tindukubeetaaga”.
Baitu ebicweka by'omubiri ebizooka nk'ebitaina maani, nibyo bikira kwetaagwa.
Kandi ebicweka by'omubiri ebibarwa nk'ebitaina kitiinisa, nibyo tukira kuha ekitiinisa. Kandi ebicweka byaitu ebitukwasa ensoni, nibyo tukira kujweka;
baitu ebicweka byaitu ebikira oburungi, tibyetaaga kujwekwa. Ruhanga, omubiri nukwo yagutegekere ati: Ebicweka ebitaina kitiinisa nibyo aha ekitiinisa okukira ebindi,
nukwo omu mubiri haleke kubamu okutaikirraniza, baitu ebicweka byona bikoonyerangane.
Ekicweka kimu kakuba kisaasa, byona bisaasira hamu. Ekicweka kimu kakuba kiheebwa ekitiinisa, byona bisemerererwa hamu.
Hati nu inywe muli mubiri gwa Kristo, buli omu kicweka kyagwo.

Ruhanga, omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza, akabanza kutamu abakwenda, yagarraho abarangi, yayongeraho ebeegesa, hanyuma abakozi b'ebyamahano, yataho n'abakiza endwara, n'abakoonyezi, n'abalemi, n'abarukubaza endimi ezitali zimu.
Abo boona bakwenda? Boona barangi? Boona beegesa? Boona bakora ebyamahano?
Boona baina ebisembo by'okutamba endwara? Boona babaza endimi? Boona basoborra amakuru g'endimi?
Baitu mute emitima yanyu ha kuserra ebisembo ebirukukira oburungi. Nanyowe ninyija kubooleka omuhanda ogurukukirra kimu endi yoona.
Noobu nkubaza endimi z'abantu n'ez'abamalaika, baitu ntaina kugonza ninsisana ekide ekirukugamba rundi enjogera ezirukujaara.

Noobu nkuba nyina obusobozi bw'okuranga ebya Ruhanga, kandi ninyetegereza ensita ze zoona, nyina n'amagezi goona; noobu naakuba nyina okwikiriza kwona okw'okwihaho ensozi kunu ntaina kugonza, tindi kantu.
Noobu naakugabira abanaku byona ebi nyinabyo, noobu naakuhayo omubiri gwange kwokebwa, kunu ntaina kugonza, tingasirwa kantu.
Okugonza kugumiisiriza kandi kugira embabazi; okugonza tikugira ihali noobu kwakuba kwenyumiza;
tikwehaisa kandi tikugira kiniga. Okugonza tikweserurra ebyakwo; tikubiihirwa, tikwikaza nzigu ha mutima;
tikusiima ebitahikire, baitu kusiima ebihikire.
Okugonza kugumira byona, kwikiriza byona, kunihira byona, kugumiisiriza byona.
Okugonza tikuhwaho. Oburangi, bwo bulihwaho; okubaza endimi, nakwo kulihwaho; n'okumanya kulihwaho.
Habwokuba okumanya kwaitu kuke, kandi n'oburangi bwaitu nabwo tibuhikire;
ebihikire obu biriija, ebitahikire birihwaho.
Obu nkaba ndi mwana naabazaaga nk'omwana, naateekerezaaga nk'omwana, naacwamuga nk'omwana; baitu obu nakuzire, naleka eby'obuto.

Hati niturorra omu ndolerwamu, tutarukuhweza kurungi; baitu omu kasumi ako, tuliroranganira kimu. Hati nimmanyaho ekicweka; baitu omu kasumi ako, ebi ndibyetegerereza kimu, nyowe nkooku nyetegererezibwe kimu.
Habweki nihaikaraho bisatu: okwikiriza, okunihira, n'okugonza; baitu ekirukukira byona nukwo kugonza.
Mute omutima ha ngonzi, kandi mugondeze kimu ebisembo ebigabwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, okukira muno eky'oburangi.
Habwokuba anyakubaza endimi, tabaza na bantu, baitu abaza na Ruhanga. Busaho muntu amwetegereza, kandi eby'ensita ebi agamba abigambisibwa Mwoyo.
Baitu anyakuranga ebya Ruhanga, aba naagambira abantu eby'okubagumya, okubatamu amaani, n'okubahuumuza.
Anyakubaza endimi ayegasira wenka; baitu anyakuranga, aba naagasira ekitebe ky'abaikiriza.

Inywena ningonza mubaze endimi, baitu eki ndukukira kugonza, murange ebya Ruhanga. Ogu anyakuranga, w'ekitiinisa okukira arukubaza endimi, rundi buli haroho ondi arukusoborra, nukwo ekitebe ky'abaikiriza kigasirwe.
Hati bagenzi bange, obu ndiija owanyu nimbaza endimi, ndibagasira ki kakuba ntabooleka ebimu ebi nasuukulirwe, ebi nkudukumanya, ebi ndukuranga, rundi ebi ndukwegesa?
Ebintu ebiteerwa, nk'endere rundi endongo, ebintu ebitaina bwomeezi, kakuba bitaahukanizaamu maraka gaabyo, omuntu alimanya ata ekirukuteerwa?
Kandi engwara kakuba egamba iraka eritarukuhulirwa kurungi, muntu ki arayeteekaniza kuramaga?
Na hali inywe nukwo kiri kiti, kakuba mubaza omu ndimi ezitarukwetegerezibwa, omuntu araakenga ata? Muliba nimubaliza omuyaga.
Mazimakwo omunsi yoona harumu endimi nyingi ezitarukusisana, kandi busaho na rumu orutaina makuru;
baitu kakuba ntamanya amakuru g'orulimi, mba ndi munyaihanga hali ogu arukubaza, nawe aba ali munyaihanga hali nyowe.
Na hali inywe nukwo kiri kiti: Nkooku murukwegomba ebisembo ebigabwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, mwitanire muno ebi ebirukugasira ekitebe ky'abaikiriza.
Nahabweki ogu arukubaza endimi, asemeriire kusaba Ruhanga, nukwo aheebwe obusobozi bw'okusoborra ebi arukubaza.
Kakuba nsaba Ruhanga omu ndimi, omwoyo gwange gusaba, baitu amagezi gange tigagasirwa.
Hati nkole ki? Ndaasaba omu mwoyo n'omu magezi; kandi ndaazina omu mwoyo n'omu magezi.
Obu oraaba noosiima Ruhanga omu mwoyo honka, omuntu atarukwikiriza asobora ata kukugarukamu: “Amiina”, habw'ebi osiiimire?
Mazimakwo osobora kuba noosiima kurungi, baitu ondi tarukugasirwa.
Nyowe ninsiima Ruhanga, habwokuba inywena nimbakira kubaza endimi;
baitu nabwo omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza naakugondeze kubaza ebigambo bitaano n'amagezi gange, nukwo nsobole kwegesa abandi, okukira kubaza ebigambo omutwaro omu rulimi orutarukwetegerezibwa.
Bagenzi bange, muleke kuteekereza nk'abaana, baitu muteekereze nk'abakuru; kyonka ha bibi musisane abaana bato.
Omu Biragiro bya Musa kikahandikwa kiti: “Abantu banu ndibagambirra omu ndimi ezitamanyirwe n'omu kanwa k'abanyamahanga; baitu nabwo tibalimpuliriza. Nukwo MUKAMA agambire ati.”
Endimi, zo karorwaho k'okukoonyera abatarukwikiriza, baitu tikali k'okukoonyera abaikiriza. Kandi okuranga ebya Ruhanga karorwaho k'okukoonyera abaikiriza, baitu tikali habw'abatarukwikiriza.
Kakuba ekitebe kyona eky'abaikiriza byesorooza, boona bakabaza endimi, abantu ab'aheeru rundi abatarukwikiriza bakataahamu, tibarukwija kugamba ngu, mugwire iraro?
Baitu boona kakuba baba nibaranga ebya Ruhanga, kandi omuntu atarukwikiriza rundi ow'aheeru akataahamu, ebigambo byabu byona bimurumiriza kandi bimusingisa omusango,
ensita ez'omu mutima gwe isuukurwa; nubwo alijuumara ha nsi, aramye Ruhanga, kandi ayatule nkooku mwinakwo Ruhanga.
Bagenzi bange, hati tukole tuta? Obu mwesorooza hamu, omu aimukya ekizina, ondi ayegesa, ondi asuukulirwa, ondi abaza endimi, ondi asoborra ebigambirwe. Ebi byona bikorwe habw'okugasira abaikiriza.
Obu haraaba haroho abarukubaza endimi, leka babe babiri bonka okutahingura ha basatu, nabwo bahangane embu; kandi habeho omu arukusoborra.
Obu haraaba hataroho arukusoborra, ayaakubalize aculeere omu iramizo, abyegambirre omu mutima gwe kandi abaze na Ruhanga.
Muleke abarangi babiri rundi basatu nubo babaze, abandi beetegereze ebigambirwe.
Kakuba habaho ondi anyakusuukulirwe ekigambo, ogu anyakubaire naabaza aculeere.
Inywena nimusobora kuranga nimuhonderana, boona nukwo beege kandi bafooke beekambi.
Mulimo gw'abarangi kutegeka emyoyo y'abarangi.
Habwokuba Ruhanga taba Ruhanga anyakuburanganiza, baitu aba w'obusinge. Nkooku kikorwa omu maramizo goona ag'abaikiriza,
abakazi baculeerege omu kwesorooza kw'abantu ba Ruhanga; habwokuba tibarukwikirizibwa kubaza, baitu beebundaaze, Ebiragiro nkooku bigamba.
Obu haraaba haroho eki barukugonza kumanya, bakaguzeege baibabo bamazire kutaaha. Habwokuba ky'ensoni omukazi kubaliza omu kwesorooza kwaitu.
Haa! Nimugira ngu, ekigambo kya Ruhanga kikaruga omuli inywe? Nandiki niinywe kyahikireho inywenka?
Obu haraaba haroho omuntu arukuteekereza nkooku ali murangi rundi aina ebisembo ebindi bya Mwoyo Ahikiriire, leka aikirize ebi ndukubahandiikira nkooku kiri kiragiro kya MUKAMA.
Kandi weena atarukwikiriza eki, nawe Ruhanga tarukumwikiriza.
Nahabweki bagenzi bange, mwegombe muno ekisembo ky'okuranga ebya Ruhanga, baitu okubaza endimi nakwo mutakutanga;
kyonka byona bikorwe kurungi kandi nibihonderangana.
Bagenzi bange, hati ka mbaijukye Amakuru Amarungi aga nabarangiriire, aga mwaikiriize kandi na hati aga mugumiremu,
nugo agabajuna kakuba mugaikiriza kurungi. Kitali eki, buli nimwikiririza busa.
Ekikuru eki nabandize kubooleka, na nyowe eki nahairwe, nikyo kinu: Kristo akafa habw'ebibi byaitu nk'Ebyahandiikirwe oku bigamba,
akaziikwa kandi yahumbuurwa haahingwireho ebiro bisatu, nk'Ebyahandiikirwe oku bigamba,
akabonekera Keefa, hanyuma yabonekera ikumi n'omu.
Yagaruka yabonekera bagenzi baitu abarukukira ha bikumi bitaano omurundi gumu; baingi omuli bo na hati bakyaroho, abandi noobu baliba baafire.
Akongera yabonekera Yakobbo, hanyuma yabonekera abakwenda boona.
Ha kumalirra akabonekera nyowe arukubakira obuto.
Ningira ninyowe w'okumalirra omu bakwenda, atasemeriire n'okwetwa mukwenda, habwokuba nkahiiganiza ebitebe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga.

Baitu embabazi za Ruhanga nizo zampikize nambere ndi, kandi embabazi ezi yangiriire itafe busa. Nangwa, nyowe nkakora muno okukira abakwenda boona, noobu araaba atali nyowe ayakozire, baitu embabazi za Ruhanga eziri omuli nyowe, nizo zaakozire.
Noobu araaba ali nyowe ayakozire, rundi abakwenda abandi, baitu ebi nibyo turangirra kandi na inywe nibyo mwaikiriize.
Hati Kristo obu araaba naarangirirwa nkooku yahumbuukire omu bafu, abamu omuli inywe basobora bata kugamba ngu, okuhumbuuka kw'abafu tikuroho?
Baitu okuhumbuuka kw'abafu obu kuraaba kutaroho, buli Kristo nawe atahumbuuke;
kandi obu araaba atarahumbuukire, okurangirra kwaitu kwa busa, kandi okwikiriza kwanyu nakwo kwa busa.
Aho nituzooka tuli babiihi b'ebisuba, habwokuba tukagumya Ruhanga nkooku yahumbwire Kristo, kandi kunu atamuhumbuule obu kiraaba kiri ky'amazima kugamba ngu, abafu tibahumbuuka.
Abafu obu baraaba batahumbuuka, buli Kristo nawe atahumbuuke.
Kristo obu araaba atarahumbwirwe, okwikiriza kwanyu kwa busa, kandi mukyali omu bibi byanyu.
N'abo abaafeeriire omu Kristo bakahwerekerra.
Obu turaaba twayesigire Kristo omu bwomeezi bunu bwonka, buli tuli bantu b'okuganyirwa okukira abandi boona.
Baitu mananukwo Kristo akahumburwa omu bafu, nuwe muzigaijo gw'abaafiire.
Okufa nkooku kwaizire habw'omuntu omu, okuhumbuuka kw'abafu nakwo nukwo kwaizire habw'omuntu omu.
Boona nkooku bafa habw'Adamu, boona nukwo balyomeera habwa Kristo.
Baitu buli muntu omu rubu rwe; Kristo nuwe muzigaijo, nukwo hakurateho abe obu aligaruka.
Obu alikamara kukwasa Ruhanga ise obukama, amazire n'okuhwerekereza obulemi bwona, obusobozi bwona n'amaani goona, obu nubwo empero erihika.
Habwokuba Kristo asemeriire kuhangiriza okuhika obu alikarubatirra abanyanzigwa be boona.
Kandi omunyanzigwa wa ha mpero ow'okuhwerekerezibwa, nuwe Rufu.
“Ningira Ruhanga akamuha kulemera kimu byona.” Baitu nambere kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Nuwe alema ebintu byona”, nikimanywa kurungi Ogu ayamuhaire kulema byona nkooku atabalirwamu.
Kandi obu alimara kuheebwa byona abireme, Omwana nawe nubwo aliremwa ogu ayamuhaire kulema byona, nukwo Ruhanga abe byona omu boona.
Abafu obu baraaba batahumbuuka, abantu bagenderra ki kubatizibwa habw'abafu? Obu baraaba batahumbuuka, habwaki abantu babatizibwa habwabu?
Na nyowe ningenderra ki kwenaga omu kabi buli kasumi?
Bagenzi bange, nimbarahira habw'okwenyumiza oku mbainaho omu Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu: Nyowe nfa buli kiro!
Kakuba nyebuga, nkooku abantu bakora: “Nkarwanisa enyamaiswa ndi Efeeso”, baitu nikingasira ki? Abafu obu baraaba batahumburwa, “Leka tulye, tunywe, habwokuba nyenkya tuli b'okufa.”
Muleke kubiihwabiihwa: “Okuteerana n'ababi nikusiisa engeso enungi.”
Mweteere, mulekere aho okusiisa. Habwokuba abamu omuli inywe tibarukumanya Ruhanga. Eki nkigambire kubakwasa ensoni.
Baitu omuntu asobora kukaguza ati: “Abafu babuumbuurwa bata? Kandi baliija baina mubiri gwa mulingo ki?”
Mudoma iwe! Embibo ei osiga temera, rundi buli ebandize kufa.
Kandi ei osiga tikiri nikyo ekimera ekiribaho, baitu osiga orujuma kwonka; rundi rw'engano rundi embibo endi.
Baitu Ruhanga aruha omubiri nkooku agonza, kandi buli rujuma aruha omulingo gwarwo.
Habwokuba emibiri yoona tesisana, baitu haroho omubiri gumu ogw'abantu, ogundi gw'ebisoro, ogundi gw'enyonyi, n'ogundi gw'encu.
Haroho emibiri ey'omwiguru kandi haroho n'ey'omunsi; baitu ekitiinisa eky'ey'omwiguru kindi, kandi n'ekitiinisa eky'emibiri ey'omunsi nakyo kindi.
Okujwa kw'izooba kundi, kandi n'okujwa kw'okwezi kundi, n'okw'enyunyuuzi nakwo kundi. Kandi n'okujwa kw'enyunyuuzi ezi, nakwo tikwingana.
N'okuhumbuuka kw'abafu nukwo kuli kuti. Omubiri oguziikwa guba gw'okujunda, kandi oguhumburwa tiguli gw'okujunda.
Guziikwa guhoiremu amaani, guhumburwa gwina amaani.
Omubiri guziikwa guli mubiri gw'obuntu, gulihumburwa guli mubiri gw'omwoyo. Obu haraaba haroho omubiri ogw'obuntu, buli haroho n'ogw'omwoyo.
Nukwo kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Adamu ow'okubanza akahangwa yaba muntu mwomeezi”; Adamu ow'okumalirra yaba mwoyo ogwomeeza.
Obwomeezi obw'omwoyo tinubwo bubanza, baitu habanza obw'omubiri; nukwo hakurataho obw'omwoyo.
Omuntu ow'okubanza akaruga omwitaka, ali cuucu kwonka; omuntu owa kabiri akaruga omwiguru.
Omuntu ow'omu cuucu nkooiku akaba ali, n'ab'omu nsi nukwo bali; kandi ow'omwiguru nkooku ali, n'ab'omwiguru nukwo bali bati.
Itwe nkooku twasisaine Adamu ayarugire omu cuucu, nukwo tulisisana na Kristo ayarugire omu iguru.
Bagenzi bange ka mbagambire kinu: omubiri n'esagama tibisobora kugweterwa obukama bwa Ruhanga, n'ekijunda tikisobora kugweterwa ekitajunda.
Hati ka mbamanyise ensita enu: itwena titulifa, baitu itwena tulihindurwa,
omu kanya kake nk'ak'eriiso likoimezaamu, engwara eya ha mpero obu erigamba. Habwokuba engwara erigamba, abafu balihumburwa batakyagaruka kufa, na itwe tulihindurwa.
Aho omubiri ogurukujunda, gulijwara ogutajunda, kandi omubiri gunu ogufa, gulijwara ogutafa.
Ogurukujunda ogu, obu guliba gujwaire ogutajunda, kandi ogurukufa gujwaire ogutafa, nubwo Ekyahandiikirwe kirihikirra ekirukugamba kiti: “Orufu rusingwirwe, rwahwerekerezibwa.”
“Rufu iwe, obusinguzi bwawe buraha? Rufu iwe, obusaalizi bw'omubuli gwawe buraha?”
Omubuli gw'Orufu nikyo ekibi, kandi amaani g'ekibi gasigikira ha Biragiro.
Ruhanga asiimwe anyakutuha obusinguzi naaraba omu MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Nahabweki bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, mugume, mutatengatengeeta, kandi obutoosa mweyongere kukora omulimo gwa MUKAMA, mumanye ngu, obu murukumukorra, obwekambi bwanyu tibuli bwa busa.
Ebirukukwata ha bisembo eby'okukoonyera abaikiriza, na inywe mukole nkooku naragiire ebitebe by'abaikiriza ab'omu Galatiya.
Ha kiro ekibanza buli wiiki, omuntu weena omuli inywe aiheho eki arukusobora ha bintu ebi atungire, akyahule, nukwo ebisembo bisoroozibwe kara ntakaizireyo.
Obu ndihika, ndituma abamu aba mulisiima, bagenda n'ebbaruha, batwale ebisembo byanyu Yerusaalemu.
Obu mulirora nikihika nyowe kugenda, ndigenda nabo.
Ndibabungira obu ndiba mmazire kuraba Makedoni, habwokuba oku nuho ndukwenda kuleetwa.
Obundi ndisobora kumara na inywe ebiro bike, rundi kumarrayo ebiro by'obutiti, nukwo mumboherre ha ndiba ningenda hoona.
MUKAMA obu aligonza, ninihira kumara na inywe ebiro bike, habwokuba tindukwenda kubarora nk'arukubahungukira kwonka.
Baitu ninyija kwikara ndi Efeeso okuhika ha kiro eky'obugenyi bwa Pentikooti,
habwokuba mbaire ntungire omugisa mukooto ogw'okukorra hanu eby'omugaso bingi, kyonka haroho baingi abarukumparana.
Timoteho obu aliija oku, mumujwahukirre kandi mukorrane nawe kurungi, habwokuba naakora omulimo gwa MUKAMA nka nyowe.
Nahabweki hatabaho arukumugaya; mumukoonyere, amale orugendo rwe n'obusinge, agaruke nambere ndi; habwokuba nyowe n'ab'oruganda boona tumutegeriize.
Kandi mugenzi waitu Apolo, nkamwesengereza muno ababungire hamu n'ab'oruganda abandi baitu abaire atakagondeze. Aliija obu alitunga omwanya.
Mwikale nimurora, mugumire omu kwikiriza kwanyu, mube bantu manzi kandi ab'amaani.
Byona ebi murukukora, mubikolege nimugonzangana.
Hati nu, bagenzi bange, mumanyire ngu, eka ya Sitefana niyo yabandize kuhinduka omu Akaaya kandi bakeehayo kuheereza abaikiriza;
nimbateererra muhege ekitiinisa abantu nk'abo, hamu n'abakozi abandi bataahi baitu.
Nkasemererwa habw'okwija kwa Sitefana na Fotunato n'Akaiko, habwokuba bakakora ebi mwakubaire mukozire muroho;
ningira bakahumuuza omwoyo gwange n'ogwanyu. Abantu nk'abo mubahege ekitiinisa.
Ebitebe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga ab'omu Asiya babaramukize. Akwila na Pirisika, hamu n'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza abeesorooleza omunju yabo babaramukize muno omu MUKAMA.
Ab'oruganda boona babaramukize. Muramukyangane nimugwangana omu kifuba nk'abantu ba Ruhanga.
Nyowe Paulo, okuramukya kunu nkwehandikiire nyenka n'omukono gwange.
Obu haraaba haroho weena atarukugonza MUKAMA, ogu akyenwe. Ija, Ai MUKAMA!
Embabazi za MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo ziikale na inywe.
Inywena nimbagonza omu Kristo Yesu. Amiina.

Nyowe Paulo, Ruhanga ou yasiimire mba mukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, na Timoteho mugenzi waitu, nituhandiikira ekitebe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga abali Korinto, hamu n'abantu ba Ruhanga boona abali omu Akaaya yoona.
Nitubagondeza emigisa n'obusinge obwa Ruhanga Isiitwe na MUKAMA Yesu Kristo.
Akugizibwe Ruhanga, Ise MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, Isiitwe ow'embabazi kandi Ruhanga omuhuumuza.
Nuwe Ogu anyakutuhuumuza omu bujune bwaitu bwona, nukwo na itwe tusobole kuhuumuza abandi abali omu bujune bw'emiringo yoona, nitubahuumuza Ruhanga nkooku yatuhuumwize.
Okubonabonesibwa kwa Kristo nkooku kwasaagire hali itwe, nukwo okuhuumuzibwa kwaitu omu Kristo kwasaagire kuti.

Itwe obu tubona enaku, twibona nukwo inywe muhuumuzibwe kandi mujunwe. Kandi obu tuhuumuzibwa, tuhuumuzibwa habwanyu nukwo mutunge amaani agarukuleeta okugumiisiriza enaku, nk'ezaitu ezi tugumiisiriza.
Nikyo tubeesigira muno, nitumanya inywe nkooku murukubonabonesibwa hamu na itwe, nukwo mulihuumuzibwa hamu na itwe.
Ab'oruganda, nitugonza inywe mumanye emihito ei twaboine omu Asiya; habwokuba ekatukiza muno amaani, yatutereburra kimu, titwanihira kukira.
Mazimakwo tukateekereza ngu, tusingirwe omusango gw'okufa. Ningira eki kikabaho tuleke kweyesiga itwenka, baitu twesige Ruhanga anyakuhuumbura abafu.
Nuwe yatujunire akabi k'okufa, kandi nuwe alitujuna. Nuwe turukwesiga nkooku araikaraga naatujuna.
Na inywe mutukoonyerege nimutusabira. Nukwo omugisa tuheebwa habw'okusaba kw'abaingi, abandi baingi baligusiimira Ruhanga habwaitu.

Okwenyumiza kwaitu nkunu, kandi omutima gwange nigugumya ngu, omunsi munu, n'okukira muno omuli inywe, tukakora ebihikire nitubooleka engeso nungi kandi ez'amazima eziruga hali Ruhanga; tutarukwesiga magezi g'ensi, baitu embabazi za Ruhanga.
Na hati titurukubahandiikira kindi, kwihaho ebi murukusobora kusoma mukeetegereza. Kandi ninihira nimwija kwetegerereza kimu,
nkooku mwayetegeriizeho ekicweka. Nukwo na inywe mulisobora kwehaisa habwaitu, nka itwe oku tulyehaisa habwanyu ha kiro ky'okwija kwa MUKAMA Yesu.
Obu namazire kwetegereza ebi byona, nkacwamu kubanza kubabungira nukwo mwongere kusemererwa obwa kabiri.
Nkagonza kubabungira obu nkaba ningenda Makedoni kandi mbaleetweho nindugayo. Nukwo na inywe mumboherre ningenda Buyudaaya.
Obu nagondeze kukora nti, nimugira nkaba nyina emitima ebiri? Rundi ebi nteegeka kukora, mbitegeka nk'omuntu kwonka, arukugamba ati: Ego, kandi omu kacu kake ati: Nangwa?
Nindahira Ruhanga w'amazima, ekigambo eki tubagambira tikiri Ego na Nangwa.
Habwokuba Omwana wa Ruhanga Yesu Kristo, nyowe, Silivano na Timoteho, ou twabatebiize, akaba atali Ego na Nangwa; baitu omuli uwe obutoosa ekigambo kya Ruhanga kiba Ego.
Ningira omuli uwe, byona Ruhanga ebi yaraganiize biba Ego. Nikyo tugambira tuti: Amina, nituraba omuli uwe habw'okuhaisa Ruhanga ekitiinisa.
Ruhanga nuwe atugumya itwena: itwe hamu na inywe, kandi nuwe yatutumire;
akatutaho akarorwaho, kandi yatuha Mwoyo we mu mitima yaitu, abe mukwato gw'ebi atwahuliire.
Baitu Ruhanga nuwe kaiso wange, ekyantangire kugaruka oku nukwo kubaganyira.
Itwe tuleke kwefoora balemi b'okwikiriza kwanyu; baitu nitukora hamu na inywe nukwo musemererwe habwokuba omu kwikiriza kwanyu mwikara mugumire.
Nikyo nacweriiremu kutagaruka kubabungira ndeke kubatuntuza.
obu ndabatuntuza, mara nibaha abarandeetera omuhimbo? Ogu ou ntuntwize?
Kandi nikyo nabahandiikiriire, nukwo obu ndiija, ndeke kubiihizibwa abo abaakubaire nibandeetera omuhimbo. Habwokuba nkagumya nti: okusemererwa kwange kuliba kusemererwa kwanyu inywena.
Nkabahandiikira nyina obujune bwingi n'obusaasi omu mutima, kandi n'amaizi maingi omu maiso, ntarukugenderra kubatuntuza, baitu okubooleka nkooku mbagonza muno.
Obu haraaba haroho ayakozire ekirukusaaliza, atasaalize nyowe nyenka, baitu akabasaaliza inywena.
Omuntu nk'ogu, ekifubiro eki yahairwe abaingi, nikimumara.
Haakire mwakumuganyiire mumuhuumuza, nukwo aleke kutereburwa obujune obuhinguraine.
Nikyo ndukubeesengerereza nti: Mugaruke mumwoleka engonzi.
Nikyo nahandiikiire ningenderra okubalenga, mmanye obu muraaba nimuhurra omu byona.
Weena ou muganyira, na nyowe mmuganyira. Kandi obu haraaba haroho eki naaganyiire, nkakiganyira habwanyu, omumaiso ga Kristo,
nukwo tutange Sitaani kutusingura; habwokuba emitego ye tugimanyire.
Obu nahikire Turoha kurangirrayo Amakuru Amarungi ga Kristo, oku nkasanga orwigi runkinguliirwe kukora omulimo gwa MUKAMA.
Baitu omutima gwange gutahuumule habw'okutasangayo mugenzi wange Tito. Nukwo kubaraga, nayongera nagenda Makedoni.
Baitu Ruhanga asiimwe, anyakutusinguza butoosa omu Kristo, kandi naakorra omuli itwe kurarangya hoona amakuru ag'okumumanya, amakuru agarukuboya nk'omugaju.
Habwokuba hali abantu abarukujunwa n'abandi abarukuhwerekerra, itwe tuli mugaju gwa Kristo ogurukuboyera Ruhanga.
Hali abo abarukuhwerekerra, tuli kijunde ky'orufu ekirukwita; baitu hali abo abarukujunwa, tuli kiboya ky'obwomeezi ekirukwomeeza. Nooha asemeriire omulimo ogu?
Itwe titurukusisana nk'abaingi, ababungya ekigambo kya Ruhanga kukiihamu amagoba; baitu tuli bantu beesigwa, abaatumirwe Ruhanga, kandi twegeseza omumaiso ge nk'abaheereza ba Kristo.
Hati twagaruka kwehaisa itwenka? Nitwetaaga ebbaruha ez'okuturanga hali inywe, rundi inywe kutuha ez'okuturanga ahandi, nkooku abandi barukuzeetaaga?
Inywe inywenka niinywe bbaruha yaitu ey'okuturanga, ehandiikirwe omu mitima yanyu, erukumanywa kandi erukusomwa abantu boona.
Kandi inywe muli bbaruha ya Kristo ei twakwasiibwe, ebbaruha eterahandiikirwe na bwino, baitu eyahandiikirwe Mwoyo wa Ruhanga omwomeezi; hatali ha bibbali by'amabaale, baitu ha mitima y'abantu.
Obu nubwo obwesige obu twina hali Ruhanga omuli Kristo.
Itwe titurukwemarra. Titurukusobora kugamba ngu, ekintu kyona nikiruga hali itwe; baitu okwemara kwaitu kuruga hali Ruhanga,
ayatusoboize kuba baheereza b'Endagaano Empyaka, etarahandiikirwe omu nyuguta, baitu eyahandiikirwe omu myoyo yaitu; habwokuba enyuguta ita, baitu Omwoyo gwomeeza.
Endagaano eya ira eyasarwirwe ha mabaale, obu eraaba yaizire n'ekitiinisa kingi, ekyatangire Abaisirairi kurora amaiso ga Musa habw'okumulikana kwago, kandi kunu ekaba neija kuhwaho,
endagaano empyaka enyakuleetwa Mwoyo teriija n'ekitiinisa ekirukukiraho?
Nahabweki endagaano eyasingisize omusango obu eraaba yaizire n'ekitiinisa, endagaano erukwihaho omusango esemeriire kugikirra kimu ekitiinisa.
Mazimakwo endagaano eyaizire ira n'ekitiinisa hati tekyainakyo, habwokuba kikamarwaho ekitiinisa ekindi ekirukukikiraho.
Endagaano enyakuhwaho obu eraaba yatungire ekitiinisa kyayo, egi etarukuhwaho esemeriire kutunga ekirukukiraho obwingi.
Itwe abaina okunihira nk'oku, nikyo twegeseza n'obumanzi.
Tituli nka Musa ayayeswekeriire ha maiso, nukwo Abaisirairi baleke kurora ekitiinisa kye nkooku kyagendaga nikikeeha.
Mara emitima yabu ekagumangana; n'okuhika hati obu basoma Endagaano ya ira, ekisweko nk'eki kiroho kandi tikibaruga ha maiso, habwokuba omu Kristo wenka nuho kiihirwaho.
Nangwa n'okuhika hati ebya Musa obu bisomwa, ekisweko eki kiikara kiswekere emitima yabu;
baitu omuntu obu ahindukira MUKAMA, ekisweko eki kiihwaho.
Hati MUKAMA ogu nuwe Mwoyo, kandi nambere hali Mwoyo wa Ruhanga, nuho haba obusinge.

Na itwe itwena obu turaaba niturora ekitiinisa kya MUKAMA n'amaiso agataswekerwe, tuhindurwa kusisana nawe, nituruga omu ktiiinisa ekimu, nitutaaha omu kindi ekirukukiraho; kandi eki kikorwa MUKAMA anyakuli Mwoyo.
Nahabweki itwe abaahairwe obuheereza bunu habw'embabazi za Ruhanga, titurukuterebuka.

Tukanga ebirukukwasa ensoni n'ebirukukorwa omu nsereko. Tituli bagobya, tituhindahindura ekigambo kya Ruhanga, baitu amazima tugooleka bbwa, nukwo abantu boona batusiimire omu mitima yabo omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
Amakuru gaitu Amarungi noobu garaaba gaswekeriirwe, baitu gaswekeriirwe habw'abo boona abarukuhwerekerra.
Nubo abo abatarukwikiriza, habwokuba omukuru w'ensi enu aswekeriire emitima yabo, nukwo abatange kurora omusana ogw'Amakuru Amarungi ag'ekitiinisa kya Kristo, anyakuli kisisani kya Ruhanga.
Itwe titwegambaho itwenka, baitu turangirra Yesu Kristo nkooku ali MUKAMA, kandi itwe tuli baheereza banyu habwe.
Ruhanga ayagambire ati: “Leka omusana gujwere omu mwirima,” nuwe yamulikire omu mitima yaitu, yatuha kwoleka abantu ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga ekyazookere omu Kristo.
Baitu itungo eri, itwe twinalyo omu bibindi by'ibumba habw'okwoleka obusobozi obuteerengwa nkooku buli bwa Ruhanga, tibuli bwaitu.
Tugosirwe embaju zoona, baitu titufunziibwe; tusobiirwe, baitu tirurukuterebuka.
Tuhiiganizibwe, baitu titunagiriziibwe; tutiirwe hansi, baitu tituhwerekereziibwe.
Obutoosa tugenda twina okufa kwa Yesu omu mibiri yaitu, nukwo obwomeezi bwe nabwo buzookere omu mibiri yaitu.
Itwe obu tuba tukyali boomeezi, butoosa tuba mu kabi k'okufa habwa Yesu, nukwo obwomeezi bwe buzookere omu mibiri yaitu erukufa.
Nahabweki orufu rukorra omuli itwe, baitu obwomeezi omuli inywe.
Itwe nkooku twina omwoyo gumu ogw'okwikiriza nk'ogwa Daudi ayahandiikire ati: “Nkaikiriza, nikyo nabaliize.” Na itwe nitwikiriza, nikyo turukubaliza.
Nitumanya ogu ayahumbwire MUKAMA Yesu omu bafu nkooku alituhumbuura hamu nawe, nukwo itwena atuhikye nambere ali.

Habwokuba byona biroho habwanyu. Kandi emigisa ya Ruhanga nkooku erukugenda neekanya omu bantu abarukweyongera obwingi, nukwo emigisa ye ekanyise eti okusiima kwaitu, kandi Ruhanga aheebwe ekitiinisa.
Nahabweki titurukuterebuka. Omubiri gwaitu noobu guraaba nigujunda, baitu omwoyo gwaitu gugaruka buhyaka buli kiro.
Omuhito gunu omuke ogw'akasumi kake nigututeekaniriza ekitiinisa ekitahwaho kandi ekitainganwa.
Itwe titurukuta maiso ha bintu ebirukurorwa, baitu tugata ha bintu ebitarukurorwa; habwokuba ebirukurorwa bihwaho, baitu ebitarukurorwa tibihwaho.
Nitumanya ngu, orusiisira oru turukwikaramu omu nsi obu ruliseeswa, tulinda ekyombeko ekindi Ruhanga eki alituha. Niyo nju etombekerwe mikono, baitu ey'omwiguru kandi ey'ebiro n'ebiro.
Kyamazima, omu mubiri gunu nitusinda, nitwegomba kujwekwa omubiri gwaitu ogw'omwiguru.
Obu tuliba tumazire kugujwara, tutalisangwa tuli busa.

Obu tuba tukyali omu rusiisira runu, tusinda habw'omwetunturo, tutarukwenda kujuurwa nangwa, baitu nitwenda kwongerwaho ekijwaro ekindi, nukwo ekijwaro kinu ekirukufa kisobole kuhigiza kiri ekirukwomeera.
ayatutekaniriize ekintu eki nuwe Ruhanga, ayatuhaire mwoyo, abe mukwato gwaitu gw'ebi ebirukwija.
Eki nikyo kitugumya omutima butoosa; nitumanya ngu, obu tuba tukyali owaitu omu mubiri, tuba tuli hara na MUKAMA.
itwe tugenda nitwikiriza kwonka, tutarukurora bwerebwere.
Twikara tugumize omutima, baitu twakugondeze kwahukana n'omubiri gunu, nukwo tugende twikale na MUKAMA.
Nahabweki, noobu turaaba tukyali omu mubiri rundi tugurugiremu, baitu tugenderrege kumusemereza.
Habwokuba itwena tulizooka omumaiso g'ekitebe kya Kristo eky'okucweraho emisango, nukwo buli omu asasurwe habw'ebirungi rundi ebibi ebi yakozire akyali omu mubiri ogu.
Itwe habw'okumanya MUKAMA nkooku ali w'okutiinwa, nikyo twekambisiza abantu; baitu Ruhanga nuwe arukumanya nkooku tuli, kandi ninihira na inywe, emitima yanyu eki neekimanya.
Titurukugaruka kweyumiza hali inywe, baitu nitubaha obulyo bw'okwenyumiza habwaitu, nukwo musobole kugarukamu abo abarukwenyumiza ha bya haruguru, ebitali by'omu mutima omu nda.
Itwe obu turaaba tuhungutukire, tuhungutukire habwa Ruhanga; obu turaaba tuteekaine, tuteekaine habwanyu.
Habwokuba engonzi za Kristo zituhambiriza, kandi nitugumiza kimu: omu nkooku yaferiire boona, nahabweki boona bakafa.
Kandi akafeera boona nukwo abarukwomeera babe batakyayomeera habwabu bonka, baitu boomere habw'ogu ayabaferiire kandi ayabahumbuukire.
Nahabweki, okuruga hati titukyatonda muntu weena habw'obuzaale bw'omubiri. Noobu turaaba twamanyire Kristo omu buzaale bw'omubiri, baitu hati titukyamumanya tuti.
Ningira omuntu weena obu aikara omu Kristo, aba kihangwa kihyaka. Ebya kara biba bihoire, aho byona bifookere bihyaka.
Ebi byona biruga hali Ruhanga ayatwegaruliire naaraba omu Kristo, yatuha obukwenda obw'okugarukanizaamu abantu na Ruhanga.
Nukwo kugamba: omu Kristo, Ruhanga akeegarurra abali omunsi, atakyabajunaaniza ebibi byabu; na itwe akatukwasa obukwenda obu obw'okugarukanisaamu.
Hati tuli ngabwa za Kristo, Ruhanga naateererra abantu naaraba omuli itwe. Nikyo turukubeesengerereza omu ibara lya Kristo, mugarukanganemu na Ruhanga.
Ogu ataramanyire kibi, Ruhanga akamufoora kibi habwaitu; nukwo omuli uwe tubagane ha buhikiriire bwa Ruhanga.
Itwe abarukukora hamu nawe, nitubeesengereza muleke kutungira busa embabazi za Ruhanga.
Ningira nuwe arukugamba ati: “Nkakuhuliiriza omu kasumi akasemeriire, kandi naakukoonyera hakiro ky'okujunirwaho.” Nkako akasumi akasemeriire; kandi kinu nikyo kiro ky'okujunirwaho.
Titurukwenda kutalibaniza omuntu weena, omulimo gwaitu guleke kusangwamu ensobi yoona;
baitu omu byona nitweyoleka nk'abaheereza ba Ruhanga. Nitugumiisiriza muno: omu kubonabonesibwa, omu bulemeezi, omu mihito,
omu kuteerwa enkoba, omu nkomo, omu kwimukirirwa, omu kutalibana, omu kuraara ha muro, n'omu kurumwa enjara.
Tuli baheereza ba Ruhanga omu kwerinda, omu kumanya, omu kugumiisiriza, omu mbabazi, omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire, omu kugonzangana okutarumu bugobya,
omu kubaza amazima, n'omu maani ga Ruhanga; tukwasire eby'okurwanisa eby'obuhikiriire omu mukono gw'obulyo n'ogw'emoso.
Tuli baheereza be omu kuheebwa ekitiinisa n'omu kugaywa, omu kugambwaho kubi n'omu kugambwaho kurungi. Nitubarwa nk'abagobya, kunu tuli b'amazima;
nk'abatamanyirwe, kunu nitumanywa kurungi; nk'abarukufa, kunu tuli boomeezi; nk'abafubiirwe, kunu titwisirwe;
nk'abali omu bujune, kunu nitusemererwa; nk'abanaku, kunu nituguudahaza baingi; nk'abataina kantu, kandi kunu twina byona.
Bakorinto inywe, tubabaliize bbwa; tubanjuruliire emitima yaitu.
Itwe tutabatangire kutwehikya, baitu ebiteekerezo byanyu nibyo bibatangire kutwehikya.
Nimbahana nk'abaana bange, na inywe emitima yanyu mugyanjurre nkooku tubanjuruliire ogwaitu.
Muleke kuteerana n'abatarukwikiriza. obuhikiriire bwina bukwatane ki n'obubi? Rundi ekyererezi n'omwirima biina bukwatane ki?
Kristo aina bukwatane ki embandwa Beliyaali? Rundi arukwikiriza ateerana ata n'atarukwikiriza?
Enju ya Ruhanga ikirraniza eta n'ibandiro? Itwe tuli Nju ya Ruhanga omwomeezi; nkooku Ruhanga yagambire ati: “Ndabaikaramuga nimbagenderamu. Ndiba Ruhanga wabu, kandi bbo baliba bantu bange.
Nikyo Ruhanga arukugambira ati: Mubarugemu, mubeecwaho, kandi mutalikwataho kintu kyona ekitasemeziibwe. Nubwo na nyowe ndibatangirra.
Ndiba isiinywe, na inywe muliba batabani bange n'abahara bange; MUKAMA w'obusobozi bwona nukwo arukugamba ati.”
Abagonzibwa, nkooku twina ebyaraganiziibwe ebi, katwoge oburofu bwona obw'omubiri n'obw'omwoyo, tube bahikiriire mali, tutiine Ruhanga.
Mutatiina kutwanjururra emitima yanyu. tiharoho muntu n'omu ou twakozire kubi, tiharoho n'omu ou twasiisire, tiharoho n'omu ou twagobiize.
Kinu tindukukigamba kubacwera omusango, habwokuba mbagambiire ira nkooku mutuli ha mutima; tuliba tuli hamu omu kufa rundi omu kwomeera.
Nimbeesiga muno; nimunyehuliza muno; mumpumwize muno. Noobu turaaba twina enaku ezirukwingana ki, baitu nyina omuhimbo ogutagambwa.
Nangwa noobu twahikire Makedoni, emibiri yaitu etahuumule naakake, baitu twabonaga enaku embaju zoona-aheeru bwabaga bulemu, omu nda butiini.
Baitu Ruhanga anyakuhuumuza abasobirwe, akatuhuumuza habw'okwija kwa Tito.
Tikuli kwija kwe kwonka, baitu n'okuhuumuzibwa oku mwamuhuumwizemu. Akatutebeza ekihika kyanyu, okuganya kwanyu, n'obwekambi mwayolekere habwange. Bikanyongera kusemererwa.
Noobu ndaaba nababihiize habw'ebbaruha ei nabahandiikiire, tindukukyeijukya. Nkabanza kukyeijukya, habwokuba nindora ebbaruha egi ekabasaaliza okumara akasumi kake.

Baitu hati ninsemererwa, tihali habw'okusaalizibwa kwanyu, baitu okusaalizibwa oku mwatungire kukabaleetera okwegarukamu. Inywe mukasaalizibwa nka Ruhanga oku yagondeze; itwe titwina eki twabaferiize.
Okusaalirwa Ruhanga nkooku agonza kuleeta okwegarukamu okurukuhikya ha kujunwa, kandi okusaalirwa oku timukweijukya; baitu okusaalirwa kw'ensi enu kurugwamu okufa.

Hati nu murole okusaalirwa oku Ruhanga yabagondiize nkooku kwabeekambisiize: nkooku mwataireho muno omutima okwetonganirra, nkooku mwasaalirwe, oku mwatiinire, oku mwagizire ekihika, oku mwayekambiire, oku mwafubire abaasobeze! Omuli ebi byona mukeeyoleka nkooku mutaina musango omu bigambo ebi nabahandiikiire.
Nahabweki obu ndaaba nabahandiikiire, ntabahandiikire habw'ogu ayasobeze, rundi habw'ogu ou baasobezeho; baitu nkabahandiikira nukwo mbooleke obwekambi obu mwatugiriire nkooku Ruhanga abwetegeriize.
Eki nikyo kyatuhuumwize. Tikuli okuhuumuzibwa kwaitu oku kwonka, baitu tukeeyongera kusemererwa muno habw'okurora omuhimbo gwa Tito, habwokuba inywena mukamugarra omutima omu nda.

Obu ndiba nnamwolekere nkooku ndukwesiima habwanyu, eki kitankwase nsoni. Ningira buli kintu kyona eki twabahaisizeho kyali ky'amazima, n'okwehaisa kwaitu omu maiso ga Tito nikweyoleka nkooku kuli kw'amazima.
Omutima gwe gwona guhweriire hali inywe obu arukwijuka obuhulizi bwanyu, n'oku mwamutangiriire nimutiina kandi numutukumira.
Na nyowe ninsemererwa habwokuba nimbeesigira kimu.
Bagenzi baitu, nitugonza mumanye emigisa ya Ruhanga eyahairwe ebitebe by'abaikiriza abali Makedoni.
Obu bakaba nibalengesebwa emihito nyingi, okusemererwa kwabu kukeeyongera, kwabaleetera okugaba muno kandi kunu obunaku bwabu bukaba buhinguraine.
Kinu ninkigumya: bakagaba nkooku baasoboire n'omutima gumu, n'okukiza baakizaaho.
Baatusabaga nibatwesengereza tubaikirize nabo bakoonyere abantu ba Ruhanga
eki bakakikora nkooku tukaba tutarukunihira, habwokuba bakabanza kwekwasa MUKAMA, kandi na itwe baatwekwasa habwa Ruhanga.
Nikyo twasabiire Tito amalirize omuli inywe omulimo ogu ogw'embabazi, ogu akaba atandikire.
hati nkooku muli kurungi mu byona, omu kwikiriza, omu kugamba kamu, omu kumanya, omu kwekamba kwona, n'omu kutugonza, nukwo mwekambire muno okuhikiriza ekikorwa eki eky'embabazi.
Eki tindukukigamba nk'arukubahambiriza, baitu ningenderra kubooleka obwekambi bw'abandi, nukwo mmanye okugonza kwanyu obu kuraaba kuli kw'amazima.
Inywe nimumanya embabazi za MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo. Noobu araaba yabaire ali muguuda, baitu habwanyu akafooka munaku, nukwo obunaku bwe bubafoole baguuda.
Kandi omu kikorwa kinu eky'embabazi nimbahabura nti: kirungi mumalirize eki mwatandikire omwaka oguhoire, muleke kumara gakora kwonka baitu mukole n'engonzi.
Mukatandika kara nimwenda kukoonyera, mweyongere mumalirize n'ebi mutungire.
Omuntu obu aikiriiza okukoonyera, nikihika ogu okukozesa ebi ainabyo, hatali ebi ataina.
Tindukugamba ngu, abandi banguhirwe, inywe mulemererwe.
Baitu habw'obwinganiza: ebyanyu ebi musaagisize omu kasumi kanu, bikoonyere bali; kandi nabo ebi balisaagisa bikoonyere inywe, nukwo habeho okwinganaingana.
Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Ayasoroize bingi, atasaagise bingi; kandi ayasoroize bike, ataseege.”
Ruhanga asiimwe ayatairemu Tito omutima ogw'okubatunturra nk'ogwange.
Akaikiriza kwija, tihali itwe kumusaba kwonka, baitu habw'okwehayo kwe. Uwe wenka akacwamu kwija owanyu.
Kandi nitumutuma hamu na mugenzi waitu arukumanywa muno omu bitebe byona by'abaikiriza, nukwo arangirreyo Amakuru Amarungi.
Tikiri eki kyonka, baitu akomerwe ebitebe by'abaikiriza kugendaga na itwe omu mulimo ogu ogw'embabazi. Omulimo ogu turukukora habw'okuhaisa MUKAMA ekitiinisa n'okwoleka omutima omurungi ogu twinagwo.
Kandi na itwe turagirwa kwerinda, tihaikara kubaho arukutubazaaho kubi habw'ebisembo ebi ebingi ebi turukurolerra.
Ningira eki turukugenderra nukwo kukora ebirukusiimwa, hatali omu maiso ga Ruhanga honka, baitu n'omu maiso g'abantu boona.
Kandi hamu nabo nitutuma mugenzi waitu ondi ou twalengeseze emirundi nyingi, twarora ali mwekambi omu bingi; baitu hati mwekambi kukira nkooku akaba ali, habwokuba naabeesiga muno.
Mara Tito, nuwe mugenzi wange ou ndukukora nawe okubaheereza; kandi bagenzi baitu abo boona, nubo batumirwe ebitebe by'abaikiriza, kandi nubo bahaisa Kristo ekitiinisa.
Nahabweki mubooleke ebirukugumya engonzi zanyu kandi mwoleke nkooku turukwenyumiza habwanyu, nukwo ebitebe byona by'abaikiriza bisobole kukimanya.
Tikirukunyetaagisa kubahandiikira ha by'okukoonyera abantu ba Ruhanga,

habwokuba nimmanya nkooku mwikara mweteekaniize kukikora. Nikyo ndukubeehaisizaamu omu Bamakedoni nimbagambira nti: Abaakaaya bamazire omwaka beeteekaniize kukoonyera. Kandi obwekambi bwanyu nubwo bwekambisize baingi omuli bo.
Nimbatumira bagenzi baitu banu, nukwo okwehaisa kwaitu habwanyu omu kukoonyera abaikiriza kuleke kufa busa, baitu babasange mweteekaniize nkooku nabagambiire.
Abamakedoni abamu bataikara kwija na nyowe bakabasanga muteeteekaniize, tukahemuka-nangwa na inywe mukahemuka-kandi kunu tukabeesiga muno.

Nikyo naroliire nikyetaagwa kusaba bagenzi baitu banu baije owaanyu ntakaizire, bateekanize kara ekisembo kyanyu eki mwaraganiize ira. Kisangwe kiteekaniziibwe, kitali ky'okuhambirizibwa, baitu habw'okwehayo kwanyu.
Eki ndukugamba nkinu: anyakusiga bike, aligesa bike; kandi anyakusiga bingi, aligesa bingi.
Buli muntu leka agabe nkooku acwiremu omu mutima gwe, atarukubalirra rundi atarukuhambirizibwa; habwokuba Ruhanga asiima omuntu omwenda.
Inywe, Ruhanga naasobora kubaha emigisa ya buli mulingo, nukwo mwikale nimutunga byona ebi murukwetaaga, kandi nimwija kusaagisaho eby'okukoonyera buli mulimo gwona omurungi.
Nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Agaba n'obwenda, kandi agabira abaseege; obuhikiriire bwe bwikaraho ebiro byona.”
Ogu anyakuha omusigi embibo, akamuha n'ebyokulya, na inywe alibaha embibo yanyu kandi agyeze. Asobole n'okukanyisa ebikorwa by'obwenda ebi mukora.
Nimwija kuguudahara omu byona habw'obwenda bwanyu bwingi obulireetera Ruhanga okusiimwa habwaitu.
Ningira okugabira abaseege tikurukukoonyera abantu ba Ruhanga bonka, baitu kukoonyera baingi okusiima Ruhanga.

Habw'okukora omulimo ogu ogw'embabazi mukaguhikya, mulihaisa Ruhanga ekitiinisa nimujurra kandi nimwikiriza Amakuru Amarungi ga Kristo. Kandi mulimuhaisa ekitiinisa habw'obwenda bwanyu omu bintu mwabagabiire n'ebi mwahaire abandi boona.
Nabo baraabatahoga omutima nibabasabira habw'embabazi nyingi za Ruhanga ezikora omuli inywe.
Ruhanga asiimwe habw'ekisembo kye ekitagambwa.
Nyowe Paulo, ou murukuteekereza nyeculeeza obu mba na inywe, kandi mba manzi obu mba ndi hara, habw'obuculeezi n'embabazi za Kristo,
nimbeesengereza nti: obu ndiija oku ndeke kwoleka amaani aga nakugondeze kwoleka abo abarukuteekereza ngu, nitukora nk'ab'ensi enu oku bakora.
Noobu turaaba tuli omunsi, baitu titurukurwana nk'ab'ensi.
Eby'okurwanisa by'obulemu bwaitu tibiri by'abantu, baitu by'amaani ga Ruhanga agahwerekereza ebigo ebigumire.
Itwe tumaraho empaka zoona hamu n'ekintu ekindi kyona eky'okwekuliriza ekirukutanga abantu kumanya Ruhanga, kandi tugarra ebiteekerezo byona eby'abantu hali Kristo.
Inywe obu mulikamara kumworobera, nubwo na nyowe ndyeteekaniza kufubira buli ntahurra yoona.
Murole ebibali omu maiso. Omuntu weena obu araaba naagumya nkooku ali wa Kristo, aijuke na itwe tuli ba Kristo nkawe.
Noobu ndaaba nimpinguranizaaho kwehaisa habw'obusobozi MUKAMA obu yatuhaire kubagumya n'okubombeka, butali bw'okubahwerekereza, eki tikyankwase nsoni.
Nyowe tinaakugondeze kusisana nk'arukubatiinisiriza n'ebbaruha zange zinu.
Habwokuba abamu nibagamba bati: “Ebbaruha ze zigumire kandi z'amaani, baitu omu nzooka ye muceke, n'emigambire ye busamu kantu.”
Abarukugamba bati, leka bamanye ebi tuhandiika omu bbaruha tutaroho, nibyo tukora turoho.
Itwe titurukwenda kwebara rundi kwerengesaniza n'abandi abarukwehaisa bonka. Bbo obu balengangana kandi bakeerengesaniza bonka, baba bataina eki barukwetegereza.
Baitu itwe titurukwija kwehaisa kukira ha rulengo Ruhanga yatutaireho. Omu rulengo oru, na inywe nuho muli.
Itwe titurukuhinguza ha rulengo oru, nk'abatarabahikireho. Ningira niitwe twabandize kubahikaho, twabaleetera Amakuru Amarungi ga Kristo.
Titurukuhinguraniza kwehaisa habw'emirimo eyakozirwe abandi; baitu nitunihira ngu, okwikiriza kwanyu nkooku kurukweyongera, n'okurangaanwa kwaitu omuli inywe nakwo kulyeyongera muno.
Nukwo tusobole kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi omunsi eza hara ohingwire owaanyu, tutarukwehaisa habw'emirimo eyakozirweyo omuntu ondi.
Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Anyakuhaisa, leka ahaisanize MUKAMA.”
Omuntu anyakwehaisa tali uwe asiimwa, baitu ogu anyakuhaisibwa MUKAMA.
Naakugondeze mungumiisirize omu budoma bwange obuke. Mbeesengeriize mungumiisirize!
Ihali mbakwatiire, lirungi nk'erya Ruhanga; habwokuba nkabasweza Kristo nukwo mbaheyo nk'omugole empikirre anyakuswirwe omusaija omu.
Baitu nintiina, enjoka nkooku yabiihabiihire Eva n'obugobya bwayo, ebiteekerezo byanyu nabyo nibiija kuhabisibwa mukaruga omu kweheera kimu Kristo.

Kakuba haija omuntu akabeegesa Yesu ondi, atali ogu ou twabeegeseze, rundi mukatunga mwoyo ondi ou mutaratungire kara, rundi mukaikiriza amakuru agaahukaine hali aga mwaikiriize kara, timwakubiikirize ahonaaho?
Nyowe ninteekereza nti: abakwenda rurangaanwa tibaina eki barukunkiza naakake.
Noobu ndaaba ntabaza kurungi, baitu amagezi nyinago, kandi ebintu byona nkabibasoborra kurungi.
Nyowe nkasobya obu nayebundaize nukwo inywe munyumizibwe, rundi obu nabarangiriire Amakuru Amarungi ga Ruhanga mutaina eki mwansaswire?
Ebitebe ebindi by'abaikiriza nkabamaraho ebyabo, nukwo mpeereze inywe.

Obu nkaba ndi na inywe ntaina kantu, busaho n'omu ou naleetiire bulemeezi, baitu ebi nkaba ninyetaaga nkabiheebwa bagenzi baitu abaarugire Makedoni. Nahabweki nkeerinda kandi ndyerinda kutabajwahya omu mulingo gwona.
Kanjurre amazima ga Kristo aga nyinago nti: Busaho n'omu alintanga kwehaisa omunsi za Akaaya.
Kandi eki nsobora kukigamba ntarukubagonza? Ruhanga amanyire nkooku ndukubagonza.
Baitu eki ndukukora hati nikyo ndiikara ninkora, nukwo ncwe abo abarukugonza kwehaisa ngu, omulimo ogu barukukora nugwo gumu n'ogwaitu.
Nangwa, abantu nk'abo tubeeta bakwenda b'ebisuba, bakozi ngobya, nibeefoora nk'abakwenda ba Kristo.
Eki kireke kutuhuniriza, habwokuba na Sitaani wenka ayefoora nka malaika w'omusana.
Nahabweki tikirukuhuniriza kurora abaheereza be nibeefoora nk'abaheereza b'obuhikiriire. Empero yaabo eringana ebikorwa ebi barukukora.
Ningaruka kugamba nti: Muleke kuteekereza ngu, ndi mudoma. Nangwa, noobu muraaba nimunteekereza muti, baitu mungumiisirize nk'omudoma, nukwo nyehaisizeeho kake.
(Eki ndukwija kugamba, tindukukigambisibwa obusobozi bwa MUKAMA, baitu ninkigamba nk'omudoma arukugumya ngu, aina eky'okwehaisaniza.
Abaingi nkooku beehaisa nibasigikira ha by'ensi enu, na nyowe ka nyehaise nti.)
Inywe muba b'amagezi, nikyo abadoma mubagumiisiririza n'okusemererwa!
Mumanyire kugumiisiriza omuntu noobu abafoora abairu, rundi abanyaga, rundi abazindiriza, rundi abeehulirraho, rundi abateera empi.
Ebi nimbigamba nk'anyakwina ensoni, habwokuba itwe tutasobole kubigumira. Baitu ebireetera omuntu weena obumanzi obw'okwehaisa; kambaze nk'omudoma-na nyowe nibyo birukundeetera kwehaisa.
Bbo Bahebburaayo? Na nyowe nukwo ndi. Bbo Baisrairi? Na nyowe nukwo ndi. Bbo baijukuru ba Abburahamu? Na nyowe nukwo ndi.

Bbo baheereza ba Kristo? Na nyowe nukwo ndi kandi nimbakira; kambaze nk'omugu w'iraro, nimbakira omu kukora muno, nimbakira omu kubohwa omu nkomo emirundi nyingi, omu kuteerwa enkoba ezitarukubarwa, n'omu kabi k'okufa emirundi nyingi.
Emirundi etaano Abayudaaya bakanteera enkoba asatu na mwenda.
Nkateerwa emiigo kasatu, nateerwa amabaale omurundi gumu. Emeeri naagenderamuga ekacweka emirundi esatu: naagwa omu nyanja naasiibamu kandi naaraaramu.

Emirundi nyingi omu ngendo zange nkagwa omu kabi k'ebisaaru, akabi k'abanyagi, akabi omu bantu ab'ihanga lyange, akabi omu Banyamahanga, akabi omu rubuga, akabi omu irungu, akabi omu nyanja, akabi omu bagenzi baitu ab'ebisuba;
omu kutalibana n'omu kulemererwa, omu kuraara ha muro emirundi nyingi, omu njara n'iroho, omu kuburwa ebyokulya emirundi etali emu, n'omu mbeho ntaina eky'okwefubika.
Noobu ndaaba ntagambire bindi, haroho n'ebirukundemeera buli kiro, kukira muno okutunturra ebitebe byona by'abaikiriza.
Nooha aceka, nyowe ntacekere? Nooha ayesiitazibwa, nyowe ntabiihirwe?
Obu ndaaba ndi w'okwehaisa, kanyehaise habw'ebintu ebyoleka obuceke bwange;
Ruhanga, kandi Ise MUKAMA Yesu, anyakuhaisanizibwa ebiro byona, naamanya nkooku ntarukubiiha.
Omu Damasiko omulemi omukuru ow'Omukama Areeta akataho abalinzi orubuga Damasiko nukwo ankwate.
Baitu abaikiriza bakanta omu kisombero, bandabya omu idirisa, bansirimurra ha kisika ky'orubuga, naacwa omu mikono ye.
Nyowe kimpikiriire okwehaisa, noobu ndaaba ntarukukutungamu kantu. Leka nyongere kubagambira MUKAMA ebi yansuukuliire omu kubonekerwa.
Nimmanya omuntu anyakwikiriza Kristo, ayatwairwe omu iguru lya kasatu, hati haahingwireho emyaka ikumi n'ena-rundi akaba aina omubiri rundi atainagwo, tindukumanya. Ruhanga nuwe arukumanya.
Kandi nimmanya omuntu ogu nkooku yatwairwe omu Kiikaro ky'Okuhiirwa-rundi akaba aina omubiri rundi atainagwo, tindukumanya. Ruhanga nuwe arukumanya.
Akahurrayo ebigambo omuntu ebi atasobora kwatura kandi omuntu ebi atasobora kusubirra.
Leka nyehaise habw'omuntu ogu, baitu habwange tindukwija kwehaisa, kwihaho omu buceke bwange.

Noobu ndatandika kwehaisa, baitu eki tikyanteere obudoma, habwokuba ninyija kubaza amazima. Nangwa kankireke, tihaikara kubaho omuntu arukunteekerezaho ebirukukira ebi arukundoramu, rundi ebi arukumpurraho.
Baitu okuntanga kwehaisa muno habw'ebingi ebi naasuukuliirwe, nkacumitwa ihwa omu mubiri, liri nk'omukwenda wa Sitaani ow'okumbonesa, ntaliija kuhinguraniza omu kwehaisa.
Nkeesengereza MUKAMA emirundi esatu, lindugeho;

baitu uwe yangarukamu ati: “Obukonyezi bwange nibukumara, habwokuba amaani gange gahikirizibwa omu buceke bw'abantu.” Nikyo ndukwesiimira muno okwehaisaniza omu buceke bwange, nukwo amaani ga Kristo gasobole kwikara omuli nyowe.
Habwa Kristo, nikyo ndukusemererwa omu buceke, omu kujumwa, omu kulemererwa, omu kuhiiganizibwa, n'omu mihito; habwokuba obu mba muceke, nubwo ngira amaani.
Mazimakwo mbalize nk'omudoma! Niinywe mukimpambiriize, habwokuba niinywe mwakubaire nimumpaisa. Noobu ndaaba ntali kantu, baitu abakwenda abo rurangaanwa tibaina eki barukunkiza naakake.
Ebikorwa by'omukwenda ow'amazima nkabikorra omuli inywe ninyehayo muno. Nkabakorramu ebirukuhuniriza, ebyamahano, hamu n'ebikorwa by'amaani.
Ebitebe ebindi by'abaikiriza tukabakorra karungi ki aka tutarabakoliire inywe? Rundi nyowe habw'okutabasaba kantu? Ensobi egi muginganyire!

Gunu nugwo omurundi gwa kasatu nyeteekaniize kwija owaanyu. Tindukwijayo kubaleetera obulemeezi, habwokuba tindukuserrayo ebyanyu, baitu ninserra inywe. Ningira abaana tibasemeriire kwahurra abazaire eby'okubakoonyera, baitu abazaire nubo baahurra abaana.
Nyowe ndihayo ebyange n'okusemererwa kandi nyeheyo nyenka habw'emyoyo yanyu. Baitu nyowe habw'okubagonza muno, nikyo murasigikiraho kungonza kake?
Mukaikiriza nkooku ntarabaleetiire bulemeezi, baitu nimugamba ngu, nkaba ndi ncwangya kandi nkabagobeza.
Hali abo aba nabatumireho, haroho ou nayekonyiize okubagobeza?
Nkeesengereza Tito kwija oku, namutuma kugenda na mugenzi waitu onu. Kandi Tito aina eki yabagobiize? Tutakoze omwoyo gumu? Tutakwate ekirale kimu?
Na hati hoona nimukyateekereza ngu, tubaire nitwetonganirra omu maiso ganyu? Abagonzibwa, byona ebi turukubaza tubibaliza omu maiso ga Ruhanga, nkooku Kristo yakubibaliize habw'okubombeka.

Eki ndukutiina nukwo kwija nkabasanga mwina engeso ezi ntarukwenda, kandi na inywe mukansanga nyina engeso ezi mutaakwenzire; tihaikara kubayo enkungani, ihali, ekiniga, okwegonza, okuhangiira, okugambisibwa, okwetumbura, n'okujagaraza abantu.

Nintiina ngu, obu ndigaruka kwija, Ruhanga wange alimbundaaza omu maiso gaanyu, nukwo na nyowe ndirirre baingi omuli abo abaakozire kara ebibi, kandi abaayangire okwegarukamu obubi bwabu, obusiihani, n'orwanju ebi baakozire.
Gunu guraaba murundi gwa kasatu nyowe okwija owaanyu. Haroho nambere kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Buli musango gusemeriire kugumibwa abakaiso babiri rundi basatu.”
Abo abaakozire kara ebibi nkabahabura, hamu n'abandi boona. Hati noobu ndaaba ntaliyo, nimbahabura nkooku naakozire omu kubunga kwange okwa kabiri nti: Obu ndigaruka obundi, tindukwija kubaganyira
habwokuba mwikara nimwenda ekihuniriza ekiraagumya Kristo nkooku arukubaliza omuli nyowe. Uwe takwata mpora, baitu abakwasa amaani.
Akabambwa ali muceke, baitu hati ayomiire habw'amaani ga Ruhanga. Na itwe tuli baceke omuli uwe, baitu omu kubaheereza, naija kutwomeeza habw'amaani ga Ruhanga.
Mwekebere inywenka, murole obu muraaba mukyagumiire omu kwikiriza kwanyu. Mwerengese inywenka. timurukumanya Yesu Kristo nkooku ali omuli inywe? Rundi buli, ekirengeso kibasingire!
Ninihira nimwija kwetegereza itwe nkooku tutasingirwe.
Baitu nitusaba Ruhanga mutakora kibi na kimu. tikuli kugamba ngu, itwe tukasinga ekirengeso, baitu inywe mukole ebihikire, itwe noobu turaaba nitusisa abasingirwe.
Titurukusobora kuhakaniza amazima, kwihaho nitugarwanirra.
Itwe nitusemererwa obu tuba baceke, baitu inywe mukaba b'amaani. eki turukusaba, inywe mube bahikiriire.
Binu mbibahandiikiire ntakabahikireho, nukwo obu ndiija ndeke kwolekera kimu obusobozi obu nahairwe MUKAMA obw'okubagumya n'okwombeka, baitu butali obw'okubahwerekereza.
Nimmalirra nimbaraga bagenzi bange, mugoroobe. Mwegarukemu. Ebi mbagambiire mubiteho omutima, mwikirranize, mwikale n'obusinge. Obu nubwo Ruhanga ow'engonzi kandi ow'obusinge aliikara na inywe.
Muramukyangane nimugwangana omu kifuba. Abantu ba Ruhanga boona nibabaramukya.
Embabazi za MUKAMA Yesu Kristo, okugonza kwa Ruhanga, n'okuteerana hamu kwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire biikalege na inywe inywena.
Nyowe Paulo omukwenda-ataratairweho bantu noobu kwakuba kutumwa omuntu, baitu ayakomerwe Yesu Kristo na Ruhanga Ise ayamuhumbwire omu bafu
na bagenzi baitu boona aba ndi nabo, nituhandiikira ebitebe by'abaikiriza abali Galatiya:
Nitubagondeza omugisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo,
ayayehaireyo kutujuna ebibi byaitu naatwiha omu businge bunu obubi nkooku Ruhanga Isiitwe yagondeze.
Ruhanga ogu aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro n'ebiro Amiina.
Nimpunirra kurora nimuruga bwango hali Ogu ayabeesire habw'embabazi za Kristo, nimwikiriza amakuru agandi.
Tikuli kugira ngu, haroho amakuru amarungi agandi, baitu haroho abamu abarukubatuntuza kandi nibenda kuramaza Amakuru Amarungi aga Kristo.
Kakuba itwe, rundi malaika anyakuruga omu iguru akabarangirra amakuru agandi agatali ago aga twabarangiriire kara, ogu akyenwe.
Nkooku twabagambiire kara, na hati nikyo ndukwongera kubagambira nti: Kakuba omuntu abarangirra amakuru amarungi agatali ago aga mwaikiriize, ogu akyenwe.
Mara nyowe ninserra kusiimwa abantu Ruhanga? Rundi si ningenderra abantu basiime ebi ndukukora? Obu naakubaire ninkyakora ebirukusiimwa abantu, tinaakubaire muheereza wa Kristo.
Nahabweki bagenzi bange, ninyenda mumanye ngu, Amakuru Amarungi aga narangiriire tigarugire mu bantu.
Nyowe ntagaheebwe muntu kandi ntageegesebwe, baitu nkagasuukulirwa Yesu Kristo.
Na inywe mukahurra eby'obwomeezi bwange obwabandize, nkyali omu diini ey'Ekiyudaaya: nkooku naahiiganiize muno ekitebe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga, ninyekamba kukihwerekeeza.
Kandi nkeeyongera muno omu diini ey'Ekiyudaaya, nakira baingi omu bantu ab'ihanga lyange aba nainganaga nabo emyaka, nkeekambira muno emirwa ey'abaisenkuru itwe.
Baitu ayansoroire ntakazairwe, yanyeta habw'embabazi ze,
akasiima okunsuukurra Omwana we, nukwo nsobole kumurangirra omu Banyamahanga, nteehanuuze abantu,
kandi ntagende Yerusaalemu kwehanuuza hali abo abambandize kuba bakwenda; baitu nkagenda Arabiya, hanyuma nagaruka Damasiko.
Obu haahingwireho emyaka esatu, nagenda Yerusaalemu kurora Keefa, namara nawe ebiro ikumi na bitaano.
Ntarole n'omu ha bakwenda abandi kwihaho Yakobbo, mugenzi wa Mukama waitu.
(Omuli ebi ndukubahandiikira, nindahira omu maiso ga Ruhanga nkooku ntarukubiiha bisuba!)
Nubwo naagenda omu bicweka bya Siriya na Kilikiya.
Obu, ebitebe by'abaikiriza Kristo ab'omu Bayudaaya bakaba batakandoraga;
kyonka bakahurra abantu nibagamba bati: “Ogu ayatuhiiganizaaga, hati nuwe arukurangirra enyikiriza ei yalengahoga ira kuhwerekereza.”
Nukwo bbo kukugiza Ruhanga habwange.
Kandi obu haahingwireho emyaka ikumi n'ena, nkagaruka Yerusaalemu hamu na Baranaba, naatwara na Tito.

Ekyantwaireyo nukwo kusuukururwa, nasoborra abakwenda Amakuru Amarungi aga ndangirra Abanyamahanga (nagasoborra omu nsita kandi omu maiso g'abo abakaba bali baarangaanwa muli bo) ntaikara kuba nk'arukwirukira busa rundi ayairukiire busa.
Kandi na Tito ou nkaba nyinawe, atahambirizibwe kusarwa noobwakubaire yali Mugiriiki.
Baitu eky'okusarwa kikaleetwa bagenzi baitu ab'ebisuba abaatutaahiremu tutamanyire, batate obugabe bwaitu obu twina omu Kristo Yesu, nukwo batugarre omu bwiru.
Abo tutaboorobere naakake konka, nukwo amazima g'Amakuru Amarungi gasobole kulindwa habwanyu gatahindukire.

Kandi hali abo abakaba bali baarangaanwa omuli bo, (okurangaanwa kwabu oku nyowe ntakufeeho, habwokuba Ruhanga tasoroora)-ningamba nti: Abo abakaba nibarangaanwa muli bo tibaina eki baayongiireho kumpabura.
Kimu kyonka bakamara kwetegereza nkooku nakwasiibwe Amakuru Amarungi kugarangirra abatasazirwe, nka Petero oku yagakwasiibwe habw'abasazirwe.
(Ningira ogu ayasoboize Petero okuhikya obukwenda ha basazirwe, nuwe yasoboize nyowe kubuhikya ha Banyamahanga.)

Yakobbo, Keefa, na Yohaana abakaba bamanyirwe nkooku bali nyomyo z'ekitebe, obu baayetegeriize omugisa ogu nahairwe, bakaikirraniza na nyowe nibagamba ngu, itwe na Baranaba tugende omu Banyamahanga, kandi bbo bagende omu basazirwe.
Kyonka eki baatuteeriire nukwo kwijuka abanaku, eki na nyowe nikyo natahoga omutima kukora.
Baitu Keefa obu yahikire Antyokiya nkamuhakaniza nimmugambira burole, habwokuba akazooka asobeze muno.
Abantu abamu abaatumirwe Yakobbo obu bakaba batakaizire, uwe yalyaga n'Abanyamahanga. Baitu obu bamazire kwija, yayehinya, yabeecwaho habw'okutiina ab'ekitebe ky'abasazirwe.
Abayudaaya abandi nabo bakahondera obucwangya bwe; nangwa na Baranaba yabagenderamu.

Baitu obu naboine batarukugendera ha mazima ag'Amakuru Amarungi, nagambira Keefa omumaiso g'abo boona nti: “Baitu iwe Omuyudaaya, obu oraaba noohondera engeso z'Abanyamahanga otarukukora nk'Omuyudaaya, osobora ota kuhambiriza Abanyamahanga kuhondera engeso ez'Abayudaaya?”
Itwe abaasazirwe, tuli Bayudaaya nyakabara, tituli Banyamahanga abasiisi.

Kandi tumanyire omuntu nkooku atahikirizibwa kworobera Ebiragiro, baitu ahikirizibwa okwikiriza Yesu Kristo; kandi na itwe tukaikiriza Yesu Kristo, nukwo tuhikirizibwe Ruhanga habw'okwikiriza Kristo, hatali kworobera Ebiragiro. Ningira busaho muntu alihikirizibwa okworobera Ebiragiro.
Nangwa na itwe noobu turaaba nitwekambira okuhikirra habw'okwikiriza Kristo, nabwo tukyali basiisi. Nukwo kugamba ngu, Kristo nuwe muleesi w'ebibi? Nikikafuuhe!
Nyowe kakuba ningaruka hati kwombeka ebi naseesire ira, buli ninkigumya nkooku nkaba ncwire Ebiragiro.
Habwokuba omu Biragiro nkaba nfiire; gamba Ebiragiro nibyo byanyisire, nukwo nyongere nyomeere hali Ruhanga.

Nkabambwa ha musaraba hamu na Kristo; takyali nyowe arukwomeera, baitu Kristo nuwe arukwomerra omuli nyowe. Kandi obwomeezi obu nyinabwo hati omu mubiri, nyinabwo habw'okwikiriza Omwana wa Ruhanga ayangondeze kandi yayehayo habwange.
Tindukwija kunagaija mbabazi za Ruhanga; habwokuba obuhikiriire obu buliba bwarabire omu Biragiro, buli Kristo akafeera busa.
Inywe Abagalatiya abadoma! Nooha ayabarogere? Inywe abayolekerwe bwerebwere Kristo nkooku yabambirwe ha musaraba!
Kambakaguze kimu kyonka: Mukaheebwa Mwoyo habw'okuhikiriza Ebiragiro rundi habw'okwikiriza Amakuru Amarungi aga mwahuliire?
Muli badomakwo? Mukatandika omu Mwoyo, hati nimwija kumalirra omu mubiri?
Ebingi byona ebi mwarabiremu, mukabigumiisiririza busa? Obu kiraaba kiri kiti, mazimakwo mukagumiisiririza busa.
Ruhanga anyakubaha Mwoyo kandi akakorra ebyamahano omuli inywe, ebi si abibakorra nukwo muhikirize Ebiragiro rundi Amakuru Amarungi aga mwahuliire?
Abburahamu nawe nukwo “yaikiriize ati Ruhanga, kandi kyamubalirwa kuba muhikiriire.”
Nahabweki nimurora abaikiriza nkooku nubo bali baana b'Abburahamu.

Kandi Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera obu byarangire kara nkooku Ruhanga alihikiriza Abanyamahanga habw'okwikiriza, byamanyisa Abburahamu, Amakuru Amarungi ganu gatakabaireho, nibigamba biti: “Omuli iwe amahanga goona numwo galiheerwa omugisa.”
Nukwo kiti abo abaina okwikiriza baheebwa omugisa nk'ogwa Abburahamu ayaikiriize ira.
Boona abeesiga okworobera Ebiragiro, bali b'okukyenwa; habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Weena atakwata byona ebihandiikirwe omu kitabu kyebiragiro kandi akabihikya ogu akyeenwe!”
Baitu nikizookera kimu nkooku hataroho muntu ahikirra omumaiso ga Ruhanga habw'Ebiragiro; habwokuba: “Ogu anyakuhikirizibwa okwikiriza, nuwe alyomeera.”
Ebiragiro tibisigikira ha kwikiriza: “Habwokuba ogu anyakuhikiriza Ebiragiro, nibyo birimwomeeza.”
Baitu Kristo akatucungura yatwiha omu mukyeno gw'Ebiragiro obu yafookere mukyenwa habwaitu habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Weena anyakuhanikwa ha muti, buli akyenerwe.”
Eki kikakorwa kiti, nukwo omu Kristo Yesu omugisa gw'Abburahamu gusobole kuhikaho Abanyamahanga, na itwe habw'okwikiriza tusobole kutunga Mwoyo ou twaraganiziibwe.
Bagenzi bange, kambahe ekyokurorraho ekya buli kiro. Tiharoho anyakudibya engwetano y'omuntu noobwakubaire kugyongeraho, emazire kuteebwaho omukono.
Nukwo ebyaraganiziibwe, Ruhanga akabiraganiza Abburahamu n'omwijukuru we. Hatali kugamba ngu: “N'abaijukuru”, nk'abaingi; baitu nikigamba hali omu, kiti: “N'omwijukuru waawe.” Ogu nuwe Kristo.
Eki ndukumanyisa nikyo kinu: Ebiragiro ebyaizire haahingwireho emyaka bikumi bbina n'asatu, tibirukudibya endagaano Ruhanga ei yagumize ira, kandi tibirukuburanganiza ekyaraganizibwe.
Habwokuba obugwetwa, obu buraaba buroho habw'Ebirago, nibuba butakyali bw'endagaano; baitu Ruhanga akabuheera Abburahamu omu ndagaano.

Hati nu, Ebiragiro bikateerwaho ki? Bikateebwaho habw'okusiisa kw'abantu, okuhika omwijukuru ayahairwe endagaano egi, obu aliija. Kandi Ebiragiro ebi bikarangirirwa bamalaika nibaraba omu muteeraniza (nuwe Musa).
Omuteeraniza abaho habw'abaingi, baitu Ruhanga ali omu.
Aho nu Ebiragiro nibihakaniza Ruhanga ebi yaraganiize? Naakake konka. Kakuba twahairwe Ebiragiro ebisobora kwomeeza, mazimakwo obuhikiriire bwakurugure omu Biragiro.
Baitu Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera, ebi byona bikabibarra omu bwiru bw'ekibi, nukwo eki ekyaraganiziibwe habw'okwikiriza Yesu Kristo, kiheebwe abo abamwikiriza.
Nukwo nu, okwikiriza obu kukaba kutakaizire, tukaba nitulemwa Ebiragiro. Tukaikara nitulemwa tuti okuhika okwikiriza obu kwatusuukuliirwe.
Habweki, Ebiragiro bikatulinda okuhika Kristo obu yaizire, nukwo tusobole kuhikirizibwa okwikiriza.
Baitu hati okwikiriza obu kwizire, titukyalemwa omulinzi ogu owa ira;
habwokuba inywena muli baana ba Ruhanga omu Kristo Yesu habw'okwikiriza.
Baingi omuli inywe nkooku mwabatiziibwe omu Kristo, hati nimusisanira kimu Kristo omu ngeso ze.
Tihakyaroho Muyudaaya rundi Mugiriiki, tihakyaroho mwiru rundi ow'obugabe, tihakyaroho musaija rundi omukazi; habwokuba inywena muli kimu omu Kristo Yesu.
Obu muraaba muli ba Kristo, muli baijukuru b'Abburahamu, bagwetwa nkooku endagaano erukugamba.
Eki ndukugenderra nkinu: omugwetwa, obu aba akiri mwana muto, taina eki akiza omwiru, kandi kunu nuwe aliba mukama w'ebintu byona.
Baitu aikara naaroleererwa abaleezi n'abakuza okuhika ha kasumi ise yataireho.
Na itwe nukwo tuli tuti. Obu tukaba tuli abaana bato, twalemwaga embandwa za kara ez'ensi.
Baitu akasumi obu kaahikire, Ruhanga yatuma Omwana we, ayazairwe omukazi. Akazaarwa naalemwa Ebiragiro,
nukwo acungule abo abaalemwaga Ebiragiro, tusobole kufoorwa baana b'omu ka ya Ruhanga.
Kandi itwe, habw'okuba baana, Ruhanga akatuma Mwoyo wa Mwana we omu mitima yaitu nayamirra ati: “Abba! Isiitwe!”
Nahabweki tokyali mwiru, baitu oli mwana, kandi nkooku oli mwana, buli oli mugwetwa, nukwo Ruhanga naija kukuha ebi ayaahurra abaana be.
Kara obu mukaba mutamanyire Ruhanga, mwali bairu b'ebitaroho;
baitu hati nkooku murukumanya Ruhanga kandi nawe naabamanya, musobora muta kugarukira embandwa eza ira ezitaina maani kandi ensungamirizi? Nimwenda kwefoora bairu baazo obwakabiri?
Inywe abarukuta omutima ha biro, ha meezi, ha busumi, na ha myaka!
Ninsaalirwa kurora nkooku, natalibaniire busa habwanyu.
Bagenzi bange nimbeesengereza, mube nka nyowe; habwokuba na nyowe nkeefoora nka inywe. Timwina kabi aka mwankoliire.
Kandi mukimanyire kurungi ngu, endwara yange egi, niyo yandeeteriize kubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi omurundi gw'okubanza.
Endwara egi noobu eraaba yabatalibaniize, baitu mutannuge kandi mutanyekanase. Kyonka mukanjwahukirra nka malaika wa Ruhanga, rundi nka Kristo Yesu wonyini.
Okusemererwa oku mwagizire omu mitima yanyu kukagya nkaha? Nyowe ningumya nti: Mwakubaire mweihiremu amaiso ganyu mugampa, kakuba kyasobokere.
Mara hati nfookere munyanzigwa wanyu habw'okubagambira amazima?
Abantu abo babahaahira kwonka, baitu tibabagondeza birungi. Benda kubaanyahukanizaho, nukwo na inywe mubagonze.
Kirungi kugonzebwa abantu habw'ebi murukukora, baitu leka babagonze butoosa, hatali kubasoonasoona obu mba ndi na inywe bwonka.
Niinywe baana bange, aba ngarukire kusaalirirwa nk'omukazi arukuzaara, okuhika Kristo obu araatondeka omuli inywe.
Naakugondeze kuba na inywe hati, nukwo mpingiseho emigambire yange, habwokuba nintuntura muno habwanyu.
Inywe abarukwenda kulemwa Ebiragiro, kinu mukingambire: Timuhurra Ebiragiro ebi bigamba?
Ningira kikahandiikwa kiti: Abburahamu akaba aina abatabani babiri: omu akamuzaara ha muzaana, ondi yamuzaara ha mukazi ow'obugabe.
Baitu omwana w'omuzaana akazaarwa habw'endagaano eyakozirwe Ruhanga.
Amakuru g'ekyokurorraho eki nugo ganu: abakazi abo ababiri nibamanyisa endagaano ibiri. Omukazi omu akaruga ha rusozi Sinai, yazaara abaana b'obwiru; nuwe Hagari.
Habwokuba Sinai nurwo rusozi oruli omunsi ya Arabbiya; kandi Hagari naasisanizibwa na Yerusaalemu orw'ebiro binu, na hati ali omu bwiru hamu n'abaana be'
Baitu Yerusaalemu orw'omwiguru, nurwo mukazi w'obugabe kandi nurwo nyinaitwe.

Nimwijuka nkooku kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Kyanganuka iwe engumba, etazaara; haguka, otoke iwe atakakwatwaga bisa eby'okuzaara; habwokuba omukazi ayanagaizirwe aina abaana baingi okukira anyakwikara na musaija we.”
Hati bagenzi bange, na itwe tuli baana abaaraganizibwe nka Isaaka.
Baitu oli ayazairwe habw'okwegomba kw'omubiri omu kasumi kali, nkooku yahiiganiize ondi ayazairwe habwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire, na hati hoona nukwo kiri.
Ebihandiko Ebirukwera bigamba bita? Bigamba biti: “Binga omuzaana n'omwana we, habwokuba omwana w'omuzana taligwetwa hamu n'omwana w'omukazi ow'obugabe.”
Habweki bagenzi bange, tituli baana b'omuzaana, baitu tuli b'omukazi ow'obugabe.
Kristo akatwiha omu bwiru yatuha obugabe; nahabweki mugume, muleke kugaruka omu kikoligo ky'obwiru.
Hati nyowe Paulo nimbagambira nti: Kakuba musarwa, Kristo taina eki alisobora kubagasira.
Ninyongera kukigumya nti: Weena anyakwikiriza kusarwa, asemeriire kukwata Ebiragiro byona.
Baitu inywe abarukugonza kuhikirizibwa Ebiragiro, nimwebaganiza hali Kristo, mwaruga ha mbabazi ze.
Kandi itwe abarukwikiriza, tutegereza kandi tunihira kutunga obuhikiriire oburukuleetwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Obu tuba tuli omu Kristo Yesu, okusarwa n'okutasarwa tikwina mugaso. Eky'omugaso nukwo kwikiriza okurukukozesibwa engonzi.
Mukaba nimugenda kurungi! Hati nooha ayabatangire kworobera amazima?
Okubiihabiihwa oku kutaruge hali ogu ayabeesire, nangwa.
Mwijuke ekitumbisa ekike nkooku kirukutumbisa ihyanga lyona.
Nimbeesiga omu Mukama nkooku mutarukwija kwikiriza ebindi ebitali byange. Kandi ogu arukubatuntuza, noobu araaba ali ata, baitu alicwerwa omusango.
Hati bagenzi bange, kakuba mba ninkyayegesa abantu kusarwa nkooku njunaanwa, habwaki bakyampiiganiza? Baitu obu kiraaba kiri kiti, enyegesa yange ey'omusaraba gwa Kristo eba etakyali nkonge.
Nyowe naakugondeze abo abarukubatuntuza beegoole bonka!
Bagenzi bange, inywe mukateerwa obugabe; kyonka obugabe bwanyu mutabufoora byekwaso by'okukora omubiri ebi gugonza, baitu muherezangane omu ngonzi.
Ningira Ebiragiro byona bihikirizibwa omu kiragiro ekigamba kiti: “Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka.”
Baitu obu muraaba nimunenangana kandi nimulyangana, mwerinde mutamaranganaho.
Nyowe nimbagambira nti: Mugendege nimwebemberwa Mwoyo Ahikiire, muleke kutwalirizibwa omubiri ebi gwegomba.
Ebi omubiri gwegomba birwanisa Mwoyo, kandi Mwoyo ebi agonza birwanisa omubiri. Ebi byombi birwanisangana, nukwo mutasobora kukora ebi mwakugondeze.
Kakuba mwebemberwa Mwoyo, buli muba mutakyalemwa Biragiro bya Musa.
Ebikorwa by'omubiri nibyeyoleka, nibyo binu: obusiihani, eby'obuhemu, orwanju,
okuramya abacwezi, oburogo, enkungani obunyanzigwa, ihali, ekiniga, okwegonza, empaka, okweyahuranamu,
itima, obutamiizi, ebisimba by'obutamiizi, n'ebindi ebirukusisana biti. Nimbahabura nkooku nabahabwire kara, abo abakora ebintu nk'ebi, tibaligweterwa bukama bwa Ruhanga.
Baitu ebirungi ebinyakuzooka omu muntu anyakwina Mwoyo nibyo binu: engonzi, okusemererwa, obusinge, okugumiisiriza, embabazi, oburungi, obwesigwa,
obuculeezi n'okwetanga. Ebintu nk'ebi tibiina kiragiro ekirukubitanga.
Abantu ba Kristo Yesu, bakabamba ha musaraba omubiri gwabo n'okwegomba kwagwo okubi, hamu n'amairu gaagwo.
Obu turaaba nitwomeezibwa Mwoyo, leka nuwe atwebembere mu byona.
Baitu tuleke kwekuliriza, kwenderezangana, n'okugirrangana ihali.
Bagenzi bange, kakuba omuntu agwa omu nsobi, inywe abaina Mwoyo Ahikiriire mumwimukye n'omutima gw'embabazi. Mwerinde, na inywe timwikara kwohebwa muti.
Mujunangane obulemeezi bwanyu, nukwo muhikirize Ekiragiro kya Kristo.
Kakuba omuntu ayebara kuba w'omugaso, kandi kunu talikwo, aba naayebiiha.
Baitu leka buli omu ayekebiije ebikorwa bye, nukwo abe n'obulyo obw'okwenyumiza, hatali kwenyumiriza hali mutaahi we.
Habwokuba buli omu alyetweka omugugu gwe.
Leka ogu arukwega ekigambo kya Kristo, abagane ebirungi bye byona n'ogu arukumwegesa.
Muleke kubiihwabiihwa; Ruhanga tateburwa. Kyona omuntu eki asiga, nikyo aligesa.
Habwokuba ogu anyakusiga omu mubiri gwe, omu numwo aligesa okufa; baitu ogu anyakusiga omu Mwoyo wa Ruhanga, omu Mwoyo numwo aligesa obwomeezi obutahwaho.
Tuleke kugarukirra omu kukora ebirungi, habwokuba akasumi obu kalihika tuligesa, kusangwa tutaterebuka.
Nukwo nu, obu tukyaina omwanya, tukorre abantu boona ebirungi, kandi okukira muno abo ab'oruganda orw'abaikiriza.
Murole nkooku ndukubahandiikira omu nyuguta enkooto n'omukono gwange nyenka.
Abo abagonza okwezookesa kurungi omu by'omubiri, nubo babahambiriza kusarwa. Eki bagenderra kiri kimu kyonka ngu, baleke kuhiiganizibwa habw'omusaraba gwa Kristo.
Nangwa n'abaasazirwe abo bonyini nabo tibahikiriza Ebiragiro bya Musa; baitu bagonza inywe musarwe, nukwo basobole kwenyumiriza habw'emibiri yanyu.
Nikikafuuhe nyowe kwenyumiza, ntenyumiriize omu musaraba gwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, ogwaleetiire ensi kubambwa habwange, na nyowe kubambwa habwayo.
Okusarwa rundi okutasarwa tikwina mugaso, baitu eky'omugaso nukwo kufooka kihangwa ekihyaka.
Obusinge n'embabazi bibe hali boona abarukuhondera eki mbahabwire, nubo Abaisirairi ba Ruhanga.
Okuruga hati haleke kubaho n'omu arukuntuntuza; habwokuba nyowe nyina enkojo za Yesu ha mubiri gwange.
Bagenzi bange, omugisa gwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo gwikale na inywe. Amiina.
Nyowe Paulo, Omukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, Ruhanga nkooku yasiimire, nimpandiikira abantu abeesigwa ba Ruhanga abahindukiire Kristo omu Efeeso.
Nimbagondeza emigisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali MUKAMA Yesu Kristo.
Ahaisanizibwe Ruhanga, Ise MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, ayatuheeriire omu Kristo emigisa yoona ey'omwoyo enyakuruga omwiguru.
Ruhanga akatukomera omu Kristo ensi etakahangirwe, tube barukwera kandi abataina kamogo omumaiso ge.
Habw'okutugonza akatukoma kara tufooke baana be omu Kristo Yesu, entegeka ye nkooku ekaba eri.
Eki akakikora nukwo tusiime embabazi ze ez'ekitiinisa ezi yatugiririire busa omu Mugonzibwa we.
Omuli uwe numwo tucungulirwa habw'okufa kwe, tuganyirwa ensobi zaitu habw'embabazi ze enyingi
ezi yatugiriire.
Omu magezi goona n'omu kwetegereza kwona Ruhanga akatumanyisa entegeka ei yasiimire, niyo nsita ei yatwolekiire omu Kristo.
Kandi niyo entegeka ey'okuteeraniza ebintu byona omu Kristo: eby'omwiguru n'eby'omu nsi, akasumi obu kalihika.
Itwe Abayudaaya abaabandize kunihira omu Kristo, tukasoroorwa, twakomwa,
ka twikale nituhaisaniza ekitiinisa ky'ogu anyakuhikiriza byona, Ruhanga nkooku ategeka kandi asiima.
Na inywe Abanyamahanga abaahuliire ekigambo eky'amazima, nugo Amakuru Amarungi ag'okujunwa kwanyu omuli uwe, mukaikiriza, mwateebwaho emanyikirizo ya Myoyo Ahikiriire ayaraganiziibwe.
Mwoyo ogu nuwe musimbo ogw'obugwetwa bwaitu okuhika obu tulibutunga, nukwo ekitiinisa kye kihaisanizibwe.
Nahabweki obu mpuliire nkooku murukwikiriza MUKAMA Yesu kandi nkooku murukugonza abaikiriza boona,
tindukulekerra kusiima Ruhanga habwanyu, nimbaijuka omu kusaba kwange.
nukwo Ruhanga wa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, Isiitwe ow'ekitiinisa abahe omwoyo ogw'amazima n'ogw'okwetegereza ebyasuukwirwe, nukwo mumumanye.
Obu alimara kumulikira emitima yanyu musobole kumanya amakuru ag'okunihira oku yabeetiire n'obwingi obw'obugwetwa obw'ekitiinisa obu yaraganiize abantu be,
n'amaani ge agatalengwa agarukukorra omuli itwe abaikiriza. Nugo gamu n'amaani ge
aga yayolekiire omu Kristo, obu yamuhumbwire omu bafu, yamwikaliza ha mukono ogw'obulyo omu biikaro eby'omwiguru.
Oku nuho Kristo ategekera ebitebe byona eby'abamalaika abakuru, n'ab'obusobozi, ab'amaani n'abalemi, rundi ekikubyo ekindi kyona, tihali omu biro binu byonka, baitu n'omu biro ebiriija.
Ebintu byona Ruhanga akabita hansi y'ebigere bye, kandi yamufoora mutwe gw'ekitebe kyona ky'abaikiriza.
Ekitebe eki nugwo mubiri gwe, okuhikirra kwa Kristo anyakuhikiriza byona omu boona.
Kandi na inywe akabomeeza bu mukaba mufeeriire omu nsobi n'omu bibi,
ebi mwakoraga ira nimuhondera emihanda y'ensi enu, nimukuraatira omukuru ow'emyoyo emibi ey'omu mwanya gw'iguru, hati nugwo mwoyo ogurukukorra omu baana entahurra.
Ira na itwe tukaba tubarumu nitukuraatira okwegomba okw'omubiri, nitukora ebi ebyegombwa omubiri n'ebiteekerezo byaitu. Nahabweki omu buzaaranwa tukaba tuli bantu b'okukyenwa Ruhanga nk'abandi boona.
Baitu Ruhanga ow'embabazi nyingi, habw'engonzi ezitagambwa ezi yatugondezeemu,
noobu tukaba tuferiire omu nsobi zaitu, baitu akatwomeeza hamu na Kristo, (embabazi ze nizo zaabajunire).
Akatuhumbuura nawe, yatwikaliza hamu omu biikaro eby'omu iguru,
nukwo omu businge obuliija asobole kwoleka obwingi bw'embabazi ze habw'ebirungi ebi arukutukorra omu Kristo Yesu.
Inywe mukaikiriza mwajunwa habw'embabazi za Ruhanga. Eki mutakyekorre inywenka, baitu kisembo kya Ruhanga.
Atakibahe habw'ebi mwakozire, haleke kubaho arukwenyumiza.
Habwokuba nuwe yatubumbire. Tukahangirwa omu Kristo Yesu nukwo tukole ebikorwa ebirungi Ruhanga ebi yategekere kara. Nibyo twikalege nitukora.
Habweki, inywe Abanyamahanga omu buzaarwa, mwijuke abo abaakozirweho kara omukoro ogw'okusarwa omubiri nkooku baabeetaga abatasazirwe.
Kandi mwijuke omu kasumi ako nkooku mukaba mutaina Kristo, mwahukaine n'oruganda rwa Isirairi, mutaina bukwatane n'endagaano ezaaraganizibwe, mutaina kunihira kandi mutaina Ruhanga omu nsi enu.
Baitu hati, habwa Kristo Yesu, inywe abakaba bali hara muno, esagama ye ebairiize haihi,
habwokuba nuwe businge bwaitu, ayatufoire itwembi Abayudaaya n'Abanyamahanga kuba omu. Kandi nuwe yaseesire ekisiika eky'obunyanzigwa ekyatubaganizaaga.
