Akahayo omubiri gwe okudibya Ebiragiro n'ebindi ebyatairweho, nukwo omu Banyamahanga n'omu Bayudaaya ahangemu omuntu omuhyaka, kandi omuli uwe abakaba bali babiri abafoole muntu omu, naagarra ati obusinge,
Kandi itwembi atugarukanganizemu na Ruhanga, tube mubiri gumu habw'omusaraba nambere yahwerekeriize obunyanzigwa.
Akaija yarangirra obusinge hali inywe abakaba bali hara, na hali abo abakaba bali haihi;
habwokuba itwembi abaina Mwoyo omu, turaba omu Kristo kuhika hali Isiitwe.
Nukwo nu, timukyali banyamahanga rundi bagonyi, baitu muli abaikazi hamu n'abantu ba Ruhanga boona, kandi muli b'omuka ya Ruhanga.
Muli kicweka ky'ekyombeko ekirukwombekwa ha musingi gw'abakwenda n'abarangi. Kristo Yesu niryo ibaale erikuru ery'obugumizo bw'enju.
Omuli uwe nuho ekyombeko kyona kiteeranirizibwa kifooka Enju erukwera ya Ruhanga, nambere MUKAMA asinga.
Omuli uwe, na inywe numwo mwombekiirwe omunju nambere Ruhanga aikara hamu na Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Nahabweki, nyowe Paulo omunyankomo wa Kristo Yesu habwanyu Abanyamahanga
ningumya mumanyire nkooku nahairwe obukeeto bw'embabazi za Ruhanga ezi nakwasiibwe habwanyu.
Nkamanyisibwa ensita egi omu kusuukulirwa, nkooku ndugire kubasoborra omu bigufu.
Obu muraabisoma nimwija kumanya nkooku nyetegeriize ensita ya Kristo.
Niyo nsita etaramanyirwe bantu ab'akasumi akandi, nkooku hati Mwoyo Ahikiriire agisuukuliire abakwenda be abarukwera n'abarangi.
Nukwo kugamba ngu, Abanyamahanga nabo bali bagwetwa hamu na itwe, bicweka by'omubiri gumu, nibabagana ebyaraganiziibwe Kristo Yesu omu Makuru Amarungi,
Ekisembo eky'embabazi Ruhanga ezi yangiriire, habw'amaani ge agarukukorra omuli itwe, nikyo kyanfoire muheereza w'Amakuru Amarungi ago.
Nyowe obu ndaaba ndi w'okumalirra omu bantu be boona, baitu nkaheebwa omugisa ogw'okumanyisa Abanyamahanga ebirungi byona ebya Kristo, ebirungi ebitakira kwetegerezibwa.
N'okumanyisa abantu boona entegeka ey'ensita ye eyaserekerwe kuruga kara omu Ruhanga, ayahangire byona.
Nukwo hati abamalaika abalemi n'ab'obusobozi abali omu biikaro eby'omwiguru basobora kurorra ha kitebe ky'abaikiriza amagezi goona aga Ruhanga.
Eki akakitegeka kuruga kara koona kandi yakihikiririza omu Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu,
ou tutungiramu obumanzi n'obwesige obutuhikya hali Ruhanga habw'okwikiriza.
Nukwo nu, nimbasaba muleke kuterebuka habw'emihito ei ndukubona habwanyu, emihito egi neebahaisa ekitiinisa.
Habw'obulyo obu, ninteereza Isiitwe amaju
nambere haruga enganda zoona ez'omwiguru n'omunsi,
kandi nimmusaba habw'ekitiinisa kye ekingi emitima yanyu agigumye n'amaani ga Mwoyo we.
Nukwo Kristo ogu aikale omu mitima yanyu habw'okumwikiriza Na inywe obu mulikamara kuhamira kimu kandi mukagumibwa omu ngonzi,
nubwo mulisobora okwetegereza hamu n'abahikiriire boona: obugazi, obura okugenda ha iguru, n'okuhama kw'engonzi ze.
Ego, kandi n'okumanya engonzi za Kristo ezitasobora kwetegerezibwa magezi g'abantu, nukwo mwijurre kimu Ruhanga.
Ogu anyakusobora kukora bingi kukira byona ebi tumusaba rundi ebi tuteekereza,
aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro byona omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza n'omu Kristo Yesu, ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
Habweki, nyowe omunyankomo habwa MUKAMA, nimbeesengereza: mube n'engeso ezinyakusemeriire omulimo ogu mwayetiirwe,
nimwebundaaza muno kandi nimuculeera, nimugumiisiriza kandi nimuganyirangana habw'engonzi,
nimutaho omutima kugumya obumu bwa Myoyo Ahikiriire anyakututeeraniza omu businge.
Haroho omubiri gumu na Mwoyo omu, nkooku mwina okunihira kumu oku mwayetiirwe.
MUKAMA ali omu, enyikiriza eri emu, okubatiza kumu.
Ruhanga nuwe omu kandi Ise boona, anyakukira boona, anyakukora omu boona kandi anyakuli omu boona.
Baitu buli omu omuli itwe akaheebwa ebisembo nkooku Kristo omu mbabazi ze yamulengiire.
Nikyo kyagambiirwe kiti: “Obu yatembere omwiguru, akeebembera ihe ly'abo aba yaihire omu bunyagwa, kandi yabaha ebisembo.”
(Okugamba ngu: “Akatemba”, nikimanyisa ki? Tikirukumanyisa ngu, nawe akabanza kusirimuka okuzimu?
Ogu ayasirimukire, nuwe omu ayatembere yahingura iguru lyona nukwo aijule hoona hoona.)
Ebisembo bye akabigaba ati: Abamu babe bakwenda, abamu barangi, abamu barangirizi b'Amakuru Amarungi, abamu baliisa kandi beegesa.
Ebi nibyo bisembo abaikiriza ebi beetaaga habw'omulimo ogw'obuheereza nukwo bombeke omubiri gwa Kristo
okuhika itwena obu tulikatunga enyikiriza emu n'okumanya Omwana wa Ruhanga, tukakura kuhika ha bukuru bwonyini obw'orulengo oruhikire orw'obukuru bwa Kristo.
Nukwo tulekere aho kuba baana abarukutwarwa hanu na hali, abarukuzongazongibwa omuyaga ogwa buli nyegesa enyakuruga omu bukurungutaniza obw'abantu n'omu bucwangya bwabu obw'ebisuba.
Baitu katubaze aby'amazima ebinyakurumu engonzi. Nukwo tukule omu miringo yoona, tube nk'ogu anyakuli omutwe, nuwe Kristo,
anyakuteeraniza kandi yasumiikaniza buli rugiga rwona omubiri oru rwahairwe. Nahabweki buli rugiga obu ruba nirukora kurungi, omubiri gukura kandi nigwombekwa omu ngonzi.
Hati kinu ninkigamba kandi ninkigumya omu MUKAMA nti: Mutongera kwikara nk'Abanyamahanga oku baikara, omu biteekerezo byabu ebitaina mugaso.
Amagezi gaabu gaswekeriirwe omwirima kandi baahukaniziibwe ha bwoomeezi bwa Ruhanga habw'obutamanya obu bainabwo, obunyakuruga omu kugumangana kw'emitima yabu.
Bakagumangana baayeheera kimu obusiihani, nibeegomba kukora ekibi kya buli mulingo.
Inywe, Kristo mutamwege muti,
rundi buli mukalemwa kumwetegereza kurungi obu mwayegesiibwe amazima agali omu Yesu.
Mucwe engeso zanyu eza ira ezi mwinazo ezisiisirwe okwegomba okubi okurukuhabisa.
Mufooke bahyaka omu biteekerezo byanyu n'omu mitima yanyu.
Mube n'obwomeezi obuhyaka Ruhanga obu arukubahangamu oburukuzookwamu obuhikiriire obw'amazima n'oburukwera.
Nahabweki mufuuhize kimu ebisuba, buli muntu abazeega amazima na mutaahi we, habwokuba tuli bicweka by'omubiri gumu.
Kakuba mukwatwa ekiniga, nwerinde mutaasiisa; mutalinaga izooba mukyaina ekiniga.
Kandi muteeretereza Sitaani mukamuha omwanya ogw'okuboohya.
Omusuma alekere aho kwiba. Haakire akozese emikono ye emirimo y'omugaso, nukwo asobole n'okugabira abaseege.
Ekigambo kyona ekibi kitaliruga omu kanwa kanyu. Mubazeege ebirungi byonka ebirukwombeka n'ebirukuhikaana n'ekintu eki muroho, nukwo kireetere omugisa abo abakihurra.
Kandi muleke kurumya Mwoyo Ahikiriire wa Ruhanga, habwokuba nuwe manyikirizo ei mwatairweho kwoleka nkooku muli ba Ruhanga okuhika ha kiro ky'okucungurwa.
Obunyanzigwa bwona, ekiniga, okubiihirwa, obwogo, okuhangirra n'itima lyona bibarugiremu kimu.
Mugirranganege embabazi, mube benda, muganyiranganege nkooku Ruhanga yabaganyiriire omu Kristo.
Nukwo nu, mwesisanizeege Ruhanga nk'abaana be abagonzibwa.
Mweyongere kugonzangana, Kristo nkooku yatugondeze, yayehayo habwaitu ali kihongwa ekirukuboya kurungi kandi kyonzira hali Ruhanga.
Baitu obusiihani, obugwagwa bwona, rundi okwegomba okubi tibisemeriire okugambwaho omuli inywe, habwokuba ebi tibisemeriire abantu ba Ruhanga.
Muleke embazo mbi, rundi embazo ez'obudoma, rundi ez'okusandaara okutahikire. Ebi byona tibibasemeriire.
Kinu mukimanyiire kimu, nkooku hataroho musiihani, rundi omugwagwa, rundi omwegombi (anyakufoora itungo lye embandwa y'okuramya) arukwija kugwetwa omu bukama bwa Kristo na Ruhanga.
Mutaikiriza muntu weena kubabiihabiiha n'ebigambo ebitarumu nsa, habwokuba ebi nibyo Ruhanga asigikiraho kukayukira abantu abatamuhurra.
Nahabweki muleke kuteerana nabo;
habwokuba ira mukaba muli omu mwirima, baitu hati muli omu musana gwa MUKAMA; mugendege nk'abaana b'omusana.
(Nambere hali musana nuho hasangwa ebirungi byona, ebihikire kandi eby'amazima.)
Mwekambire kumanya MUKAMA ebi arukugonza.
Muteetaba omu bikorwa by'omwirima ebitaina mugaso, baitu mubyoleke bwere bwere.
Habwokuba ebi bakora omu nsita, bikwasa ensoni n'okubibazaaho;
baitu ekintu kyona ekirukuturukibwa omu musana kizooka; habwokuba kyona ekizooka kifooka omusana.
Nikyo kyagambiirwe kiti: “Sisiimuka iwe anyakugwijagiire, kandi ohumbuuke omu bafu, nubwo Kristo araakumulikira.”
Nahabweki mwerinde muno ebi murukukora, mutaba nk'abantu abataina magezi, baitu mube b'amagezi.
Mukozese kurungi obusumi obu mwinabwo habwokuba ebiro binu bibi.
Nukwo nu muleke kuba badoma, baitu mwetegereze MUKAMA ebi arukwenda.
Kandi muleke kutaamira amarwa, habwokuba galeeta okwenagiriza; baitu mwijule Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Nambere mwesorooleza, muzinire hamu zabbuli, ebizina, n'eby'okuhaisaniza Ruhanga, nimuzinira MUKAMA kandi nimumukugiza n'emitima yanyu yoona.
Obutoosa n'omu byona musiimege Ruhanga Isiitwe, nimujurra ibara lya MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Mworoberangane habw'okutamu Kristo ekitiinisa.
Baanyinabwenge, muhurrege baiba-inywe nkooku muhurra MUKAMA.
Habwokuba nyineeka nuwe mutwe gwa nyinabwenge nka Kristo oku ali mutwe gw'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, nugwo omubiri gwe, kandi nuwe Mujuni wakyo.
Ekitebe ky'abaikiriza nkooku kiremwa Kristo, nukwo na banyinabwenge balemwege bati baibabo omu byona.
Baanyinamaka mugonzeege bakazi banyu nka Kristo oku yagondeze ekitebe kye, yayehayo habwakyo,
nukwo asobole kukihikiriza amazire kukisemeza naakyogya n'amaizi ago hamu n'ekigambo ky'omurwa ogu.
nukwo akyereetere omu kitiinisa, kitaina kabara noobu gwakuba mugonya, rundi ekindi nk'eki; kiikale kiri kirukwera kandi kitaina kamogo.
Abasaija nabo nukwo basemeriire kugonza bakazi baabo nkooku bagonza emibiri yabo yonyini. Ogu anyakugonza mukazi we, buli aba ayegondeze wenka.
Busaho muntu aranobere omubiri gwe; baitu aguliisa kandi agurolerra muno nkooku Kristo arolerra ekitebe ky'abaikiriza.
Na itwe tuli bicweka by'omubiri gwe.
“Nikyo omusaija araalekeraga ise na nyina agumire hali mukazi we, kandi ababiri abo bafooke mubiri gumu.”
Enu niyo nsita nkuru, ei ndukugamba nti: Neemanyisa Kristo n'ekitebe kye.
Nukwo nu, buli omu omuli inywe agonze mukazi we nkooku ayegonza wenka, kandi n'omukazi atemuga iba ekitiinisa.
Abaana muhurrege abazaire banyu habwa MUKAMA, habwokuba kihikire.
“Otiinege sso na nyoko” eki nikyo kiragiro ky'okubanza ekyayongiirweho okunihiza ngu:
“Noija kuba kurungi n'okugundagunda omu nsi.”
Na inywe baise-baana muleke kubiihiza abaana banyu, baitu mubooroole omu ngeso nungi nimubeegesa ebya MUKAMA.
Abairu muhurrege bakama banyu ab'omunsi munu, nimutiina kandi nimwebundaaza n'omutima gumu nk'abarukuhurra Kristo.
Eki muleke kukikora obu baba babataireho eriiso, nk'abarukwenda kusiimwa abantu, baitu mukikole nk'abairu ba Kristo, nimukora Ruhanga ebi agonza n'omutima gumu.
Muheereze n'obwekambi nk'abarukukorra MUKAMA hatali bantu.
Kandi muheereze nimumanya ngu, buli kirungi kyona omuntu eki akora nikyo MUKAMA alimusasurra, noobu araaba ali mwiru rundi w'obugabe.
Na inywe bakama b'abairu nukwo mubakole muti, muleke kubakanga, mumanye ngu, MUKAMA waabo kandi owaanyu ali omwiguru kandi tasoroora.
Eky'okumalirra mube b'amaani omu MUKAMA, nimugumibwa obusobozi obw'amaani ge.
Mujwale eby'okurwanisa byona ebya Ruhanga, nukwo musobole kwemera obugobya bwa Sitaani.

Itwe titurukurwanisa abantu abaina omubiri n'esagama, baitu niturwanisa amahe ag'emyoyo emibi agali omu biikaro ebya ha iguru, emyoyo ey'abakuru, ey'ab'obusobozi, n'ey'abarukulema ensi enu ey'omwirima.
Habweki mukwate eby'okurwanisa byona ebya Ruhanga, nukwo musobole kwemera ebiribaho ha kiro ekibi, kandi obu mulimara kukora byona, mwemerre mugumire.
Nahabweki, mwemerre mwetegere amazima omu nda, kandi mujwaire ha kifuba obuhikiriire nk'ekizibaho ky'ekyoma.
Mujwale enkaito omu bigere byanyu, mweteekaniize okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi ag'obusinge.
Okukira byona, mukwate engabu y'okwikiriza ei musobora kuzimisa emyambi yoona ey'Omubi erukwaka omurro.
Mujwale enkofiira ey'ekyoma ey'okujunwa, kandi mukwate n'empirima eya Mwoyo Ahikiriire, nikyo kigambo kya Ruhanga.
Obutoosa musabege nimwesengereza Ruhanga okubakoonyera, kandi nimusabira omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire. Eki mukikolege obutalekerra, nimusabira abaikiriza boona,
kandi na nyowe munsabirege, nukwo ntunge ebi ndaagamba obu ndaabaga nindangirra n'obumanzi ensita ey'Amakuru Amarungi,
aga ndi ngabwa yago, mboherwe omu njegere; nukwo nsobole kugarangirra n'obumanzi nkooku kinsemeriire.
Tikiko mugenzi waitu omugonzibwa kandi omuheereza omwesigwa omu MUKAMA araabamanyisa byona; nukwo mumanye nkooku ndi, n'ebi ndukukora.
Nikyo mmutumiire, mumanye nkooku tuli, kandi abagarre omutima omu nda.
Obusinge n'engonzi hamu n'okwikiriza ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwa na MUKAMA Yesu Kristo bibe hali ab'oruganda boona.
Kandi Ruhanga agirre embabazi boona abagonza MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo n'engonzi ezitafa.
Nyowe Paulo na Timoteho, abaheereza ba Kristo Yesu, nituhandiikira abantu ba Ruhanga boona aba Filipi abali omu Kristo Yesu, hamu n'abaroleerezi n'abaheereza bunyu.
Nitubagondeza emigisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Obu mbaijuka bwona, nsiima Ruhanga wange.
Kandi omu kusaba kwange kwa butoosa mbasabira inywena nyina omuhimbo.
Nyikara nimbasiima habw'okunkoonyera okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi okuruga ha kubanza okuhika na hati.
Kandi ngumiza kimu nti: Ruhanga ayatandikire omulimo omurungi omuli inywe, aligumaliriza ha Kiro Yesu Kristo nambere aligarukira.

Nyowe kimpikiriire okubateekerezaaho nti inywena. Ningira mbaikaza ha mutima, habwokuba inywena mubagana na nyowe ha migisa Ruhanga ei yampaire, obu mba ndi omu nkomo hanu rundi nindwanirra Amakuru Amarungi kandi ningagumya.
Ruhanga nuwe kaiso wange, amanyire nkooku mbainaho ekihika, nimbagonza nka Kristo Yesu oku abagonza.
Kandi eki ndukusaba nkinu: engonzi zanyu zigende nizeeyongera muno omu kumanya n'omu kwetegereza kwona,
nukwo musobole kusiima ebirukukirra kimu oburungi kandi muhike ha Kiro kya Kristo musemiire kandi mutaina kamogo,
mwijwire abikorwa by'obuhikiriire ebireetwa Yesu Kristo, nukwo muhaise Ruhanga ekitiinisa kandi mumunyumize.
Bagenzi bange, ninyenda mumanye ebyambaireho nkooku byakonyiire kwo kurarangya Amakuru Amarungi.
Kandi ekyarugiremu nukwo abaserikale abarukulinda ekikaali n'abandi boona kumanya nkooku naboherwe habwa Kristo.
Okukwatwa kwange kunu kukaleetera baingi muno omu bagenzi baitu kwesiga MUKAMA, bakeeyongera muno obumanzi obw'okwegesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga batarukutiina.
Mazimakwo abamu barangirra Kristo habw'ihali n'okuhakana; baitu abandi bamurangirra n'omutima murungi.
Abo bakikora habw'engonzi, nibamanya nkooku nakwasirwe habw'okurwanirra Amakuru Amarungi.
Baitu bali, barangirra Kristo habw'okurwanirra orubaju rwabu, hatali habw'amazima; kandi nibagenderra kunyongera obusaalizi ndi hanu omu nkomo
Hati, eki nikiita ki? Ekikuru kiri kimu kyonka, Kristo arangirirwe omu miringo yoona: rundi omu kwesisaniriza, rundi omu mazima. Ogu nugwo muhimbo gwange.
Ego, kandi ndaikaraga n'omuhimbo, habwokuba mmanyire okusaba kwanyu n'obukoonyezi bwa Mwoyo wa Yesu Kristo nkooku birindugiramu okutaisurwa.

Eki nikyo ndukutegereza n'ekihika kingi, kandi nikyo ndukunihira, nkooku ntalikwatwa nsoni naakake, baitu habw'obumanzi bwingi obu nyinabwo hati, kandi obu nabaire nabwo kara koona, Kristo araaheebwaga ekitiinisa omu mubiri gwange, nkyayomiire rundi nfire.
Habwange okwomeera ni Kristo, kandi okufa nugo magoba.
Okwikara omu mubiri gunu, obu kuraaba nikundugiramu okukora eby'omugaso, nabwo eki ndaakomaho kindemere.
Ebintu ebi ebibiri bindemeseze. Nyowe ekinakugondeze nukwo kuruga omunsi, ngende nyikale na Kristo; habwokuba eki nikyo kirukukiraho oburungi.
Baitu okwikara omu mubiri gunu, nikyo kirukukira kubagasira inywe.
Eki nkimanyiire kimu, nahabweki ninyija kwikara n'okwongera kuba nainywe, nukwo mweyongere omu kwikiriza n'omu kusemererwa.
Kandi obu ndigaruka kwija owaanyu, eki kiribakoonyera muno okuhaisa Kristo Yesu ekitiinisa.

Kyonka enyikara yanyu esemeriire kuhikaana n'Amakuru Amarungi ga Kristo, nukwo obu ndiija kubarora, rundi ntaizireyo, nsobole kuhurra nkooku mugumire mwina omwoyo gumu n'ebiteekerezo bimu, nimwekambira hamu habwokuba mukaikiriza Amakuru Amarungi,
mutarukutiinisibwa kintu kyona ekirukuleetwa abanyazigwa banyu. Eki nikiija kwolekera kimu bbo nkooku balihwerekerra, baitu inywe nkooku mulijunwa; kandi eki kiriruga hali Ruhanga.
Habwokuba mutaheebwe mugisa gw'okwikiriza Kristo kwonka, baitu n'ogw' okubonabonesibwa habwe,
nimurwana obulemu oburukusisana buli, obu mwarozire nindwana, kandi obu murukuhurra ninkyarwana na hati.
Nukwo nu, obu haraaba haroho okugumyangana omu Kristo, okwimukyangana okuleetwa engonzi, n'okukwataniza omu Mwoyo, rundi okuganyira n'okugirrangana enbabazi,
munyijuze omuhimbo mwina ebiteekerezo bimu, n'engonzi ez'omulingo gumu, nimwikirraniza omu byona n'omutima gumu.
Mutalikora kintu kyona habw'okwegonza rundi okwekuliriza, baitu mwebundaaze, nimumanya abandi nkooku barukubakira oburungi.
Buli omu hali inywe aleke kuta omutima hali ebi arukugonza wenka, baitu agute na ha birukugonzibwa abandi.
Omwoyo Kristo Yesu ogu akaba ainagwo, nugwo musemeriire kuba nagwo.
Uwe nobu araaba yasisanaaga Ruhanga, baitu okwingana kwe na Ruhanga atakire kukufaho.
Akeemaramu ekitiinisa yayefoora mwiru, yazaarwa nk'abantu.
Habw'okuzaarwa nk'omuntu, akeebundaaza kandi yaba muhulizi, kuhika ha kufa, nangwa n'okufa okwa ha musaraba.
Nikyo Ruhanga yamunyumiriize, yamuruka ibara erirukukira agandi goona.
Nukwo boona abanyakuli omu iguru, n'ab'omunsi, n'ab'okuzimu, obu bahurra ibara lya Yesu, bateeze amaju,
kandi buli rulimi rwatule Yesu Kristo nkooku ali Mukama, nukwo Ruhanga Ise aheebwe ekitiinisa.

Habweki, bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, nkooku mwabaire bahulizi kara, na hati nukwo mube, hatali kumpurra obu mba ndoho, baitu mukire kumpurra obu mba ntaroho, mwekambire okujunwa kwanyu nimutina kandi nimutukumira.
Habwokuba Ruhanga naakorra omuli inywe, naabakoonyera okugonza n'okuhikiriza ebi asiima.
Mukole ebintu byona mutarukutontorroma kandi mutarukuteera mpaka,
nukwo mube abataina musango kandi abeezibwe; abaana ba Ruhanga abataina kamogo hagati y'abantu ab'obusinge bunu oburamaire kandi obuhabire aba murukwakiramu nk'enyunyuuzi ezirukwakira ab'omu nsi,
nimugumiza kimu ebigambo by'obwomeezi. Nukwo ha Kiro kya Kristo nsobole kwenyumiza nkooku ntarairukiire busa, kandi ntaratalibaniire busa.
Esagama yange noobu eraaba eri y'okuseeswa ha kyonzira ekiruhongwa-nukwo okwikiriza kwanyu kweyongere, baitu ninsemererwa kandi ninkyanganuka hamu na inywe inywena.
Na inywe nukwo musemererwe muti kandi mukyanganuke hamu na nyowe.
Ninihira omu MUKAMA Yesu kubatumira bwango Timoteho, nukwo omutima gungwe omu nda mmazire kumanya amakuru g'owaanyu.
Tinyina ondi weena amwingana mu kutunturra muno obwomeezi bwanyu.
Abandi boona beeserurra ebyabu, bitali bya Yesu Kristo.
Baitu omugaso gwa Timoteho mugumanyire, habwokuba omu by'Amukuru Amarungi tukaheereza hamu nk'omwana oku arukukoonyera ise.
Nikyo ndukunihirra kumutuma ahonaaho, obu ndakarora ebyange nambere biraagarukira;
kandi ninyesiga MUKAMA ngu, na nyowe nyenka ndiija oku bwango.
Hati nyetegeriize nkooku kirukwetaagwa kubatumira Epafurodito mugenzi wange, omukozi kandi omuserikale nyakyaitu; nuwe mukwenda wanyu arukumpa ebi ndukwetaaga;
habwokuba inywena, abaire abainaho ekihika, kandi omutima gukamusarra kumanya nkooku mwahuliire eby'endwara ye.
Akarwarakwo mali, kake afe. Baitu Ruhanga akamugirra embabazi, atazigirre uwe wenka baitu na nyowe, nukwo obujune obu nyina buleke kunyongerwaho.
Nikyo ndukuteeraho muno omutima kumubatumaho, mukyanganuke habw'okugaruka kumurora, kandi na nyowe omutima gungaruke omunda.
Habweki, mumutangirre omu MUKAMA n'omuhimbo gwona; kandi abantu nk'abo mubatemuga ekitiinisa.
Ningira akaba ali haihi n'okufa habw'omulimo gwa Kristo, naahayo obwomeezi bwe okuhikiriza inywe ebi mwakunkolire.
Eky'okumalirra bagenzi bange, mukyanganuke omu MUKAMA. Na hati tikirukunjwahya kubahandiikira ebintu ebirukusisana na biri. Na inywe nikibaleetera obusinge.
Mwerinde embwa ezi! Mwerinde enkozi z'ebibi! Mwerinde abo abasara omubiri!
Itwe tuli abasazirwe b'amazima, Mwoyo nuwe atuhabura nkooku turaaramya Ruhanga. Okwenyumiza kwaitu kuli omu Kristo Yesu. Titwesiga emikoro ya ha mubiri.
Noobu baakujuliire emikoro egi, baitu nyowe tinyina eki ndukutiina. Obu buraaba buli bulyo obw'okwesiga emikoro ya ha mubiri, nooha araabunkiza?
Nkasarwa ha kiro kya munaana, ndi Omunyaisirairi, ow'oruganda rwa Benyamiini, Omuhebburaayo ayazairwe Abahebburaayo, kandi omu kukuraatira Ebiragiro, ndi Mufalisaayo.
Nkooleka obwekambi bwange nimpiiganiza ekitebe ky'abaikiriza. Omu kuhikirra okurukusigikira ha Biragiro, tinyina musango.
Ebirungi byona ebi natungire, nkabyeta kuferwa habwa Kristo.

Mazimakwo, ebintu byona nimbirora nk'ebitaina mugaso obu mbirengesaniza n'oburungi obw'okumanya Kristo Yesu MUKAMA wange. Habwe nkaikiriza kuferwa ebintu byona kandi mbirora nk'ebitaina mugaso, nukwo ntunge Kristo,

kandi nyikale omuli uwe. Tinkyaserra obuhikiriire bwange habwange obusigikira ha Biragiro, kwihaho obu oburukuleetwa okwikiriza Kristo. Nubwo obuhikiriire oburukuruga hali Ruhanga kandi oburukuleetwa okwikiriza kwaitu.
Eki ndukwenda nukwo kumanya Kristo n'okumanya amaani g'okuhumbuuka kwe, mbagane nawe omu kubonabonesibwa kwe, nsisane nawe n'omu kufa kwe.
Nukwo obu kiraaba nikisoboka, na nyowe mpike ha kuhumbuuka omu bafu.
Tindukugamba ngu, eki mmazire kukitunga; rundi ngu, mmazire kuhikirra; baitu ninyekamba kukyetungira, Kristo Yesu nkooku yanyetungire.
Bagenzi bange, tindukugira ngu, eki nkakyetungira; kwihaho eki ndukukora kiri kimu kyonka: nukwo kwebwa ebindi enyuma n'okwitanira ebindi omumaiso,
ninyekamba kuhika ha kigendererwa, nukwo ntunge empeera ey'omwiguru Ruhanga ei yanyetiire omu Kristo Yesu.
Abo abeetwa abakuru omuli itwe, nukwo tusemeriire kuteekereza tuti. Obu haba haroho ekintu eki murukuteekereza okundi, nakyo Ruhanga naija kukibasuukurra.
Kyonka nambere tuhikire, muho tugendere tutarukugarukirra.
Bagenzi bange mwikirranize kandi munkuraatire. Itwe nkooku tuli kyokurorraho kyanyu, mwetegereze abo abarukukora nka itwe.
Habwokuba baingi omu Baisirairi abo, aba nabagambiireho emirundi nyingi, na hati aba ndukubagambira ntaireho n'okurra, baikara bali banyanzigwa b'omusaraba gwa Kristo.
Empero yabo nukwo okuhwerekerra; ruhanga waabo niyo enda, kandi beenyumiriza ha bintu ebirukubahemura, emitima yabo bagimaliza ha bintu by'ensi.
Baitu itwe, obwikaro bwaitu buli omwiguru, nambere haliruga Omujuni, MUKAMA Yesu Kristo ou turukulindirra.
Nuwe alihindura emibiri yaitu etaina kitiinisa, esisane nk'ogwe ogw'ekitiinisa habw' amaani agamusoboza kulema ebintu byona.
Habweki nu, bagenzi bange, aba ngonza kandi aba nyinaho ekihika, okusemererwa kwange kandi ekondo yange, mugumire muti hali MUKAMA, inywe enganzi zange.
Ninyesengereza Evodiya na Sintike, baikirranize omu MUKAMA.

Kandi na iwe mugenzi wange mali, ninkusaba okoonyere abakazi abo, habwokuba tukatalibanira hamu okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi, kandi nimbabara na Kelementi n'abakozi abandi bagenzi bange ab'amabara gaabu gali omu kitabu eky'obomeezi.
Mukyanganukege omu MUKAMA obutoosa; ningaruka kugamba nti: Mukyanganuke.
Okugumiisiriza kwanyu kumanywe abantu boona. Ningira MUKAMA ali haihi kugaruka.
Mutaharaza omutima habw'ekintu kyona, baitu omu buli kintu mwikale nimumanyisa Ruhanga ebi murukwetaaga, nimumusaba, nimumwesengereza kandi nimumusiima.
Obusinge bwa Ruhanga obuhinguraine okwetegereza kwona, bulirinda emitima yanyu n'ebiteekerezo byanyu omu Kristo Yesu.

Eky'okumalirra, bagenzi bange, byona eby'amazima, byona eby'ekitiinisa, byona eby'obulyo, byona ebirukwera, byona ebirungi, byona ebirukusiimwa nibyo muteekerezeho, hamu n'engeso enungi n'ebindi ebisemeriire kunyumizibwa.
Ebi mwanyegereho, ebi mwanyihireho, ebi mwampuliireho, n'ebi mwandozireho, nibyo mukolege; kandi Ruhanga ow'obusinge araikaraga na inywe.
Ninkyanganuka muno omu MUKAMA, habwokuba mulinzirwe mwagaruka mwanyijuka. Mazimakwo mukaba muntaireho omutima, baitu mukaba mutakatungire mwanya.
Tikuli kugira ngu, eki ninkigambisibwa obuburwa, habwokuba nkeega okwenihira omu mulingo gwona ogu mbamu.
Nimmanya kukeeherwa ebintu n'okubisaagirirwa; omu buli kintu n'omu miringo yoona nkeega amagezi ag'okwekoonyera: omu mweru n'omu njara, omu itungo n'omu bunaku.
Ninsobora kukora byona habw'Ogu anyakumpa amaani.
Baitu mukakora kurungi kunyirukirra omu muhito gwange.

Na inywe Abafilipi nimumanya ngu, obu natandikire kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi ninduga Makedoni, hatabeho kitebe ky'abaikiriza na kimu ekyayeteeraine na nyowe omu kurolerra entaahya n'enturukya ya sente, okwihaho inywe inywenka.
Noobu nkaba ndi Teesalonika, mwantwekerega eby'okunkoonyera.
Tikuli kugira ngu, ninserra ebisembo; baitu ninserra amagoba Ruhanga aga alibongeramu.

Nyowe, emperra yange mmazire kugitunga kandi nsaagisizeho! Ntungire ebirukumara habwokuba Epafurodito amazire kumpa ebisembo ebi mwantwekiire, nikyo kihongwa ekirukuboya kurungi kandi ekyonzira ekirukusiimwa Ruhanga kandi eki agonza.
Ruhanga wange alibaha byona ebi murukwetaaga nk'obwingi bw'obwenda bwe omu Kristo Yesu oku buli.
Ekitiinisa kibe hali Ruhanga Isiitwe ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
Mundamukize abantu ba Ruhanga boona omu Kristo Yesu. Bagenzi bange aba nyinabo hanu, nibabaramukya.
Abantu ba Ruhanga boona nibabaramukya, muno muno ab'omu kikaali kya Kaisaali.
Emigisa ya MUKAMA Yesu Kristo ikale n'emyoyo yanyu.
Nyowe Paulo, Ruhanga ou yagondeze mbe mukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, hamu na Timoteho mugenzi waitu,
nitubahandiikira inywe abantu ba Ruhanga kandi bagenzi baitu abeesigwa abali Kolosai: Nitubagondeza omugisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga iitwe.
Butoosa obu tuba nitubasabira, tusiima Ruhanga, Ise MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo,
habwokuba tukahurra nkooku murukwikiriza Kristo Yesu, n'oku murukugonza abantu ba Ruhanga boona,
nimusigikira ha kunihira oku mwina nukwo mutunge ebirungi ebimwahuliirwe omwiguru. Okunihira oku mwahuliireho kara omu nyegesa y'amazima.

Nugo Amakuru Amarungi agabahikireho, kandi agarukweyongera muno nigararanga omunsi yoona. Gakeeyongera gati omuli inywe okuruga ha kiro eki mwabandiizeho kuhurra n'okwetegereza kwo embabazi za Ruhanga,
nkooku mwayegesiibwe Epafura, omuheereza mugenzi wange omugonzibwa. Habwange nuwe muheereza omwesigwa wa Kristo,
ayaizire okutumanyisa engonzi Mwoyo Ahikiriire ezi yabatairemu.
Nahabweki okuruga obu twakihuliire, titukoosaga kubasabira, nukwo mwetegerereze kimu Ruhanga ebi agonza, kandi mwijule amagezi goona n'okumanya kwona okurukuleetwa Mwoyo wa Ruhanga,
mugire engeso ezisemeriire MUKAMA, mukole ebi asiima, mweyongere omu birungi byona ebi murukukora, kandi mweyongere kumanya Ruhanga.
Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona abagumye habw'amaani ag'ekitiinisa kye, nukwo mugire obumanzi bwona kandi mugumiisirize n'okusemererwa.
Musiime Isiitwe ayatusoboize kubagana ha bugwetwa bw'abahikiriire abali omu bukama bw'omusana.
Nuwe yatwihire omu bukama obw'omwirima, yatutaahya omu bukama bw'Omwana we omugonzibwa,
anyakutucungura kandi anyakutuganyira ebibi.
Kristo nuwe kisisani kya Ruhanga atarorwa, omuzigaijo gw'ebihangwa byona;

habwokuba omuli uwe, byona nuho byahangiirwe: eby'omu iguru n'eby'omu nsi; ebiboneka n'ebitaboneka; rundi ebitebe by'abamalaika abakuru, ab'obusobozi, n'abalemi-ebintu byona bikahangirwa omuli uwe kandi bikahangwa habwe.
Nuwe yabandize kubaho byona bitakabaireho, kandi ebintu byona biteeranira omuli uwe.
Nuwe mutwe gw'omubiri-kandi omubiri ogu nikyo kitebe ky'abaikiriza. Nuwe ntandiko kandi omuzigaijo ogw'abahumbuukire omu bafu, nukwo omu byona nuwe abe w'okubanza.
Habwokuba Ruhanga akagonza Kristo we aijurre kimu obwa Ruhanga bwe,
kandi akacwamu kwegarurra ebintu byona, eby'omu nsi rundi eby'omu iguru naaraba omuli uwe, obu yaleesire obusinge habw'esagama y'omwana we eyasirwe ha musaraba.
Inywe kara, mukaba mwebaganiize na Ruhanga, mwina obunyanzigwa omu mitima yanyu kandi, nimukora ebibi.
Baitu hati mugarukangainemu na Ruhanga omu mubiri gw'omwana we habw'okufa kwe, nukwo abahikye omumaiso ge nimwera, mutaina kamogo, kandi mutaina eki murukujunaanwa.

Kyonka mwikale omu kwikiriza, mugumire kandi mutarukutengeeta, mutarukuruga ha kwesiga Amakuru Amarungi aga mwahuliire, agaarangiriirwe buli kihangwa ekinyakuli omunsi, amakuru nyowe Paulo aga nafookere omuheereza waago.
Hati ninsemererwa kurora nimbonabona habwanyu, habwokuba nimpikiriza n'omubiri gwange ebirukubura ha mabone Kristo aga yaboine habw'omubiri gwe-nikyo kitebe ky'abaikiriza.
Ekitebe eki nikyo nakomiirwe kuba muheereza wakyo nk'omulimo gwa Ruhanga ogu naahairwe habwanyu oku guli, nukwo mmanyisize kimu ekigambo kya Ruhanga.
Egi niyo nsita eyaserekerwe ira lyona n'obusinge bwona, baitu hati enyakwolekerwe abantu be.
Nubo Ruhanga yagondeze kwoleka ensita egi nkooku ina ekitiinisa kingi omu Banyamahanga. Ensita egi nuwe Kristo anyakuli omuli inywe, omukwato gwaitu ogulitutungisa ekitiinisa.
Nuwe turukurangirra, nitwegesa kandi nituteererra buli muntu n'amagezi goona, nukwo weena anyakuhikire tusobole kumuleeta hali Kristo.
Eki nikyo ndukutalibanira kandi nikyo ndukwekambira n'amaani goona Ruhanga aga arukunnyijuza.
Ninyenda mumanye nkooku nyekamba muno habwanyu, na habw'abo abali Layodikeeya, n'abandi boona abatakandoraga,
nukwo emitima yabo egarukwemu amaani nkooku bateeraniziibwe hamu omu ngonzi, beetegereze kandi bamanyiire kimu ensita ya Ruhanga, nuwe Kristo.
Omuli uwe nuho haserekerwe amagezi goona n'okwetegereza kwa Ruhanga.
Eki ninkigamba, nukwo haleme kubaho n'omu arukubahabisa n'enyegesa ey'okusoonasoona.
Noobu ndaaba ntali nainywe mali, baitu mu mwoyo ndi na inywe, ninsemererwa okumanya nkooku murukwerinda kandi mugumire omu kwikiriza Kristo.
Nkooku mwaikiriize Kristo Yesu abe MUKAMA wanyu, nukwo mumwikaleho,
mumugumireho kandi mumweboheho, mugumire omu kwikiriza nkooku mwayegesiibwe, nimusiima n'omutima gwona.
Mwerinde hatabaho muntu n'omu arukubahabisa n'ebigambo by'amagezi n'obucwangya obutarumu, naahondera emigenzo eya ira ey'obuzarranwa rundi naahondera emizimu eya ira, baitu atarukuhondera Kristo.
Habwokuba Krsito, omu mubiri gwe, aijwire obwaruhanga bwona.
Kandi omuli uwe anyakuli mutwe gw'abamalaika abalemi n'abamalaika ab'obusobozi bwona nuho mwatungiire obwomeezi obwijwire.
Kandi omuli uwe numwo mwasaliirwe ensarwa etali y'emikono, nubwo mwafurukire engeso ez'obuhangwa omu kusarwa okwaleesirwe Kristo.
Mukaziikwa nawe omu kubatizibwa, kandi mwahumbuurwa nawe habw'okwikiriza obusobozi bwa Ruhanga ayamuhumbwire omu bafu.
Na inywe abakaba baferiire omu bibi n'omu kutasarwa okw'-emibiri yanyu, Ruhanga akaboomeeza hamu na Kristo, amazire kutuganyira ebibi byaitu byona.
Nubwo yadibize ekihandiiko ekyatutongaga ibanja, yaguruka ebiragiro byakyo hamu n'amaani gaakyo. Ekihandiiko eki akakiihaho, yakibamba ha musaraba.
Embandwa zanyu enkuru kandi ez'amaani akaziihaho, yazifoora by'okusungwa naazisingurra ha musaraba.
Nahabweki hatabaho n'omu arukubacwera omusango ha birukukwata ebyokulya n'ebyokunywa, rundi ebirukukwata ha biro bikuru, rundi ha mboneko y'okwezi, rundi ha Sabbato.
Ebi byona, kisisani kwonka ekirukwoleka ebirukwija; baitu ekintu kyonyini, nuwe Kristo.
Hatabaho n'omu arukwemanya ngu nabakira, habwokuba uwe akeekomera kuramya n'okwinamira abamalaika, naayesiga ebi yasuukulirwe naayenyumiriza busa omu biteekerezo bye eby'obuntu.
Abantu nk'abo baba batakyagumira ha Mutwe, nuwe Kristo anyakuliisa omubiri gwona, akaguteeraniza omu ngingo zagwo n'omu binywa, gukakura Ruhanga nkooku asiima.
Obu muliba mwafiire hamu na Kristo, mwaruga ha mizimu eya ira ey'ensi, habwaki mwikara n'engeso nk'ez'abo abakyali b'ensi? Habwaki mworobera ebiragiro ebirukugamba biti:
“Otakwataho! Otarozaaho! Otakoraho!”
(Ebiragiro ebirukukwata ha bintu ebihwaho ahonaaho bimazire kwekoonyezibwa.) Oku tinukwo kuhondera enyegesa n'ebiragiro ebyatairweho abantu?
Mazimakwo binu nibizooka nk'eby'amagezi, nibibongera amaani ag'okwehayo, okwebundaaza, n'okusaaliza omubiri; baitu tibiina mugaso gwona ogw'okutanga okwegomba okubi kw'omubiri.
Nukwo nu, obu muraaba mwahumbuukire hamu na Kristo, mute omutima ha by'omwiguru, Kristo nambere ali, anyakwikaliire ha mukono gw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga.
Muteekerezeege ebintu eby'omwiguru, bitali eby'omunsi.
Habwokuba mukafa, kandi obwomeezi bwanyu buserekerwe na Kristo omu Ruhanga.
Kristo obwomeezi bwaitu obu aligaruka kuzooka, nubwo na inywe mulizooka hamu nawe omu kitiinisa.
Nahabweki mucwe engeso ez'ensi ezinyakuli omuli inywe: obusiihani, obugwagwa, ebiteekerezo ebibi, okwegomba okubi, n'omukoijo gw'itungo ly'abandi, itungo eri mwafoire embandwa zanyu ez'okuramya.
Habwokuba ebi nibyo birireetera Ruhanga kubakayukira.
Kandi ebi nibyo mwakoraga obu mukaba mukyabirumu.
Baitu hati mucwe engeso zinu: ekiniga, okubiihirwa, itima okuhangirra, n'okubaza eby'ensoni.
Mutabiihangana ebisuba, habwokuba mukaleka obwomeezi obwa ira n'engeso zaabwo,
mwatandika obundi obunyakwikara nibuhindurwa buhyaka nukwo bubahikye ha magezi na ha nsisana by'Ogu ayabuhangire.
Obu, nihaba hatakyaroho Omugiriiki n'Omuyudaaya, asazirwe n'atasazirwe, omunyaihanga n'ow'ihanga eriteegesibwe, omwiru n'ow'obugabe, baitu Kristo nuwe byona omu byona.
Inywe abaakomerwe Ruhanga, abarukwera kandi abagonzibwa, mube n'okuganyira, embabazi, okwebundaaza, obuculeezi, n'okugumiisiriza.
Obu haraaba haroho anyakwina akahyeme hali mutaahi we, mugumiisirizangane kandi muganyirangane. MUKAMA nkooku yabaganyiire, na inywe nukwo musemeriire kuganyirangana.
Kandi ekirukukira byona, mube n'engonzi eziteeraniza hamu ebintu byona omu kwikirraniza okw'amazima.
Obusinge bwa Kristo obu mwayetiirwekwo kuba ebicweka by'omubiri gumu buleme omu mitima yanyu. Kandi musiimege Ruhanga.

Ekigambo kya Kristo kiikalege nikyeyongera omuli inywe, obu muraabaga nimwegesangana kandi nimuhaburangana omu magezi goona, noobu muraabaga nimuzina zabbuli, ebizina by'okukugiza, n'ebizina ebiruga mu mwoyo, nimusiima Ruhanga omu mitima n'ebizina ebiruga mu mwoyo, nimusiima Ruhanga omu mitima yanyu.
Kandi kyona eki muraagambaga rundi eki muraakoraga, mukikolege omu ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu, omuli uwe nimusiimiramu Ruhanga Ise.
Banyinabwenge muhurrege baiba-inywe nkooku MUKAMA asiima.
Banyinaamaka mugonzeege bakazi banyu kandi muleke kubagirra omwaga.
Abaana muhurrege bazaire banyu omu byona, habwokuba eki nikyo MUKAMA asiima.
Baise-baana muleke kutuntuza abaana banyu, bataharaza emitima.
Abairu muhurrege bakama banyu ab'omunsi omu byona. Kandi eki muleke kukikora obu baba babataireho eriiso, nk'abarukwenda kusiimwa abantu; baitu mubaheereze n'omutima gumu nimutiina MUKAMA.
Buli mulimo gwona ogu mukora, mugukole n'okusemererwa, nk'abarukuheereza MUKAMA batali bantu.
Nimumanya ngu, obugwetwa niyo mpeera yanyu ei muliheebwa MUKAMA; habwokuba nimuheereza MUKAMA Kristo.
Ningira enkozi y'ebibi erisasurwa habw'ebibi yakozire. Ruhanga tasoroora mu bantu.
Inywe bakama b'abairu, abairu banyu mubakorre eby'obwinganiza kandi ebihikire, nimumanya na inywe nkooku mwina MUKAMA omwiguru.
Mweyongere omu kusaba mutarukugarukirra, mutarukuhungira kandi musiime Ruhanga.
Na itwe mutusabire, nukwo Ruhanga asobole kutukingurra omuhanda ogw'okurangirra Amakuru Amarungi n'okumanyisa ensita ya Kristo eyankwasize omu nkomo,
nukwo nsobole kugisoborra kurungi nkooku nsemeriire.
Abantu ab'aheeru mubakwatege n'amagezi, mutarukusiisa akasumi aka mwina.
Obutoosa ebigambo byanyu bibege birungi, binurrege abandi nk'ebirungirwemu ekisura, nukwo musobole kumanya eki musemeriire kugarukamu buli omu.
Tikiko, ow'oruganda omugonzibwa, omukozi omwesigwa kandi omuheereza mugenzi waitu omu kukorra MUKAMA, araabagambira ebyambaireho.
Bunu nubwo bulyo bwonyini obu mmutumiire hali inywe, nukwo musobole kumanya nkooka tuli, kandi na inywe abagumye emitima.
Namutumayo hamu na Oneesimo mugenzi waitu omwesigwa kandi omugonzibwa, omuntu ow'owaanyu. Baraabagambira byona ebyabaire kunu.
Alisitaako, omunyankomo mugenzi wange, naabaramukya; na Mariko mwihwa wa Baranaba (ou nabamanyisizeho kara obu alibahikaho, mumutangirre kurungi).
Na Yesu, anyakwetwa Yusito, naabaramukya. Omu bakozi bataahi bange abarukukorra obukama bwa Ruhanga, banu bonka nubo abaasazirwe, kandi bakampuumuza.
Epafura ow'owaanyu, omuheereza wa Kristo Yesu, naabaramukya. Obutoosa abaijuka n'omutima gumu omu kusaba kwe, nukwo musobole kwemerra mugumire, mweheriireyo kimu okukora byona Ruhanga ebi agonza.
Ndi kaiso arukugumya nkooku yabakoliire n'amaani, inywe hamu n'abo abali Layodikeeya n'abali Hieraapoli.
Luka, omufumu omugonzibwa, na Deema nibabaramukya.
Mundamukize ab'oruganda abali Layodikeeya. Mundamukize Nimfa, n'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza ab'omu nju ye.
Ebbaruha enu obu erikamara kubasomerwa, mugitwekere ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza aba Layodikeeya bagisome; kandi na inywe musome ebbaruha eriruga Layodikeeya.
Muteererre Arakiipo muti: “Oyekambe okuhikiriza obuheereza MUKAMA obu yakuhaire.”
Nyowe Paulo okuramukya kunu nkuhandiikire n'omukono gwange. Muteebwa nkooku nkiri omu nkomo. Embabazi za Ruhanga ziikale na inywe.
Nyowe Paulo, hamu na Silivaano na Timoteho, nituhandiikira ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza ba Teesalonika abali omu Ruhanga Isiitwe na MUKAMA Yesu Kristo: Nitubagondeza omugisa n'obusinge.
Obutoosa tusiima Ruhanga habwanyu inywena, nitubaijuka obutalekerra omu kusaba kwaitu.

Nitwijuka omumaiso ga Ruhanga waitu kandi Isiitwe ebi murukukora habw'okwikiriza kwanyu, n'ebi murukwekambira habw'engonzi zanyu, n'ebi murukugumiisiriza habw'okunihira oku mwina omu MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Bagenzi bange, nitumanya Ruhanga nkooku abagonza kandi nkooku yabakomere;

ningira Amakuru Amarungi aga twabarangiriire gakabahikaho kwo. Gatabahikeho omu bigambo byonka, baitu omu maani n'omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire kandi gakabahwitura. Mumanyire enyikara yaitu omuli inywe nkooku ekaba eri nitugenderra kubagasira.
Na inywe mukahondera engeso zaitu n'eza MUKAMA, mwaikiriza Amakuru Amarungi nimubonesibwa muno, baitu mwina okusemererwa habw'okukoonyerwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Nukwo mwafookere muti kyokurorraho ky'abaikiriza boona abali Makedoniya n'Akaaya.
Ekigambo kya MUKAMA mutakirangaanize omu Makedoniya n'Akaaya honka, baitu amakuru g'okwikiriza oku mwina omu Ruhanga gakaranganwa hoona. Nikyo ntarukugondeza kukibazaaho muno;
habwokuba bbo bonyini bamanyisa buli hantu nkooku mwatutangiriire kurungi kandi nkooku mwahindukiire kwo Ruhanga, mwaleka embandwa, nukwo muheereze Ruhanga omwomeezi kandi ow'amazima,
n'oku murukulindirirra Omwana we kuruga omu iguru, ou yahumbwire omu bafu, nuwe Yesu anyakutujuna ekifubiro ekiri ky'okwija.
Bagenzi bange, inywe inywenka nimumanya okubunga kwaitu omuli inywe nkooku kutarafiire busa.
Noobu turaaba twabonesiibwe kandi twaswaziibwe omu Filipi nkooku murukumanya; baitu Ruhanga waitu akatuha obumanzi obw'okubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi nituhakanizibwa muno.
Kandi binu ebi turukubeegesa tibirugwamu nsobi, tibiri bibi, tibirumu bugobya.
Baitu Ruhanga nkooku yakukomere, akatukwasa Amakuru Amarungi ganu, na itwe nukwo tugarangirra tutarukugenderra kusiimwa abantu, baitu kusiimwa Ruhanga anyakumanya emitima yaitu.
Mukimanyire kurungi, kandi Ruhanga nuwe kaiso waitu, itwe titukabazaaga bigambo by'okunwekanweka, rundi eby'okuswekerra omururu gwaitu.
Titwaserraga kitiinisa omu bantu: omuli inywe rundi omu bandi, kunu nk'abakwenda ba Kristo twakusoboire kukisaba.
Baitu tukabakwatirwa embabazi, nk'omulezi arukulera abaana be.
Nukwo habw'okubagonza muno, tukamalirra kubagana na inywe, tikuli kubagana Amakuru Amarungi ga Ruhanga gonka, baitu n'obwomeezi bwaitu bwonyini, habwokuba mukaba mumazire kufooka nganjani zaitu mali.
Bagenzi bange, nimwijuka omulimo n'okutalibana kwaitu; twakoraga nyamusana n'ekiro nukwo tuleke kulemerra omuntu weena omuli inywe, obu tukaba nitukyabarangirra Amakuru Amarungi ga Ruhanga.
Inywe muli bakaiso, kandi Ruhanga nawe kaiso, engeso zaitu nkooku ziikara ziri nungi, zihikiriire kandi itarukunyoomwa inywe abaikiriza.
Nimumanya nkooku twateererraga buli omu omuli inywe, n'oku twayekambisaaga boona kandi twahanaga nka isebaana oku akora abaana be,
nukwo mube n'engeso ezirukusiimwa Ruhanga, anyakubeeta kutaaha omu bukama bwe n'omu kitiinisa kye.

Kandi na itwe nikyo tusiimira Ruhanga obutoosa, habwokuba obu mwahuliire ekigambo kya Ruhanga eki twabatebiize, mutakiikirize nk'ekigambo ky'abantu, baitu mukakiikiriza nk'ekigambo kya Ruhanga ekirukukora omuli inywe abaikiriza. Kandi mazimakwo nukwo kiri.

Ab'oruganda, inywe mukasisana ebitebe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga omu Kristo Yesu ebiri Buyudaaya; habwokuba abantu ab'ihanga lyanyu bakababonesa enaku ezirukusisana nk'ez'abaikiriza ba Buyudaaya baabonesiibwe ab'ihanga lyabo.
Nubo abaisire MUKAMA Yesu n'abarangi, nubo baatubingire, baabiihiza Ruhanga kandi baahakaniza abantu boona.
Bakatutanga kwegesa Abanyamahanga ebigambo ebisobora kubaleetera okujunwa, nukwo Abayudaaya kuhikiriza bati ebikorwa byabo ebibi. Baitu ekifubiro kya Ruhanga kirinzirwe kyabahikaho.
Bagenzi bange, obu tukaba twakabarugaho akacu kake twahukaniize emibiri etali myoyo, tukeekamba muno, twina ekihika kingi eky'okugaruka kubarora;
habwokuba tukagonza kwija owaanyu. Nyowe Paulo nkalengaho emirundi nyingi, baitu Sitaani akantanga.
Baitu nu, MUKAMA waitu Yesu obu aliija, okunihira kwaitu, okusemererwa kwaitu, n'ekondo yaitu ebirukutusiimisa omumaiso ge nibyo biha? Ti niinywe?
Habwokuba niinywe kitiinisa kyaitu n'okusemererwa kwaitu.
Nahabweki obu twarozire tutakyasobora kugumiisiriza, tukacwamu tusigale Aseni itwenka,
nukwo kutuma Timoteho mugenzi waitu kandi omuheereza wa Ruhanga omu kurangirra Amakuru Amarungi ga Kristo, abagumye omu kwikiriza kwanyu kandi abateererre,
haleke kubaho n'omu arukutengesibwa emihito egi. Na inywe inywenka nimumanya ebi nkooku bikaba biri by'okutuhikaho.
Tukabagambira kara, obu tukaba tukyali na inywe, nkooku tuli b'okubona emihito; kandi nukwo kyabairekwo, nkooku murukumanya.

Habweki obu narozire ntakyasobora kwikara ntaina eki mbahuliireho, nabatumaho Timoteho, mmanye okwikiriza kwanyu nkooku kuli, habwokuba nkaba nintiina nti, rundi omwohi ataakuba abooheze, kandi omulimo gwaitu gukafa busa.

Hati Timoteho obu yagarukire naaruga owaanyu, yatuleetera amakuru ag'okwikiriza kwanyu n'okugonza kwanyu. Kandi yatumanyisa nkooku mutwijuka butoosa n'okusemererwa, nimugonza muno kuturora, nka itwe oku turukugonza kubarora.
Nahabweki ab'oruganda, okwikiriza kwanyu kutuhuumwize omu bujune bwaitu bwona n'omu mihito yaitu.
Okumanya inywe nkooku mugumire hali MUKAMA, nikyo kitugumya omutima.
Ruhanga turaamusiima tuta habw'okusemererwa oku kwona oku twinakwo habwanyu omumaiso ge?
Tukataho muno omutima kusaba nyamusana n'ekiro, nukwo tusobole kurorangana twongerereze ebirukubura omu kwikiriza kwanyu.
Nitusaba Ruhanga waitu kandi Isiitwe wonyini, hamu na MUKAMA waitu Yesu, batwebembere batuhikye owaanyu.
Kandi MUKAMA abongere okugonzangana muno, n'okugonza abantu boona, nka itwe oku tubagonza,
nukwo asobole kugumya emitima yanyu, mwemerre omu maiso ga Ruhanga kandi Isiitwe nimwera kandi mutaina kamogo ha kiro MUKAMA waitu obw'aliija aina abahikiriire be boona.

Eky'okumalirra, bagenzi bange, nitubeesengerereza kandi nitubateererra omu ibara lya MUKAMA Yesu tuti: nkooku mwatwegiireho okuba n'engeso enungi n'okukora ebisiimwa Ruhanga, mweyongere muno, kukira nkooku murukukora hati.
Mumanyire ebiragiro ebi twabahaire habwa MUKAMA Yesu.
Ningira kinu nikyo Ruhanga agonza: mube abarukwera, mwetantale obusiihani.
Buli omu omuli inywe amanye okulema omubiri gwe gwikale nigwera kandi gwina ekitiinisa;
mutatwarwa okwegomba okw'omubiri nk'abakafiiiri abatamanya Ruhanga.
Nukwo haleke kubaho muntu weena anyakusobeza mugenzi we akamusiisira oburungi bwe obu, habwokuba MUKAMA nuwe muhoozi w'enzigu omuli ebi byona, nkooku twabahabwire kara nitubakomeetereza.
Ningira Ruhanga atatwetere eby'obugwagwa, baitu akatwetera oburukwera.
Weena anyakugaya enyegesa enu, tagaya muntu, baitu agaya Ruhanga anyakubaha Mwoyo we Ahikiriire.
Baitu ha kigambo ky'okugonza ab'oruganda, timurukwetaaga muntu n'omu kubahandiikira, habwokuba inywe inywenka Ruhanga akabeegesa okugonzangana;
kandi mazimakwo nimugonza ab'oruganda boona abali omu Makedoniya. Baitu nitubateererra bagenzi baitu, mweyongere muno okukora muti.
Muteho omutima kwikara mutaina bwogo, mwekambire emirimo yanyu, kandi mukole n'emikono yanyu nkooku twabahabwire,
nukwo abantu b'aheeru babahe akitiinisa, kandi mwemale inywenka mutarukukwatirirwa muntu n'omu.
Bagenzi bange, tirurukwenda inywe okutamanya ha by'abaagwijagiire nukwo muleke kusaalirwa nk'abandi abataina kunihira oku basaalirwa.
Baitu obu turaaba nitwikiriza Yesu nkooku yafiire kandi yahumbuuka, nukwo n'abo abaagwijagiriire omu Yesu, Ruhanga alibaleeta hamu nawe obu aligaruka.
Ka tubaijukye MUKAMA ngu, itwe aboomire abaliba baroho MUKAMA haaligarukira, titulibanza abo abaagwijagiire.

Habwokuba MUKAMA wonyini alisirimuka naaruga omwiguru, naaragira n'iraka ery'obusobozi, na mukuru wa bamalaika aliba naayamirra, kandi n'engwara ya Ruhanga eriba neegamba. Nubwo abaafeeriire omu Kristo balibanza kuhumbuuka.
Hanyuma na itwe aboomiire abaliba bakyaroho, tulitwarwa hamu nabo omu bicu okutangirra MUKAMA omu mwanya; nukwo tuliikara tuti nawe ebiro byona.
Nahabweki muhuumuzangane n'ebigambo ebi.
Bagenzi bange, eby'obusumi n'emyaka timurukwetaaga kubihandiikirwa.
Habwokuba inywe inywenka nimumanya kurungi ekiro eky'okugaruka kwa MUKAMA kiriija nk'omusuma oku aija omu bwire bw'ekiro.
Abantu obu baba nibagamba bati: “Haroho obusinge n'okuteekaana”, nubwo bahikwaho okuhwerekerra okwa bwango nkooku ebisa bihikaho omukazi anyakwina enda, kandi tihalibaho ow'alitabuka.
Inywe bagenzi bange, timuli omu mwirima, ekiro eki kubahikaho nk'omusuma.
Habwokuba inywena muli baana b'omusana kandi muli baana b'ekyerezi; tituli b'ekiro rundi b'omwirima.
Nukwo nu, tuleke kugwijagira abandi nkooku bakora; baitu twikale niturora kandi tuleke kutamiira.
Ningira abo abagwijagira, bagwijagira ekiro, kandi n'abo abatamiira, batamiira ekiro.
Baitu itwe nkooku tuli baana b'omusana, tuleke kutamiira, twekingire ha kifuba engabu y'okwikiriza n'okugonza, kandi ha mutwe tuteho enkofiira y'okunihira okujunwa.
Ningira Ruhanga atatuteereho kufubirwa, baitu akatuteeraho kujunwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo,
ayatufeeriire nukwo twomere hamu nawe, obu tuba niturora rundi tugwijagiire.
Habweki muhuumuzangane kandi mugumyangane nkooku murukukora hati.
Bagenzi bange nitubeesengereza, mutemu ekitiinisa abo abarukukora omuli inywe, abeebembezi kandi abahabuzi banyu omu MUKAMA,
kandi mubahe ekitiinisa kingi nimubagonza habw'omulimo babakorra. Mwikarane n'obusinge.
Bagenzi bange nitubateererra, muhabule abagara, mugumye abataina maani omu mutima, mukonyere abaceke. Kandi abo boona mubagumiisirize.
Mwerinde, haleke kubaho n'omu omuli inywe arukuhoora enzigu habw'obubi obu akoliirwe; baitu obutoosa mulengeho okukorrangana oburungi n'okubukorra abandi boona.
Musemererwege obutoosa,
musabege obutalekerra,
musiime Ruhanga omu byona ebinyakubaho; habwokuba eki nikyo Ruhanga abagondeza omu Kristo Yesu.
Muleke kubundiika Mwoyo Ahikiriire,
muleke kugaya eby'oburangi;
baitu mwetegereze buli kintu, kandi mugumire ha birungi.
Mwetantale ekibi ky'omulingo gwona.
Ruhanga, MUKAMA ow'obusinge, abeereze kimu. Emitima yanyu, emyoyo yanyu, n'emibiri yanyu ikale kurungi etaina kamogo okuhika ha kiro eky'okugaruka kwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Ruhanga ayabeesire aba mwesigwa kandi alihikiriza ebi yaraganiize.
Bagenzi bange, mutusabire!
Muramukye ab'oruganda boona n'omwoyo omurungi nimubagwa omu kifuba.
Nimbateererra omu ibara lya MUKAMA, ebbaruha enu esomerwe ab'oruganda boona.
Embabazi za MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo ziikale na inywe.
Nyowe Paulo, hamu na Silivaano na Timoteho, nituhandiikira ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza aba Teesalonika abali omu Ruhanga Isiitwe na MUKAMA Yesu Kristo:
Nitubagondeza omugisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na MUKAMA Yesu Kristo.
Bagenzi bange, kituhikiriire okusiima Ruhanga habwanyu nkooku kisemeriire, habwokuba okwikiriza kwanyu nikweyongera muno kandi n'okugonzangana kw'omuntu n'omugenzi we nakwo nikweyongera.
Nahabweki itwe nitubenyumirizaaho omu bitebe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga habw'okuguma kwanyu n'okwikiriza kwanyu omu kuhiiganizibwa oku kwona n'omu mihito ei murukugumiisiriza.
Eki nikyo kirukwoleka encwa ya Ruhanga ey'obulyo, nukwo inywe musobole kusangwa musemeriire obukama bwa Ruhanga obu murukubonera enaku hati.
Habwokuba Ruhanga naarora nkooku kiri ky'obwinganiza okubonesa abo abarukubabonesa;
kandi na inywe abanyakubonesibwa, okubahuumuza hamu na itwe. Ebi biribaho MUKAMA Yesu obu alizooka naaruga omwiguru, aina baamalaika be ab'obusobozi nibaizira omu murro
ogurukufubira abo abatarukumanya Ruhanga, hamu n'abo abatoorobera Amakuru Amarungi aga MUKAMA waitu Yesu.
Baliheebwa ekifubiro eky'okuhwerekerra okw'ebiro n'ebiro, n'okubingwa omu maiso ga MUKAMA n'omu kitiinisa eky'obusobozi bwe,
obu aliija ha kiro kiri okuheebwa ekitiinisa omu bahikiriire be n'okuhuniriza boona abaikiriize, habwokuba amakuru twabatebiize, mukagaikiriza.
Eki nikyo tubasabira obutoosa, nukwo Ruhanga waitu ababarre omu basemeriire eki yabeetiire, kandi ahikirize n'obusobozi bwe ebirungi byona ebi mwayecweriire kukora n'ebi murukukora habw'okwikiriza.
Nukwo MUKAMA waitu Yesu anyumirizibwe omuli inywe, na inywe munyumirizibwe omuli uwe, nk'embabazi za Ruhanga waitu n'eza MUKAMA Yesu Kristo okuziri.
Bagenzi bange, ha kigambo eky'okugaruka kwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo n'okusorrokana kwaitu kumutangirra, nitubeesengereza

muleke kucwekwa enkizi rundi kukangwa ebintu byona ebirukumanyisa ngu, ekiro kya MUKAMA kihikire; noobu byakuleetwa abarangi b'ebisuba, rundi orugambo rw'abantu, rundi ebbaruha erukusisana nk'erugire hali itwe.
Mutaliikiriza muntu n'omu kubabiihabiiha omu mulingo gwona. Ekiro eki tikirukwija kuhika obwemi butakacwekere, kandi Omwemi atakoolekerwe. Nuwe ogu ow'okuhwerekerra,
anyakuhakaniza kyona ekyetwa ruhanga rundi ekiramibwa. Naayenyumiriza kukira byona, nukwo aikarre omunju ya Ruhanga naayeyeta Ruhanga.
Timurukwijuka eki nkooku nakibagambiire obu nkaba nkyali na inywe?
Ekimutangire kuzooka hati, mukimanyire; nukwo asobole kwolekwa akasumi ke obu kalihika.
Habwokuba obwemi bukatandika ira, nibukora omu nsita; baitu Kristo anyakubutanga, araikaraga naabutanga okuhika obu alikaihwaho.
Obu nubwo Omwemi alizooka, kandi MUKAMA Yesu alimwisa orwoya orw'akanwa ke, amuhwerekereze n'okumuliikana okw'okwija kwe.
Omwemi ogu aliija omu busobozi bwa Sitaani, aina amaani ag'okukora ebihuniriza ebirukuhabisa, n'ebyamasano,
hamu n'ebindi byona ebirisobora kuhabisa abo abali b'okuhwerekerra, habwokuba bakanga kugonza amazima agaakubajunire.
Nikyo Ruhanga abalekera bahabisibwa, baikirize ebisuba ebi.
Nukwo boona abataraikiriize amazima, baitu baasiima obubi, bacwerwe omusango, gubasinge.
Bagenzi bange abagonzibwa MUKAMA, kituhikiriire kusiima Ruhanga butoosa habwanyu, habwokuba okuruga kara na kara Ruhanga akabakomera okujunwa, mwezibwe Mwoyo Ahikiriire kandi mwikirize amazima.
Eki nikyo yabeetiire naayekoonyeza okurangirra kwaitu okw'Amakuru Amarungi, nukwo musobole kubagana ha kitiinisa kya MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Nahabweki bagenzi bange mugume, mukwatire kimu byona ebi twabeegeseze na kanwa kaitu rundi ebi twabahandiikiire.
MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo wonyini, na Ruhanga Isiitwe ayatugondeze, yatuha ekihuumuro eky'ebiro n'ebiro n'okunihira okugumire habw'embabazi ze,
ahuumuze emitima yanyu kandi abagumye omu birungi byona ebi mukora n'ebi mugamba.
Eky'okumalirra bagenzi bange, mutusabire, nukwo ekigambo kya MUKAMA kyanguhe kuraranga hoona kandi kisingule, nkooku kyasingwire omuli inywe;
na itwe tusobole kutabuka abantu ababi kandi engumangani, habwokuba boona tibaina okwikiriza.
Baitu MUKAMA mwesigwa; alibaha amaani kandi abajune Omubi.
Nitubeesiga omu MUKAMA, habwokuba nimukora kandi mulyongera kukora ebintu ebi turukubaragira.
MUKAMA aterekereze emitima yanyu omu ngonzi za Ruhanga n'omu kugumiisiriza kwa Kristo.
Bagenzi bange, nitubaragira omu ibara lya MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, mwecweho ow'oruganda weena atarukwenda kukora emirimo kandi atarukukuraatira engeso ezi twabamanyize.
Inywe inywenka mumanyire nkooku musemeriire kutukuraatira. Obu tukaba tuli na inywe tukaba tutali bagara,
tutaliire busa ebyokulya by'omuntu weena, baitu twatalibanaga, twajwahaga kandi twakoraga nyamusana n'ekiro, nukwo tuleke kulemeera omuntu n'omu omuli inywe.
Tikuli kugamba ngu, tukaba tutaina bulyo obw'okubikolerwa, baitu tukagonza kubaha ekyokurorraho omu ngeso zaitu, eki muraakuraatira.
Obu tukaba tuli na inywe, tukabaha ekiragiro ekirukugamba ngu: Atarukwenda kukora, aleke kulya.
Habwokuba nituhurra abamu omuli inywe nkooku bali bagara, beetaahya omu by'abandi, tibagira eki bakora.
Abantu nk'abo nitubaragira kandi nitubateererra omu MUKAMA Yesu Kristo, bakole emirimo yabo hataroho bwogo, beetungire ebyokulya byabo nyabwabu.
Ab'oruganda, mutajwaha omu kukora ebirungi.
Kakuba habaho arukwanga kukwata ebi turukugamba omu bbaruha enu, omuntu ogu mumwetegereze, mutongera kukorrana nawe, nukwo akwatwe ensoni.
Muleke kumurora nk'omunyanzigwa, baitu mumuhabule nka mugenzi wanyu.
MUKAMA w'obusinge wonyini, abahe obusinge obusumi bwona n'omu bintu byona. MUKAMA abe nainywe inywena.
Okuraga kunu nkwehandiikire nyenka n'omukono gwange: Ninyowe Paulo. Kanu nuko karorwaho omu bbaruha zange zoona; nukwo mpandiika nti.
Embabazi za MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo ziikalege na inywe inywena.
Nyowe Paulo, omukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, ayakomerwe kandi natumwa Ruhanga ayatujunire na Kristo Yesu okunihira kwaitu,
Ninkuhandiikira iwe Timoteho, omwana wange mali omu kwikiriza: Ninkugondeza emigisa, embabazi, n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu.
Oikaleyo Efeeso nkooku nakuteereriire obu nkaba ningenda Makedoniya, nukwo otange abantu abamu, baleke kwegesa enyegesa endi.

Baleker'aho n'okwemarra ha nganikyo ez'okwehangahanga, baleker'aho n'okurondooza eby'obwijukuru obutaina nambere bugarukira, ebirugwamu empaka, baitu bitarukumanyiza abantu engeso enungi ezirukuleetwa okwikiriza.
Kandi kunu itwe eki turukugenderra omu nyegesa zaitu, nizo ngonzi eziruga omu mutima ogusemiire n'omu biteekerezo ebihikire, n'omu kwikiriza okutarumu obugobya.
Abantu abamu abanyakuruga hali ebi, bahabira omu mpaka ezitaina makuru,
bagonza kufooka beegesa b'ebiragiro, kunu tibarukwetegereza ebi barukwegesa rundi ebi barukugumya.
Kyonka itwe tumanyire Ebiragiro nkooku biri birungi, kakuba omuntu abihondera omu mulingo oguhikire.

Baitu kinu nikyo kisemeriire kwetegerezibwa: Ebiragiro tibiteebwaho habw'abarukukora kurungi, baitu biteebwaho habw'abeemi n'entahurra, habw'abatatiina Ruhanga n'abasiisi, habw'abatata mutima ha diini, n'abasiisa ebya Ruhanga, habw'abaita baisebo rundi banyinabo, na habw'abaisi b'abantu abandi,
habw'abasiihani, abakuuhya, n'ababuza abantu, habw'ababiiha ebisuba n'abarahira ebisuba, n'ekindi kyona ekirukuhakaniza enyegesa enyakuhikire.
Egi niyo nyegesa erukwikirraniza n'Amakuru ago Amarungi kwo aga Ruhanga anyakuhaisanizibwa, nyowe aga nakwasiibwe.
Ninsiima Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu ayampaire amaani ag'okukora omulimo gunu, habwokuba akarora nkooku ndi mwesigwa nukwo kunkoma kumuheereza,
kara noobu ndiba namujumire, namuhiiganiza, kandi naamubazaaho kubi; baitu akangirra embabazi habwokuba ebi nkabikozesibwa obutamanya, ntakaikiriize.
MUKAMA waitu akangirra embabazi nyingi, yampa okwikiriza n'engonzi ebi tutunga omu Kristo Yesu.
Ekigambo kinu ky'amananu kandi kisemeriire kwikiririzibwa kimu, ekirukugamba kiti: Kristo Yesu akaija omunsi okujuna abasiisi. Kandi omuli abo, ninyowe ow'okubanza.

Baitu eki nagiririrwe embabazi nikyo kinu: omuli nyowe omusiisi ow'okubanza, Yesu Kristo ayolekeremu okugumiisiriza kwe okutaina h'okugarukira, kube kyokurorraho ha bandi abarukwija kumwikiriza, basobole kutunga obwomeezi obutahwaho.
Ruhanga omu wenka, MUKAMA ow'ebiro n'ebiro, atafa kandi atarorwa, ahaisanizibwe kandi aheebwe ekitiinisa ebiro n'ebiro! Amiina.
Binu nibyo ndukukuteererra mwana wange Timoteho. Bihikaana n'ebi abarangi baakugambireho kara. Leka na hati bikuhe amaani ag'okurwana kurungi,
ogumye okwikiriza, omutima gwawe nkooku gukuhabura. Abantu abamu habw'okutafaaho omutima ebi gurukubahabura, bakafeerwa okwikiriza kwabo.
Omuli abo nuho hali Himenaayo na Alekizanda, aba nalekiire Sitaani, nukwo beege kutajuma Ruhanga.
Eky'okubanza, nimbateererra nti; Musabire abantu boona, nimubeesengereza, nimubatonganirra, kandi nimubasiimira.
Musabire abakama n'abalemi boona, nukwo twikale tuteekaine, twina obusinge, nitutiina Ruhanga kandi nitwoleka engeso nungi omu byona.
Eki kirungi kandi nikisiimwa Ruhanga ayatujunire.
Nuwe anyakugonza abantu boona bajunwe kandi bamanye amazima.
Ningira haroho Ruhanga omu, kandi n'omuteeraniza omu, nuwe muntu Yesu Kristo anyakuteeraniza Ruhanga n'abantu,
Ayayehaireyo kuba ndehwa ya boona, kandi eki akakikora akasumi kaakyo obu kahikire.
Eki nikyo nakomiirwe mbe murangirizi kandi mukwenda okwegesa Abanyamahanga eby'okwikiriza n'eby'amazima (na hati nimbaza amananu, tindukubaza bisuba).
Ekindi eki ndukwenda, abasaija beebemberege okusaba omu biikaro byona, baimukize kurungi emikono yabo, bataina kiniga rundi enkungani.
Kandi ninyenda abakazi bajwale ebyokujwara ebisemeriire kandi ebibahikire, batasibire isoke, noobwakuba kujwara eby'ezaabbu, eruuru, rundi ebijwaro by'omuhendo mwingi;
baitu bejweke ebikorwa ebirungi nkooku kisemeriire abakazi abarukutiina Ruhanga.
Omu kasumi ak'okwegesibwa, omukazi aikale aculire kandi naayebundaaza.
Tindukwikiriza mukazi kwegesa rundi kutegeka abasaija; baitu aikale aculiire.
Ningira Adamu nuwe yabandize kubumbwa, nukwo haakurataho Eva.
Kandi Adamu atabiihabiihwe, baitu omukazi nuwe yabiihabiihirwe, yagwa mu kibi.
Kyonka omukazi alijunwa habw'okuzaara abaana, kakuba agumire omu kwikiriza, aina engonzi, oburukwera, hamu n'engeso nungi.
Ekigambo kinu ky'amananu: Omuntu weena obu ayenda obukuru bw' oburoleerezi, aba ayegombere omulimo murungi muno.
Habweki omuroleerezi asemeriire kuba muntu ataina kyona eki arukujunaanwa; musaija anyakuswire omukazi omu, omwerinzi, omwetegereza, ateekaine, w'amakune, kandi anyakusobora kwegesa.
Atali mutamiizi, atarukujumbuutuka baitu mukwata mpora. Muntu atarukukungana kandi atarukwemarra ha sente.
Asemeriire kulema kurungi eka ye naayegesa abaana be kumuhurra n'okumutamu ekitiinisa omu byona.
Omuntu obu atamanya kulema kurungi eka ye, asobora ata kurolerra akitebe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga?
Asemeriire kuba muntu anyakumazire omwanya ahindukiire Kristo, taikara kwekuliriza muno akasingwa omusango ogwasingire Sitaani.
Kandi asemeriire kuba muntu arukusiimwa n'abantu ab'aheeru, kuba kitaba kwo naija kujumwa kandi agwe omu mutego gw'Omwohi.
Abaheereza nabo basemeriire kuba bantu b'omutima ogugumire, abatali b'enkuru ibiri, abatarukunywa muno marwa, n'abataina mukoijo gw'ebintu.
Basemeriire kulinda ensita z'okwikiriza n'omutima gumu.
Baitu nabwo, babanze balengesebwe. Kakuba bazooka nkooku bahikire, batandike obuheereza bwabu.
Abaheerezakati nabo basemeriire kuba b'omutima ogugumire kandi abatarukugeya. Babe beerinzi kandi beesigwa omu byona.
Abaheereza babe n'omukazi omu, baleme kurungi abaana babo hamu n'eka yabo;
habwokuba abo abahikya kurungi obuheereza bwabo, beetungira ibara lirungi kandi abantu baabeesiga muno habw'okugumya okwikiriza oku baina omu Kristo Yesu.
Ninihira kwija owaanyu bwango, baitu nkuhandiikire binu,
kakuba nkererwa, nukwo osobole kumanya engeso abantu ezi basemeriire kuba nazo omu ka ya Ruhanga. Niryo iramizo lya Ruhanga omwomeezi, enyomyo kandi orugo orw'amazima.

Na itwe leka twatule eby'ensita eby'enyikiriza yaitu nkooku biri bikuru mali. Nibyo ebirukugamba biti: Akafooka muntu, yagumibwa Mwoyo Ahikiire, yarorwa bamalaika, yarangirirwa omu mahanga, yaikirizibwa ab'omunsi yoona, yatwarwa omu iguru n'ekitiinisa.
Mwoyo Ahikiire nagamba bbwa ngu, omu biro eby'omumaiso abamu balinaga okwikiriza, nibahabisibwa emyoyo ey'ebisuba n'enyegesa za Sitaani,
nibahabisibwa obugobya bw'ababiihi b'ebisuba abaina emitima egumangaine kandi esiiriziibwe Sitaani.
Nubo abo abatanga abantu okuswerangana, baziza ebyokulya Ruhanga ebi yahangire kuliibwa abo abamwikiriza. Nubo abo abamanyire amazima kandi ababirya n'okusiima.
Kyona Ruhanga eki yahangire kiba kirungi kandi tihakubaireho ekirukuzirwa kakuba kiriibwa n'okusiima;
habwokuba nikiba kyeziibwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga hamu n'okusaba.
Timoteho, obu olihabura oti ab'oruganda boona, oliba muheereza murungi owa Kristo Yesu anyakuta omutima ha by'okwikiriza n'eby'enyegesa enungi ei wakuraatiire.
Oyecwereho kimu enganikyo ezitali za Ruhanga kandi ez'obudoma. Wemanyiize kutiina Ruhanga.
Okwemanyiiza omu by'omubiri, noobu kuraaba nikugasa; baitu okutiina Ruhanga nikukirra hara omugaso; habwokuba oina eki orukunihira kutanga omu bwomeezi bunu n'omu bwomeezi obuliija.
Ekigambo eki kya mananu kandi kisemeriire kwikiririzibwa kimu.
Habwokuba eki nikyo turukutalibanira kandi nikyo turukwekambira. Ningira okunihira kwaitu kwona tukutaire hali Ruhanga Omwomeezi, Omujuni w'abantu boona, okukira muno ow'abaikiriza.
Ebigambo binu obyegese kandi obiteererre.
Hatabaho n'omu arukukugaya habw'okuba musigazi, baitu obe kyokurorraho ha baikiriza omu kubaza, omu ngeso, omu kugonza, omu kwikiriza, n'omu burukwera bw'omutima.
Taho omutima okusomera abantu Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera, okubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi n'okubeegesa okuhika obu ndiija.
Otanagaija ekisembo kya Mwoyo eki wahairwe habw'ebigambo abarangi bakugambireho, abakuru obu baakutaireho emikono.
Emirimo egi yoona ogyekambire, ogiteho muno omutima, nukwo boona barole nkooku orukugenda omu maiso.
Engeso zaawe ozeegendereze kandi oyetegereze n'enyegesa yawe; ogigumireho. Obu olikora oti, nubwo olyejuna kandi ojune n'abarukukuhurra.
Otalicoomera musaija mukuru, baitu omuhabulege nkooku waakuhabwire sso. Abasigazi obakole kurungi nka bagenzi baawe,
abakazi bakuru obakorre ebirungi nk'ebi wakukoliire nyoko, kandi abaisiki nka banyanyoko, omu burukwera bwona.
Abafaakati nyakabara, obatemuga ekitiinisa.

Omufaakati obu araaba aina abaana rundi abaijukuru, abaana abo leka babanze beetegereze ediini ebi erukubaragira kukorra ab'oruganda rwabo, n'ebi basemeriire kugarurra bazaire baabo; habwokuba eki nikyo Ruhanga arukusiima.
Omufaakati nyakabara, ataina kiroleererwa, okunihira kwe kwona akutaire hali Ruhanga, aikara naayesengereza kandi naasaba ekiro na nyamusana.
Baitu omufaakati anyakwenagiriza, asisana nk'afiire, noobu araaba akyali mwomeezi.
Eki okibasoborre nukwo baleme kuba n'ebi barukujunaanwa.
Kakuba habaho omuntu ataina eki arukukorra ab'obuzaale bwe, okukira muno ab'oruganda rwe mali, aba anagiire kimu okwikiriza, kandi aba ali mubi okukira ogu atakaikirizaaga.
Anyakuhandiikwa nk'omufakaati nuwe ogu anyakuhikize emyaka nkaaga y'obukuru, ayaswirweho omusaija omu,

kandi amanyirwe habw'ebikorwa ebirungi ebi akora, nk'ayayoroire kurungi abaana, ayakuniire abagenyi, ayanaabisize abantu ba Ruhanga ebigere, ayahumwize abali omu mihito, kandi ayayeheerireyo kimu okukora kurungi omu byona.
Baitu abafaakati abato otabaikiriza; habwokuba omubiri obu gubalemesa, gubaiha hali Kristo, bagonza kugaruka kuswerwa.
Nukwo beeretera omusango habw'okutahikiriza ekiragaano kyabo eki baabandiize kuragaana na Kristo.
Tikiri eki kyonka, baitu bataahirirwa n'obugara, batandika kwenjeera, nibaruga munu nibataaha muli. Tibuli bugara bwonka, nibabaza ebi bataakubaliize.
Nahabweki naakugondeze abafaakati abato baswerwe, bazaale abaana, barolerre amaka gaabo, nukwo abanyanzigwa baleke kubona obwiho obw'okutubazaaho kubi.
Ningira abamu omuli bo bakahaba ira, nibakuraatira Sitaani.
Omuntu weena arukwikiriza, obu araaba aina abanyabuzale be abafaakati, abakoonyere; ekitebe ky'abaikiriza kireke kwetweka obulemeezi obu, nukwo kisobole kukoonyera abafaakati nyakabara.
Abakuru abarukwebembera kurungi, leka baheebwe ekitiinisa okukira abandi, muno muno abo abarukukora omulimo ogw'okurangirra n'okwegesa.
Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera bigamba biti: “Omuntu arukukugesira, aikirizibwa kutwara ha buro.” kandi biti: “Omukozi asemeriire empeera ye.”
Otaliikiriza eki barukujunaana omukuru w'ekitebe, rundi buli nikigumibwa abakaiso babiri rundi basatu.
Kandi abo abanyakulemera omu kibi, obahane omumaiso ga boona, nukwo abandi baikale nibatiina.
Ninkuteererra omumaiso ga Ruhanga, n'aga Yesu Kristo, n'aga bamalaika abataraterebukire, ebiragiro binu obikwase boona atarukusoroora, nookora byona omu bwinganiza.
Otalyanguhiriza okutaho abantu emikono, kandi oleke kwetaba omu bibi by'omuntu ondi; oikalege n'omutima ogurukwera.
Otongera kunywa amaizi gonka, baitu onywehoga n'otwarwa tuke habw'enda yawe na habw'endwara yawe enyakwikara niimuka.
Ebibi eby'abamu bizooka bwango, byeyoleka batakacweriiwe musango, baitu eby'abandi bizooka haahingwireho akasumi.
Ebikorwa ebirungi nabyo nukwo bizooka bwango biti; noobu biba bitakazookere, baitu tibisobora kwikara biserekerwe.
Boona abali omu bwiru, bamanye bakama baabo nkooku basemeriire kuheebwa ekitiinisa, nukwo ibara lya Ruhanga n'enyegesa yaitu bireke kugaywa.

Abairu abaina bakama baabo abaikiriza, baleke kubagaya ngu, boona b'oruganda rumu; baitu babaheereze kurungi okukiraho habwokuba abo abarukugasirwa omulimo gwabo nubo abaikiriza kandi abagonzibwa. Ebi nibyo obeegese kandi obateererre.
Baitu kakuba habaho arukwegesa ebitali ebi rundi atarukwikirraniza n'ebigambo ebihikire ebya MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo n'enyegesa erukwikirraniza n'enyikiriza yaitu.
aba ahinguraniize akwekuliriza, kandi taina eki amanyire. Aina n'omutima omubi ogw'okuhakaniza n'okuteera empaka ha bigambo ebizaara ihali, okwahukana, okuhangirra, okuteekerezaho kubi abantu,
n'okuteeza empaka abantu abaina ebiteekerezo ebiramaire kandi abataina mazima, abarukuteekereza ngu, ediini nugwo muhanda ogw'okuguudahara.
Nukwo, ediini erumu itungo lingi, baitu hali abo abaikara nibasiima ebi bainabyo.
Omunsi tukaijamu tutaina kantu, kandi tuligirugamu tutarukutwara kantu;
baitu obu tuba twina ebyokulya n'ebyokujwara, leka ebi bitumale.
Abo abarurukira itungo bagwa omu kwohebwa n'omu mutego, batwalirizibwa okwegomba okutali kumu, okutarumu bwetegereza kandi okuleeta akabi, kukadikiza abantu omu kuhwerekerra, bakahwaho.
Ningira omukoijo gw'omulingo ogu nugwo gwaihire abamu ha kwikiriza kwabu, emitima yabo baagireetera enaku nyingi.
Baitu iwe, omuntu wa Ruhanga, ebi byona obiirukege; omutima gwawe gwona ogute ha buhikiriire, ha kutiina Ruhanga, okwikiriza, okugonza okugumiisiriza na ha kukwata mpora.
Rwana masaija obulemu bw' okwikiriza; ogumire ha bwomeezi obutahwaho obu wayetiirwe kandi obu wayatwire kurungi noorahira omumaiso g'abakaiso baingi.
Hati nu, ninkuteererra omu maiso ga Ruhanga anyakwomeeza ebintu byona, n'omumaiso ga Kristo Yesu ayayatuliire kimu omumaiso ga Ponsiyo Pilaato nkooku ali kaiso ow'amazima,
ohonderege eki nakuragiire, otaina kamogo kandi otaina eky'orukujunaanwa, okuhika MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo obu alizooka.
Okuzooka kunu, omu kasumi kakwo, Rutakirwa wenka nuwe alikumanyisa. Nuwe MUKAMA w'abakama kandi Omulemi w'abalemi.
Ogu wenka nuwe atafa kandi aikara omu musana ogutahikwaho, atakarorwahoga kandi atasobora kurorwa muntu n'omu. Aheebwe ekitiinisa kandi ahangirize ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
Abaguuda ab'omunsi munu, obahabule baleke kwehurra, n'okuta emitima yabo ha itungo eritaikaraho; baitu bagite hali Ruhanga anyakutuheera kimu byona ebitusemeza.
Abantu abo basemeriire kukora kurungi; bakole ebikorwa ebirungi bingi, babe benda kandi bagabe n'omutima gumu.
Oku nukwo kweyombekera omusingi ogugumire ogw'ebiro ebiriija, nukwo basobole kutunga obwomeezi, nubwo bwomeezi obuhikire kwo.
Mwana wange Timoteho, linda eki wakwasiibwe. Wetentale orubazo orutarumu kutiina Ruhanga, n'empaka abantu abamu ezi beeta magezi, kandi kunu tikirikwo.
Habwokuba abamu obu bahondera amagezi ago bahabira kimu, nibaruga omu muhanda ogw'okwikiriza. Embabazi za Ruhanga ziikale na iwe.
Nyowe Paulo, Ruhanga ou yakomere kuba mukwenda wa Kristo Yesu, okurangirra obwomeezi obwaraganiziibwe obu tutungira omu Kristo Yesu,
ninkuhandiikira, iwe Timoteho omwana wange omugonzibwa: Ninkugondeza emigisa, embabazi, n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na Kristo Yesu MUKAMA waitu.
Ninsiima Ruhanga ou mpeereza n'omutima gumu, nka baisenkurunyowe oku baakozire, obu nkwijuka bwona omu kusaba kwange.
Obu nyijuka okurra kwawe, nyegomba kukurora ekiro na nyamusana, nukwo nsemerererwe kimu.
Ninyijuka okwikiriza kwawe okw'amananu, okwikiriza okwatandikiire omu nyokwenkuru Loyisi na nyoko Ehuniike, kandi hati ningumya na iwe oinakwo.
Nikyo ndukukwijukiza kwimukya buhyaka ekisembo kya Ruhanga ekiri omuli iwe, eki waatungire obu nakutaireho emikono.
Ningira Ruhanga atatuhe mutima ogw'obutiini, baitu akatuha ogw'amaani, ogw'engonzi, kandi ogw'okwetanga.
Nukwo nu, otakwatwa ensoni okujurra MUKAMA waitu, noobwakuba nyowe omunyankomo we. Kandi na iwe ikiriza okubonesibwa habw'Amakuru Amarungi, nookonyerwa amaani ga Ruhanga.
Nuwe ayatujunire kandi yatweta kuba bantu be, atarukusigikira ha bikorwa byaitu, baitu naasigikira ha ntegeka ye na ha mbabazi ezi yatugiriire ira omu Kristo Yesu.
Kandi na hati azoolekiire omu kwija kw'Omujuni waitu Kristo Yesu, ayahwerekeriize, yayolekera obwomeezi obutahwaho omu Makuru Amarungi.
Amakuru Amarungi ago, nugo nakomiirwe kuranga, ndi mukwenda kandi mwegesa,
kandi hati nikyo ndukubonera nti enaku. Baitu tindukukwatwa nsoni, habwokuba nimmanya ou naikiriize, kandi ningumya nkooku asobora kulinda ekisembo eki yankwasize okuhika ha Kiro kiri.
Na iwe ikara ohondere ekyokurorraho ky'ebigambo ebirungi ebi nakugambiire, ogumire omu kwikiriza n'omu kugonza ebinyakuli omu Kristo Yesu.
Ekirungi eki wahairwe, kirinde nookonyerwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire anyakwikara omuli itwe.
Omanyire boona abali omu Asiya, nkooku bandugireho. Omuli abo nuho hali Fiijelo na Herumojene.
MUKAMA agirre embabazi eka ya Onesiiforo habwokuba akampuumuza emirundi nyingi, atankwatirwe nsoni ndi hanu omu njegere,
n'obu yahikire Rooma akanserra aina ekihika, yanzoora.
MUKAMA amuhe kugirirwa embabazi ha Kiro eki! Na iwe omanyire kurungi byona ebi yankoliire ndi Efeeso.
Hati iwe, mwana wange, ba w'amaani habw'obukoonyezi bwa Kristo Yesu.
Ebi nakugambiire omumaiso g'abakaiso baingi, obikwase abantu abeesigwa, abalisobora kwegesa n'abandi.
Na iwe nk'omuserikale omurungi owa Kristo Yesu, gumira okubonabona kwawe.
Tiharoho muserikale anyakuli ha mulimo gwe anyakwetaba omu bigambo by'abatali barwani, habwokuba naagenderra kusiimwa ayamukomere.
Omuzaani w'empaka taheebwa kondo, rundi buli naahondera ebiragiro by'okuzaana.
Omulimi omwekambi nuwe asemerra kubanza kuganura ebyokulya ebi ayereze.
Weetegereze ebi ndukugamba, habwokuba MUKAMA naija kukukoonyera kukenga byona.
Ijuka Yesu Kristo ayahumbuukire omu bafu kandi mwijukuru wa Daudi, nkooku kyarangirwe omu Makuru Amarungi aga nabatebiize.
Amakuru Amarungi ago nugo ndukubonabonera, mboherwe omu njegere nk'omuntu enkozi y'ebibi. Baitu ekigambo kya Ruhanga tikibohwa.
Habweki ngumiisiriza byona habw'abakomerwemu, nukwo nabo batunge okujunwa n'ekitiinisa eky'ebiro n'ebiro omu Kristo Yesu.
Ekigambo kinu ky'amazima ekirukugamba kiti: Obu turaaba twafiire hamu nawe, buli tulyomeera hamu nawe;
obu turaaba nitugumiisiriza hamu nawe, buli tulirema hamu nawe; obu turaaba nitumwehooga, nawe alitwehooga.
Noobu turaaba tutali beesigwa, baitu Uwe aikara ali mwesigwa, habwokuba tasobora kwehakaniza.
Ebi oikalege noobibaijukya, kandi obateererre omumaiso ga MUKAMA: beerinde empaka ezitaleeta karungi, baitu zihwerekereza abazihurra.
Wekambe okweyoleka oli muntu kwo arukusiimwa Ruhanga, omukozi atarukukwatwa nsoni, arukwegesa kurungi ekigambo ky'amazima.
Werinde embazo ezitarumu kutiina Ruhanga, habwokuba nizongera kuhabisa abantu,
kandi ebigambo byabo bigenda nibirya nk'ekookoro. Omuli abo nuho hali Himenaayo na Fileeto,
abaahabire amazima nibagamba ngu, okuhuumbuka kukahingura ira. Nukwo bajuumika okwikiriza okw'abantu abamu.
Baitu omusingi gwa Ruhanga ogugumire gwikaraho, guroho emanyikirizo erukugamba eti: “MUKAMA, abe naabamanya”, kandi eti: “Weena anyakwatura ibara lya MUKAMA, aruge omu bubi.”
Omunju enkooto tihabamu bikwato ebya zaabbu n'efeeza byonka, baitu habamu ebibaizirwe n'ebibumbirwe. Ebimu biba by'emirimo ey'ekitiinisa, ebindi by'emirimo etali y'ekitiinisa.
Omuntu kakuba ayeihaho byona ebitali birungi; obu, alifooka kikwato ky'omulimo gw'ekitiinisa, kintu ekyeziibwe kandi ekirukugasira nyineeka, kiteekaniziibwe okukora omulimo gwona omurungi.
Habweki oyetantale okwegomba kubi okw'obusigazi, oyemarre ha buhikiriire, ha kwikiriza, ha kugonza, na ha businge, nookwataniza n'abo abeeta ibara lya MUKAMA, baina omutima ogurukwera.
Wecwereho kimu empaka ez'obudoma ezitaina makuru; na iwe omanyire nkooku izaara enkungani.
Omuheereza wa MUKAMA tasemerra kuba muntu w'enkungani, baitu aba munyambabazi ha buli muntu weena, mwegesa murungi kandi anyakugumiisiriza,
omuntu arukuhana mpora abarukumuteeza empaka. Rundi Ruhanga asobora kubaha kwegarukamu kandi bakamanya amazima,
nukwo basobole kutabuka emitego Sitaani ei yabakwatiiremu, bakole ebi Ruhanga yagondeze.
Baitu kinu okyetegereze: omu biro ebya ha mpero, halibaho obuzibu obw'akabi.
Habwokuba abantu balyegonza, balirurukira sente, balyekuliriza, balyekunika, balijuma abandi, tibaliihurra bazaire baabo, baliba ntasiima, abatafaaho buhikiire,
abataina mbabazi, abataganyira, abahangirra, abaseesaseesa ebyabo, abatiinisa abandi, abanoba oburungi,
baliba ngobya, ntabiganya, abahingurana okwekuza, bantu abagonza okwesemeza bonka okukira kugonza Ruhanga,
nibahikiriza emikoro y'ediini baitu nibanga obusobozi bwayo. Abantu nk'abo obeetantale!
Omuli abo nuho hali abataaha amaju bakahamba abakazi abataina maani g'omutima, abalemeriirwe ebibi byabu kandi abarukutwarwa okwegomba okwa buli mulingo.
Abakazi abalihuliriza buli mwegesa, baitu batarukusobora kumanya amazima.
Abantu ba ira Yane na Yambere nkooku baahakaniize Musa, abasaija banu nabo nukwo barukuhakaniza amazima--nubo bantu abaramaire ebiteekerezo kandi okwikiriza kwabo kw'obugobya.
Baitu tibalihika hara, habwokuba obudoma bwabo bulimanywa boona, nk'obw'abasaija bali ababiri.
Baitu iwe Timoteho, hati omazire kwetegereza enyegesa yange, eki ndukugenderra omu bwomeezi bwange, okwikiriza kwange, okugumiisiriza kwange, engonzi zange, okuguma kwange,
okuhiiganizibwa kwange n'okubonesibwa kwange. Noomanya ebyangweriire omu Antyokiya, Ikoniyo, na Lisitura; okuhiiganizibwa kwona oku naagumiisiriize! Baitu ebi byona MUKAMA akabinjuna.
Mazimakwo boona abarukwenda kukuza obwomeezi baahairwe Ruhanga nibakuraatira Kristo Yesu, bali b'okuhiiganizibwa.
Omu kasumi ako abantu enkozi z'ebibi kandi engobya balyeyongera kuba babi, nibabiiha abandi kandi nabo nibabiihwa.
Baitu iwe ogumire hali ebi wayegere kandi ebi waikiririize kimu, noomanya ayabikwegeseze.
Okuruga omu buto, Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera bikakumanyisa ebisobora kukuhabura bikakuhikya ha kujunwa okuleetwa okwikiriza Kristo Yesu.
Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera byona bihandiikisibwa Ruhanga, kandi bigasa omu kwegesa eby'amazima, omu kuhana abahabire, okuhabura, n'okutendeka abantu omu buhikiriire,
nukwo omuntu wa Ruhanga azooke nkooku ayegesebwa kwo, aina byona ebirukwetaagwa okukora omulimo gwona omurungi.
Ninkuteererra omumaiso ga Ruhanga n'aga Kristo Yesu ow'alicwera omusango aboomiire n'abafiire, ninkurahiza okugaruka kwe n'obukama bwe:
Rangirra ekigambo, kyekambire omu busumi obusemeriire n'obutasemeriire. Hwitura, hana kandi teererra; otaterebuka omu kugumiisiriza n'omu kwegesa.
Halibaho akasumi abantu obu balyanga kuhurra enyegesa ey'amazima, habw'okugira amatu agarukubanulirra, balyesorooleza abeegesa abarukubeegesa ebi barukwenda.
Balyanga kuhurra amazima, baburanganire omu nganikyo z'okwehangahanga.
Baitu iwe otalitengeeta, gumiisiriza emihito, kora omulimo ogw'omugambizi ow'Amakuru Amarungi, ohikirize kurungi obuheereza bwawe.
Habwokuba nyowe ndi haihi n'okutambwa; obwire bwange obw'okuruga omunsi buhikire.
Nyowe nkarwana masaija, empaka z'okwiruka nzimazire, okwikiriza nkugumize.

Okuruga hati nsigaize okutunga ekondo ey'obuhikiriire eyanteekaniriziibwe--MUKAMA, omucwi w'emisango omwinganiza, ei alimpa ha Kiro kiri. Taligiha nyowe nyenka, baitu na boona abaataire omutima ha kugaruka kwe.
Kora kyona eki orukusobora ompikeho bwango.
Habwokuba Deema anyakugonza ensi enu enyakuroho, akandugaho yagenda Teesalonika. Kereseke akagenda Galatiya, Tito yagenda Dalamatiya.
Luka wenka nuwe nsigaire nawe. Yeta Maliko, oije nawe; habwokuba nangasira muno omu gw'obuheereza.
Tikiko nkamutuma Efeeso.
Obu oliba noija, oleete omwegereko ogu nasigire Turoha mba Karipo. Ondeetere n'ebitabu, baitu okukira muno eby'emizingo y'empu.
Alekizanda, omuheesi w'emiringa, akankora kubi muno; MUKAMA alimusasura habw'ebi yakozire.
Na iwe omwerinde, habwokuba enyegesa yaitu akagihakaniriza kimu.
Omu kwetonganirra kwange okw'okubanza, busaho n'omu ayansagikire; boona bakandugaho. Hati ninsaba baleke kukijunaanwa!
Baitu MUKAMA akanyemerraho, yampa amaani ag'okurangirirra kimu ekigambo kye, nukwo Abanyamahanga boona basobole kukihurra. Na nyowe nukwo natabukire nti akanwa k'entale.
MUKAMA alintabura akabi koona kandi alinjuna, antwale omu bukama bwe obw'omwiguru. Ekitiinisa kibe hali Uwe, ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
Ondamukize Pirisika n'Akwila n'ab'omuka ya Onesiifooro.
Erasito akasigara Korinto, Turofimo nkamusiga Mileeto arwaire.
Lengaho oku orukusobora kwija obusumi bw'obutiti butakahikire. Yubulo, Pudensi, Liino, Klaudiya n'ab'oruganda boona bakuramukize.
MUKAMA aikale n'omwoyo gwawe. Embabazi za Ruhanga ziikale na inywe.
Nyowe Paulo, omuheereza wa Ruhanga kandi omukwenda wa Yesu Kristo, ayatumirwe okugumya okwikiriza kw'abantu abaakomerwe Ruhanga n'okubamanyisa amazima g'ediini,
amazima agasobora kubaleetera obwomeezi obutahwaho, Ruhanga atabiiha, obu yanihiize okuruga kara,
kandi omukasumi akahikire obu yayolekere omu kigambo kye, Ruhanga anyakutujuna, eki yankwasize kurangirra;
ninkuhandiikira iwe Tito, omwana wange mali omu kwikiriza itwena oku tukuraatira: Ninkugondeza embabazi n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na Kristo Yesu Omujuni waitu.
Eki nakusigiire Kureete, nkenda ohikirize byona ebitarakozirwe, n'okukoma abakuru omu buli rubuga, nkooku nakuragiire,
Okome omuntu ataina eki barukumuhyemera, omusaija ayaswire omukazi omu, kandi aina abaana abarukwikiriza. Muntu atarukurangwaho ngeso mbi kandi atali ntahurra.

Omuroleerezi nkooku ali omukeeto wa Ruhanga, asemeriire kuba ataina eki barukumuhyemera; tasemeriire kwemanyaho muno rundi kubiihirwa bwango. Atali mutamiizi, omunyakiniga, rundi arukururukira ebintu;
baitu abe w'amakune, engonzi y'oburungi, arukwerema wenka, mwinganiza, ata omutima ha bya Ruhanga, kandi muntu arukwerinda.
Asemeriire kugumira ha bigambo eby'amazima nkooku yabyegesiibwe, nukwo asobole kusoborra abantu omu nyegesa enungi kandi asingule abarukugihakaniza.
Haroho abantu baingi entahurra, abarukubaza ebitarumu, engobya, okukira muno ab'omu kitebe ky'abasazirwe.
Abo basemeriire kuculeezibwa, habwokuba nibajuumika amaka maingi, nibeegesa ebi batasemeriire kwegesa, nukwo beetungire sente.
Omu hali bo, omurangi waabu nyakabara, akagira ati: “Abakureete obutoosa babiiha ebisuba, nyamaiswa mbi, b'omukoijo kandi bagara.”
Kandi binu ebi yagambire by'amazima. Nahabweki Abakureete obacoomere n'amaani, nukwo bafooke bagumu omu kwikiriza.
Baleke kuta omutima ha nganikyo ez'okwehangahanga ez'Abayudaaya, rundi ha nyegesa ez'abantu abarukwanga amazima.
Hali abasemiire, ebintu byona bisemera; baitu hali abasiisikaire n'abatarukwikiriza, busaho ekisemera; habwokuba emitima yabu yonyini n'ebiteekerezo byabu bikasiisikara.
Bagamba ngu, bamanyire Ruhanga, baitu omu bikorwa byabu bamwanga. Bali bantu abanugwa, ntahurra, abatasobora kukora akantu koona akarungi.
Baitu iwe Tito, oyegese ebirukuhikaana n'enyegesa ey'amazima.
Teererra abagurusi babe beegendereza, beekambi, b'amagezi, bagumu omu kwikiriza, omu kugonza n'omu kugumiisiriza.
Abakaikuru, nabo bateererre nkooku otereriire abagurusi. Babe n'engeso ezisemeriire abaikiriza, baleke kuhangirra, abantu kulemwa etamiiro; baitu beegese ebirungi,
nukwo batendeke abakazi abato okugonza baibabo n'abaana baabu.
Babeegese kuba abarukwetegereza, abatarukusiihana, babe bakazi abanyakutegeka amaka gaabu, banyambabazi kandi abarukworobera baibabo, nukwo ekigambo kya Ruhanga kireke kugaywa.
Abasigazi nabo obeekambise, beege kwetanga.
Omu byona ebi okora, weyoleke oli kyokurorraho, eky'ebikorwa ebirungi, kandi omu nyegesa yaawe weyoleke oli w'amazima kandi w'amaani.
Oyegese ebigambo ebihikire kandi ebitasobora kugaywa, nukwo arukukuhakaniza akwatwe ensoni, aburwe ekibi eki arukutugambaho.
Gambira abairu bahurre bakama baabu, kandi baboorobere omu byona, batarukubateeza mpaka.
