Baleke kwekomakoma ebintu, baitu boolekere kimu obwesigwa obw'amazima, nukwo omu byona basobole kuhaisa ekitiinisa enyegesa ya Ruhanga Omujuni waitu.
Habwokuba embabazi za Ruhanga zizookere omu nsi kujuna abantu boona,
zaatwegesa okwanga obukafiiri n'okuteegomba eby'ensi, twikale tuli beerinzi, b'amananu, nitutiina Ruhanga omu nsi munu,
tutegeriize okutunga eki twanihizibwe. Nukwo okuzooka okw'ekitiinisa okwa Ruhanga waitu Rutakirwa kandi n'Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo,
ayayehaireyo habwaitu okutucungura, naatwiha omu bubi bwona kandi naayeyereza abantu be, nubo abo abeekambira okukora ebirungi.
Ebintu ebi, obirangirre. Kandi oteererre abantu baawe noohana n'obusobozi bwona. Otaikiriza muntu n'omu kukugaya.
Abantu baawe obaijukye okworobera abalemi n'ab'obusobozi. Obeegese okubahurra beeteekanize okukora omulimo gwona omurungi.
Baleke kubazaaho kubi muntu weena. Beerinde enkungani, babe baculeezi, kandi booleke abantu boona amakune agahikire.
Habwokuba na itwe kara tukaba tuli basema, ntahurra, bantu abahabire, abarukulemwa okwegomba okubi n'okwegonza kwa buli mulingo. Twaikaraga omu itima n'ihali, nitunobwa abantu kandi nitunobangana.
Baitu embabazi za Ruhanga Omujuni waitu n'engonzi ze ha bantu obu zaazookere,
yatujuna. Hatali habw'oburungi bw'ebi twakozire, baitu habw'embabazi ze. Akatwogya tuzaarwe obwa kabiri kandi tufooke bahyaka omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Mwoyo ogu Ruhanga akamutuseesiraho atarukubalirra, naamurabya omu Yesu Kristo Omujuni waitu,
nukwo embabazi ze ituhikirize, tufooke bagwetwa abarukunihira kutunga obwomeezi obutahwaho.
Ebigambo ebi by'amazima. Ebigambo ebi, ninyenda obiteho amaani, nukwo abo abaikiriize Ruhanga bateho omutima okukora ebikorwa ebirungi. Ebigambo ebi birungi kandi nibigasira abantu.
Baitu oyetantale empaka ez'obudoma n'okurondereza eby'obuzaale. Oyetantale okukungana n'okuhakaniza ensoborra z'Ebiragiro, habwokuba ebi tibiri by'omugaso kandi tibirumu nsa.
Omuntu arukkuteeza empaka, obu omara kumuhabura omurundi gumu rundi ebiri, omuleke;
noomanya omuntu arukukora ati nkooku amazire kuhaba kandi asiisire. Nawe wenka naayesingisa omusango.
Obu ndikutumira Aritemisi rundi Tikiko, okole kyona eki orukusobora okumpikaho bwango, onsange Nikopoli, habwokuba oku nuho ncwiremu kumara ebiro by'obutiti.
Okole kyona eki orukusobora kuboherra Zeena Looya hamu n'Apolo omu rugendo rwabu. Ocwe goona batunge ebi barukwetaaga.
Abantu baitu leka beege okukora ebikorwa ebirungi, nukwo batungise bagenzi baabu ebi barukwetaaga, baleke kwikara kwonka bataina mugaso.
Boona aba ndi nabo nibakuramukya. Na iwe oturamukize boona abanyakutugonza, abaturukuteerana nabo omu kwikiriza. Embabazi za Ruhanga zikale na inywe inywena.
Nyowe Paulo, omunyankomo habwa Kristo Yesu, na Timoteho mugenzi waitu, Nitukuhandiikira iwe Fileemoni omugonzibwa kandi omukozi mugenzi waitu,
na Afiya munyaanya-itwe, na Arikipo omuserikale mugenzi waitu, n'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza abeesorooleza omu nju yaawe:
Nitubagondeza emigisa n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali MUKAMA Yesu Kristo.
Obutoosa obu nkwijuka omu kusaba kwange, nsiima Ruhanga wange.
Habwokuba mpurra ha kugonza n'okwikiriza ebi orukwoleka MUKAMA Yesu na bantu be boona.
Kandi ninsaba ngu, okukwataniza n'abandi omu kwikiriza kunu kwongere kukukengesa ebirungi byona ebi twatungire omu Kristo.
Mugenzi wange, engonzi zaawe zindetiire omuhimbo kandi zimpuumwize, habwokuba oruhurwire emitima y'abantu ba Ruhanga.
Nukwo nu, noobu ndaaba ntarukutiina kukuragira omu Kristo okukora ekirukwetagwa,
baitu habw'engonzi nyina eki ndukukusaba, nyowe Paulo omukwenda kandi omu kasumi kanu omunyankomo habwa Kristo Yesu.
Ninkwesengereza habw'Oneesimo, ou nfoire mwana wange ndi omu nkomo. (
Kara akaba atarukukugasira, baitu hati omu mazima naakugasira muno, kandi na nyowe naangasira.)
Ngugwo mmukugaruliire nk'arukukugarurra omutima gwange gwonyini.
Naakugondeze kwikara nawe, ampeereze omu kiikaro kyawe, nkyali omu nkomo habw'Amakuru Amarungi.
Baitu mmaliriire kutakora kintu na kimu otaikiriize, nukwo oburungi bwawe buleke kuba bw'akagemo, baitu bube bw'okwegondeza wenka.
Rundi nikyo yakurugiireho kumara akaanya kake, nukwo osobole kugarukanganira kimu nawe,
atakyali mwiru, baitu naakiraho. Afookere ow'oruganda omugonzibwa, okukira muno hali nyowe, kiraasura ki hali iwe, arukwikara nawe omu mubiri n'omu MUKAMA.
Obu oraaba nonyeta mutaahi waawe, omujwahukirre nkooku waakujwahukiriire nyowe.
Obu araaba yakusobiize rundi aina ibanja lyawe lyona, olitonge nyowe.
Nyowe Paulo, kinu ninyija kukihandiika nyenka n'omukono gwange nti: Ibanja eri ndirisasura--tindukwenda n'okukwijukya nkooku onyinaho ibanja, kandi ibanja eri niiwe wonyini.
Nukwo mugenzi wange, ninyenda onkoonyere omu MUKAMA. Ohuumuze omutima gwange nk'omunyaruganda omu Kristo.
Habw'okwesiga nkooku oli muhulizi, nkuhandiikire nimmanya nti: Oraakora ebindukukugamba, n'okubikizaaho obikizeeho.
Kandi ekindi, onteekanirize h'okuraara. Habw'okusaba kwanyu ninihira kulekerwa, mbagarukire.
Epafura, omunyankomo mutaahi wange omu Kristo Yesu, naakuramukya.
Mariko, Aristariko, Deema, na Luka abakozi bagenzi bange, nabo nibakuramukya.
Embabazi za MUKAMA Yesu Kristo zikale na iwe.
Ira Ruhanga yabalizaaga baisenkuruitwe omu miringo nyingi kandi etarukusisana, naaraba omu barangi;
baitu omu biro binu ebirukumalirra, itwe atugambiriire omu Mwana, ou yataireho abe mugwetwa w'ebintu byona, kandi omuli uwe nuho yahangirre ensi.

Nuwe kwangasana kw'ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga, kandi kisisani kyonyini eky'obwaruhanga bwe, iguru n'ensi abihangiize n'ekigambo kye ky'obusobozi. Obu yamazire kukora eky'okwogyaho ebibi, yaikarra omwiguru ha mukono gw'obulyo ogwa Ruteerengwa,
naakirra kimu bamalaika obukuru, nk'ibara yarukirwe oku lirukukira agaabo ekitiinisa.
Malaika ki Ruhanga ou aragambire ati: “Iwe oli Mwana wange, nakuzaara kiro kya hati”? Rundi ati: “Nyowe ndiba Ise, nawe abe Mwana wange”?
Kandi obu yaleesire omuzigaijo omunsi akagamba ati: “Bamalaika ba Ruhanga boona bamuramye.”
Ha bamalaika, Ruhanga akagamba ati: “Nuwe arukuhindura bamalaika miyaga, kandi abaheereza be ndimi z'omurro.”
Baitu ha Mwana agamba ati: “Ai Ruhanga ekitebe kyawe, kiikaraho ebiro n'ebiro, omwigo ogw'obwinganiza nugwo mwigo ogw'obukama bwawe.
Okagonza obuhikiriire, wanoba obubi; nikyo Ruhanga, Ruhanga wawe yakusorooliire, yakuha ekitiinisa kukira bataahi baawe.”
Kandi ati: “Ai MUKAMA, omu kubanza niiwe wataireho omusingi gw'ensi, kandi iguru, mulimo gw'engaro zawe;
ebi birihwaho, baitu Iwe olisigaraho, byona birikura nk'ekijwaro,
olibikuba nk'esuuka, kandi birihindurwa nkooku bahindura ekijwaro. Baitu Iwe tohinduka, kandi emyaka yawe terihwaho.”
Malaika ki ou aragambire ati: “Ikarra ha mukono gwange ogw'obulyo, okuhika abanyanzigwa baawe obu ndibafoora akatebe k'ebigere byawe”?
Bamalaika boona teri myoyo erukuheereza Ruhanga? Enyakutumwa kuheereza abo abali b'okujunwa?
Nikyo tusemeriire kuta muno omutima hali ebi twahuliire, tutaikara kubirugaho.
Baitu Ebiragiro ebyagambirwe bamalaika, obu biriba byabaire by'amaani gati, nukwo weena atarukubihondera rundi atarukubihurra akaheebwa ekifubiro ekimusemeriire,
itwe tulitabuka tuta obu tulinagaija okujunwa okurukwingana aho? MUKAMA nuwe yabandize kukuturangirra, hanyuma abo abaamuhuliire nabo bakatumanyisa okujunwa oku.
Ruhanga nawe yakugumyaga n'oburorwaho, ebihuniriza, n'ebyamahano ebitali bimu, hamu n'ebisembo bya Mwoyo Ahikiriire ebi agaba nkooku agonza.
Bamalaika tibali nubo Ruhanga yahaire obusobozi bw'okulema ensi erukugenda kwija, ei turukubazaaho.
Haroho nambere kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Omuntu kintu ki, Iwe kumwijuka, rundi omwana w'omuntu, Iwe kumutaho omutima?
Okamumaza akaanya, atakaingaine bamalaika; wagaruka wamujweka ekondo y'ekitiinisa n'ey'okutiinwa,

wamuha okulema ebintu byona; byona okabita omu mikono ye.” Ruhanga obu yamuhaire okulema ebintu byona, taina na kimu eki ataramuhaire okulema. Baitu kuhika hati, titukarozire ebintu byona nibimuhurra.

Kwihaho Yesu ogu ayamazire akaanya atakaingaine bamalaika, hati nitumurora ajwaire ekondo ey'ekitiinisa kandi ey'okutiinwa eyamurugiire omu kufa oku yarabiremu; nukwo, habw'embabazi za Ruhanga, akaba naasobora kufa habw'abantu boona.
Ruhanga anyakuhanga kandi anyakwikazaaho ebintu byona, obu yagondeze kutaahya abantu baingi omu kitiinisa kye, akaba asemeriire kubanza kuhikiriza ogu ayabaleetiire okujunwa naamurabya omu busaalizi.
Habwokuba ogu anyakweza, aina obuzaale bumu n'abo abanyakwezibwa. Nikyo atakwatirwa nsoni kubeeta bagenzi be,
naagamba ati: “Ebikubyo byawe ndibirangirra bagenzi bange, ndikunyumiza omu kitebe hagati.”
Na handi ati: “Ruhanga ndamwesiga.” Kandi ati: “Dora ndi hanu, hamu n'abantu Ruhanga aba yampaire.”
Nahabweki abaana ab'oruganda rumu nkooku basisaniza omubiri n'esagama, na Yesu nukwo yayefoire muntu nka bo, nukwo habw'okufa kwe asobole kuhwerekereza ogu anyakulema orufu, nuwe Sitaani,
n'okujuna abo boona abaamazire obwomeezi bwabo omu bwiru bw'okutiina orufu.
Mazimakwo bamalaika tibali nubo yaizire kujuna, baitu akaija kujuna baijukuru ba Abburahamu.
Habweki kikamuhikirra kusisana bagenzi be omu buli kintu, nukwo asobole kufooka nyakatagara omukuru, ow'embabazi kandi omwesigwa omu kuheereza Ruhanga, aleherre abantu habw'ebibi byabo.
Uwe wenyini nkooku yabonabonesiibwe kandi yayohebwa, nikyo arukusoborra kukoonyera abo abarukwohebwa.
Nahabweki ab'oruganda abarukwera, inywe abaayesirwe kubagana obwomeezi obw'omwiguru, mute ebiteekerezo byanyu hali Yesu omukwenda wa Ruhanga kandi nyakatagara omukuru ow'enyikiriza yaitu.
Akaba ali mwesigwa hali Ogu ayamutaireho, nka Musa nawe oku yabaire mwesigwa omunju ya Ruhanga yoona.
Baitu Yesu akaba asemeriire kuheebwa ekitiinisa kingi okukira Musa, omwombeki w'enju nkooku aheebwa akitiinisa okukira enju enyakwombekwa. (
Habwokuba buli nju yoona egira anyakugyombeka, baitu omwombeki w'ebintu byona nuwe Ruhanga.)
Musa akaba ali mwesigwa omu nju ya Ruhanga nk'omuheereza kandi kaiso w'okugumya ebintu Ruhanga akaba ali w'okusoborra hanyuma;
baitu Kristo akaba ali mwesigwa omunju ya Ruhanga nk'omutabani. Na itwe tuli nju ya Ruhanga obu turaaba nitugumiza kimu obwesige bwaitu kandi nitwenyumiza habw'ebi tunihira kutunga.
Nikyo Mwoyo Ahikiriire yagambiire ati: “Kiro kinu obu murahurra iraka lye,
mutagumanganiza emitima yanyu nk'abaanyemiire omwirungu ha kiro kyabo eky'okulengesibwa,
nambere baisenkuru inywe baanjwahisize, kunu bakaba bamazire emyaka makumi ana nibarora ebi ndukukora.
Nikyo nabiihiriirwe ab'obusinge bunu, nagamba nti: ‘Obutoosa bahaba omu biteekerezo byabo; kandi tibamanyire mihanda yange’
Nikyo narahiriire nyina ekiniga nti: ‘Tibali b'okutaaha omu buhuumuro bwange.’ ”
Bagenzi bange mwegendereze, tihaikara kubaho omu omuli inywe arukugira omutima mubi, ogutarukwikiriza, ogurukutwaliriza okuruga hali Ruhanga omwomeezi.
Baitu muhanangane buli kasumi. Obu muba mukyaina “akasumi”, haleke kubaho n'omu omuli inywe agumanganizibwa obugobya bw'ekibi.
Kakuba tugumiza kimu obwesige bwaitu obwabandize, tukabuhikya ha mpero, nitwija kubagana ha birungi bya Kristo.
Nikyo kyahandiikiirwe kiti: “Kiro kinu obu murahurra iraka lye, mutagumanganiza emitima yanyu nk'abaanyemiire.”
Nibaha abo abaahuliire, bakagaruka baayema? Tinubo abo boona abaarugire Misiri beebembiirwe Musa?
Kandi nibaha aba yabiihiriirwe okumara emyaka makumi ana? Tinubo abo abasiisire, kandi emitumbi yabo yagaramirana omwirungi?
Nibaha aba yarahiriire ngu, tibali b'okutaaha omu buhuumuro bwe? Tinubo abo abaayemere?
Habweki niturora nkooku baalemerwe kutaaha habw'okutaikiriza kwabo.
Nahabweki obu hakyaroho okunihira okw'okutaaha omu buhuumuro bwa Ruhanga, twerinde tihaikara kubaho omu hali inywe arukusangwa alemerwe kubutaahamu.
Na itwe Amakuru Amarungi tukagahurra nka bo oku baagahuliire, baitu ebigambo ebi baahuliire bitabagasire, habwokuba abaabihuliire bakasangwa bataina kwikiriza.

Itwe abaikiriize, tulitaaha omu buhuumuro obu, obu yabalizeho ati: “Nikyo narahiriire nyina ekiniga nti: ‘Tibali b'okutaaha omu buhuumuro bwange.’ ” Kandi kunu emirimo ye yoona ekaba ehoire okuruga obu yahangire ensi.
Haroho na handi omu Byahandiikirwe nambere yabalize ha kiro kya musanju ati: “Ruhanga akahuumura ha kiro kya musanju, amazire emirimo ye yoona.”
Aho nuho yasigikiire kugamba ati: “Tibali b'okutaaha omu buhuumuro bwange.”
Hakabaho abo abaabandize kuhurra Amakuru Amarungi, baalemwa kutaaha omu buhuumuro bwa Ruhanga habw'obutaikiriza bwabo; baitu haroho abandi ab'okubutaaha.

Nikyo Ruhanga yateerireho akasumi akarukwetwa “Kiro kinu”, naabaliza omu Daudi haahingwireho emyaka nyingi, omu bigambo ebi naruga kujurra nti: “Kiro kinu obu murahurra iraka lye, mutagumanganiza emitima yanyu.”
Kakuba Yoswa yahikize Abaisirairi omu buhuumuro obu, Ruhanga tiyaakugarukire kubazaho kiro ekindi.
Nukwo nu, hakyaroho ekihuumuro ekirukusisa ekya Sabbato, ekyahuliirwe abantu ba Ruhanga,;
kandi weena anyakutaaha omu buhuumuro bwa Ruhanga aleka emirimo ye, Ruhanga nkooku yalekere eye.
Nahabweki, katwekambe okutaaha omu buhuumuro obu, haleke kubaho n'omu arukunagwa obutaikiriza nk'obu.

Habwokuba ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyomiire kandi nikikora; kitoire okukira empirima ey'amoogi abiri. Kicumita nikitaaha omunda okubaganiza omutima n'omwoyo, okubaganiza engiga n'omusoina. Kyetegereza ebiteekerezo by'omuntu n'entegeka y'omutima gwe.
Busaho kihangwa na kimu ekiserekerwe amaiso ga Ruhanga, byona nibirorwa kurungi kandi bisuukuliirwe amaiso g'Ogu ou turukwija kwetonganaho.
Obu turaaba twina nyakatagara omukuru ayatembere omwiguru, nuwe Yesu Omwana wa Ruhanga, katugumire ha enyikiriza yaitu.
Habwokuba titwina nyakatagara omukuru atarukusobora kuganya na itwe omu buceke bwaitu; baitu twina ogu ayayohiibwe omu miringo yoona nka itwe, kyonka tiyasiisa.
Aho nu, katwirre haihi ekitebe kya Ruhanga ow'embabazi tutarukutiina, nukwo tusobole kuganyirwa n'okutunga emigisa ey'okutukoonyera omu bwire obu turukugyetaagiramu.
Nyakatagara omukuru weena anyakukomwa omu bantu, ateebwaho kumarra abantu ebyabo ebiina obukwatane na Ruhanga, okuhonga ebisembo, n'okutamba ebyonzira habw'ebibi byabo.
Naasemerra kukwata mpora abatarukwetegereza n'abahabire, habwokuba nawe aina obuceke nk'abo.
Nahabweki kimuhikiriire kutamba ekyonzira habw'ebibi bye wenka, na habw'ebibi by'abandi.
Kandi busaho n'omu ayeha wenka obukuru obu, baitu ayetwa Ruhanga, nk'Arooni oku yayesirwe.
Kristo nawe ateekuze wenka nukwo afooke nyakatagara omukuru baitu akateebwaho Ogu ayamugambireho ati: “Iwe oli mwana wange, nkuzaire kiro kya hati.”
Na handi naagamba ati: “Iwe oli nyakatagara ebiro byona, ow'omu mulingo gwa Melikizedeki.”
Yesu, obu akaba ali omunsi, akasaba kandi akeesengereza naayamuza kandi narra amaizi, nayamirra Ogu ow'akaba naasobora kumujuna orufu; kandi Ruhanga akamuhurra habw'okwebundaaza omumaiso ge.
Noobu araaba yabaire Mwana wa Ruhanga, baitu okubonabonesibwa kwe kukamwegesa kuba muhulizi.
Obu yamazire kuhikirizibwa, yafooka ndugirro ey'okujunwa okutalihwaho habw'abo boona abamuhurra;
ningira Ruhanga akamurangirra nkooku ali nyakatagara omukuru, ow'omu mulingo gwa Melikizedeki.
Hali nyakatagara ogu, twina bingi eby'okubazaaho, baitu kigumire kubisoborra, habwokuba biro binu mufookere abatarukwetegereza bwango.

Omu kasumi kanu, noobu muraaba musemeriire kufooka beegesa b'abandi, nabwo nimwetaaga ondi ow'okubeegesa buhyaka engiga enkuru ez'ekigambo kya Ruhanga. Nimwetaaga amata, baitu bitali byokulya ebirukuguma.
Weena arukukuzibwa amata, takeetegeriize kurungi enyegesa enyakutuhikya ha kuhikirra, habwokuba akyali mwana.
Baitu ebyokulya ebirukuguma, biba by'abantu bakuru abamanyiire okwahurana oburungi n'obubi.

Nahabweki tulekere aho kwegesa engiga enkuru ez'enyegesa za Kristo ezi twabandiizeho, baitu tugende ha nyegesa ez'abantu abakuru, tutagaruka kutaho omusingi ogw'okuhindukira Ruhanga, rundi ogw'okuzira ebikorwa byaitu ebifiire.
Tulekere aho kwegesa ha mirwa y'okwezibwa, ha kuteebwaho emikono, ha kuhumbuuka kw'abafu, n'okucwerwa omusango okwa ha mpero.
Ebi tulibibazaaho Ruhanga obu alisiima.
Abo abaarugire ha kwikiriza basobora bata kugarurwa ha kuzira obwa kabiri? Haroho abamu abaamazire kujwerwa omusana gwa Ruhanga, abaaroleze ha burungi bwa Ruhanga, abaabagaine ha Mwoyo Ahikiriire
kandi abaakengere oburungi obw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'eby'amaani eby'ebiro ebirukwija.
Abo obu bagwa bakaruga ha nyikiriza yabo, tikisoboka kubagarra bakeegarukamu obwa kabiri, habwokuba bbo bonka beebambira Omwana wa Ruhanga ha musaraba kandi bamukwasa ensoni.
Bali nk'itaka Ruhanga eri aha mugisa nalinagira enjura emirundi nyingi nukwo limereze abalimi ebimera ebirungi.
Baitu obu limeza amahwa n'amatojo, liba litakyaina mugaso, liri haihi kukyenwa; empero yalyo, nukwo kwokebwa.
Noobu turaaba nitubaza tuti, baitu inywe abagonzibwa, nimumanya ebyanyu birungi okukiraho, kandi biraabahikya ha kujunwa.
Ruhanga mwinganiza, tarukwija kwebwa ebikorwa byanyu n'engonzi ezi mwayolekere habwe nimuheereza abantu ba Ruhanga nkooku murukukora hati.
Kandi nitwenda buli omu omuli inywe ayoleke obwekambi nk'obu okuhika ha mpero, nubwo ebi arukunihira kutunga birihikirizibwa.
Muleke kuturumuka, baitu mukuraatire abo abagwetiirwe ebyaraganiziibwe habw'okwikiriza n'okugumiisiriza kwabo.
Ruhanga, obu yaraganiize Abburahamu, habw'okutabaho ondi arukumukira obukuru ow'okurahira, akeerahira wenka,
naagamba ati: “Mazimakwo ndikuha omugisa kandi nkukanyise.”
Aho Abburahamu, obu yamazire kugumiisiriza, akatunga eki yaraganiziibwe.
Mazimakwo abantu barahira ogu arukubakira ekitiinisa kandi okurahira kubamara empaka zaabo zoona.
Ruhanga nawe obu yagondeze kunanurra kimu abagweterwa endagaano nkooku atahindura ntegeka ye, akagigumya n'ekirahiro.

Nukwo habw'ebintu ebi ebibiri ebitahinduka: entegeka ye n'ekirahiro nambere Ruhanga atasoborra kubiiha bisuba, itwe abaamwebingire tusobora kugarurwamu omutima nitunihirra kimu kutunga ebi yaturaganiize.
Okunihira oku twinakwo kuli nk'enyomyo egumire kandi etarukutengeeta enyakusibikwaho omwoyo. Nukwo okunihira okurukututaahya omu kiikaro ekirukwera omu nda, enyuma y'enyigamo,
nambere Yesu yagenzire habwaitu naatwebembera, amazire kufooka nyakatagara omukuru ow'ebiro n'ebiro ow'omulingo gwa Melikizedeki.
Melikizedeki ogu, omukama wa Saleemu kandi nyakatagara wa Ruhanga Rutakirwa, akaitirana Abburahamu naaruga ha bulemu nambere baitiire abakama, yamusabira omugisa.

Nubwo Abburahamu yamubaganiriizeeho ekicweka ekya ikumi ekya byona ebi yanyagire. Amakuru g'okubanza ag'ibara Melikizedeki nganu: omukama w'obuhikiriire, kandi lyongera limanyisa omukama wa Saleemu, amakuru gaakyo: omukama w'obusinge.

Omu Byahandiikirwe tibatwoleka ise rundi nyina, noobwakubaire obuzaale bwe. Tibooleka myaka ye nambere yabandiize noobwakubaire nambere agarukira; baitu bamusisaniza Omwana wa Ruhanga; aikara ali nyakatagara ebiro byona.
Murole omuntu ogu nkooku ali w'ekitiinisa! Isenkuru itwe Abburahamu akamuha ekicweka kimu ekya ikumi ky'eminyago yoona.
N'abaijukuru ba Leevi, abo abatunga omulimo ogw'obunyakatagara, baikirizibwa omu Biragiro okwihaho abantu bagenzi baabo ekicweka kya ikumi, kandi kunu nabo baijukuru ba Abburahamu.
Baitu omusaija ogu ataina buzaale nabo, Abburahamu akamuha kimu kya ikumi kandi yasabira omugisa Abburahamu ogu, Ruhanga ou yaragaine nawe.
Na hati kimanyirwe kurungi omukuru nuwe asabira omuto omugisa.
Biro binu ekicweka ekya ikumi kitungwa banyakatagara abanyakufa, baitu omu biro kya Melikizedeki kikatungwa nyakatagara ogu ou kyahandiikirweho ngu, tarukwija kufa.
Omuntu asobora kugamba ngu, Omuleevi ogu, hati anyakutunga ekicweka ekya ikumi, nawe akakiha nyakatagara ogu naaraba omu Abburahamu,
habwokuba akaba akyali mu sagama ya Abburahamu isenkuru obu yaitiraine Melikizedeki.

Hati nu obuhikiriire obu buraaba bwatungiirwe omu bunyakatagara bw'Abaleevi (nambere abantu baaheeriirwe Ebiragiro), bulyo ki obwakwetaagisize nyakatagara ondi ow'arukuruga omu rukarra rwa Melikizedeki, atali ow'omu rukarra orurukwetwa: “orw'Arooni”?
Ningira obu habaho empinduka omu bunyakatagara, buli n'omu Biragiro hasemeriire kubamu empinduka.
Kandi ogu arukugambwaho ebi byona, akaba atali w'oruganda orwarugwamuga muntu n'omu ow'okuheereza ha itambiro.
Kimanyirwe kurungi MUKAMA waitu nkooku yarugire omu ruganda rwa Yuda, kandi Musa taina na kimu eki yagambire ha bunyakatagara oburukuruga omu ruganda oru.
Eki nikigumibwa kurungi obu harukwija nyakatagara ondi arukusisana Melikizedeki ogu
ayafookere nyakatagara atarukusigikira ha migenzo y'obuzarranwa, baitu anyakusigikira ha busobozi obw'obwomeezi obutali bw'okuhwaho.
Habwokuba kikamuhandiikwaho kiti: “Iwe oli nyakatagara obusinge bwona, ow'omu mulingo gwa Melikizedeki.”
Ha rubaju rumu entegeka eyabandize ekaihwaho habw'obuceke n'obutagasa bwayo,
(habwokuba Ebiragiro bitaleete kuhikirra kwona); baitu ha rubaju orundi haizire okunihira okurukukira oburungi kandi okurukusobora kutwiriza haihi na Ruhanga.
Kandi eki kitakorwe hataroho ekirahiro.

Abo abaabandize kuba banyakatagara, bakaheebwa obukuru bwabo hataroho kurahira; baitu Yesu, uwe akabuheebwa n'ekirahiro ekirukugamba kiti: “MUKAMA akarahira kandi talyeijukya eki yarahiire ati: Oli nyakatagara obusinge bwona.”
Eki nikyo kyafoire Yesu okuba mwema w'endagaano erukukira oburungi.
Baanyakatagara abaabandize bakaba bali baingi nibahonderangana, habwokuba orufu rwabaihaga ha mulimo gwabu.
Baitu Yesu aikara ali nyakatagara obusinge bwona kandi obunyakatagara bwe bw'oruteekerro, tibugweterwa ondi.
Habweki ebiro byona asobora kujuna abo abeebinga Ruhanga nibaraba omuli uwe, habwokuba abaho okubatonganirra obutoosa.
Aho nu kikaba nikisemerra itwe kutunga nyakatagara omukuru nk'ogu, ahikiriire, ataina kabi noobu kakubaire kabara, asoroirwe omu basiisi, anyumiziibwe okukira eby'omu iguru byona.
Uwe tarukwetaaga kuhonga ebyonzira buli kiro nk'abanyakatagara abo abaabandize: rundi habw'ebibi bye, rundi habw'eby'abandi. Eki akakikora omurundi gumu yamara, obu yayehongere wenka.
Mazimakwo Ebiragiro bikataho abantu abaceke babe banyakatagara abakuru; baitu anyakutairweho ekirahiro ekyahozirwe hanyuma, nuwe Mwana anyakuhikiriziibwe obusinge bwona.
Ekikuru omuli ebi turukugamba nikyo kinu: Twina nyakatagara omukuru anyakwikaliire ha mukono ogw'obulyo ogw'Ekitebe ky'Anyakusinga omwiguru,
omuheereza ow'omu kiikaro ekirukwera kandi ow'omu heema nyakabara etarasimbirwe bantu, baitu eyasimbirwe MUKAMA.
Buli nyakatagara mukuru weena ateebwaho kuhonga ebisembo n'okutamba ebyonzira; nahabweki nyakatagara waitu ogu nawe asemeriire kugira eky'okuhonga.
Kakuba abaire akyali omu nsi, tiyaakubaire nyakatagara mukuru naakake, habwokuba haroho banyakatagara abandi abarukuhonga ebisembo Ebiragiro nkooku bituragira.

Omu byona ebi bakora bahondera ekyokurorraho kandi ekisisani ky'ebi ebikorwa omu kiikaro ekirukwera eky'omwiguru. Habwokuba Musa, obu akaba ayeteekanize kwemereza eheema, Ruhanga akamuhabura naagamba ati: “Taho omutima okukora ebintu byona noohondera ekisisani eki wayolekerwe ha rusozi.”

Kya mazima kugamba ngu, Kristo akaheebwa obuheereza oburukukira obwa ira ekitiinisa, habwokuba nuwe muteeraniza wa Ruhanga n'abantu omu ndagaano erukukiraho oburungi, enyakukoliirwe ha byaraganiziibwe ekirukukira oburungi.
Kakuba endagaano eyabandize etarabairemu nsobi, tihaakubaireho bulyo obw'okukora eya kabiri.
Baitu Ruhanga akarora abantu be nkooku basobeze, nukwo kugira ati: “MUKAMA akagamba ati: ‘Akasumi kalihika nkole endagaano empyaka na bantu ba Israiri n'oruganda rwa Yuda.
Endagaano etarukusisana n'eri ei nakozire n'abaisenkurubo ha kiro eki nabakwasire ha mukono nimbaiha omunsi ya Misiri. Bbo batagumire ha ndagaano yange, nikyo na nyowe nabaihiireho omutima.’

MUKAMA naayongera ati: Enu niyo ndagaano ei ndiragaana n'abantu ba Isirairi: ebiro ebi obu birihwaho ndita ebiragiro byange omu biteekerezo byabo, mbihandiike omu mitima yabo; kandi ndiba Ruhanga wabo, nabo babe bantu bange.
Abantu tibalyegesangana rundi omuntu kuhabura mugenzi we ati: ‘Manya MUKAMA’. Habwokuba boona balimmanya, okubandiza h'arukukira obuto omuli bo okuhika h'arukukirra kimu obukuru.
Na nyowe ndibaganyira obubi bwabo, kandi ebibi byabu tindigaruka kubiijuka. ”
Ruhanga obu arukubaza ha ndagaano empyaka, buli naadibya eya ira. Ningira kyona ekidiba kikakura, kiba kisigaize kuhwaho.
Endagaano eya ira nayo ekaba ina emigenzo ey'okuramya, hamu n'ekiikaro kyayo ekirukwera omunsi.
Hakaba haroho eheema. Omu rwemo rwayo orw'omu maiso nuho haikaraga ekikondo ky'etaara, emeeza, hamu n'omugaati ogw'Empongano. Orwemo oru rwayetwaga Ekiikaro Ekirukwera.
Enyuma y'enyigamo eya kabiri hakaba haliyo orwemo orwayetwaga Ekiikaro Ekirukwera ky'ebirukwera,

rurumu ekiswa kya zaabbu eky'okwoterraho omugaju, n'esanduuko ey'endagaano ehunzirwe zaabbu embaju zoona, nambere haikaraga ekibindi kya zaabu ekirumu maanu, omwigo gw'Arooni ogwarokiire, kandi ebibbali by'amabaale ag'endagaano.
Haruguru yayo haroho bamalaika ab'ekitiinisa ab'ekihanda ky'Abakerubbi, basiikiriize ekiikaro ky'okuganyirraho. Ebintu ebi byona, hati titusobora kubitondogorra.
Ebi obu byamazire kuteekanizibwa biti, banyakatagara baikaraga nibataaha omu rwemo orw'okubanza, nibakoramu emirwa yabo.
Baitu omu rwemo orwa kabiri hataahamuga omukuru w'abanyakatagara wenka, kandi yataahamuga omurundi gumu omu mwaka gwona, naatwara esagama ei yahayoga habwe na habw'ebibi by'abantu.
Omu ntegeka ezi ibiri, Mwoyo Ahikiriire naayoleka omuhanda ogurukutaaha omu kiikaro ekirukwera nkooku gutakabaire kukingurwa, orwemo orw'okubanza rukyaroho.
(Nurwo rumanyisa obusinge oburoho.) Entegeka egi nkooku ekaba eri, haaheebwayo ebisembo n'ebyonzira ebikaba bitarukusobora kuhikiriza omutima gw'omuntu arukuramya.

Nukwo kugamba, emirwa egi yakwataga ha byokulya, na ha byokunywa, na ha kunaaba okw'okweyeza okutali kw'omulingo gumu. Niyo mirwa eyatairweho kulinda emibiri yaitu okuhika ha kasumi ak'okugarra byona buhyaka obu kalihika.

Baitu Kristo obu yaizire ali nyakatagara omukuru ow'ebirungi ebiri by'okwija, akakingura enyigamo y'eheema erukukira obukuru n'obuhikiriire (etarakozirwe mikono y'abantu. Nukwo kugamba etali y'ensi enu).
Akataaha omu Kiikaro Ekirukwera ky'ebirukwera omurundi gumu yamara. Atatwalemu sagama y'embuzi rundi ey'enyana, baitu akatwara esagama ye yonyini, nukwo yatutungiire ati okucungurwa okutalihwaho.
Abantu abasiisi okubamiisira esagama y'embuzi, n'ey'enimi, rundi iju ery'ekyonzira ky'enyana, obu kuraaba nikweza omubiri,
esagama ya Kristo ayarabire omu Mwoyo Atahwaho kwehayo hali Ruhanga ataina kamogo, terikira muno kweza emitima yanyu okugiiha omu bikorwa ebifiire, nukwo muheereze Ruhanga Atafa!

Nahabweki Kristo nuwe muteeraniza ow'Endagaano Empyaka, nukwo abo abanyakwetwa, batunge obugwetwa obutahwaho obwaraganiziibwe. Okufa kwe okwabaireho nukwo kwabacungwire omu bibi ebi baakozire bakyali omu ndagaano eyabandize.
Okugweta tikubaho batakagumize ngu, kigweta afiire.
Batandika kugweta okurugirra ha kufa kwe, habwokuba okugweta tikubaho kigweta akyayomiire.
Noobwakubaire endagaano eyabandize ekagumibwa nihaseeswa esagama.

Musa obu yamazire kumanyisa abantu boona ebi baaragiirwe omu Biragiro, yakwata esagama ey'enyana n'ey'embuzi, hamu n'amaizi, naakozesa ebyoya by'entaama erukugaajuka n'akati ak'okumiisa, yamiisira ekitabu ky'endagaano n'abantu boona,
naagamba ati: “Enu niyo sagama ey'endagaano Ruhanga ei yabaragiire kuhondera.”
Kandi omu mulingo nugwo gumu yamiisira eheema n'ebikwato byona ebikozesibwa omu kuramya.
Mazimakwo omu Biragiro bya Musa haihi ebintu byona byezibwa, n'esagama kandi nambere hatali kuseesa sagama, tiharoho kuganyirwa ebibi.
Nahabweki ebintu ebirukusisana eby'omwiguru byasemerraga kwezibwa n'emirwa ey'okuseesa esagama; baitu ebintu byonyini eby'omwiguru, byo bisemerra kwezibwa n'ebyonzira ebirukukira binu oburungi.
Habwokuba Kristo atataahe omu Kiikaro Ekirukwera ekyakozirwe emikono y'abantu kandi ekirukusisana eky'omu iguru, baitu akataaha omu iguru lyonyini, nukwo azooke omu maiso ga Ruhanga kututonganirra.
Baitu uwe ateetaage kwikara naayehonga nk'omukuru wa banyakatagara oku ataaha omu Kiikaro Ekirukwera ky'ebirukwera buli mwaka, naahonga esagama etali ye nyabwe.
Kakuba kyabaire kiti, yakwikaire naabonabonesibwa okuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi. Baitu akasumi ako, obu kahoireho, akazooka omurundi gumu yamara, nukwo aiheho ebibi naayehonga wenka.
Kandi abantu boona nkooku baateerirweho okufa omurundi gumu, hanyuma bakacwerwa omusango,
Kristo nawe akatambwa omurundi gumu nayetweka ebibi by'abaingi, kandi alizooka obwakabiri atarukwizirra ebibi, baitu kujuna abo abamutegeriize n'ekihika.
Ebiragiro bya Musa tibirukutwoleka ebirungi byonyini ebirukugenda kwija, baitu kisisani kyabyo. Ebiragiro eby'emigenzo ey'okuhonga ebyonzira buli mwaka, tibisobora kweza abo abanyakuramya.
Ebiragiro obu biraaba byasoboire kubeeza, ebyonzira ebi tibyakulekiirwe kutambwa? Abanyakuramya obu baraaba baayeziibwe omurundi gumu baamara, tibaakwongiire kwemanyaho ebibi.
Baitu okuhonga ebyonzira ebi buli mwaka kuba nikwijukya abantu ebibi byabo.
Habwokuba esagama ey'enimi n'ey'embuzi tesobora kwihaho bibi.
Kristo obu yaizire omunsi, nikyo yagambiire ati: “Ebyonzira n'ebihongwa tobyenda, baitu okanteekaniriza omubiri,
Ebihongwa ebyokeze kandi ebiheebwayo habw'ebibi tobyetaaga.
Na nyowe nukwo kugira nti: ‘Ai Ruhanga, dara nyowe, nyizire kukora ebi orukwenda’, nkooku kyampandiikirweho omu kitabu ky'Ebiragiro.”
Aho nambere yagambiire ati: “Toyenda kandi toyetaaga byonzira n'ebihongwa, noobu byakubaire ebihongwa ebyokeze kandi ebiheebwayo habw'ebibi” (ebi nibyo bihongwa ebisangwa omu Biragiro),
akongera yagamba ati: “Dara nyowe, nyizire kukora ebi orukwenda.” Kristo nukwo yadibize ati ebyonzira eby'okubanza, agumye ekyonzira ekye,
Kandi Kristo habw'okukora Ruhanga ebi yayenzire, itwe tukeezibwa omubiri gwe ogwahongerwe omurundi gumu kyahwa.
Buli nyakatagara ayemerra buli kiro naakora omulimo gwe, aikara naahonga ebyonzira ebi ebitasobora kwihaho bibi.
Baitu Kristo obu yamazire kuhonga ekyonzira kimu eky'ebiro byona habw'ebibi, yaikarra ha mukono gw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga.
Okuruga obu, aikara naategereza okuhika abanyanzigwa be Ruhanga obu alibafoora akatebe k'ebigere bye.
Omu kuhonga ekyonzira ekimu eki, abo aba ayeza akabahikiriza ebiro byona.
Mwoyo Ahikiriire nawe naatunanura. Okubanza akagira ati:
“MUKAMA akagamba ati: Akasumi ako obu kalihwaho, enu niyo ndagaano ei ndiragaana nabo: Ndita Ebiragiro byange omu mitima yabo, kandi mbihandiike omu biteekerezo byabo.”
Kandi yayongera ati: “Tindigarukira kwijuka ebibi byabo n'ensobi zabo.”
Ebibi obu bimara okuganyirwa, haba hatakyaroho kubihongerra.
Habweki ab'oruganda, nitunihira okutaaha Ekiikaro Ekirukwera habw'esagama ya Yesu,
nituraba omu muhanda omuhyaka ogu yatutemiire kandi oguraba omu nyigamo eyomiire, nugwo mubiri gwa Kristo.
Itwe abaina nyakatagara omukuru arukurolerra Enju yoona ya Ruhanga,
katwirre Ruhanga haihi twina omutima ogw'amazima n'okwikiriza okugumire. Emitima yaitu emazire kusemezibwa, erugire omu biteekerezo ebibi, kandi emibiri yaitu eyogiibwe n'amaizi amarungi,
katugumire ha kunihira oku twinakwo tutarukutengeta, habwokuba Ruhanga ayaraganiize, mwesigwa.
Katurole nkooku tusobora kwekambisangana omu ngonzi n'omu bikorwa ebirungi,
tutarukuba bagara omu kwesorooza kusaba, abamu nkooku bakora; baitu twimukyangane, okukira muno obu murukurora Ekiro nikirra haihi.
Kakuba twongera kusiisa, kunu tumazire kumanya amazima, haba hatakyaroho kyonzira eky'okwihaho ebibi;
baitu haba haroho kulindirra n'obutiini omusango ogulicwibwa n'ekibabu ky'omurro ogulimarraho kimu abeemi.
Omuntu anyakucwa Ebiragiro bya Musa obu arumurizibwa bakaiso babiri rundi basatu, aitwa hatali kuganyirwa.
Nimuteekereza omuntu ayagayire Omwana wa Ruhanga, yafurungura esagama ey'endagaano eyamwereze, yabiihiza Mwoyo ow'embabazi, ogu alitunga ekifubiro ekirukwinganaha?
Ningira nitumanya ayagambire ati: “Okuhoora enzigu kwange, ninyowe ndihoora.”
Kintu kya mahano okugwa omu mikono ya Ruhanga omwomeezi.
Mwijuke ebiro ebyahingwire obu mwamazire kumulikirwa, mukabanza kurwana n'amaani nimugumiisiriza emihito.
Obundi n'obundi mukeemerezibwa omu maiso g'abantu, babajume kandi babasaalize. Obundi mwabalirwaga omuli abo abaajumirwe bati.
Habwokuba mwagirraga abanyankomo embabazi, mwaikirizaaga n'omutima gumu kunyagwa ebintu byanyu, ningira mukaba nimumanya nkooku mwina itungo erirukukiraho oburungi kandi eritahwaho.
Nahabweki muleke kusiisa obwesige bwanyu obulibarugiramu empeera enkooto.
Nimwetaaga kugumiisiriza, nukwo mukole Ruhanga ebi agonza kandi mutunge ebi yaraganiize.
Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Hasigaire akasumi kake, ogu arukwija aije, kandi tarukwija kukerererwa;
omuheereza wange omwesigwa aligumira ha kwikiriza, baitu obu aligaruukirra, omwoyo gwange tigulimusiima.”
Itwe tituli omuli abo abagaruukirra bakahwerekerra, baitu tuli omuli abo abaina okwikiriza, bakajuna emyoyo yabo.
Okwikiriza nukwo kurukugumya ebintu ebinihirwa, kandi kurukutunanura ha bintu ebitarorwa.
Okwikiriza oku nukwo kwaleetiire abantu aba ira okusiimwa Ruhanga.
Okwikiriza kukatukengesa ensi nkooku yahangirwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga. Nahabweki ebirukurorwa bikahangwa nibiihwa omu bitarukurorwa.

Habw'okwikiriza, kwe akahongera Ruhanga ekyonzira ekyasiimirwe okukira ekya Kaini, nikyo yasiimirwe yabalirwa omu bahikiriire. Eki Ruhanga akakigumya naikiriza ebi yamuhongiire. Kandi Abeli ogu, noobu aliba yafiire, baitu habw'okwikiriza kwe naakyatwegesa na hati.
Habw'okwikiriza, Enoka akatwarwa omwiguru atafiire; kandi atagaruke kuzooka habwokuba Ruhanga nuwe yamutwaire. Obu akaba atakatwairwe, akasiimwa Ruhanga nkooku kyahandiikirwe.
Nambere hatali kwikiriza, omuntu tasobora kusiimwa Ruhanga. Weena anyakwirra haihi Ruhanga asemeriire kumwikiriza nkooku aroho kandi aheera abo abamuserra.

Habw'okwikiriza, Noha obu yahabwirwe Ruhanga namwoleka ebirukwija kubaho, akahurra kurungi, yakora eryato erikooto ery'okujuna eka ye. Habw'okwikiriza kwe, akasingisa ensi omusango, yafooka mugwetwa w'obuhikiriire obuleetwa okwikiriza.
Habw'okwikiriza, Abburahamu akahurra obu yayesirwe okuruga owaabu agende omunsi ei ekaba naija kuheebwa. Akaimukya orugendo atarukumanya h'arukugenda.
Habw'okwikiriza akaikara omunsi ei yaraganiziibwe ali nk'omunyaihanga omunsi egi, yararaaga omu heema nka Isaaka na Yakobbo oku baakozire, nubo abaagwetirwe hamu nawe ebyaraganiziibwe.
Akaba naategereza orubuga orwina emisingi egumire, orwayombekerwe kandi orwakozirwe Ruhanga.
Habw'okwikiriza, Saara akasobora kutwara enda noobwakubaire akaba ahingwize emyaka ey'okuzaara, habwokuba akaikiriza ogu ayamuraganiize nkooku ali mwesigwa.
Habweki omusaija ogu omu, ow'akaba ahoireyo ati, akarugwamu abaijukuru baingi abarukwingana enyunyuuzi eza haiguru, kandi abali nk'omusenyi ogutarukubarwa ogwa ha musa gw'enyanja.
Abo boona bakafa nibaikiriza batakatungire ebyaraganiziibwe, baitu bamazire kubirebera hara n'okubigirra ekihika, nibeemanya nkooku bali banyamahanga kandi bazaahisiibwe omunsi.
Ningira abarukwemanya bati nibooleka nkooku barukuserra obuzaarwa bwabo.
Kakuba baajuzire ensi ei baarugiremu, baakusoboire kugarukayo.
Baitu bbo nibeegomba ensi erukukiraho oburungi, niyo ey'omwiguru. Nahabweki Ruhanga tarukukwatwa nsoni kwetwa Ruhanga wabu, habwokuba nuwe yabateekaniriize orubuga.
Habw'okwikiriza, Abburahamu obu yalengerwe, akahayo Isaaka. Nukwo kugamba, ogu ow'akaba ahairwe endagaano akaikiriza okutamba omwana we omu wenka
ayagambirweho ati: “Isaaka nuwe alikurugiramu abaijukuru.”
Abburahamu akagumya Ruhanga nkooku asobora kuhumbuura abantu noobu baraaba bafiire; nikyo Abburahamu yagaruliriirwe omwana we, nk'anyakurugire omu bafu.
Habw'okwikiriza, Isaaka akasabira Yakobbo na Esau emigisa akasumi kayo katakahikire.
Kandi habw'okwikiriza, Yakobbo obu akaba ali haihi kufa, abaana boona ba Yosefu akabasabira omugisa ainamire ha ntuli y'omwigo gwe naaramya Ruhanga.
Habw'okwikiriza, Yosefu obu akaba ali haihi kufa, akaranga Abaisirairi nkooku baliruga omunsi ya Misiri kandi yaragira omulingo balimuziikamu.
Habw'okwikiriza, Musa obu yazairwe, abazaire be bakamuserekera ameezi asatu. Habw'okurora omwana ali murungi, batatiine kiragiro ky'omukama w'ensi egi.
Habw'okwikiriza, Musa obu yakuzire, akanga kwetwa mutabani wa muhara wa Faraaho,
yasiima kukorwa kubi hamu n'abantu ba Ruhanga, okukira okwegondeza omu kusemererwa kw'ekibi okumara akacu kake.
Akateekereza okujumwa habwa Kristo nkooku kiri ky'omuhendo okukira obuguuda bwona obwa Misiri. Omutima gwe akaba agutaire ha mpeera ei aliheebwa.
Habw'okwikiriza akaruga Misiri atarukutiina kiniga ky'omukama wayo; akagumira kimu nk'arukurora Ruhanga Atazooka.
Habw'okwikiriza akataho obugenyi bw'okuhingurwaho yamiisira emiryango esagama, nukwo Omuhwerekereza ow'abaana b'emizigaijo aleke kukoraho Abaisirairi akabi.
Habw'okwikiriza, abantu bakacwanganiza Enyanja Erukutukura nk'abarukurubata ha bwerre; baitu Abamisiri obu baalengereho kukora bati, amaizi gakabaita.
Habw'okwikiriza, ebisiika by'orubuga Yeriko bikagwa bimazire kugotwa kumara ebiro musanju.
Habw'okwikiriza, Rahaabbu malaaya ataitwe hamu n'abeemi abo, habwokuba akakunira entasi.
Hati ebindi ngambe ki? Tinyina kasumi ak'okubazaaho Gidyoni, Baraki, Samusooni, Yefuta, Daudi, Samwiri n'abarangi
abo abaasingwire abakama abatali bamu habw'okwikiriza, baakora ebihikire nikyo baatungire Ruhanga ei yaraganiize, baigara akanwa k'entale,
baaraaza omurro ogurukumekuka, baatabuka empirima ez'obwogi, obuceke bwabo bwabarugiramu amaani, baafooka manzi omu bulemu, baabinga amahe ag'abanyamahanga.
Abakazi baagarulirwa abaabu abaahumbukire omu bafu. Abamu bakacanzibwa baayanga kulekerwa, nukwo basobole kuhumbuurwa bataahe omu bwomeezi oburukukiraho oburungi.
Abamu bakaswahirizibwa baateerwa enkoba, hamu n'okubohwa omu njegere n'okuteebwa omu nkomo.
Bakabateeza amabaale, bakasarwamu habiri n'emisumeeno, bakabaisa empirima; baagendaga bajwaire ebisaato by'entaama n'eby'embuzi, bali mpwerwa, nibabonabonesibwa, nibakorwa kubi
ensi bakaginuga habwokuba etabasemerre baajeerajeeraga omu marungu n'omu nsozi, nibaikara omu maingira n'omu maina g'ensi.
Abo boona noobu baraaba baasiimirwe habw'okwikiriza kwabo, baitu batatunge ebyaraganiziibwe,
habwokuba Ruhanga akaba atuteekaniriize kara ekintu ekirukukira oburungi, nukwo itwena tuhikiririzibwe hamu.

Habweki nu, nkooku twehinguliriziibwe ekitibe ky'abakaiso abo boona, na itwe tweiheho ekintu kyona ekirukututanga, n'ekibi kyona ekirukutuboha; kandi twiruke n'okugumiisiriza kalitango enyakutairweho omu maiso gaitu.

Amaiso tugahangire Yesu omutembuzi kandi omuhikiriza ow'okwikiriza kwaitu. Habw'okusemererwa oku akaba naarora omumaiso yagumiisiriza omusaraba, yagaya ensoni zaagwo, kandi hati asingire ha mukono ogw'obulyo ogw'ekitebe ky'obukama bwa Ruhanga.
Muteebwa ogu ayagumiisiriize enobi erukwinganaho abasiisi ei baamugiriire, nukwo muleke kujwaha n'okugwa ensazi.
Omu kurwanisa ebibi, timukabaire kugumisiiriza kuhika ha kuseesa esagama yanyu.
Kandi obu, mweberwe Ruhanga eki arukubahabura nk'abaana be naagamba ati: “Mwana wange, otagaya okuhana kwa MUKAMA, kandi otaterebuka obu akufubira.
Habwokuba MUKAMA ou agonza, nuwe ahana; kandi ou ayeta mwana we, nuwe ateera.”
Okufubirwa kurugwamu okugumiisiriza. Ruhanga abarolerra nk'abaana; kandi mwana ki atafubirwa ise?
Obu muraaba mutarukufubirwa boona nkooku bafubirwa, buli muli bitwekano, timuli baana kwo.
Kandi na itwe tukaba twina baisiitwe ab'omunsi abaatufubiraga, twabatamuga ekitiinisa. Titwakukizire muno kuhurra Omuzaire w'emyoyo yaitu, nukwo tukoomera?
Habwokuba baisiitwe ab'omunsi baatufubiraga okumara akasumi kake nkooku baagonzaaga; baitu Ruhanga atufubira nukwo tube barungi kandi tubagane ha buhikiriire bwe.
Omu kasumi kanu, okufubirwa kwona nikutusaaliza kwonka, titurukukusiima; baitu abaakuliire omu kufubirwa kunu, kulibarugiramu ebikorwa eby'obuhikiriire n'obusinge.
Habweki mugumye emikono yanyu erukuteba n'amaju ganyu amaceke.
Mutemere ebigere byanyu emihanda eterekeriire; nukwo omuli inywe arukucumbagira aleke kuhendekeramu, baitu akire.
Mwekambe okuba n'obusinge n'abantu boona, kandi mwitanire obuhikiriire, habwokuba nambere butali, tiharoho alirora Ruhanga.
Mwerinde, hatabaho n'omu arukusubwa obukoonyezi bwa Ruhanga. Hataikara kumera omuli inywe “ekimera ekirukusarra” kikaleeta obutwa oburukurwaza baingi.
Hatabaho omusiihani rundi arukugaya ebya Ruhanga, nk'Esau ayatunzire obugwetwa bwe habw'ekiihuro ekimu.
Baitu hanyuma obu yagondeze okugarulirwa omugisa, akangirirwa nkooku murukumanya. Noobu araaba yagusabire narra, baitu atatunge kasumi ak'okwegarukamu.
Inywe mwijuke nkooku mutairiire haihi orusozi oruroho omurro ogurukwaka, omwirima, ekibunda, ekiyaga,
iraka ery'engwara, kandi n'iraka eryagambire ebigambo ebyakangire abaabihuliire bayesengereza ngu, haleke kubaho ebigambo ebindi ebiribagambirwa.
Habwokuba batasobole kwemera ekiragiro ekyatairweho, ekirukugamba kiti: “Buli kihangwa kyona, noobu kyakubaire ekisoro, kakuba nikirra haihi n'orusozi, kiraaterwa amabaale.”
Mazimakwo ebi baarozire bikaba nibitiinisa muno, nukwo Musa kugamba ati: “Nintukumira habw'obutiini.”
Baitu hati inywe muhikire ha rusozi Siyoni, na ha rubuga rwa Ruhanga Atafa, Yerusaalemu orw'omwiguru orunyakurumo bamalaika abatarukubarwa abeesoroliize ha bugenyi.
Mwizire ha rusorrokano orw'emizigaijo eyahandiikirwe omwiguru, muhikire hali omucwi w'emisango Ruhanga owa boona, na hali emyoyo y'abarungi abahikiriziibwe.
Muhikire hali Yesu omuteeraniza wa Ruhanga n'abantu omu ndagaano empyaka, na ha sagama ye eyaseesekere erukwamirra kukira esagama y'Abeli.

Mwegendereze, muleke kwanga kuhuliriza Ruhanga arukubaza. Abaayangire kuhuliriza ogu ayabahabwire ali ha rusozi, obu baliba bataratabukire, kiraasura ki itwe kakuba twanga kuhuliriza anyakuhabura naayema omu iguru?
Obu nubwo iraka lye lyatengeseze ensi; baitu hati araganiize ati: “Ninyija kugaruka kutengesa ensi; teri nsi yonka, baitu n'iguru.”
Obu yagambire ati: “Ninyija kugaruka kutengesa ensi”, akaba naamanyisa ebihangwa ebyatengesiibwe nkooku birihwaho, nukwo ebitasobora kutengesibwa biikaleho.
Nahabweki, tusiime Ruhanga habw'okutuha obukama obutasobora kutengesibwa, kandi tumuramye nkooku kimusemeriire nitumuha ekitiinisa kandi nitumutiina,
habwokuba Ruhanga waitu murro kahwerekereza.
Mwikalege nimugonzangana nk'ab'oruganda.
Muteho omutima okukunira abagenyi. Omu kukora eki, abamu bakakunira abamalaika batabamanyire.
Mwijuke abo abali omu nkomo, nk'abagirumu hamu nabo. Mwijuke n'abo abarukukorwa kubi, habwokuba na inywe mwina omubiri nka bo.
Abantu boona obuswezi babutemu ekitiinisa, n'ekitabu ky'abaswerangaine kiikale kitasiitaziibwe; habwokuba abanjuka n'abasiihana, Ruhanga alibacwera omusango.
Omutima gwanyu muleke kugumaliza ha sente. Mwenihire n'ebi mwinabyo, habwokuba Ruhanga akagamba ati: “Tindikurugaho kandi tindikuhemukira.”
Nikyo turukugambira tutarukugurukyagurukya tuti: “MUKAMA nuwe mukonyezi wange, tinditiina; kiki omuntu eki asobora kunkora?”
Mwijuke abeebembezi banyu, abo abaabeegeseze ekigambo kya Ruhanga; mwetegereze ebyarugire omu bwomeezi bwabo, mwikirize nkooku baikiriize.
Yesu Kristo tahinduka nkooku akaba ali ijo, nukwo ali hati, kandi nukwo aliba ebiro byona.
Muleke kuhabisibwa enyegesa ezitali zimu ezirukuruga hanu na hali; kirungi omutima gugumibwe embabazi za Ruhanga kukira emizizo y'ebyokulya etaragasiire abo abaagihondiire.
Itwe twina itambiro abo abaheereza omu heema eri batarukwikirizibwa kulyaho kihongwa kyalyo.
Habwokuba emitumbi ey'ebisoro enyakurugwamu esagama nyakatagara omukuru ei atwara omu kiikaro ekirukwera kuba kihongwa habw'ekibi, emitumbi egi eyokezibwa aheeru y'orusiisira.
Yesu nawe akabonabonera aheeru y'orubuga, nukwo ayeze abantu n'esagama ye.
Habweki tuturuke, tumusange aheeru y'orusiisira, twikirize kujumwa habwe.
Habwokuba hanu titwina bwikaro, baitu nituserra obwikaro oburukwija.
Nahabweki twikale nituhongera Ruhanga ekyonzira eky'okumukugiza nitukirabya omu Yesu, nikyo kyonzira ky'abo abamwikiriize.
Mutebwa kukorra abantu ebirungi n'okubagana ebi mwinabyo, habwokuba ebyonzira nk'ebi nibyo Ruhanga asiima.

Muhurre abeebembezi banyu kandi muboorobere; habwokuba nibarolerra emyoyo yanyu nk'abantu abaligijunaanwa. Eki bakikole n'okusemererwa bataina mutima mubi; kitali eki, ebi barukubakorra tibirukwija kubagasira.
Mutusabire, habwokuba nitumanya nkooku twina omutima oguteekaine. Nitwenda byona kubihikya kurungi.
Ninyongera kubeesengereza: munsabire muno, nukwo mbagarulirwe bwango.
Ruhanga ow'obusinge, ayahumbwire omu bafu MUKAMA waitu Yesu, omuliisa ow'entaama omukuru, ayagumize endagaano etahwaho naaseesa esagama ye,
abahe ebirungi byona ebi murukwetaaga kuhikya ebi agonza, nukwo akorre omuli inywe ebi arukusiima, naabirabya omu Yesu Kristo anyakusemeriire kuheebwa ekitiinisa ebiro byona. Amiina.
Ab'oruganda, nimbeesengereza, ebigambo byange eby'okubahabura mubiikirize n'omutima gumu, habwokuba mbifundize.
Nimbamanyisa mugenzi waitu Timoteho nkooku alekiirwe. Obu alimpikaho bwango, ndija nawe tubarole.
Mundamukize abeebembezi banyu n'abantu ba Ruhanga boona. Ab'oruganda, enzaarwa za Itale nibabaramukwa.
Omugisa gwa Ruhanga gwikale na inywe inywena. Amina.
Nyowe Yakobbo, omuheereza wa Ruhanga kandi owa MUKAMA Yesu Kristo, nimbaramukya inywe ab'enganda ikumi na ibiri abaararangiire omu mahanga.
Bagenzi bange, obu muraahikwahoga emihito etali y'omulingo gumu, mugiitanire n'okusemererwa.
Okulengwa kw'okwikiriza kwanyu kurugwamu okuguma.
Kandi muleke okuguma oku kuhikirize omulimo gwakwo, nukwo musobole kufooka abahikiriire kandi abagumire omu by'omutima mutaina ekirukubaburaho.
Omuli inywe obu haraaba haroho anyakubuzirwe amagezi, agasabe Ruhanga anyakugabira abantu boona atarukubalirra kandi atarukweijukya, mazimakwo aligaheebwa.
Baitu asabe aina okwikiriza kandi atarukugurukyagurukya, habwokuba anyakugurukyagurukya asisana ekigonzi ky'enyanja ekinyakutwarwa kandi ekinyakucundwacundwa omuyaga.
Anyakugurukyagurukya aleke kuteekereza ngu, omuntu ow'emitima ebiri kandi ow'atagumire omu ngeso ze zoona
aina eki alitunga hali MUKAMA.
Muleke mugenzi wanyu omunaku ayesiime, Ruhanga obu amunyumiza,
kandi omuguuda ayesiime Ruhanga obu amubundaaza, habwokuba abaguuda balihwaho nk'orwakyo rw'ebimera.
Izooba obu lituruka liina ekibabu kyalyo ekisiiriiza kandi ekihotokya ebimera, orwakyo rwabyo rukunkumuka n'oburungi bwabyo buhwaho. Omuntu omuguuda nawe nukwo alihwaho ati, nakyaserra itungo.
W'omugisa omuntu ogu anyakugumiisiriza omu kwohebwa, habwokuba obu alimara kusingura, aliheebwa ekondo ey'obwomeezi Ruhanga ei yaraganiize abamugonza.
Omuntu obu ayohebwa aleke kugira ati: “Nyohiibwe Ruhanga”, habwokuba Ruhanga tayohebwa kukora ebibi, kandi tayohya muntu n'omu;
baitu buli muntu ayohebwa obu abiihwabiihwa kandi atwalirizibwa okwegomba kwe okubi.
Hanyuma okwegomba obu kumara kwija, kuzaara ekibi; kandi ekibi obu kimara kukura, kirugwamu kufa.
Bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, muleke kubiihwabiihwa.
Ekintu kyona ekirungi n'ekisembo kyona ekihikire biruga omu iguru hali Kazooba Nyamuhanga, atahindahinduka kandi tali nk'ekituuru ekigenda nikiihwaho.
Akacwamu kutufoora baana be natwoleka enyegesa ye ey'amazima, nukwo tube omuganuro gw'ebi yahangire.
Bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, kinu mukimanye: omuntu weena ahurre bwango, baitu atanguhiriza kubaza rundi kukwatwa ekiniga,
habwokuba anyakwina ekiniga tarukwija kuhika ha buhikiriire Ruhanga obu ayenda.
Nahabweki mweiheho obubi bwona n'engeso mbi zoona. mwikirize n'obuculeezi ekigambo Ruhanga eki yataire mu mitima yanyu ekirukusobora kubajuna.
Baitu ekigambo eki mukite omu nkora, mutali nk'abarukukihurra kwonka, mukebiihabiiha.
Omuntu obu ahurra ekigambo atakihikiriize, asisana nk'anyakwerorra omu ndolerwamu.
Obu ayerora, agenda, kandi ahonaaho ayebwa nkooku arukusisana.
Baitu ogu arukwetegereza Ebiragiro ebihikire, nibyo ebiragiro ebitwiha mu bwiru, akabyekambira, atali muhulizi arukwebwa baitu mukozi arukukora, nuwe aliheebwa omugisa omu ebi arukukora.
Kakuba habaho arukuteekereza nkooku ali muntu w'ediini, kandi kunu tarukulema rulimi rwe, baitu nayebiihabiiha, ediini y'omuntu ogu busamu kantu.
Ediini nyakabara kandi etaina kamogo omumaiso ga Ruhanga Isiitwe niyo enu: kusuura enfuuzi n'abafaakati abali omu mihito, n'okwerinda okusiiswa ensi.
Bagenzi bange, inywe abarukwikiriza MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, MUKAMA w'ekitiinisa, muleke kusoroora omu bantu.
Kakuba haija omuntu anyakujwaire empeta eza zaabbu hamu n'ebijwaro ebirungi, ataaha nambere mwesoroliize; hakaija n'omunaku anyakujwaire obutengo,
mukata omutima hali ogu anyakujwaire kurungi, mukamugamba muti: “Weza ikarra hanu”; kandi omunaku mukamugambira muti: “Yemerra hali”, rundi muti: “Ikarra hansi aho ha bigere byange”,
obu, nimuba mutasoroire mu bantu, mukacwamu mutaina bwinganiza?
Bagenzi bange abagonzibwa, mutege amatu! Ruhanga akakoma abanaku ab'omunsi babe baguuda omu kwikiriza kandi bagwetwa b'obukama obu yaraganiize abo abamugonza.
Baitu inywe, omunaku ogu, mumugayire. Kandi abaguuda tinubo babaita kubi? Tinubo babacunda nibabatwara omu kooti?
Tinubo abajuma ibara eri ery'ekitiinisa inywe Abakristo eri mwarukirwe?
Kakuba muhikiriza kwo ekiragiro ekikuru, Ebyahandiikirwe nkooku birukugamba biti: “Ogonzeege mutaahi waawe nkooku oyegonza wenka”, obu mukora kurungi.
Baitu obu musoroora, buli mukozire ekibi kandi Ekiragiro kibasingisa omusango, mwafooka basiisi.
Habwokuba weena anyakulemwa kukwata ekintu kimu ekiri omu Biragiro, aba asingirwe omusango gw'okutahikya Ebiragiro byona.
Ningira Ogu ayagambire ati: “Otalisiihana”, nuwe yagambire ati: “Otaliita”. Kakuba otasiihana baitu okaita, buli ocwire Ebiragiro byona.
Nahabweki mubazeege kandi mukolege nk'abantu abalicwerwa omusango, nk'Ebiragiro ebitwiha omu bwiru oku bitegeka.
Ataraagizire mbabazi, alicwerwa omusango ogutarumu mbabazi; habwokuba embabazi zimuganyiza omusango.
Bagenzi bange, nikigasa ki omuntu kugamba ngu, aina okwikiriza, baitu ataina ebi arukukora? Okwikiriza oku kusobora kumujuna?
Kakuba mugenzi wanyu omusaija rundi omukazi aba naajwara ebitahikire kandi ataina byokulya ebya buli kiro,
baitu omu omuli inywe akamugambira ati: “Genda n'obusinge, otagate kandi oigute”, atamuhaire ebi omubiri gurukwetaaga, eki nikigasa ki?
Habweki, okwikiriza kwonka obu kuraaba kutarumu bikorwa, kuba kufiire.
Baitu haroho asobora kugamba ati: “Iwe oina okwikiriza, na nyowe nyina ebikorwa.” Hati nu onyoleke okwikiriza kwawe okutarumu bikorwa, na nyowe habw'ebi nkora, ndakwoleka okwikiriza kwange.
Oikiriize Ruhanga nkooku ali omu, kandi ohikya kwo. Nangwa n'amasitaani eki gakiikiriza n'okukankana nigakankana.
Mutaahi wange, iwe omudoma, nooyenda bakwoleka okwikiriza okutarumu bikorwa nkooku kutarukugasa?
Ebikorwa tinibyo byahikiriize isenkuru itwe Abburahamu obu yahaireyo omutabani Isaaka ha itambiro?
Aho noorora, okwikiriza kukagendera hamu n'ebikorwa bye, kandi okwikiriza kukahikirizibwa ebi yakozire.
Nahabweki Ekyahandiikirwe kikahikirizibwa ekirukugamba kiti: “Abburahamu akaikiriza Ruhanga, kandi eki kyamurugiramu obuhikiriire”; yayetwa nganjani ya Ruhanga.
Aho nuho murukurorra omuntu nkooku ahikirizibwa ebikorwa, kutali kwikiriza kwonka.
Nikyo kimu Rahabbu, omunyarwanju ogu, nawe akahikirizibwa ebikorwa obu yakuniire entasi yabaragirra omuhanda gundi.
Omubiri ogutarumu mwoyo nkooku guba gufiire, n'okwikiriza okutarumu bikorwa nukwo kuba kufiire kuti.
Bagenzi bange, haleke kubaho baingi omuli inywe abarukugonza kwefoora beegesa b'abandi, habwokuba nimumanya itwe abarukwegesa nkooku tulicwerwa omusango ogurukukira ogw'abandi.
Ningira itwena tusobya emirundi nyingi. Kandi omuntu kakuba atasobya omu bigambo abaza, ogu aba ahikiriire kandi asobora kulema omubiri gwe gwona.
Itwe tuta ebyoma omu kanwa k'embaraasi nukwo zitworobere, tulema emibiri yazo yoona, tuzitwara nambere turukwenda.
Murole n'emeeri; noobu ziba ziri nkooto zita, kandi niitwarwa emiyaga y'amaani, baitu zirungikwa engahi entaito muno hoona omurungiki h'arukwenda.
Orulimi narwo kacweka kataito k'omubiri, baitu rwenyumiriza ha bintu ebikuru. Ka kyamahano okurora ekibira ekikooto nikyokebwa akarro kake!

Orulimi narwo ruba murro. Omu bicweka by'omubiri orulimi niyo ndugirro y'ebibi byona, rusiisa omubiri gwona, rurugwamu omurro ogukwokya obuhangwa bwaitu bwona; kandi orulimi oru rucumika omurro ogu rwiha okuzimu Nyabuyonga.
Buli mulingo gw'ebisoro, n'ebinyonyi, n'ebyekurra, n'encu ez'omu nyanja bisobora kulemwa kandi bikalemwa ira abantu;
baitu tiharoho muntu asobora kulema orulimi ruba bubi obutahuumura, rwijwire obusegwe obwita.
Nurwo tweyambisa kukugiza MUKAMA Isiitwe, kandi turukyenesa abantu abaahangirwe omu nsisana ya Ruhanga.
Omu kanwa ako konyini harugamu okukugiza n'okukyena. Bagenzi bange, eki tikisemeriire kuba kiti.
Ensoro emu esobora kurugwamu amaizi amarungi n'amabi?
Nyabura inywe, omutini gusobora kwana ebijuma eby'omuti Oliva, rundi omuzaabbibbu kwana eby'omutini? Amaizi g'ekisura nago tigasobora kurugwamu amarungi.
Nooha omuli inywe anyakwina amagezi n'okwetegegereza? Leka akigumye n'engeso ze enungi n'ebikorwa ebi akora n'obuculeezi obunyakurumu amagezi.
Baitu omu mitima yanyu obu muraaba mwinamu ihali lingi rundi okwegonza, muleke kwenyumiza n'okusereka amazima.
Amagezi nk'ago tigaruga omwiguru, baitu garuga omunsi; tigali g'abantu baitu g'Omwohi.
Nambere hali ihali n'okwegonza, nuho haba okutaikirraniza, hamu n'ebikorwa ebibi byona.

Baitu amagezi agaruga omwiguru, eky'okubanza gaba marungi, gongera galeeta obusinge n'obuculeezi, gaikiriza eby'obulyo, gaijwire embabazi, garugwamu ebikorwa ebirungi, tigasoroora mu bantu kandi tigarumu bugobya.
Okuhikirra niryo igesa ly'embibo ezabyairwe kurungi abantu abaserra obusinge.
Kiki ekireeta amalemu n'empaka omuli inywe? Tikuli kwegomba okubi okurukurwanira omu bicweka by'emibiri yanyu?

Inywe mwegomba ebintu; baitu obu mulemwa kubitunga, mwikiriza n'okwita abandi. mwegomba eby'abandi, baitu obu mulemwa kubitunga, nubwo mucwa obulemu kandi murwana. Ekibatanga kutunga, habwokuba timubisaba Ruhanga.
Kandi obu musaba mutaheebwa, habwokuba musabire kubi. Mukaba nimwenda kubimarra omu kwegomba kwanyu okubi.
Ha! Bantu inywe abateesigwa! Timurukumanya okuganjana n'ensi nkooku nubwo obunyanzigwa hali Ruhanga? Nahabweki weena anyakugonza kuganjana n'ensi, ayefoora muzigu wa Ruhanga.
Rundi nimuteekereza ngu, Ekyahandiikirwe kigambira busa ekirukugira kiti: “Omwoyo Ruhanga ogu yatutairemu, tarukwenda kugwegarurra?”
Baitu emigisa ei atuha neekiraho, nikyo kyahandiikirwe kiti: “Abeekuza, Ruhanga abahakaniza; baitu abeebundaaza abaha emigisa.”
Nahabweki mworobere Ruhanga; murwanise Omwohi, nawe naija kubarugaho.
Mwirre haihi Ruhanga, nawe alibairra haihi. Inywe abasiisi munaabe engaro zanyu, na inywe ab'emitima ebiri, mugisemeze.
Mutuntule, muganye, kandi murre. Enseko zanyu ifooke kurra, n'okusemererwa kwanyu kufooke bujune.
Mwebundaaze omumaiso ga MUKAMA, nawe alibanyumiza.

Bagenzi bange, muleke kubazanganaho kubi. Anyakubazaaho kubi mugenzi we, rundi anyakumucwera omusango, buli nabazaaho kubi Ekiragiro kikuru eky'engonzi kandi nakigaya. Kakuba ogaya Ekiragiro ekikuru, buli torukukihikya, baitu oyefoire mukama wakyo.
Haroho omu wenka anyakutaho Ebiragiro kandi aba mukama wabyo. Nuwe ogu arukusobora kujuna n'okuhwerekereza. Baitu iwe niiwe oha arukucwera mugenzi waawe omusango?
Muhurre inywe abanyakugamba muti: “Hati rundi nyenkya turaagenda omu rubuga nanka, tumaleyo omwaka nitusuubura, nukwo twiheyo amagoba”,
kunu mutarukumanya ebiraabaho nyenkya. Obwomeezi bwanyu kintu ki? Muli nk'ekiho ekinyakuzooka akacu kake, hanyuma kikakya.
Haakire mugambe muti: “MUKAMA obu alisiima, na itwe tuba tukyaroho, turaakora kinu na kiri.”
Baitu hati nimwemanyaho muno, nikyo murukwenyumiriza. kandi okwenyumiza nk'oku kuba kubi.
Weena anyakumanya eki asemeriire kukora baitu akalemwa kukikora, eki kimufookera kibi.
Hati nu inywe abaguuda, murre kandi muteere empamo habw' enaku erukwija kubaizira.
Itungo lyanyu hati lijunzire, n'ebijwaro byanyu biriirwe enkugutu.
Ezaabbu yanyu n'efeeza bimomere, kandi obumomi bwabyo bulibasingisa omusango, nibulya emibiri yanyu nk'omurro. Itungo eri mwayahwire, liribahindukira omu biro bya ha mpero.
Mwetegereze, empeera mwagobiize abakozi abaagesire emisiri yanyu neeyamuza; kandi emikungo y'abagesi ehulirwe MUKAMA w'amahe.
Mukaikara omunsi nimwejaahiika kandi nimusemererwa; mukalya, mwaiguta nkooku mwagondeze omu biro abahikiriire ebi baitiirwemu.
Mukasingisa omusango omuntu ahikiriire kandi mwamwita; kunu nuwe ogu atarabarwanisize.
Habweki bagenzi bange, mugumiisirize okuhika MUKAMA obu aliija. Murole omulimi, alindirra omusiri gwe kurugwamu ebirimwa by'omugaso. Agumiisiriza okuhika obu gugwerwa enjura ey'itoigo n'ey'irumbi.
Na inywe mugumiisirize. Mutaterebuka habwokuba MUKAMA amaliize kuhika.
Bagenzi bange, muleke kunyegerrangana, mutaikara kujunaanwa mumaiso g'omucwi w'emisango; habwokuba na hati ali ha irembo nategereza.
Bagenzi bange, ekyokurorraho eky'okugumiisiriza n'okubonabona nubo abarangi abaabalize omu ibara lya MUKAMA.
Mumanye ngu, abaagumiisirize tubeeta bahiirwa. Mukahurra Yobu nkooku yagumiisiriize kandi mwarora Mukamu nkooku yamulinzire. Abakwo munyambabazi kandi muganyizi.

Baitu bagenzi bange, ekikuru muno: mutalirahira iguru noobu yaakuba ensi, rundi endahiro endi yoona. Ekigambo kyanyu: Ego, kiikale kiri: Ego; kandi ekigambo kyanyu: Nangwa, kiikale kiri: Nangwa, nukwo muleke kusingwa omusango.
Omuli inywe obu haraaba haroho anyakwina obulemeezi, asabe. Obu haraaba haroho arukusemererwa, azine eby'okukugiza Ruhanga.
Omuli inywe obu haraaba haroho anyakurwaire, leka ayete abakuru ab'ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, bamusabire nibamusiiga amagita omu ibara lya MUKAMA;
kandi okusaba oku okunyakurumu okwikiriza nikwija kukiza omurwaire, na MUKAMA naija kumwimukya. Obu araaba yakozire ebibi, araabiganyirwa.
Nahabweki mwaturrangane ebibi byanyu, musabirangane nukwo mukire. Okusaba kw'omuntu ahikiriire kwina amaani kandi nikugasa muno.
Eriya akaba ali muntu nka itwe, baitu akasaba ataireho omutima ngu, enjura ereke kugwa, kandi enjura yamara emyaka esatu n'ameezi mukaaga etarukugwa ha nsi.
Kandi akagaruka yasaba, iguru lyanaga enjura, n'ensi yameza ebimera byayo.
Bagenzi bange, obu haraaba haroho omuli inywe omuntu anyakuhabire, yaruga ha mazima, kandi hakabaho arukumugarra,
ogu amanye nkooku weena anyakugarra omusiisi, akamwiha omu nsobi ei yahabiiremu, alijuna omwoyo gw'omusiisi ogu, kandi ebibi ebitabarwa biriswekerwa.
Nyowe Petero, omukwenda wa Yesu Kristo, nimpandiikira inywe abaazaahire mwararangira omu mahanga ga Ponto, Galatiya, Kapadokiya, Asiya na Bitiniya.
Inywe abaakomerwe mwasororwa Ruhanga Isiitwe, mwayezibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire nukwo mworobere Yesu Kristo kandi mumiisirwe esagama ye: Emigisa n'obusinge byeyongere omuli inywe.
Ruhanga, Ise MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, akugizibwe, Habw'embabazi ze enyingi tukazaarwa buhyaka, twatunga okunihira okugumire habw'okuhumbuuka omu bafu okwa Yesu Kristo;
kandi twatunga obugwetwa obutahwaho, obutasiisikara, kandi obutacucuka Ruhanga obu atwahuliire omwiguru.
Habw'okwikiriza, inywe nimulindwa amaani ga Ruhanga kandi alibajuna ha kiro kya ha mpero nambere alisuukurra entegeka ye.
Eki kibaleetere okusemererwa, noobu muraaba muli b'okubona enaku hati okumara akaanya kake.

Okubona enaku kuligumya amazima ag'okwikiriza kwanyu nkooku kuli kw'omuhendo okukira zaabbu enyakusobora kusiisikara, kunu neesemezibwa omurro. Okwikiriza kwanyu okw'amazima nikwija kubaleetera ekitiinisa, okusiimwa, n'okunyumizibwa Yesu Kristo obu aliboneka.
Noobu muraaba mutakamubonaga, baitu nimumugonza. Noobu muraaba mutarukumurora hati, baitu nimumwikiriza kandi nimukyanganuka n'okusemererwa okutagambwa.
Ekiruga omu kwikiriza kwanyu, nukwo kujuna emyoyo yanyu.
Abarangi abaarangire eby' embabazi za Ruhanga ezi mukaba nimwija kugirirwa mu biro binu, bakaserra muno kandi baakaguliiriza ha kujunwa kunu.
Bakakaguliiriza ha muntu rundi ha kasumi Mwoyo wa Kristo aka yagenderiire obu yaboolekere okubonesibwa kwa Kristo n'ekitiinisa ekirihonderaho.

Bakasuukulirwa Ruhanga nkooku ebi bakaba batarukubiranga habwabu baitu habwanyu. Ebi nibyo ebigambo ebi mwegesebwa hati abo abarukubarangirra Amakuru Amarungi, nibakoonyerwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire ayatumirwe yaruga omwiguru. Kandi ebi nibyo bamalaika nabo beegomba kwetegereza.
Habweki nu, mugumye emitima yanyu kandi mwerinde. Okunihira kwanyu kwona mukute ha mbabazi ezi muligirirwa ha kusuukurwa kwa Yesu Kristo.
Nk'abaana abahulizi, muleke kusisana nkooku mukaba muli obu mwalemwaga okwegomba okubi okw'obutamanya bwanyu obwa ira.
Baitu Ruhanga ayabeesire nkooku ahikiriire, na inywe mube bahikiriire omu ngeso zanyu zoona.
Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Mube bahikiriire, habwokuba nyowe mpikiriire.”

Omu kusaba kwanyu, obu muraaba nimweta Ruhanga Isiinywe, kandi nuwe anyakucwera buli omu omusango atarukusoroora, nasigikira ha bikorwa ebi yakozire, mwikale nimutiina kukora kubi ebiro byona by'okuzaahibwa kwanyu.
Nimumanya nkooku mwacungwirwe, mwaruga omu ngeso ezitaina mugaso ezi mwaijukwire baisenkuru inywe, mutacungurwe n'ebintu ebihwaho, nk'efeeza na zaabbu,
baitu mukacungurwa esagama ey'omuhendo eya Kristo, erukusisana ey'omwana gw'entaama ogutaina kamogo rundi kabara.
Kristo ogu, Ruhanga akamukoma kara ensi etakahangirwe, yayolekwa habwanyu omu biro binu eby'okumalirra.
Habwe, nimwikiriza Ruhanga ayamuhumbwire omu bafu, yamuha ekitiinisa. Nahabweki, okwikiriza n'okuhihira kwanyu bigumirege hali Ruhanga.
Hati nkooku mumazire okweza emyoyo yanyu habw'okworobera amazima, kandi nimugonza ab'oruganda n'omutima gumu, mwekambire kugonzangana n'emitima yanyu yoona.
Mukazaarwa buhyaka, mutarukuruga omu mbibo enyakucweka, baitu nimuruga omu mbibo etacweka habw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga ekyomeeza kandi ekiikaraho;
habwokuba kikahandiikwa kiti: “Kyona ekyetwa omuntu kisisana obunyansi, n'ekitiinisa kyona eky'omuntu kisisana orwakyo orw'obunyansi. Obunyansi buhotoka, orwakyo rukunkumuka;
baitu ekigambo kya MUKAMA kiikaraho ebiro byona.” kandi ekigambo eki, nugo Makuru Amarungi aga mwarangiriirwe.
Nahabweki, muleke itima lyona n'obugobya bwona, muleke obuteesigwa, ihali n'okuhangirra kwona.
Abaana enkerembe abaakazarwa juba nkooku beetaaga amata ag'omubiri, na inywe mwetaaga amata amarungi ag'omwoyo, nukwo gabakuze, gabahikye ha kujunwa;
habwokuba “Muroleze ha burungi bwa MUKAMA”, nkooku kyahandiikirwe.
Mwije hali ogu. Nuwe ibaale eryomeezi, ibaale abantu eri baayangire; baitu eryakomerwemu Ruhanga kandi ery'omuhendo.
Na inywe mube nk'amabaale agoomeezi, agombekerwemu enju ey'omwoyo, mube abanyakatagara abarukwera, nukwo mutambe ebyonzira eby'omwoyo, ebyonzira ebirukusiimwa Ruhanga omu Yesu Kristo.
Ebihandiiko Ebirukwera nibigamba biti: “Dara, nimbyara omu Siyoni ibaale ery'obugumizo, ibaale eryakomerwe kandi ery'omuhendo. Weena anyakumwikiriza, talikwatwa nsoni.”
Habweki, hali inywe abaikiriza, ibaale eri, ly'omuhendo; baitu habw'abo abataikiriza: “Ibaale lyonyini abombeki eri baayangire, niryo lyafookere bugumizo bw'enju.”
Kyayongera kiti: “Lyaba ibaale eriritabaijura abantu, kandi mwandara ogulibanaga”; batabaijuka habwokuba tiboorobera kigambo, nkooku Ruhanga yakibategekiire.

Baitu inywe muli ruganda orukomerwemu, orwina abanyakatagara b'oruganda rwa MUKAMA, ihanga erirukwera, bantu ba Ruhanga mali, nukwo mumanyise ebikorwa ebirukuhuniriza eby'Ogu ayabeesire, yabaiha omu mwirima yabataahya omu musana gwe ogw'amahano.
Ira mukaba mutali bantu be, baitu hati muli bantu ba Ruhanga. ira mukaba mutagiriirwe mbabazi, baitu hati muzigiriirwe.
Abagonzibwa, nimbeesengereza nk'abantu abali mu mahanga kandi abaazaahire, mwetantale okwegomba okw'omubiri okurukurwanisa emyoyo yanyu.
Mugire engeso nungi omu Banyamahanga, noobu baraaba nibabeeta nkozi z'ebibi, baitu leka barole ebirungi ebi mukora, nukwo bakugize Ruhanga ha kiro eki aliiziramu.
Habwa MUKAMA, mworobere ab'obusobozi boona abarukubalema, noobu araaba ali Kaisaali, habwokuba nuwe mukuru,
rundi abalemi abakuru abatumirwe Kaisaali kufubira abo abanyakukora kubi, n'okusiima abo abanyakukora kurungi.
Ningira Ruhanga kinu nikyo agonza, inywe okukora ebihikire, nukwo muculeeze obutamanya bw'abadoma.
Mube bantu b'obugabe, baitu obugabe bwanyu mutabufoora byekwaso by'okusiisa; kyonka mwikale muli baheereza ba Ruhanga.
Abantu boona mubatemuga ekitiinisa. Mugonzeege ab'oruganda. mutiinege Ruhanga. Kandi Kaisaali mumuhe ekitiinisa.
Inywe abaheereza b'abantu, mworobere bakama banyu nimubatamu ekitiinisa kyona. Mutoorobera ab'embabazi rundi ab'amakune bonka, baitu n'abanyamwaga.
W'omugisa ogu anyakugumiisiriza enaku ezi bamuboneseza busa habwa Ruhanga.
Karungi ki aka mutunga obu mugumiisiriza kuteerwa habw'okukora kubi? Baitu obu mugumiisiriza kusaalizibwa habw'okukora kurungi, nimwija kusiimwa Ruhanga.
Ningira eki nikyo mwayetiirwe, habwokuba Kristo nawe akabonesibwa habwanyu, yabasigira ekyokurorraho, nukwo na inywe muhondere ekirale kye.
Uwe atakole kibi; akanwa ke katabemu bugobya.
Obu yajumirwe, atajume; obu yabonesiibwe, atakange abaamuboneseze; baitu akeesiga Ruhanga anyakucwa emisango omu bwinganiza.
Kristo wonyini, omu mubiri gwe akeetweka ebibi byaitu yabihikya ha musaraba, nukwo tuzirre kimu ekibi, kandi twemarre ha buhikiriire. Ebihuta bye nibyo byabakirize.
Habwokuba mukaba muhabire nk'entaama, baitu hati muhabukire, mwagaruka hali Omuliisa kandi Omuroleerezi w'emyoyo yanyu.
Na inywe banyinabwenge, muhurrege ba iba-inywe, nukwo abamu mulibo noobu baraaba batarukwikiriza kigambo kya Ruhanga, baitu bahindurwe engeso zanyu enungi, mutaina eki murukubagambira,
obu barora engeso zanyu enungi ezirumu kutiina Ruhanga.
Oburungi bwanyu buleke kuba ha bintu ebirukuzooka, nimusiba isoke, nimwekunisa na zaabbu, nimujwara ebirukwandaara;
baitu oburungi bwanyu bube bw'omunda omu mitima yanyu, nk'ekintu eky'omuhendo ekiikaraho, nugwo omwoyo gw'embabazi kandi omuculeezi, omwoyo ogw'omuhendo mali omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
Abakazi abahikiriire aba ira abaanihiraga omu Ruhanga, nabo nukwo baayecumaga bati, kandi baahurraga baibabo,
nka Saara oku yahurraga Abburahamu, naamweta mukama we. Hati na inywe muli bahara be obu muraaba nimukora ebihikire, mutarukwikiriza kintu na kimu kubakanga.

Na inywe banyinamaka, mwikale n'abakazi banyu nimubataho omutima kandi nimubatamu ekitiinisa, habwokuba bbo b'amaani make. Baitu bagweterwa hamu na inywe ekisembo kya Ruhanga eky'obwomeezi. Obu muraakora muti, tiharukwija kubaho kintu kyona ekirukutanga okusaba kwanyu.
Eky'okumalirra, inywena mube n'omwoyo gumu, mugirrangane embabazi, mugonze ab'oruganda, mugire omutima ogurukworoba kandi ogurukwebundaaza.
Muleke kugarurrana obubi rundi okujumangana; baitu musabirangane omugisa. Ningira eki nikyo Ruhanga yabeetiire, nukwo abahe omugisa.
Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Ogu anyakugonza obwomeezi n'okutunga obusinge, atange orulimi rwe kubaza ebibi, n'akanwa ke akatange kubaza eby'obugobya;
ayetantale ebibi, akole ebirungi; aserre obusinge kandi abwitanire.
Habwokuba amaiso ga MUKAMA gaikara garoleriire abahikiriire, kandi amatu ge agatega okusaba kwabo. Baitu amaiso ga Ruhanga gakimba abo abakora kubi.”
Nooha asobora kubakora kubi obu muraaba nimwekambira okukora ebirungi?
Noobu muraaba nimubonesibwa habw'obuhikiriire, muliheebwa omugisa. Abantu abo mutabatiina kandi mutaharaza omutima,
baitu muhe Kristo ekitiinisa mu mitima yanyu, abe MUKAMA wanyu. Mwikalege mweteekaniize okusoborra kurungi buli muntu anyakubakaguza ha kunihira oku mwinakwo;

baitu nabwo mukikole muli baculeezi nimuha Ruhanga ekitiinisa. Kandi mwikale mwina omutima omurungi, nukwo abo abarukubaza kubi ha ngeso enungi ezi mwina habw' okuhondera Kristo, obu baraabajumaga bakwatwe ensoni.
Haakire mubonabonesibwe habw'okukora ebirungi, Ruhanga obu araaba naakisiima, hatali okubonesibwa habw'okukora ebibi.
Kristo akafa habw'ebibi omurundi gumu yamara. Ahikiriire akafeera abatahikiriire, nukwo asobole kutuhikya hali Ruhanga. Omubiri gwe bakagwita baitu omwoyo gwe Ruhanga akagwomeeza.
Omwoyo ogu nugwo yagendiiremu kurangirra emyoyo y'abaafiire ei ekaba eri omu nkomo.
Nubo abantu abatarahuliire kara, Ruhanga obu akaba abagumiisiriize omu biro bya Noha, eryato erikooto obu likaba nirikorwa, abantu abake, nka munaana bonka eri baajunirwemu okutaitwa amaizi.

Ekyokurorraho eki nikisisana okubatizibwa okurukujuna inywe. Okubatizibwa oku tikiri kintu ekirukwogya iko ha mubiri, baitu nukwo okusaba kwaitu, Ruhanga atuhe omutima ogwezire habw'okuhumbuuka kwa Yesu Kristo.
Nuwe ogu ayagenzire omwiguru, ali ha mukono ogw'obulyo ogwa Ruhanga, naalema ebitebe bya bamalaika, eby'ab'obusobozi, n'eby'amaani.
Kristo nkooku yabonabonesiibwe omu mubiri, na inywe mwikale mwina omutima ogugumire nk'ogwe, habwokuba weena anyakubonabonesibwa omu mubiri, alekeraho kukora ebibi,
nukwo amale ebiro ebimusigaire akyaina omubiri atarukulemwa okwegomba kubi okw'abantu, baitu naalemwa entegeka ya Ruhanga.

Omu biro ebyahingwire mukamara akasumi kaingi nimukora ebi Abanyamahanga basiima. Mukaikara omu busiihani, omu kworobera okwegomba kubi okw'omubiri, omu tamiiro, omu magenyi amabi, omu bididi ebirumu ebitamiiza, n'omu kuramya abacwezi.
Hati Abanyamahanga nibahunirra okurora mutarukuteerana nabo omu ngeso mbi nk'ezi kandi nikyo barukubajumira.
Baitu bbo balyetonganira hali Ogu anyakweteekaniza kucwera omusango aboomiire n'abafiire.

Eki nikyo Amakuru Amarungi gaarangiriirwe na hali abantu abaafiire. Noobu baraaba baamazire kucwerwa omusango omu mubiri nk'abantu boona, baitu balisobora kuhika ha bwomeezi bwa Ruhanga omu myoyo yabo.
Empero ya byona eri haihi; nahabweki mwikale nimwerinda kandi muteekaine nukwo musobole kubaza na Ruhanga.
Okukira byona mwikale nimugonzangana, habwokuba engonzi iswekerra ebibi bingi.
Mugirranganege amakune mutaina kahyeme.
Buli omu nkooku yahairwe ekisembo, mubikozese kukoonyera abandi nk'abakeeto ba Ruhanga abarungi abaahairwe ebisembo ebitarukusisana.

Weena anyakubaza, abaze Ruhanga ebi amusuukuliire. Weena anyakuheereza, aheereze n'amaani Ruhanga aga amuhaire; nukwo omu byona Ruhanga akugizibwe omu Yesu Kristo, anyakwina ekitiinisa n'obulemi ebiro byona. Amiina.
Abagonzibwa, muleke kuhunirizibwa ebirengeso eby'amaani ebirukubagwera, mukaba nk'abagweriirwe ihano.
Baitu musemererwe muno habw'okubagana ha kubonesibwa kwa Kristo, nukwo ekitiinisa kye obu kirisuukurwa, mulikyanganuka kandi musemererwe.
Kakuba babajuma habw'okwikiriza Kristo, muli b'omugisa, habwokuba Mwoyo ow'ekitiinisa, Mwoyo wa Ruhanga aikara hali inywe.
Baitu hatabaho n'omu omuli inywe arukubonabonesibwa habw'obwisi, habw'obusuma, habw'okukora kubi, rundi habw'okwetaahya mu by'abandi.
Kakuba omuntu abonabonesibwa habw'okuba Mukristo, aleke kukwatwa ensoni; baitu akugize Ruhanga habw'okwetwa ibara eri.
Ningira akasumi ak'okucwa omusango kahikire. Okucwa omusango nikubandiza ha bantu ba Ruhanga, Obu kuraaba nikubandiza hali itwe, abo abataikiriza Amakuru Amarungi ga Ruhanga baliba bata?
Kikahandiikwa kiti: “Omuntu ahikiriire obu araaba atarukwanguhirwa muno kujunwa, leero atarukutiina Ruhanga n'omusiisi baliba bata?”
Nahabweki abo ababonabonesibwa nkooku Ruhanga agonza, baikale nibakora ebirungi, kandi obwomeezi bwabo babukwase Omuhangi omwesigwa.
Nahabweki ninteererra abakuru omuli inywe, nyowe omukuru nyakyabu, kaiso w'okubonesibwa kwa Kristo kandi arukubagana ha kitiinisa ekirukwija kusuukurwa:
Murolerre igana lya Ruhanga eri mwakwasiibwe, mulirolerre mutarukuhambirizibwa, baitu nimugonza; mutarukukorra empeera, baitu nimuheereza n'omuhimbo.
Mutalemesa ireme abo aba murukurolerra, baitu mube kyokurorraho ekirungi hali igana.
Kandi Omuliisa omukuru obu alizooka, muliheebwa ekondo ey'ekitiinisa etacucuka.
Na inywe abasigazi mworobere abakuru. Inywena mwekambire kuheerezangana nimwebundaaza, buli omu omu rubu rwe; habwokuba: “Ruhanga ahakaniza abeekuliiriza; baitu abeebundaaza, abaha omugisa.”
Nahabweki mwebundaaze mwikirize kulemwa obusobozi bwa Ruhanga, nukwo akasumi obu kalihika asobole kubanyumiza.
Okutuntura kwanyu kwona mukumukwase, habwokuba abataho omutima.
Mwerinde kandi mwikale nimurora. sitaani, omuzigu wanyu, naarabanganamu nk'entale erukubbukura, neeserra ou eraajunjubura.
Mumwangirre, mugumiire omu kwikiriza kwanyu, nimumanya bagenzi banyu ab'omunsi yoona nkooku bahikwaho okubonesibwa nk'okwanyu.
Kandi obu muliba mumazire kubonesibwa akacu kake, Ruhanga ow'embabazi nyingi, ayabeetiire ekitiinisa kye ekitahwaho omu Kristo, alibahuumuza, alibagumya, kandi alibongera amaani.
Obulemi bwikale nawe ebiro byona. Amiina.

Mbahandiikiire ebbaruha enu engufu, ninkoonyerwa Siraasi ou ndukumanya nkooku ali w'oruganda omwesigwa. Nimbateererra kandi nimbamanyisa enyegesa enu nkooku erumu embabazi za Ruhanga ez'amazima; mugigumiremu.
Ekitebe ky'abaikiriza abali Bbabbulooni, akyakomerwe Ruhanga nka inywe, nikibaramukya. Omwana wange Mariko nawe naabaramukya.
Muramukyangane nimugwangana omu kifuba n'engonzi. Obusinge bwikale na inywe inywena abali omu Kristo!

Nyowe Simooni Petero, omuheereza kandi omukwenda wa Yesu Kristo, nimpandiikira inywe abaahairwe okwikiriza kw'omuhendo okurukwingana n'okwaitu, okunyakuruga omu buhikiriire bwa Ruhanga waitu kandi Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo.
Omugisa n'obusinge bikanye omuli inywe nkooku murukugenda nimweyongera kumanya Ruhanga n'okumanya Yesu MUKAMA waitu.

MUKAMA waitu ogu, habw'amaani ge ag'obwaruhanga, akatuha ebirungi byona ebirukukwatana n'obwomeezi obuhyaka kandi n'okuheereza Ruhanga; yabituheera omu kumanya Ogu ayatwesire kubagana ha kitiinisa kye n'oburungi bwe.
Ebi nibyo yatuheeriremu endagaano ze ez'omuhendo kandi enkuru, nukwo habwazo musobole kukira obubi obw'omunsi obuleetwa okwegomba okubi, kandi mubagane ha bwaruhanga bwe.
Habw'obulyo obu, mwekambe nkooku murukusobora okwongera engeso nungi ha kwikiriza kwanyu, kandi ha ngeso nungi mwongereho okumanya,
ha kumanya mwongereho okwetanga, ha kwetanga mwongereho okuguma, ha kuguma mwongereho okutiina Ruhanga,
ha kutiina Ruhanga mwongereho okugirrangana embabazi nk'ab'oruganda, kandi ha kugirrangana embabazi nk'ab'oruganda mwongereho n'engonzi.
Kakuba muba n'ebirungi ebi byona kandi bikeeyongera kukanya, nibiija kubatambira obugara rundi okutaba b'omugaso bibaleetere kumanyira kimu MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo.
Weena ataina ebirungi nk'ebi, aba mufu w'amaiso, arora ebimuli haihi byonka, kandi aba ayeberwe nkooku yayogiibweho ebibi bye ebya ira.
Habweki bagenzi bange, mweyongere okwekamba nukwo mwoleke boona nkooku mwayesirwe kandi mwakomerwe. Kakuba mukora muti, timurukwija kugwa;
kandi muliheebwa obugabe bw'okutaaha omu bukama obutahwaho obwa MUKAMA kandi Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo.
Nahabweki ndaatahoga omutima obutoosa okubaijukya ebirungi ebi, noobu muraaba mubimanyire kandi mugumire omu mazima aga mwahairwe.
Ninteekereza nikihika okubeekambisa mbibaijukye ntakafiire,
habwokuba nyetegeriize ndi haihi kufa, MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo nkooku yammanyisize.
Ninyija kutaho omutima kubaijukyaga ebirungi binu akasumi koona, noobu ndiba mmazire kufa.
Obu twabamanyisize ha busobozi na ha kwija kwa MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo, tutakuraatire ebigambo eby'okwehangahanga, baitu tukaba baakaiso abaayeroliire ekitiinisa kye,
habwokuba Ruhanga Ise obu yamunyumiize namuha ekitiinisa, hakahulirwa iraka eryarugire omu Kitiinisa Kikuru kya Ruhanga, nirigamba liti: “Onu nuwe Mwana wange omugonzibwa ou nsiima muno.”
Iraka eri tukalihurra niriruga omwiguru, habwokuba tukaba tuli nawe ha rusozi orurukwera.

Nubwo ebyarangirwe abarangi byayongiire kugumibwa Ruhanga. Na inywe muraakora kurungi eki kukitaho omutima, abantu nkooku bata omutima ha taara erukwakira omu mwirima okuhika obwire kukya, n'enyunyuuzi ey'omu rukyakya ekaimuka omu mitima yanyu.
Ekikuru muno, mumanye nkooku hataroho burangi bw'omu Bihandiiko Ebirukwera omuntu obu asoborra habwe wenka;
ningira tihakabahoga oburangi omuntu obu arayatwire wenka, baitu abantu bagambisibwa Mwoyo Ahikiriire kwatura ebigambo ebyarugire hali Ruhanga.

Abarangi b'ebisuba nkooku baimukire omwihanga lya Isirairi, n'abeegesa b'ebisuba nukwo baliimuka bati omuli inywe, babataahyemu mpora mpora obuhakani oburukuhwerekereza, nangwa n'okwehakana MUKAMA wabu ayabacungwire. Baayereetera bonka okuhwerekerra okwa bwango.
Baingi balihondera engeso zaabo z'orwanju kandi bagayise abantu omuhanda gw'amazima.
Habw'omukoijo gwabo balibaihaho sente nibabeegesa ebigambo eby'obugobya. Omusango gukabasinga ira kandi tigukarugahoga. Ekifubiro kyabu kiikara nikibategereza.
Ruhanga ataganyire bamalaika obu baasiisire, baitu yabanaga omu kiinongoro ky'omurro, yababohera okuzimu omu mwirima kasira, baikaleyo okuhika obu balicwerwa omusango.
Kandi ataganyire abantu aba ira n'ensi yabo obu yaleesire okusandaara kw'amaizi omunsi y'abo abatatiina Ruhanga, baitu akajuna Noha ayateereriire abantu bahikirre.
Kandi Ruhanga akookya embuga za Sodomu na Gomora yazifoora iju, yaisingisa omusango ogw'okuhwerekerra, zibe kyokurorraho ky'abo abaliba batarukutiina Ruhanga.
Baitu yajuna Looti, omuntu omurungi ow'akaba atuntuziibwe muno orwanju rw'abantu ababi.
(Ningira omuntu omurungi ogu, ebi yarozire n'ebi yahuliire obu yabaikaramuga nibakora ebitahikire, byasaalizaga omutima gwe omurungi buli kiro.)
Ebi byona bitwoleka Ruhanga nkooku amanyire kujuna abamutiina, akabaiha omu mitalibano; amanyire n'okwikaza ababi ha kifubiro okuhika ha kiro eky'okucwerwa omusango;

kandi okukira muno abo abeemarra ha kwegomba okubi okw'emibiri yabo, kandi abarukugaya obusobozi bwa Kristo. Abeegesa b'ebisuba abo, bantu bahoole kandi ntahurra, tibatiina n'okujuma bamalaika ab'ekitiinisa,
kandi kunu bamalaika noobu baraaba nibabakiraho amaani n'obusobzi, tibabahyemera kandi tibabajunaana musango omumaiso ga MUKAMA.
Baitu abasiisi abo basisana ebisoro ebitaina magezi, ebisoro ebirukulemwa obuhangwa bwabyo, ebyazaalirwe kutegwa n'okwitwa. Bajuma ebintu ebi batarukumanya, bali b'okuhwerekerezibwa nk'ebisoro ebi,

basaalizibwa kubi habw'ebibi ebi baakozire. Eki barukweta kusemererwa, nugo amagenyi ga nyamusana. Abantu abo bitonyezi ebibi kandi bumogo omu kitebe kyanyu, nibeegondeza omu obubi bwabo, babagobeza noobu muba nimulya nabo.
Amaiso gaabo gaijwire obusiihani, tibaniha kibi. Batwaliriza abantu abaina emitima etagumire, kandi emitima yabo ekamanyirra omukoijo. Baana bakyenwa!
Bakaruga omu muhanda oguterekeriire, baahaba, baatoma omuhanda ogwa Balaamu, mutabani wa Behori, ayagondeze kwetungira ebisembo ebyarugire omu kukora ebitahikire,
baitu yacoomerwa habw'ekibi kye. Endogoyi etagamba, ekabaza n'iraka nk'ery'omuntu, yamaraho iraro ly'omurangi ogu.
Abantu abo tubeeta maziba agoomere kandi kiho ekirukutwarwa ekiyaga; baahuliirwe omwirima ogukwasire.
Obu baba nibabaza ebigambo eby'okwehaahire, batwaliriza omu kwegomba kw'omubiri abantu abakaruga kwecwaho abasiisi.
Babanihiza obusinge, kandi kunu bbo, bairu b'engeso mbi; ningira kyona ekisingura omuntu, aba mwiru wakyo.
Baitu obu bamara kutabuka obubi bw'ensi, habw'okumanya MUKAMA waitu kandi Omujuni Yesu Kristo, bakagaruka kubwetabamu kandi bukabasingura. Enyikara yabo eya hanyuma efooka mbi okukira ey'okubanza.
Kyakubaire kirungi kakuba abantu abo bataramanyire omuhanda ogw'obuhikiriire, okukira kumara kugumanya, bakagurugaho kandi baaleka ebiragiro ebirukwera ebi baahairwe.
Kibahikireho nk'orufumo rw'amazima orugamba ruti: “Embwa egarukira ebitanaki byayo”; kandi: “Empunu obu emara kwogebwa, egaruka kwekulingura omu saabu.”
Abagonzibwa, enu niyo bbaruha eya kabiri ei mbahandiikiire, kandi omu bbaruha ezi zombi nindengaho kubaijukya n'okusisiimura emitima yanyu ey'amananu.
Ninyenda mwijuke ebyarangirwe abarangi abahikiriire, hamu n'ebiragiro bya MUKAMA kandi Omujuni ebi mwagambiirwe abakwenda.
Eky'okubanza, kinu mukyetegereze: omu biro ebya ha mpero, abasekerezi baliija nibasekereza, kandi nibatwalirizibwa okwegomba kw'emibiri yabu,
nibagamba bati: “Akaraganiza kwija, hati araha? Okuruga baisenkuru itwe obu baafiire, ebintu byona biikaire nkooku bikaba biri ensi neehangwa.”
Kandi bakangira kimu Ekyahandiikirwe ekirukugamba ngu: Ira muno iguru likabaho habw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga; kandi ngu: N'ensi ekahangwa yaihwa omu maizi kandi yatebwaho kugabaganiza.
Ekyarugiremu, amaizi ago nugo gaasandaire gahwerekereza ensi ei ekaba eroho omu kasumi ako.
Kandi habw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga eki kyonyini, iguru n'ensi ebiroho hati byahuliirwe omurro, byahwiirwe okuhika ha kiro eky'okucwa omusango n'okuhwerekereza abantu abatatiina Ruhanga.
Abagonzibwa, muteebwa ekigambo kinu ekirukugamba ngu: Hali MUKAMA ekiro kimu kiri nk'emyaka rukumi, kandi emyaka rukumi eri nk'ekiro kimu.
