MUKAMA takerererwa okuhikiriza ebi yaraganiize, abantu abamu nkooku bateekereza; baitu inywe nabagumiisiriza, tarukugonza muntu n'omu ahwerekerre, baitu boona beegarukemu.
Kandi ekiro kya MUKAMA kiriija nk'omusuma. Obu nubwo iguru lirihwaho n'okuhinda kwingi, n'ebyalihangirwemu biryagibwa omurro, kandi ensi na byona ebigirumu birisiirira.
Ebintu ebi byona obu biraaba biri by'okuhwaho biti, inywe musemeriire kuba bantu ba mulingo ki? Musemeriire kuba bantu abarukwera kandi abarukutiina Ruhanga omu bwomeezi bwanyu,
mutegeriize kandi nimwegomba ekiro eky'okwija kwa Ruhanga; habwokuba ha kiro eki, iguru liricumikwa omurro lihwerekereziibwe, n'ebyalihangirwemu byagibwe omurro.
Baitu itwe nitutegereza iguru erihyaka n'ensi empyaka nambere abahikiriire baikara, nkooku yaraganiize.
Habweki abagonzibwa, ebi nkooku mubyetegeriize, mwekambe nukwo MUKAMA abasange mutaina kabara rundi kamogo, baitu mwina obusinge.
Kandi mumanye nkooku tulijunwa okugumiisiriza kwa MUKAMA waitu. Na Paulo, mugenzi waitu omugonzibwa, nukwo yabahandiikiire, naahondera amagezi aga yahairwe.

Eki nukwo yakisoboroire ati, nkooku akora omu bbaruha ze zoona. Omuli zo harumu ebintu ebimu ebitarukwetegerezibwa bwango, abasema kandi abaceke ebi bahingisa nkooku bahingisa Ebyahandiikirwe ebindi, bikabarugiramu okuhwerekerra.
Habweki inywe abagonzibwa, binu nkooku mwabimanya kara, mwerinde, mutaikara kuhabisibwa ensobi ez'abeemi abo, mukaruga nambere mugumiire.
Baitu mweyongere omu mbabazi n'omu kumanya MUKAMA waitu kandi Omujuni Yesu Kristo. Ekitiinisa kibe hali uwe, hati n'ebiro byona. Amiina.
Nitubahandiikira ha bya Kigambo ky'obwomeezi ow'akaba aroho kuruga okubanza, ou twahuliireho, ou twarozire n'amaiso gaitu, kandi ou twayetegeriize twamukwataho n'engaro zaitu.
Obwomeezi obu bukoolekwa, twaburora, tuli bakaiso babwo; kandi na inywe nitubarangirra obwomeezi obu obutahwaho, obukaba buli owa isiitwe, baitu hati butwolekerwe.
Eki twarozire kandi twahuliire, na inywe nikyo turukubarangirra, nukwo musobole kuteerana na itwe; kandi okuteerana kwaitu kuli omu Isiitwe hamu n'Omwana we Yesu Kristo.
Binu nitubibahandiikira nukwo musobole kusemerererwa kimu.
Ganu nugo makuru aga twahuliire Omwana we naagamba, kandi nugo turukubarangirra tuti: Ruhanga aba musana kandi omuli Uwe tiharumu mwirima naakake.
Kakuba tugamba tuti: Nituteerana nawe, kandi kunu nitugendera omu mwirima, buli nitubiiha ebisuba n'engeso zaitu tiziri z'amazima.
Baitu obu tuba nitugendera omu musana, Uwe nkooku ali musana, buli na itwe tuteeraine hamu, kandi esagama y'Omwana we Yesu etwogyaho buli kibi kyona.
Kakuba tugamba tuti: Titwina kibi, buli nitwebiiha itwenka kandi tuba tutali b'amazima.
Kakuba twatura ebibi byaitu, Ruhanga aba mwesigwa kandi mwinganiza, naija kubituganyira atwogyeho ebitahikire byona.
kakuba tugamba tuti: Titukasiisaga, tuba nitumufoora mubiihi w'ebisuba kandi n'ekigambo kye tikiri omuli itwe.
Baana bange, binu nimbibahandiikira nukwo muleke kukora ebibi; baitu omuntu weena obu araakora ekibi, amanye nkooku twina omutonganirizi anyakwikara na Isiitwe, nuwe Yesu Kristo omwinganiza.
Nuwe ndehwa y'ebibi byaitu, kandi tibiri byaitu byonka, baitu n'eby'ensi yoona.
Obu turaaba nitukwata ebiragiro bye, nikyo kirukugumya nkooku tumumanyire.
Ogu anyakugamba ati: “Mmumanyire”, kunu tarukukwata biragiro bye, mubiihi w'ebisuba, kandi taina mazima.
Baitu weena anyakuhondera ekigambo kye, ogu nuwe agonzakwo Ruhanga. aho nuho turukugumiza nkooku tuli omu Ruhanga:
anyakugamba ngu, aikara omu Ruhanga, asemeriire kuraba omu muhanda Kristo ogu yarabiremu.
Abagonzibwa, Ekiragiro ndukubahandiikira tikiri kihyaka, baitu kiragiro kikuru eki mukaba mwina kara. Ekiragiro eki ekikuru niyo nyegesa ei mwahuliire.
Baitu nabwo nimbahandiikira ekiragiro ekihyaka, kandi amazima gaakyo nigazookera omu Kristo n'omuli inywe, habwokuba omwirima nigugenda kuhwaho, kandi omusana ogw'amazima gutandikire kujwa.
Anyakugamba ngu, ali omu musana, kunu naanoba ow'oruganda, ogu aba akyali omu mwirima.
Anyakugonza mugenzi we, aikara omu musana, kandi tiharoho ekiramwesiitaza.
Baitu anyakunoba mugenzi we aba ali omu mwirima; kandi omwirima ogu nugwo agenderamu. Tamanya nambere arukugenda, habwokuba omwirima gumwisire amaiso.
Baana bange, nimbahandiikira habwokuba ebibi byanyu bibaganyirwe habwa Yesu.

Inywe baise-baana, nimbahandiikira habwokuba mumanyire Ogu ayabaireho okuruga kara. Inywe abasigazi, nimbahandiikira habwokuba musingwire Omubi ogu. Na inywe abaana, nimbahandiikira habwokuba Isiitwe nimumumanya.

Inywe baise-baana, nimbahandiikira habwokuba mumanyire Ogu ayabaireho okuruga kara. Na inywe abasigazi, nimbahandiikira habwokuba muli b'amaani, ekigambo kya Ruhanga kiikara omuli inywe, kandi musingwire Omubi.
Muleke kugonza ensi, noobu byakuba ebintu ebigirumu. Omuntu weena obu agonza ensi, buli aba atarukugonza Isiitwe.
Habwokuba byona ebirukusangwa omunsi tibiri bya Isiitwe baitu by'ensi, kandi nibyo binu: okwegomba okubi okw'omubiri, okwegomba okubi okw'amaiso, n'okwenyumiza ha itungo.
Ensi na byona ebyegombwamu bihwaho; baitu ogu anyakukora Ruhanga ebi agonza, aikaraho ebiro n'ebiro.
Baana bange, akasumi ak'okumalirra kahikire. Mukahurra ngu, arukurwanisa Kristo naija. Na hati abarukurwanisa Kristo baizire baingi; eki nikyo kirukutumanyisa akasumi kandi nkooku kali k'okumalirra.
Abantu abo bakaruga omuli itwe, kunu bakaba batali baitu, kakuba babaire baitu, bakwikaire na itwe; baitu bakaturugaho, nukwo kimanywe boona nkooku batali b'ekitebe kyaitu.
Baitu inywe mukakomwa Ahikiriire Ogu, kandi inywena nimumanya amazima.
Mu kubahandiikira, tindukugenderra kugamba ngu, timumanyire amazima, baitu nimugamanya, kandi nimumanya ebisuba nkooku bitasobora kuruga mu mazima.
Nooha arukubiiha ebisuba? Tinuwe ogu arukuhakana Yesu nkooku ali Kristo? Arukurwanisa Kristo, nuwe ogu arukuhakana Ruhanga na Ise mwana.
Busaho n'omu anyakwanga Mwana akaikiriza Ise. Ogu anyakwikiriza Mwana, buli aikiriza na Ise.
Eki mwahuliire okuruga omu kubanza, nikyo mugumye. Eki mwahuliire okuruga kara kakuba mukigumya, obu nubwo muliikara omu Mwana n'omuli Ise.
Kandi Kristo eki yaturaganiize nikyo kinu: obwomeezi obutahwaho.
Binu nimbibahandiikira kubahabura hali abo abarukugonza kubahabisa.

Baitu Mwoyo ogu, Kristo ou yabahaire, aikara omuli inywe, kandi timurukwetaaga muntu ondi weena ow'okubeegesa; habwokuba Mwoyo ou mwahairwe, abeegesa buli kintu. Okwegesa kwe kw'amazima, tikuli kw'ebisuba. Habweki mwikale omu Kristo, nkooku Mwoyo yabeegeseze.
Hati nu, baana bange, mwikale omuli uwe, nukwo obu alizooka tusangwe tugumire, tuleke kumwehinyaho tukwasirwe ensoni obu aliija.
Obu muraaba nimumanya Kristo nkooku ahikiriire, nimumanya weena anyakukora ebihikire nkooku azairwe Ruhanga.
Murole Isiitwe nkooku yatugondeze, itwe okwetwa baana ba Ruhanga, kandi nukwo tuli. Nikyo ensi etarukutumanyira, habwokuba nawe etamumanye.
Abagonzibwa, hati tuli baana ba Ruhanga; tikikamanyirwe nkooku tuliba, baitu nitumanya Kristo obu alizooka, nitwija kumusisana habwokuba tulimurora nkooku ali.
Kandi weena arukumwesiga, ayeyeza, Kristo nkooku yayeziibwe.
Weena anyakukora ekibi, aba n'omusango ogw'okucwa Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga, habwokuba kukora ekibi nukwo kucwa Ebiragiro.
Mumanyire Kristo eki yaiziriire, nukwo kwihaho ebibi, kandi omuli uwe tiharumu kibi.
Busaho n'omu anyakwikara omuli uwe akyakora ekibi; kandi weena anyakukora ekibi buli takamubonaga kandi takamumanyaga.
Baana bange, mutaikiriza muntu n'omu kubahabisa! Ogu anyakukora ebihikire, nawe ahikiriire nka Kristo oku ahikiriire.
Ogu anyakukora ekibi, aba wa sitaani; habwokuba Sitaani akakora ebibi kuruga kara. Ekyaleesire Omwana wa Ruhanga, nukwo kuhwerekereza byona sitaani ebi akora.
Busaho n'omu ayazairwe Ruhanga aikara naakora ebibi ningira obwomeezi bwa Ruhanga bwikara omuli uwe, kandi tasobora kukora ekibi habwokuba akazaarwa Ruhanga.
Aho abaana ba Ruhanga n'abaana ba Sitaani nuho bamanyirwa: Weena anyakukora ekitahikire, tali wa Ruhanga kandi ogu atagonza mugenzi we, nawe tali wa Ruhanga.
Ekigambo eki mwahuliire okuruga kara nikyo kinu: Tugonzangane.
Tuleke kusisana Kaini ow'akaba ali w'Omubi, kandi yaita mugenzi we. Akamwitira ki? Habwokuba ebikorwa bye bikaba biri bibi, baitu eby' owanyina bikaba biri birungi.
Bagenzi bange, kitabahuniriza okurora ensi neebanoba.
Itwe tumanyire nkooku twarugire omu rufu, twataaha omu bwomeezi, habwokuba nitugonza bagenzi baitu. Ogu atagira ngonzi, aikara afiire.
Weena anyakunoba mugenzi we aba mwisi, kandi nimumanya nkooku hataroho mwisi anyakwina obwomeezi obutahwaho omuli uwe.
Aho nuho turukumanyira engonzi nkooku ziri, habwokuba Kristo akahayo obwomeezi bwe habwaitu; na itwe kituhikiriire kuhayo obwomeezi bwaitu habwa bagenzi baitu.
Kakuba omuntu aba atungire ebintu by'ensi, kandi akarora mugenzi we aina eki arukwetaaga, akanga kumugirra embabazi, ogu asobora ata kugira ngu, naagonza Ruhanga?
Baana bange, okugonza kwaitu kuleke kuba kw'akalimi rundi kwa ha minwa, baitu kuzooke omu bikorwa n'omu mazima.
Aho nuho turaamanyira nkooku tuli b'amazima, kandi emitima yaitu nkooku eriteekana omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
Emitima yaitu noobu etujunaana eta, baitu twikale nitumanya Ruhanga nkooku ali mukuru kukira omutima ebi gurukutujunaana, kandi naamanya ebintu byona.
Abagonzibwa, kakuba emitima yaitu etatucwera musango, buli titwina eky'okutiina omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
Kyona eki tumusaba akituha, habwokuba tukwata ebiragiro bye kandi tukora ebi asiima.
Kinu nikyo kiragiro kye ekigamba kiti: Kituhikiriire okwikiriza Omwana we Yesu Kristo kandi na itwe okugonzangana, Kristo nkooku yaturagiire.
Boona abakwata Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga baikara omuli Kristo nawe aikara omuli bo. Mwoyo ou yatuhaire, nuwe atumanyisa Kristo nkooku aikara omuli itwe.
Abagonzibwa, muleke kwikiriza buli mwoyo, baitu emyoyo mugyetegereze, nukwo mumanye obu eraaba neeruga hali Ruhanga; habwokuba abarangi baingi ab'ebisuba bararangire omunsi.
Aho nuho muraamanyira Mwoyo wa Ruhanga: Weena arukurangirra Yesu Kristo nkooku yazairwe omu mubiri, buli aina omwoyo oguruga hali Ruhanga.
Baitu weena atarukurangirra Yesu, buli taina mwoyo oguruga hali Ruhanga. Ogu nugwo mwoyo gw'ogu arukurwanisa Kristo, ou mwahuliireho nkooku arukwija, kandi ahikire ira omunsi.
Baana bange, inywe muli ba Ruhanga, kandi abarangi abo ab'ebisuba, mubasingwire; habwokuba Mwoyo anyakuli omuli inywe nuwe mukuru okukira oli ayaizire omunsi kurwanisa Kristo.
Bbo b'ensi enu, habwokuba ebi barukugamba by'ensi, kandi ensi ebahuliriza.
Itwe tuli ba Ruhanga. Weena arukumanya Ruhanga atuhuliriza, kandi atali wa Ruhanga tatuhuliriza. aho nuho tumanyira omwoyo ogw'amazima n'omwoyo ogurukuhabisa.
Abagonzibwa, tugonzangane; habwokuba engonzi ziruga hali Ruhanga. Ogu anyakwina engonzi, aba azairwe Ruhanga kandi amanyire Ruhanga.
Ogu ataina ngonzi tamanya Ruhanga, habwokuba Ruhanga nuwe ngonzi.
Kinu nikyo kyayolekere engonzi za Ruhanga hali itwe: akatuma omunsi Omwana we omu wenka, nukwo atwomeeze.
Kandi engonzi ezindukugamba nizo zinu: tukuli kugira ngu niitwe twagondeze Ruhanga, baitu nuwe yatugondeze, nukwo kutuma Omwana we abe ndehwa y'ebibi byaitu.
Abagonzibwa, Ruhanga obu araaba yatugondeze ati, na itwe kituhikiriire kugonzangana.
Tiharoho muntu araboine Ruhanga; baitu obu tuba nitugonzangana, Ruhanga aikara omuli itwe, kandi engonzi ze zihikirirra kimu omuli itwe.
Aho nuho tumanyira nkooku twikara omu Ruhanga, nawe nkooku aikara omuli itwe habwokuba akatuha Mwoyo we wonyini.
Tukarora kandi twagumya nkooku Isiitwe yatumire Omwana we kuba Mujuni w'ensi.
Weena anyakwatura Yesu nkooku ali Mwana wa Ruhanga, Ruhanga aikara omuli uwe, nawe aikara omu Ruhanga.
Nahabweki, nitumanya kandi nitwikiriza Ruhanga nkooku atugonza. Ruhanga nuwe ngonzi, kandi ogu anyakwikara omu ngonzi, aikara omu Ruhanga na Ruhanga aikara omuli uwe.
Ekirukwoleka engonzi nkooku ihikirizibwa omuli itwe nukwo kwikara twina obwesige ha kiro ky'okucwerwa omusango, habwokuba enyikara yaitu omunsi munu, niyo emu n'eya Kristo.
Engonzi tiigira butiini. Engonzi z'amazima ibinga obutiini bwona habwokuba anyakutiina, aba naatiina ekifubiro; nukwo kugamba, aba ataina ngonzi ezihikire.
Itwe tugonza habwokuba Ruhanga nuwe yabandize kutugonza.
Kakuba habaho arukugamba ati: “Ningonza Ruhanga”, kandi kunu naanoba mugenzi we, ogu mubiihi w'ebisuba; habwokuba atarukugonza mugenzi we ou arukurora, tasobora kugonza Ruhanga ou atakaroraga.
Kandi kinu nikyo kiragiro Kristo eki yatuhaire ekigamba kiti: Ogu anyakugonza Ruhanga, agonzeege na mugenzi we.
Buli muntu anyakwikiriza Yesu nkooku ali Kristo, aba mwana wa Ruhanga; kandi weena anyakugonza Isemwana, agonza n'omwana we.
Kinu nikyo tumanyiraho nkooku tugonza abaana ba Ruhanga: obu tuba nitugonza Ruhanga kandi nitukwata ebiragiro bye.
Habwokuba okugonza Ruhanga nukwo kukwata ebiragiro bye. Kandi ebiragiro bye tibirukulemeera.
Weena anyakuzairwe Ruhanga asingura ensi, kandi ekisingura ensi nukwo okwikiriza kwaitu.
Baitu anyakusingura ensi nooha? Tinuwe ogu anyakwikiriza Yesu nkooku ali Mwana wa Ruhanga?
Yesu Kristo akaija naaraba omu maizi ag'okubatizibwa n'omu sagama y'okufa kwe. Ataije omu maizi gonka, baitu akaija omu maizi n'omu sagama.
Kandi Mwoyo nuwe kaiso w'okukigumya, habwokuba Mwoyo nuwe mazima.
Haroho obwakaiso busatu: Mwoyo, amaizi, n'esagama; kandi ebisatu ebi biikirraniza.
Obu turaaba nitwikiriza obwakaiso bwa bantu, obwakaiso bwa Ruhanga nibukiraho obukuru; kandi obwakaiso bwa Ruhanga nubwo bunu: akajuliirra Omwana we.
Weena anyakwikiriza Omwana wa Ruhanga, aba aina obwakaiso omu mutima gwe. Ogu atarukwikiriza, afoora Ruhanga mubiihi w'ebisuba, habwokuba taikiriza bwakaiso Ruhanga obu yahaire ha Mwana we.
Kandi obwakaiso nubwo bunu: Ruhanga akatuha obwomeezi obutahwaho, kandi obwomeezi obu buli omu Mwana we.
Anyakwina Mwana buli aina obwomeezi; baitu ataina Mwana wa Ruhanga taina n'obwomeezi obu.
Binu nimbihandiikira inywe abarukwikiriza Omwana wa Ruhanga, nukwo mumanye nkooku mwina obwomeezi obutahwaho.
Kandi bunu nubwo bwesige obu tumwinaho: kakuba tusaba ekintu kyona nkooku asiima, atuhurra.
Kandi obu turaaba nitumanya nkooku atuhurra omu kyona eki tumusaba, nitumanya nkooku tuli b'okutunga ebi tumusabire.

Kakuba omuntu weena arora mugenzi we naakora ekibi ekitarukurugwamu orufu, amusabire, nukwo Ruhanga amuhe obwomeezi. Eki nikikwata hali abo abatakora kibi ekirukurugwamu rufu. Haroho ekibi ekirukwita; tindukugamba eki nikyo omuntu asemeriire kusaba Ruhanga akimujune.
Okusobya kwona kiba kibi, baitu haroho ekibi ekitali ky'okwita.
Tumanyire weena ayazairwe Ruhanga nkooku atakyakora kibi; baitu Kristo, Omwana wa Ruhanga, amulinda kandi Omubi tasobora kumukwataho.
Tumanyire nkooku tuli ba Ruhanga, kandi ensi yoona nkooku erukulemwa Omubi.

Kandi nitumanya Omwana wa Ruhanga nkooku yaizire, yatuha okwetegereza nukwo tumanye Ruhanga owamazima; kandi ow'amazima; Ogu nuwe twikaramu habwokuba tuli omu Mwana we Yesu Kristo. Ogu nuwe Ruhanga ow'amazima, kandi nuwe bwomeezi obutahwaho.
Baana bange, mwerinde embandwa.
Nyowe omukuru, nindamukya Omugole ayakomerwe Ruhanga, hamu n'abaana be aba ngonza omu mazima. Tali nyowe nyenka arukubagonza, baitu na boona abamanyire amazima.
Ninkuramukya habw'amazima agali omuli itwe kandi agalitwikaramu ebiro byona:
Emigisa, embabazi, n'obusinge ebiruga hali Ruhanga Isiitwe na hali Yesu Kristo Omwana we, biikalege na itwe omu mazima n'omu ngonzi.
Nkasemererwa muno okurora abamu ha baana baawe nibahondera amazima nkooku twaragiirwe Ruhanga Isiitwe.
Hati nu, ninkwesengereza Mugole wange, ntali nk'arukukuhandiikira ekiragiro ekihyaka, baitu eki kyonyini eki twahuliire okuruga kara ekirukugamba ngu, tugonzangane.
Kandi okugonza nukwo kunu: itwe okukwata ebiragiro bya Ruhanga. Kinu nikyo ekiragiro eki mwahuliire okuruga omu kubanza, ekirukugamba kiti: Mwikale mwina engonzi.
Abarukubiihabiiha abantu bakanyire omunsi, nubo abo abatarukwikiriza Kristo nkooku yafookere muntu. Weena anyakugamba ati, nuwe mubiihi w'ebisuba kandi munyanzigwa wa Kristo.
Mwerinde, mutaikara kufeerwa ebi mwakoliire, baitu mutunge empeera enyakuhikire.
Omuntu weena anyakwekiza ha nyegesa ya Kristo, taba wa Ruhanga; kandi ogu anyakugumira ha nyegesa ye, aina bombi: Isiitwe na Mwana.
Kakuba omuntu aija nambere muli atarukwegesa nyegesa enu, mutalimutaahya omunju, n'okumuramukya mutalimuramukya.
Ogu anyakumuramukya buli ateeraine nawe omu bikorwa bye ebibi.
Noobu ndaba nyina bingi eby'okubahandiikira, tindukwenda kukozesa orupapura na bwino, baitu ninihira kwija kubarora n'okubaza na inywe niturorangana, nukwo okusemererwa kwaitu kuhikirre.
Abaana b'owanyoko ayakomerwe Ruhanga, nibakuramukya.
Nyowe omukuru, ninkuhandiikira iwe Gaayo, enganzi yange, ou ngonza omu mazima.
Omugonzibwa, ninsaba byona bikugendere kurungi, kandi obe mwomeezi omu mubiri nkooku oli kurungi omu mwoyo.
Nkasemererwa muno abamu ha bagenzi baitu obu baizire bammanyisa nkooku orukwekambira amazima kandi noogahondera kwo.
Busaho ekisobora kundeetera omuhimbo okukira kuhurra abaana bange nkooku barukuhondera amazima.
Omugonzibwa, obu okoonyera ab'oruganda, munomuno abagenyi abatamanyirwe, obu nookora ekintu eky'obwesigwa.
Kandi abo nubo abaamanyisize ekitebe kyona ky'abaikiriza ha ngonzi zawe. Kyakubaire kirungi kwongera kubaboherra omu rugendo rwabo omu mulingo ogusiimwa Ruhanga ou oheereza.
Bakaimukya orugendo oru habwa Kristo kandi bataikirize kutwara akantu koona abakafiiri aka bakaba nibagonza kubaha.
Habweki tusemeriire kugumya abantu nk'abo, nukwo tusobole kubakoonyera ha mulimo ogw'okurarangya amazima.
Nyowe nyina ebi naahandikiire ekitebe ky'abaikiriza, baitu Diyoterefe anyakugonza kwebembera boona, taikiriza ebi ndagira.

Habweki obu ndiija, ndibaijukya ebi akora nantebya kubi. Tagarukira hali eki kyonka, baitu ayanga n'okujwahukirra ab'oruganda, nangwa naatanga n'abo abagonza kubajwahukirra, kandi ababinga omu kitebe ky'abaikiriza.
Omugonzibwa, otakuratira abarukukora ebibi, baitu okuratire abarukukora ebirungi. Ogu anyakukora ebirungi, nuwe wa Ruhanga; kandi anyakukora ebibi, takaroraga Ruhanga.
Demeetiriyo, abantu boona bamubazaaho kurungi, kandi n'amazima nago nigamuheera obwakaiso. Na nyowe ninkigumya, kandi mumanyire obwakaiso bwange nkooku buli bw'amazima.
Mbaire nyina bingi eby'okubahandiikira, baitu tindukwenda kubihandiikisa akacumu na bwino.
Ninihira kubarora bwango, nukwo tubaze niturorangana.
Obusinge bube na iwe. Banywani baitu nibakuramukya. Ondamukize banywani baitu, buli omu.
Nyowe Yuda, omuheereza wa Yesu Kristo kandi mugenzi wa Yakobbo, nimpandiikira abo abaayesirwe, abagonzibwa omu Ruhanga Isiitwe, kandi abaalinzirwe habwa Yesu Kristo:
Embabazi, obusinge, n'engonzi byeyongere omuli inywe.

Abagonzibwa, habw'ekihika kingi eki mbaire nakyo eky'okubahandiikira ebirukukwata ha kujunwa kwaitu, ndozire nikyetaagwa muno okubahandiikira nimbateererra: murwanirre enyikiriza abantu ba Ruhanga ei baahairwe omurundi gumu, kyahwa.

Habwokuba haroho abantu abamu abaatutaahiremu tutarukumanya. Nubo abo abaarangirweho ira nkooku balisingwa omusango. Bali bantu abatatiina Ruhanga, abahindura embabazi za Ruhanga waitu nibaifoora byekwaso by'okukora eby'obusiihani, baayanga Omulemi waitu omu wenka kandi MUKAMA Yesu Kristo.
Ebi noobu muraaba mwabimanyire ira, baitu hati ningonza kubaijukya nkooku MUKAMA, ayajunire abantu be naabaiha omunsi Misiri, akongera yahwerekereza abo abataramwikiriize.

Na bamalaika abataralinzire rukarra rw'obukuru bwabo bakaruga omu kiikaro kyabo, akabaikaza omu mwirima kasira, baboherwe omu njegere ezi batalirugamu okuhika ha kiro kikuru eky'okucwererwaho omusango;
nk'ab'omu Sodomu na Gomora n'embuga ezindi ezaaherraineho oku baayetabwire omu busiihani n'omu rwanju orutali rw'obuhangwa, bakafubirwa omu murro ogutahwaho, babe kyokurorraho kyaitu.
Omu mulingo nugwo gumu, abantu abo basiisa emibiri yabu, nibatwalirizibwa ebirooto byabo, bagaya obusobozi bwa Ruhanga kandi bajuma ab'ekitiinisa ab'omu iguru.

Noobwakubaire Mikairi, omukuru wa baamalaika, obu akaba naahakaniza Sitaani, akamuteeza empaka ha by'omubiri gwa Musa, atagonze kumucwera omusango naamugaya, baitu akamugambira ati: “Leka MUKAMA wenka nuwe akuhane.”
Baitu abantu banu bagaya kyona eki batarukwetegereza, kandi batwalirizibwa ebintu ebi bamanyire habw'obuhangwa bwabo nk'enyamaiswa ezitaina magezi, kandi nibyo bibahwerekereza.
Balikibona! Habwokuba bakwasire omuhanda gwa Kaini, beenaga omu nsobi eya Balaamu habw'okwetungira amagoba, kandi bahwerekererra omu bwemi bwa Koora.

Nubo abo abasiisa amagenyi ganyu ag'engonzi habwokuba bakora ebintu bya buli mulingo bataina nsoni, nibeefaaho bonka. Bali nk'ebicu ebitarumu njura, ebirukutwarwa omuyaga; rundi nk'emiti etaana bijuma omu kasumi kaabyo, eyafiire yaleka, kandi yasindukira kimu.
Bali nk'ebigonzi by'enyanja erukusikuka, nibarugwamu esaabu n'orwondo. Bali nk'enyunyuuzi ezirukwenjeera, abaayahuliirwe okwikara omu mwirima kasira ebiro byona.
Abo nubo Enoka ow'omu bwijukuru bwa musanju okuruga h'Adamu yarangireho naagamba ati: “Kinu mukyetegereze, MUKAMA naija n'abahikiriire be obuhumbe n'obuhumbe
kucwera abantu boona omusango, n'okugusingisa abo abatatiina Ruhanga habw'ebibi byona ebi baamukozire omu mulingo mubi, na habw'ebigambo ebibi abasiisi abatatiina Ruhanga ebi baamubalizeeho.”
Abo nubo ntontorromi, bahyemi, abalemwa okwegomba kwabo okubi, abeehaahira n'ebigambo bingi, bantu abanwekanweka abandi, nukwo bagire eki babaihaho.
Baitu inywe abagonzibwa, kibahikiriire kwijuka abakwenda ba MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo ebi baarangire.
Bakabagambira bati: “Omu biro bya ha mpero halibaho abasekerezi abatatiina Ruhanga, abalemwa okwegomba kwabu okubi.”
Abo nubo abaleetereza okwebaganizaamu, bantu b'ensi abataina Mwoyo wa Ruhanga.
Baitu inywe, abagonzibwa, mugumire kandi mweyongere ha nyikiriza yanyu erukwera muno; musabirege omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire.
Mwikale omu ngonzi za Ruhanga, mutegereze obwomeezi obutahwaho MUKAMA waitu Yesu Kristo obu alibaha habw'embabazi ze.
Abo abarukugurukyagurukya, mubahwitule;
abandi mubajune, nimubasahura omu murro; n'abandi mubagirre embabazi, baitu nimwegendereza, nangwa munobe n'ekijwaro ekisiisirwe ebibi byabo eby'orwanju.
Ekitiinisa, obukuru, obulemi n'obusobozi bibe hali Ogu arukusobora kubalinda mutagwa, akabahikya omu maiso g'ekitiinisa kye mutaina kamogo kandi mukyanganukire.
Ebi byona biheebwe Ruhanga omu wenka anyakutujuna naaraba omu Yesu Kristo MUKAMA waitu ayabaireho ira lyona, anyakuroho hati, kandi ow'alibaho ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
Kunu nukwo okusuukururwa Ruhanga oku yahaire Yesu Kristo kwoleka abaheereza be, bamanye ebikaba nibiija kubaho bwango. Binu akabimanyisa naatuma malaika hali omuheereza we Yohaana,
ayahandiikire byona ebi yaboine naajurra ebigambo bya Ruhanga n'obwakaiso bwa Yesu.
W'omugisa anyakusoma ebigambo binu eby'okuranga, kandi b'omugisa abo abanyakuhurra n'abanyakukwata ebihandiikirwe omu kitabu kinu; habwokuba akasumi kali haihi kuhika.

Nyowe Yohaana nimpandiikira ebitebe musanju eby'abaikiriza ebiri omu Asiya: Nimbagondeza omugisa n'obusinge ebinyakuruga hali Ogu anyakubaho, ayabaireho, kandi ow'okwija, n'ebinyakuruga hali emyoyo musanju enyakwikara omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama bwe,
kandi ebinyakuruga hali Yesu Kristo kaiso omwesigwa ayabandize kuhumbuuka omu bafu, kandi anyakulema abakama b'ensi. Ogu anyakutugonza, ayatwihire omu bibi byaitu naatucunguza esagama ye,
yatufoora bukama kandi banyakatagara ba Ruhanga Ise, aheebwe ekitiinisa n'obusobozi ebiro n'ebiro. Amiina.
Ngugwo naizira omu bicu, kandi buli riiso lirimurora, n'abo abaamucumisire balimurora; kandi enganda zoona ez'omunsi zirimuterra empamo. Egokwo. Amiina.
Mukama Ruhanga agamba ati: “Ninyowe Ntandiko, ninyowe Mpeero.” Anyakubaho, ayabaireho, kandi ow'okwija, Kamara-byona.

Nyowe Yohaana mwene wanyu, anyakubagana na inywe omu Yesu: emihito n'okugumiisiriza ebitutungisa obukama, nkaba ndi omu kizinga ekirukwetwa Patimo, nkwatirweyo habw'okurangirra ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'okumanyisa abantu ebya Yesu.
Ha kiro kya Mukama, obu natemberwe Mwoyo, enyuma yange nahurra iraka likooto nk'ery'engwara,
nirigamba liti: “Ebi orukurora bihandiike omu kitabu, obitwekere ebitebe musanju by'abaikiriza abali: Efeeso, Sumiruna, Perugamo, Tiyatiira, Saadisi, Filadelufiya na Layodikeeya.”
Nubwo nakubuutukire kurora ow'akaba naabaza na nyowe. Obu nakubuutukire, narora ebikondo musanju eby'etaara, bya zaabbu;
hagati y'ebikondo ebi nkarora omu arukusisana Omwana w'omuntu, ajwaire ekanzu eraihire, ayeteegere omu kifuba omweko gwa zaabbu;
omutwe gwe n'isoke rye bikaba nibyera ti nk'ebyoya by'entaama njeru, nibyera nk'ebirika. Amaiso ge gakaba nigaaka nk'endimi z'omurro;
ebigere bye bikaba nibisisana omulinga oguzigwire, ogusemereziibwe omu kyoto; kandi iraka lye likaba nirisisana nk'iraka ery'amaizi amaingi agarukuhirra;
omu mukono gwe ogw'obulyo akaba akwasire enyunyuuzi musanju, omu kanwa ke haarugamu empirima etoire ey'amoogi abiri, kandi amaiso ge gakaba nigangasana nk'izooba erirukujwa n'amaani.
Obu namurozire, nagwa ha bigere bye nasisana nk'anyakufiire. Baitu yantaho omukono gwe gw'obulyo, naampuumuza ati: “Otatiina, ninyowe ow'okubanza, owa ha mpero,
kandi hati nyomiire. Nkafa, baitu okuruga hati ndaikaraga ndi mwomeezi ebiro byona, kandi nyina ebisumuruzo by'Orufu n'eby'Okuzimu.
Handiika ebi orukurora, ebinyakuroho hati kandi ebiribaho hanyuma.

Amakuru agaserekerwe ag'enyunyuuzi musanju ezi orozire omu mukono gwange ogw'obulyo, n'ag'ebikondo musanju eby'etaara eza zaabbu nugo ganu: enyunyuuzi musanju imanyisa bamalaika ab'ebitebe musanju by'abaikiriza, kandi ebikondo musanju eby'etaara bimanyisa ebitebe ebi byonyini.”

“Handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ab'Efeeso noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'Ogu anyakukwasire enyunyuuzi musanju omu mukono gwe gw'obulyo, kandi anyakugendera hagati y'ebikondo musanju ebya zaabbu. Naagira ati:

“Nyowe mmanyire ebikorwa byawe, okwekamba kwawe, n'okugumiisiriza kwawe; kandi mmanyire nkooku otasobora kugumiisiriza ababi, baitu okutegereza abo abanyakweyeta bakwenda kunu tibalibo kwo, wasanga bali b'ebisuba.
Mmanyire nkooku orukugumiisiriza muno, nooyemera bingi habwange kandi tojwaha.
Baitu eki ndukukujunaana nkinu: tokyaina engonzi ezi okaba oinazo okubanza.
Nukwo nu, ijuka ha warugiriire kugwa; oyegarukemu, okole ebi wakoraga okubanza. Obu otaakole oti, ndikuhikaho, ekikondo ky'etaara yawe nkiihe omu kiikaro kyakyo, rundi buli oyegarukiremu.
Ekirungi eki ndukukusiimaho nkinu: noonoba ebikorwa by'ekitebe ky'Abanikola
Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe ky'abaikiriza. Anyakusingura ndimwikiriza kulya ha muti ogw'obwomeezi ogunyakuli omunsi ya Ruhanga ey'okuhiirwa.”
“Kandi handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Sumiruna noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'ow'okubanza kandi owa ha mpero, ayafiire kandi yahumbuuka. Naagira ati:
“Mmanyire omuhito gwawe n'obunaku bwawe (kunu oli muguuda); kandi mmanyire ebihangirro by'abo abeeyeta Bayudaaya, kunu tibalibo kwo, baitu isorrokaniro lya Sitaani.

Otatiina ebi orukwija kubonabona. Hurra nu, Omwohi amaliriire kuta omu nkomo abamu omuli inywe, nukwo mulengesibwe. Nimwija kumara ebiro ikumi nimubonesibwa. Mugume okuhika ha kufa, nubwo na nyowe ndibaha ekondo ey'obwomeezi.
Ogu anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe by'abaikiriza. Anyakusingura, okufa okwa kabiri tikwina eki kulimukoraho.”
“Kandi handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Perugamo noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'Ogu anyakwina empirima enyakutoire ey'amoogi abiri. Naagira ati:

“Mmanyire h'oikara, oku nuho hali ekitebe eky'obukama bwa Sitaani; baitu iwe okyagumiire ha ibara lyange kandi oteehooge nkooku orukunyikiriza, noobu haakubaire omu biro by'Antipa, kaiso wange omwesigwa, ayaitiirwe owaanyu oku nambere Sitaani aikara.

Baitu nyina ebigambo bike ebi ndukubajunaana: oku mwinayo abantu abamu abarukwikiriza enyegesa za Balaamu ayahabwire Balaki kwesiitaaza abaana ba Isirairi, nukwo balye ebyokulya ebihongiirwe abacwezi kandi beemarre ha busiihani.
Kandi mwina n'abamu abarukuhondera enyegesa ez'Abanikola.
Hati nu mwegarukemu. Kakuba muteegarukamu, ninyija kubahikaho bwango, abo boona mbarwanise n'empirima ey'akanwa kange.

“Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe by'abaikiriza. Anyakusingura, ndimuha byokulya ebiserekerwe, niyo maanu; kandi ndimuha ibaale erirukwera erihandiikirweho ibara erihyaka eritamanyirwe muntu n'omu, okwihaho ogu anyakulirukirwe.”

“Handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Tiyatiira noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'Omwana wa Ruhanga, anyakwina amaiso agarukwaka nk'endimi z'omurro, kandi ebigere ebirukusisana omulinga oguzigwire. Naagira ati:
“Mmanyire ebikorwa byawe, engonzi zawe, okwikiriza kwawe, obuheereza n'okugumiisiriza kwawe; kandi nimmanya ebikorwa ebi orukukora hati nkooku birukukira ebyabandize.
Baitu kinu nikyo ndukukujunaana: n'okyaikiriza omukazi ogu Yezabeeli, arukweyeta murangikati, nuwe ahabisa abaheereza bange kandi naabeegesa kwemarra ha busiihani n'okulya ebihongiirwe embandwa.
Nkamuha akasumi ak'okwegarukamu, baitu akanga kuleka obusiihani bwe.
Hati nu ninyija kumuleetera endwara emuzingike, kandi abo abasiihana nawe ndibaleetera emihito nyingi, rundi buli balekere ebi arukukora;
kandi n'abaana be ndibaita. Nukwo ebitebe byona eby'abaikiriza bimanye nkooku ali nyowe arukwetegereza ebiteekerezo n'emitima; kandi buli omu omuli inywe ndimuha ebisemeriire ebikorwa bye.
“Baitu abandi abasigaireho, inywe abali Tiyatiira abatarukuhondera nyegesa egi, abatakeegere abandi eri beeta ifubo lya Sitaani, nyowe nimbagambira nti: Tindukwija kubongeraho bulemeezi obundi.
Kyonka mugumize kimu eki mwinakyo okuhika obu ndiija.
Ow'aliba asingwire kandi ahikiriize ebi ndukwenda okuhika ha mpero, ndimuha obusobozi obw'okulema amahanga,
nyowe nkooku naabuhairwe Isenyowe. Aligalemesa omwigo ogw'ekyoma, agasasangule nk'omubumbi oku asasangura ebinaga.
Kandi ndimuha enyunyuuzi ey'omu rukyakya (nuwe Kristo).
Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe by'abaikiriza.”

“Handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Saadisi noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'Ogu anyakwina emyoyo musanju eya Ruhanga n'enyunyuuzi musanju. Naagira ati: “Mmanyire ebikorwa byawe, oyetwa mwomeezi kandi kunu ofiire!
Sisiimuka, ogumye ebi okyasigaize, biri haihi kuhwaho; habwokuba nindora ebikorwa byawe nkooku bitarukuhika omu maiso ga Ruhanga wange.
Hati nu oijuke ebi wahairwe n'ebi wahuliire; nibyo ogumye, kandi oyegarukemu. Obu otasisiimuke ndiija nk'omusuma, kandi tolimanya kasumi aka ndikuhikiraho.
Omu Saadisi okyainamu abake abatarasiisire bijwaro byabo. Baligenda na nyowe bajwaire ebirukwera, habwokuba bakisemeriire.

Ogu anyakusingura, nukwo alijwara ati ebijwaro ebirukwera, kandi ibara lye tindiriragaza omu kitabu eky'obwomeezi; baitu ndimuranga omumaiso ga Isenyowe n'ag'obwomeezi; baitu ndimuranga omumaiso ga Isenyowe n'ag'abamalaika be.
Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe eby'abaikiriza.”

“Handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Filadelufiya noogamba oti: Binu nibyo bigambo by'Ogu Ahikiriire, ow'amazima kandi anyakwina ekisumuruzo kya Daudi. Nuwe ogu anyakukingura hatarukubaho n'omu anyakukinga; kandi anyakukinga hatarukubaho n'omu anyakukingura. Naagira ati:
“Mmanyire ebikorwa byawe. Dora ntaire omu maiso gaawe orwigi orukingwirwe, orutasobora kukingwa muntu n'omu. mmanyire nkooku oina amaani make, baitu nabwo okakwata ekigambo kyange kandi otanyehooge.
Ab'omu isorrokaniro lya Sitaani, abeeyeta Bayudaaya kunu tibalibo kwo, nibabiiha kwonka--ndabahambiriza baije bagwe ha bigere byawe, nukwo bamanye nkooku nakugondeze.
Habwokuba okakwata ekigambo kyange ekirukuhabura kiti: Gumiisiriza; nikyo na nyowe ndikulindira omu kasumi ak'okwohebwa okuliizira ensi yoona, okulenga abo abarukwikara omunsi.
Ninyija bwango; gumiza kimu eki oinakyo, tihaikara kubaho akunyagaho ekondo yawe.

Ogu anyakusingura, ndimufoora nyomyo omunju ya Ruhanga wange, taligirugamu naakake. Ndimuhandiikaho ibara lya Ruhanga wange n'ibara ly'orubuga rwa Ruhanga wange nurwo Yerusaalemu oruhyaka orusirimuka niruruga omw'iguru mba Ruhanga wange Mmuhandiikeho n'ibara lyange erihyaka.
Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe eby'abaikiriza.”

“Handiikira malaika ow'ekitebe eky'abaikiriza ekiri Laodikeya noogamba oti: ‘Binu nibyo bigambo by'Ogu arukwetwa “Kibekwo”, kaiso omwesigwa kandi ow'amazima, endugirro ya byona Ruhanga ebi yahangire. Naagira ati:
“‘Mmanyire ebikorwa byawe: torukufuka kandi torukwokya. Haakire waakufukire rundi waakwokeze!
Baitu habw'okusangwa oli kooyakooya, torukufuka kandi torukwokya, ninyija kukutanaka, onduge omu kanwa!
Ningira niiwe arukugamba oti: Ndi muguuda, ebintu nibinyizira kurungi, tinyina eki ndukwetaaga; kandi kunu torukumanya nkooku oli munaku, w'okuganyirwa, museege, kihimbaara, kandi noogenda busa.

Nahabweki ninkuhabura: onguleho zaabbu enyakusemeziibwe omurro, nukwo obe muguuda. Onguleho n'ebijwaro ebirukwera, bikuswekerre, bikwiheho ensoni ez'okurorwa noogenda busa; kandi onguleho omubazi ogw'okuta omumaiso, nukwo orole.
Abo aba ngonza, mbahana kandi mbafubira; nahabweki wekambe kandi oyegarukemu.
Hurra nu, nyemeriire ha rwigi ninyeranga; omuntu weena obu ahurra iraka lyange akakingura orwigi, ninyija kutaahamu, mmuhikeho, nukwo tulye hamu.
Ogu anyakusingura, ndimwikiriza aikarre na nyowe ha kitebe kyange eky'obukama, nka nyowe oku nasingwire, naikarra na Isenyowe ha kitebe kye eky'obukama.
Anyakwina okutu, ahurre Mwoyo ebi arukugambira ebitebe eby'abaikiriza.’”

Ebi obu byahoire, nkaimukya amaiso narora orwigi rukingwirwe omu iguru! Kandi iraka nabandize kuhurra, nirigamba nk'ery'engwara, lyangambira liti: “Temba, oije hanu, nkwoleke ebiraabaho, binu bimazire kurugaho.”
Ahonaaho naijwaho Mwoyo, narora ekitebe ky'obukama kiteekaniziibwe omu iguru, kiikaliirweho omuntu.

Kandi Ogu ow'akaba akiikaliireho, akaba naayengeengeta nk'amabaale ag'omuhendo aganyakwetwa yasipi na saarudiyo; kandi ekitebe eki kikaba kyehinguliriziibwe omuhangazima ogurukusisana ibaale ly'omuhendo erinyakwetwa simaragido.

Ekitebe eki kikaba kyehinguliriziibwe ebitebe ebindi makumi abiri na bbina. Kandi ha bitebe ebi hakaba haikaliireho abakuru makumi abiri na bbana, bajwaire ebijwaro ebirukwera, baina ekondo za zaabbu ha mitwe yabo.
Omu kitebe eky'obukama haarugamu emirabyo erukumulikya, okubbaruka kw'enkuba n'okuhinda. Omumaiso gaakyo hakaba haroho etaara musanju ezirukwaka, ezirukumanyisa emyoyo musanju eya Ruhanga.

Omumaiso g'ekitebe eki hakaba haroho ekirukusisana nk'enyanja ey'ekirahule erukumuliikana nka kirisitaalo. Okwehinguliriza ekitebe, ha buli rubaju, hakaba haroho ebihangwa bbina ebyomeezi, biijwire amaiso embaju zoona, omu maiso n'enyuma.
Ekihangwa ekyomeezi eky'okubanza kikaba nikisisana entale; ekya kabiri kikaba nikisisana enimi; ekya kasatu, ha maiso kikaba nikisisana omuntu; kandi ekya kana kikaba nikisisana isamba kaharruka.

Ebihangwa ebi ebbina ebyomeezi, buli kimu kikaba kiina amapapa mukaaga, biina amaiso embaju zoona, aheeru n'omu nda; kandi nyamusana n'ekiro nibizina obutalekerra biti: “Ahikiriire, Ahikiriire, Ahikiriire, Mukama Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona, ayabaireho, anyakubaho, kandi ow'okwija!”
Buli kasumi ebihangwa ebyomeezi ebi obu byahaisanizaaga, obu byakugizaaga, kandi obu byasiimaga Ogu anyakwikaliire ha kitebe ky'obukama, Ogu anyakubaho ebiro byona,
nubwo abakuru amakumi abiri na bbana baajuumaraga omu maiso g'Ogu anyakusingire ha kitebe, kandi baramya Ogu anyakwomeera ebiro byona. Ekondo zaabbu bazinaga hansi omumaiso g'ekitebe nibazina bati:
“MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu, niiwe osemeriire kuheebwa ekitiinisa, okukugizibwa, n'obusobozi, habwokuba niiwe wahangire byona; bikahangwa kandi bikabaho nkooku wagondeze.”
Omu mukono ogw'obulyo gw'Ogu anyakusingire ha kitebe ky'obukama, nkaroramu omuzingo gw'ekitabu oguhandiikirwe embaju zombi, oguboherwe emanyiikirizo musanju;
kandi narora malaika ow'amaani naarangirra n'iraka likooto ati: “Nooha asemeriire kwanjurra omuzingo n'okucwa emanyiikirizo zagwo?”
Baitu hatabeho n'omu omwiguru, rundi omunsi, rundi okuzimu ayasoboire kwanjurra omuzingo n'okugusoma.
Na nyowe nkarra muno habw'okuburwaho n'omu ow'akaba asemeriire kwanjurra omuzingo n'okugusoma.
Nubwo omu ha bakuru yangambiire ati: “Leka kurra; orole Entale ey'orunganda rwa Yuda, Ekikoro kya Daudi, asingwire. Nahabweki uwe asobora kwanjurra omuzingo n'okubambura emanyiikirizo zagwo musanju.”

Hagati y'ekitebe ky'obukama n'ebihangwa bbina ebyomeezi, n'omu bakuru abo hagati, nkarora Omwana gw'Entaama ayemeriire, naasisana nk'anyakutambirwe, aina amahembe musanju n'amaiso musanju, agarukumanyisa emyoyo musanju Ruhanga ei yatumire omunsi yoona.
Yagenda yaiha omuzingo omu mukono ogw'obulyo ogw'Ogu ow'akaba asingire ha kitebe ky'obukama.

Obu yamazire kutwara omuzingo, ebihangwa ebbina ebyomeezi n'abakuru amakumi abiri na bbana baajuumara omumaiso g'Omwana gw'entaama, buli omu akwasire endongo n'ebibindi bya zaabbu ebiijwire omugaju, nubwo bumanyisa okusaba kw'abahikiriire.

Baazina ekizina ekihyaka nibagamba bati: “Niiwe osemeriire kutwara omuzingo n'okubambura emanyiikirizo zagwo, habwokuba okaitwa, wacungurra Ruhanga abantu n'okufa kwawe, noobaiha omu buli ruganda, buli ngambo, omu bantu boona n'omu mahanga goona.
Wabafoora bukama kandi banyakatagara ba Ruhanga waitu, nubo balirema omunsi.”
Omu kubonekerwa kwange nahurra amaraka ga bamalaika baingi batarukusobora kubarwa, beehinguliriize ekitebe ky'obukama, n'ebihangwa ebyomeezi, n'abakuru abo.
Boona nibagamba n'iraka likooto bati: “Mwana gw'Entaama ayatambirwe asemeriire kuheebwa obusobozi, obuguuda, amagezi, amaani, okunyumizibwa, ekitiinisa n'okukugizibwa!”

Kandi nkahurra ebihangwa byona ebiri omwiguru, omunsi, okuzimu, n'omu nyanja na byona ebinyakugirumu nibigamba biti: “Ogu anyakusingire ha kitebe ky'obukama, hamu n'Omwana gw'Entaama, bakugizibwe, banyumizibwe, baheebwe ekitiinisa n'obusobozi ebiro n'ebiro!”
Kandi ebihangwa ebbina ebyomeezi byagamba biti: “Nukwo kibe kiti!” Abakuru baajuumara ha nsi, baaramya.

Nubwo narozire Omwana gw'Entaama naabambura emanyiikirizo ey'okubanza ha manyikirizo musanju, kandi nahurra ekimu ha bihangwa ebbina ebyomeezi nikigamba n'iraka nk'ery'okuhinda kw'enkuba kiti: “Rugayo!”
Narora embaraasi rweru, etemberwe omuntu akwasire obuta; yaheebwa ekondo, yaramaga kusingura kandi yasingurra kimu.
Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya kabiri, nahurra ekihangwa ekyomeezi ekya kabiri nikigamba kiti: “Rugayo!”
Haarugayo embaraasi endi rugaaju. Ow'akaba agitembere yaikirizibwa kwiha obusinge omunsi, nukwo abantu baitangane; kandi yaheebwa empirima enkooto.

Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya kasatu, nahurra ekihangwa ekyomeezi ekya kasatu nikigamba kiti: “Rugayo!” Narora embaraasi rwozi. Ow'akaba agitembere akwasire minzaani omu ngaro ze;
nahurra ekirukusisana iraka niryema hagati y'ebihangwa bbina abyomeezi, nirigamba liti: “Endengo ey'engano erukwera ebe mpeera y'ekiro kimu; baitu amagita n'amarwa obikwate mpora!”
Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya kana, nahurra iraka ery'ekihangwa ekyomeezi ekya kana nirigamba liti: “Rugayo!”

Narora embaraasi rubuubi. Ow'akaba agitembere, ibara lye nuwe Rufu, kandi Kuzimu emuhondiire; byaheebwa obusobozi ha kimu kya kana eky'ensi, okukiisa empirima, kiihe, ebidanda, n'enyamaiswa ez'omunsi.
Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya kataano, narora hansi y'itambiro emyoyo y'abo abaisirwe habw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga, na habw'obwakaiso obu baahaire;
baatoka n'iraka likooto bati: “Ai Kamarabyona, ahikiriire kandi ow'amazima, olimara kasumi ki otakacweriire musango abo abaikara omunsi, kandi olibahoora di enzigu habw'esagama yaitu?”
Nubwo buli omu omuli bo yahairwe ekanzu erukwera, kandi baagambirwa kwongera kuhuumuraho akasumi, okuhika omuhendo ogw'abaheereza bagenzi baabo na bataahi baabo ab'okwitwa nka bo obu gulikahika.
Omu kubonekerwa kwange, Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya mukaaga, haabaho omusisa ogw'amaani; izooba lyaraara, lyasisana orugoye orurukwiragura, okwezi kwona kwatukura nk'esagama,
enyunyuuzi eza haiguru zaaragalika hansi, nk'omuti omutini oku guragalikya ebijuma byagwo omu bwire bwa kasambura obu gutengesibwa ihunga;
iguru lyahwaho nk'omuzingo ogukubirwe, buli rusozi na buli kizinga byaihururwa omu biikaro byabyo.
Nubwo abakama b'ensi n'abantu ab'ekitiinisa, engabwa ez'amahe, abaguuda, ab'amaani kandi buli muntu: omwiru n'ow'obugabe baayeserekere omu maingira n'omu mabaale ag'omu nsozi;
baataagira ensozi n'amabaale ago bati: “Mutugwere, mutusereke amaiso g'Ogu anyakusingire ha kitebe ky'obukama; kandi mututabule ekiniga ky'Omwana gw'Entaama;
habwokuba ekiro kikuru eky'okucweraho omusango kihikire, nooha asobora kukyemera?”
Ebi obu byahoire, nkarora bbana beemeriire ha mbaju ina ez'ensi, nibatangirayo emiyaga ena ey'ensi, haleke kubaho omuyaga ogurukuteera omunsi, ha nyanja rundi ha muti gwona.

Nagaruka narora malaika ondi naatemba naaruga Buruga-izooba, akwasire emanyiikirizo ya Ruhanga omwomeezi, yayeta n'iraka likooto bamalaika abbana abakaba bahairwe obusobozi obw'okukora kubi ensi n'enyanja,
naagamba ati: “Mutakora kubi ensi, enyanja noobu yakuba emiti, okuhika obu turakamara okuta emanyiikirizo ha buso bw'abaheereza aba Ruhanga waitu.”
Kandi nahurra omuhendo gw'abatairweho emanyiikirizo, baahikaga akasiiriira kamu, obukumi bbuna mu nkumi ina, abaarugire omu buli ruganda orw'Abaisirairi.
Ab'omu ruganda rwa Yuda abatairweho emanyiikirizo kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Rubbeeni, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Gadi, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri;
ab'omu ruganda rw'Aseeri, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Nefutaali, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Manaasse, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri;
ab'omu ruganda rwa Simyoni, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Leevi, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Isaakaari, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri;
ab'omu ruganda rwa Zebbuluni, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Yosefu, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri; ab'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini abatairweho emanyiikirizo, kakumi mu nkumi ibiri.

Ebi obu byahoire, narora ekitebe kikooto eky'abantu, omuntu aba ataakusoboire kubara, abaarugire omu mahanga goona, omu nganda zoona, omu bantu boona n'omu ngambo zoona beemeriire omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama, n'omumaiso g'Omwana gw'Entaama, bajwaire ekanzu ezirukwera, bakwasire omu ngaro amataagi g'enkindo,
nibatokera haiguru n'iraka likooto bati: “Okujuna nikuruga hali Ruhanga waitu anyakusingire ha kitebe ky'obukama, na hali Omwana gw'Entaama!”
Kandi bamalaika abakaba beemeriire beehinguliriize ekitebe ky'obukama, beehinguliriize n'abakuru, n'ebihangwa bbina ebyomeezi, baajuumara omu maiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama, baaramya Ruhanga,
nibagamba bati: “Nukwo kibe kiti! Ruhanga waitu anyumiziibwe kandi aheebwe ekitiinisa, amagezi, okusiimwa, okukugizibwa, obusobozi n'amaani obusinge bwona! Amiina.”
Nubwo omu hali abakuru yankagwize ati: “Banu abajwaire ekanzu ezirukwera nibaha, kandi barugire nkaha?”
Nyowe namugarukamu nti: “Waitu, niiwe orukumanya.” Nandiki uwe ati: “Banu nubo abo abaarugire omu mihito mingi; baayogya ekanzu zabo, baazeereza omu sagama ey'Omwana gw'Entaama.
Nikyo barukwemererra omumaiso g'ekitebe ekya Ruhanga, nibamuheereza omunju ye nyamusana n'ekiro; kandi Ogu anyakusingire ha kitebe ky'obukama, alibasangirra n'ekitiinisa kye.
Tibaligaruka kurumwa njara, noobwakubaire kukwatwa iroho; tibaliteerwa musana, noobu kyakubaire ekibabu kyagwo.

Habwokuba Omwana gw'Entaana anyakwemeriire omu maiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama, aliba muliisa wabo, alibeebembera abahikye ha nsoro ez'amaizi ag'obwomeezi; kandi Ruhanga alibasusura amaizi goona ag'omumaiso gabo.”
Omwana gw'Entaama obu yabambwire emanyiikirizo eya musanju, haabaho okuculeera omu iguru okumara nk'ekicweka ky'esaha.
Nubwo narozire bamalaika musanju abeemerra omumaiso ga Ruhanga baaheebwa engwara musanju.

Haija malaika ondi yayemerra haihi n'itambiro, aina ekiswa kya zaabbu; yaheebwa emigaju nyingi ey'okwotera hamu n'eby'okusaba kw'abahikiriire ebikaba biri ha itambiro lya zaabbu omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama;
kandi omwika gw'omugaju gwaimuka omu maiso ga Ruhanga hamu n'eby'okusaba kw'abahakiriire, byona byaruga omu mukono gwa malaika ogu.
Aho malaika yakwata ekiswa kya zaabbu, yakiijuza omurro ogwa ha itambiro, yakihungura omunsi; enkuba zaabbaruka, emirabyo yamulikya, haabaho n'omusisa.
Nubwo bamalaika musanju abakaba baina engwara musanju, baayeteekaniza kuziteera.
Malaika ow'okubanza yateera engwara ye, haazooka orubaale n'omurro bitabwirwemu esagama, byagwa omunsi; kimu kya kasatu eky'ensi kyamekuka, n'ekimu kya kasatu eky'emiti n'obunyansi, byona byahya.
Malaika owa kabiri yateera engwara ye, ekintu ekirukusisana orusozi orukooto orurukwaka omurro, kyagwa omu nyanja.
Kimu kya kasatu eky'enyanja kyafooka sagama, n'ekimu kya kasatu eky'ebihangwa ebyomeezi ebiri omu nyanja kyafa, kandi kimu kya kasatu eky'emeeri kyahwerekerezibwa.
Malaika owa kasatu yateera engwara ye, enyunyuuzi enkooto yaruga omu iguru, neeyaka nk'ekimuli, yagwa ha kimu kya kasatu eky' ebisaaru na ha maziba.
Ibara ly'enyunyuuzi egi, niyo Nyakusarra. Kimu kya kasatu eky'amaizi gasarra pe, gaita abantu baingi, habwokuba gakaba gasaaliire.

Malaika owa kana yateera engwara ye, kimu kya kasatu eky' izooba kyateerwa, hamu n'ekimu kya kasatu eky'okwezi, na kimu kya kasatu eky'enyunyuuzi. Ekyarugiremu: kimu kya kasatu eky'ekyererezi kyabyo kyaswekwa omwirima, omusana gukamara kimu kya kasatu ky'ekiro gutarukujwa. Okwezi n'enyunyuuzi nabyo byamara kimu kya kasatu ky'ekiro bitarukujwa.

Aho narora kandi nahurra isamba erikaba nirihurruka omu burangasa, niryamuza n'iraka likooto liti: “Ziribabona, ziribabona, ziribabona abaliba bali omunsi engwara ezindi isatu obu zirigamba, bamalaika abasatu ezi bali haihi kuteera!”
Malaika owa kataano yateera engwara ye, narora enyunyuuzi eyarugire omwiguru, yagwa hansi; enyunyuuzi egi yaheebwa ekisumuruzo eky'omunwa ogw'ekiina ekitaina h'okugarukira,
yakingura omunwa gw'ekiina eki. Omu munwa gwakyo haarugamu omwika ogurukusisana ogw' ekikoomi. Izooba n'oburangasa byaswekwa omwika ogwarugire omu munwa gw'ekiina.
Omu mwika ogu haarugamu enzige, zaija omunsi, zaaheebwa obusobozi obw'okwokya abantu nk'enge ez'omunsi.
Zaatangwa kukora kubi obunyansi bw'omunsi, n'ekimera kyona ekibisi rundi omuti gwona; baitu ikaheebwa obusobozi hali abo bonka abataina manyikirizo ya Ruhanga ha buso bwabo.
Ikaikirizibwa kubacanza okumara ameezi ataano, hatali kubaita; kandi okwokya kwazo kukaba nikusisana nk'okw'enge obu eyokya omuntu.
Omu meezi ago ataano, abantu baliserra orufu baitu tibalirubona; balyegomba kufa, nakwo kulibairuka.
Omu nzooka, enzige ezi ikaba niisisana nk'embaraasi ezitegekiirwe obulemu. Ha mitwe yazo hakaba haroho ebirukusisana ekondo za zaabbu; amaiso gaazo gasisanaga nk'amaiso g'abantu.
Ebyoya byazo byasisanaga nk'isoke ly'abakazi, kandi amaino gaazo gali nk'ag'entale.

Zikaba ziina ebigaragamba ebirukusisana ekyoma eky'okwekingira ha kifuba, okuhuuma kw'amapapa gaazo kwasisanaga okuhuuma kw'ebigaali bingi ebirukusikwa embaraasi ezirukwiruka enziriga nizigenda ha bulemu.
Zikaba ziina emikira enyakwina emibuli nk'ey'enge, kandi omu mikira yazo nuho hali obusobozi bw'okucanza abantu okumara ameezi ataano.
Ziina omukama arukuzirema, nuwe malaika ow'ekiina ekitaina h'okugarukira; omu Ruhebburaayo, ibara lye nuwe Abadooni, kandi omu Rugiriiki ayetwa Apolyoni (amakuru gaalyo Omuhwerekereza).
Omuhito ogw'okubanza guhoire, hati hakyasigaire emihito endi ebiri.
Nubwo malaika owa mukaaga yatiire engwara ye, kandi nahurra iraka erirukuruga omu mbaju ina ez'itambiro erya zaabbu erinyakuli omumaiso ga Ruhanga.
Iraka lyagambira malaika owa mukaaga, ow'akaba aina engwara, liti: “Lekera bamalaika abbana abaabohiirwe ha kisaaru ekikooto Efuraate.”
Bamalaika abbana baalekerwa, nubo abakaba bategekiirwe esaaha, ekiro, okwezi n'omwaka ogw'okwitiramu kimu kya kasatu eky'abantu.
Omuhendo ogw'amahe ogw'abarwanira ha mbaraasi gwahikaga obukaikuru bikumu bibiri; omuhendo gwabo nkaguhurra.

Omu kwolekwa kwange, nukwo narozire nti embaraasi n'abakaba bazitembere: bakaba bajwaire ebyoma eby'okwekingira ha kifuba eby'erangi nk'ey'omurro rundi ey'ibaale ery'omuhendo ey'erangi ya bbururu, n'ey'obuganga; kandi emitwe y'embaraasi ekaba neesisana emitwe y'entale, omu kanwa kaazo haarugamu omurro, omwika n'obuganga.
Enfu ezi isatu nizo zaisire kimu kya kasatu eky'abantu: omurro, omwika, n'obuganga ebyarugire omu kanwa k'embaraasi ezi.
Habwokuba obusobozi bw'embaraasi buli omu kanwa kaazo n'omu mikira yazo; emikira yazo ina emitwe erukusisana enjoka, kandi niyo zeekonyeza kutema abantu.

Abantu abaasigaireho, abataraisirwe nfu ezi, bateegarukemu ebikorwa ebi baakozire n'emikono yabo, noobu kwakuba kuleka kuramya emizimu n'embandwa ebyaheesirwe omu zaabbu, omu feeza, omu mulinga rundi ebyabaizirwe omu mabaale n'omu miti, ebintu ebitasobora kurora rundi kuhurra rundi kurubata.
Kandi bateegarukemu obwisi bwabo, oburogo bwabo, obusiihani bwabo, n'obusuma bwabo.
Aho narora malaika ondi ow'amaani naasirimuka naaruga omu iguru, ali omu kicu, n'omuhangazima guli haruguru y'omutwe gwe. Ha maiso ge nigangasana nk'izooba, amaguru ge gali nk'enyomyo z'omurro.
Omu mukomo gwe akwasire akazingo k'ekitabu akasuukwirwe. Okuguru kwe okw'obulyo yakuta ha nyanja, kandi okw'obumoso yakuta ha bwerre.
Yayamirra n'iraka likooto nk'entale erukubbuukura. Obu yayamiriire, enkuba musanju zaagamba.
Enkuba omusanju obu zaamazire kugamba, nkaba nyeteekaniize kuhandiika, baitu nahurra iraka erirukuruga omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Enkuba musanju, ebi zaagamba obiculerre, otabihandiika.”
Malaika ou naboine ayemeriire ha nyanja na ha bwerre, omukono gwe ogw'obulyo yagwimukya haiguru,
yarahira Ogu anyakwomeera ebiro byona, ayahangire iguru, ensi, anyanja, n'ebinyakubirumu byona, naagamba ngu, tihakyaroho kukeerereza okundi,
baitu omu biro malaika owa musanju ebi aliterramu engwara, nubwo Ruhanga alihikiriza entegeka ye ey'ensita nkooku yagambiire abarangi abamuheereza.
Nubwo iraka eri nahuliire niriruga omwiguru, lyayongera lyangambira liti: “Genda oihe akazingo k'ekitabu ekyanjurwirwe omu ngaro za malaika anyakwemeriire ha nyanja na ha bwerre.”
Nagenda hali malaika ogu, namusaba ampe akazingo k'ekitabu. Uwe yangarukamu ati: “Nkako, kakwate okalye; nikaija kukuruma omu nda, baitu omu kanwa karakunurra nk'obwoki.”
Akazingo ako nakaiha omu mukono gwa malaika nakalya; omu kanwa kange kakaba nikanura nk'obwoki, baitu obu namazire kukalya, narumwa omu nda.
Malaika yangambira ati: “Osemeriire kugaruka kuranga ebiriizira abantu ab'enganda nyingi, amahanga, engambo, n'abakama.”
Hanyuma naheebwa oruti orw'okulengesa, orurukusisana orubango; haabaho ayandagiire ati: “Imuka, olenge Enju ya Ruhanga n'itambiro, kandi obale abo abaramizaamu;
baitu otalenga ezigati ey'aheeru y'Enju egi; yo ogireke, habwokuba ehairwe Abanyamahanga kandi balirubaatirra orubuga orurukwera okumara ameezi makumi ana n'abiri.
Kandi abakaiso bange ababiri ndibaha obusobozi obw'okuranga okumara ebiro rukumi rumu omu bikumi bibiri n'enkaaga, baliranga bajwaire ebiguniya.”
Abakaiso abo niyo emiti ey'oliva, n'ebikondo bibiri eby'etaara ebinyakuli omu maiso ga MUKAMA w'ensi yoona.
Kakuba habaho weena arukubakora kubi, omurro gulibaruga omu kanwa, gumaleho abanyanzigwa baabo. Kakuba habaho weena arukubakora kubi, nawe nukwo ali w'okwitwa ati.

Baina obusobozi obw'okukinga iguru, nukwo enjura ereke kugwa omu biro ebi balimara nibaranga. Kandi baina obusobozi ha maizi okugahindura sagama, n'okuleeta omunsi buli muhito gwona ha bakagondiize hoona.
Obu balikamara kuha obwakaiso bwabu, ekinyamaiswa ekinyakuruga omu kiina ekitaina h'okugarukira kiribarwanisa, kibasingule, kibaite;
kandi emitumbi yabu erigaraamirra omu ikuute ery'orubuga orukuru nambere MUKAMA wabo yabambiirwe ha musaraba, orubuga orusisanizibwa Sodomu na Misiri.
Abantu aba buli mulingo, buli ruganda, buli ngambo, n'aba buli ihanga emitumbi yabo baligihanga amaiso okumara ebiro bisatu n'ekicweka, batarukwikiriza eziikwe omu kituuro.
Kandi abo abaliba bali omunsi balibeebugira, balisemererwa kandi balitwekerangana ebisembo, habwokuba abarangi abo ababiri baabatuntuzaaga muno.
Baitu obu haahingwireho ebiro bisatu n'ekicweka, orwoya orw'obwomeezi orwarugire hali Ruhanga rukabataahamu, baayemerra; n'abo boona abaababoine baatiina muno.
Nubwo abakaiso abo ababiri baahuliire iraka likooto erirukuruga omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Mutembe, mwije hanu!” Baatemba omu iguru, bali omu kicu, abanyanzigwa baabo nibabarora.
Kandi omu kasumi ako haabaho omusisa ogw'amaani, kimu kya ikumi eky'orubuga kyagwa; abantu kasanju baitwa omusisa, kandi abaasigaireho baatina muno, baakugiza Ruhanga ow'omwiguru.
Omuhito ogwa kabiri guhoire, hati ogwa kasatu gumalize kwija.

Nubwo malaika owa musanju yatiire engwara ye, omu iguru haahulirwa amaraka makooto agaagambire gati: “Obukama bw'ensi buhindukire, bwaba bwa MUKAMA waitu n'Ogu ou yaseesireho amagita (nuwe Kristo), kandi alirema ebiro byona.”
Abakuru amakumi abiri na bbana abanyakwikarra ha bitebe byabu omu maiso ga Ruhanga baajuumara, baamuramya,
nibagamba bati: “Nitukusiima MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona, anyakuroho kandi ayabaireho, habwokuba oyegaruliire obusobozi bwawe, wajuumura engoma.

Amahanga gakabiihirwa muno, hati akasumi kawe kahikire ak'okugafubira: abafiire okucwerwa omusango, n'abaheereza baawe okuheebwa empeera, nubo abarangi n'abahikiriire n'abo abakutiina, abato n'abakuru kandi nuko kasumi ak'okumaraho abahwerekereza ensi.”
Aho Enju ya Ruhanga ey'omwiguru yakingurwa, kandi esanduuko ey'endagaano yazooka omu Nju ye; haabaho emirabyo, okuhinda kw'amaani, okubbaruka kw'enkuba, omusisa n'orubaale rwingi.
Kandi haazooka omwiguru ekintu ekirukuhuniriza muno: omukazi ajwaire izooba, okwezi kuli hansi y'ebigere bye, kandi ha mutwe ajwaire ekondo ey'enyunyuuzi ikumi na ibiri.
Omukazi ogu akaba akulize, naataaga habw'okurumwa ebisa, ali omu busaalizi obw'okuzaara.
Kandi omwiguru haazooka ekirukuhuniriza ekindi; nikyo ekijoka ekikooto ekirukutukura, ekiina emitwe musanju, amahembe ikumi, n'ekondo musanju ha mitwe yakyo.

Omukira gwakyo gwasingorra kimu kya kasatu eky'enyunyuuzi ez'omwiguru, gwazinaga hansi. Ekijoka kyayemerra omumaiso g'omukazi ow'akaba ali haihi kuzaara, nukwo kisonsomere omwana we naakyamuzaara ati.
Yazaara omwana w'obwojo ow'akaba ali w'okulema amahanga goona naagalemesa omwigo ogw'ekyoma, baitu omwana we yasahurwa, yatwarwa omba Ruhanga na ha kitebe eky'obukama bwe.
Omukazi yairukira omwirungu nambere Ruhanga akaba amuteekaniriize ekiikaro h'asobora kuroleererwa kurungi okumara ebiro rukumi bibiri n'enkaaga.
Nubwo obulemu bwacwekere omwiguru, Mikairi na bamalaika be baarwana n'ekijoka; kandi ekijoka na bamalaika baakyo baarwana,
baitu baasingurwa, kandi tibaagaruka kutunga kiikaro omu iguru.
Ekijoka eki kikooto kyahungurwa hansi, niyo enjoka egi eya ira enyakwetwa Omwohi kandi Sitaani, anyakubiihabiiha ensi yoona--yahungurwa omunsi hamu na bamalaika be.

Kandi nahurra iraka erikooto omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Hati okujuna, amaani, n'obukama bwa Ruhanga waitu hamu n'obusobozi obwa Kristo we biizire, habwokuba omulegi wa bagenzi baitu, anyakubalega hali Ruhanga waitu nyamusana n'ekiro, abingirwe omwiguru.
Bamusingwize okufa kw'Omwana gw'Entaama n'obwakaiso bw'amananu obu bamuheriire; batataatirre bwomeezi bwabo, nangwa baikiriza n'okumufeera.
Nahabweki, semererwa iwe iguru, na inywe abaliikaramu! Baitu ziribabona inywe ensi n'enyanja, habwokuba Omwohi abaiziiremu aina ekiniga kingi, kandi amanyire nkooku asigaize akasumi kake!”
Ekijoka obu kyarozire nkooku kihungwirwe omunsi, kyaronza omukazi ayazaire omwana omwojo.

Baitu omukazi akaheebwa amapapa abiri ag'isamba erikooto, nukwo asobole kwiruka ekijoka, agende omu irungu, omu kiikaro nambere akaba naija kuroleerererwa okumara akasumi akali nk'emyaka esatu n'ekicweka.
Ekijoka eki kyabooga ekisaaru ky'amaizi maingi, nikigaiha omu kanwa kaakyo, gahondere omukazi, nukwo entunga yago emutwale hara;
baitu ensi yakoonyera omukazi agu, yayesama, yamira ekisaaru ekyaboogerwe ekijoka.
Nubwo ekijoka kyabiihiriirwe omukazi, kyagenda kurwanisa oruzaaro rwe orwasigaireho, nubo abo abakwata Ebiragiro bya Ruhanga kandi abajurra Yesu.
Nubwo ekijoka kyayesimbire ha musa gw'enyanja.

Nyowe nkaba nyemeriire ha musa gw'enyanja; kandi narora ekinyamaiswa nikiimuka omu nyanja kiina amahembe ikumi, emitwe musanju, ekondo ikumi ha mahembe gaakyo, kandi ha mitwe yakyo hahandiikirweho ibara erirukujuma Ruhanga.

Ekinyamaiswa eki narozire, kikaba nikisisana engo, ebigere byakyo nibisisana eby'edubu, akanwa kaakyo nikasisana ak'entale. Ekijoka kyakiha amaani gaakyo, n'ekitebe kyakyo eky'obukama, n'obusobozi bwakyo obwingi.
Ogumu ha mitwe yakyo gukaba nigusisana ogwina ekihuta ekirukusobora kukiita, baitu ekihuta eki ekyakusoboire kukiita, kyakira; kandi abantu boona ab'ensi bahondera ekinyamaiswa bahuniriire.
Abantu baaramya ekijoka eki, habwokuba obusobozi bwakyo kikabuha ekinyamaiswa, kandi baaramya n'ekinyamaiswa nibagamba bati: “Nooha arukusisana ekinyamaiswa, kandi nooha asobora kukirwanisa?”
Ekinyamaiswa eki kyaheebwa akanwa k'okugamba ebigambo eby'okwekuliriza n'eby'okujuma Ruhanga, kandi kyaikirizibwa okukozesa obusobozi bwakyo okumara ameezi amakumi ana n'abiri.
Kyayesamya akanwa kaakyo kubaza eby'okujuma Ruhanga, nikijuma ibara lye, n'ekiikaro eki aikaramu, n'abo abaikara omwiguru.
Kandi kyaikirizibwa okurwanisa abantu ba Ruhanga n'okubasingura. Kyaheebwa obusobozi ha nganda zoona, ha bantu boona, ha ngambo zoona, na ha mahanga goona.
Kandi boona abaikara omunsi baliramya ekinyamaiswa eki. Nubo abo ab'amabara gaabo gatarahandiikiirwe okuruga ha kuhangwa kw'ensi omu kitabu eky'obwomeezi eky'Omwana gw'Entaama ayatambirwe.
Anyakwina okutu, ahurre:
Ogu ow'okunyagwa, anyagwe omu bwiru; ogu anyakwisa empirima, nawe aitwe n'empirima. Aho nuho harukwetaagirwa okwikiriza n'okugumiisiriza okw'abantu ba Ruhanga.
Nubwo narozire ekinyamaiswa ekindi ekyakununukire omu itaka; kiina amahembe abiri nk'entaama, kyabaza nk'ekijoka.
Kyakozesa obusobozi bwona obw'ekinyamaiswa eky'okubanza, na kiri kikiroleeriire. Kyahambiriza ensi n'abagirumu kuramya ekinyamaiswa eky'okubanza ekyakizire ekihuta kyakyo eky'okukiita.
Kyakora ebirukuhuniriza, kyaragira omurro guruge omwiguru gugwe hansi, abantu nibarora.

Ebihuniriza ebi kyaikiriziibwe kukora omu maiso g'ekinyamaiswa eky'okubanza bikahabisa abo abaikara omunsi. Kikabaragira kukora ekisisani eky'okunyumirizaaho ekinyamaiswa eki ekyahutaaziibwe empirima, baitu kyagaruka kyayomeera.
Kyaikirizibwa kuhuuha orwoya omu kisisani eki ky'ekinyamaiswa, nukwo kisobole kubaza; kandi kyaikirizibwa n'okwita abo abarukwanga kuramya ekisisani eky'ekinyamaiswa.
Kyahambiriza boona, abato n'abakuru, abaguuda n'abanaku, ab'obugabe n'abairu, bateebweho akarorwaho ha mukono ogw'obulyo rundi ha buso,
nukwo haleke kubaho n'omu asobora kugura n'okutunda, rundi buli aina akarorwaho ako, niryo ibara ly'ekinyamaiswa, rundi enamba y'ibara lyakyo.
Eki kintu ky'okwetegereza: arukwetegereza ayezorre amakuru ag'enamba y'ekinyamaiswa eki, habwokuba nayo namba y'abantu. Enamba yakyo, rukaaga mu nkaaga, na mukaaga.
Nubwo narozire Omwana gw'Entaama ayemeriire ha rusozi Siyoni, hamu n'abantu akasiiriira kamu mu bukumi bbuna n'enkumi ina, abakaba bahandiikirwe ha buso ibara lye n'ibara lya Ise.

Kandi nahurra iraka erirukuruga omwiguru, nirisisana okuhirra okw'amaizi maingi kandi okugamba okw'enkuba ez'amaani. Iraka eri nahuliire likaba nirisisana nk'ery'abateezi b'endongo abarukuteera endongo zaabbu,

bakaba nibazina ekizina ekihyaka omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama, n'omu maiso g'ebihangwa bbina ebyomeezi, n'omu maiso g'abakuru abo. Busaho n'omu ayasoboire kukwata ekizina eki, okwihaho abantu akasiiriira kamu mu bukumi bbuna n'enkumi ina abaacungwirwe omunsi.

Nubo abo abatarayesiisire n'abakazi, habwokuba batamanye bakazi; abo nubo bahondera Omwana gw'Entaama hoona h'akagenda; nubo abaacungwirwe omu bantu, bali munganuro gwa Ruhanga n'ogw'Omwana gw'Entaama.
Omu kanwa kaabu hatasangwemu bisuba, habwokuba tibaina kamogo.

Hanyuma narora malaika ondi naahurruka omu mwanya, aina Amakuru Amarungi agatalihwaho ag'okurangirra abo abaikara omunsi, ag'okurangirra amahanga goona, enganda zoona, ab'engambo zoona, n'abantu boona;
yagamba n'iraka likooto ati: “Mutiine Ruhanga kandi mumukugize, habwokuba akasumi ke ak'okucwa omusango kahikire; kandi muramye Omuhangi w'iguru n'ensi, enyanja n'ensoro zoona z'amaizi.”
Haakurataho malaika ondi, owa kabiri, ayagaambire ati: “Rugwire Bbabbulooni orubuga rukuru! Rugwire oru orwatamiize amahanga goona n'obubi obw'obusiihani bwarwo!”
Malaika ondi owa kasatu yabakurataho naagamba n'iraka likooto ati: “Kakuba omuntu weena aramya ekinyamaiswa eki n'ekisisani kyakyo, kandi akateebwaho akarorwaho ha buso rundi ha mukono,
nawe alinywa empotole ey'ekiniga kya Ruhanga, enyakwiturwirwe omu kikopo kye. Alibonabonesibwa omurro n'obuganga oburukwokya, bamalaika abahikiriire n'Omwana gw'Entaama baroleriire.

Omwika ogw'okubonesibwa kwabo guliikara nigucuuka ebiro n'ebiro; kandi abo abaramya ekinyamaiswa n'ekisisani, kyakyo hamu n'abanyakwina akarorwaho ak'ibara lyakyo, tibaligira kihuumuro nyamusana n'ekiro.”
Aho nuho harukwetaagirwa okugumiisiriza kw'abahikiriire. Nubo abo abakwata Ebiragiro bya Ruhangga kandi abaikiriza Yesu.

Kandi nahurra iraka erirukuruga omu iguru nirigamba liti: “Handiika oti: Okuruga hati, baina omugisa abafu abaraafeeraga omu MUKAMA.” Kandi Mwoyo naakigumya ati: “Mazimakwo baina omugisa, hati bahuumule, baleke emirimo yabu, habwokuba ebikorwa byabu bagenda nabyo!”
Nubwo narozire ekicu ekirukwera, kiikaliirweho omu arukusisana omwana w'omuntu, ajwaire ha mutwe ekondo ya zaabbu, akwasire omu ngaro enoijoro enyakutoire.

Malaika ondi yaruga omu Nju ya Ruhanga naayeta n'iraka likooto Ogu anyakwikaliire ha kicu naagamba ati: “Kwata enoijoro yawe ogese, habwokuba akasumi ak'okugesa kahikire, ebyokugesa by'ensi byeriire kimu.”
Nubwo Ogu anyakwikaliire ha kicu yahungya enoijoro ye omunsi, yagesa ensi.
Malaika ondi yaruga omu Nju ya Ruhanga ey'omwiguru, nawe akaba akwasire enoijoro enyakutoire.

Kandi malaika ondi yaruga ha itambiro, nuwe malaika anyakwina obusobozi ha murro, yayera n'iraka likooto Ogu anyakukwasire enoijoro enyakutoire naagamba ati: “Kwata enoijoro yawe osale ebijuma by'emizabbibbu ey'omunsi habwokuba byengere.”
Nubwo malaika yahungya enoijoro ye omunsi, yasoroza ebijuma by'emizaabbibbu y'omunsi, yabinaga omu ndeeba enkooto ey'ekiniga kya Ruhanga.
Ebijuma byajungirwa omu ndeeba aheeru y'orubuga oru, byarugwamu esagama nyingi, yatuuma kuhika ha sentimita kikumi mu ataano, yagera kukira ha kilomita bikumi bibiri mu kyenda.
Nubwo narozire omwiguru ekyamahano ekindi ekikuru kandi ekirukuhuniriza. Nubo bamalaika musanju abaina emihito musanju ey'okumalirra, habwokuba ekiniga kya Ruhanga niyo kirukugarukiraho.

Kandi nkarora ekintu ekirukusisana enyanja ey'ekirahule etabwirwemu omurro, n'abo abaasingwire ekinyamaiswa n'ekisisani kyakyo n'enamba y'ibara lyakyo beemeriire ha rubaju rw'enyanja ey'ekirahule, bakwasire omu ngaro endongo za Ruhanga.

Bakaba nibazina ekizina kya Musa omuheereza wa Ruhanga n'eky'Omwana gw'Entaama nibagamba bati: “Ai MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona, ebikorwa byawe bikuru kandi bihuniriza! Ai MUKAMA ow'obusinge bwona, emihanda yawe ehikire kandi y'amazima!
Ai MUKAMA nooha atalikutiina kandi atalikunyumiza? Niiwe wenka Ahikiriire. Amahanga goona galiija gakuramye, habwokuba encwa yaawe ey'obulyo, hati eyolekerwe.”
Ebi obu byahoire, nkarora omwiguru Enju ya Ruhanga erumu eheema y'obwakaiso ekingwirwe,
haarugamu bamalaika musanju baina emihito musanju kandi bajwaire ekanzu eza bafuta enungi erukunekaneka, beetegere omu kifuba emyeko ya zaabbu.
Kandi ekimu ha bihangwa ebbina ebyomeezi kyaha bamalaika musanju ebibindi musanju ebya zaabbu ebiijwire ekiniga kya Ruhanga anyakwomeera ebiro byona.
Enju yaijura omwika ogwarugire omu kitiinisa kya Ruhanga n'omu maani ge, kandi busaho n'omu ayasoboire kugitaaha okuhika emihito musanju eya bamalaika musanju obu yahoire.
Nubwo nahuliire iraka erikooto eryarugire omu Nju ya Ruhanga ey'omwiguru, nirigambira bamalaika omusanju liti: “Mugende museese omunsi ebibindi musanju eby'ekiniga kya Ruhanga.”
Malaika ow'okubanza yagenda yaseesa omunsi ebiri omu kibindi kye, abantu abakaba baina akororwaho ak'ekinyamaiswa kandi abaaramize ekisisani kyakyo baacweka ebihooya ebibi ebirukununka.
Malaika owa kabiri yaseesa omu nyanja ebiri omu kibindi kye, enyanja yafooka nk'esagama y'omuntu afiire, kandi buli kintu ekyomeezi ekikaba kiri omu nyanja kyafa.
Malaika owa kasatu yaseesa ebiri omu kibindi kye omu bisaaru n'omu maziba, byafooka sagama.
Nahurra malaika anyakurolerra amaizi ago naagamba ati: “Niiwe Ahikiriire, anyakuroho kandi ayabaireho, encwa yawe enu y'obulyo.
Habwokuba abantu bakaseesa esagama y'abarukwera n'abarangi, hati na Iwe obahaire esagama, niyo banywe. Niyo basemeriire!”
Kandi nahurra iraka erirukuruga ha itambiro nirigamba liti: “Ego, MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona, encwa yawe y'amazima kandi y'obulyo!”
Malaika owa kana yaseesa ebiri omu kibindi kye ha izooba, lyaikirizibwa okusiiriiza abantu n'ekibabu kyalyo.
Abantu baasiirizibwa ekibabu eky'amaani, kandi baakondereza ibara lya Ruhanga anyakwina obusobozi ha mihito egi, bateegarukemu kandi baayanga kumuha ekitiinisa.
Malaika owa kataano nawe yaseesa ebiri omu kibindi kye ha kitebe ky'obukama eky'ekinyamaiswa. Obukama bwakyo bwaswekwa omwirima; abantu baayeruma endimi habw'okuhururwa
baakondereza Ruhanga ow'omu iguru habw'okuhururwa oku n'ebihooya ebi bacwekere, baitu bateegarukemu ebi baakozire.
Malaika owa mukaaga yaseesa ebiri omu kibindi kye ha kisaaru ekikooto Efuraate. Amaizi gaakyo gaayomera kimu, nukwo hateekanizibwe omuhanda abakama abarukuruga Burugaizooba ogu basobora kurabamu.
Kandi narora emyoyo emibi esatu, erukusisana ebikere, neeruga omu kanwa k'ekijoka, omu kanwa k'ekinyamaiswa, n'omu kanwa k'omurangi ow'ebisuba.
Egi niyo myoyo ya Sitaani enyakukora ebihuniriza, enyakugenda omu bakama ab'ensi zoona kubasorooza baije ha bulemu ha kiro kikuru ekya Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona.
(“Dora, ninyija nk'omusuma! W'omugisa ogu anyakwikara naarora, akalina ebijwaro bye, nukwo aleke kugenda busa, abantu bakamurora enjuuro!”)
Emyoyo egi yasorooleza abakama omu kiikaro ekirukwetwa omu Ruhebburaayo: Aramagedoni.
Malaika owa musanju yaseesa omu mwanya gw'iguru ebiri omu kibindi kye. Iraka likooto lyaruga ha kitebe ky'obukama ekiri omu Nju ya Ruhanga nirigamba liti: “Kihoire!”
Haakurataho emirabyo, okuhinda kw'amaani, okubbaruka kw'enkuba, n'omusisa gw'amaani ogutakabahoga abantu baakaba kubaho omu nsi. Omusisa ogu gukaba gw'amaani muno.

Orubuga orukuru rwayahukanizibwa omu bicweka bisatu, n'embuga enkuru ez'amahanga zaagwa, zaahwerekerra, baitu Ruhanga ateebwe Bbabbulooni, yaijuka orubuga oruranganwa kurunywisa ekikopo kyona ekiijwire empotole ey'ekiniga kye.
Ebizinga byona byamirwa, n'ensozi zoona zaabura;
kandi orubaale orw'amabaale amakooto againa obulemeezi obwa kilo makumi ataano buli limu, rwaruga omwiguru rwateera abantu, kandi baakondereza Ruhanga habw'omuhito ogw'orubaale ogwabatiinisize muno.
Nubwo omu ha bamalaika omusanju abakaba baina ebibindi musanju, yaizire yangambira ati: “Rugayo, nkwoleke omusango ogucwerirwe malaaya rurangaanwa, nurwo rubuga oruli hagati y'ebisaaru bingi.
Nuwe ayasiihaine n'abakama b'ensi; kandi abantu abaikara omunsi baatamiizibwa obubi bw'obusiihani bwe.”
Malaika yantwara omwirungu ndi omu Mwoyo Ahikiriire, narora omukazi aikaliire ha kinyamaiswa rugaaju, ekinyakwijwire amabara maingi agarukujuma Ruhanga, kiina emitwe musanju n'amahembe ikumi.

Omukazi akaba ajwaire ekijwaro eky'erangi ya kahuukya n'erukutukura tukutuku, ayekunisize n'ezaabbu, amabaale g'omuhendo n'eruuru. Omu ngaro akwasire ekikopo kya zaabbu ekiijwire ebinugwa n'obubi obw'obusiihani bwe.
Ha buso bwe hahandiikirweho ibara eritarukumanywa makuru nirigamba liti: “Babbulooni orubuga orukuru, kizaara abamalaaya n'ebinugwa eby'ensi yoona.”
Kandi narora omukazi atamiire esagama ey'abantu ba Ruhanga n'ey'abakaiso abaferiire Yesu. Obu narozire omukazi ogu nkahunirra muno;
nukwo malaika ogu kunkaguza ati: “Kiki ekirukukuhuniriza? Kankwatire ensita ey'omukazi ogu kandi n'ey'ekinyamaiswa eki atembere eky'emitwe musanju n'amahembe ikumi.

Ekinyamaiswa eki orozire, kikaba kiroho, hati tikiroho, baitu nikiija kugaruka nikiruga omu kiina ekitaina h'okugarukira, nukwo kigende kihwerekereziibwe. Kandi abantu abaikara omunsi, ab'amabara gaabu batarahandiikirwe omu kitabu eky'obwomeezi ensi yakaaba kuhangwa, balihunirra kurora ekinyamaiswa eki, habwokuba kikaba kiroho, hati tikiroho, baitu nikiija kugaruka.
“Kinu nikikengwa omuntu ow'amagezi: emitwe musanju neemanyisa ensozi musanju omukazi ezi aikaliireho;
kandi neemanyisa abakama musanju: abataano halibo bakafa, omu aroho, kandi ondi takaizire; baitu obu aliija, aliikaraho akasumi kake.
Kandi ekinyamaiswa ekikaba kiroho, ekitaroho hati, nuwe mukama owa munaana, baitu naabalirwa omu bali omusanju kandi naija kuhwerekerezibwa.
“Amahembe ikumi ag'orozire nigamanyisa abakama ikumi abatakabaire kuteera engoma, baitu nibaija kulemera hamu n'ekinyamaiswa eki kumara esaaha emu yonka.
Abo bakaikirraniza, baacwa amagezi ag' okukwasa ekinyamaiswa eki amaani gaabo n'obusobozi bwabo.
Balirwanisa Omwana gw'Entaama, baitu uwe alibasingura, habwokuba nuwe Mulemi w'abalemi kandi MUKAMA w'abakama. Kandi balisingurwa abo abali hamu nawe, nubo abaayesirwe, abaakomerwe kandi abeesigwa.”
Malaika yagaruka yangambira ati: “Ebisaaru ebi orozire nambere malaaya aikaliire, nibimanyisa abantu ab'emiringo nyingi, ebitebe by'abantu, amahanga n'engambo nyingi.
Kandi amahembe ikumi ag'orozire, go hamu n'ekinyamaiswa birinoba malaaya ogu, birimwehindukirra, birimutwara busa, birijunjubura omubiri gwe, birimusiiririza kimu n'omurro,

habwokuba Ruhanga akakita omu mitima yabo okwikirraniza n'okuhikiriza entegeka ei yamutegekiire, nukwo obusobozi bwabo obw'okulema babuhe ekinyamaiswa okuhika ebigambo bya Ruhanga obu birikahikirizibwa.
Omukazi ou orozire, nurwo rubuga orukuru orunyakulema abakama b'ensi.”
Ebi obu byahoire, narora malaika ondi naasirimuka naaruga omwiguru, aina obusobozi bwingi, kandi ensi yayangasana habw'ekitiinisa kye.

Yayamirra n'iraka ery'amaani ati: “Rugwire Bbabbulooni orubuga rukuru! Rugwire! Rufookere bwikaro bw'emizimu, bwikaro bwa buli mwoyo mubi gwona, bwikaro obwikarwamu buli kinyonyi kyona ekirofu kandi ekirukunobwa;
habwokuba amahanga goona gatamiire obubi bw'obusiihani bwarwo, kandi abakama ab'ensi basiihaine narwo, n'abasuubuzi ab'ensi baguudahaire habw'itungo erirugire omu rwanju rwarwo.”
Nubwo nahuliire iraka erindi erirukuruga omwiguru nirigamba liti: “Inywe, bantu bange, muturuke muruge omu rubuga oru, timwikara kwetaba omu bibi byarwo, mukabagana ha mihito yarwo.
Ebibi byarwo bituumire kuhika ha iguru, kandi Ruhanga aijukire obubi bwarwo.
Murukole nkooku rwakozire abandi, kandi mururongoole kabiri habw'ebi rwakozire, ekikopo ky'amarwa ag'empotole aga rwabanywisize, inywe murugarurremu kabiri.

Nkooku rwayenyumiize rwonka kandi rwagira orwanju, na inywe nukwo murusaalize kandi murutuntuze muti. Noobu ruraaba nirugamba omu mutima gwarwo ruti: ‘Nyikaliire nk'Omugo, tindi mufakaati, obujune tibulimpikaho’,
baitu kiro kimu emihito yarwo eriruhikaho: orufu, okuganya na kiihe, kandi rulyokebwa omurro; habwokuba MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona nuwe arukurucwera omusango.”
Abakama ab'ensi abaasiihaine kandi abaayanjukire narwo, balirulirirra kandi baruterre empamo obu balirora omwika gwarwo nigucuuka.
Balyemerra hara, nibatiina kururora nirubonabonesibwa, kandi baligamba bati: “Ai bambi! Ai Bambi! Iwe rubuga orukuru! Iwe Bbabbulooni orubuga orw'amaani! Ekifubiro kyakuhikaho omu saaha emu yonka.”
Abasuubuzi ab'omunsi nibarulirirra kandi nibarugaragarra, habwokuba busaho n'omu akyayongera kubaguraho bintu byabo:

zaabbu, efeeza, amabaale g'omuhendo n'eruuru; bafuta enungi eya kahuukya, engoye eza liiri n'ezirukutukura; n'emiti yoona erukuboya kurungi; ebintu byona ebyakozirwe omu masanga, byona ebyabaizirwe omu miti ey'omuhendo, omu mulinga ogw'omuherre, ekyoma ekigumire n'amabaale agarukwangasana;

eby'okuboyesa ebyokulya, ebirungo, eseeta, omugaju, emyamirro, amarwa, amagita, ensaano enungi n'engano; ente n'entaama; embaraasi n'ebigaali byazo, hamu n'abairu rubaale--nukwo kiti nambere abantu bahingisibwamu ebintu.
“Amagoba omwoyo gwawe aga gwayegombere, gakurugireho, kandi byona ebi wayekunisaaga hamu n'ekitiinisa kyawe obifeerirwe, toligaruka kubirora!”
Abasuubuzi ab'ebintu ebi, abaaguudahaziibwe itungo ery'orubuga oru, balyemerra hara, nibatiina kururora nirubonabonesibwa, nibaganya kandi nibarra bati:
“Ai bambi! Ai bambi! Orubuga orukuru, orwajwaraga bafuta enungi, ey'erangi kahuukya n'erukutukura, orwatonerwe n'ezaabbu, amabaale ag'omuhendo n'eruuru!
Obuguuda obu bwona buhwerekereziibwe omu saaha emu yonka.” Kandi bakama b'emeeri, n'abo abagenderamu, abalimba n'abo abanyakusuburra ha nyanja baayema hara,
nibaborooga muno obu baarozire omwika gwarwo nigucuuka, bayekaguza bati: “Rubuga ki orwainganaga orubuga runu orukuru?”

Baayeseesa ecuucu ha mitwe. Obu, nibaganya, nibarra kandi nibeesaalinga bati: “Ai bambi! Ai bambi! Orubuga orukuru, orwaguudahaize boona abakaba baina emeeri ha nyanja! Ruhwerekereziibwe omu saaha emu.
Iwe iguru, inywe abahikiriire, abakwenda n'abarangi murwebugire, habwokuba Ruhanga arusingisize omusango habwanyu!”

Nubwo malaika ow'amaani yakomere ibaale erirukwingana orubengo orukooto, yalihungura omu nyanja naagamba ati: “Bbabbulooni orubuga orukuru nukwo rulinagwa hansi n'amaani ruti, kandi tiruligaruka kuzooka.

Amaraka g'abateezi b'endongo n'ag'abazini, ag'abateezi b'enseegu hamu n'ag'abateezi b'engwara, tigaligaruka kuhulirwa omuli iwe; kandi omukozi w'omulimo gwona taligaruka kuzooka omuli iwe; n'iraka ery'orubengo tiririgaruka kuhulirwa omuli iwe.

Kandi ekyererezi eky'etaara tikirigaruka kwakira omuli iwe. Iraka erya kigabura n'erya kigabuka tiririgaruka kuhulirwa omuli iwe. Mazimakwo abasuubuzi bawe bakaba bali bantu barangaanwa omunsi, habwokuba amahanga goona okagabiihabiiha n'oburogo bwawe.
Kandi omu rubuga oru hakaba haseesekeremu esagama ey'abarangi n'abahikiriire, n'eya boona abaisirwe omunsi.”
Ebi obu byahoire, nahurra iraka likooto erirukusisana ery'ekitebe ky'abantu baingi abali omwiguru nibazina bati: “Haleluya! Okujuna, ekitiinisa n'obusobozi, byona bya Ruhanga waitu.
Habwokuba encwa ye y'amazima kandi y'obulyo. Malaaya rurangaanwa ayasiisire ensi n'obusiihani bwe amusingisize omusango kandi amuhoire enzigu habw'esagama y'abaheereza be.”
Baayongera baayamirra bati: “Haleluya! Omwika ogurukuruga omu rubuga oru guraikaraga nigucuuka ebiro byona.”
Kandi abakuru amakumi abiri na bbana, hamu n'ebihangwa ebbina ebyomeezi baajuumara hansi, baaramya Ruhanga anyakwikaliire ha kitebe eky'obukama nibagamba bati: “Nukwo kibe kiti. Haleluya!”
Kandi iraka lyaruga ha kitebe ky'obukama niryamirra liti: “Muhaisanize Ruhanga waitu, inywe inywena abaheereza be, inywe abamutiina abato n'abakuru!”

Nubwo nahuliire iraka erirukusisana ery'ekitebe ky'abantu baingi, erirukuhirra nk'amaizi amaingi kandi erirukuhinda nk'okubbaruka kw'enkuba z'amaani niritoka liti: “Haleluya! MUKAMA Ruhanga waitu ow'obusobozi bwona ahangiriize.
Katusemererwe, tukyanganuke kandi tumukugize, habwokuba obugenyi bw'obugole obw'Omwana gw'Entaama buhikire, kandi Omugole we ayeteekaniize;
akaikirizibwa kujwara bafuta erukunekaneka, erukwera kandi esemiire” habwokuba bafuta erukunekaneka neemanyisa ebikorwa ebirungi eby'abahikiriire.
Malaika yangambira ati: “Handiika oti: B'omugisa abaraliziibwe ha kiihuro ky'obugenyi bw'obugole obw'Omwana gw'Entaama.” Malaika yayongera ati: “Ebi nibyo bigambo bya Ruhanga ebya mazima.”

Aho najuumara ha bigere bye kumuramya, baitu yantanga ati: “Otakisura! Nyowe ndi muheereza nka iwe, kandi nk'abagenzi bawe abagumya ebya Yesu. Ramya Ruhanga.” Habwokuba ekisembo kyona eky'okuranga kisigikira ha bwakaiso Yesu obu yahaire.
Nubwo narozire iguru likingwirwe, haazookayo embaraasi rweru! Ogu ow'akaba agitembere, naayetwa Mwesigwa kandi Mazima, nuwe acwa emisango omu bulyo kandi arwana obulemu omu bwinganiza.
Amaiso ge nigasisana endimi z'omurro, ha mutwe gwe ajwaire ekondo nyingi, kandi hahandiikirweho ibara eritarukumanywa muntu n'omu kwihaho uwe wenka.
Ajwaire ekanzu enyakwibikirwe omu sagama, kandi ibara eri bamweta niryo Kigambo kya Ruhanga.
Ab'amahe ag'omwiguru baamuhondera batembere embaraasi nyingi rweru, bajwaire bafuta erukunekaneka, erukwera kandi esemiire.
Omu kanwa ke haarugamu empirima enyakutoire ey'okutemesa amahanga, kandi aligalemesa omwigo ogw'ekyoma; abanyanzigwa be alibarubatirirra omu ndeeba ey'ekiniga kya Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona.
Ha kanzu ye na ha mpirima ye hahandiikirweho ibara: MUKAMA w'abakama kandi Mulemi w'abalemi.
Aho narora malaika ayemeriire omu izooba, yayeta n'iraka likooto enyonyi zoona eziharruka haiguru omu burangasa ati: “Mwije mwesorooze ha kiihuro ekikuru kya Ruhanga!
Mwije mulye enyama ey'abakama, ey'engabwa ez'amahe, n'ey'emanzi: enyama ey'embaraasi n'abatembi baazo, n'ey'abantu boona, ab'obugabe n'abairu, abato n'abakuru!”
Narora ekinyamaiswa eki, n'abakama ab'ensi, n'amahe gaabu ageesoroize kurwanisa Ogu anyakwikaliire ha mbaraasi n'okurwanisa ihe rye.

Ekinyamaiswa kyahambwa hamu n'omurangi ow'ebisuba ayakozire ebihuniriza omumaiso gaakyo. (Ebihuniriza ebyahabisize abo abatairweho akarorwaho k'ekinyamaiswa n'abo abaaramize ekisisani kyakyo.) Ekinyamaiswa n'omurangi ow'ebisuba byanagwa omu nyanja y'omurro erukwaka n'obuganga bikyali byomeezi.
Abaasigaireho bakaitwa empirima y'Ogu anyakwikarra ha mbaraasi, niyo mpirima enyakuruga omu kanwa ke; amahungu goona gaalya gaaniha emitumbi yabo.
Nubwo narozire malaika ondi naasirimuka naaruga omwiguru, akwasire omu ngaro ekisumuruzo eky'ekiina ekitaina h'okugarukira n'orujegere rukooto.
Yagenda yakwata ekijoka, niyo njoka egi eya ira enyakwetwa Omwohi kandi Sitaani, yamuboha kumara emyaka rukumi,
yamunaga omu kiina, yakiigarra, yakitaho enkwasi amazire kumwigalirramu, nukwo aleke kwongera kubiihabiiha amahanga, okuhika emyaka rukumi obu erihwa. Obu erihwaho asumururwe akaanya kake.

Hanyuma narora ebitebe by'obukama, abakaba babiikaliireho nubo abo abaahairwe obusobozi obw'okucwa emisango. Kandi narora emyoyo y'abo abaacwirweho emitwe habw'okujurra Kristo n'ekigambo kya Ruhanga. Nubo abo abatararamize kinyamaiswa rundi ekisisani kyakyo, abakaba batatairweho karorwaho kaakyo ha buso rundi ha mikono yabo. Baahumbuuka, baalema hamu na Kristo kumara emyaka rukumi.
Abafu abandi batahumbuuke okuhika emyaka egi rukumi obu yahoireho. Oku mukwo okuhumbuuka okw'okubanza.

W'omugisa kandi ahikiriire anyakubagana ha kuhumbuuka okw'okubanza! Abali nk'abo, okufa okwa kabiri tikubainaho busobozi; baitu baliba banyakatagara ba Ruhanga na Kristo, balirema hamu nawe okumara emyaka rukumi.
Emyaka rukumi obu erihwa, Sitaani alisumururwa aruge omu nkomo ye,
alituruka kubiihabiiha Gogu na Magogu, nugo amahanga agali ha mbaju ina ez'ensi agasorooleze obulemu. Omuhendo gw'abantu abo nigwingana omusenyi ogw'enyanja.
Bakagenda banyaaka ensi yoona, baagota orukande rw'abantu ba Ruhanga n'orubuga orukuru orugonzibwa; baitu omurro gwaruga omwiguru gwabahwerekereza,
kandi Omwohi ayababiihabiihaga yanagwa omu nyanja erukwaka omurro n'obuganga, nambere hakaba hali ekinyamaiswa n'omurangi ow'ebisuba, kandi nambere balibonabonesezibwa nyamusana n'ekiro ebiro byona.
Aho narora Ekitebe ky'obukama ekirukwera kandi eky'ekitiinisa n'Ogu ow'akaba akiikaliireho. Ensi n'iguru byairuka byaruga omumaiso ge, byaburra kimu.

Narora abafu, abakuru n'abato, beemeriire omumaiso g'ekitebe ky'obukama, kandi ebitabu byasuukurwa. Ekitabu ekindi nakyo kyasuukurwa, nikyo kitabu eky'obwomeezi. Abafu baacwerwa omusango habw'ebi ebi baakozire ebyahandiikirwe omu bitabu.
Enyanja yabooga emitumbi y'abagiferiiremu. Rufu na Kuzimu byagarra abafu abakaba babirumu. Boona baacwerwa omusango habw'ebi baakozire.
Nubwo Rufu na Kuzimu byanagirwe omu nyanja y'omurro. Kandi enyanja y'omurro, nukwo okufa okwa kabiri.
Omuntu weena ow'ibara lye litarahandiikirwe omu kitabu ky'obwomeezi yanagwa omu nyanja y'omurro.
