Nubwo narozire iguru erihyaka n'ensi empyaka. Habwokuba iguru ery'okubanza n'ensi ey'okubanza bikaba bihoireho, kandi enyanja ekaba etakyaroho.
Narora orubuga orurukwera, Yerusaalemu oruhyaka, nirusirimuka niruruga omwiguru hali Ruhanga, ruteekaniziibwe nk' omugole ou bakunisiize iba.
Kandi nahurra iraka likooto niriruga ha kitebe ky'obukama nirigamba liti: “Hati mumanye Ruhanga nkooku aikara n'abantu be. Aliikara nabo, babe bantu be, nawe wenka aliikara omulibo.
Alibasusura amaizi goona ag'omu maiso gabo. Orufu tiruligaruka kubaho, noobu kwakuba okuganya, rundi okurra, rundi obusaasi. Habwokuba ebintu ebya kara biriba bihoireho.”
Ogu ow'akaba asingire ha kitebe eky'obukama yagamba ati: “Hati ebintu byona nimbifoora bihyaka!” Yayongera yagamba ati: “Handiika binu, habwokuba binu bigambo by'okwesiga kandi by'amazima.”

Nubwo yangambiire ati: “Byona bihikiriziibwe! Ninyowe Alufa na Omega, amakuru gaabyo: Entandiko kandi Empero. Weena anyakukwatwa iroho ndimuha amaizi agatali g'okugura, agarukuruga omu iziba ery'amaizi ag'obwomeezi.
Weena anyakusingura, bunu nubwo buliba bugwetwa bwe: Ndiba Ruhanga we, kandi uwe aliba mwana wange.
Baitu abatiini, abataikiriza, abanugwa, abaisi b'abantu, abasiihani, abarogo, abaramya abacwezi n'abanyabisuba boona, omugabo gwabo eriba enyanja erukwaka omurro n'obuganga. Nukwo okufa okwa kabiri.”
Nubwo haizire omu ha baamalaika omusanju, abakaba baina ebibindi musanju ebiijwire emihito musanju eya ha mpero, yangambira ati: “Ija, nkwoleke Omugole, omukazi w'Omwana gw'Entaama.”
Yantwara ha rusozi orukooto kandi oruraihire ntemberwe Mwoyo Ahikiriire, yanyoleka orubuga orurukwera, Yerusaalemu, nirusirimuka niruruga omwiguru hali Ruhanga,
rwina ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga. Okwangasana kwarwo nikusisana ibaale ery'omuhendo omukooto, nirusisana ibaale yasipi, nirwengengeta nka ibaale kristalo.

Rukaba rwehinguliriziibwe ekigo ekikooto kandi ekiraihire. Kiina amalembo ikumi n'abiri, ha malembo ago haroho bamalaika ikumi na babiri; kandi na ha malembo hahandiikirweho amabara ag'enganda ikumi na ibiri ez'Abaisirairi.
Ha Burugaizooba amalembo asatu, bukiizi bw'emoso amalembo asatu, bukiizi bw'obulyo amalembo asatu, na Bugwa-izooba amalembo asatu.
Ekigo ky'orubuga oru kikaba kiina amabaale g'omusingi ikumi n'abiri agahandiikirweho amabara ikumi n'abiri ag'abakwenda ikumi na babiri ab'Omwana gw'Entaama.
Malaika ayabalize na nyowe, akaba aina orubango orwa zaabbu orw'okulengesa orubuga, amalembo gaarwo n'ebisiika byarwo.

Orubuga oru rukaba rwina embaju ina ezirukwingana, obura bwarwo bwainganaga n'obugazi bwarwo. Orubuga yarulengesa orubango, rwahikya kilomita enkumi ibiri n'ebbina; obura, obugazi n'obwemi bwarwo nibwingana.
Malaika yayongera yalenga ekisiika kyarwo, kyahikya mita nkaaga oburaiha, abantu nkooku baalenga.
Ekisiika kikombekwa na mabaale g'omuhendo agarukwetwa yasipi, baitu orubuga rukombekwa na zaabbu yonyini, erukumuliikana nk'ekirahule.
Emisingi ey'ekisiika ky'orubuga ekaba etonerwe n'amabaale ag'omuhendo aga buli mulingo. Omulingo ogw'okubanza, niryo ibaale yasipi, erya kabiri saafiro, erya kasatu kalukeedoni, erya kana simaragido,
erya kataano sarudoni, erya mukaaga saarudiyo, erya musanju kirisoolito, erya munaana beerilo, erya mwenda topaazi, erya ikumi krisoopuraso, erya ikumi na limu yasinto, erya ikumi n'abiri ametisito.
amalembo ikumi n'abiri, nugo amabaale ag'eruuru ikumi n'ibiri, buli irembo lyombekerwe n'eruuru emu yonka; kandi ikuute ery'orubuga likaba likozirwe na zaabbu yonyini, erukumuliikana nk'ekirahule.
Omu rubuga oru ntarolemu Nju ya Ruhanga, habwokuba MUKAMA Ruhanga ow'obusobozi bwona n'Omwana gw'Entaama nubo Nju ya Ruhanga y'orubuga oru.
Kandi orubuga oru tirurukwetaaga izooba rundi okwezi eby'okurujwera, habwokuba ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga nikyo kyererezi kyarwo kandi Omwana gw'Entaama niyo taara yarwo.
Amahanga galigendera omu kyererezi kyarwo; kandi abakama b'ensi baliruleetamu ekitiinisa kyabo.
Amalembo gaarwo tigalikingwa nyamusana omurundi na gumu; kandi oku, obwire tibwairege.
Baliruleetamu ekitiinisa ky'amahanga n'itungo lyago.

Baitu ekintu kyona ekitasemiire tikirirutaahamu, noobwakubaire omuntu weena anyakukora ekirukunugwa rundi eby'obugobya; baitu halitaahamu abo bonka abaahandiikirwe omu kitabu eky'obwomeezi eky'Omwana gw'Entaama.
Nubwo malaika yanyolekere ekisaaru eky'amaizi ag'obwomeezi, ekirukwangasana nk'ibaale kristaalo, ekirukugera nikiruga ha kitebe ky'obukama ekya Ruhanga n'eky'Omwana gw'Entaama,

nikiraba hagati y'ikuute ery'orubuga orukuru. Ha buli rubaju orw'ekisaaru hakaba haliyo emiti y'obwomeezi enyakwina ebijuma byayo by'emiringo ikumi n'ebiri, enyakwana ebijuma buli kwezi; kandi ebikoora byayo bikaba biri by'okutambira abantu ab'amahanga.
Omu rubuga oru tihaligaruka kuzookamu kintu kyona ekikyenerwe, baitu haraikaramuga ekitebe ky'obukama ekya Ruhanga n'eky'Omwana gw'Entaama, kandi abaheereza be balimuramya.
Balirora amaiso ge, kandi ibara lye liriba ha buso bwabo.
Obwire tibuligaruka kwira; tibalyetaaga kererezi ky'etaara rundi izooba, habwokuba MUKAMA Ruhanga nuwe araabamulikiraga kandi balirema ebiro byona.
Hanyuma malaika yangambira ati: “Ebigambo binu by'okwesiga kandi by'amazima. MUKAMA Ruhanga anyakuha abarangi omwoyo ogw'okuranga, atumire malaika we ayoleke abaheereza be ebiri haihi kubaho.”
Kandi Yesu yagamba ati: “Hati nu, ndi haihi kwija. W'omugisa ogu arukukwata ebigambo ebyarangirwe ebiri omu kitabu kinu.”
Nyowe Yohaana, ninyowe ayahuliire kandi ayarozire ebintu ebi. Obu nabihuliire kandi mbirozire, najuumara ha bigere bya malaika ayabinyolekere kumuramya;
baitu yantanga ati: “Otakisura! Nyowe ndi muheereza nka iwe kandi nka bagenzi bawe abarangi, kandi nk'abo abakwata ebigambo ebiri omu kitabu kinu. Ramya Ruhanga!”
Kandi yanteererra ati: “Ebigambo ebyarangirwe ebiri omu kitabu kinu otabiculerra, habwokuba akasumi kabyo kali haihi kuhika.
Arukukora kubi, leka akole kubi, arukusiisa, leka asiise; arukukora ebihikire, leka abikole; kandi arukwera, ayeyongere omu burukwera.”
Yesu yagamba ati: “Dora ndi haihi kwija. Nyina empeera ey'okusasura buli omu habw'ebi yakozire.
Ninyowe Alufa na Omega, amakuru gaakyo: Ow'okubanza kandi Nw'okumalirra, Entandiko kandi Empero.”
B'omugisa abo aboogya ebijwaro byabu bakabyeza, nukwo baikirizibwe kulya ha bijuma by'emiti y'obwomeezi n'okutaaha orubuga orukuru nibaleetwa omu malembo.
Aheeru yarwo haikarayo embwa, abarogo, abasiihani, abaisi b'abantu, abaramya abacwezi na boona abagonza kandi abaikaliza eby'obugobya.
“Nyowe Yesu, nkutumiire malaika wange akumanyise binu, nukwo bigasire ebitebe by'abaikiriza. Ninyowe kikoro kandi mwijukuru ow'oruganda rwa Daudi, enyunyuuzi erukwangasana ey'omu rukyakya.”

Mwoyo Ahikiriire n'Omugole nibagamba bati: “Rugayo.” Kandi weena arukuhurra, leka agambe ati: “Rugayo.” Kandi wena anyakukwasirwe iroho, leka aije; na weena arukwetaaga, leka anywe amaizi ag'obwomeezi agatarukugurwa.
Nyowe Yohaana, nimpabura weena arukuhurra ebigambo ebyarangirwe ebiri omu kitabu kinu: Kakuba omuntu abyongeraho, Ruhanga alimwongeraho emihito enyakusoboroirwe omu kitabu kinu.
Kandi omuntu kakuba abikeehyaho, Ruhanga talimwikiriza kuhika ha muti ogw' obwomeezi n'omu rubuga orurukwera, ebisoboroirwe omu kitabu kinu.
Ogu arukugumya binu naagamba ati: “Mazimakwo ndi haihi kwija.” Nukwo kibe! Ija MUKAMA Yesu!
Embabazi za MUKAMA Yesu ziikale n'abantu be boona. Amiina.
